column2: Abraham chapa Devid, ava Chapa Jisu Khrista ki charuwl Laaika.
Abraham ma Isek pah, ungu Isek ka Jakob pah; Jakob pa Juda leh mnaopale pah,
Juda le mnumei Tamar ri Peres leh Yera pah, Peres ava Hesron pah, Hesron na Ram pah,
ungu Ram ma Aminadab pah, Aminadab pa Nashon pah, Nashon na Salman pah,
Salman na Rahab leh Boas pah, ungu Boas leh Ruth ti Obed pah, Obed ti Jessi pah
Ungta Jessia kruwng Devid pah.
Ungta Devid ta mnumei Uriah numei ava tu Solomon pah,
Ungu Solomon na Rehoboam pah, Rehoboam ma Abija pah, Abija ava Asa pah
ungta Asa ava Jehosaphat pah, Jehosaphat ta Joram pah, Joram ma Ujiah pah,
ungu Ujiah ava Jotham pah, Jotham ma Ahas pah, Ahas ava ngi Hejekiah pah,
Ungta Hejekiah ngi Manaseh pah, Manaseh ngi Amos pah, Amos ava ngi Josiah pah,
ungu Josiah ngi Jekheniah leh mnaopa le ava pah, mmaan ava Babylon thu paam suwkki ma am in mpha thung ki kurthuwk.
Ungta Babylon tha paam suwk ki ma am dil thaanni: Jekheniah ngi Sheltil pah, Sheltil li Jerubabel pah,
Jerubabel li Abiud pah, Abiud ti Eliakim pah, Aliakim mi Ajor pah,
ungu Ajor ri Jadok pah, Jadok ki Akhim pah, Akhim mi Eliud pah,
ungta Eliud ta Eleajar pah, Eleajar ra Mathan pah, Mathan na Jakob pah,
ungu Jakob pi Khrista mdo dit Jisu ṭou na Mery ava innpu Joseph pah.

Ava leiji charuwl rek mkheng Abraham thungki ngi Devid kpha ava charuwl rek sowm leiplii, ungu Devid thung ki ngi Babylon tha paam suwk ki ma am naan ava charuwl sowm lei plii, ungta Babylon paam suwk thung ki ngi Khrista kpha ava charuwl sowm lei plii kurthuwk.
Tunva Jisu Khrista ava mlam hanto ngi ṭou da. Mnuh Mery ava Joseph pi inn mthlot dok mpha thu, mmaanni mpaalve du inni pthla kchiir nao kuhur dok jap ksa ngi pha da;
ungta minnpu Joseph ava mrinkindit miilai kurthuwk da, ning kja mhin pii nuwm mda; tupruti mbowr tlo pthii nuwm da.
Pdainu mma ngi hava mreel bing thu, asuwn, mmer khatti Mukpu waan tamsii ngi ktardet da, theda; “Devid chapa Joseph, anumei Mery klou rang nga ṭi ma; mleija mma thungki ava pthla kchiir ri kurthuwk,
mma ngi chapa khat kuplu ra; ungu mmiing ava Jisu dida phuwk nadi, mleija Mma ngi pnu rek thung ki mmii rek kaktlan pik ra.”
Mukpu ngi khulpu rek hin mdo the dok hava mkheng mkurkhum nra thuwk da:
“Asuwin, ktlangdang nala khatti nao hur donle Chapa khat kuplu ra; ungu mmiing ava Emmanuel kdi ra.”
‘ava ki mlei ja Isowr ri miti ṭhiinna’.
Joseph pi ki iip mhan kardel mpha thu, Mukpu waantamsii paureen ava heppi tlo da; mnu mei ava louda,
Pdainu Chapa khat pluda Jisu dida mmiing mphuwk du khim khai kunlom lamme; ungta mmiing ava Jisu dida phuwk da.
Tunva kruwng Herod mpha thu Judia ki Bethlehem thung ngi Jisu mṭou mpha thu, asuwn, kniw thuwna ktongki ksing mii rek Jerusalem tha arhang lamda; the lamda,
“Jehudia rek Kruwng kṭou Mma ava tva thung da? Mleija kniw thuwna ktong tha Mma bursi neenni dei innu, ungta luw kbuk chra kthleng in ping.”
Kruwng Herod ti hava maryaak mpha thu, kunchul da, ungta Jerusalem thungki mma kurthlo ṭhi rek mii mkheng;
ungta thiimpu kinreel rek,ava ki mii rek Nowlam chukpu rek, mkheng tu kurbuk da, mmaan hin Khrista ṭou nrang tva thung da kdingi pau khewl lamda.
Mmaanni mhin the lamda, “Judia ki Bethlehem thungra; mleija ava khulpu rekki mdo kjit dok:
‘Ungta Judia paam thungki,
O Bethlehem nang ava,
Judia paam kpu rek arlakki mikdil sii ruk kurthuwk pti;
mleija kmii Isreel rek leen kpaal ra,
nah athung ngi paam kpu khat kurjung ra.’ ”
Ava dilli Herod ti ksing mii rek ava tuprutti ownda, bursi mkandanna mpha ava khewl lamda ungu kminni deida;
Ungta mma ngi Bethlehem tha hai sii lamda; theda, “Naanni va inra nao ava ktippi athlaam in; ungu aphaak inta, nei ruk va luw kdo hai buk chaak nra, pauna marvan hur pik chaan.”

Mmaanni kruwng dothe maryaak dok dil thaanni mlam ṭoi nraan tha chet lamda; ungta asuwn, kniw thuwna tha mdo dee in bursi ava ngi nao amna mun ava phada mri du khim khai mdu suk inni ru rit pik lamda.
Mmaanni bursi mdee in thungta, klin sii ngi kanpa, kheel sii ki kanpa ngi;

inn ava thu mhailu in thungta nao ava leh mnuh Mery dei lamda, ungta kuwn lamda luw buk chlam da. Ava dilli msumbuwr in pvang lamda; jeering leh reidii ungu myrrh tdit ava Mhin chla tlaaiji down chlam da.
Ungta mer khat ti mhin inni pau mdo kham pik lam dil kṭoiji, mmaanni Herod hin mdil in kinle kma; lam msik khat lep lamda mpaam thaanni sun lamda.

Tunva mmaanni msun dok inle, asuwn; Mukpu waan tamsii ngi Joseph mer khatti ktardet da ungu theda, “Kardel ra nao ava leh mnuh aṭhira Egypt tha echen in; ungu Neiji akthe pik du khim khai ava tha jiam daat in, mleija Herod ti nao ava mdo aeyo nra kthlaam ra kurthlong nga.”
Ungta mma ngi kardel da nao ava leh mnuh ṭhida, jaanni Egypt tha sun lamda;
ungu Herod mdiyo du khim khai ava tha am chdaat lamda. Hava khulpu hin ni Mukpu ngi mdo the dok, “Kchapa ava Egypt thungki kdo own;” dida mdo the ava mkurkhum na kurthuwkda.

Ava dilli Herod ti ksing mii rek dohuwn chaak na ava mdee thungta kdung ngi plung pthit da, ungta ksing mii rek hinki mpha mdo dee dok dil kṭoiji, Bethlehem ungu mpaamkowl thungki kum knii ki ngi mkurdu ki psel nao mkheng mdo eayo nraan mii sii da.
Ava dilli khulpu Jeremiah do the dok ava kurkhum da;
“Ungta kdung ngi kurnung karbaang da
kṭap krowl khat Ramah thu aryaa da,
Rachel li mnao le tummi ṭap da;
mleija mmaan ma amma leiji,
mii do pthlai ra ava ro me.”
Pdainu Herod mdiyo thungta, asuwn; Mukpu waan tamsii ngi Joseph mer khatti Egypt thung ngi ktardet da; theda,
“Kardel ra nao ava leh mnuh aṭhira; ungta Isreel paam tha hung in, mleija nao ava rinkhu kthlaam mii ava kdiyou kcha a.”
Ungta mma ngi kardel da nao ava leh mnuh ava ṭhida Isreel paam tha hung lamda.

Pdainu Arkhelius ava ngi mpah Herod kchang donda Judia paam kpu ngi ka amma tdit maryaak thungta, ava tha mvan rang nga mma ngi ṭi chda, ungta mmer ri pau mdo kham pik dil kṭoiji Galil paamkowl tha thliir chda.
Ungu mma ngi Nasareth tdit khuwpii khat thung ngi vangda am chda. “Mma ava Nasareth mii khat di donle ku ownra,” dida khulpu rek hin mdo the ava mkurkhumna kurthuwk da.
Mpha ava thu baptis kuptlot Johon thlengda, Judia thungki kbowklaiji paryaam da.
“Plung ren ahur in, mleija parwaan Kruwngpaam ava knai tekka.”
Mleija “Kbowklaiji krowl khatti owngda:
Mukpu lamṭoi ra apurchuwl pik,
Mkhu ther nrang rek arjit pik;”
havaa khulpu Isaijah ngi mdo the dok kat kurthuwk da.
Tunva Johon na ut mulli turkhown dona hiil naa da, murkowl saavun sulpaar kparyeel da; ungu khaopruwn leh nowm pkhui dii chaa needa.
Ungta Jerusalem thungki, ungu Judia mkheng thungki,ungta Jordon paamkowl mkheng thungki, mii rek ava mma hin thlengda,
ungta mmaanni mupnu ton in mdo the thut intu kilṭhi ngi Jordon kreng thu mma ngi baptis ptlot pik lamda.

Pdainu mma ngi Pharisi rek leh Sadusi rek knempok baptis ktlo ra karva slii ava mdee thungta, mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Pruwl doi naorek naan! Plung thit kthleng rang thungki kchen daak ra ak sii inna ku da?
Plung ren kuhur akurhui nraan thei echui in;
‘Neen kpah raanna Abraham kthloi in,’ dida adaksaa in thung ngi kthe nuwmmi am maan; mleija neiji akthe inna, Isowr va hava lung rek thungki ava Abraham naole ngi kpurthuw kapchaang ra.
Tun rukva ding rek arjuwng leen ṭhii rek kaksai daatta; thei kṭha kchui kma ding rek khim khaija phuwr donle mei thu kvar pthii ra.

“Plung ren kuhur leiji neiva dii ngi baptis akuptlot in; pdainu nei kdil ṭoida karvang Mma ava nei kihinnu klin lang lang,Mkhu kok rek ruk kuhur rang nga nea kurhui chmaang; Mma ava ngi pthla kchiir leh mei tu kurthloppi baptis akuptlot chraan.
Mdo pkhui nrangki tuhu ava mkhut thung ngi ka am daat, Mma ngi pkhuida mdo pintiin kehu mchang rek ava ktom thu kthiira, pdainu mpirvii ava kṭuw knai kma mei thu kapkaa pthiira.”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi Johon hin baptis mdolo chaak nra Galil ki Jordon tha arvang da.
“Nang ngi nei baptis ado tuptlot rang kchang, nei kihin ni Nang kthleng pti mo?” dida kthe pkhaan ruk kro.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Tunva anto chdaat so; mleija rinkindit rek mkheng nenni tpurkhum na kurthuwk ra. Ava dilli Johon ni ro da.
Ungta Jisu ngi baptis mtlot mpha thu dii thungki kbei sekki arhun thuwk teng da,ungu asuwn, parwaan kparvang da, uṭhuw heppi Isowr pthla arjung ṭumda, mleen ni kchuk dei da; ungta mleenni lengda.
Ungu asuwn, parwaan ki krowl khatti theda, “Hava Nei kwonsat lo Kchapa, Mhin kning kthlung nga.”
Ava dilli Jisua dijabowl do pthleem ra pthla ngi kbowklai tha ṭhida.
Ungta Mma ngi nii somplii jaan som plii thu then ngowl da, ava dilthang ro ngi mpoi tham da.
Ungta kepthleem mi Mhin arva da, theda, “Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta hava lung rekka thenpen apur owl.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthawng da, “Ava mdo kjit dok.”
‘Thenpen daatti mii ava ring nime; pdainu Isowr ner thungki kthuwk pauna ava khim khai daat ra.’
Ava dilli dijabowl li kchiir khuwpii tha hanṭhida, ungta luwbuk Inn kchuwng ver leenni kalṭhida.
Ungu Mhin theda, “Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta adaksaa ava jungkhuwng; mleija ava kjit dok da,
Nah aksut pṭoi ra Mma ngi waan tamsii rek akpiira ungta lung khdaat preva ngi akhu mdo thown ma nra, mkhut inni akukjowng lamra.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Ava ruk mdo kjit dok; nang ngi nang ki Isowr Mukpu ava ado pthleem ro nime.”
Veikhat nowlli dijabowlli lown kparthaang sii ava leen ṭhida dultipaam thungki kruwngpaam rek mkheng leh mlaarnee Mhin tdet da,
Ungta Mhin theda, “Nang ngi tluwda luw atbuk bi havale mkheng nga Nah hin apii chnik di.”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Esun dok, Seitaan mleija hava mdo kjit dok; ‘nang ngi nangki Isowr Mukpu ava luw ado buk ra ungta Mma daat hin sok adolo ra.’”
Ava dilli dijabowlli Mma ava ma pthii da; ungu asuwn,waan tamsii arjung da Mhin sok lo pik da.
Tunva Johon mdo kjown dok in Mma ngi maryaak thungta, Galil tha vang thliir chda.
Ungta Nasareth ma thida truwn biing ngi Kaparnahum tha, Jebulun leh Naptali paamkowl tha am chdaat da.
Khulpu Isaijah dothe dok ava mkurkhum na kurthuwk da:
“Jebulun paam leh Naptali paam tha,
Jordon arkaan da,truwn ktong tha,
ktlok chati rek Galil ava tha,
kjiing thu ka am mii rekki,
klin lang lang ki mar awng dei da,
ungta ava paamkowl tha ungu,
kdiyou thu ka am mii rek hin mar awng kleng nga.”
Mpha ava thu Jisu ngi kparyaam pṭhunda, theda, plung ren ahur chaan, mleija parwaan Kruwngpaam ava knai tekka.
Mma ngi Galil truwn be ngi mkurlon thungta,Pitor mdo dit Simon leh mnaopa Andrija unao knii ngi truwn thu kchak kdeeng slii hai deida; mleija mmaanna tuwlva kukjowng mii rek lam.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kdil aṭoi chaan; ungu Neiji mii rek kukjowng apurthuw nikaan di.”
Ungta mmaanni makchak rek in ma pthii teng lam thida, Mma dil ṭoi chlam da.
Ungu ava thungki anto kchet slii ngi Jebidi chapa rek Jeems leh mnaopa Johon unao knii rekki, mpah in Jebidi tu arkuwng leen makchak rek in ktuphut slii meek deida; ungbi Mma ngi own lamda.
Ungta mmaanni arkuwng leh mpah in ava ma pthii teng lamda, ungu Mma dil ṭoi chlam da.
Ungta Jisu ngi Galil paam mkheng thu tlowng da, synagog rek thu purchuk da; ungu Kruwngpaam kṭha paumin paryaam da, ungta omlai khim khai leh mii rek arlakki msik msik omlaiji kukoi pdam da.

Syria paam mkheng nga Mma mlei thung ngi pauren rek kurjou da, ungta kukoi rek mkheng Mhin ṭhi paphaak lamda; omlai msik msikki kukoi rek, ungu kpaang kma rek; ramṭhi rek, arngol rek; kyeng rek Mma ngi pdam pik lamda.
Ungta Galil thungki, Dikapoli thungki, Jerusalem thungki, Judia thungki, ungu Jordon hai kheel dek thung ki mii rek klin lang lang ngi kurtuwl da Mdil ṭoida.
Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rek mdee thungta, lown tun hangda, mku on thungta, msiikhu rek Mhin arhang lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mner pvangda mhin inni purchuk da theda.
“Pthla ktong tha sra rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija parwaan Kruwngpaam ava mmaan tum.
“Kurnung karbaang da kṭap rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija mmaanna lungam kpii chlamra.
“Plung kdowng rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija mmaanni dultipaam kpha chlamra.
“Rinkindit tummi poitham ningkraal kparteel rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija mmaan ava kpapa chlamra.
“Plung knei rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija mmaanni plungnee kpha chlamra.
“Plung kpinchel rek ava msuwnkṭha, mleija mmaanni Isowr kdei chlamra.
“Kdaai kpii rek ava msuwn kṭha, mleija mmaan ava Isowr naole kdira.
“Rinkindit tummi kja kakham kparteel rek ava msuwn kṭha, mleija parwaan Kruwngpaam ava mmaan tum.
“Nei ktummi naan ava mii rekki ning er aplo inda,kja kakham piida kṭha kma mkheng plei neida mdo the psuk naan ava asuwnkṭha.
Plung kngammi ekanpa chaan, mleija naanki mnah ava parwaan tha klinra; mleija mii rek ava ngi naan adu inni khulpu rek ava mdo pjat mdo pkham in.
“Naan ava dultipaam ki pti in pti; pdainu pti ngi ma al mmaan chaakku, tak heppi ka al nowl rang da? Ava var pthiida mii rekki mdo ther kma donle do khat lee sii me.
“Naan ava dultipaam ki mar awng in pti. Lown khat leenni khuwpii khat ka am ava kurdowl pchaang nime.
Mata mii rekki meila khat pchuk thida tomkol ti ngi thii nime, pdainu mrina khat leenni kthiira; ungu inn thungki mkheng ka awnra.
Naanki kṭha nong rek mmaanni deida ungu parwaan tha ka am naan Apah hin mdo punlor nra, naanki mar awng ava mii rek maiṭhuwmmi kdung ngi lengso.
“Neia Nowlam leh khulpu rek kpamaang ra kurjung pi kdingi naanva bin maan; Neiva kpamaang rang ki kurjung pmaang, pdainu kpurkhum rangki ping.
Mleija, kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, parwaan leh dulti mmaan du khim khai, Nowlam thungki kbii, mdit mata bindu khdaat preva mkheng ava mkurkhum du khim khai maang nime.

Ava leiji ku mii khatti hava paureen rek kdil sii khat leek pthii thida, mii rek hin anto hep daatti mpurchu bi, parwaan Kruwngpaam tha mikdil sii kdi ngi ku ownra. Pdainu ava tloda ungu kpurchuk mmaan ava parwaan Kruwngpaam tha klin sii ngi ku ownra.
Mleija ahin thaanni Neiji kthea, naan rinkhu kindit ava Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rek mapkheel mabi, parwaan Kruwngpaam lut chip pchaang ni maanti.
“‘Nang ngi mii eayou ma; ungu mii ke eayou ku mii khat ava ksoi liit kma kekṭewlra,’ dida mii pliw rek hin mdo the naanni ado aryaak dok in.

Pdainu Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mu u mnao plungthit kuplo mii pum ktai ava ksoi liit kma kekṭewl ra; ku mii khatti mu u mnao ava ning er pauvi muplo psuk bi, karseel lop ktur oira, ungu ku mii khatti ‘ka aak!’ dida mthebi, sim mei thung ngi ktla ra.
Ava leiji naanni kchiir suwlbuwr hin chla tlaai adown in ungu a u anao inni mruk ado taplaal chaak naan abin phaak inta,
downda ado piik raan ava kchiir suwlbuwr maiṭhuwmmi ama lap thiinra, ru kri ngi a u anao hin vang inra ekarman dok in; thiinra arva inra ado piik chaak raan chla tlaai ava adown chaan.

Naan arawlmii intu kekṭewl rangki ache slii arlaan inni, kbeiji plap akurthut ṭhi dok maanbi, naan arawlmii inni kekṭewl mii hin akparlaan pthii raan, ungu kekṭewl mii va kseel hin,ungta kseel mii va rowng inn thu akthii raan.
Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni mṭut na sum ava achoi dok du in khim khai ava thungki thuwk chip pchaang ni maan ti.
“‘Losang kṭhi rome,’ dida mdo the naanni aryaak in.
Pdainu Neiji akthe inna, kturdouvi snu khat ksuw ku mii khat ava mma tu kilṭhi ngi mplung rilli karmak nong mtlot dokka.
Naan achang inki mik ki pnu akaptla raan mkurthutta,akhor pthiin ra avar pthiin; naan adaksaa in mkheng sim thu mtlaak rang kchang nga, naan athung kiin khat kmaang kcha ava ngi kursuk sii ra.
Ungta naan achang inki khutti pnu akaptla raan mkurthutta, areen buk inra avar pthiin; naan adaksaa in mkheng sim thu atlaak raan kchang nga, khut khat kmaang kcha ava ngi kursuk sii ra.
“Hanto ruk va theda, ‘Ku mii khatti mnu mei bowr mtlot pthii ta, bowr mdo tlot na ki mlei akjit sora mhin apii so.’

Pdainu Neiva ahin thaanni kthea, mma ngi mkirmet ma lei daatti ku mii khatti mnumei bowr mtlot pthii bi, mma leen losang mṭhia; ungta mbowr mdo tlot pthii snu ava klou ku mii khat ava ruk va losang mṭhia.
“ ‘Kindit kma thu paureel ma; pdainu Mukpu hin apaureel dok ava atlo,’ dida pliw mii rek hin mdo the naanni aryaak nowl in.
Pdainu Neiva ahin thaanni kthea, ‘Naanni parwaan ktham da pau adoreel in rome, mleija ava Isowr ko onna.
Mata dulti ktham da paukreel rome, mleija ava klin lang lang ki Kruwng khuwpii.
Ungta aluwn ktham da paukreel rome,mleija sam arjik khdaat preva kpupowl mdit mata kpuvom pchaang maanti.’
Naanni ko ol tekki ado the raan ava ‘Oji,’ mdit mata ‘Eme;’ hava hai hinni kthuwk pau ava kṭhakma jesang.
“ ‘Mik tummi mik khat ungu haa tummi haa khat,’ dida mdo the ava naanni ado aryaak dok in.
Pdainu Neiva ahin thaanni kthea, kṭhakma khat ava phuw lou maan; pdainu ku mii khatti achang inki abiing thaanni atitpeen inta, khat ktongki ruk mhin adoi pik in.
Ku mii khatti mdo oiji aphrik in ktha khat mlota, aphrik in kder ruk asu pik in;
ungta ku mii khatti meel khat ache nraan atnam duwl inta, meel knii kpha ache ṭhiin.
Ahin thaanni kaktham hin apiin, ungu ahin inni kurpu chra ava mat maan.
“‘Aveen wonsat alo ungu aksnuwm kma ava apder cha,’ dida mdo the naanni aryaak dok in.
Pdainu Neiva ahin thaanni kthea, aksnuwm kma rek wonsat alo in ungu kja kakham akpii rek tummi aṭhil pik chaan;
anto mkurthut bi parwaan ki Apah naole kurthuwk naan di; mleija kniw ava kṭhakma leh kṭha leen arhan kthuwk ungu kindit leh kindit kma leen khuw mdo prat.
Mleija naan wonsat aklo chaan hin daatti wonsat alo innu, ava talu mnah pha chnaan di? Khasna klou rek ruk va anto heppi mdo tlot pme mo?
Naanki a u anao in hin daatti salaam atlot innu, mii murson rek hinnu talu kheelli ado tlot in ka amma? Ktlok chati rek ruk va anto heppi mdo tlot in pme mo?
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, parwaan ki Apah inni mkinreel mkurthut lulu ngi naan rukka kinreel akurthut maan rome.
“Mii rek maiṭhuwmmi mmaan do dee rang ngi plung klut dotlot ado tlot ma nraan chek asin chaan; anto mkurthut mabi parwaan ki Apah in hinki mnah thloi chni maan ti.

“Ava leiji, naanni apiik chaak in mpha thu; adu suk inni peengkhul dum maan, ṭha tlot ktlo rekki synagog thu,ungu lamṭhuwm rek thu mii rek do panpaak rang ngi mdo tlot in lulu tlo maan. Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea; mmaanki mnah ava mdo arlaan chaak dok in.
Pdainu naanni apiik chaak in mpha thu, achang inki khut dotlot ava alee inki khut pdee maan;
anto mkurthut bi ado piik chaak rek in ava kurthuwk ra; ungta tuprutti aksut pṭoi chaan Apah inni mnah akpii chraan.

“Ungta naanni aṭhil chaak in mpha thu,ṭha tlot ktlo rek lulu akurthut raan pme; mleija mmaanni synagog rek thu ungu lamṭhuwm rek arkil thu, mii rek dodee rang ngi rip da kṭhil cha ava mdo ngei in. Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea,mmaan ki mnah ava mdo arlaan chaak dok in.

Pdainu naanni aṭhil chaak in mpha thu, innka thu vangluwt inra ungu thurngot asul in thiinra tuprutti ka am naanki Apah ava hin aṭhil chaan; ungu tuprutti aksut pṭoi in naanki Apah ava ngi mnah akpii chraan.
“Ungta kṭhil cha thungva ktlok chati rek dotlot lulu ngi do ksii kma ngi pau purnuwm maan; mleija mpauna rek in knempok leiji karyaak pik lamra kdingi bin lamda.
Mmaan hep daat kurthuwk maan, mleija naanni aṭhil chaak du in liitti ado kriin chaak in ava Apah inni mdo dee dok.
“Hanto lulu ngi aṭhil chaan:
Parwaan tha ka am neenki Kpah,
Nah amiing kchiir kurthuwk so.
Nah Akruwngpaam kurjung kurthuwk so,
Parwaan tha aplung bin ado tlot heppi,
dultipaam thu kurthuwk so.
Mnii ktaiki thenpen tnii mhai pii chaan;
ungta neen rukku neen ki lei ktuwl rek
kdo ptlot pik in heppi, klei tuwl rek in
mhai ptlot pik chaan;
ungta kepthleem thu mhai ptla chmaan,
pdainu kṭha kma thungki mhai arthuw chaan;
mleija Kruwngpaam, ungta rutan,
ungu laarnee ava kṭuw knai kma ki Nah ado:
Amen
Mleija naanni mii rek do parma na aptlot pik inbi, parwaan ki Apah in ruk va ado parma naan thungki akuptlot pik chraan.
Pdainu naanni mii rek do parma na thungki aptlot pik maanbi, Apah in rukva ado parma naan thungki aptlot pik in nime.

“Ungta naanni then angowl in mpha thu, ṭha tlot ktlo rek lulu ngi; mik sut na thung ngi arda kdowng ngi am maan, mleija mmaanni then mngowl in mpha thu mii rek do dee nrang ngi mmai in tpurnung lamda. Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mmaanki mnah ava mdo arlaan chaak dok in.
Pdainu naanni then angowl in mpha thu, aluwn thao apbul inra ungu amai in aphiit in.
Ungu mii ngi athen ngowl in ava dei nime pdainu tuprutti ka am naan ki Apah in, ungta tuprutti aksut pṭoi in naanki Apah inni mnah akpii chraan.
“Ngeetti pṭum da tampei kakaak chra, ungu kupru rekki pkui donle mdo prut chaak ra; dultipaam thu adaksaa kiinra alrou purtuwl maan.
Pdainu ngeet do pṭum mara tampei kakaak kmara ungu kupru ngi mdo prut chaak mara, adaksaa inki tumra parwaan tha alrou apurtuwl chaan.
Mleija naanki alrou am na thung ngi aplung bin in rukka ka am ra.
“Daksaa meila ava mik. Ava leiji amik in mdam bi, adaksaa in mkheng nga mar awng ngi kdimra;
pdainu amik in mdam mabi, adaksaa in mkheng nga kjiing ngi kdim chra. Naan thungki mar awng ngi mjiinbi; ava tija thung ngi klin kurthuwk chdaat rang!

“Ku mii khat lee ngi chukpu knii sok lo nime; mleija mma ngi khat pder chthi donle khat wonsat klo ra, mdit mata khat hin plung plut bet thi donle khat hin pau kleek psuk ra. Naanni Isowr leh alrou sok adolown ro nime.

“Ava leiji Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni arinkhuwn mlei thu, talu chaa nikdi mdit mata talu nee nikdi mdit mata adaksaan mlei thu talu hiil naa nikdi kdingi plung pja maan. Then hinnu rinkhu ungta dona hinnu daksaa ava ngi kheel sii pme mo?
Kjuwng puwa rekka asuwn; mmaanni pṭau lamme, arkun lamme, ktom thung ruk va purkuk lamme; anto daat joso parwaan ki naan Apah ngi mdo pmaal chaak lam. Naanna mmaan kheel dek kurthuwk maan ti mo?
Ungta naan ku mii khatti plung mdo pjat leiji mrinkhu khutup khdaat pang pre mpursown pchaan mo?
Ungu talu leiji naanni adona naak raan mlei thung ngi plung apjat inna? Bil thungki duwm rei rekka tak heppi kukmowng tdit abin phaak in, mmaanni nong lou lamme, plaa ruk arvai lamme;
anto daat joso Neiji akthe pik inna, Solomon daat ruk va mlaarnee mkheng nga havale khat hep daatti hiil naame.

Pdainu snii ngi kring daat ungu pduk nii ngi lung plu thung ngi tdii pthiira, bil thungki arna rek daat rap klua Isowr ri mpihiillu, O, kthlowm suwnni krin cha mii rek, Mma ngi naanna kheel sii ngi apihiil in nime mo?
Ava leiji, naanni ‘Talu chaa nikdi?’ mdit mata ‘Talu nee nikdi?’ mdit mata ‘Talu hiil naa nikdi?’ kdingi plung pja da the maan.
Mleija ktlok chati rekki hava le mkheng nga mdo thlaam in; ungta parwaan ki naan Apah ngi havale mkheng ado kriin inna mdo dee dok.
Pdainu ru kri ngi Mma Kruwngpaam leh Mma rinkindit ava athlaam chaan; ungu havale mkheng ruk naan ado kurthuwk ra.
“Ava leiji, pduk nii kira naanni plung pja maan; mleija pduk nii ki rang nga anto kunchul chdaat ra. Nii khat ki kja ngi mnit ava ki kpurdon chra.
“Naan ado tikṭewl ma nraan kṭewl maan.
Mleija naan do kṭewl ava ngi akekṭewl raan; ungu naanni parte da ado piik naan thung ngi akparte pik raan.
Naan adak kat in mik tun ki ktobor kdei kma, talu leiji a u anao mik thungki dangka arko inna?
Naan amik kat in leenki ktobor ma am daat arlaannu, ‘Amik leenki dangka lou pthii ni,’ kdingi tak heppi a u anao hin the naan di?
Ṭhat tlo ktlo naan, ru kri ngi naan adak kat mik thungki ktobor alou pthii dok in, ungu a u anao mik leenki dangka ava ado lo pthii nraan kinthiir deekki dei ro naandi.
“Kchiir do ava ui rek hin pthii maan, ungu vak maiṭhuwmmi asum khau pthii maan, mmaanni mkhuwnni kther pthii ra ungu karheel donle aknam raan.
“Aṭhil in ungu akpii chraan; athlaam in ungta pha chnaan di; thurngot aṭhil in, ungu akpvan pik raan.
Mleija kṭhil cha mii pum ktaiji marlaanna, ungta kthlaam mii ngi mphaak chaakka, ungu thurngot kṭhil mii hin kapvan pik ra.
Mata naan ku mii khat hin mchapa ngi thenpen mṭhil na, mhin lung khat kpii rang mo?
Mata tuwlva khat mṭhil na mhin pruwl khat kpii rang mo?
Naanni kṭha kma tija kurthuwk chdaat jownti, anaole hin kṭha apiik de innu, parwaanki naan Apah va Mhin kṭhil cha reka tija thu kṭha do kpii chrang!
Ava leiji naan hin mii do tlot ra ado ngei in heppi, mmaan hin atlo in, mleija hava Nowlam ungu khulpu rek kurthuwk.
“Paltong ktarbik thu lut chaan; mleija paltong kparjaa ungu mlam ko ol ava kukrop chrang ki lamtha mdo ṭhi, ungu ava thu klut miia knempok.
Mleija paltong ktarbik ungu mlam kparsa ava ngi rinkhu tha mdo ṭhi ungu kpha kcha mii rek ava ktlowm tekka.
“Jao dona knaa, pdainu mril inna nowm tkei kurthuwk, kinditkma khulpu rek naan hin kthleng ra, chek asin chaan.
Mmaan ava mthei inni naanni dei naandi. Tirliing leen ki rik rou mdit mata tirliing chaam leenki kduwt armel purku in mo?
Ava leiji ding kṭha khim khaiji thei kṭha kchui, pdainu ding kṭha kma leen va thei kṭhakma kchui.
Ding kṭha ngi thei kṭhakma chui me, mdit mata ding kṭhakma ngi thei kṭha chui me.
Thei kṭha kchui kma ding khim khaija kphur pthii ra ungu mei thu kvar pthii ra.
Anto hep lulu ngi mmaan ava mthei rek inni naanni dei naan di.
“Nei kihin Mukpu, Mukpu, dida kthe mii pum ktaiji parwaan Kruwngpaam lut chip pchaang nime, pdainu parwaan ki Nei Kpah Mma plung bin ktlo mii ava daat ra.

Ava nitti mii knempokki ‘Mukpu, Mukpu,’ Nah amiing ngi neenni pau phuwng maan ring mo? Ungu Nah amiing ngi tarnam rek rei pthii maan ring mo? Ungta Nah amiing ngi klin klin nong rek tlo maan ring mo? didonle kthe lamra.
Ungu mhin inni Neiji, ‘Naanna adei maan ring; Kihin ki esun dok in, kṭhakma ktlo rek naan,’ dida thethuw nikdi.
“Hava Nei kpauna rek aryaa thida ktlo mii pum ktai ava lung leen inn ksa miilai ava hep daat ra;
ungta khuw rada, ungu dii linda, tarthli ngi raanda, pdainu tluw me, mleija lung leen mdo pri kurthuwk.
Ungta hava Nei kpauna rek aryaa thida ktlo kma mii pum ktai ava sitphui leenni inn ksa ka ak miilai khat ava hep daat ra;
ungta khuw rada, dii linda, tarthli ngi raan da, ungu inn ava deeng da, ungta tluw da, ungu mmeel kthi lang lang ngi tluw chda.
“Ungta Jisu ngi hava le mdo the mupṭut dok thungta, Mma do purchu ngi kurtuwl mii rekka ngak chlam da,
mleija Mma ngi rutan pum khat heppi purchuk da, ungu mmaan ki Nowlam chukpu rek hep daat va kurthuwk me.”
Mma ngi lown leen ki murjun ṭum thungta, kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ngi mdil ṭoi da;
ungta asuwn, raaichii kthung miilai khatti arva da Mmaiṭhuwm mi pkhuppi tirdiil da, Mhin theda, “Mukpu, Nang ngi atrot pik ta mhai partleu cha.”
Ungta Mma ngi mkhut khiingda mma makmei chunni, theda, “Neiva krotta, ekartleu cha.” ungu tun kat daatti mraaichii ava tlei chda.
Ungu Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Asuw, ku mii khat lee hin do khat lee the ma; pdainu vang ra, thiimpu hin adaksaa ktardet cha, ungta mii rek hin ado tdet na ngi Mousi paureen dil kṭoiji tlaai adown chaa.”
Jisu ngi Kaparnahum tha mhai lu thungta, rawlmii klin khatti Mhin arva da ktham chda,
ungu theda, “Mukpu, nei ksra owr ava yeng chda kdung plung kinsiir ri inn tha iip da ka am daatta.”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin theda, “Neiji vada pdam nik di.”
Pdainu rawlmii klin ava ngi Mhin arthawng da, “Mukpu nei ki inn thung ngi arhai rang nga neia kurhui chmaang; pdainu pauna hehe ngi athe,ungu ksra owr ra kdam chdaat ra.

Mleija nei rukka rutan kurdu ngi ka am miilai khat ping, nei kukur du ngi rawlmii rek ka am lam; ungta hava khat hin ni ‘Va’ kdit che mma ngi vada, ungu ktlok nitti ‘Arvang’ kdit che arvang da; ungta ksuwk hin ‘Hava atlo’ kdit che mma ngi tloda.”
Jisu ngi hava maryaak thungta ngak chda,ungu mdil kṭoi rek hin Mma ngi theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isreel thung rap kluva hanto lu ngi krin cha Neiji pha liit maang.
Neiji akthe inna,kniw thuwna ki leh kniw tlaak na ki mii knempok thleng donle parwaan Kruwngpaam tha Abraham, Isek ungta Jakob le tu tebol hin kuk ong lamra.
Ungta hava kruwngpaam chapa rekka duwnki kjiing thu mvar pthii mpha thu, ava thu mii rekki ṭap donle mhaa in kikril lamra.”
Ungu rawlmii klin ava hin Jisu ngi theda, “Vangcha; nang ngi ado rin chaak heppi kurthuwk so.” Ungta sra owr ava mpha ava kat thung ngi dam chda.
Ungu Jisu ngi Pitor inn thung ngi mlu thungta, mma kternu ava riphaakki koida ki iip daat deida.
Mma ngi mkhut tha makmei thungta,mriphaak va ma dok da, ungta mma ngi kardel da Mhin sok lo chda.
Ava nit kjiing tha mii rekki tarnam rek doṭhi mii knempok Mhin arhai ṭhi lamda; ungu pauna daatti pthla rekka rei pthii da, ungta kukoi mkheng nga pdam pik lamda.
Khulpu Isaijah ngi hava the dok da, “Mma ngi nenki nukduwng milo pik inda na omlai in mi hur pik inda,” dida mdo the ava mkurkhum na kurthuwk.
Tunva kurtuwl mii klin lang lang ngi Mma mdo klop dok Jisu ngi mdee thungta, raalpha khat tha mvan nraan Mma ngi pau pṭumda.
Ungta Nowlam chukpu khatti Mhin arhang da theda, “Chukpu, Nah ache na ktai thu aju ṭoi chni.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Tkei rekka mkhur in ka am, kjuwng puwa rekka mbuw in ka am; pdainu Mii Chapa ngi mluw mdo thiik chaak nra mmun khat lee ame.”
Ungta siikhu rek ktlok khatti Mhin theda, “Mukpu, ru kri ngi vang nira kpah alruwl chdok lap ni.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kdil aṭoi cha ungu kdiyou rekka mdak in diyo mdo alruwl chaak nlam ra ama pthii.”
Ungu Mma ngi arkuwng leen mtuwn thungta, msiikhu rekki mdil ṭoi chlam da.
Ungta asuwn, truwn leen tchangkhuw klin lang lang khat raang da, ava leiji arkuwng ava truwn thung ngi kpurlup rang ngi tloda; pdainu Mma ava iip dok da.
Ungu mmaanni Mhin pha lamda, pardel lamda, Mhin the chlam da, “Mukpu, mhai ktlan chaan, kmaang chra nthe ina.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “O mruk suwnni krin cha rek naan, talu leiji kṭi in pti?” Ungta Mma ngi kardel da tchangkhuw kraang leh truwn ava raida; ungbi pum daaiji daai chda.
Ungta mii rekka ngak chlamda the lamda, “Tchangkhuw kraang leh truwnni mdo pṭoi hava Miilai ava ku rang da?”

Ungta Mma ngi raalpha khat ktong tha, Gadarenis khuwpaam tha marvan thungta, thlaan rek thungki kthuwk tarnam rek doṭhi miilai knii ngi kurdut ṭhida, ramtleng ngi ma am lei inni ku mii khat lee ngi ava ktongki lam ava ṭoi pchaang me.
Ungu asuwn, mmaanni owng lamda, “O Isowr Chapa neenna talu mhai pardit chnaan di? Mpha mvee du liitti neen mkapja raan kthleng pti mo?”
Tunva mmaan amna ava raalpha ngi vak mluwngpa ava maal meek lamda.
Ungu tarnam rekki Mhin ktham chlam da, “Nang ngi atrei pthii raanta vak luwng thu mhai sii chaan,”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Va in,” Ava lei mmaanni arvang thuwk lamda; ungu asuwn, kham kukki vak luwng rek mkheng nga truwn thu jungjaam lamda, dii thu tla you tir lamda.
Ungta kseel rekka chen chlam da, khuwpii tha chet lamda, mmaanni do khim khai, ungu tarnam rek doṭhi rek thung ngi kthuwk ava song lamda.
Ungu asuwn, khuwpii rek mii mkheng ngi Jisu kurdut ṭhira arva lamda; ungta mmaanni mdee in thungta, mpaam in thungki mkunsun dok nra Mhin ktham chlam da.
Ungta Mma ngi arkuwng khat leen tuwng da, Mma mdak kat ki khuwpii tha arvang da.

Ungu asuwn, mmaanni kyeng miilai khat ava mi ii na tu arhai kdom lamda; ungbi Jisu ngi mmaan do rin chaak ava mdee thungta,kyeng miilai ava hin theda, “Kchapa aplung apnet; apnu tong rekka akuptlot pikka.”
Ungta asuwn Nowlam chukpu rek angṭhe ngi msingreel inni the lamda, “Hava Miilaiva Isowr kjowm cha ngi kpauva.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi muplung reel in deida, theda, “Talu leiji aplung ril in thung ngi kṭha kma ado reel inda?
‘Apnu ton rekka akuptlot pikka,’ dida tithe mdit mata, ‘Ekardel ra echet,’ dida tithe ava tva ngi ko ol betta?
Pdainu Mii Chapa ngi dultipaam thu pnu rek mdo ptlot pik naki rutan mthloija tdit naanni ado dee nraan,” Kyeng miilai ava hin Mma ngi theda, “Kardel, a iina achomra, a inn tha vang cha.”
Ungbi mma ngi kardel da mi inn tha vang da.
Kurtuwl mii rekki ava mdee in thungta ṭi chlam da, ungu miirek hin anto lu rutan kpii Isowr ava punlor chlam da.
Jisu ngi ava thungki hanto mhai kurlon thungta, khasna inn thung tha ku kong daat Mathi mdo dit miilai khat deida; ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Kdil aṭoi cha.” Ungta mma ngi rip daat da mdil ṭoi chda.
Ungu inn thu tebol hin mku on thungta, asuwn khasna klou rek leh pnu kirvei rek knempokki Jisu leh msiikhu rek ku on ṭhi lamda.
Ungu Pharisi rekki hava mdee in thungta, mmaanni msiikhu rek hin the lamda, “Talu leiji naanki Chukpu va khasna klou rek leh pnu kirvei rek mdo maal ṭhi da?”
Pdainu Mma ngi ava maryaak thungta theda, “Kchun kdam mii va kdim kriing me, pdainu kukoi rek daat.

‘Neiva wonsat kthloi kdo ngei, ungu tlaai kdown ngei maang,’ dinu Neiji kdo the ava vang inra talu mdo thena kdingi ekurchuk chaan. Mleija Neiji rinkindit rek ko ownra kurjung pmaang, pdainu pnu kirvei rek ko own kurjung ping.”
Ava dilli Johon siikhu rekki Mhin arva lamda, the lamda, “Neen leh Pharisi rek va then ngowl kchok innu, pdainu talu leiji Nah siikhu rek va then ngowl lam me da?”

Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kphalpa ngi ma am ṭhi daat lam arlaannu, mmal rek va kurnung karbaang don ka am lam rang mo? Mmaan arlakki kphalpa mdo lo dok nrang ki mnit rek karvang ra, ava dil ro ngi then kngowl lamra.
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi buw ren laak ava ngi buw pliw tun kleng lot nime, mleija mdo lot ava ngi buw ava kekṭet ra ungu kheel sii ngi kjen ra.

Mata rik rou dii ren ava rik rou dii pliw am ndaat saavun khau thu daal nime; ava kma donle, saavun khau rekka ksai phokra, ungta rik rou dii ruk kjaan chra, ungu saavun khau ruk kmaang chra. Pdanu rik rou dii ren ava saavun khau ren khat thu mdo daal ra, ungu mikniing ngi kuhuira.

Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni hanto mpau slii arlaanni, asuwn paam kpu khatti Mhin arva da, Mmaiṭhuwm mi pkhuppi tirdiil da, theda, “Tun tunni kchanua diyou chda, pdainu Nang ngi arvada mleen akhut ati khiin pik bi, mma kring ra.”
Ungu Jisu ngi ripda msiikhu rek tu mdil vanṭoi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, kum sowm lei knii lik thu hii ngi jaan da suwkthuwk snu miilai khatti mdil pang tha arva da mbuw mor thowng chda.
Mleija mma mdaksaa ngi hanto the chda, “Neiji mbuw mor rek rek kthown chaak bi, nea dam chnik di.”
Ungu Jisu ngi mdil kinle da mdee thungta,mhin theda, “Kchaanu aplung apnet cha; ado rin chaakki kdam im pti.” Ungta mpha ava kat thung ngi snu ava dam chda.
Ungu Jisu ngi paamkpupa inn thu marvan lu thungta, riseem kdum rek leh kurnung karbaang da kṭap deida,
Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Esun in, mleija nalanao ava kdiyou pme, pdainu ki iip kcha ngaal.” Ungu mmaanni pnii chaak lamda.
Pdainu kurtuwl mii rekki duwn tha mthuw dok inle,Mma ngi vangluwt da mkhut tha kjowng da, ungbi nalanao ava kardelda.
Ungta hava pau ava paamkowl mkheng thu ṭoujei da.
Ungu Jisu ngi ava thungki mkurlo thungta, mik ktot miilai knii ngi mdil ṭoida, krowl kparyaa ngi owng lamda, “Devid Chapa, wonsat mhailo chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi inn thu mvan lu thungta, mik ktot rekka Mhin arva lamda; Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji hava kdo tlot pchaan ra ava naanva arin chaak inna?” Ungta mmaanni Mhin the chlam da, “Oji, Mukpu.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi mmik rek in kmei pik lamda, theda, “Naan do rin chaakki kurthuwk so.”
Ungta mmik inna kparvang da, “Ungu asuwn, ku mii khat lee ngi dei mso.” dida Jisu ngi kparsa lang lang ngi parseel lamda.
Pdainu mmaanni sun lamda marveel mkheng thu Mma mleiji ṭoujei lamda.
Ungta mmaanni ksunra mkurlo slii arlaan inni, asuwn, tarnam ramṭhi ngi ki ewng miilai khat arhai ṭhi lamda.
Ungu tarnam mrei pthi thungta, ki ewng miilai ava mpau thuwk da, ungbi kurtuwl mii rekka ngak chlam da, the lamda, “Isreel thung ngi hava lu khat lee tdee chaak inme.”
Pdainu Pharisi rekki the lamda, “Tarnam rek chapa rutanni tarnam rek mdo rei pthii.”
Ungta Jisu ngi khuwpii rek leh khuw rek mkheng thung ngi chet da, Synagog rek thu purchuk da, ungu Kruwngpaam kṭha paumin paryaam da ungta omlai khim khai leh kduwng ksaan khim khai pdamda.
Ungu Mma ngi kurtuwl rek mdee thungta, wonsat lo chlam da,mleija mmaan ava krung ra ktaak Jao heppi parvai lamda, pchaang chlam me.
Ava dilli Mma ngi msiikhu rek hin theda, “Tkhau rang nga knempokka, pdainu kakhau rang nga ktlowm suwn na.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Mukpu ngi tkhau rang thu kakhau rang rek mdo sii nra aṭhil chaan.”
Ungta Mma ngi msiikhu rek sowm lei knii ava Mhin own lam thida, pthla ktobor rek mdo rei pthii nraan, ungu omlai khim khai leh kduwng ksaan khim khai mdo pdam nraan rutan pii lamda.
Kenyee rek miing sowm lei knii ava havale: ru kri ngi Pitor mdo dit Simon leh mnaopa Andrija: Jebedi chapa Jeems leh mnaopa Johon;
Philip leh Bartholomio; Thomas leh khasna klou Mathi; Alphias chapa Jeems leh Thadius;
Kanan ki Simon leh Mma kro kma Iskariot ki Judas.
Ungta Jisu ngi sowm lei knii rek ava parseel lamda sii lamda, “Naanni ktlok chati rek hin ungu Samaria rek khuw thu lut maan,
Pdainu kmaang kcha Isreel Jao rek inn thu echet in.
Ungta naanni ache naan thu hanto aparyaam inra atheen, ‘Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava knai tekka.’
Kukoi apdam in, kdiyou apardel in, raaichii kthung rek apdam in, tarnam rek arei pthiin. Naanni mman ktaakki ado arlaan in, mman ktaakki apiin.
Jeering hur maan, thiir kpowl hur maan, mdit mata thiir sum don arkowl in tunni hur maan.
Alam ṭoi raan ki khau arkeeng maan, phrik karsakki hur maan, khu kok rek karsakki hur maan, kchung khdaat pre sin maan; mleija nong klou rek va then mdo arngai in.
Ungta khuwpii joso khuw thung daat joso alu in mpha thu, ku ngi kurhuija tdit adei dok thiinra, asun duwn khim khai mma hin jiam daat in.
Naanni inn thu alu in mpha thu salaam atlo in.
Ungta inn ava mkurhuita, naan thungki kdaai ava mleen ni jiam so; pdainu mkurhui mata naan thungki kdaai ava aleen thaanni ekinle chaso.
Ungu ku mii khatti akowl maan sora mdit mata apauna rek in maryaak maanta, inn mdit mata khuwpii ava amaak in mpha thu akhuwn arbaat akṭho pthiin.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, makṭewl nit va khuwpii ava hinnu Sodom leh Gomora ngi kdiil dei bet ra.
“Ungta asuwn, tkei rek arlakki Jao lulu ngi Neiji ak sii inna; ava leiji pruwl lulu esing in ungu uṭhuw lulu ngi plung kparneem ahur chaan.
Mii rek tuk asut chaan, mleija mmaanni karseel lop thu akparlaan pthii raan, synagog rek thu akṭhi raan,
ungu Nei ktum mi rinpaumin ado hur nraan, paam kpu rek leh kruwng rek ungta ktlok chati rek hin akparlaan pthii raan.
Mmaanni atparlaan pthiin mpha thu apau raan mdit mata ado the raan thung ngi plung pja maan; mleija ṭhang ava kat thung ngi ado the raanna akpii chraan;
mleija kpau rang nga naan rang pme, pdainu naanki Apah pthla ngi naan thung ngi kpau ra.
Unao khatti unao khat kdiyou rang ngi kparlaan pthii ra, ungu mpah ngi mnao, mnaole ngi mnuh leh mpah raal pii donle mdiyo nraan ktlo ra.
Ungta Nei kmiing tummi naan ava mii mkheng ngi akipder chraan. Pdainu mṭut na kpha dekki kdiil pchaang ava kaktlan pik ra.

Khuwpii khat thu mmaanni kja kakham atpiik inta, mbe ki hinni kunthot dok in; mleija kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Mii Chapa ngi murjun du khim khaiji Isreel khuwpii rek mkheng parkhil pchaang ni maan ti.
“Siikhu khat ava mma chukpu tunni ame, mdit mata sra owr khat ava mma kpupa tunni ame;

Siikhu khatti mma chukpu hep daat ungu sra owr khatti mma kpupa hep daat mkurthut nrang nga ko khop kcha a. Mmaanni inn kpupa ava Beljebul kdingi mo own inbi, inn thungki ka am rek ngaalla tak hep pang ngi kthe psuk lam rang.
“Ava leiji mmaanna ṭi maan; mleija mdo pandan ma rang ngi mdo khum daat do khat lee ame, mdit mata tdee mara kurdowl daat ame.
Kjiing thu Neiji ado ktheen ava; mar awng thung ngi kthuwk ra; ungu tuprut pau naanni ado aryaak in ava, innthlun leenni mdo ksam dok.
Ungta daksaa daat aeyou thida raothla ke eayou pchaang kma mii ava naanni ṭi maan; ava kchang nga daksaa leh raothla mikniing sim thung ngi kaptlayou pchaang Mma lamchi aṭi chaan.
Priit rek knii ava ana khatti mdo jur pme mo? Ungu Apah in plung bin kma donle khdaat pre dul leen tla nime.
Ungta aluw leen inki sam rek daat rap klua mkheng ngi mdo tai dok.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, ṭi maan; naan ava priit rek knempok hinnu mman klu lang lang in pti
“Ava leiji mii rek maiṭhuwm mi Nei makdei pandi mii pum ktai ava Nei ruk va, parwaan ki Kpah maiṭhuwm mi deipandi chnik di.
Pdainu mii rek maiṭhuwm mi Nei makipthlei mii ava, Nei rukku parwaan ki Kpah maiṭhuwm mi pthlei nik di.
“Dultipaam thu Neiji kdaai kurjun ksin rang pi kdingi bin maan; Neiji kdaai arjun sin nimaang, pdainu kaangksaang khat ra.
Mleija Nei kurjun ava chapa miilai khatti mpah raal mdo piik nra, ungu chanu khatti mnuh raal mdo piik nra, mukmou khatti makternu raal mdo piik nra;
ungu miilai khatti mdo snuwm mara ava mphungka thungki kat kurthuwk ra.

Nei wonsat mdo talo kipkheel dekki ku mii khatti mpah leh mnuh wonsat mlobi, ava Nei kihinni kurhui chme; ungu Nei wonsat mdo talo kheel li mchapa mdit mata mchanu wonsat mlobi, ava ruk Nei kihinva kurhui me.
Ungta mma mdaksaa ki khros hurda Nei kdil kṭoi kma mii ava Nei kihinva kurhui chme.
Mrinkhu kpha kcha mii ava kmaang chra, ungu Nei ktummi mrinkhu kvardeen kcha mii ava kpha chra.
“Naan akarlaang kchaan mii va Nei ruk mdo tarlaan chaak, ungta Nei mkarlaang kcha mii ava va Nei mju ksii Mma ava mdo arlaan chaak.
Mma ava khulpu khat mkurthuw leiji khulpu khat marlaan chaakbi, khulpu khat ki mnah kpha chra, ungta rinkindit khat mkurthuw leiji, rinkindit khat ava marlaan chaakbi, rinkindit ki mnah kpha chra.
Ungu ku mii khatti siikhu khat mkurthuw leiji, hava kdil sisi khat hin dii kdai tong khat pang mpiik chaak bi, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mma ki mnah ava pmaan pik liit nime.”
Ungta Jisu ngi siikhu rek sowm lei knii parseel lam thida, kurlouda khuwpii rek thung ngi kpurchuk rang leh kparyaam ra chet da.
Tunva Johon ni rowng inn thung ngi Khrista nong tlot rek maryaak thungta, pauna tu kilṭhi ngi msiikhu rek Mhin hai sii da,
ungta Mhin theda, “Kurjung ra Mma ava pti mo, mdit mata neenni ktlok khat mlam suw chnik kaan da?”
Ungbi mhin inni Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Vang inra naan do aryaak leh naan do dee ava Johon hin ason pik in:
mik ktot ti khuw dei da, ungu kyeng ngi chet da, raaichii kthung ngi kartleu da, ungta knaa kbeeng ngi aryaa da, ungu kdiyou rek ki kardel lamda, ungta sra rek hin kṭha paumin mparyaam pik lamma.”
Ungu Nei krawlmii kma mii ava msuwkṭha.
Mmaanni msun dok in thungta, kurtuwl mii rek hinni Johon mlei thung ngi kthe pṭhun da: “Kbowk laiva talu ksuw kchet in pti? Tirthli doraan ding kakna ksuw in pti?
Talu lei naanni kchet in pti? Buw ktarnaal dang dang knaa miilai mo? Asuwn, buw ktarnaal dang dang ngi kirsim mii rek ava kruwng rek inn thu ka am.
Ava mkurthuttu talu leiji kchet in pti? Khulpu khat ksuw mo? Oji, Neiji akthe inna, khulpu khat ki kheel dek kurthuwk.
Mma mlei ava kchiir laaika thung ngi hanto kjit dok da, ‘Asuw, Nah amaiṭhuwm mi ktamsii khat kju siia, mma ngi Nah alam akpurchuwl pik ra.’

Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea,snu rek do pluk mii rek arlakki baptis kuptlot Johon hinnu klin ku khat lee ame; anto daat joso parwaan Kruwngpaam thang va kdil sisi ava mma hinnu klin sii kurthuwk ra.
Baptis kuptlot Johon nit ki kupṭhun ni snii kpha thu parwaan Kruwngpaam ava ngi kut, lurki kja mdo phaak, ungu kut,lur mii rek ava ngi nam trom mi klou kurthuwk.
Mleija Johon ki mpha kpha dekki khulpu rek mkheng leh Nowlam ava mdophuwn;
ungta kurjung rang ki Elijah pi dida karlaang nuwm mii rek va anto abin chdaat so.
Taryaak na knaa kthloi mii ava ngi aryaa chaso.
“Pdainu hava charuwl rekka talu purtol lam nik di? Ava bajaar mun thung ngi ku ong da mdolet ṭhira ko own kmo rek hep daat lam,
‘Neenni laampe dum innu, ungu naanna kardaam maan ti; neenva ṭap innu, ungu naanna kurnung karbaang maan ti,’ dilam da.
Mleija Johon kurjung ngi chaa nee me, ungbi mmaanni theda, ‘Tarnam mthloija,’ dilam da.

Mii Chapa kurjung ngi mchaak mneek nowl thungta,mmaanni theda, ‘Asuwn, poibuwr kparjaa ungu nee da kipri, khasna klou rek leh pnu kirvei rek plap khat,’ dilamda. Anto daat joso lousing nga mnong ngi mdo pindit.”
Ava dilli klin klin nong rek maknem mdo tlot na khuwpii rek ava krai cha pṭhunda, mleija mmaanni plung ren hur lamme.

“Khorasin nang nga asuwkthi, Bethsaida nang nga asuwkthi! mleija naan athung inni klin nong kthuwk ava Tyr leh Sidon thung ngi kthuwk mkurthut daat tlaang bi, alraang raang ngi mmaanni buw kthii naa lam don purvut kubuk lam don plung ren mdo hur chaak raanna.
Pdainu ahin inni kthea,makṭewl nit va naan hinnu Tyr leh Sidon ava ngi kdiil dei bet ra.

Ungta Kaparnahum nang nga parwaan kpha dekki kirkhiing namo? Nang ava sim thu akaptla pthii ra. Mleija nang athung ngi klin nong rek kthuwk ava Sodom thungki mkurthut daat tlaangbi,snii kpha thung ngi ka am daat ra.
Pdainu Neiji ahin kthea, makṭewl nit va nang hinnu Sodom mi kdiil dei bet ra.”
Mpha ava kat thung ngi Jisu ngi tpandang da, “Akpanpaak chaakka Apah, parwaan leh dulti ki Mukpu, havale ava ksing leh kdeipindi thungki dowl pthii tinu.
Oji, Apah, Nah plungnee ado ngeen ava anto hep daat kurthuwk.

Do mkheng ava Kpah ngi Nei kihinni mdo tparlaan dok; ungta Mpah kma donle ku mii khat lee ngi Mchapa ava dei me; ungu Mchapa ngi mhin mdo tpandan nra mdo kchol rek kma donle ku mii khat lee ngi Mpah ava dei me.
Nong klou leh bowr krik mii mkheng Nei kihin arva chaan, ungu Neiji aparnga chni kaan di.
Nei ki knong alou in ungta Nei kihinni ekurchuk chaan; mleija Neia kuplung knei ungu kuplung kparneem, ungta naan ki raothla karngat chaak nra pha chnaan di.
Mleija Nei knong nga ko ol, ungu Nei kbowr ava kthowm.”
Mpha ava thu Jisu ngi kehu bil thu chet da; msiikhu rekka mpoi in mtham thungta, kehu chavui pjii lamda kchaa pṭhun lamda.
Pdainu Pharisi rekki ava mdee in thungta, Mhin the lamda, “Asuw, asiikhu rekka, sabath nitti Nowlam kurthuwk kma nong mtlot inna.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Devid leh mmiiṭhi rekki mpoi in mtham thu mdo tlot in ava naanva pa maan timo:
mma ngi tak heppi Isowr Inn thu luwt da,ungu mdo down dok thenpen ava mchaak, mma ruk ungta mmiiṭhi rek daat ruk va mdo chaak in ava Nowlam dorot pme, pdainu thiimpu rek daat do chaak ra ava pme mo?
Mata thiimpu rekki sabath nitti luwbuk Inn thu sabath mdo pkui in ava karmak tdit ki Nowlam ava naanni tak heppi apat in?
Neiji akthe inna, luwbuk Inn hinva klin bet do khat hava thung ngi ka am daatta.
Ungta hava tak mdo the na tdit naanni adee inta, ‘Neiji wonsat ava kdo ngei chaak ungu tlaai down ava pme,’ kparmak kma mii ava naanni mraal ado piik in ro nime.
Mleija Mii Chapa ava sabath ki Mukpu ruk kurthuwk.”
Ungta Mma ngi ava thungki vangda, ungu mmaan synagog thung ngi lut da.
Ungta asuwn, mkhut khat kyeng miilai khat ava thung ngi am daat da. Ungu mmaanni Mhin khewl lamda, “Sabath nitti kapdam ava Nowlam do rot mo?” kdingi mmaanni mraal mdo piik nraan the lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan thung ki ku mii khatti mJao mdo thloi khat ava sabath nitti khur thung ngi mtlaak dokku, mkhutti kjowng da ṭen arthuw nime mo?
Ava leiji Jao khat hinnu miilai khatti mman klu kurthuwk.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi miilai ava hin theda, “Akhut arjii.” Ungta mma ngi mkhut arjii da, ungbi mii murson rek khut heppi mkheng ngi dam chda.
Pdainu Pharisi rekki Mma mdo ae kre nraan karseel lop thung ngi vang thuwk lamda.
Jisu ngi hava mdo dee leiji ava thungki kurlou da sun da. Ungta mii knempokki mdil ṭoi lamda, ungu mkheng inni pdam pik lamda.
Ungta Mma ava mii ngi mdo dee ma nra mhin inni pau pṭum da.
Hava ava khulpu Isaijah ngi mdo the dok ava mkurkhum na kurthuwk:
“Asuwn, Nei kdo kchol ksra owr,
Kraothla ngi plung mdo pngam psuk Nei ksra owr,
Mma leen Neiji kapthla thii nik di,
ungu Mma ngi ktlok chati rek hin mkindit kparyaam ra.
Mma ngi karteen ṭhii mdit mata ko owng tlo nime,
mdit mata lamṭhuwm rek thu ku mii khat lee ngi mukrowl aryaa nime;
kindit ava ngi mapchaan du khim khai;
kbeng dingthum pbeng nime,
mdit mata plaa teher ava mei khut archu you nime;
ungu Mma miing nga ktlok chati rekki mbin chaak in.” Dida mdo the ava mkurkhumna kurthuwk.
Ava dilli mik ktot khat tarnam doṭhi ki ewng kcha ava Mhin arhai ṭhi lamda, ungu Mma ngi pdam pik da, ava leiji ki ewng miilaiji pauda ungta khuw kdei pha chda.
Ungu mii mkheng nga ngak chda, ungta the lamda, “Hava Devid Chapa ngaal mo?”
Pdainu Pharisi rekki aryaa da the lamda, “Tarnam kruwng chapa Beljebul rutanni hava Mma ngi tarnam rek mdo rei pthii pchaan.”

Muplung thuw in Mma ngi deida, mhin inni theda, “Mthi na ngi mraal karpii da kinṭhen kruwngpaam khim khai ava do sii nime, ungu mthi na ngi mraal kirpii da kinṭhen khuwpii mdit mata inn ava rip chip pchaang nime.
Ungta seitaan ni seitaan mraal pii sora mthi nangi mkinṭhen bi, tak heppi mkruwngpaam ava krip pchaang rang?
Ungu Beijebul rutan ni Neiji tarnam rek krei pthi kukur thuttu, naaan achapa leenva ku rutan ni mdo rei pthi da? Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da,mmaanni naan akekṭewl raan.
Pdainu Isowr pthla ngi Neiji tarnam rek krei pthi pchaang ku kurthut bi, Isowr Kruwngpaam ma naan leen kurjung nga.
Mata ruktang mii ava ru kri ngi mbowl dok mabi, tak heppi ru ktang khat inn thungva khatti lut don mdona kupru pchaang rang? Mma ngi mbowl dok dil thang ro ngi mi inn thungki kukruwl rora.
Neitu kilṭhi kma mii ava Nei mukro kma, ungu Neitu kurkuk kma mii ava kpinṭheu tir pthira.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, pnu ungta Isowr kjowm cha ngi kpau mii mkheng ava kuptlot pik ra, pdainu pthla leen kjowm cha ngi kpau mii mkheng ava ptlot pik nime.

Mleija Mii Chapa leen mraal kpii ngi pau kthe ku mii khat ava kuptlot pik ra, pdainu pthla kchiir mraal piida kpau ku mii khat ava hava charuwl thung daat don karvang rang ki charuwl thung daat don ptlot pik nime.
“Ungta thei mṭhat nra mding ava apṭhat in; mdit mata thei mṭhat ma nra mding ava pṭhat maan; mleija ding ava mtheiji mdo tdet.
Pruwl doi nao rek naan! aṭhat ma arlaan inni tak heppi kṭha pauvi kpau in pti da? Mleija plung thungki kiplee ava nerri mdo the.
Kṭha miilaiji kṭha mdo purtuwl thungki kṭha mdo thuwṭhi, ungu kṭhakma miilaiva kṭhakma mdo purtuwl thungki kṭhakma mdo thuwṭhi.
Neiji akthe inna,makṭewl nit va mii pum ktai ava do ksii kma pauna mdo the khim khaija ktai ra.
Mleija naan ki pauna rek ava ngi akpindit raan, ungta naan pauna rekki mraal akpii raan.”
Ava dilli Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rek mii angṭhe ngi Mhin the da, “Chukpu, neenni Nah hinki titin na khat kdee chaak nuwm inna.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Kṭhakma leh losang kṭhi charuwl ava ngi titinna mdo thlaam in, pdainu khulpu Jonah ki titinna kma donle titinna kpii ro nime.
Mleija Jonah ava tuwlva poi thung ngi nii kdum jaan kdum amda, ava leiji Mii Chapa rukka dulti plung thung ngi nii kdum jaan kdum ka amra.

Makṭewl nit va Ninevah mii rekki rip lam donle hava charuwl ava mraal kpii lamra; mleija Jonah do paryaam leiji mmaanni plung ren hur lamda, ungta asuwn, Jonah hinnu klin do khat hava thung ngi krip daatta.

Makṭewl nit va kurdu ktongki kruwngnu ngi rip donle hava charuwl ava mraal kpii lamra; mleija dultipaam mdon na ki ngi Solomon lousing karyaa chra thleng da, ungta asuwn, Solomon hinnu klin do khat hava thung ngi krip daatta.”
“Miilai khat thungki pthla kṭhakma ngi msun dok dil tha, mkarngat nra kthlaammi dii am nma mun thu tlowngda, pdainu mma ngi pha mda.
Ava dilli mma ngi theda, ‘Neiji ksun dok na inn ava thung ngi kinle chdaat ni.’ Ungu mma ngi marvan kinlet thungta, ktlong deek ungta truh dang kintiing deekki phada.

Ava dilli mma ngi chet da mma hinnu kṭha sii kma pthla kṭhakma murson rek ṭhi tpom da, ungu mmaanni mthung ngi lut lam da am lamda; ungta mṭut na thangva miilai ava ru kri ki hinnu kheel sii ngi jul chda. Ava leiji hava kṭhakma charuwl rekka anto hep daat kurthuwk ra.”
Mma ngi mii rek hin mpau slii arlaanni, asuwn, duwn thang ngi mnuh leh mnaopa le ngi rip lamda, Mhin mdo kirbiik ṭhi nlamra paukhewl chlam da.
Ku mii khatti Mhin theda, “Anuh leh anaopale ngi duwn tha rip lamda, ado tkarbiik ṭhi nuwm lam leiji atikhewl lamma.
Pdainu Mhin kthe miilai ava hin arthawngda, “Knuh leh knaopale ava kule da?”
Ungta msiikhu rek ktongtha mkhutti tikheu da, Mma ngi theda, “Havalea Nei knuh leh knaopale lam!
Mleija parwaanki Kpah plungbin ktlo mii ava Nei kṭapa, kchernu ungu knuh lam.”
Ava nit katti Jisu ngi inn thungki thuwk da truwn biing ngi ku owng da.
Ungta kthuwk kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ngi klop dok da, ava leiji arkuwng khat leen kalda ko ongda ungu kurtuwl mii mkheng ava laan tha am daat lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi paupurtol rek knempokki mhin thaanni theda, “Chiikvar miilai khatti chii kvar ra chet da.
Ungu mma ngi mvar thungta, chii angṭhea lam thu tla da, ungbi puwa rekki thlengda chom chlam da.
Chii rek angṭhea lung dul leen tla da, duldak am puk mda, ungu duldak kukthukki ma amma leiji mowngteng da,
pdainu kniw kakhang ngi sat da, ungta murjuwng ma amma leiji purvui chda.
Chii rek angṭhea tarliing rek thung ngi tla da, ungta tarliing mowngda ava ngi pardel you lamda.
Chii rek angṭhea duldak kṭha thung ngi tlada, mthei chui da, angṭhe ngi mbel arjaa khat, angṭhe ngi somtruk, angṭhe ngi som kdum chuida.
Knaa kthloi ku mii khatti aryaa chso.”
Ava dilli siikhu rekki Mhin arva lamda the lamda, “Talu leiji paupurtol rekki mhin inva ado the pik lamda?”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Naan hinva parwaan Kruwngpaam ki tuprut pau ava ado dee nraan ado tpiik chaak in, pdainu mmaan hinva ava pme.
Mleija ktlonuwm hin knemmi kpii chra, ungu mma ngi kheelli kthloi chra, pdainu kthloi kma mii ava mma ngi mdothloi chaak mruk suwn rukka klowng pthii ra.
Hava leiji Neiji paupurtolli kdo the pik lam, mleija ksuw daatti mmaanni dei lamme, ungta karyaa daatti aryaa pindi lamme, kdei pindi ruk kurthuwk lamme.
Mmaan hin va Isaijah pauphuwnni mdo the ava mkurkhumna:
‘Naanni aryaak inna pdainu aryaa pandi maanti,
ungta asut inna pdainu tden rukva dei maan ti.
Mleija hava miirek plung ava kurmuwng cha,
maknaa in ava mdo aryaak naanni krik cha a,
ungta mmik rek in ava mipjiin pthiinna,
mmaanni mmik rek inni dei lam mso,
maknaa rek inni aryaa lam mso,
muplung ril inni dei pindi lam mso,
ungta mdam nraan Nei ktummi kinle lam mso.’
Pdainu naan mikka msuwkṭha, mleija mmaanni deida, ungta aknaa inni aryaa da.

Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan ado dee in ava khulpu rek leh rinkindit rek mii knempokki mdee nuwm in, ungu mmaanni tdee pha chlamme, ungta naan do aryaak maryaak chaak nuwm in, ungu karyaa pha chlam me.”
“Chiikvar paupurtol ava aryaa chaan.
Ku mii khatti Kruwngpaam pauna aryaa da ungu mdee pindit mabi, kṭhakma khatti thleng da muplung thungki mdo var ava mdolo pthii; hava ava lam thung ngi ktla rek lam.
Pauna aryaa da karlaang teng kcha, ava hava lungdul leen mdo var ktla ava;
anto joso mthung ngi arjuwng ma amma leiji mpha mruk tummi diil chda, pdainu pauna leiji suwkthuwk mdit mata kja kakham mphaak le, kbei sekki tluw chda.
Ungta tirliing arlakki mdovar ava pauna karyaa kcha mii rek lam, pdainu dultipaam tuk ksut ungu suwang thuw mdo ngei leiji pauna ava archu youda, ungta ava ngi mthei kchui kma tdet da.
Dul kṭha leen mdo var ava pauna aryaa da kdei pindi mii rek lam; mmaanna mthei chuida, khatti arjaa khat, khat leen som truk, ungu khat leen som kdummi kchui.”
Mma ngi mmaiṭhuwm inni ktlok paupurtolli theda, “Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava miilai khatti kṭha chiimuh mbil thung ngi mdo var ava tu tpinṭim kro;
pdainu mi ii dok chaak arlaan- ni,mma kusnuwm kma mii ngi arva da kehu rek arlakki kṭul var thida sun chda.
Ava leiji mdo pṭau rekki mowngda thei mchui in thungta, kṭul rek rukka kandang da.
Ungta inn ava thungki sra owr ri mhin arvang da theda, ‘Ocha, abil thung va chiimuh kṭha ado var pme mo? Tak heppi kṭul rek ka am da?’
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, ‘Kusnuwm kma rekki hava mdo tlot.’ Ungbi sra owr ri mhin theda, ‘Ava mkurthut ta neenni chetda kdo purku raan angeija?’
dainu mma ngi theda, ‘Eme; kṭul kphuiji kehu rek phui kthen naan di.

Takhau pha mvee du khim khaiji mowngve chdaat lamso; mkhau in mpha thu, ru kri ngi kṭul rek purkuk da mtut mtut ti tapkaak nra, pdainu kehu rekka purkuk da kuktom thu ado thiik raan, dida kakhau rek hin neiji the laini’ ”
Mma ngi ktlok paupurtol khat rukva mhin inni theda, “Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava miilai khatti anruwng muh louda mbil thung ngi mdo var ava hep daat;

mmuh rek ava mkheng thungki kdil sii kurthuwk, pdainu marhan mown thungta kukmowng rek thungki klin sii ngi ding khat kurthuwk da, ava leiji kjuwng puwa rekki thleng lamda, mbaak leen mbuw rek sa chlam da.”
Mma ngi ktlok paupurtol rukva mhin inni theda, “Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava snu miilai khatti jaangju louda tparte na ava kdum jaam louda thowl mkur owl du khim khai mdo purhau ava hep daat.”
Jisu ngi hava paupurtol mkheng ngi mii rek hin theda; pau kpurtol kma donle Mma ngi do khat lee pre mhin inni the kchok me.
Hava ava khulpu rek do the ava mkurkhum na kurthuwk da: “Pau purtol rek ava ngi Neiji kner pvang nik di, dultipaam mapṭhan daatki kurdowl daat Neiji thethuw nik di.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rek ma thida inn thung ngi vang luwt da. Ungta msiikhu rekki Mhin arvang lamda Mhin the lamda, “Bil thungki kṭul mlei thung ngi mhai thethut pik chaan.”
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Chiimuh kṭha kvar mma ava Mii Chapa;
bil ava dultipaam, ungu chiimuh kṭha ava Kruwngpaam chapa rek, kṭul rek ava kṭha kma ava chapa rek,
ungta kusnuwm kma dovar ava Dijabowl; takhau pha kvei ava kum ṭut na, ungu kakhau rek ra ava waan tamsii rek ra.
Kṭul rek purkuk da mei thung ngi mdo pkaak ava heppi, kum ṭut na thang va anto ktlora
Mii Chapa ava ngi waan tamsii rek arju ksiira, Mma Kruwngpaam thungki pnu kaptau rek mkheng leh kṭhakma mkheng ava purkuk donle,
kṭuw knai kma meiṭhuwm thung ngi kvar pthii ra; ava thu mii rekki ṭap donle mhaa in kikril lamra.
Ava dilli rinkindit rekki Mpah in Kruwngpaam thung ngi kniw heppi kleng lamra. Taryaak na knaa kthloi mii ngi aryaa chso.”

“Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava bil khat thung ngi sumbuwr kurdowl li ka am chdaat, miilai khatti mphaak khot thungta, purvuwl dok thida; mkanpatti vangda mdo thloi mkheng jur dokda ungta bil mdo ren chaak ava hep daat kurthuwk.”
“Veikhat nowlli, parwaan Kruwngpaam ava tek tre kthlaam sum dowl klou miilai khat ava lulu,
mma ngi mman klu lang lang sum khau khat mphaak thungta, vangda mdo thloi mkheng jur dok thida, mdo ren chaak ava hep daat.”
“Veikhat nowlli, parwaan Kruwngpaam ava truwn thung ngi kchak kdeeng thu msik msik tuwlva kurkuk da;
mdim thungta, mii rek ki dii biing ngi ko ong thida kṭha ava uwm thung ngi pintiingda, kṭha kma mdo var pthi ava lulu.
Ava leiji kum ṭut tiing tiingva anto hep daat ra. Waan tamsii rekki arjung donle rinkindit thungki kṭha kma rek ava kpintiing lamra,
ungta kṭuw knai kma ki meiṭhuwm thung ngi kvar pthii lamra; ava thu mii rekki ṭap donle mhaa in kikril lamra.”
“Hava mkheng nga adee pindit inna?” Ungbi mmaanni the lamda, “Oji.”

Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da parwaan Kruwngpaam tum mi kurchuk Nowlam chukpu rek khim khaija tva ngi ren da tva ngi pliw tdit deida mdo mna ksintho inn kpupa khat ava hep daat.”
Ungta Jisu ngi hava paupurtol rek the dok thida, Mma ngi ava thungki kurlou da
Mdaksaa ki khuwpaam tha arvang da, mmaan synagog thung ngi purchuk da, ava leiji mmaanni ngak chlam da; the lamda, “Hava Miilai va hava lousing leh klin klin nong rek mdo tlotta tva ki mdo phaak da?
Hava ding kparnaal lik ava pme mo? Mnuh miing nga Mery pme mo? Ungta Jeems, Joseph ungu Simon leh Judas lea Mma naopa rek pme mo?
Ungta mcher rek mkheng ruk nen tu tkilṭhi daat in pme mo? Ava mkurthuttu hava Miilaiva hava mkheng nga tva ki mdo phaak da?”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin pthlei lamda. Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Khulpu khat ava mdaksaa khuwpaam leh mdak kat ki phungka thung daat kma donle mii do kjat nma ra ame.”
Ungta Mma ngi ava thu nong klin knem mi tlo me, mleija mmaanni rin chlamme.
Mpha ava kat thung ngi paamkpu Herod ti Jisu mlei thung ngi pau karjaam ava aryaa da.
Ungta msra owr rek hin mma ngi theda, “Hava ava baptis kuptlot Johon kdiyou dok thungki kring kardella; ava leiji nong mdo tlot naki rutan mma thung ngi ka am.”
Mleija Herod ti Johon na kjowng da, bowl thida, mnaopa Philip numei Herodia tummi rowng inn thung ngi thiida;
mleija Johon ni mhin theda, “Nang ngi mma adolo ava Nowlam dorot ava pme.”
Ungta mma ngi ae you nuwm da, anto daat joso mii rek ṭi da, mleija mmaanva khulpu khat pi kdingi bin chlam da.
Pdainu Herod ṭouna mnit arvangda, Herodia chanu ngi lop maiṭhuwm mi mkardaam thungta Herod ning tupthlungda,
ava leiji mma ngi pau kthamda mma doṭhil khim khai mhin mdo piik nra paureel dok da.
Mnuh do sin chaakki mma ngi theda, “Hava arkuw thung ngi baptis kuptlot Johon luwchai ado tpiik chaak ra neiji kingeija.”
Ungta kruwng ava kdung ngi kansiir chda; pdainu mpau ktham leh mmal rekki mlei kurthuwk da mdo arvan sin nraan mma ngi paureen da;
rowng inn thungki Johon luw mdo reen nraan mma ngi mii hai siida,
ungta mluw ava arvan sin lamda, arkuw thung ngi nalanao hin pii lamda,ungu nalanao vi mnuh hin arvan sin da.
Ungta msiikhu rekki arva lamda mukluwng ava lou lamda alruwl chlam da; ungu mmaanni sun lam da Jisu hin song lamda.

Tunva Jisu ngi hava maryaak thungta, Mma ngi ava thungki kurlou da, arkuwng khat leen mmun ktliing khat thung ngi chet da. Pdainu kurtuwl mii rekki aryaa da, khuwpii rek thungki mkhuwnni chet lamda mdil ṭoi lamda.
Mma ngi diibiing ngi mhai thungta kurtuwl mii klin lang lang ngi ka am deida; ungbi Mma ngi wonsat lo chlam da, ungta kukoi rek pdam pik lamda.
Khuw mjiin thungta, siikhu rekki Mhin arvang lamda, the lamda, “Hava munna ktliing nga, ungta kokto dokka; kurtuwl mii rek ava mdaksaa in tummi then mdo ren chaak nlamra apsun chlam.”
Jisu ngi theda, “Sun lamnime; naanni mdo chaak raan do mruk apii chaan.”
Mmmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Neenni thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii hava tha kthloi inna.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Nei kihin tha arvan sin in.”

Ava dilli Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rekka nowmsuwl leen mko on nraan pau pṭum da; ungta thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii louda parwaan hansuw da,ungu phowl kṭha parlaan da, ungta khui thida thenpen rek ava siikhu rek hin pii da, ungu siikhu rekki kurtuwl mii rek hin them pik lamda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng ngi poi kpa ngi chaa lamda. Ungu mkikleem kṭik ava mmaanni bowr sowm lei knii kdim jilli lou lamda.
Ungta kmaal mii rek ava snu rek leh kmo rek kthekma mii pun parnga arveel kurthuwk.
Ava dilli Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rek mupsun slii arlaanni, siikhu rekka arkuwng leen raalpha khat ktong tha mvan nraan tlo da.
Ungta Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rek mupsun dok dil tha, mthi na ngi kṭhil chra lown leen hang da. Khuw mjiin thungta Mma mthi ndaatti ava tha am daat da.
Pdainu mpha ava thungva arkuwng ava laan tu kdung ngi lam karlat da, mleija tarthli ngi raan lamda, dii kakna ngi prei lamda.
Ungta jaan ki ṭhang plii thung ngi Mma ngi truwn leen mkhu ngi chet da, mhin inni arvang da.
Pdainu truwn leen mche ava siikhu rekki mdee in thungta, kdung piir lamda, thelamda, “Ava raothla khat!” Ungta mṭit inni mmaanni owng lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni pau teng da, theda, “Aplung apnet chaan, Nei ping; ṭi maan.”
Ungta Pitor ri Mhin arthawng da, “Mukpu, Nah akurthutta, dii leen Nah hinni kahai nra pau mhai pṭum pik.”
Mma ngi theda, “Arva.” Ava leiji Pitor ri arkuwng leen ki ṭum da, ungu dii leenni Jisu hin vada;
Pdainu tirthli kraang mdee thungta mma ngi ṭi chda, ungu dii thung ngi mtlaak slii thungta, “Mukpu mhai ktlan cha” dida owngda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mkhut hai khiing tengda kjowng thida mhin theda, “O mruksuwn daatti krin cha miilai, talu leiji plung kinṭheek ki abinna?”
Ungu mmaanni arkuwng leen mkal in thungta, tarthli kraang ava down dok da.
Ungta arkuwng thungki mii rekki Mhin luwbuk lamda, the lamda, “Kindit katti Nah Isowr Chapa pti.”
Ungu mmaanni mvan klaan dok in thungta, Kenasarit tha arvang lamda.
Ungta mun ava thungki mii rek va Mma ava tin chlam da, ungu marveel mkheng thung ngi mii sii lamda, kukoi rek mkheng Mhin ṭhi paphaak lamda,
ungta mbuw mor rek rek mdo thown chaak nlam ra mmaanni Mhin ktham chlam da; ungu kthowng mii knempok ava dam da.
Ungta ava dilli Jerusalem ki kthleng Pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki the lamda,
“Talu leiji Nah siikhu rek va alraangki nopa mdo leek inda? Mleija mmaanni mmaal in mpha thung ngi mkhut in alṭhu lamme.”
Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Ungta talu leiji naanva alraangki nopa tum daatti Isowr paureen ado leek in da?
Mleija Isowr ri paureen da, ‘Apah leh anuh akjat cha,’ Ungta ‘Mpah mdit mata mnuh leen kṭhakma kthe mii ava kdiyou kat ra.’

Pdainu naanva theen tinu, ‘Ku mii khatti mpah mdit mata mnuh hinni, naanni nei kihin ki ado phaak raan ava Isowr hin kpiik dok,’ kdingi theen tinu, mma ngi arleek setti mpah leh mnuh mdo kjat nra ame.
Ava leiji naanni alraangki tum daatti, Isowr pauna ava leek pthiin tinu.
Ṭha tlot ktlo naan! Naanki lei thung ngi Isaijah va hanto mdo the dok:
‘Hava mii rekki mner daat inni makjat lamda,
pdainu muplung ril inna Nei kihin ki kdung ngi lam kar latta;
mmaanni mii ki paurin nopa ava ktlo ngi,
Neia do ksii kma ngi luw mbuk lamda.’ ”
Ungta Mma ngi mii rek Mhin own thida mhin inni theda, “Aryaa inra adei pindi chaan:
miilai khat ner thung ngi jung klut ava ngi mii kchou me, pdainu ner thungki arhan kthuwk ava ngi miilai khat ava mdo kchou kre.”
Ava dilli siikhu rekki Mhin arva lamda, the chlam da, “Nang ngi hava athe mpha thu Pharisi rek plung kpur ava dei mti mo?”
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Kpah parwaan ki ngi mdo phun ma dinglung haikhe khim khaija kphui pthiira.
Ama pthiin; mmaanna mik ktot kṭhi rek lam. Ungta mik ktot khatti mik ktot khat mṭhibi, mikniing inni khur thung ngi ktla you lamra.”
Pdainu Pitor ri Mhin theda, “Pau purtol ava mhai the pindit pik chaan.”
Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Nang rukka tun kpha ngi kdei pindi kma pa pti mo?
Ner thung ngi jung klut khim khaija poi thung ngi jungda karthleng jowk jowk daat ava nang va dei mti mo?
Pdainu ner thungki kthuwk ava plung thungki arhan kthuwk, ungu ava ngi miilai mdo kchou kre.
Mleija plung thungki ngi kṭha kma mdo thuwṭhi, mii ke eayou, losang kṭhi, nala tartlaang kturkui, kupru, kindit kma thu sakhi kpii, kuhowng cha,
hava le ngi miilai khatta mdo kchou kre; pdainu khut kulṭhu kma ngi then kchaa ava ngi mii kchou me.”
Ungta Jisu ngi ava thungki kurlouda Tyr leh Sidon paamkowl tha kunsun da.
Ungu asuwn, paamkowl avaki Kenan ki snu miilai khatti arvada ungu owngda, “O, Devid Chapa, Mukpu, aplungnee mhai tdet cha; kchanu ava kdung reenni tarnam khatti pja chda.”
Pdainu Mma ngi pauna khdaat preva arthaan pik me. Ungta msiikhu rekki arva lam da, Mhin ktham chlam da the lamda, “Ndil in ṭoida mma kṭappa, apsun pthii.”
Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Neia Jao kmawng kcha Isreel inn thung daatti mdo tsii.”
Pdainu mma ngi Mmaiṭhuwm mi arvada pkhup pi tardiil da the chda, “Mukpu, mhai bom cha.”
Ungu Mma ngi arthawng da, “Kmo rek thenpen louda ui rek hin kvar pthii ava kursuk pme.”
Mma ngi theda, “Oji, Mukpu, anto daat joso ui rek rukva mmaan kpupa rek tebol leenki mikri ktla ava mdo chom chaak pi.”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “O, Snu ado rin chaakka klin lang lang nga! Nah do ngei dil kṭoiji ekurthuwk so.” Ungta mchanu ava mpha ava kat thu dam chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi Galil truwn biing ki ksun ra kurlou da. Ungu lown leen hangda, ava thu ku ong da.

Ungta kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ngi Mhin arhang lamda, mmaanni mkhu kseek, kyeng cha, mik ktot, ki ewng, ungu ktlok knempok ki kukoi Mhin ni arhan ṭhi lamda, mkhu ther ri thii lamda, ungu Mma ngi pdam pik lamda.

Ava leiji kurtuwl mii rekka ngak chlam da, ki ewng cha ava ngi mpau thuwk da, kyeng cha ava ngi karjii da, khu kseek ava ngi chet da, ungu mik ktotti khuw mdee thungta, Isreel ki Isowr ava panpaak chlam da.

Ava dilli Jisu ngi msiikhu rek Mhin own thida theda, “Kurtuwl mii rek hava kwon ksa lamma, mleija hava nii kdum lik thung ngi mi amṭhiin da, ungta mdo chaak raan do khat lee thloi chlam me; ungu mpoi in ktham daatti sii pthii nuwm lam maang, lam tha purthlokki klou kro lam.”
Ungu siikhu rekki Mhin the lamda, “Kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ava hava kbowk laiju thenpen kokhopva tva ki tphaak raan da?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Thenpen tija athloi inna?” Mmaanni arthawngda, “Tikheu, ungu tuwlva kdil sisi mruk suwn.”
Ungta kurtuwl mii rek ava dul leen mko on nraan paureen da,
Mma ngi thenpen tikheu leh tuwlva kdil sisi ava lou da, phowl kṭha parlaan thida msiikhu rek hin pii da, ungu siikhu rekki kurtuwl mii rek hin them pik lamda.
Ungu mmaan mkheng inni mpoi in kpa ngi chaa sap lamda; ungta mkekleem kṭik ava bowr tikheu kdim jilli chom lamda.
Kmaal mii rek ava snu rek leh kmo rek kthe kma pselpa mii pun plii arveel.
Ungta kurtuwl mii rek psun thida, Mma ngi arkuwng leen tuwngda, Magadan paamkowl tha vangda.
Ungta Pharisi rek leh Sadusi rek ki Mhin arva lamda, ungu kpirsin na ngi parwaan ki titinna mhai tdet in kdingi Mhin khewl lamda.
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Kjiing thang ngi vaosen mtlaak chocheva khuw kinthiir ra diinti naanni theen tinu.
Ungu jiingsunni parwaan ava vaosen tla da khuw mkarsim cheu, ‘snii va tchang khuw kraangra’ kdingi the in tinu. Pdainu mpha rek kira titinna rek ava purlup dei maan ti.
Kṭhakma leh losang kṭhi charuwlli, titinna khat thlaam da, pdainu Jonah ki titinna kma donle titinna kpii ro nime.” Ava leiji Mma ngi ma pthii lamda ungu sun chda.
Ungu siikhu rekki raalpha khat ktong tha mthlun in thungta, thenpen mdo hur raan pirngiil chdok lamda.
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Pharisi rek leh Sadusi rek thowl ava tuk asut inra chek asin chaan.”
Ungta mmaan msingreel inni karseel psuk lamda, the lamda, “Thenpen hur maan min.”
Pdainu Jisu ava dei thida theda, “O mruksuwnni krin cha rek naan, thenpen ado hur maan leiji asingreel inni talu leiji karteen psuk in pti
Naanni dei mlai liit in timo? Thenpen parnga rekki mii pun parnga, ungu bowr tija ngi apurku in tdit naanni bin phaak maan timo?
Mata thenpen tikheu rekki mii pun plii, ungu bowr tija ngi apurku in?
Neiji thenpen kdo thena kmapa tak heppi naanva dei maan tida? Pharisi rek leh Sadusi rek thowl chek asin dei chaan.”
Ava dilli mmaanni thenpen chek mdo sin raan kma, pdainu Pharisi rek leh Sadusi rek do purchu mdo the na tdit dei ro lamda.
Tunva Jisu ngi Kaisaria Philippia paamkowl tha marvan thungta,Mma ngi msiikhu rek hin pau Khewl da, “Mii rek va Mii Chapa ava kuw pi mdit inda?”
Ungbi mmaanni theda, “Mii mursonva baptis kuptlot Johon pi dida, angṭhe rek va Elijah pi dida, Ungu angṭhe rek nowlva Jeremia mdit mata khulpu rek thungki khat pi dilam da.”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Pdainu naanva Neia ku pi ati dit inna?”
Simon Pitor ri arthawng da, “Nah Khrista, Kring Isowr Chapa ava pti.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin arthawng da, “Simon Barjonah, nah asuwkṭha a! mleija hava daksaa leh hii ngi apandan pik me, pdainu parwaanki Kpah.
Ungta Neiji ahin kthea, nah Pitor nim ti, ungu hava lung leen Neiji Krinlop sa nik di, ungta kdiyou rutanni pchaang nime.

Neiji parwaan Kruwngpaam chungkam ahin apii nik di,ungu nang ngi dultipaam thu ado bowl khim khai ava parwaan thang ruk va kbowl ra, ungta nang ngi dultipaam thung ngi ado parthle khim khai ava parwaan thang ruk va kparthlet ra.”
Ava dilli Mma ava Khista tdit siikhu rekki ku mii khat lee hin mdo son ma nraan, Mma ngi mhin inni kparsa lang lang ngi parseel lam da.

Mpha ava kat thung ngi Jisu ngi Jerusalem kdo hanphaak ma rome ungta do knempok thung ngi kver rek, thiimpu kinreel rek, ungu Nowlam chukpu rekki kja kakham mikpii, ungta mki ae you lamra, ungu mnii kdum na nitti ring kardel nik di, dida msiikhu rek hin ktidet pṭhun da.
Ungta Pitor ri ṭhida Mhin krai pṭhun da, theda, “Mukpu, Isowr ri rome! Hava Nah athung ngi tden rukku thuwk mso.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mdil kinle da Pitor hinni theda, “Seitaan, Kdil tha kursown dok! Nah Nei klam akhaanna; mleija nah Isowr ktongki pti pme, pdainu mii rek ktongki pti.”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi msiikhu rek hin theda, “Ku mii khatti Nei kdil mṭoi nuwm bi, mdaksaa kulro msora, khros alou chso, ungta Kdil aṭoi cha so.
Mleija mrinkhu kaktlan nuwm mii ava kmaang chra, ungu Nei ktummi mrinkhu kmaang kcha mii ava ngi kpha chra.
Mleija miilai khatti dultipaam mkheng pha chthi sora, mrinkhu mmaan chaakku, ava tak ksii rang? Mata miilai khatti mrinkhu ava talu tung ngi kparthleng rang?
Mleija Mii Chapa ava Mma waan tamsii rek tung ngi Mpah laarnee ngi murjun mpha thu Mma ngi mii khim khaija mnong tlot dil kṭoiji kpinlet pik ra.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava thu krip daat mii angṭhe ava ngi Mii Chapa ngi Mkruwngpaam tu kilṭhi ngi murjun ava mdee du khim khai inni, kdiyou du lam nime.”
Ungta nii truk dil tha Jisu ngi Pitor leh Jeems ungu mnaopa Johon ṭhida, ktliing ngi lown kparthaang leen hang lamda.
Ungta Mma ava mmaan maiṭhuwm mi mrungchen karthleng da, ungu mmai ava kniw heppi lengda, ungta mdo mna ava mar awng heppi powl da.
Ungta asuwn, ava thu Mousi leh Elijah ngi ktarddet lamda, Mma tu karbii meek lam da.

Ungu Pitor ri Jisu hin theda, “Mukpu hava thung ngi ta am daat inna kdung ngi kṭha a; Nang ngi arot rang ta, hava thu neiji buw inn kdum esa chni, Nah atum ra khat, Mousi tumra khat, ungu Elijah tumra khat.”
Mma ngi anto mpau slii arlaanni, asuwn armei kepleu vi arjiil dok lamda, ungu armei thungki krowl khatti theda, “Hava Nei kwonsat lo Kchapa, Mma hin kning kthlung nga; Mma hin aryaan.”
Siikhu rekki ava maryaak in thungta, mmai in kuhuwm lamda tpee tir chlam da, ungta kdung ngi ṭi chlam da.
Pdainu Jisu ngi arvangda kmei lamda, theda, “Hanrip in, ṭi maan.”
Ungta mmaanni kin awn lamda khuw mhan sut in thungta,Jisu kma donle ku mii khat lee dei lamme.

Ungta mmaanni lown leen ki murjun ṭum slii arlaan inni, Jisu ngi mhin inni, Mii Chapa ava ngi kdiyou dok thungki mrin kardel du khim khai, ku mii khat lee hin mik kleng mdo dee inna mdo son ma nraan paureen da.
Ungta siikhu rekki Mhin pau khewl chlam da, “Talu leiji Nowlam chukpu rek va ru kri ngi Elijah kurjung rang pi mdo dit in da?”
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Do mkheng kpinjiir ra Elijah ava kurjung;
pdainu Neiji akthe pik inna, Elijah ava kurjung dok, ungta mmaanni dei chlamme, pdainu mdo ngei in khim khai mhin tlo lamda. Ava leiji Mii Chapa rukka mmaan khut thung ngikja kakham kphara.”
Ava dilli baptis kuptlot Johon mdo thena tdit siikhu rekki dei pindi ro lamda.
Ungu mmaanni kurtuwl mii rek hin murjun in thungta, miilai khatti Mhin hangda, mmaiṭhuwm mi pkhuppi tardiil da theda,
“Mukpu kchapa ava wonsat mhailo pik cha, mleija arngol arveida, ungu kdung reenni jakham chda; mleija maknem thung ngi mei thu tluw da, ungu dii thung ngi tla da.
Ungta neiji Nah siikhu rek hin karhai ṭhi chaak na, mmaanva pdam pchaang lam mda.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi arthawng da, “O krin dei kma karmak charuwl rek, tija pang roi ksotti Neiva aṭhi nikaan da? Tija pang roi ksotti Nei va adiil ṭhi ni kaan da? Nei kihin arvan ṭhiin.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin raida, ungu mma thungki tarnam arvan thuwk da, ungta mpha ava kat thung ngi pselnao ava dam chda.
Ava dilli siikhu rekki sipar jikki Mhin arva lamda the lamda, “Talu leiji neenva rei pthii pchaang maan ring da?”

Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Mleija mruk suwnni ado rin chaak lei in. Mleija kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni anruwng muw khat di pang ngi arin chaak inbi, hava lown ava ‘Hava thungki va tha kurlou dok,’ dida atheenbi, kurlou dok ra; ungu naan hin kthuwk kma ra do khat lee amni me.”
(Pdainu then ngowlda kṭhil cha kma donle hava lua kthuwk lu pme.)
Mmaanni Galil thung ngi mkurku slii arlaan ni, Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Mii Chapa ava mii rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthii ra,
Ungta mmaanni ke eayou ra, ungu nii kdum diltha kring kinle ra.” Ungbi mmaanna kdung reenni muplung in ja chda.
Mmaanni Kaparnahum marvan in thungta, luwbuk Inn khasna klou rekki Pitor hin hang lamda ungu mhin the lamda, “Naan ki Chukpu va khasna mtai dok mo?”

Mma ngi theda, “Oji.” Ungu mma ngi inn tha marvan thungta, Jisu chodu ngi mhin pauda, theda, “Simon nangva talu abinna? Dultipaam ki kruwng rek va ku hinki khasna mdit mata lampaal ava mlo in da? Mchapa hinki mo ktlok rek hin ki da?”
Ungu mma ngi “ktlok rek hinki” dida mthe thungta, Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Ava mkurthut bi mchapa le va pii nime.

Talu talu kurthuwk daat joso mmaan kro kma tkurthut ma nraan, ju rang ngi truwn thung ngi tuwlva ava kuikin avar psuk, ungta ru kri ki tuwlva ado kjown ava alou, ungu nang ngi mner alaibi mthung ngi thiir sum khat pha nadi; ava alou ra Nei ktum rang leh naan atum raan apii lam.”
Mpha ava kat thung ngi siikhu rekki Mhin arvang lamda, “Parwaan Kruwngpaam thangva ku ngi klin sii da?”
Ungta Mma ngi nao khat ownda, mṭim inni thiida,
ungu theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni plung ren hur da kmo rek lulu akurthut maan bi, parwaan kruwngpaam ava tden thung preva lut chip pchaang ni maan ti.
Hava nao heppi plung kparneem mi ka am ku mii khat ava, parwaan Kruwngpaam tha klin sii ra.
Hanto lu hep daat nao khat ku mii khatti marlaan chaak bi, ava Nei mdo tarlaan chaak;
pdainu Nei mikrin kcha hava kdil sisi thungki khat ava pnu mtlaak nra mtlot bi, mma tumva klin langlang lung khat louda mlowl leen psuk da kukthuk truwn thung ngi tvar pthi ava ngi kursuk sii ra.
“Kepthleem rek ava ngi pnu ktla dultipaam ava msuwkthi! Mleija kepthleemma kthleng kat ra, pdainu kepthleem thung ngi ktla miilai ava msuwkthi!

Ungta akhut mdit mata akhu inni pnu thu akaptla raan mkurthutta, areen buk inra avar pthiin; mleija khut knii ungu khu knii kthloiji kṭuw knai kma meiṭhuwm thung ngi atlaak raan kchang nga, akhut akhuwn kyeng ngi rinkhu ado phaak inni kursuk sii ra.
Ungta amik inni pnu akaptla raan mkurthutta,akhor inra avar pthiin; mleija mik knii thloida sim meiṭhuwm thu ado tvar pthii raan kchang nga mik khdaatti rinkhu ado phaak chaak inni kursuk ra.
“Hava kdil sisi thungki khat naanni ado hown chaak in rome tdit adei in; mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, parwaan ki mmaan waan tamsii ava mpha ktai thung ngi parwaan ki Kpah maiṭhuwmmi ka am lu.
Mleija Mii Chapa ava ngi kmaang kcha rek kaktlan rang ki kurjung.
Naanva talu abin inna? Jao arjaa khat kthloi miilai khatti, marlak inki khat mapve dokku, som tku lei tku ava lown tha ma pthii thida, kipveet dok khat ava chet don thlaam nime mo?
Ungta mma ngi mphaak chaak bi, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, kipveet kma som tku lei tku ava hinva mma ngi kheel sii ngi kanpat psuk chra.
Ava leiji hava kdil sisi rek khat mmaan chaak ra ava parwaan ki Kpah plungbin pme.
“Naan a u anao inni apsul in sora pnu mtlaak ta, vang inra adak kat leh mma tung daatti, ado tupsul naan ava athe pik in, mma ngi ataryaak pik inbi, a u anao in ava naanni aphaak chaak inna.
Pdainu mma ngi ataryaak pik maanbi,mii knii khat aṭhi tpom in, ditta pauna khim khaija mii knii kdummi tdee naki msakhi ra.
Mmaan hin rukku mma ngi maryaak nuwm mata, rinlop hin atheen; ungu rinlop hin rukku mma ngi maryaak mata, ktlok chati rek leh khasna klou rek hep lulu ngi kurthuwk chaso.

“Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni dultipaam thu ado bowl in khim khai ava parwaan paam thang rukku kbowl ra, ungu naanni dultipaam thung ngi ado parthle in khim khai ava parwaan paam thang rukku kparthlet ra.
Veikhat nowl li Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mmaan doṭhil ava naan miilai knii ngi dultipaam thung ngi arot pik inbi, mmaan tummi parwaan ki Kpah rukva krot pik lamra.
Mleija Nei kmiing ngi knii mdit mata kdum mi mkurku thu Nei rukka mmaan arlakki ka am ping.
Ava dilli Pitor ri Mhin arhangda theda, “Mukpu, nei ku u knaovi mupsul sora pnu mtlaak tlit daattu,knem sii ngi vei tikheu kpha thung ngi ptlot pik nimo?”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Neiva vei tikheu daattu dinu the maang, pdainu vei som tikheu kheu vi vei tikheu ra.
“Ava leiji, parwaan Kruwngpaam ava kruwng khatti msra owr rek tu sum klut leh kchet ava mdo pintiin nuwm ava tu purtol che naan di.
Mma ngi ktai mupṭhun thungta,arda man pun sowm lei parnga ktuwl miilai khat ava mhin arvan ṭhi lamda.
Ungu mma ngi mchoi pchaan ma rang thungta, mnumei tu kilṭhi ngi mnaole ungta mdo thloi mkheng jur thida mdo choi dok nra mhin ni pau pṭum da.
Ava leiji sra owr ava ngi pkhup pi tardiil da mhin ktham chda, ‘Mukpu mhai arda bong cha, do khim khai neiji achoi chdaat nik di.’
Ungta sra owr ava mma kpu ngi wonsat lo chda, mlei tuwl ava ptlot pik chda.
Pdainu sra owr ava katti, kurlouda mvan thungta,mma hinni dinarii arjaa khat pang lei ktuwl mmiiṭhi khat kurdut ṭhida; ungbi mlowl tha klel da theda, ‘Alei tuwl la mhai choi dok.’
Ava leiji mmiiṭhi sra owr khat ava ngi, ‘Mhai arda bong cha achoi chdaat nik di,’ dida kuwn da mhin ktham chda.
Pdainu mma ngi ro mda, mleituwl ava mchoi dok du khim khai ji rowng inn thung ngi daal pthii da.
Kthuwk nong ava mmaan miiṭhi sra owr rekki mdee in thungta, kdung ngi muplung in kpur ri karbin lamda, ungu vang lamda kthuwk nong mkheng ava mmaan ki Mukpu hin song chlam da.
Ava dilli Mukpu ngi mhin ni own thida theda, ‘Kṭha kma sra owr nang! Nang ngi ado ktham chaak leiji alei tuwl mkheng ado kuptlot pik.
Neiji wonsat ado klo lulu ngi, amiiṭhi sra owr hin nangva wonsat lo nim ti mo?’
Ungta Mukpu ngi mma hinki lei mdo tuwl mkheng mchoi dok du khim khai rowng inn thung ngi kseel rek hin parlaan pthiida.
Ava leiji naanni aplung ril in thung ngi, a u anao in aptlot pik maan bi, parwaan ki Kpah ruk va naan mii pum ktaija anto ktlo ra.”
