Tunva Jisu ngi hava le mdo the pṭuw dok thida, Galil thungki sunda, ungu Jordon raalpha ngi Judia paamkowl tha lut da;
Ungu kurtuwl mii knempok ki mdil ṭoida ava thu Mma ngi pdam pik chlamda.
Ungta Pharisi khatti Mhin arhang da mdo pirsin na ngi Mhin pau khewl da, “Mlei khat leiji miilai khatti mnu mei bowr mdo tlot pthii ra ava Nowlam va mrot mo?”
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Mupṭhun daat ki kseem va psel leh snu mdo seem, ava naanva pa maan ti mo?
Ungu theda, ‘Mleija hava leiji pselpa ngi mpah leh mnuh ma thi donle mnu mei mdo am ṭhira, ungu knii ava daksaa khdaat ra.
Ava leiji mmaan ava knii ngi am bong lamme, pdainu daksaa khdaatti ka am lam. Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Isowr do punlom dok ava ku mii khat lee ngi ṭhen mso.”
Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Talu leiji Mousi va mdo kinṭhen ṭhi nra, bowr ktlo ki mlei kikjit kro dida pau mdo reen da?”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan plung ril mapchai reen leiji Mousi va mnu mei bowr ktlo pthii ava mdo rot, pdainu mupṭhun daat le va anto lua kurthuwk me.
Ungta Neiji ahin thaanni kthea; mnumeiji mkarmet ma lei daatti mbowr tlo pthii thida, ktlok khat mlo bi, ava losang mṭhia.”
Siikhu rekki Mhin theda, “Pselpa khatti mnumei tu hanto lu rang mkurthut bi, snu mdolo ma ngi kṭha a.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tithe hava psel mkheng ngi arlaang nime, pdainu mdo piik dok mii rek ava hin daat ra.

Mleija mṭou daat ki kukhong chjap ra mii ka am, ungu mii ngi mkhon chaak nra mdo seem kukhong kcha mii ka am, ungta parwaan Kruwngpaam tummi mdak saa ngi khong chnuwm da kukhong cha rek mii ka am. Hava karlaang pchaang ra mii ava ngi arlaang cha so.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi mleen thaanni mkhut khiing da mdo ṭhil pik lam nra Mhin ni kmo rek arhai ṭhi lamda. Siikhu rekki mii rek ava rai chlam da;
pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Kmo rekka Nei kihinni arva chdaat lamso, ungta khaan maan; mleija hanto lulu thu parwaan Kruwngpaam ma ka am.”
Ungta Mma ngi mleen thaanni mkhut khiin pik lam thida sun chda.
Ungta asuw in, miilai khatti Mhin arhangda, theda, “Chukpu kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu kdo phaak chaak nra, talo kṭha tatlot rang da?”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Talu leiji kṭha mlei thung ngi ado tikhewl da? Isowr kma donle kṭha ku mii khat lee ame. Nang ngi rinkhu aphaak nuwm ta paureen rek ava arkhii cha.”
Mma ngi Mhin theda, “Tva da?” Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Nang ngi mii eayou ma, losang ṭhi ma, pruma, kindit kma thu sakhi ri pik ma,
anuh leh apah akjat cha, ungta adaksaa lulu ngi aveen wonsat alo.”
Pselnao ava ngi Mhin theda, “Hava le mkheng nga kdo pṭoi chaak; talu kdo tlot mlai ka am da?”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nang ngi kinreel akurthutta, vangra,ado thloi rek ava ajur thira sra rek hin apii cha, ungu parwaan tha asumbuwr thloi chna di; ungta arva ra kdil aṭoi cha.”
Pselnao ava ngi hava maryaak thungta, plung kja lang lang ngi vang sun da; mleija mma ngi do knempok thloi da.
Ungta Jisu ngi msiikhu rek hin theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, suwangpa ngi parwaan Kruwngpaam mthlun nrang nga tija thung ngi kparsa chdaatta.
Veikhat nowlli Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, suwang ngi Isowr Kruwngpaam mthlun rang kchang nga ut ti prou khur thung ngi mlu ava ngi ko ol sii ra.”
Siikhu rekki hava maryaak in thungta, kdung ngakki the lamda, “Mdittu ku da mdo ktlan rang nga?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi suw rim lamthida theda, “Mii rek hinva hava kurthuwk lu pme, pdainu Isowr hinva do mkheng nga kurthuwk lu.”
Ava dilli Pitor ri arthawngda, Mhin theda, “Asuw, neenni do khim khai ma pthii thiinnu Nah dil kdo ṭoi chaak in. Neenni talu thloi ni kaan di?”

Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, dultipaam ren ava thu Mii Chapa ngi mlaarnee ki longkhom leen mko on mpha thu, Nei kdil kṭoi naan ruk va Isowr ku onna sowm lei knii leen ku ong da, Isreel chati sowm lei knii kṭewl naan di.

Ungta ku mii khatti minn rek, mu u mnao, mcher, mpah mdit mata mnuh, mnaole, mpaam rek ava Nei kmiing tummi mmaak pthii bi, kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava tpom pik donle arjaa khat kheelli karlaang chra.
Pdainu ru kri ki mii knempok ava dil knau ra, ungta dil knau rel ava ngi ru kri ra.”
“Mleija parwaan Kruwngpaam ava inn kpupa ngi jiingsun kpanma ngi chet da rikrou bil thung ngi nong klou ra arda kren mche chaak ava lulu.
Nii khat ki arda man dinarii khat khatti mkulrot naan dok dil tha, rik rou bil thung ngi haisii lamda.
Ungu mma ngi ṭhang kdum arveelli ktlowng ngi ktlok rek ava mardaan kthii lang lang ngi bajaar thung ngi krip daat dei lamda;
Ungta mmaan hin rukku mma ngi theda, ‘Naan rukka rikrou bil thung ngi vaan, ungu ado kpiik raan mkindit ava apii ni kaan di,’ ava leiji mmaanni va lamda.
Ungta mma ngi ṭhang truk leh ṭhang tku arveelli, anto jikki tlo nowl da.
Ungu ṭhang sowm lei khat arveelli mhai nowl thungta, mii angṭhe krip daat pha nowl da; ungbi mma ngi mhin inni the nowl da, ‘Talu leiji niiluwnva arda kthii lang lang ngi krip tlit daat in pti?’
Mmaanni theda, ‘Mleija ku mii khat lee ngi arda mren pik maan da.’ Mma ngi mhin inni theda, ‘Naan rukka rikrou bil tha vaan.’
“Ungu khuw mjiin thungta, rikrou bil kpupa ngi mma ki sumvai klou hin theda, ‘Nong klou rekka a own lamra, mṭut na ki ngi ru kri ki thok kpha marda man in apii chlam.’
Ungta ṭhang sowm lei khat arveel ro ngi karva rek va, mii pum ktaiji dinarii khat khat arlaang chlam da.
Tunva ru kri ki rek karvang va, kheelli arlaang raan pak innu kdingi bin chlam da; pdainu mmaan ruk va mii pum ktaiji dinarii khat khat daat arlaang lamda.
Ungta ava mdo arlaan lei inni inn kpupa ava psul chlam da,
the lamda, ‘Mṭut na ki relva ṭhang khdaat thu nong lou lamda, ungu niiluwnni kniw ksa khaangda nong klou neen tu mpinṭim in tinu.’
“Pdainu mmaan arlakki khat hin mma ngi arthawngda, ‘Cham, neiji nah hin kar mak tlo maang; dinarii khatti tkulrot naan pme mo?
Naan ado ava alou inra vang in; naan hinni kdo piik lulu ngi hava mṭut na rel ki rukka kdo piik chaak.
Nei kdo ava nei kuplung bin ni kdo kchol chaak ro memo? Mdit mata nei kuplungnee leiji khei athe naan mo?”
Ava leiji dil knau rek ava ru krira, ungu ru kri rek ava dil knaura.
Ungta Jisu ngi siikhu rek sowm lei knii ṭhida, Jerusalem tha hang da, ungu lam tha Mma ngi mhin inni theda,
“Asuw in, nenni Jerusalem tha ka hang in min; ungta Mii Chapa ava thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek hin kparlaan pthii ra ungu mmaanni mraal pii lam donle ke eayou ra,
ungta ktlok chati rekki mdo pni chaak nraan ungu bunda khros leen mdo pthoi nraan kparlaan pthi lamra, ungta mnii kdum na thung ngi Mma ngi kring kardel ra.”
Ungta ava dilli Jebedi chapa rek nuh ngi arhang da mchapa rek tu kilṭhi ngi mmaiṭhuwm mi pkhuppi tardiil lamda Mhin do khat ṭhil chda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Talu angei da?” Mma ngi Mhin theda, “Nah Akruwngpaam thu hava nei kchapa rek kniia khatti achang ktong tha khatti alee ktong tha mkon chaak nlam ra pau mhai reen pik cha.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Ado ṭhil ava nang ngi dei pindi cha mti. Neiji kdo neek na tong thung ngi nee pchaang naan di?” Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Nee pchaang nikaan di.”

Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei ktong nga nee pchaang naan di, pdainu kchang ktong tha kuk ong rang leh klee ktong tha ku kong ra ava Neiji kdo rot ra ava pme, pdainu Kpah ngi mdo purchuwl pik rek ava tum.”
Ungu sowm rekki ava maryaak in thungta, unao knii rek leen mmaanni kdung ngi plung pthit lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi Mhin ni own lam thida theda, “Ktlok chati rek ava mmaan ki paam kpu ngi mleen thaanni mdo paalna, ungta klin mii rekki mmaan leen rutan mdo trat ava naanni ado dee in.
Naan arlak va anto lua kurthuwk me; pdainu naan arlakki klin mii ava naan sra owr ra,
ungta naan arlakki ru kri ver mma ngi asuwk in ra;
Mii Chapa mak rap klua, sok talo psuk ra kujung pme pdainu sok klou ra kurjung, ungu Mma rinkhu ngi mii knempok mdo ktlan pik nra kurjung.
Ungu mmaanni Jerikho ki mvanthuw in thungta, kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ngi mdil ṭoida.
Ungta asuwn lamsiir ri mik ktot miilai knii kong daat lamda, Jisu kchet meek slii ava maryaak in thungta, mmaanni owng lamda, “Devid Chapa wonsat mhailo chaan!” dilamda.
Ungbi kurtuwl mii rekki, “Rim kdi jiam in,” dilam da rai chlam da; pdainu kheel set setti mmaanni owng lamda, “Devid Chapa, Mukpu, wonsat mhailo chaan!”
Ungta Jisu ngi rip thida own lamda, theda, “Neiji talu ado ktlot pik raan angei inna?”
Mmaanni Mhin the chlam da, “Mukpu, kmik in kparvang so.”
Ungta Jisu ngi wonsat lo chlam da mmik in kmeida, ungbi tun kat daatti mmaanni khuw dei lamda ungu mdil ṭoi chlam da.
Ungta mmaanni Jerusalem nai lamda ungu kruwn lown tha Bethphas marvan in thungta, Jisu ngi msiikhu rek knii haisii lamda,
mhin inni theda, “Adu suk inki khuw ava thung ngi va in, ungta skowlraam khat msuwn tu pha khot naan di, aparthlet inra Nei kihinni arvan ṭhiin.
Ku mii khatti ati khewl luwng inta, ‘Mukpu ngi kriingda, ungu Mma ngi kbei sekki arhai ksii pinle ra,’ adi inra athe pik in.”
Kthuwk nong ava khulpu ngi mdo the dok ava mkurkhum nra kurthuwk.
“Sijon chanu hin athe pik, Asuw,
nang ki Kruwng ava nah hinni kurjung nga;
Mma ava plung kparneemmi skowlraam khatsuwn leenni klhleng nga.”
Jisu ngi mdo parseel pik lam ava heppi siikhu rekki va lamda tlo lamda;
mmaanni skowlraam leh msuwn ava arvan ṭhi lamda, ungta mleen dona phat lamda, ava leenni Mma ava ko ong da.
Lam thung ngi mii maknem va buw phat lamda, ungta angṭhe rek va ding baak pra lamda lam thung ngi phat chlam da.
Ungta mdu mdil kṭoi kurtuwl mii rekki owng lamda, “Hosana, Devid Chapa! Mukpu miing ngi kurjung Mma ava msuwkṭha! Kparthaang sii ngi Hosana!”
Ungu Mma ngi Jerusalem mlu thungta, khuwpii mkheng ngi kdung vawng klummi owng lamda, “Hava ku da?”
Ungta kurtuwl mii rekki the lamda, “Hava Galil ki Nasareth thungki Khulpu Jisu.”
Ungta Jisu ngi Isowr luwbuk Inn thung ngi lut da ungta luwbuk Inn thung ngi do kren rek leh kjur rek ava Mma ngi rei pthiida.
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ava mdo kjit dok, ‘Nei Ki inn ava tiṭhil chaak na Inn ra;’ pdainu naanva namtrom rek khur apurthut pthiinna.”
Ungta luwbuk Inn thu Mma hin tha kyeng rek leh mik ktot rek arva lamda, ungu Mma ngi pdam pik lamda.

Pdainu thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki Mma ngi tnga na nong mdo tlot, ungta luwbuk Inn thu kmo rek ko owng ngi “Hosana Devid Chapa!” kdingi mu own in ava mdee in thungta; mmaanni kdung ngi plung pthit lamda;

ungta Mhin the lamda, “Hava le ngi talu mthea, Nangva aryaakka?” Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Oji”; ‘Nao kdowng rek leh arnuw kjown rek nerri kpanpaak ki mkinreel ava athuw ṭhia,’ dida mdo the ava pa maan timo?
Ungta ma pthii lam thida, Mma ngi khuwpii ava thungki thuwk da, Bethania tha kipriik ra vang da.
Jiingsun kpanma ngi Mma ngi khuwpii tha mdil mkinlet thungta, mpoi thamda.

Ungu lam siir ri kduwt ding khat mdee thungta,Mma ngi vapha da, ungbi marna daat kma donle Mma ngi do khat lee pha chme. Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Athei chui purnowl liit mso!” Ungta kduwt ding ava tun kat daatti ṭong chda.
Siikhu rekki ava mdee in thungta kngak cha ngi the lamda, “Tun kat daattu kduwt ding ava tak heppi kṭong chdaat da?”

Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni plung kinṭheek liit kma arin chaak inbi, kduwt leen daatti naanni tlo ni maan ti, pdainu hava lown hin rukva, ‘Kurphui ra truwn thung ngi tla cha,’ dida athe inbi ava kurthuwk ra.
Ungta naanni ado ṭhil chaak in khim khaija arin chaak inbi naanni arlaang chnaan di.”

Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk Inn thu lut da mpurchu slii daat arlaanni, thiimpu kinreel rek leh mii rekki kver rek Mhin arhang lamda, the lamda, “Hava lea talu rutanni Nang va ado lot, ungu hava rutanna ku ngi atpiik da?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Nei rukku pau khat aju khewl chaanni; naanni ava atar thaan inbi Nei rukku talu rutanni hava lea kdo tlot tdit athe pik ni kaan di.

Baptis kuptlot Johon na tva ki kthleng? Parwaan kimo mdit mata dulti mii rek hin ki?” Ungbi mmaanni khat leh khatti karseel lamda,nenni ‘Parwaan ki pi,’ dida narthaan inbi, ‘Talu leiji mma ava rin chmaan ti,’ di donle mi kthe raan.
Pdainu nenni ‘Dulti mii rek hin ki pi’ dida nthe inbi, hava mii rek mluwngpa ava nṭit inna; mleija mii mkheng ngi Johon na khulpu khat pi di lamda.
Ava leiji mmaanni Jisu hin arthawng lamda, “Dei maan ring.” Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei rukku talu rutan ni hava lea kdo tlot tdit athe pik ni maan ring.
“Naanni talu abin inna? Miilai khatti chapa rek knii thloi da; upa bet hinni mma ngi vangda theda, ‘Kchapa, sniiva rik rou bil tha chet nong alou.’
Ungta mma ngi arthawngda, ‘Chet ni maang’; pdainu ava dil tha mma ngi plung pinle da chet da.
Ungu miknit na hin mma ngi vangda anto heppi theda, ungbi mma ngi ‘Chet laini ocha’, di thida chet mda.

Hava mmaanve knii thungva ku ngi mpah plungbin mtlotta?” Mmaanni theda, “Ru kri ki,” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan adu thaanni khasna klou rek leh ko ok kma rekki Isowr Kruwngpaam thangva ku hung lamra.

Mleija naan hinni Johon ni lam kindit deek ktong tha arjung da, ungta naanni rin chmaan ti, pdainu khasna klou rek leh ko ok kma rekki rin chlam da; ungu naanni kdei kurthuwk jownti, mdil thang daat ruk va naanni plung ren hur da mhin krin cha kurthuwk maan ti.

“Ungta ktlok paupurtol ruk aryaa chaan. Inn kpupa khat amda,mma ngi mbil thu rik rou phunda, ungu mrowng tlot psuk da, mdii mdo sun nra khur kvel da, ungta mbuk sada, knum rek hin sil na thida, khuwpaam ktlok tha pjiin chda.
Ungta thei mchui na ki mkaal mvee thungta, thei klou ra msra owr rek ava knum rek hinni hai siida;
ungbi knum rek va sra owr ra lou lamda khat bun lamda, ktlok khat eayou lamda, ktlok khat ava lung ngi deeng lamda
Ungta mma ngi msra owr rek haisii nowl da, ru kri ki hinnu kheel sii ngi mmaanni mhin inni tlo lamda.
Mṭut na rel va mma ngi mchapa haisii da theda, ‘Kchapa ava mmaanni kakjat kro lam.’
Pdainu knum rekki mchapa mdee in thungta, mmaanni the lamda, ‘Hava lamchi pipa, arvaan mma ava eayou in che ungu alrou ava nenni ta thloi chaak raan.’
Ungta mmaanni lou lamda rik rou bil nowmbe ngi var pthii lam thida eayou lamda.
Ava leiji rik rou bil kpupa ngi arva don knum rek hin talu ktlo rang?”
Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Mma ngi kṭha kma mii rek ava tiṭit kirvei daatti ke eayou lamra, ungta mkaal mkaal thung ngi thei kpii ra ktlok mii rek ava hinni mma ngi rik rou bil knum rang nga ksil nra.”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda,
naanni Laaika rek ava pa maan ti mo:
‘Inn ksapa do pthlei lung ava katti,
markil ki ksuwk bul kurthuwk da;
hava Mukpu nong tlot,
ungta nen nmik sut naan thu tnga chaak in pme mo’?
“Ava leiji, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan athung kiin Isowr Kruwngpaam ava lou donle thei kchui rangki chati khat hinni kpii pthii ra.
Ungta hava lung leen ni ktluw mii ava mikṭiik mikṭiikki kukui chra; pdainu mma ngi mtlaak na mii ava purvut ti kjuwng chra.”
Thiimpu kinreel rek leh Pharisi rekki ava paupurtol maryaak in thungta, mmaan mlei thung ngi mdo the na tdit dei lamda.
Pdainu mmaanni kukjowng rang ki mtlot in thungta, mii rek mkluwngpa ava ṭi chlam da, mleija mmaanni Khulpu khat kdingi bin lamda.
Ungta pau ksaammi Jisu ngi mhin inni paupurtol khatti the nowl da,
“Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava kruwng khatti mchapa ki kphal kmaal mdo piik chaak ava tu tpurtol kro,
ungta mma ngi kphal kmaal ra kowl mdo lat chaak mii rek ava ku ownra msra owr rek siida; pdainu mmaanni thleng nuwm lamme.

Ungta mma ngi ktlok sra owr rek siida the nowl da, ‘kokowl lat dok rek hin atheen, asuwn kmaal rang ki kpurchuwl dokka, ksilpa rek leh msuwn kmar rek eayou nu, ungta do khim khai kpurchuwl dokka kphal kmaal mhai thlen pik chaan.’
Pdainu mmaanni ko ol tekki tlo lamda, khatti bil tha, ungu khatti msumdowl lo ntha,
angṭhe rekva sra owr rek ava kjowng lamda, ungta aeyou lamda.
Ungta kruwng ava ngi plung pthit da, mii rek ava mlop mloppi siida, mii ke eayou rek ava pmawng pthii da, ungta mkhuwpiin ava rukka meiji pkaa pthii da.
Ava dilli mma ngi msra owr rek hin theda, ‘Kphal ava kurchuwl dokka, pdainu kukowl lat chaak rek ava kurhui sii me.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, lamṭhuwm rek thung ngi va inra, ado dut thok in khim khai mii knempok kphal kmaal rang ki arvan ṭhiin.’
Ungta sra owr rekki lamṭhuwm thung ngi chet lamda, mdo phaak khot in mii mkheng kṭha leh kṭha kma purkuk lamda; ava leiji kphal inn ava malli dim chda.
“Pdainu kphalpa ngi arva da mmal rek msut thungta, kphal dona knaa kma miilai khat dei da;
Ungbi mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Plap, kphal dona knaa kma daattu tak heppi hava thu klut pti da?’ Ungta mma va do khat lee the pchaang me.
Ava dilli kruwng ngi vaiklou rek hin theda, ‘Mkhu mkhut abowl inra duwnki kjiing thung ngi avar pthiin; ava thung ngi mii rekki mhaa in kril donle kṭap lamra.’
Mleija knempok mdo own, pdainu mruk suwn daat mukcholla.”
Ava dilli pharisi rek ki sun lamda, tak heppi mpauna rek thung ngi tukjown raan kdingi karseel lamda.

Ungta mmaanni siikhu rek leh Herodia mii rek Mhin haisii lamda the lamda, “Chukpu, Nah kindit tdit neenni kdee in, Isowr lam kindit deekki purchuk tinu, ungta mii ava tuksuw mti; mleija mii rek nong powk ava nang ngi kjat mti.
Ava mkurthuttu Nang va talu abinna, mhai the pik chaan. Keisar hin khasna tpiik ava Nowlam do rot mo dorot pme?”
Pdainu mmaan ṭhat ma Jisu ngi deida theda, “Talu leiji atpirsin naanna, ṭha tlot ktlo rek naan?
Khasna tummi sum ava mhai tdet in.” Ungta mmaanni thiir sum khat arvan sin lam da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Hava ku do kjit ungu ku mdutta?”
Ungu mmaanni theda, “Keisar.” Ava dilli Mma ngi theda, “Keisar do rek ava Keisar hin apiin ungu Isowr do rek ava Isowr hin apiin.”
Mmaanni ava maryaak in thungta, kdung ngi ngak chlam da; ungu ma pthii lam thida sun chlam da.
Ava nit katti kdiyou thungki kring karheel ame dida kthe Sadusi rekki Mhin arva lamda paukhewl lamda,
the lamda, “Chukpu, Mousi va hanto theda, ‘Naolu khat lee kthloi kcha mlaiji mii ava ngi mdiyo bi, mei khunu ava mnaopa ngi mdolo ra, ungu mu upa tummi naole mdo pluk pik ra.’
Tunva neen karlak inni unao tikheu am lamda; ru kri verri snu louda, naolu khat lee kthloi cha kma laiji mnu mei ava mnaopa hin ma thida diyou chda.
Ava leiji miknit na ruk, ungu mukdum na, mtikheu na jun pha dek da.
Mmaan mkheng dil tha snu ava ruk diyou chda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, kring karheel nit va hava tikheu thungki ku numei kurthuwk rang da? Mleija mkheng inni numei purthuw sap lamda.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Naanva aparma inna, mleija laaika mdit mata Isowr rutan daat don dei maan ti.
Mleija kring karheel nit va, innknei mdit mata kphal pii nime, pdainu parwaan tamsii rek hep daat ra.
Ungta kdiyou rekki kring karheel mkurthuttu, Isowrri ahin inni mdo the ava naanni pa maan timo’?
‘Neia Abraham ki Isowr, Isek ki Isowr, ungu Jakob ki Isowr pmaang mo’? Mma ava kdiyou ki Isowr pme pdainu kringki Isowr.”
Ungu kurtuwl mii rekki ava maryaak in thungta, Mma do purchu leen mmaanna ngak chlam da.
Pdainu Sadusi rekka rim kdi mpa am pthii lamma tdit pharisi rekki maryaak in thungta, mmaanni arva kurkuk lamda.
Ungta mmaan arlakki Nowlam chukpu khatti, mdo parsin na ngi Mhin pau khat khewl da.
“Chukpu, Nowlam thungki paureen mklin sii ava tva da?”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nang ngi nang ki Isowr Mukpu ava aplung ril mkheng, araothla mkheng, ungu adobin mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi wonsat adolo ra.
Hava ngi klin ungta ru kri ver ki paureen.
Ungta miknit na rukka hanto hep daat, nang ngi aveen ava adaksaa kat lulu ngi wonsat alo cha.
Hava paureen rek knii ava Nowlam leh khulpu rek kurdu ngi ka am.”
Tunva pharisi rekki mthuw kurku arlaanni, Jisu ngi mhin inni pau khat khewl lamda,
theda, “Khrista ava talu heppi abin inna? Mma ava ku Chapa?” Ungta mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Devid Chapa.”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ava mkurthuttu tak heppi Devid va pthla tdaalli, Mhin Mukpu dida mdo theda?
‘Nei ki Mukpu ngi Neiki Mukpu hin theda,
arawlmii rek akhu tingi kthiik du khim khai,
Nei kukhut chang ktong tha ku ong cha.’
Devid mdak katti Mukpu mdo dit ava tak heppi mma chapa kurthuwk rang da?”
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi Mhin pauna khat lee arthawng pchaang me, mdit mata ava nit ki kupṭhun ni ku mii khat lee ngi Mhin pau khewl purnowl me.
Ava dilli Jisu ngi kurtuwl mii rek leh msiikhu rek hin theda,
pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek ki Mousi longkhom leen ku ong lamda;
ava leiji mmaan do the khim khaija atlo inra adan in, pdainu mmaan do tlot lu rang pme; mleija mmaanni mparyaam inna, pdainu mnongva tlo lamme.
Mmaanva mii do diil pchaan ma bowr krik ki bowl lamda, ungu mii rek lukou leen thii lamda; pdainu mmaanva mkhut chel in daat rukva pursown lamme.
Mmaanni do mkheng ava mii rek do dee rang ngi tlo lamda; mleija mleen thaanni laaika mjiik kṭum pa ngi arkeeng lamda, ungu mbuw mor in kturrown,
ungta kmaal mun rek thung ngi mmun takjat ngeen lamda, ungu synagog rek thung ngi longkhom kṭha ngeen lamda,
ungta bajaar mun thung ngi mii salaam ngei lamda, ungu mii ngi rabbi mdo dit ra ava ngei lamda.
Pdainu naanni Rabbi dida ado to own nraan ki pme, mleija naanni Chukpu khat thloi in tinu, ungta akheng inni unao jesang in pti.
Ungta dultipaam thung ngi ku mii khat lee hin apah dida own maan, mleija parwaan tha ka am naan ki Pah khat ado thloi in.
Mata chukpu rek di maan, mleija Khrista tdit Chukpu khat ado thloi in.
Naan arlakki klin sii mii ava ngi naan ki sra owr kurthuwk ra;
ungu ku mii khatti mdak saa mkar khiin nuwmbi, ava ktipneem pthii ra, ungta kneem mii rek ava ki khiing ra.

“Pdainu ṭha tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh pharisi rek naan ava suwkthi! Mleija mii rek mraal kpii ngi naanni parwaan Kruwngpaam arkam pthiin tinu; mleija naan adaksaa in ruk lut maan ti, mdit mata klut ra mii ruk plut maan ti.

Kṭha do tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh pharisi rek naan ava suwkthi! Mleija naanni meikhu inn kruwl inti, ksaangpa ngi kṭhil cha do tlot tlo inti; ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da klin sii ki mraal arlaang chnaan di.

Kṭha tlot ktlo pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek naan ava suwkthi! Mleija miilai khatti plung mdo parthlen nra truwn leh laan tija arkaan inti, ungu mii ngi plung mparthlen dok le, knii kheel dekki naan adaksaa in lulu ngi sim nao purthuw krep pthiin tinu.

“Mik ktot kṭhi rek naanna asuwn kthi! ‘Ku mii khatti luwbuk Inn ktham da pau mreel bi, ava do khat lee pme; pdainu ku mii khatti jeering luwbuk Inn ktham da pau mreel bi, mii ava mdo the dok ava ngi mbowlla,’ kdingi the in tinu.
Mik ktot ka aak rek naan! Mleija tva ngi klin, jeering rang mo mdit mata jeering kurdowlli kthii luwbuk Inn rang?
Ungta naanni theen tinu, ‘Ku mii khatti kchiir suwlbuwr ktham da pau mreel bi, ava do khat lee pme; pdainu kchiir suwlbuwr leen ki chla ava maktham bi, mdo reel dok ava ngi mma ava mbowlla.’
Mik ktot rek naan! Mleija tva ngi klin betta, chla ava mo mdit mata chla ava kurdowlli kthii kchiir suwlbuwr da?
Ava leiji kchiir suwlbuwr kaktham mi mleenki do khim khai ruk mdo ktham kthen dok;
ungta luwbuk Inn kaktham mii ava ruk pau mdo ktham kthen ungu mthungki ka am Mma ruk mdo ktham kthen;
ungta parwaan kaktham mii ava rukku, Isowr longkhom ungu ava leenki kuk ong rek ruk mdo ktham kthen.

“Kṭha tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh pharisi rek naan ava asuwnkthi! Mleija naanni chiimuh mkheng tholowm piin tinu, ungu krik bet Nowlam mlei thu kindit, wonsat ava krin cha thu leek psuk in tinu; murson kleek kma hava lea naan ni ado tlot kat raan.
Mik ktot kṭhi rek naan! Naanni pdou rei pthii thiin tinu ut pjol in tinu!

“Kṭha do tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh pharisi naanna asuwn kthi! Mleija naanni tong leh arkuw mduwn ava knowt in tinu, pdainu mthung nga naan ki avawnglum in leh daksaa akpirnin naanni kdim kcha a.
Mik ktot pharisi naan! Ru kri reeppi tong leh arkuw mthung ava aknowt dok in, mbi mduwn rukka kartleu chra.

“Kṭha do tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rek naan ava asuwn kthi! Mleija naan ava mduwn kindang kṭha kpowlli tparnaal dang thlaan rek ava hep daat in pti, pdainu mthung ava kdiyou mii rek ava ru ungu ktobor ri kdim cha.
Ava leiji naan rukka mduwn daatti rinkindit ti mii rek hin kindang in pti, pdainu athung inna ṭha tlot ktlo leh pnu ngi kdim kchaan pti.
“Kṭha do tlot ktlo Nowlam chukpu rek leh pharisi rek naan ava asuwn kthi! Mleija naanni khulpu rek thlaan rek sak pik in tinu, ungu rinkindit rek purthlot in tinu,
theen tinu, ‘Nenni npah le in mpha thu na am daat tlaang inbi, khulpu rek hii kpubuw nenki ntum ka am kma rang nga.’
Hanto adaksaan mraal kpii ngi sakhi rek kurthuwk da, mleija naan ava khulpu rek ke eayou mmaan ava chapa rek in pti.
Ava mkurthutta naanki apah leenni mdo parte na ava apdim dok in.
Pruwl nao rek naan, sim thu akbuk nraan thungki tak heppi karthlet chnaan di?

Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Neiji khulpu rek leh ksing mii rek ungu Nowlam chukpu rek naan hinni mdo sii mii angṭhe ava naanni aeyou naan di ungta khros leen pthoi naan di ungu mii angṭhe ava synagog rek thung ngi bun naan di ungta khuwpii khat ki ngi khuwpii khat tha rei punthowm pthii naan di,

Ungta kdei cha kma Abel hii thung ki ngi Barakhia chapa Sakharia kpha, kchiir thungki ngi kchiir suwlbuwr kpha naanni ado eayo in dultipaam thung ngi rinkindit rek hii kbu mkheng ava naan leenni kurjung ra.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava mkheng nga hava charuwl rek mkheng leenni kthleng ra.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, khulpu rek eayou tinu ungu nah hinni mdo sii mii rek ava lung ngi deeng you tinu! Tak hep pang kurnowlli Neiva anao lea harnu ngi msuwn rek mapthla ti ngi mdo om lulu ngi om nik di ungta nangva ro mti!
Asuw, a inn na ktlong reng rong ngi mmaak pthia.
Mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ‘Mukpu miing ngi kurjung Mma ava msuwkṭha, dida kthe du khim khai nang ngi vei khat mdei chnim ti.’ ”
Ungta Jisu ngi luwbuk Inn ma thida sun chda, ungu msiikhu rekki Mhin ni luwbuk Inn kṭha ava song chlam da.
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Hava le mkheng adee inna, dei naan dida? Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mdo var pthii ma ra lung khat leenni lung khat kurtuwn daatti ma liit nime.”

Ungta Jisu ngi kruwn lown leen tha mo ko on daat arlaanni, spar jikki msiikhu rekki Mhin arhang lam da, the lamda, “Hava tden kthuwk rang, ungu Nah arjun nrang leh kum ṭut kira titinna ava talu rang, mhai the pik chaan?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Ku mii khat lee ngi lele tha ado tiṭhi ma nraan tuk asut chaan.
Mleija Nei kmiing ngi mii knempok thleng donle, ‘Neia Khrista ping,’ di donle mmaanni mii knempok lele tha kṭhi pthii lamra.
Ungta naanni rawl rek leh rawl ki titi aryaa naan di; ava naanni piir pik maan; mleija hava ksoi liit kma kthuwk ra, pdainu mṭut nra ava pme.
Mleija chati khatti chati khat mraal kpii ra, ungu kruwngpaam khatti kruwngpaam khat mraal kpii ra, ungta mmun ktai thung ngi poi tham leh ringnaang kthuwk ra.
Hava mkheng nga kthuwk ra pdainu nao kuplu rang ngi kdung kṭou heppi mdo pṭhun na kurthuwk ra.
“Ava dilli mmaanni suwk thuw akpii raan ki akparlaan pthii raan; ungta ake eayou raan; ungu Nei kmiing ngi chati rek mkheng ngi akipder chraan.
Ungta mii knempokki khat leh khat kparthlei ra, khat leh khat kparder chdonle ktluw tir chra.
Ungu kindit kma khulpu rek knempok thleng donle mii knempok lele dung ngi kṭhi pthii ra.
Ungta kṭha kma knempok leiji, mii maknem mi wonsat ava kma pthii ra.
Pdainu mṭut na kpha dekki kdiil pchaang mii ava kaktlan pik ra.
Ungu chati rek mkheng thung ngi rinpaumin khat kurthuwkki, hava Kruwngpaam kṭha paumin ava dultipaam mkheng thung ngi karyaam ra; ava dilli mṭut na kurjung rora.
“Ava dilli khulpu Deniel li mdo the tiṭit kirvei naanni adee in mpha thu, mmun kchiir thung ngi krip ra. (kpa kcha mii ngi adei pindi chaso.)
Ava dilli Judia thu ka am rekki lown leen tha kchen lamra;
ungta innthlun leen ka am daat mii va mi inn thu ka am do ava klou ra jungṭum mso;
ungu bil thu ka am mii va mbuw klou rang ngi mdil kinle mso.
Ungta mpha avale thung ngi nao kuhur rek leh nao kakai rek ava tija thung ngi msuwkthi chdaatta!
Phalbii thung leh sabath nitti achen ma nraan aṭhil dei chaan.
Mleija ava dilli dultipaam mupṭhun daat ki snii kpha thung ngi kthuwk kma lai, ka am kma, ungu tden rukku kthuwk nowl kmara, klin langlang ki suwk kthuwk ava ka amra.
Ungta mnit rek ava muptoi pthii ma daat ngaallu dulti mii ku khat lee pre ktlan pik nime; pdainu mdo kchol mii rek ava tummi mnit rek ava mdo ptoi pthii.
Ava dilli ku mii khatti naan hinni, ‘Asuwn, Khrista ava hava tha! Mdit mata Mma ava ‘Va tha,’ dida mtheen mpha thu rin chmaan.
Mleija kindit kma khrista rek leh kindit kma khulpu rek thleng donle, titinna klin klin leh tnga na rek akti det raan, naan ava lele dung ngi ado tiṭhi nraan, mrot khim khai thu mdo kchol rek ra.
Asuwn, mdu jappi, Neiji akthe pik inna.

Ava leiji mmaanni naan hin thang ngi, ‘Asuwn Mma ava kbowklai ji ka am daatta,’ dida mthe in mpha thu naanni va thuwk maan, mdit mata ‘Mma ava innka thung ngi ka am daatta,’ dida mthe in mpha thu rin chmaan.
Mleija kowl kiplek ki kniw thuwna ki ngi kniw tlaak na kpha dekki mlen ava lulu ngi, Mii Chapa arjun nrang rukka anto hep daat ra.
Ungta daksaa kluwng amna mun ktai thung ngi pa ah rek kurtuwl ra.
“Ungta suwk kthuwk ava dil tha kbei sekki kniw ngi kjiing chra, ungu thla ngi mar awng pii nime, ungta parwaan ki bursi rek ktla chra, ungu parwaan rutan rek ava kunchun ra;

ava dilli Mii Chapa arjun nrang ki titinna ava kindang rora, ungta dultipaam thungki chati rek mkheng ngi kurnung karbaang donle kṭap ra, ungu Mii Chapa ngi armei tu kilṭhi ngi parwaan rutan leh mlaarnee klin langlang ngi kurjung mmaanni kdei lamra;
ungta Mma ngi waan tamsii rek ava peengkhul krowl kparyaa tu kilṭhi ngi ksii lamra, ungu dultipaam markil plii thung ki parwaan mdo pṭhunna leh mdonna ki Mma do kchol rek ava kpurkuk lamra.
“Kduwt ding ngi ekurchuk chaan; mbaak kdowng deek jamda marnaa muksun daat le, chuwr khuw knaija tdit naanni ado dee in.
Ava lulu ngi, hava le mkheng naanni adee in mpha thu, paltong be katti Mma ava lam knaija tdit adei in.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, havale mkheng mthuw du khim khai hava charuwl ava maang nime.
Parwaan leh dultia kmaang cha kro, pdainu Nei kpauna ava maang liit nime.
“Pdainu mnit leh mṭhang ava ku khat lee ngi dei me, parwaan ki waan tamsii daat don, Mchapa daat don deime, pdainu Mpah daatti mdee.
Noha nit rek lulu ngi Mii Chapa arjun nrang rukka kurthuwk ra.
Diipa mkinlet du ungta Noha ngi arkuwngpii thu mlu du khim khai, mmaanni chaanee lamda,phal lamda innknei snu klou tlo lamda.
Ungta diipa kinle da mmaan ava mkheng inni mlo chaak du khim khai, mmaanni dei lamme, Mii Chapa arjun nrang rukka anto hep daat ra.
Ava dilli miilai knii ngi bil thu ka am ra; khat lou thidonle khat ava kma pthii ra.
Snu miilai knii ngi sum thung ngi bu ksura; khat lou thidonle khat ava kma pthii ra.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, asut pṭoi chaan, mleija naan ki Mukpu ava talu nitti kurjung rang tdit naanni dei chmaan ti.
Pdainu hava adei in, innkpupa ava ngi jaanni kupru thlen na ki mpha ava mdee chaak daat tlaangbi,mma ngi mi inn ava kṭha ngi sut pṭoi donle kruwl nime.
Ava leiji, naan rukka akurchuwl chaak nraan; mleija Mii Chapa ava rukka naanni ado bin phaak liit maan ṭhang ava thu Mma ngi kurjung ra.
“Ungta mma ki Chukpu ava ngi mi inn thungki mkheng mdo silna, ungu mpha kcha ngi mii rek hin then kpii ra, trin chaak kro sra owr ava ku rang da?
Chukpu ngi mthlun mpha thu ktlo meek slii ngi mdo phaak ra sra owr ava msuwkṭha.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Mma ngi mulrou mkheng nga mhin ksil nra.
Pdainu kṭha kma sra owr ri mthii na ngi hanto athe sora, ‘Neiki chukpu ava kukto ra,’
ungta mma miiṭhi sra owr rek ava kbun pṭhun sora, ungu chaaneeda prii da ma am arlaanni,
sra owr mma ki Chukpu ava mdo bin phaak liit ma nit thu ungta ṭhang thung ngi kurjung ra,
ungta Mma ngi mraal kpii ra ungu ṭha tlot ktlo murson rek tu kthiira; ava thu mii rekki mhaa kril lam donle kṭap lamra.
“Parwaan Kruwngpaam ava nala miilai sowm ava ngi meila sinda kphalpa kurdut ṭhira mcheen ava purtol che naan di.
Miilai parnga rekka ka ak lam ungu miilai parnga rekka ksing rek lam.
Mleija ka aak rekki meila mlo in mpha thu, mmaanni thaodii lou lamme;
pdainu ksing rek va meila mlo in mpha thu, thaodii rukka mu uwm thuwn sin lamda.
Kphalpa ngi mukto dok thungta, mkheng inni kurngui chlam da, iip dok lamda.
Pdainu thanṭim jaanni krowl khatti owngda, ‘Asuwn, Kphalpa ava! Arva inra akurdut ṭhi chaan.’
Ava dilli nala rek mkheng kardel lamda, mmeila in purthlong lamda.
Ungbi ka aak rekki ksing rek hin theda, ‘Athaodiin mruk mhai pinṭhe pik chaan, mleija neen kmeidiin na kthlang kcha a.’
Pdainu ksing rekki arthawng lamda, ‘Naan tum ruk neen ktum in ruk ku khop kma kro; ava leiji kjur mii hin vada ado ren chaak inni kursuk bet ra.’
Ungta mmaanni kren ra mhai arlaan inni Kphalpa arjungda, ungu kurchuwl dok mii rek ava kphal kmaal ra hun ṭhi da; ungta thurngot arkam pthii da.
Ava dilli nala rek angṭhea thleng ro lamda, the lamda, ‘Mukpu, Mukpu, mhai pvan pik chaan.’
Pdainu Mma ngi arthawng da, ‘Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanna adei maan ring.’
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da asut pṭoi chaan, mleija naanni mpha don mṭhang daat don dei maan ti.
“Mleija miilai khatti kipjiin rang ki ngi msra owr rek mhinni own lam thida, mulrou mkheng mdo sil nlam lulu;
miilai khat hin mma ngi sum pun parnga pii da, khat hin knii ungta khat hin khat pii da, mma mma do pchaan dil kṭoiji pii da. Ava dilli mma ngi pjiin da.
Sum pun parnga karlaang mma va chet tengda sum dowl lo nda; ungu sum pun parnga lot tpom da.
Anto hep daatti sum pun knii kthloi ruk va knii lot tpom da.
Pdainu sum pun khat karlaang mma va chet da dul tou thida mma chukpupa sum ava dowl pthii da.
Tunva mpha roi ksot dil thang ngi sra owr rek chukpu ava thlung da ungu mmaan tu sum ava tai lamda.
Ungta sum pun parnga karlaang mma ngi arvang da, sum punparnga mdolot tpom tu arvan sin da, mhin theda, ‘Chukpu sumpun parnga mpii chtinu, sum pun parnga neiji lot tpom nu.’
Mma ki chukpu ngi mhin theda, ‘Kṭha a, trin chaak kro sra owr; nang ngi hava mruk suwn thung ngi trin chaak akurhui leiji, do knempok asil na nik di; nangki chukpu kanpat thu lut cha.’
Ungta sumpun knii kthloi rukva arvang da, theda, ‘Chukpu nah asum pun knii mparlaan chti nu,hei sum pun knii lot tpom chnu.’

Mma chukpu ngi mhin the da, ‘Kṭha a, kṭha ungu trin chaak kro sra owr; hava mruk suwn thung ngi trin chaak kro akurthut leiji, hava leenni neiji do knempok asil na nik di, nang ki chukpu kanpat thu lut cha.’
Sum pun khat karlaang ruk va arvang da, the da, ‘Chukpu, nang nga kparsa miilai pti, nang ngi ado pṭau ma khau tinu, ado pkhui ma ado purku ava neiji deinu;
ava leiji aṭi chnu ungbi neiji chet nu tnek thu kdo dowl pthii. Hei ado ava alou cha.’
Pdainu mma chukpu ngi mhin arthawng da, ‘Kṭha kma howng kva sra owr nang! Neiji kdo pṭau ma khau nu kdo pkhui ma kdo purku adee mo?
Sum lot na thu ksum thii da, neiji kikinlet mpha thu mdo lot tpom tu kdo arlaan chaak rang nga nang ngi apartlai krea.
Ava leiji mma hinki sum ava alou inra sum sowm kthloi hin apiin.
Mleija ktlo nuwm mii ava hin kheelli kpii ra, ungta mma ngi kheelli kthloi ra; pdainu kthloi kma mii ava, mma ngi mdo thloi mruk suwn ava ruk klou pthii ra.
Ungta do ksi kma sra owr ava duwn ki kjiingnu thung ngi avar pthiin, ava thu mii rekki mhaa kril donle kṭap lamra.
“Mii Chapa ava ngi waan tamsii rek mkheng tu mlaarnee ngi murjun mpha thu, mlaarnee longkhom leen Mma ngi kuk ong ra.
Mma maiṭhuwm mi chati rek mkheng ava kpurkuk ra, ungta Jao krung ngi keel rek thungki Jao rek mdo ṭhen lulu ngi, Mma ngi khat thungki khat kṭhen pthii ra.
Ungta Mma ngi jao rek ava mchang ktongki mkhut leen kthii ra, pdainu keel rek ava mlee ktongki khut thung ngi kthii ra.
Ava dilli Kruwng ngi mchang ktong ki mkhut thungki rek hin kthe ra, ‘Arhung in, O Kpah phowl kṭha kpha rek, dultipaam mapṭhan daat ki ado tpurchuwl pik dok in Kruwngpaam ava thung ngi am chaan;
Mleija Neiji kpoi mtham mpha thu then mpii chaan ti, kning makraal mpha thu dii mpii chaan ti, malpa kukurthut thu mkowl chaan ti,
kdak chaiji ka am mpha thu buw mpihiil chaan ti, kukoi thu mvel chaan ti, rowng inn thu ka am mpha thung ki hin mthlen pik chaan tinu.’
Ava dilli rinkindit rekki Mhin karthawng ra, ‘Mukpu tden thung ngi neenni apoi ktham dei innu apmaal innu, mdit mata aning makraal thung ngi dii akipneek inda?
Ungta tden thu malpa ngi thleng tinu akowl chaannu mdit mata adak chai dei innu dona akipihiil chaak in da?
Ungta tden thung ngi akoi dei innu mdit mata rowng inn thung ngi a am dei innu akvel chaak inda?
Ungta Kruwng ngi mhin inni karthawng ra, ‘Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni ku u knao kdil sisi ado tlot in ava Nei kihinni ado tlot in kurthuwk.’
Ava dilli Mma lee ktong tha ku kong rek hin kthe ra, ‘Ki hinki kursown dok in, pauhur do buk rek naan, dijabowl leh mtamsii rek tummi mdo purchuwl dok kṭuw knai kma meiṭhuwm thu lut chaan;
Mleija Neiji kpoi mtham mpha thu naanni then mpii maan ti, kning makraal thu kdo neek ra dii mpii maan ti,
malpa kukurthut thu mkowl chmaan ti, kdak chaiji ka am mpha thu buw mpihiil maanti, ku koi ungta rowng inn thu ka am mpha thu mvel maan ti.’

Ava dilli mmaan rukku karthawng ra, ‘Mukpu tden thu apoi tham da mdit mata aning kraal da, mdit mata malpa ngi am ti ungta adak chaiji am ti mdit mata koi ti mdit mata rowng inn thu a am kdee chun inni sok alo chmaan ring da?’
Ava dilli Mma ngi mhin thaanni karthawng ra, ‘Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava le kdil sisi leen naanni ado tlot in ava Nei kihin ni ado tlot in.’
Ungta mmaanna kṭuw knai kma mraal pii lam donle kupsun lamra, pdainu rinkindit rek ava kṭuw knai kma rinkhu tha ksii lamra.”
Jisu ngi hava pau mdo the mkheng mupṭut dok le, msiikhu rek hin Mma ngi theda,
“Nii knii dil tha taplaanna ka am ra ava naanni ado dee in, ungta Mii Chapa ava khros leen mdo pthoi nraan kparlaan pthii ra.”
Ava dilli thiimpu kinreel rek leh mii rekki kver rekki Kaiphas tdit thiimpu kparthaang dulbukki kurkuk lamda,
ungta Jisua kupru lulu kjowng da mdo aeyo nraan karseel lamda.
Pdainu mmaanni theda, “Kmaal thung rang pme mleija mii rek ava ngi vawng klummi kut,lur lamra.”
Tunva Jisu ngi raaichii kthung Simon inn thu ma am daat arlaanni,
snu khatti reidii mman klu langlang mu uwm thung ngi sin da, Mhin arhang da, Mma ngi tebol be ngi mo kon daat arlaanni, mluw leen ptlong da.
Pdainu siikhu rekki ava mdee in thungta, muplung in pthit lamda, the lamda, “Talu leija hava mdo partlai kre da?
Mleija hava reidii ava sum knempokki jurda, ungu sra mii hinni mdo piik chaak kro.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava tuk mdo sut leiji mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji snu ava mning atpumul inna? Mleija mma ngi Nei kihin ni kṭha deek nong tlo im da.
Mleija sra rek ava mpha ktai thung ngi naanni ado kilṭhi ṭhi daat in, pdainu naan va Neia mpha ktai thung ngi mthloi tlit daat ni maan ti.
Nei kdaksaa leen mma ngi hava reidii mdo ptlon ava Nei kukulruwl nra mma ngi mdo purchuwl.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, dultipaam mkheng thu hava kṭha paumin mkaryaam mpha thu, hava mma nong tlot ava kbin paphaakki kthe lamra.”
Ava dilli Judas Iskariot tdit, sowm lei knii arlakki khat, mma ngi thiimpu kinreel rek hin chet da,
theda, “Mma ava neiji ahin thaanni kparlaan na nea naanva talu mpii naan di?” Ungbi mmaanni thiir sum som kdum mhin ni pii lamda.
Ungta mpha ava thungki ngi mdo parlaan pthii nrang ki mpha kcha mma ngi suw da.
Tunva thowl ktaak thenpen kmaal mnii khat na thok nitti, siikhu rekki Jisu hin arvang lamda Mhin the lamda, “Nang ngi taplaanna amaal chaak nrang nga neenva tva thu purchuwl nikaan da?”
Mma ngi theda, “Khuwpii thung ngi va in, ungu ksoi kma ra miilai khat hin atheen, ‘Chukpu, ngi theda, Neiki mpha ava knai tekka; nah inn thung ngi taplaanna ksiikhu rek tu dan chaanni.’ ”
Ungta Jisu do the pik lam heppi siikhu rekki tlo lamda, ungu mmaanni taplaanna purchuwl chlam da.
Ungu khuw mjiin rui rui thungta, Mma ngi siikhu rek sowm lei knii tu tebol hin ko ong lam da;
ungta mmaanni mmaal slii arlaan inni, Mma ngi theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan miilai khatti Neia mipthlei naan di.”
Ungu mmaanna kdung ngi muplung in ja chda, ungbi khat khatti Mhin, “Nei ngaal mo, Mukpu,” di lamda kthe pṭhun lamda.
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Neiji arkuw thung ngi kdo puhuwm ṭhi mma ngi mkipthlei ra.
Mii Chapa ava Mma mlei thu mdo kjit dok heppi kchet ra, pdainu Mii Chapa kipthlei mma ava msuwkthi! mii ava tuṭou ṭouvi mṭou mabi mma tumva kṭha rang nga.”
Mma kipthlei Judas ava ngi theda, “Chukpu, nei mo?” Mma ngi mhin theda, “Nah ado the ava.”
Tunva mmaanni mmaal arlaan inni, Jisu ngi thenpen louda, ungta phowl kṭha parlaan thida, khuida siikhu rek hin pii da, ungu theda, “Alou inra achaan; hava Nei kdaksaa.”
Ungta Mma ngi tong louda, mpanpaak dok diltha mhin inni pii da, theda, “Akheng inni aneen;
mleija hava paurina Neiki kihii, pnu rek mdo ptlot pik nra mii knempok tummi kdo pbuwk.
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan tu kilṭhi ngi Kpah Kruwngpaam tha ren ava kneek du khim khai hava rik rou thei dii Neiji nee purnowl nimaang.”
Ungta ava diltha mmaanni laa thee lamda kruwn lown tha hang lamda.

Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Snii ki jaan kat thung ngi Nei ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, naan akheng nga tluw chnaan di; mleija ava hanto kjit da, ‘Neiji Jao krung ava prei nik di, ungta Jao rek mkheng nga kinṭheu tir chlam ra.’
Pdainu Neiji krin kardel dok dil tha, naan adu inni Galil tha vang nik di.”
Pitor ri Mhin thethuw da, “Nah aleiji mmaan mkheng tluw chdaat lam joso, neia tluw ni maang.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, snii jaan kat thu harkhuwng ngi mkhuwn du ngi nang va vei kdum mmat na di.”
Ungbi Pitor ri Mhin theda, “Nah akdiyo ṭhi kma donle, neiji akmat tlo nimaang.” Ungta siikhu rek mkheng rukva anto the sap lamda.
Ungta ava dilli Jisu ngi mmun Gethsamani tdit ava thung ngi va ṭhi lamda, ungu Mma ngi siikhu rek hin theda, “Neiji va kursown da kṭhil chaak slii arlaan ni hava thung ngi am daat in.”
Ungta Mma ngi Pitor leh Jebedi chapa rek knii ṭhida, ava thung ngi kja lang lang leh plung kunchul pṭhun da.
Ava dilli Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kdiyou daat rang ngi kraothla ava kja kcha a; hava thu jiam inra mhai sut pṭoi ṭhi chaan.”

Ungta Mma ngi hai kursown bet thida, mmaiji ju kuwn da pukhuppi tardiil da ungu ṭhil chda, “Apah, mkurthut de rang ta hava tong ki hinki ava mhailo pik cha; joso Nei kdo ngei rang pme, pdainu Nah aplung bin daat ra.”
Ungu Mma ngi msiikhu rek hin marvan thungta ki iip daatti pha lamda; ungbi Mma ngi Pitor hin theda, “Nangva ṭhang khat pang daat rukka msut pṭoi ṭhi pchaang mti mo?
Kepthleem thu atlaak ma nraan asut pṭoi inra aṭhil chaan; pthla va mtlot nuwm ma pdainu daksaa va ksowlla.”
Ungta vei khat nowlli mvei knit na ngi va da ṭhil chda, “Apah, Neiji kdo neek ma kro kma mkurthut cheen tung ngi mhailo pthii pik ma, Nah aplung bin daat so.”
Ungta Mma ngi marvan nowl thungta ki iip daatti pha nowl lamda, mleija mmik inna kdung reenni rik da.
Ava leiji Mma ngi ma pthii nowl lam thida, kṭhil chra mvei kdumna vada, mdo the ksa pauna rek anto jikki the nowl da,
Ava dilli Mma ngi siikhu rek hin arvang da theda, “Naanni iip tlit daat inti karnga in pti mo? Asuwn, Mii Chapa ava pnu kirvei rek khut thung ngi mdo parlaan pthii nrang ki ṭhang ava knaija.
Ekardel in; vang in che; asuwn Nei mkipthlei ava knaija.”

Ungta Mma ngi mpau slii daat arlaanni, sowm lei knii arlakki Judas ava ngi kurtuwl mii rek klin lang lang ngi ṭhida, kaang ksaang rek leh kchung rek sin lamda, thiimpu kinreel rek leh mii rekki kver rek hin ki arva lamda.
Tunva kipthlei ava ngi titinna khat pii lamda, theda, “Nei kdo put ra Miilai khat ava ra; Mma akjowng chaan.”
Ungta mma ngi Jisu hin arhang da theda, “Kdaai kurthuwk so, Chukpu!” Ungu mma ngi put da.
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Cham, talu leiji hava thu kthleng pti da?” Ava dilli mmaanni arhang lamda, mkhut inni Jisua kjowng lamda.
Ungta asuwn, Jisu doṭhi rek thung ki khatti mkaang ksaang mklee thungta, thiimpu kparthaang suwk khat knaa sel buk da.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Akaang ksaang nga ma am na thu athii pinle dok; mleija kaang ksaang ksin mii mkheng nga mkaang sin inni kmaang tir chlam ra.
Kpah hin Neiji kthe bi Mma ngi sowm lei knii kheel dekki waan tamsii rek mpunpa msii pik pchaang nime kdingi naanni abin inna?
Pdainu anto mkurthuttu tak heppi Laaika rek ava kurkhum rang da?”

Ṭhang ava kat thu Jisu ngi kurtuwl mii rek hin theda, “Naanni kup pru mraal kpii heppi, kaang ksaang leh kchung rek sin in ti, Nei mikṭhi ra kthleng in pti mo? Luwbuk Inn thu mnii ktai Neiji ku ong nu kpurchu mpha thu naanni mukjowng maan ti.
Pdaiinu hava le mkheng nga khulpu rek Laaika rek mkurkhum nrang lei kthuwk.” Ava dilli siikhu rek mkheng inni mada chen chtir lamda.
Ungta ava dilli kukjowng rek va Jisua Nowlam chukpu rek leh kver rek kurku na Keiphas tdit thiimpu kparthaang hinni ṭhi lamda.
Pdainu lam karlat haiji Pitor va mdil ṭoida, ungta thiimpu kparthaang dulbuk kpha dekki ṭoi da, mthu lut da mṭut na kdei rang ngi karseel rek tu ko ong sap lamda.
Tunva mmaanni mdo eayo nraan thiimpu kinreel rek leh karseel lop mkheng ngi Jisu mraal kpii ngi rinpaumin kindit kma the psuk lamda,
pdainu kindit kma sakhi rek knempok thleng daat joso mmaan ni khat lee pre pha lamme. Mṭut na rel tha miilai knii rekki mdu suk inni arhang lamda
the lamda, ‘Hava Miilaiva theda, Isowr luwbuk Inn ava ea krep thi nik don nii kdum daat thung ngi sa nik di,’ dida Mma ngi mthe.
Ungta thiimpu kparthaang ngi rip da theda, “Ado arthaan ra ame mo? Hava mii rekki mraal akpii ngi sakhi rek mdo piik inna talu lei da?”
Pdainu Jisua rim kdi am chda. Ungta thiimpu kparthaang ngi Mhin theda, “Kring Isowr kthamnu neiji Nah hin kthea, Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta mhai the pik chaan.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nah do the ava Ping. Pdainu Neiji ahin kthea, hava dil tha Mii Chapa ava ngi ruktang chang ktong tha ku ongda, ungu parwaan ki armei rek tu kurjung nang ngi dei nadi.”

Ava dilli thiimpu kparthaang ngi mphrik kturrown ri jen thida theda, “Mma ngi Isowr kjowm kcha ngi kpauva, talu leiji nenni sakhi murson ta thlaam raan da? Tunva Isowr kjowm kcha ngi mpau naanni aryaak sap inna.
Naanva talu heppi akṭewl inna?” Mmaanni arthawng lamda, “Mma ngi mdiyo ra ava kngei inna.”
Ava dilli mmaanni Mmai leen ptil kballi pthot lamda, ungu prei lamda; ungta mii angṭhe va tpeeng lamda,
the lamda, “Mhai purphuwn pik chaan, Khrista Nang ngi! Nah akipreija ku?”
Tunva Pitor ra duwnki dulbukki ku ong daat da. Ungbi sra owr nala khatti arva da theda, “Nang rukka Galil ki Jisu dil kṭoi pti.”
Pdainu mkheng in maiṭhuwm mi mma ngi mat da theda, “Nang do the ava talu tdit neiji dei maang.”
Ungta mma ngi dulbuk tha mvan thungta, sra owr snu khat nowlli deida, ungbi mbe ngi krip daat rek hin theda, “Hava miilai ava Nasareth ki Jisu tu kilṭhi.”
Veikhat nowlli mma ngi pau ktham da mat da, “Neiji hava Miilai ava dei chliit maang.”
Ma am bong le mbe ngi krip daat rekki Pitor hin arvang lamda the lamda, “Ksoi liit kma nang rukka mmaan arlakki khat pti, mleija akurthlon akurbowlli rome.”
Ava dilli mma ngi mdaksaa pauhur kurbuk da ktham da kthe pṭhunda, “Hava Miilai ja neiji dei chliit maang.” Ungbi tun kat daatti harkhuwng ngi khuwngda.
Ungta Pitor ri Jisu do the ava bin phaak da, “Harkhuwng ngi mkhuwn du ngi nang va vei kdum mmat na di.” Ungu mma ngi duwn tha van thuwk da mning ksiinni ṭap chda.
Ungta Jiingsun mpha mvee thungta, thiimpu kinreel rek leh mii rekki kver rek mkheng ngi Jisu mdo eayo nraan mraal pii lamda karseel lamda;
Ungu mmaanni ktu lam thida, paam kpupa Pilat hin parlaan lamda.
Ungta Mma kipthlei Judas ava ngi mraal ka am mkirdee thungta, mma ngi plung ren hur da ungu thiir sum som kdum ava thiimpu kinreel rek hin arhai sin pinle da,
the da, “Neiji mraal ktaak hii kdo pthlei leiji pnu ktla im ping.” Ungu mmaanni theda, “Ava neen kleennu talu ksi rang da? Athi na ngi kursuw cha.”
Ungta mma ngi thiir sum ava luwbuk Inn thu var pthii thida sun chda; ungu mthi na ngi kurhuwk you da.
Pdainu thiimpu kinreel rekki thiir sum ava lou lam thida, the lamda, havalea hii man mkurthut leiji, sumbuwr thu tithiik ka Nowlam do rot ava pme.”
Ava leiji mmaanni karseel lam thida, mal rek mdo alruwl nraan, bil khat ren nlamda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da bil ava snii kpha thung ngi hii bil mdo dit.
Ava dilli khulpu Jeremia ngi mdo the dok ava kurkhum da, mma ngi theda, “Ungta Isreel chapa rekki mdo thiik Mma man thiir sum som kdum ava lou lamda,
Ungu Mukpu ngi nei kihin mdo tithe pik lulu ngi mmaanni uwm bil tummi pii lamda.”
Tunva Jisu ngi paam kpupa maiṭhuwm mi rip da, ungu paam kpupa ngi Mhin pau khewl da, “Nah Jehudia rek Kruwng pti mo?” Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Nah ado the ava Ping.”
Pdainu thiimpu kinreel rek leh kver rekki mraal mpiik thungva Mma ngi arthawng sii me.
Ava dilli Pilat ti Mhin theda, “Nah mraal akpii ngi mmaanni sakhi knempok mdo piik in ava aryaa mti mo?”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni pau khat lee arthawng me, ungu mraal mdo piik in khdaat ruk arthawng me; ava leiji paam kpupa ava kdung ngi ngak chda.
Tunva paam kpupa va kurtuwl mii rek tummi mmaan do ngei miilai khat rowng inn thung ki mdo pthuw kcholu.
Ungta mii mkheng do dee dok Barabas ava rowng inn thu ka am daat kurthuwk da.
Ava leiji mmaanni mkurku in mpha thu, Pilat ti mhin inni theda, “Naan atum raan ni neiji ku kdo pthuw ra angei inna, Barabas rang mo, Khrista mdo dit Jisu rang?”
Mleija mkheithe inni Mma ava mdo parlaan in tdit mma ngi deida.

Ava daat kma, mma do kṭewl na longkhom leen mku on daat arlaanni, mnumeiji mhin pau hai pthla da, “Rinkindit Miilai ava hin nang ngi do khat lee ado tlot ro nime, mleija Mma tummi nea jaanklu kmer ri kdung kja cha ping.”
Tunva thiimpu kinreel rek leh kver rekki Barabas ṭhil lamda ungu Jisu mdo aeyo nraan mii rek ksop lamda.
Ungta paam kpupa ngi veikhat the nowl da, “Naan atum ra hava miilai knii thung ki ku kdo pthuw ra angei inna?” Ungbi mmaanni theda, “Barabas ra.”
Ungbi Pilat ti mhin inni theda, “Ava mkurthuttu Khrista mdo dit Jisua neiva talu purlo nik di?” Mkheng inni the lamda, “Mma ava khros leen apthoi pthii.”
Ungbi mma ngi theda, “Mma va talu kṭha kma mtlot da?” Pdainu mmaanni kheel set setti owng lamda, “Mma ava khros leen apthoi pthii.”

Ava leiji do khat lee sii me, pdainu kutlur mupṭhunna tdit Pilat ti mdee thungta, kurtuwl mii rek maiṭhuwm mi dii louda mkhut alṭhu thida, theda, “Hava Miilai hii ava nea dei chmaang, adaksaa inni kursuw chaan.”
Ungta mii rek mkheng ngi mhin arthawng da, “Mma hii ava neen kleen ungu knaole leenni jiam chaso!”
Ava dilli mma ngi Barabas pthuw pik lamda, ungu Jisua khros leen mdo pthoi nraan parlaan pthii da.
Ungta ava dilli paam kpupa ava rawlmii rekki Jisua lusang inn thu ṭhi lamda, ungu rawlmii lop mkheng ava Mma maiṭhuwm mi kurkuk lamda.
Ungu mmaanni mbuw khowk pthii lam thida kning ngi ksen buw pihiil lamda,

ungta mmaanni tirliing her lamda, mluw leen pkhum lamda, ungu mchang ktongki mkhut leen kchung khat psin lamda. Ungta Mmaiṭhuwm mi pkhup pi tardiil lamda pnii chaak da, the lamda, “Jehudia rek Kruwng roi ksotti ering cha!”
Ungta mmaanni ptil kbailli pthot lamda, ungu mkhut leen ki kchung mmaanni lou lamda mluw tha prei chlam da.
Ungta mmaanni mipnii chaak dok dil inni, kuknotti mbuw khowk pthii lamda, mdaksaa ki buw pihiil lamda, ungta khros leen mdo pthoi nraan hanṭhi lamda.
Mmaanni hanto mhai kurlo in thungta, Syrini ki mmiing Simon tdit miilai khat kurdut ṭhi lamda; hava mma hin khros mdo kdom Ṭhi nra pnam psuk lamda.
Ungu Golgotha mdo dit mun khat mmaanni mhai phaak in thungta, (mlei ava luw ru kdimna mun)
mmaanni kakhaa lang lang do khat ju tu purchuwm lamda Mhin pii lamda; pdainu Mma ngi mpartem thungta nee nuwm me.
Ungta mmaanni khros leen pthoi lamda, ungu mdo mna ava pchel piik sut nlamda marlak inni them lamda;
ava dilli ava tha ku ong lamda mmaanni sut pṭoi lamda.
Ungta mluw thip leenni Mma raal kpii ngi hanto tpat khat thii lamda, “Hava Jehudia rek Kruwng Jisu.”
Ungta kupru rek knii rukka Mma tu khros leen khatti mchang ktong tha khatti mlee ktong tha pthoi kthen lamda.
Ungta mbe ngi kurlon mii rekki mluw in hai lamda, ning er plo psuk lamda,
the lamda, “Luwbuk Inn ea krep thida nii kdum daat thung ngi ksa rang lo, kartlan cha! Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta, khros leen ki arjung ṭumlo.”
Anto hep daatti thiimpu kinreel rek ungu Nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rekki Mma ava pnii chaak lamda, the lamda,
“Mii murson na ktlan pik thida; mdaksaa ava kartlan pchaangme. Mma Isreel rek Kruwng; tun tunni Mma ngi khros leenki murjun ṭumbi,nenni trin chaak raan.
Mma ngi Isowr mdo rin chaak; Mma ava Isowrri mbin pikta tun tunni Mma ngi aktlan pik chaso; mleija, ‘Neia Isowr Chapa ping,’ dida Mma ngi mdo the.”
Ungta Mma tu khros leen mdo pthoi kthen kupru rek rukva anto lulu ngi the psuk lamda.
Ungta tunva ṭhang truk thungki ngi ṭhang tku kpha dekki mpaam mkheng nga pum jiing ngi jiing chda.
Ungta ṭhang tku arveelli Jisu ngi krowl kparyaa ngi owng da, “Eli, Eli, lama sabathani?” Mlei ava, “Neiki Isowr, Neiki Isowr, talu lei Neia atmaak pthiia?”
Ungbi mbe ngi krip daat rek mii angṭhe ngi aryaa da the lamda, “Hava Miilai va Elijah mo ownna.”
Ungta mmaan thungki khatti va chen tengda buwphown louda, ju kdor thu puhuwm thida, kchung leen daar da, mdo neek ra han piida.
Pdainu murson rekki theda, “Arda khot, Elijah ngi arjung ṭumda kaktlan sik rangmo suw lap in che.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mvei knit na krowl kparyaa ngi owng thida mṭut na ki tdaal ṭen chda.
Ungta asuw in, luwbuk Inn thungki buwkhaar ava karthak ki ngi kurdu kpha dekki karjen chda; ungu dulti kunchun da, ungta lung kui da;
thlaan rek ruk kparvang da, kintiing mii rek kdiyou dok knempok ava ring kardelda;
ungta thlaan rek thungki kthuwk mii rek ava Mma ngi mrin karheel diltha,kchiir khuwpii tha mmaanni hang lamda, mii knempok hin ktardet lamda.

Ungta rawlmii ki klin leh mma miiṭhi rekki, Jisua msut pṭoi in thungta, kthuwk nong ava leh ringnaang kthuwk ava dei lamda, ungbi mmaanna kdung reenni ngak chlam da, ungu the lamda, “Kinditti, hava Miilai ja Isowr Chapa kat thide!”
Ungta ava thung ngi Galil ki ngi Jisu dil ṭoida Mhin sok klo cha, snu rek knempok ruk va, leer khatti sut pṭoi chlam da;
mmaan arlakki ava Magdaleni Mery, Jeems leh Joseph nuh Mery, ungta Jebedi chapa rek nuh am lamda.
Ungu khuw mjiin thungta, Arimathia ki mmiing Joseph tdit suwang pa khat ungu siikhu khat kurthuwk, mma ava arhang da.
Mma ngi Pilat hin vada, Jisu kluwng nga ṭhil chda. Ava dilli Pilat ti mma hin mdo piik nlamra pau pṭum da.
Ungta Joseph pi mukluwng ava louda, ktarnaal dang ngi kartleu deek plaa buw khat louda,
ungta mma mdaksaa thlaan ra lung kreu da mdo vu ren dang ava thung ngi alruwl chda; ungta thlaan thurngot ava lung klin khatti arkam thida sunda.
Ungta Magdaleni Mery leh Mery murson rek va thlaan tarngai lamda ava thu ku ong daat lamda.
Mupduk nii ditta mdo purchuwl naan ava dil tha, thiimpu kinreel rek leh pharisi rekki, Pilat maiṭhuwm mi kurkuk lamda
ungu the lamda, “Ocha, leinei pa ngi mrin daat mpha thu, ‘Nii kdum dil tha Neiji ring kardel nowl nik di,’ dida mdo the ava neenni bi phaak innu.

Ava leiji, nii kdum mvee dok du khim khai thlaan ava mdo seel psuk lam nra pau apṭum, anto mkurthut mabi, msiikhu rekki va da pru dok lam thi donle, ‘Mma ava kdiyou dok thungki kring kardella,’ di lam don mii rek hin ksong lamra, ungu ru kri ki hinva mṭut na thang ki ngi kheel sii ra.”
Pilat ti mhin inni theda, “Naanni kseel rangki rawlmii rek aṭhiin ra; vaan, ado pchaan ja inni aseel psuk chaan.”
Ava leiji mmaanni va lamda, thlaan ava kbii nam lamda klu ngi rung lamda.
Tunva sabath nit dil tha, hapta ki mnii khat na thokki khuw mutmul daat arlaanni, Magdaleni Mery leh Mery murson rekki thlaan ksuw ra chet lamda.
Ungta asuwn, ava thu ringnaang klin lang lang khat thuwk da; mleija parwaan ki Mukpu waan tamsii arjung ṭumda, ungu lung phel ava purlup pthiida, thida mleen ko ong da.
Mrungchen ava kowl kiplek hep daat kurthuwk da, ungu mdo mna ava tbuwr heppi powl da.
Ungta thlaan krung mii rekva Mma mdo ṭit reen lei inni kunchun lamda kdiyou rek lulu ngi am chlam da.
Pdainu waan tamsii ngi snu rek hin theda, “Naanni ṭi maan; mleija Neiji kdea, khros leen mdo pthoi in Jisu ava kthlaam in pti.
Mma ava hava thu ame; mleija Mma ngi mdo the dok heppi, kring kardel dok kcha. Arvang in, Mma iina mun ava asuwn.

Ungta kbeiji vang inra, msiikhu rek hinni, Mma ava kdiyou thungki kring kardel dokka, adi inra ason pik chaan, ungu asuwn, Mma ava naan adu inni Galil tha kvang nga; asuwn, Neiji akthe pik dok inna, ava tha naanni Mma ava dei chnaan di.”
Ava leiji mmaanni thlaan thungki mṭit in leh kheel sii ki mkanpat inni kuknotti sun lamda, ungu msiikhu rek hin ksong rangki chen lamda.
Ungta asuwn, Jisu ngi kurdut ṭhi lamda mhin inni theda, “Kdaaiji aju ṭhi chaan so!” Ungu mmaanni hangkal lamda mkhu kjowng lam da, Mma ava luwbuk chlam da.
Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Ṭi maan; ku u knao rek ava ngi Galil tha mvan nraan, vang inra, pau ason pik chaan; ava tha mmaanni mikdei ro lamra.”
Ungta mmaanni hanto mvan slii arlaan inni, asuwn, kseel rek mii angṭhe ngi khuwpii tha vang lamda, kthuwk nong mkheng ava thiimpu kinreel rek hin song lamda.
Ungta mmaanni kver rek tu kurdu lamda karseel lamda, rawlmii rek hin sum pii lamda,
ungta the lamda, “‘Neenni ki ii chaak dok arlaanni, jaanni msiikhu rek thleng lamda pru dok lamda,’ adiinra mii rek hin asong in.
Ungta hava ava paam kpupa knaa mthlun bi, naanni plung ado pjat ma nraan, neenni mning pthlung chdaat ni kaan di.”
Ungta mmaanni sum ava lou lamda, mmaan doparseel heppi tlo lamda; ungu hava paumin ava Jehudia rek arlakki snii kpha thung ngi kurjou da.
Ungta tunva siikhu rek sowm lei khat ava Galil tha vang lamda, Jisu do the pik lown ava tha hang lamda.
Ungta mmaanni mdee in thungta luwbuk chlam da, pdainu mii angṭheva plung kinṭhekki bin lamda.
Ungu Jisu ngi arvang da mhin inni theda, “Parwaan ki leh dultipaam thungki rutan mkheng ava Nei kihin ni mitpiik dok.
Ava leiji chati rek mkheng thung ngi chet inra, siikhu rek aseem in, ungta Mpah, Mchapa, ungu Pthla Kchiir miing ngi baptis aptlot in,
ungu Neiji naan hin pau kdo reen mkheng ava mdo dan nraan apurchuk in; ungta asuwn, kum ṭut du khim khai, Neiji mpha ktai thu aṭhi nikaan di.”
Hava Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista ki kṭha paumin mdo pṭhunna.
Khulpu Isaijah thung ngi mdo kjit lulu, “Asuw in, lam akardit pik raan amaiṭhuwm inni Neiji ktamsii kap pthlatta,
miilai khat krowlli kbowk laiji owngda, “Mukpu lamṭoi ra ardit pik, mkhu ther arjit pik chaan.”
Baptis kup ptlot Johon ava kbowklaiji kandang da, plung panle da baptis ktlo ungu pnu rek kup ptlot pik mlei thung ngi paryaam da.
Ungta Judia paam mkheeng thung ki ungu Jerusalem thung ki mii mkheeng Mhin thlengda. Mmaanni mupnu ton in mdo the thut intu kilṭhi ngi Jordon kreng thu Johonni baptis ptlot lamda.
Tunva Johon na ut mulli turkhown downa hiil naada, murkowl saavun sulpaar kparyeel da, khaopruwn leh nowm pkhui dii chaa nee da.
Ungta mma ngi mii rek hin hanto purchuk da theda, “Nei kdil ṭoida karvang miilai ava nei kihinva kdung ngi kunlor lang lang. Neia jukuwn da mkhu kok rii kparthlee pik rang ruk kurhui chmaang.
Neiva dii tu kurthloppi baptis akup ptlot in, pdainu Mma va pthla kchiir ri baptis akup ptlot raan.”
Ava arveel lik thu Jisu ngi Galil ki Nasaret thungki thleng da Jordon kreng thu Johon ni baptis ptlot da.
Mma ngi dii thungki marhan thuw thungta, tunkat daatti parwaan kparvangda, pthla ngi Uṭhuw heppi mleen ni arjung kṭum deida.
Ungta parwaan ki krowl khatti theeda, “Nang nga kwonsat lo kchapa pti, ahinni kdung kning ktlung nga.”
Ungta tunkat daatti pthla ngi kbowklai ji haisi da.
Ungta Mma ava kbowklaiji nii sompli amda, seitaanni pthleem da, nowm saa rek tu amda, Mhin waantamsii ngi sok lo chda.
Tunva Johon muk kjown dok dil thaan ni, Jisua Galil paam tha arvang da, Isowr ki kṭha paumin paryaam da.
Hanto theda, “Mpha kcha karvang nga, Isowr Kruwngpaam lamknai ja, plung apinle inra kṭha paumin arin chaan.”
Ungta Jisu ngi Galil truwn biing ngi mhai kurlon thungta, kchakki tuwlva deengda kuk jowng slii, Simon leh mnaopa Andrija deida, ditta mmaanna tuwlva kuk kjowng mii rek lam.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei kdil aṭoi chaan, Neiji mii kuk jowng apurthuw chnikaan di.”
Ungta mmaanni kuk not katti mak kchak rek in ma pthi lam thida Mma dil ṭoi chlamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mhai kursown set thungta Jebidi chapa rek Jeems leh mnaopa Johon ni arkuwng tunni makkchak rek in ktuphut meek slii hai deida.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mdee lam thungta own teng lamda; ungu mmaanni mpah in ava msra owr rek tu arkuwng tun ma lam thida Jisu dil ṭoi chlamda.
Ungta Jisu leh msiikhu rekka Kaparnahum tha arvang lamda, ungu mup pduk nii ngi sabath mvee thungta Jisu ngi synagog thu lut da purchuk da.
Ungta Mma do purchu karyaa mii rek ava kdung ngi ngak chlamda, mleija Mma ava Nowlam chukpu ruk kurthuwk kmapa ngi mrutan khat pummi purchuk da.
Ungta tun kat daatti pthla kṭha kma doṭhi miilai khatti synagog thung ngi keu da ṭapda.
“Nasaret ki Jisu neenna tak mhai pirdit chnaandi? Neen mke ae krep raan kthleng pti mo? Nah ku pti tdit neiji kdee chaak, Isowr hinki kchiir khat ava pti.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mma raida, “Rim kdi am, mma thung ki arvang thuwk dok,” dida theda.
Ungu pthla ktobor ava ngi miilai ava kdung tnok da pu owng thida mthungki arvang thuwk da.
Ungta kdei daat mii rek mkheng nga ngak chlamda, ava leiji msingreel inni karkhewl lamda, “Hava talu lu da? pauren kpurchuk mo? pthla ktobor rek hin rutan pummi pau mreenna mup pṭoi daat inna.”
Ungu tun kat daatti Jisu mlei thung ngi pauren ava Galil paamkowl kteen thung ngi kurjou da.
Ungu kbeiji Mma ngi synagog ma thida Simon leh Andrija inn tha Jeems leh Johon ṭhida valut da.
Ungta Simon kternu riiphaakki koida ki iip daat ava mii rekki Mhin son pik tengda.
Ungbi Mma ngi thlengda mkhut kjowng da tip prip da ungbi mriiphaak ava dam chda, mma ngi mhin inni sok lo pik chlamda.
Kniw jungtla da khuw mjiin rui rui thungta ava nitti mii rekki kukoi rek leh tarnam doṭhi rek mkheng Jisu hin ṭhi paphaak lamda.
Ungu khuwpii ava thungki mii mkheng nga thurngot bul kurtlun dekki thuwk kurtuwl lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi msik msik omlaiji kukoi mii rek ava pdamda, tarnam lut da ram mdo tparvee rek ruk rei pthii pik lamda, Mma ava ku tdit tarnam rekki mdo dee lei inni kpau ava pchaang lamme.
Ungta mup pduk nii jiingsun kpanma ngi Mma ngi kardel da mmun ktliing khat thu chet da, ava thung ngi ṭhil chda.
Ungbi Simon leh mmiiṭhii rekki thlaam da,
ungu mmaanni mphaak khot in thungta, “Mii mkheng ngi Nah ata thlaamma,” kdi ngi Mhin the pik lamda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Hava marveel ki khuw murson rek thung ngi va nowl in che, mmaan hin rukku paumin paryaam chni, mleija Neia ava ki tummi kthleng ping.”
Ungta Mma ngi Galil paam mkheng thung leh synagog rek thung ngi chet tlowng da paumin paryaam da, tarnam rek ruk rei pthii da.
Ungta raaichii kirvei miilai khatti Jisu hin va da tpee da mhin mdo pdam pik chaak nra ktham chda, theda, “Nang ngi at trot pik cheen tung ngi mhai partleu cha.”
Jisu ngi msut rim thungta wonsat lo da, mkhut ṭen arjii da makmei chunni mhin arthawngda, “Neiva krotta kartleu cha.”
Ungbi tun kat daatti mraaichii tleida kartleuda dam chda.
Ungta Mma ngi klu katti parseel thida kuk notti psunda.

Ava dilli mhin theda, “Asuw ku mii khat lee hin hava mlei song ma. Pdainu thiimpu hin setleng ngi chet ra mma ngi aju suw so; ava dilli mii rek hin kdam cha ping tdit ado tdet na ngi, Mousi paureen dil kṭoiji tlaai adown cha.”

Pdainu mma ngi vangsun da hava pau mlei thung ngi kantekki kpau pṭhun da, pau ren rek ava marden kteen thung ngi purjouda. Mma pauson ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, khuwpaam ava thu Jisua kurphuwng ngi lut chip pchaang kurnowlme. Mma ngi khuw duwn tha ma am daat thungta, mmun ktai ki mii rek Mhin thlengda.
Ungta Mma ngi nii khuw mruk makcheen diltha, Kaparnahum paam tha mvan kinlet thungta, Mma ava inn tha ka am daatta kdi ki pau kurjou da.
Ungbi mii rek knem pok mthuw kurtuwl leiji inn thung nga mmun ksang khat lee ame, thurngot bul kurtlun dekki ku ong lamda, ava thu Jisu ngi mhin inni pauna paryaam da.
Ungbi Jisu kpaphaak ra kyeng miilai khat pselpa miilai plii ngi kdom da thleng lam da.
Pdainu mii mkarkee reen leiji kukoi ava Jisu hin pnai pchaang lamme, ava leiji Jisu am ndaat kartin ki inn mthlun puhup lamda, kukoi miilai ava mi iina tu ju ptla lamda.
Ungu mmaan do rin chaak ava Jisu ngi mdee thungta kyeng miilai ava hin Jisu ngi theda, “Kchapa nah apnu ton rekka akup ptlot pik dokka.”
Ungbi Nowlam chukpu rek angṭhe kukong daat rekki plung kpur ri hanto karbin lamda.
“Talu ki da Mma ngi han tolu mpau va? Mma va Isowr kjowm cha ngi pau memo? Isowr kma donle ku mii khat lee ngi pnu kup ptlot pik pchaang me.”
Ungta mmaanni plung kpur ri mdo bin in ava Jisu ngi dei teng da, ava leiji Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji naan va plung kpur ri abin inna?
Kyeng mii ava hin tithe ra mko ol sii ava, ‘Apnu tonna akup ptlot pikka dida tithe rang mo kardel ra akpher achom ra chet’ dida tithe rang?
Pdainu Mii Chapa ngi dultipaam thu pnu rek mdo ptlot pik na ki rutan mthloija tdit naan dodee nra, Jisu ngi kyeng ava hin theda,
“Neiji ahin kthea, kardel ra ak pher achom ra a inn tha vang,”

ungbi mii mkheng maiṭhuwm mi msut pṭoi daat arlaan inni mma ngi kardel da mak kpher chom daat da kuk notti vangda, ungbi mii plung mkheng nga ngak chda, Isowr ava hanto punlor chlamda, “Hava lua neenni dei chliit mlai in ring,” di lamda.
Jisu ngi Galil duwm biing ngi veikhat mhai nowl thungta, mii knempok kthuwk kurtuwlli klop dok da, ungbi mhin inni Mma ngi purchuk da.
Ungu Mma ngi hanto mhai kurlon thungta khasna klou rek inn thung ngi Alphias chapa Levi kuk ong daat deida, “Nei kdil aṭoi cha,” dida Jisu ngi mthe thungta rip daat da mdil ṭoi chda.
Ungta Jisu leh msiikhu rekka Levi inn thung ngi kmaal ra tebol hin khasna kṭhai rek leh pnu kirvei rek tu ko ong da, mleija Mma dil kṭoi mii rekka nem pok da.

Ungu Jisu ngi khasna kṭhai rek leh pnu kirvei rek tu mmaal meek in ava Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rekki mdee in thungta, mmaanni siikhu rek hin khewl lamda, “Talu leiji Jisu va mmaan mdo maal ṭhi lamda?”

Ungbi mmaan dokhewl ava Jisu ngi aryaa da, ungu mhin inni theda, “Kchun kdam mii va kdim kriing me, pdainu kukoi rek daat,Neia rinkindit rek ko own kurjung pmaang pdainu pnu kirvei rek ku own kurjung ping.”

Tunva baptis kup ptlot Johon siikhu rek leh Pharisi rek siikhu rek va then ngowl kchok lamda, ava leiji mii angṭhe ngi Jisu hin thleng lam da pau khewl lamda, “Talu leiji baptis kup ptlot Johon siikhu rek leh Pharisi siikhu rek va then ngowl lam thida, Nah asiikhu rek va then ngowl lam me da?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kphalpa mdak ma am daat arlaannu mmal rek va then kngowl kro mo? Kphalpa mdak ma am khim khai thu tden thung preva mmaanni then ngowl lam nime.
Mmaan hinki kphalpa mdo sun ṭhi dok nrang ki nit rek karvang ra, ava nit thung ro ngi mmaanni kngowl lamra.
Ku mii khat lee ngi buw laak ren louvi buw pliw tun kleng lot nime, mma ngi ava mtlot bi buw pliw ava buw laak ren ava ngi jen donle kheel sii ngi kik ṭet ra.
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi rik rou dii ren ava saavun khao pliw thu daal nime, mma ngi mdaal tpombi saiphok donle kukui chra, ava kchang nga rik rou dii ren ava saavun khao ren khat thu mdo daal ra.”
Sabath nit nii khatti Jisu ngi kehu bil thu kurlon da. Msiikhu rek tu hanto mche arlaan inni, msiikhu rek va kehu paar kip pjiit pṭhun lamda.
Ungbi Pharisi rekki Jisu hin the lamda, “Asuw, talu leiji asiikhu rek va sabath nitti Nowlam do rot ma nong mtlot inna?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Devid ti then mchaak nuwm mpha thu mdo tlot ava naanva pa maan timo? Mmiiṭhi rek leh mdak poi mtham mpha thu,

tak heppi Isowr Inn thu lut da,Abiather ri thiimpu kinreel mtlot mpha thung ngi, Isowr hin thenpen mdo down dok ava mdo chaak. Nowlam dothe dil kṭoiva ava thiimpu daatti mdo chaak ra, pdainu Devid va chaa thida mmiiṭhi rek ruk pii memo?”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Sabath nit ava mii tum ra mdo pa am, sabath tumra mii mdo pa am pme.
Ava leiji Mii Chapa ava sabath nit rekki Mukpu ruk kurthuwk.”
Ungu Jisu ngi synagog thu mlu nowl thungta mkhut kseek miilai khat am daat da.
Ungbi sabath nitti Jisu ngi map pdam luwngta tuk kjown raan kdi ngi tup prutti mmaanni sut pṭoi lamda.
Kseek miilai ava hin Jisu ngi theda, “Hava tha arvang.”

Ava dilli Mma ngi mii rek hin theda, “Sabath nitti nenki Nowlam va tatlot ra nong mdo rot talu ka am da? Kṭha ktlo rang ki mo sul kpurnul rang ki da? Mii rinkhu kek ktlan rang ki mo ke eayou rang ki da?” Pdainu mmaanni rim kdi am lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi plung kthii ngi msut bong lam dilli, muplung in kap pchai reen ava mdee thungta plung pkham psuk lamda, thida mii ava hin theda, “Akhut arjii,” ungu mma ngi mkhut marjit thungta mkhut ava dam chda.
Ava leiji Pharisi rekki thuwk teng lamda, tak heppi Mma ava ti ea kre rang kdingi Herod mii rek tu Mma raal kpii ngi karseel psuk lamda.
Jisu leh msiikhu rekka duwm biing ngi vang kunsun lamda, ungbi Galil paam ki leh Judia paamki mii knem pokki mdil ṭoida.
Ungta Jerusalem paam, Edomia arveel ki, Tyr leh Sidon khuwpii arveel ki, ungu Jordon paam kniw thuwna ktong ki rekki Jisu nong tlot aryaa lamda Mhin thleng lamda.
Ungta mii rek do duwl ma nra msiikhu rekki arkuwng khat mdo purthlon nraan Mma ngi theda,
mleija mii knem pok Mma ngi mdo pdam leiji omlai kirvei rek mkheng ngi mdak mdo thown chaak nraan lei Mhin knaira nam kurduwl lamda.
Ungta pthla ktobor rekki Mma mdee in mpha thu mdu sukki kurthluwn lamda, “Nah Isowr Chapa pti,” kdingi owng lamda.
Ungta ku mii khat lee hin mdo pandan ma nraan Jisu ngi mhin inni kparsa katti pau pṭum da.
Ungta Jisu ngi lown tha hangkal thida mdo ngei rek ava Mhin own lamda. Ungbi mmaanni Mhin hang lamda.
Mma doṭhi ra ungu paumin kparyaam mdo sii ra sowmlei knii ava Mma ngi kchol lamda.
Tarnam mdo rei pthii pchaan nraan ki rutan ruk pii lamda:
Mma ngi Simon dida mmiing mdo thowl Pitor;
Jebidi chapa rek Jeems leh mnaopa Johon (mmiing inna Benarji ditta pṭeek kpuwk chapa rek dida Jisu va mdo thowl)
Andrija, Philip, Bartholomio, Mathi, Thomas, Alphias chapa Jeems, Thadius, Kenan ki Simon,
ungu Mma kip pthlei Iskariot ki Judas hava lim kchol lam da, ava dilli mi inn tha vang da.
Ungta mii rek thuwk kurtuwl pok nowl da ava leiji kmaal pchaang chlamme.
Mma ava mong kuk kto kcha a dida mii rek ki mdo the mphungka rekki aryaa lamda, mdo pdown nraan Mhin va lamda.
Ungta Jerusalem ki kurjung Nowlam chukpu rek angṭhe ngi Mhin the lamda, “Mma ava Belyebul marvee chaakka, ungu tarnam kruwng chapa rutan piikki tarnam rek mrei pthii pchaanna.”
Ungbi Mma ngi Mhin own lam thida paupurtolli theda, “Tak heppi seitaan va seitaan krei pthii rang da?
Kruwngpaam khat ava mthi na ngi mṭhen bi, ava kruwngpaam ma rip chip pchaang nime.
Ungu inn ava mthi na ngi mkurkhui chaak bi inn ava rip chip pchaang nime.
Ungu seitaanni mdak saa mthi na ngi kulro msora mkurkhui chaak bi, rip pchaang nime, pdainu mṭut chaak na kurthuwk ra.
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi ru ktangpa inn thu lut da mdo thloi ava lowng pchaang nime, ru kri ngi ru ktangpa ava bowl thidonle mi inn thungki klowng pchaang rora.
“Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mii chapa rek pnu ton ungu mmaanni Isowr kjowm cha ngi mpau in mkheng ava kup ptlot pik ra.
Pdainu ku mii khatti pthla kchiir tun kjowm cha ngi mpau bi ava tden thung preva ptlot pik nime, pdainu kṭuw knai kma pnu kirvei chra.”
“Mleija Mma ava pthla ktobor marvee chaakka,” kdingi mmaanni the lamda.
Ungta Jisu nuh leh mnaopa le arva lamda, duwn tha krip daatti pauvi hai pthla lamda.
Ungbi tukhul da kuk ong mii rekki Mhin theda, “Duwn thang ngi anuh leh anaopa le ngi ata thlaam lamma.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Kule da Nei knuh leh knaopa lea?”
Ungta Mma tukhul da kukong rek hin suw purkhol thida theda, “Hava lea Nei knuh leh knaopa le!
Isowr do ngei ktlo mii ava Nei kṭapa, Nei kchernu, ungu knuh.”

Ungta Mma ngi truwn biing ngi kpurchuk pṭhun nowlda. Ungbi kurtuwl mii mluwng pa ngi Mma ava tukhul dok da, ava leiji Mma ava truwn leen arkuwng tunni ku ong da, kurtuwl mii mkheng nga laan tha truwn biing ngi am lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi paupurtol knempok ki mhin inni purchuk da, mdo purchu slii thu Mma ngi mhin inni hanto theda:
“Aryaan! Chii kvar miilai khatti chii kvar ra chet da.
Mma ngi chii mvar thungta angṭhea lam thu tla da, ungbi puwa rekki chom chda.
Chii angṭhea lung leen tla da, tnek ma am ma leiji kbei sekki mowng da.
Ungta kniw do satti purvui da, murjung ma am ma leiji tu ṭon ruk ṭong chda.
Angṭhea tirliing rek arlakki tla da, ungbi tirliing kuksunni pardel youda, mthei chui pchaang me.
Ungta chii angṭhea dul dak kṭha thu tla da, ungbi klin ksaang ngi mowng da thei chui da: mvui leen som kdum, som truk, ungu arjaa khatti chui da.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Mdo aryaak nra knaa kthloi mii ava ngi aryaa chaso.”
Ungta Mma ngi sangtlaakki ma am mpha thu, karyaa mii rek leh sowmlei knii rekki paupurtol mlei thu khewl chlam da.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan hinva Isowr Kruwngpaam ki tuprut pau ado kpiik chaak in, pdainu duwn ki rek tumva do mkheng nga paupurtolli kurthuwk.
Mleija mmaanni dil kinle da kuptlot pik dok mkurthut maanbi, ksuw daatti kdei pchaang kma; karyaa daatti karyaa pindi kma kurthuwk lamra.”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanva hava paupurtolla dei pindi maan timo? Anto mkurthuttu, tak heppi paupurtol mkheng nga dei pindi naan da?
Chii kvar rekki pauna varda,
Ungta hava lea lam thu ktla rek, mdo var pauna ava mmaanni maryaak inki mpha thu, seitaan ni thleng teng da mmaan thung ngi mdo var pauna ava lou pthii da.
Ungta lung leen ktla chii mdo var rek ava hava le hep daat, mmaanni pauna maryaak inki mpha thu kbei sekki kanpa ngi arlaang lamda.
Pdainu mmaan thu arjuwng ma am ma leiji mpha mruk tummi amthida, pauna ava leiji suwkthuwk ma am che kbei sekki ktluw chlam.
Ungta ang ṭhe rekka tirliing arlakki ktla chii rek hep daat, mmaan ava pauna karyaa rek,
pdainu dultipaam tuk sut lamda, suwang thuw ungu ktlok ktlok plung reelli mthu lut da, pauna ava archuw pthii da, thei chui dei me.
Pdainu dul kṭha tun ktla rek ava pauna aryaa da karlaang kcha, ungu mvui leen som kdum, som truk, ungu arjaa khatti thei kchui ava kurthuwk.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Meila ava mrina tun kthii kma ra, tomkal ti mdit mana kowm ti ngi mdo thiik ra mdo sin mo?
Mleija kandang kma ra kurdowl daat ra ame, ungu mar awng thu kandang kma ra tuprut do khat lee ame.
Mdo aryaak nra knaa kthloi mii ava ngi aryaa chaso.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni ado aryaak naan thung ngi rip mer chaan; naanni partee da ado piik naan thu akpartee pik raan, ungu kheel setti akpii chraan.
Mleija kthloi mii ava hin kheel setti kpii chra, ungu kthloi kma mii ava mdo thloi suwn ruk klowng pthii ra.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Isowr Kruwngpaam ma mii ava ngi dul leen chii mdo var ava hep daat.
Mma ngi jaan ni iip da suwnni kardel da, ungu chii muh ava tak heppi klin ksaang ngi kmowng tdit mma ngi dei me.
Dulti thungki mdei ksun da, mbaak jam da, markhei leen knempok ki thei kchui.
Pdainu mvui mmin thungta, tangkep sin da khao da, mleija bu khao pha ava vei da.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Isowr Kruwngpaam ma tak purtol che naanda, mdit mana talu paupurtol sinton che naan di?
Ava anruwng muh hep daat, dul leen mvar mpha thu, dulti leen ki chiimuh rek mkheng thungki kdil sii.
Anto daat joso chiimuh rek mkheng thungki klin sii ngi mowng da, mbaak rek jam da, marlim ti ngi kjuwng puwa rekki mbuw sada ava hep daat.”
Mmaanni mdo aryaak pindit lei inni, paupurtol knempok ki mhin inni pauna the pik lamda.
Paupurtol kma donle mhin inni Mma ngi pau the kchok me, pdainu Mma siikhu rek hin thang va do khim khaija ktliing ngi mdo the pik kcho lam.
Ava nitti khuw mjiin rui rui thungta, Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nenni raalpha khat tha van arkaan inche.”
Ungbi kurtuwl mii rek ma lam thida, Mma ava mmaanni ṭhida arkuwng leen mhep heppi vang lamda. Ungu arkuwng murson rek rukka Mma tu kilṭhi lamda.
Ungu kdung reenni tchangkhuw mraan thungta, dii kurluppi arkuwng deeng da, ava leiji arkuwng plee da.
Pdainu Mma ava arkuwng ther ri iip dok da, ungbi pardel lam thida Mhin the lamda, “Chukpu kmawng chra nthe inna tuk sut nim ti mo?”
Ungbi Mma ngi kardel da tchang khuw kraang ava arkowk da, ungu truwn hin ruk va, “Rim kdi am! Edaai dok!” dida theda. Ungbi tchang khuw kraang ngi down dok da, pum daaiji daai chda.
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji kṭi in pti? Rin chmaan ti mo?”
Ungta mmaanna mpiir reen lei inni msingreel inni hanto the lamda, “Tchang khuw leh truwn kpha ngi mpau mdo pṭoi Mma hava ku rang da?”
Mmaanni Gerasini paamki truwn raalpha tha arvang lamda.
Ungu Mma ngi arkuwng thung ki marhan thuw daat le, thlaan rek thungki kthuwk pthla ktobor doṭhi miilai khat ava ngi kurdut ṭhida,
mma ava thlaan rek thu amda, ku mii khat lee ngi thiir ri rukku bowl bong pchaang me;
mleija maknem thung ngi mkhut mkhu thiir ri ngi ktu lamda, pdainu mri ava mthum mthummi kpot da,mdo ktut in ruk det chda, ungbi ku mii khat lee ngi bowl bong pchaang me.
Mma ngi suwn jaan knai kma thlaan rek leh lown rek tha pveet da, owng da mthi na ngi lung ngi kturthuw da amda.
Ungta mma ngi lam kla ngi Jisu mhai dee thungta; va chen da Mhin luwbuk da.
Ungu mma ngi kdung ngi owngda ṭap da theda, “Kparthaang sii ki Isowr Chapa Jisu, Nangva talu mpirdit chna? Isowr Chapa pti tdit neiji kdea, mhai pja chma!”
Mleija Mma ngi mhin theda, “Pthla ktobor nang, mii ava thungki arvan thuwk dok!”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin khewl da, “Amiing nga ku?” Mma ngi arthawng da, “Nei kmiing nga mpun pii; mleija knempok in ping.”
Ungu Mma ngi paam duwn tha mdo sii pthii ma nlamra kdung ngi Mhin ni ktham chda.
Tunva vak rek ava mluwngpa ngi lown siir ri maal meek lamda.
Ungbi mmaanni, “Vak rek thu mhai sii chaan, mmaan thung ngi lut chaanni,” kdingi Mhin ktham chlamda.

Ava leiji msun nraan Mma ngi rot pik lamda, ungbi pthla ktobor rek ava thuwk lamda, vak rek thu lut lamda; ungta pun knii arveel vak luwng rek ava; kham kukki jungjaam lamda, truwn thu tla you tir lamda.
Vak kseel rekka chen lamda, khuwpii leh mkhuwpaam in thung ngi pau ava mson in thungta, kthuwk dok nong ava ksuw ra mii rek arva lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Jisu hin marhai in thungta, ava thung ngi tarnam doṭhi ku kong daat dei lamda, tarnam doṭhi mii ava ngi plung kinditti dona hiil naada kuk ong daat mdee in thungta; mmaanni ṭi chlam da.
Ungta tarnam doṭhi mii ava leh vak rek thung ngi kthuwk nong kdei rekki mii rek hin pau song lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Jisua mveen rek thaanni mkunsun nra Mhin ktham chlam da.
Ungu Mma ngi arkuwng leen mhankal thungta, tarnam doṭhi mii ava ngi mdil kṭoi chrang ki Mhin ktham chda.
Pdainu Mma ngi mat da, mhin theda, “Inn tha aplap rek hin vang, ungu Mukpu ngi tija klin nong ata tlot pik, ungu wonsat ata lo, tdit ki pau asong cha.”
Ungbi mma ngi vangsun da, Jisu ngi tija thu mma ava wonsat mlo tdit ki pau ava Dikapoli thu kparyaam pṭhun da; ungbi mii mkheng nga ngak chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi arkuwng leen raalpha khat ktong tha mvan nowl thungta, Mma ava truwn biing ngi mii knempok kthuwk kurtuwlli klop dok da.
Ava dilli mmiing Jairas mdo dit synagog thungki kpu rek arlakki khat mma ngi Mhin thleng da, Jisu mdee thungta, mkhu ther ri kuwn da,
hanto theda, Mhin ktham chda, “Kchanu kmo suwn ava kdiyou ra kirsaan da, Nang ngi arva da mleen akhut atkhaan pik bi, mma ngi kring kdam kpha cha ra!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mdil vanṭoi da.
Ungta mdil kṭoi mii ava nem reen da, Mma klop dok lam da.
Ava thu kum sowm lei knii lik thung ngi hii ngi kjaan snu miilai khat amda,
mma ava kdim rek knempok kurdu ngi jakham da, mdo thloi chaak mkheng pthlang da, pdainu mdam rang kchang nga kheel set setti jul da.
Jisu mlei thung ngi pau ava mma ngi maryaak thungta, mii mluwngpa arlakki, mtur ngukki arva da mphrik mor thowng chda.
Mleija mma ngi theda, “Neiji mphrik mor rek rek kthown chaak bi, dam chnik di.”
Ungu mtun kat daatti mhii kjaan ava kar khaam dok da; mdak thungki omlai ava kdam dokki karja da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mdaksaa thungki rutan khat kthuwk dokka tdit ki marchawng karja da, mdil kinle teng da mdil kṭoi miiluwng rek hin, “Ku da kiphrik mor kthowng nga?” dida theda.
Ungbi msiikhu rekki Mhin theda, “Asuw, mii mluwngpa ngi nam kurduwl da aju klop dok da,ava Nang va Nei mukthowng nga ku da? diti the tinu.”
Ungbi ktlo miilai ava kinle da suw da.
Pdainu snu ava ngi mdaksaa thung ngi kthuwk ava deida, mṭit ti kunchun da, arva da Mmaiṭhuwmmi kuwn da, mkindit mkheng Mhin the thuw chda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kchanu, ado rin chaakki kdam im pti; kdaaiji vang, a omlai thungki dam cha.”
Jisu ngi mpau slii arlaanni paam kpupa inn thungki miilai khatti theda, “Achanua kdiyou dok cha a, talu leiji Chukpu ning atpumulla?”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan dothe knaa tipbeen psuk da synagog kpupa hin theda, “ṭi ma, trin he he ngi arin chdaat.”
