Ungta Jisu ngi Pitor leh Jeems ungu Jeems naopa Johon ṭhida ku mii khat lee ngi mdil mdo ṭoi ra rome.
Mmaanni synagog kpupa inn mvan phaak in thungta, kurnung karbaang da owngda kṭap dei da.
Ungta Mma ngi mvan lu mpha thu mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji plung kurkholli kṭap in pti? hava naova kdiyou pme, pdainu ki iip chngaal.”
Ungbi mmaanni pni chaak da, pdainu Mma ngi mii mkheng nga duwn tha pthuwk pthii thida, nao ava pah leh mnuh ungta Mma dil kṭoi rek ṭhi da nao ava am na thung ngi vang lut lam da.
Mkhut louda kjowngda Mma ngi mhin theda, “Talitha kumi;” ava ki mleija, “Nalanao, Neiji ahin kthea, kardel.”
Ungbi tun kat daatti nao ava kardel da chet da. (Mleija kum sowm leiknii kpha dok nao) Ungta mmaanna kdung ngi ngak chlam da.
Hava ava ku mii khat lee ngi mdo dee ma nra Jisu ngi klu katti parseel lamda, ungu nao ava hin then mruk mdo piik chaak nlam ra mhin inni theda.
Jisu ngi ava mmun ma thida mdaksaa ki khuwpaam tha arvang da; ungu msiikhu rek va mdil ṭoi da.

Ungta sabath nitti Mma ngi synagog thung ngi lut da kpurchuk pṭhunda. Ungta Mma do purchu karyaa mii mkheng nga ngak chda,ungu the lamda, “Hava mkheng nga Mma va talu thungki mdo phaak da? Mma hin mdo piik lousing nga tak hep kdu lu daat da? Mkhutti klin klin nong mdo tlotta!
Hava ding kparnaal lik, ungta Mery chapa ungu Jeems leh Josi, Juda ungta Simon le u pa, ungta mcher rek ruk nenni ta am ṭhiin daat pme mo?” kdingi mmaanni plung kpurri bin lam da.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Khulpua mdaksaa ki khuwpaam, mri mlam thu, mphungka thung kma donle, mii do kjat nma ra ame.”
Ungta Mma ngi kukoi rek angṭhe leen mkhut khiing da mii mdo pdam ava kma donle, mun ava thu Mma ngi nong klin tlo pchaang me.
Mmaan do rin ma leiji ngak chda.
Ungta Jisu ngi marveel ki khuw rek thung ngi tlowng da purchuk da.
Ungta Mma ngi sowm lei knii rek Mhin own thida, pthla ktobor rek leen rutan mdo thloi nraan pii lamda, knii nii ngi sii lamda.
Naanni kchung kma donle alam ṭoi raan thungki ra do khat lee ado hur in ro nime; thenpen, thowngja, ungu arkowl riin thung ngi sum ado hur in ro nime kdingi parseel lamda.
Pdainu khu kok rek ava knaa cha krora, dona karsakki ku hur rome.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni alu naan inn ava thung ngi asun duin khim khai ji am daat in.
Ungu naan akup thlung kmaan, amat in da akaryaak pik kmaan ma am ta, asun thaanni mmaan rinpaumin kipthleiji, akhuwn arbaat akṭho pthiin.”
Ava leiji mmaanni duwn tha chet lamda, mii ava ngi plung mdo pinlet ra kdingi paryaam lamda.
Mmaanni tarnam rek rei pthii lamda, thao pbul lamda kukoi rek knempok pdam lamda.
Jisu miing kunton na tdit kruwng Herod ti aryaa da, mii angṭhe va, “Baptis kuptlot Johon kdiyou thungki kardel; ava leiji Mma thung ngi ktlo ki rutan rek ka am,” dilam da.
Pdainu angṭhe rek va theda, “Elijah pi di lamda,” ungu angṭhe rek nowl va, “Chodu ki khulpu rek arlakki khat pi” di lamda.
Pdainu Herod ti maryaak thungta, mma ngi theda, “Neiji mluw kdo reen Johon ava kardel,” pi dida.
Mleija Herod ti Johon kukjowng mii mdo sii na ki mleija, mma mdak kat naopa Philip numei lowng da mnumei tpurthuw da, Herodia tum daatti Johon na bowl da rowng inn thung ngi mdo khum pthii.
Mleija Johon ni Herod hin theda, “Anaopa numei ado paal ṭhi ava Nowlam do rot pme.”
Ava leiji Herodia va Johon na kdung ngi mraal pii da, aeyou nuwm da, pdainu pchaang me.
Herod va Johon na kchiir rinkindit miilai khat tdit mdo dee leiji ṭi da, kṭha ngi mdo thiik. Mma ngi mdo aryaak na thung ngi tija mning mul na am daat joso kanpa ngi Mhin aryaa chda.
Pdainu mpha kcha arvang da, mleija Herod ṭou na nit ava thu mma ngi, klin rek, nong klin kpuw rek, Galil paam thung ki ber ksu rek ava pmaal da.
Ungbi Herodia chanu ngi vang lut da mkardaam thungta, Herod leh mmal rek ning ptlung da; ava leiji kruwng ngi nalanao hin theda, “Ado ngei khim khai athe neiji arot pik nik di.
Nang ngi ado tiṭhil khim khai ku kruwngpaam mṭim kpha thu apii nik di.”
Ungbi mma ngi vang thuwk da mnuh hin, “Talu ṭhil chnik da,” kdingi mthe thungta, “Baptis kuptlot Johon luwchai aṭhil,” dida mnuh va theda.
Ungbi mma ngi kruwng hin vang lut teng da, kakja haiji, “Baptis kuptlot Johon luw arkuw thung ngi ado tpiik chaak ra neiji kngeija,” dida theda.
Hava ngi kruwng plung kdung ngi pja da; pdainu mpau reel dok leh mmal rekki mlei kurthuwk da, mpauna ava leek nuwm me.
Ungta kruwng va kseel rawlmii khat own da mluw mdo arvan sin nra pau pṭum da. Ungbi mma ngi va da rowng inn thung ki mluw reen da;
ungu arkuw thu arvan sin da, nala nao hin pii da, ungta nala nao va mnuh hin pii da.
Msiikhu rekki ava maryaak thungta, va lamda mdak kluwng ava lou lamda thlaan thu alruwl chlamda.
Kenyee rekki Jisu hin mdil kinle lamda, mnong tlot in leh mpausaam mkheng Mhin song lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Asangtlaak inni arva inra mmun ktliing khat thu ekarnga chaan,” Mleija karva kvang mii mnem reen leiji kmaal ki mpha ruk pha chlam me.
Ungbi mmun ktliing khat thung ngi arkuwng leen tuwng lam da msang tlaak inni va lam da.
Mii maknem mi mhai in ava sut pṭoi da, dei lamda, ungu khuw mkheng thungki mii rekki mkhu inni chen pṭoi lamda, mun ava thu mmaanni ru ri dok lamda.
Mma ngi dii biing ngi mhai thungta kurtuwl mii knempok deida, ungbi wonsat lo chlam da, mleija kseel ra ktaak jaonao rek heppi deida; pau knempokki kpurchuk pṭhun da.
Ungta khuw mjiin rui rui thungta msiikhu rek Mhin arva da the lam da, “Mmun hava ktliing nga, ungu mpha rukka kuk to dokka,
apsun chlam, mkhuw paam in leh khuw rek tha chet lam sora, mdo chaak raan then aren chlam so.”
Pdainu Mma ngi arthawng da, “Mdo chaak raan do mruk naanni apii chaan,” Ungbi mmaanni theda, “Mmaan do chaak rang nga neenni hava dinari arjaa knii ngi va da ren pik ni kaan mo?”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni the da, “Thenpen tija athloi inna? Vang inra asuw in.” Mmaanni suw lam thida the lamda, “Thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii ka amma.”
Ungta Mma ngi mii mkheng nga nowm suwl ke er leen lop loppi mko on nraan mhin inni pau pṭum da.
Ava leiji mmaanni lop loppi arjaa khat khat leh som parnga nga ngi ko ong lam da.

Ungta Mma ngi thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii lou da parwaan hansuw da phowl kṭha parlaan thida pkuida mii rek mdo them pik nlam ra msiikhu rek hin parlaan da; thida tuwlva knii ruk khuida them pik lamda.
Mii mkheng ngi poi kpa sappi maal da.
Ungta then kekleem ava tomkal sowm lei knii jilli purkuk lamda.
Thenpen kchaa mii rek ava mii pun parnga lik.
Ungta Mma ngi kuknotti kurtuwl mii rek mupsun slii chunni msiikhu rekka Bethseida kpha ra raalpha khat tha mdu betti haisii lamda.
Ungu mii rek tu mkinṭhen diltha, Mma ngi lown tha kṭhil chra hang da.
Khuw jiing da, arkuwng nga truwn leen mvan slii arlaanni, Mma ava msangtlaakki laan tha am daat da.

Mma ngi leer khatti mhai sut lam thungta, msiikhu rek kja lang lang ava hai dei da, mleija mdu suk inni tirthli ngi raan lamda,jaan ki ṭhang plii arveel ro ngi Mma ngi dii leen mkhu ngi chet da pha lamda. Mma va mbe thaanni chet nuwm da,
pdainu mbe thaanni truwn leen mche ava mmaanni mdee in thungta, raothla pak da kdingi owng lamda.
Mleija mkheng inni Mma mdee in thungta piir lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi pau teng da mhin inni theda, “Plung apnet in, Nei ping; ṭi maan.”
Ungta arkuwng leen mmaan ku on ṭhi lamda, tirthli kraang ruk down dok da. Ungbi mmaan na kdung ngak chlam da,
mleija thenpen mlei thu mmaanni dei pindi chlamme, pdainu muplung inna pchai set set da.
Ungu mmaanni raalpha khat tha mvan arkaan in thungta, Kenisarit paam van pha lamda, dii biing ngi priik lamda.
Arkuwng leenki mṭum in thungta, Jisua mii rek va tin chteng da.
Ungbi mmaanni mveen in khim khai thu chen karvel lamda, kukoi mii rek ava mi ii naan tu kdom lam da, Jisu am na mun thlaam lamda paphaak chlam da.

Ungta Mma ngi mche na ktai thu khuw tee don, khuwpii daat don,mdit mana paampii ki mii rek kurbu na mun ktai thu pi iip lamda, mmaanni miphrik mdo thown chaak nlam ra Mhin ktham chlam da; ungu kthowng cha mii knem pokka dam chda.
Tunva Pharisi rek leh Jerusalem ki kthleng Nowlam chukpu rek angṭhe ngi Mhin mthuw kurtuwl in thungta,
siikhu rek angṭhe ngi mkhut in kbuwr ri, mleija khut kulṭhu kma then mmaal in dei lamda.
Mleija Pharisi rek leh Jehudia rek va cho du ki kver rek nopa pṭoi lam da, mkhut in kulṭhu kma then cha kchok lamme;

ungu mmaanni bajaar ki mthlun in mpha thu, mdak saa in mkirtleu du khim khai then cha kchok lamme; ungu nopa knem pok mmaanni mdo pṭoi in ruk ka am,tong rek, uwm rek, ungu thleengkam mdo kno kcho lu in.
Ungbi Pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki Mhin khewl lamda, “Talu leiji asiikhu rek va kver rek nopa kupṭoi kma, khut kbuwr ri then mdo chaak in da?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kṭha a, hava Isaijah ngi ṭha tlot ktlo naan mlei thung ngi mdo kjit ava lulu:
‘Hava mii rekki mner duwn daat inni makjat lamda, pdainu muplung ril inna Nei kihin ki kdung lam karlat kcha a.’
Mmaanni luw mdo tbuk lam ava do sii me, mleija Isowr Nowlam kurthuwk daat joso dulti mii do tlot kupṭoiji purchuk lamda.
Naan ni Isowr paureen ma pthiin tinu mii nopa tlot ava arpom mer in tinu.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Isowr paureen kipthleiji, naanni mo ol nra nopa ava arpom inti nu.
Mleija Mousi ngi theda, ‘Apah leh anuh akjat cha;’ ungu mpah leh mnuh hin kṭha kma kpau mii ava kdiyou ra.’
Pdainu naanva, ‘Ku mii khatti mpah mdit mata mnuh hin, nei kihin ki ado phaak chaak ra ava korban’ (mlei ava Isowr hin kpiik dok) kdi ngi theen tinu.
Ava mkurthut bi naan va mma ngi mpah leh mnuh nong mdo tlot ra prot maan ti.
Naanni ado kjown daat in nopa ava ngi Isowr pauna leek inti, tutlot mara do knem pok tlo in tinu.”
Ungu Jisu ngi mii rek Mhin ni own lam thida theda, “Mhai aryaa in, akheng inni,ungu adei pindi chaan.
Miilai thung ngi duwn ki jung klut do ava ngi mii ava kchou me; pdainu mii ava thungki arhan kthuwkki miilai ava mdo kchou kre.”
Mdo aryaak nra knaa kthloi ku mii khatti aryaa chaso.
Ungta Mma ngi mii rek ma thida inn thu mvan lu thungta, msiikhu rekki paupurtol mlei thu Mhin khewl chlam da.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ava mkurthuttu naan rukka kdei pindi kma pa in pti mo? Miilai thung ngi duwn ki jung klut ava ngi mii kchou me tdit naanni dei maan ti mo?
Jung klut ava plung ki rang pme poi thungki rang kurthuwk ungu karthleng kcha lu pme mo?” (Then mkheng nga kartleu dok dida Mma ngi theda.)
Ungta Jisu ngi theda, “Mii khat thungki arhan kthuwk ava ngi mii mdo kchou kre.
Mleija miilai plung thung ki arhan kthuwk ava kṭha kma jesang, nala tartlaang kturkui, kupru, mii ke eayou, losang kṭhi,
hangmal, ṭhat ma nong ktlo, plei knei, ko ok kma, khei kthe, ku huwng cha, kpohok, mong kokto,
ṭha kma hava mkheng nga plung ril thungki arhan kthuwk jesang, ava ngi mii mdo kchou kre.”
Ungta Mma ngi mun ava thungki kurlou da, Tyr leh Sidon paamkowl tha vang da. Ungta Mma ngi inn khat thu lut da, ku mii khat lee ktardet nuwm me; anto daat joso kurdowl pchaang me.
Pdainu mchanu kmo suwn pthla ktobor ri ram mdo tparvee snu miilai khat ava ngi aryaa da Mhin thleng teng da, mkhu ther ri luwbuk chda.
Tunva snu ava Syrophosia thung ngi kṭou Grik mii, mma ngi mchanu thungki tarnam mdo rei pthii pik nra Mhin ktham chda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Ru kri reeppi kmo rek maal dok lam so, mleija kmo rek thenpen lou da ui rek kip pthii pik ava ro me.”
Pdainu mma ngi arthawng da, “Oji, Mukpu, anto daat joso ui rek ruk va tebol tu n ki kmo rek bu ptlaak mdo chom chaak ma!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi snu ava hin theda, “Hava ado the pa daat so, a inn tha vang kinle, achanu thungki tarnam ma ksun kcha a.”
Ungu mma ngi mi inn tha mvan thungta, mchanua ki iip daatti van pha da, mthungki tarnam ruk sun chda.
Ava dilli Jisua Tyr paamkowl ki mdil kinle da, Sidon ki ngi Galil truwn chet thlengda Dikapoli paamkowl tha vang da.
Ungta mmaanni knaa kbeeng mpau kaklak miilai khat Mhin ṭhi paphaak lamda, mleen mkhut mdo khiin pik chaak nra Mhin ktham chlam da.
Ungbi mii rek arlakki ṭhi ptliing thida, mkhut chelli maknaa thun da, maplei pthot da kmei pik da;
parwaan hansuw da,tdaal ṭen thida, “Epha phatta,” mlei ava “Kparvang,” dida theda.
Ungbi maknaa ava kparvang da,miplei kurkol da, mma ngi ktarnaal deekki pau da.
Ungta ku mii khat lee hin mdo the thut ma nra Jisu ngi mhin pau pṭum da; mhin inni kheel set setti pau mupṭum le kheel sii ngi paryaam lamda.
Ungu kheel sii ngi mnga chaak in thungta mmaanni the lamda, “Do mkheng kṭha deekki mtlot ta; knaa kbeeng ngi maryaakka, mpau kthuwk kma mpapau pchaanna.!”
Ava nit lik thung ngi, mii mluwng pa ngi mthuw kurtuwl nowl thungta, mdo chaak raan do khat lee am mda, Mma ngi msiikhu rek own thida mhin inni theda,
“Kuplung kakhamma, hava kurtuwl mii rekka, mleija nii kdum lik thung ngi mi amṭhiin da, mdo chaak raan do khat lee thloi chlam me.
Poi ktham daatti mi inn thaan kupsun lambi, lam tha puwrthlowk ki klou kro lam; ungu mii angṭhea lam kla ki kthleng chlam.”
Ungbi msiikhu rekki Mhin arthawng da, “Tak heppi houja pang mii knemma kbowk laiju Miilai khdaat va thenpen ni kpamaal rang ki da?”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni khewl da, “Thenpen tija athloi inna?” Ungbi, “Tikheu,” di lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi kurtuwl mii rekka dul leen mku on nraan paureen da; ava dilli thenpen tikheu louda, panpaak thida, khui da msiikhu rek hin mii rek maiṭhuwmmi mdo down nraan pii da, ungbi mmaanni kurtuwl mii rek maiṭhuwmmi down pik lamda.
Ungta mmaanni tuwlva kdil sisi mruk thloi lam da; ava ruk phowl kṭha parlaan thida mmaiṭhuwm inni mdo down nraan paureen da.
Mii mkheng nga poi kpa sappi maal da, mkikleem kṭik ava tomkal tikheu kdim jilli purkuk lamda.
Ungta mii rekka pun plii arveel.
Mma ngi mii rekka psun lam thida; arkuwng leen msiikhu rek tu kal teng lamda, Dalmanutha paamkowl tha vang lamda.
Ungta Mma hin Pharisi rek thleng lam da karteen ṭhi lamda, mdo pirsin naanni parwaan ki titinna mhai tdet in di lamda.
Ungta pthla ngi Mma ngi tdaal ṭen ring thida the da, “Talu leiji hava charuwl va titinna mdo thlaam da? Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava charuwl hin titinna pii ni me.”
Ungta Mma ngi ma thi lamda, arkuwng leen tuwng nowl da raalpha khat ktong tha vang kunsun da.
Tunva mmaanni arkuwng leen thenpen mdo hur raan parngiil chdok lamda; khdaat chrel hur lam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni mluw klek thida theda, “Pharisi rek leh Herod thowl cheek asin dei chaan.”
Ungbi mmaanni khat leh khat karteen psuk nlam da, “Thenpen thloi maan min.”
Ungta Jisu ngi deida mhin inni theda, “Thenpen ado thloi maan leiji talu ki ngi karteen in pti? Tun kpha thung ngi kdei mdit mata kdei pindi kurthuwk maan ti mo? Aplung inna kapchai set set daat mo?
Mik kthloi daatti kdei kma, knaa kthloi daatti karyaa kma pa in pti mo? Naanni bin pha liit maan ti mo?
Neiji mii pun parnga do chaak ra thenpen parnga kdo pkui, ava tomkal tija kdimmi mkekleem kṭikka apurku in?” Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Sowm lei knii.”
“Ungta mii pun plii do chaak ra thenpen tikheu kdo pkui mkekleem kṭikka tomkal tija kdimmi apurku in?” Ungbi mmaanni theda, “Tomkal tikheu.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanna kdei pindi liit kma pa in pti mo?”
Ungta mmaanni Betsaida tha arvang lamda. ungbi mii angṭhe ngi mik ktot khat Mhin ṭhi paphaak da, mdo kmei pik nra the chlam da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mik ktot ava mkhut tha kjowng da, khuwduwn tha ṭhi da; mmik leenni Mma ngi ptil pthot da, mleenni mkhut mkhiin pik dilli, Mma ngi mhin theda, “Khuw adea?”
Ungbi mma ngi khuw hansuw thida theda, “Mii kdea; pdainu ding rek kchet heppi kdea.”
Ava dilli vei khat nowlli mleenni mkhut khiin pik da; msut rim thungta, do khim khai kindit chelli dei da.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mi inn tha van sii thida theda, “Khuw thung ngi vang lut ma.”
Ungta Jisu ngi msiikhu rek tu Kaisaria Philippia khuw rek tha vang lamda; ungta mmaanni lam tha mvan slii arlaanni, Mma ngi msiikhu rek hin pau khewl lamda, “Mii rek va Neia ku pi mti dit lamda?”
Ungbi mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Baptis kuptlot Johon; ungu angṭhe rek va Elija pi di lamda; ungta angṭhe rek nowl va khulpu rek arlakki khat pi di lamda.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni khewl lamda, “Pdainu naan va Neia ku pi ati dit inna?” Pitor ri arthawng da, “Nah Khrista pti.”
Ungbi ku mii khat lee hin mmaanni mdo the thut ma nraan mhin inni Jisu ngi pau pṭum da.

“Mii Chapa ava do knem pokki suwk kthuwk ra, kver rek, thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rekki Mma ava pthlei donle, ke eayou ra,ungu nii kdum dil tha kring kardel ra,” dida Mma ngi kpurchuk pṭhun da.
Mma ngi havaa kurphuwng ngi the da. Ungbi Pitor ri ṭhida, Mhin kurkowk pṭhun da.
Pdainu Mma ngi mdil kinle da msiikhu rek msut daat chunni Pitor ra raida theda, “Kdil tha kursown dok, Seitaan! mleija nang nga Isowr ktong ki pti pme, pdainu dulti mii rek hinki pti.”
Ungta Jisu ngi kurtuwl mii mluwng pa leh msiikhu rek Mhin own thida, mhin inni theda, “Ku mii khatti Nei kdil mṭoi nuwm bi, mdaksaa kulro mso, mdaksaa khros ahur sora Nei kdil aṭoi chaso.
Mleija ku mii khatti mrinkhu maktlan nuwm bi ava kmaang chra; pdainu Nei ktum ungu kṭha paumin tummi ku mii khatti mrinkhu mpiik chaak bi, mma ava kaktlan pik ra.
Mleija mii ava ngi dultipaam thungki pha chthi sora mrinkhu mkartlaai chaakku, ava talu ksi rang?
Mleija mma rinkhu ava mii ngi tak heppi kpinlet pik rang?

Mleija ku mii khatti losang kṭhi ungu pnu kirvei ki charuwl hava thung ngi Nei ungu kṭha pauna rek tummi ningkja mkursoi bi, Mii Chapa ruk va Mpah laarnee ngi kchiir waan tamsii rek tu murjun mpha thu ningkja ksoi ra.”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava thu krip daat mii angṭhe va Isowr Kruwngpaam mi rutan tu kilṭhi ngi kurjung ra ava mdee du khim khai kdiyou pha nime.”
Ungta nii truk diltha Jisu ngi Pitor leh Jeems ungu Johon ṭhi da mthi naanni lown kparthaang leen hang lamda. Ungta mmaiṭhuwm inni mrungchen karthleng da,
mdona naak ava kepleu dang ngi powl da,ava hep lulu ngi dultipaam thu ku mii khat lee ngi arsu pchaang nime.
Ava thu Elija ngi Mousi tu Mhin ni ktardet da Jisu tu pausaam lamda.
Ungbi Pitor ri Jisu hin theda, “Chukpu, hava thu ta am daat inna kṭha a; nenni buw inn kdum sa inche, Nah ado ra khat,Mousi do ra khat, ungta Elijah do ra khat.”
Mleija kdung reenni mṭit leiji mdo the ra dei pindi chme.
Ungta armeiji jiil dok lamda, armei thung ki krowl khatti theda, “Hava Nei kwonsat lo Kchapa; Mhin aryaa in!”
Ungbi mmaanni kinle teng lamda khuw msut ploi in thungta, Jisu kma donle ku mii khat lee dei lamme.
Ungta mmaanni lown leen ki murjun ṭum slii arlaan ni Jisu ngi mhin inni pau pṭum da, “Mii Chapa ngi kdiyou thungki mrin karheel du khim khai, hava ado dee inna ku mii khat lee hin song maan.”
Ava leiji mlei ava mmaanni bin pthii daat lamda, kdiyou thungki kardel mdo ditta tak mdo the nda kdingi karkhewl lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Mhin paukhewl chlam da, “Talu leiji Nowlam chukpu rek va Elijah ava trin kma kurjung rang pi mdo dit inda?”

Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Elijah ava do mkheng kparmang ra ru kri ver ri kurjung dok; ungu tak heppi Mii Chapa ava mdo kjit rek thungva do knempok thung ngi suwk thuwk don, bun rai donle, mraal kpii lam ra dida mdo kjit da?
Pdainu akthe pik inna,ru kri ver ri Elijah ava kurjung dok, ungu mmaanni mdo tlot nuwm inna mhin mtlot dok in, kikjitti mma mlei thung ngi mdo kjit dok ava heppi kthuwk dok.”
Ungu mmaanni siikhu rek mjun phaak in thungta, mii knempok kurtuwl ava ngi klop dok lamda, Nowlam chukpu rek tu karteen slii dei lamda.
Ungu kurtuwl mii mkheng ngi Mma mdee khot in thungta, kdung ngi ngak chlam da, ungbi mmaanni Mhin va chen lamda, arvui chlam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni paukhewl lamda, “Ado karteen psuk inna talu da?”
Ungbi kurtuwl mii rek thungki khatti Mhin arthawng da, “Chukpu, kchapa ava mthung ngi mpau kthuwk kma pthla lut da, Nah hin karhai ṭhi chaak na;
ungta mma ava mdo ṭhi na ktai thu ptluw da, mhaa kril da, muhuwn thlut da, mner ṭen pursowm kchok da; ungbi Nah asiikhu rekki mdo trei pthii pik nlam ra kthe chaak na pchaang chlam mda.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “O krin dei kma charuwl rek, tak hep pang ksotti Neiva aṭhi ni kaan da? Nei kihin arvan ṭhiin!”
Ungbi mmaanni pselnao ava Mhin ṭhi paphaak lamda. Pthla ngi Jisu mdee thungta, tun kat daatti pselnao ava dul deen nda var pthii da, ungbi mner tha muhuwn thlut da.
Ungta Jisu ngi nao ava pah hin khewl da, “Hava tja roi ksotta?” Ungbi mma ngi the da, “Mmot daat ki kupṭhun.”
Mma ava maknem thung ngi dii leh mei thu ke ea krep rang ngi duwl kchok da; pdainu Nang ngi atlot pchaan rangta, wonsat mhai lo chaan ra mhai bom chaan.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nang ngi arot bi krin cha mii hin va do mkheng nga kurthuwk lu.”
Tun kat daatti nao pah ava owng da ṭap da, “Neiva krin chaakka; kdo rin chaak de ma thung ngi mhai bom cha,” dida theda.

Ungu Jisu ngi kurtuwl mii rek arva kchen kurkuk mdee thungta, hanto theda, “Kyeng ktokhoi pthla nang, Neiji pau kreenna, mma thungki arvang thuwk dok, mma thung ngi alu nowl ro nime,” dida pthla ktobor rai da.
Ungta keu da nao ava kdung mtono dok dil tha, arvan thuwk da, ungbi nao ava kdiyou lulu ngi am chda, ava leiji mii knem pokki theda, “Nao ava kdiyou kcha a.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mkhut tha kjowng da tip prip da, ungbi han rip da.
Ungu Jisu ngi inn thu mvan lu thungta, msiikhu rekki tup prutti Mhin paukhewl chlam da, “Talu leiji neen va rei pthii pchaang maan ring da?”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Hava lua kṭhil cha kma donle do khat lee ngi rei pthii pchaang me.”
Ungta mmaanni mmun ava thungki Galil vang klaan lamda, ungu Mma ngi ku mii khat lee hin ktardet nuwmme.
Mleija Mma ngi siikhu rek hin hanto purchuk da theda, “Mii Chapa ava mii rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthii ra, mmaanni ki ae you ra, ungta mdiyo dok le nii kdum dil tha kring kardel nowl ra.”
Pdainu mmaanva talu mdo the nda tdit dei pindi chlamme; ungu Mhin mdo khewl raan ruk ṭi lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Kaparnahum vang thlung lamda, inn thu ma am daat arlaan inni Mma ngi khewl lamda, “Naanni lam tha ado karteen psuk inna talu da?”
Pdainu mmaanni rim kdi am lamda, mleija ku ngi klin sii kdingi mmaanni lam tha karteen psuk lam da.
Ungta Mma ngi ku ong thida,sowm lei knii ownda; mhin inni theda, “Ku mii khatti ru mrit nuwm bi, mma ava mkheng thungki dil knau sii ungu mkheng ki sra owr kurthuwk ra.”
Ungta Mma ngi nao khat lou da, marlak inni thii da; kdom da mbaanni arpom thida, mhin inni theda,
“Nei kmiing ngi ku mii khatti hanto lu nao marlaan chaak bi, Nei mdo tarlaan chaak; ungu Nei mkarlaang cha miia Nei mdo tarlaan ava pme, pdainu Nei mju ksii Isowr mdo arlaan chaak.”
Johon ni Mhin theda, “Chukpu, Nah amiing ngi tarnam rek krei pthii miilai khat neenni dei innu, ungbi nen ndil kṭoi kma pa kdi ngi, pdown pthiinnu.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Mma ava pdown maan, mleija Nei kmiing ngi nong klin klin ktlo rek mmaanni, dil tha kbei sekki Nei kleen kṭha kma kpau lamra.
Mleija nen mi kahal kma mii ava nen ntum.
Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni Khrista miing ado hur lei inni, ku mii khatti ado neek raan dii tong khat pang akpii kchaan ma am bi, mma ava mnah kpinlet pik ra.”
“Ku mii khatti Nei mikrin chrek hava kmo sisi rek lam arkam da pnu thu maptlaak bi, chakri lung klin lang lang mlowl psuk da truwn thung ngi tvar pthii ava ngi kursuk sii ra.
Ungu akhut khat inni pnu akaptla raan mkurthut ta, areen buk pthiin, mleija kdiyou liit kma sim thu knii ngi alu raan kchang nga khdaatti rinkhu ado phaak inni kursuk ra.
Mmaan kchaa pden ava tden thung pre diyou me, ungta mei kṭuwng ava ruk diyou me.
Ungta akhu inni pnu akaptla raan mkurthut ta, areen buk pthiin, mleija khu knii ngi sim thu atlaak raan kchang nga, kseek ki rinkhu ado phaak in ava ngi kur suk ra.
Mmaan kchaa pden ava tden thung pre diyou me, ungta mei kṭuwng ava ruk diyou me.
Ungu amik inni pnu akaptla raan mkurthutta, akhor pthiin, mleija mik knii kthloiji sim thu atlaak raan kchang nga, mik khdaat thloi da Isowr Kruwngpaam kthlung ngi kur suk sii ra.
Mmun ava thungva pden diyou me, ungu mei ruk diyou me.
Mleija mii khim khaija mei thung ngi pti ka al heppi ka al chra.
Ptia kṭha; pdainu ma al ava mmaan chaakku tak heppi ka al nowl rang? Adak in thung ngi pti apa al in, ungu kdaaiji khat leh khat ji am in.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mmun ava ma thida Jordon kheel da Judia paamkowl tha vang da, ungbi Mhin mii knempok mthuw kurtuwl nowl thungta, veikhat nowlli Mma nopa kpurchuk pṭhun da.
Ungta Mma hinni kthleng Pharisi rekki mdo pirsin naanni paukhewl lamda, “Nowlam va innpu ngi mnumei bowr ktlo pthii mrot mo?”
Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Mousi va talu pau atreen pik inda?”
Mmaanni theda, “Mousi va mii ava ngi bowr mdo tlot na ki mlei kjit thii donle, mdo kinṭhen ṭhi kro ra dida.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Mleija naan plung ril mapchai reen leiji mma ngi hava pauva reen da mdo kjit.
Pdainu kapṭhang mupṭhun daat le, ‘Isowr va psel leh snu seem da.’
Hava ngi mlei kurthuwk da pselli mpah leh mnuh ma thi donle mnumei tu ma am vee ra,
ungu knii ava khdaat kurthuwk ra, ‘Mleija mmaan ve ava knii ngi am bong lamme, daksaa khdaatti ka am.’
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Isowr do punlom dok mii ava ku mii khat lee ngi kṭhen ro nime.”
Ungta inn thung tha siikhu rekki hava mlei thung ngi Mhin pau khewl lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ku mii khatti mnumei bowr tlo pthii thisora snu khat mlo bi, mma ngi mnumei leen losang mṭhia.
Anto hep daatti numeiji mi innpu bowr tlo pthii thisora psel khathin inn mnee bi mma rukku mi innpu leen losang mṭhia.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mdo kmei pik nlamra mii rekki kmo rek ava Mhin ṭhi paphaak lamda, ungbi siikhu rekki rai lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi ava mdee thungta plung kpur ri, mhin inni theda, “Kmo rek va mhai phaa chdaat lamso, khaan maan, mleija Isowr Kruwngpaam ava hanto lu hep daat thung ngi ka am.
Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ku mii khatti Isowr Kruwngpaam ava hava nao khat heppi marlaan chaak ma bi, lut chip pchaang nime.”
Ungta Mma ngi kmo rekka mbaanni kdom da, mleen thaanni mkhut khiing da, phowl kṭha parlaan chlam da.
Ungta Jisu ngi ksun ra mkurlo slii arlaanni, pselpa miilai khatti va chen da, mdu sukki pkhuppi tirdiil da Mhin theda, “Kṭha Chukpu, neiji talu tlo da kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava pha chnik di?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Talu leiji kṭha diti ado tu own da? Isowr kma donle kṭha ku khat lee amme.
Nang ngi paureen rekka ado dee; ‘Mii eayou ma, losang ṭhi ma, pru ma, kindit kma sakhi ri pik ma, huwng chma, anuh leh apah akjat cha.’”
Ungbi mma ngi Mhin theda, “Chukpu, keksee daat ki hava mkheng nga kdo pṭoi chaak.”

Ungta Jisu ngi wonksa lang lang ngi suw rim thida theda, “Do khat ado tlot ra kvaat daatta; vang, ado thloi ajur thira sra rek hin apii cha, ava ngi parwaan ki asumbuwr kurthuwk ra; ungu arva,Kdil aṭoi cha.”
Ava mdo the leiji kurnung da, alrou knempok mdo thloi leiji plung kja lang lang ngi vang sun da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mdil kinle da siikhu rek suw thida mhin inni theda, “Suwang rekki Isowr Kruwngpaam mthlun nraanna tija thung ngi kparsa chdaatta.”
Ungbi mpauna rekki siikhu rekka ngak chlam da. Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni the nowl da, “Kmo rek, Isowr Kruwngpaam tuthlun nrang nga tija thung ngi kparsa chdaatta!
Suwang khatti Isowr Kruwngpaam mthlun rang hin va, ut khatti prou khur thu mlu ngi ko ol sii ra.”
Ungta siikhu rekka kdung reenni ngak chlam da, Mhin the lam da, “Ava mkurthuttu mdo ktlan na ku rang da?”
Jisu ngi suw rim lamthida theda, “Ava lua dulti mii hinva kurthuwk nime, pdainu Isowr hin pme, do mkheng nga Isowr hinva kurthuwk lu.”
Pitor ri Mhin kthe pṭhunda, “Asuw neenni do mkheng ma pthiin thinu, Nah dil kdo ṭoi chaak in.”
Jisu ngi theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ku mii khat lee ngi Nei ktum,ungu kṭha pauna tummi, mi innlou, mcher mṭah, mnuh mpah, mnaole, mdit mata mpaam kma pthii mapchaanma bi,

karvang ra kum thu mma ngi suwkthuw mphaak thu mi inn rek, mcher mṭah, ungu mnuh mpah, ungta mnaole, mpaam tu kilṭhi ngi arjaa khat ktopommi suwkthuw kphaak ṭhi lamra; ungu karvang ra kum thung ngi kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu karlaang ra.
Pdainu ru kri ki mii knempok ava dil knau ra,ungu dil knau ava ngi ru kri ra.”

Ungta Jerusalem hun kpha ra, lam tha mche slii arlaan inni, Jisua mdu bet inni ru rida hang da, ungbi siikhu rekka ngak chlam da, ungta mdil in kṭoi rekka ṭi chlam da. Jisu ngi sowm lei knii rek ṭhi nowl da, Mma leenni kthuwk ra mlei thung ngi mhin inni kthe pṭhun da.

Mma ngi theda, “Asuw in, nenna Jerusalem tha kahang slii in min, ungta Mii Chapa ava thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek hin kparlaan pthii ra; mmaanni mdiyo nra mraal kpii lamra, ungu ktlok chati rek hin kparlaan pthii lamra.
Ungta mmaanni pnii chaak donle ke eayou ra, pdainu nii kdum diltha kring kardel ra.”
Ungta Jebidi chapa rek Jeems leh Johon ni Mma pha lamda, Mhin the lamda, “Chukpu, ahin kdo ṭhil chaak in khim khai mtlot pik naan di kdingi kngei inna.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji ado ktlot pik raan talu angei inna?”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Nah alaarnee ngi khatti achang tha ungu khatti alee tha, kuk ong mhai rot pik chaan.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni talu kṭhil inna tdit dei pindi chmaan ti. Neiji kdo neek na tong ava nee pchaang da, mdit mata Neiji baptis kdo tlot na thu baptis tlo pchaang naan mo?”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Neenva pchaang ni kaan di.” Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei kdo neek na tong thu nee pchaang naan di,Neiji baptis kdo tlot na thu tlo pchaang naan di.
Pdainu kchang leh klee tha ku kong rang nga Nei kdo rot ra ava pme, pdainu mma mma tummi mdo purchuwl pik ava kurthuwk ra.”
Ungta miilai sowm rekki ava maryaak in thungta, Jeems leh Johon leen kdung ngi plung pthit lamda.
Ungu Jisu ngi Mhin own lam thida theda, “Ktlok chati rekka naanni ado dee in, ungu kpaal na kver rekki mmaan leen rutan mkheng mdo thloi in, ungu nong klin kpuw rekki rutan mdo pinret.
Pdainu naan arlak va anto lua kurthuwk me; naan arlakki klin ra kngei mii ava mkheng ki sra owr kurthuwk ra.
Ungta naan arlakki ru kri nuwm mii ava mkheng ki suwk kurthuwk ra.
Mleija Mii Chapa rukka mii sok lo psuk ra kurjung pme, pdainu sok klou ra, ungu Mma rinkhu ngi mii knempok mdo ktlan nra kpii chra kurjung.”

Ungta mmaanni Jerikho arvang lamda; Mma ngi msiikhu rek leh kurtuwl mii mluwngpa tu kilṭhi ngi Jerikho thungki mkunsun in thungta, Timaju chapa Bartholomio tdit mmik ktot ava then kṭhil chra lam siirri ku ongda.
Nasareth ki Jisu tdit mma ngi maryaak thungta, “Devid, Chapa Jisu, Aplungnee mhai tdet cha!” dida ṭap da kthe pṭhun da.
Ungbi mii maknem mi rim kdi jiam dida rai chda; pdainu kheel set setti owng da ṭap da, “Devid Chapa, Aplungnee mhai tdet cha!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi rip da theda, “Va own in,ungu mmaanni mik ktot ava own lamda; plung apnet ra; erip, Jisu ngi ato ownna,” kdingi the pik lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mbuw hiil var pthii thida Jisu hin arva chen da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin khewl da, “Nah atummi tak ado ktlot pik ra angeija?” Ungbi mik ktot ava ngi theda, “Chukpu, khuw tdeera kngei chaakka.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Alam tha vang; ado rin chaakki kdam im pti.” ungta tun kat daatti mma ngi khuw deida, lam thung ngi Jisu dil ṭoi chda.
Ungta mmaanni Jerusalem mthlun tiing tiing inle, Bethphas leh Bethania ki kruwn tdit ava lown tha, Mma ngi siikhu rek knii haisii lamda,
ungu mhin inni theda, “Adusuk inki khuw ava thung ngi va lut in, naanni ahai thlun daat inle, ku mii khat lee ko on nma skowlraam suwn khat kpursuk daat dei naan di, aparthlet in ra arvan ṭhiin.
Ungta ku mii khat ti talu leiji aparthle inna dida mthe ta, ‘Mukpu ngi kriing da kbei sekki arhai pthla pinle ni kaan di’ kdingi athe pik in.”
Ungu mmaanni mhai lu in thungta, skowlraam suwn ava inn thurngot kpursuk daat da; mmaanni mparthle in thungta,
mbe tha krip daat rekki mhin inni theda, “Tak ktlo in pti, talu leiji skowlraam suwnna aparthle inna?”
Ungta mmaanni Jisu dothe heppi the lamda; ungbi rot pik lamda.
Ungu mmaanni skowlraam suwn ava Jisu paphaak lamda, mleen buw phat lam thida mleen Jisu ko ong da.
Ungta mii knempok ki lam thu buw phat lamda, angṭhe rek va bil thungki arnaa du lamda phat chlam da.
Ungta mdu leh mdil li kchet mii mkheng ngi owng lamda, “Hosana! Mukpu miing ngi kthleng Mma ava msuw kṭha!
O kparthaang sii ki Hosana! Nen ki npah in Devid Kruwngpaam kthleng slii meek Mma ava msuw kṭha,” kdi ngi the lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem thlung da, luwbuk Inn thu lut da,Mma ngi do mkheng loi da msut dok diltha, mukto dok leiji, sowm lei knii ṭhi da, Bethania tha va lamda.
Ungu mupduk nii ngi Bethania thungki mdil mkinlet in thungta, Jisua mpoi tham da.

Ungta raalpha khatti kduwt ding arnaa mhai dee thungta, thei kchui daat luwng rang mo kdingi va mer da, mhai phaak thungta marnaa kma donle do khat lee amme, mleija kduwt thei mchui na ki mkaal kurthuwk me.
Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Ku mii khat lee ngi aleen ki thei chaa purnowl mso.” Ungta Mma dothe ava siikhu rekki aryaa da.

Ungta mmaanni Jerusalem thlung lamda, Ungu Jisua luwbuk Inn thu lut da, luwbuk Inn thungki kren rek leh kjur rek ava rei pthii da, sum parthlen na tebol rek leh uṭhuw kjur rek ko onna longkhom mkheng kpurlup kparthel pṭhun da.
Ungu ku mii khat lee ngi luwbuk Inn thung ngi klut mdit mata kthuw ṭhi ro me.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni purchuk da theda, “Nei ki Inn na chati mkheng ki doṭhil chaak na Inn di nik di, dida mdo kjit dok pme mo? Pdainu naan va kuppru rek khur apurthuw pthiinna!”

Ungta thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki ava aryaa da; Jisu mdo ea kre nraan ki mlam thlaam lamda; mleija kurtuwl mii mkheng va Mma do purchu thung ngi ngak chlam da, ava leiji Mma ava ṭi lamda.
Ungu khuw mjiin rui rui thungta,mmaanni khuwpii ava thungki duwn thuwk lamda.
Mmaanni mupduk nii jiingsunni ava lam mṭoi in thungta, kduwt ding ava murjung kpha dekki kpurvui kcha dei lamda.
Ungbi Pitor ri Jisu do the bin paphaak da Mhin ni theda, “Chukpu, Asuw! Nah pauhur buk kduwt ding ava kpurvui kcha a!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin ni arthawng da, “Isowr hin arin cha.

Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ku mii khatti hava lown nang nga kurlou buk ra truwn thu kpurlup cha, dida plung kinṭheek liit kma thesora, mma dothe ava kurthuwk ra kdingi mrin chaak bi, ava kurthuw pik ra.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ktham chda ado ṭhil chaak in khim khaija, kphaak chaakka kdingi arin chaan,ungu naan do ra.
Ungta naanni kṭhil chra ari in mpha thu ado hal chaak in ku mii khat ma amta, ava aptlot pik in, ava mkurthutbi parwaan tha ka am apah in ruk va ado parma naan mkheng akuptlot pik chraan.”
Pdainu naanni aptlot pik maanbi, parwaan ki apah in ruk va apnu ton inna aptlot pik in nime.
Ungta mmaanni Jerusalem hanpha nowl lamda, Jisu ngi luwbuk Inn thung ngi mkurlon slii arlaanni thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rek, ungu kver rek Mhin thleng lamda.
Ungu mmaanni Mhin theda, “Hava mkheng nga talu rutan mdit mata ku ngi rutan apii da Nang va ado tlot?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji pau khat aju khewl inni ava atarthaan inbi Nei ruk va talu rutan thloi nu hava lea kdo tlot tdit athe pik ni kaan di.
“Baptis kuptlot Johon na parwaan ki mo mdit mata dulti mii rek thungki kthleng? Mhai arthawng in.”
Ungbi mmaanni msingreel inni karseel lamda, “Parwaan ki pi dida nthe inbi, talu leiji mma ava rin chmaan ti di donle kthe ra.
Pdainu nenni dulti mii rek thungki pi dida tithe raan mo?” mmaanni mii rek ṭi nowl lamda, mleija Johon na khulpu kindit kat pi dida mii rek va bin chda.
Ava leiji mmaanni Jisu hin, “Dei maan ring,” kdingi arthawng lamda. Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Ava mkurthut bi Nei ruk va talu rutanni hava lea kdo tlot tdit athe pik ni maan ring.”

Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni paupurtol rekki kthe pṭhun da. “Miilai khatti rik rou phunda, mukloi rowng tlot psuk da, mdii mdo sun nra khur kvel da, mbuk sa dok thida knum rek hin parlaan da, ava dilli paam khat tha pjiin chda.
Mpha mvee thungta, mmaan hinki rik rou thei mruk klou ra, knum rek hin sra owr khat hai sii da.
Ungbi mmaanni kjowng da bun lamthida, mjesang ngi sii pthii lamda.
Veikhat nowlli mma ngi msra owr khat va sii da, ungbi mma ruk mluw heem krep lamda mning kakjak rakki bun lam thida sii pthii lamda.
Khat mhai sii nowl thungta, eayou lamda, anto hep daatti mii murson knempok rukka, angṭhe bun lamda, angṭhe eayou lamda.
Mṭut na rel va, wonsat mdo lo chaak mchapa; ‘Hava lamchi mmaanni kakjat cha kro lam,’ kdingi hai sii da.
Pdainu knum rek va khat leh khatti the lamda, ‘Hava lamchi pipa; leen, mma ava aeyou in che, alrou mkheng nga nen ndo ra!’
Ungta mmaanni ṭhi lamda, aeyou lam thida, rik rou bil nowm be ngi var pthii lamda.
Rik rou bil kpupa va talu ktlo rang? Mma ngi thleng donle knum rek mkheng nga ki ae krep ra, ungu mbil ava ktlok mii hin kpii ra.
Hava Laaika ava naan ni pa maan ti:
‘Inn ksapa ngi mdo pthlei lung ava katti markil ki kcho bul kurthuwk;
hava Mukpu nong tlot; nenni tsut naan thu
kdung tnga chaak in pme mo’?”
Ungta mmaanni mdo kjown nra tlo lamda, pdainu kurtuwl mii rek ṭi lamda, mleija paupurtol mdo saam ava mmaan mdo rot nma tdit dei lamda; ava leiji mmaanni ma pthii da sun chlam da.
Ungta Pharisi mii rek angṭhe leh Herod mii rekki Mma pauna thu mdo pmen nraan arva lamda.

Ungu mmaanni Mhin thleng da the lamda, “Chukpu, Nah kindit tdit neenni kdee in, ku mii khat lee pre nang ngi tuk su mti; mleija mii nong puwk nang ngi kjat mti, pdainu Isowr lam mkindit purchuk tinu, Keisar hin khasna tpiik ava Nowlam do rot mo mdit mata do rot pme?
Neenni pii ni kaan mo pii ni maan ring?” Pdainu mmaanni kṭha do tlot mdo tlot in Jisu ngi dei da mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji atparsin naanna? Thiir sum khat mhai piin, suw lap ni.”
Ungu mmaanni khat arvan sin lamda. Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Hava ku do kjit ungu ku arlim da?” “Keisar,” kdingi mmaanni the lamda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Keisar do rek ava Keisar hin apiin, Isowr do rek ava Isowr hin apiin.” Ungbi mmaanna kdung ngi ngak chlam da.
Ungta kdiyou thungki kring kardel ame dida kthe Sadusi rekki Mhin thleng lamthida hanto pau khewl lamda,

“Chukpu, Mousi va hanto mikjit pik inda, mleija ku mii khat upa khatti snu lou da, nao kuplu cha kma laiji mnumei ma da mdiyo bi mnaopa ngi mnuwn ava lou donle mu u pa tummi naole kupluk pik ra di da.
Mpha khat thung ngi unao tikheu amda; u pa reeppi snu khat lou da nao khat lee kthloi cha mlaiji diyou chda.
Ungbi miknit na mnaopa ngi snu ava lou da, nao kthloi cha mlaiji diyou chnowl da, anto hep daatti mnaopa mukdum na ruk kurthuwk da;
ungu unao tikheu va nao khat lee thloi lamme, mṭut na rel thang va snu ava ruk diyou chda.
Ungta kring karheel nit thungva snu ava ku numei kurthuwk rang? Mleija mtikheu kheu inni mnumei in purthuw sap lamda.”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni ado parma naanna hava lei pme mo? Naanni Laaika rek daat don Isowr rutan daat don dei maan timo?
Mleija mmaanni kdiyou thungki mrin kardel in mpha thungva innknei snu klou daat don kphal don parwaan thang va ame, pdainu waan tamsii rek hep daat sap ra.

Kdiyou vi mrin kardellu, naanva Mousi Laaika ava pa maan timo,? Chanchiim mei kṭuwng mlei thung ngi mphel rek thu Isowr va tak heppi mthe,? ‘Nea Abraham ki Isowr, Isek ki Isowr, Jakob ki Isowr ava ping!’
Mma ava kdiyou ki Isowr pme pdainu kring ki Isowr; naanva aparma reen inna.”

Ungta Nowlam chukpu rek thungki kthleng khatti mmaan karteen ava aryaa da, Jisu ngi kṭha deekki mdo arthaan ava mdo dee leiji, mma ngi Mhin pau khat khewl da, “Paureen mkheng thungki ru kri ver ra talu da?”
Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Ru kri ver ava, ‘Aryaa, O Isreel: Nenki Isowr Mukpu ava, Mukpu khdaat.
Naanki Mukpu Isowr ava, aplung ril in mkheng, araothla in mkheng, ado bin in mkheng, ungu arutan in mkheng tu wonsat adolo raan.’
Miknit na ava hava, ‘Adaksaa lulu ngi aveen wonsat alo.’ Hava le kheelli klin paureen ame.”
Ungta Nowlam chukpu ngi Mhin theda, “Kindit deek im ti, Chukpu; Mma ava khdaat, Mma kma donle murson khat lee ame, diti kindit deekki athea.
Ungu Mma ava plung ril mkheng tu kurthlop tdee mkheng tu, rutan mkheng tu kurthloppi wonsat tulo ra, ungu ndaksaa heppi nveen wonsat tulo ra, ava pii da tlaai tdown mkheng kheel dek kurthuwk.”
Ungta mma ngi ksing ngi mdo arthaan Jisu ngi deida, mhin theda, “Nah Isowr Kruwngpaam thungki lam karlat mti.” Ava diltha ku mii khat lee ngi Mhin paukhewl nuwm me.
Ungta Jisu ngi luwbuk Inn thu kpurchukki theda, “Tak heppi Nowlam chukpu rek va Khrista ava Devid chapa pi mdo dit in da?
Devid mdak kat ruk va pthla kchiir tdaalli hanto tpandang da, ‘Mukpu ngi neiki Mukpu hin theda:
Nang arawlmii rek Neiji akhu ti ngi kthiik du khim khai,
Nei ku khut chang ktong tha ko ong cha.’
Devid mdak katti Mukpu dida mdo own; ava leiji tak heppi mma chapa kurthuwk rang da?” Ungu kurtuwl mii knempok ki kanpa kanpa ngi aryaa chlam da.
Ungta mdo purchu thu Mma ngi theda, “Phrik kturrown tu kchet nuwm, mii kurku na bajaar ktai thung ngi salaam kngei,
ungu synagog rek thung ngi longkhom kṭha kngeen, ungu kmaal thung ngi takjat mun kngeen, Nowlam chukpu rek ava cheek asin chaan.
Meikhu sra owr da,mi inn thuwnki lowngda ksaangpa ngi kṭhil cha do tlot ktlo mmaanni kheel sii ki mraal kpha chlam ra.”
Ungta Jisu ngi sumbuwr be ngi ku ong da, kurtuwl mii knempokki sumbuwr thung ngi sum mdo daal in ava suw rim da, suwang mii knempok va sum knem knemmi daal da.
Ungu sra meikhunuh khat kthleng va, ana khat pang lulu, thiir sum knii pang daal chda.
Ungbi Mma ngi msiikhu rek own da mhin inni theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava sra meikhunu ngi mkheng arlak va kheel sii ngi sum buwr thungva mdaal chaakka.
Mleija mii mkheng va mdo thloi knempok thungki mdo daal; pdainu mma va mdo thloi chaak suwn lou dek da mdaal chaakka.”
Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk Inn thungki mvan thuw thungta, Mma siikhu khatti Mhin theda, “Asuw, Chukpu, hava lung rekka tija thung ngi tnga chaak ndaat ki Inn rek kurthuwk daatta!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Nangva hava klin klin Inn rekka adea? Lung khat leenni khat kurtuwn daatti tden thung preva ma nime; mkheng kheng ngi kvar pthii ra.”
Ungu Mma ngi luwbuk Inn raalpha ki kruwn lown leen mku on thungta, Pitor, Jeems, Johon, ungu Andrija ngi tuprutti Mhin paukhewl chlam da.
“Hava tden thung rang, mhai the pik chaan? Hava nong rek mkheng mkurkhum nra titinna talu ka am rang da?”
Ungbi mhin inni Jisu ngi kthe pṭhun da, “Ku mii khat lee ngi lam lelee tha ado tiṭhi ma nraan, cheek kirsin chaan.
Nei kmiing ngi mii knempok thleng donle, ‘Nea Mma ping!’ di don kthe ra, ungu mmaanni mii knempok ava lam lele tha kṭhi ra.
Ungta naanni rawl rek leh rawl ki titi aryaak in mpha thu, plung kpurthlown maan; ru kri reeppi hava kthuwk ra, pdainu mṭut na rang ki ava pme.

Mleija paam khat ki mii ngi paam khat ki mii kahal chra, kruwngpaam khatti kruwngpaam khat kahal chra; mmun kteen thung ngi ringnaang kthuwk ra, poi tham ka am ra; pdainu hava ava nao kuplu rang ngi kdung kṭou heppi kupṭhun ra.

Pdainu adaksaan tuk asut dei chaan; mleija mmaanni karseel lop thu akṭhi raan; synagog rek thung ngi akbun raan, ungu Nei ktummi rinpaumin kuhur rangki paam kpu rek leh kruwngrek maiṭhuwm mi rip naan di.
Ungu kṭha paumin ava ru kri ngi chati rek mkheng thung ngi ado paryaam raan.

Ungta mmaanni akjowng in donle atparlaan pthiin mpha thu, mdu ngi ado the raan ava plung purdun psuk maan; pdainu mpha ava kat thung ngi ado the raan ava akpii chraan, mleija kpau rang nga naan ra ava pme; pdainu pthla kchiir ra.
Ungta unao khatti mu u mnao khat kdiyou rang ngi kparlaan pthii ra, mpah ngi mnao anto ktlo ra, ungu mnaole ngi mpah leh mnuh hal chdonle ke eayou ra.
Ungta Nei kmiing leenni naanna mii mkheng ngi asnuwm in nime. Pdainu mṭut na kpha dekki kdiil pchaang mii ava kaktlan pik ra.”
“Pdainu naanni tiṭit kirvei am liit nma ra mun thung ngi ka am ava adee in mpha thu ‘Kpa cha mii ngi adei pindi chaso’, Jihudia thu ka am rekki lown rek tha kchen ra;
innthlun leen ka am mii ruk va junṭum mso, mi inn thu lut da do khat lee lou mso;
bil thung ngi ka am mii ruk va mdo mna klou ra mdil kinle mso.
Mpha ava thu nao kuhur leh nao kakai snu rek ava tija thung ngi msuw kthi chdaat ta!
Phalbiw thung ngi mthuw ma nra aṭhil dei chaan!
Mleija ava nit rek thung ngi Isowr ri dultipaam kapṭhang mupṭhun daat ki kthuwk mlai ungu kthuwk nowl kma ra suwk thuw ava ka amra.
Ungta Mukpu ngi mnit rek muptoi pthii ma ngaallu, dulti mii ku khat lee pre ktlan nime; pdainu kchol da mdo pankai rek tummi mnit rekka mdo ptoi pthii.
Ungta naan hin ku mii khatti, ‘Asuw in, Khrista ava hava tha!’ mdit mata ‘Mma, va suw in!’ dida mtheen ta rin chmaan.
Kindit kma khrista rek leh kindit kma khulpu rekki titinna leh tnga na tdet donle, mrot khim khai thu mdo kchol dok rek ava lele tha kṭhi lamra.
Pdainu tuk kursut dei chaan; mpha ava marvan du ngi mkheng akthe pik dok inna.
“Pdainu nit rek ava thu, suwk kthuwk ava dil tha, kniw ngi kjiing chra, thla ngi mar awng pii nime,
parwaan ki bursi rek arjun ktla ra, ungu parwaan ki rutan rek kunchun ra.
Ungta Mii Chapa ava ngi armei thung ngi mrutan leh mlaarnee klin lang lang ngi kurjung mmaanni kdei lamra.
Ungu ava dil tha Mma ngi mtamsii rek sii donle, markil plii thungki mdo kchol Mma mii rek ava, dulti donna leh parwaan donna thungki kpurkuk ra.
“Kduwt ding ngi ekurchuk chaan. Kdowng deekki mbaak jamda, marnaa rek muksun daat le, kunjou kveija tdit naanni ado dee in.
Ava lulu ngi hava khim khai kthuwk adee inta, mpha knaija, paltong be ngi knai tekka, tdit naanni adei in.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava mkheng mthuw du khim khai hava charuwl ava maang nime.
Parwaan leh dultia kmaang chra, pdainu Nei kpauna rekka maang nime.
“Pdainu mnit mdit mata mṭhang ava ku khat lee ngi dei me, parwaan ki waan tamsii rek daat don, mdit mata Mchapa daat don deime, pdainu Mpah daatti kdeira.
Tuk asut inra, asuw pṭoi chaan; mleija mpha ava tden kurjung rang tdit naanni dei maan ti.
Ava miilai khatti kipjiin rang ngi, msra owr rek mii ktai hin mnong raan trat da, thurngot ksut pṭoiji kṭha ngi mdo sut pṭoi nra pau reen thida mi inn mada mipjiin chaak ava hep daat ra.
Ava leiji asut pṭoi dei chaan mleija inn kpupa ava tden kthlung rang tdit naanni dei chmaan ti, kjiing ngi, mdit mata thanṭim mi, mdit mata harkhuwn ni, mdit mata jiingsun kpanma ngi kthlung kro.
Mma ngi murjun tengle ki iip daatti ado tphaak ma nraan,
Neiji naan hin kdothe ava mii mkheng hin kdo the kurthuwk; asut pṭoi chaan.”
Tunva nii knii kursonni taplaanna ungu thowl taṭhaak ma thenpen kmaal amda. Ungbi thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki Jisu kjowng da mdo aeyo nraan tuprutti mlam thlaam lamda.
Mleija mmaanni theda, “Kmaal mpha thung rang pme, mleija mii rekki ro mdonle mikrai chraan.”

Ungta Mma ngi Bethania thu raaichii kthung Simon inn thung ngi tebol be ngi mukon daat arlaanni, snu khat kthleng ngi nard tdit reidii kchiir deek mmen klu lang lang mu uwm thu hurda, mu uwm ava pkui thida Jisu luw tun ptlong da.
Pdainu ava thu ka am mii angṭhe ngi plung kpur ri bin da msingreel inni theda, “Talu leiji reidiia mdo partlai kre da?
Mleija hava reidii ava dinari arjaa kdum kheelli jurda sra rek hin mdo piik chaak kro!” kdingi mmaanni snu ava psul chlam da.
Pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Mma ava mthi na ngi ama dok in; talu leiji mning apmul inna? Nei kihin kṭha deek nong mma va tlo imda.
Mleija sra rekka mpha ktai thu naanni ado am ṭhiin, ungu naanni abin khim khai thuwn kṭha tlot pik naan di; pdainu naanva Neia mpha ktai thu mthlop ni maan ti.
Mma ngi mdo pchaan ava mdo tlot; mma ngi Nei kdaksaa mdo pbul ava kukulruwl nra mdu ngi ktlo kurthuwk.
Ungta kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, dultipaam mkheng thung ngi kṭha paumin mkaryaam na thu, hava mma nong tlotta kbin paphaakki kthera.”
Sowm lei knii arlakki khat, Iskariot Juda ngi, Jisu mdo rotma ngi thiimpu kinreel rek hin va da.
Ungu mmaanni ava maryaak in thungta, kanpa lamda, ungu mhin sum mdo piik nraan paureel dok lamda. Ungu mmaan hin mma ngi kro kma ngi mdo parlaan nra mpha kcha ava thlaam da.

Ungta thowl ktaak thenpen kmaal mnii khat na thok, jao taplaan na ki tlaai kdown mpha thu, msiikhu rekki Mhin theda, “Tva tha msiin tidonle neenni chet da taplaanna amaal nrang nga purchuwl ni kaan da?”
Ungu Jisu ngi siikhu rek knii haisi da,ungta mhin inni theda, “Khuwpii thu va lut in, uwm thu dii kukdom miilai khatti aju kurdut ṭhi raan, mma dil aṭoi in,
ungu mma lu na inn kpupa hin atheen, ‘Chukpu, ngi theda, malli kthlunna innka ava tu ungda, ksiikhu rek tu taplaanna kmaal nrang nga tva thung rang da?’
Ungta mma ngi mdo purchuwl dok tun knung reep innka khat aktidet raan; ava thung ngi nen ntum raan apurchuwl in.”
Ungta siikhu rekki kurlou lamda khuwpii ava tha va lamda, ungbi Mma dothe pik heppi pha lamda; ungu ava thu taplaanna purchuwl chlam da.
Ungu khuw mjiin rui rui thungta, Mma ngi sowm lei knii rek tu ar vang lamda.
Ungta mmaanni tebol leen mmaal slii arlaan inni Jisu ngi mhin thaanni theda, “Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Neiji kdo maal ṭhi slii rek arlakki khatti mro nime.”
Ungbi siikhu rekka plung kja lang lang ngi, khat khatti Mhin the chlamda, “Nei ngaal mo?”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Mma ava sowm lei knii thung ki khat, Neiji arkuw thung ngi thenpen kdo puhuwm ṭhi slii ava ra.
Mleija Mii Chapa ava Mma mlei thung ngi mdo kjit dok heppi kchet ra, pdainu Mii Chapa kro kma mii ava tija thu msuw kthii chdaatta! Mleija mii ava tumva tu ṭou ṭouvi mṭou chaak mabi kṭha ra.”
Ungta mmaanni mmaal slii arlaanni, Mma ngi thenpen louda, ungu phowl kṭha parlaan da, ungta pkui thida them pik lamda, ungu theda, “Alou in; hava Nei kdaksaa.”
Ungta Mma ngi tong khat louda, mpanpaak dok dil tha mhin inni pii nowl da, mkheng inni nee sap lamda.
Ungu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Hava mii knempok tumra kdo pbuwk, paurina Nei ki kihii.
Kinditti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr Kruwngpaam ki ren ava kneek du khim khai, Neiji rik rou dii veikhat nee nowl ni maang.”
Ava diltha mmaanni laa thee lamda, kruwn lown tha hang lamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanna akheng inni tluw chtir naan di; mleija hanto kjit dok da, ‘Neiji jao krung prei nik di, ungu mjao rek ava kinvei tir chra.’
Pdainu Neiji krin kardel diltha, naan aduwnni Galil tha vang nik di.”
Pdainu Pitor ri Mhin theda, “Mmaan mkheng ktluw kurthuwk daat joso nea tluw ni maang.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, snii jaan kat ti harkhuwng ngi vei knii mkhuwn du ngi, nangva vei kdum mmat na di.”
Pdainu mma ngi kheel setti theda, “Nah adiyo ṭhi kma donle, amat ni maang.” Ungta mkheng inni anto the sap lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Getsamani tdit mun thung va lamda; ungu msiikhu rek hin Mma ngi theda, “Neiji kṭhil chaak slii arlaanni, hava thu eku ong daat in.”
Ungta Mma ngi Pitor, Jeems, ungu Johon ṭhi da, mun ava thung ngi kheel sii ki kja kakham pṭhun da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kdiyou daat rang ngi kraothla ava kja kcha a; hava thu am inra, mik khut ahar chaan.”
Ungu Mma ngi kla betti va kursown thida, dul leen tpee da ṭhil chda, “Mkurthut de rang ta, hava ṭhang nga mhai sown pik cha.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Abba, Apah, Nah ahinva mkheng nga kurthuwk lu; hava kihin ki tong ava mhailo pik cha; anto daat joso Nei kuplung bin rang pme, pdainu Nah aplung bin daat ra.”
Ungu Mma ngi marvan thungta, siikhu rekka ki iip daatti pha lamda, ungbi Mma ngi Pitor hin theda, “Simon ki iip slii daat im ti mo? ṭhang khat pang thung ngi mik khut har pchaang mti mo?
Kepthleem thu atlaak ma nraan, mik khut ahar inra aṭhil chaan; pthla va mngeenna pdainu daksaa va ksowlla.”
Ungta Mma ngi va nowl da mdo ṭhil ksa pauna ava hep daatti ṭhil chnowl da.
Ungu Mma ngi marvan thungta, ki iip daatti pha nowl lamda, mleija mmik inna kdung ngi rik da; mdo arthaan nraan dei chlam me.
Ungta mvei kdum na marvan thu, mhin inni theda, “Ki iip tlit daatti karnga in pti mo? Ko khoppa; ṭhang kvei dokka; Mii Chapa ava krokma mii ava ngi pnu ktong rek khut thu mparlaan dokka.
Ekardel in, vang in che; asuw in, mukrokma ava knaija!”

Ungta tun kat daatti,Mma ngi mpau slii daat arlaanni, sowm lei knii arlakki khat, Juda ava ngi thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek ungu kver rek hinki mii knempok ṭhi da, kaang ksaang leh kchung rek sin lamda thleng da.
Tunva krokma mii ava ngi titinna khat pii lamda theda, “Neiji miilai khat kdo put ra, Mma ava akjowng inra aseel psuk chaan.”
Ungu mma ngi arva da, “Chukpu!” kdingi theda, put da.
Ungta mmaanni khut kjownni kjowng lamda.
Pdainu krip daat rek arlakki khatti, mkaang ksaang maklee thungta, thiimpu kinreel suwk khat knaa sel buk da
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin thaanni theda, “Naanni kuppru hal chda kthleng lulu ngi, kaang ksaang rek leh kchung rek sin in ti mukukjowng ra kthleng in pti mo?
Nit kurnowlli luwbuk Inn thu kpurchuk ra aju am ṭhiinnu, ungu naan ruk va mukjowng maan ti. Pdainu Laaika mkurkhum na kurthuwk so.”
Ungta mkheng inni ma pthii lamda chen chtir lamda.
Ungta kseenao khatti mdona ktaakki buw laak khatti mdak kparyeel da, Jisu dil ṭoi da, ungbi mma ruk kjown kthen lamda.
Pdainu mbuw laak var pthii thida mchai daatti chen chda.
Ungta mmaanni Jisua thiimpu kparthaang hin ṭhi lamda; thiimpu kinreel rek, kver rek, Nowlam chukpu rek mkheng thuwk kurbuk lamda.
Ungu Pitor va lam karlatti, thiimpu kparthaang dulbuk kpha dekki mdil ṭoi da; ungta kseel mii rek tu mdak kpurlum ra mei tur oida ku ong lamda.
Tunva thiimpu kinreel rek leh karseel lop mkheng ngi Jisu rinpaumin kro kma ngi, mdo eayo nraan ki mlam thlaam lamda; pdainu mmaanni khdaat pre pha lamme.
Mleija Mma krokma ngi mii knempokki kindit kma sakhi pii lamda, pdainu mdo theenna kinṭim sii me.
Ungta Mma krokma mii angṭhe ngi rip da kindit kma sakhi hanto pii lamda,
“Neenni Mma do the karyaak in, ‘Khut do sak hava luwbuk Inn ava Neiji ea krep thi nik donle, khut do sak ma khat nowl nii kdum thung ngi Neiji sa nik di’ dida theda.”
Ava daat ruk va mrinpaumin mdo theenna kinṭim siime.
Ungta mṭim merri thiimpu kparthaang ngi rip da, Jisu hin paukhewl da, “Nang va arthawng nim ti mo? Hava mii rekki arin paumin mdo rot maanna talu lei da?”
Pdainu Mma ngi karthawng kma rim kdi am chda. Veikhat nowlli thiimpu kparthaang ngi Mhin paukhewl da, “Nah suw kṭha Chapa Khrista pti mo?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Nei ping; Mii Chapa ngi ru ktang chang ktong tha ku ong donle, parwaan ki armei thu kurjung nang ngi dei na di.”
Ungta thiimpu kparthaang ngi mdona jen thida theda, “Talu lei nenni sakhi murson ta thlaam raan da?
Isowr kjowm cha ngi mpau pda naanni aryaak sap inna. Naanva tak heppi areel inna?” Mkheng inni mdo aeyo nuwm lei inni psul sap lamda.
Mii angṭhe va mleen ptil kbal kupthot pṭhun da, mmai kuhuwm lamda, prei lamda, “Apurphuwng,” kdingi the lamda. Ungu kseel rek va tuthuw chlam da.
Ungta Pitor ri dulbuk thu ma am daat arlaanni, thiimpu kparthaang sra owr snu miilai khatti;
Pitor ri mei mdo tur oi dei da, mhin suw rim thida theda, “Nang rukka Nasareth ki Jisu ava dil kṭoi pti.”
Pdainu mma ngi mat da, “Nah ado thea neiva tdee dee ngi dei maang kdei ruk kurthuwk maang,” dida theda. Ungta mma ngi paltong lam ktong tha vang thuwk da.
Ungta sra owr snu ava ngi dei da, ungbi mbe ngi krip daat rek hin theda, “Hava miilai rukka mmaan arlakki khat,” dida kthe pṭhun nowl da.
Pdainu mma ngi mat nowl da. Ungta ma am bongle mbe ngi krip daat rekki Pitor hin the nowl lamda, “Ksoi liit kma nang rukka mmaan arlakki khat munna; mleija nang rukka Galil mii pti.”
Pdainu mma ngi mdaksaa kartham da kthe pṭhun da, “Naan do the hava Miilai ava neiji dei chliit maang.”

Ungta tun kat daatti harkhuwng ngi mvei knit na khuwng da. Ungbi Pitor ri Jisu pauthe ava bin phaak da, “Harkhuwng ngi vei knii mkhuwn du ngi nangva vei kdum mro nim ti.” Ungu mma ngi mning ksiinni ṭap da.
Ungta jiingsun mpha mvee daat le, thiimpu kinreel rekki, kver rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek, ungu karseel lop mkheng tu kurkuk lamda, karkhal nlamda; ungu Jisua bowl lamthida Pilat hin parlaan lamda.
Ungta Pilat ti Mhin paukhewl da, “Nah Jihudia rek Kruwng pti mo?” Ungbi Mma ngi mhin arthawng da, “Nah dothe ava ping.”
Ungu thiimpu kinreel rekki do knempokki mraal pii lamda.
Ungta Pilat ti Mhin paukhewl nowl da, “Nangva arthawng nim ti mo? Asuw, mmaanva akro kma ngi tija thu araal atpiik lamma.”
Pdainu Jisu va do khat lee arthawng purjom me, ava leiji Pilat ta ngak chda.
Tunva kmaal lu kchok thungva rowng inn thungki mmaan do ngei miilai khat khat mdo pthuw kcholu.
Ungta rowng inn thung ngi, paam kurlownni mii ke eayou, jai klah rek arlakki, Barabas tdit miilai khat amda.
Ungu kurtuwl mii rekki Pilat hin hang lamda, chodu chodilli mdo pthuw kcho nopa ava mdo tlot pik nlam ra kaktham pṭhun lamda.
Ungbi mma ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Naan tummi jehudia rek kruwng kdo pthuw ra angei inna?”
Mleija thiimpu kinreel rek kheithe ngi Mma ava mhin mdo parlaan in tdit deida.
Pdainu makchang ra Barabas mdo pthuw nra, thiimpu kinreel rekki kurtuwl mii rek ksop lamda.
Ungta Pilat ti mhin inni the nowl da, “Ava mkurthut tu naanni Jihudia rek Kruwng ado dit in Mma ava neiva tak pardit nik di?”
Ungbi mmaanni owng nowl lamda, “Mma ava khros leen apthoi.”
Ungu Pilat ti mhin thaanni theda, “Talu lei, Mma va talu kṭha kma mtlot da?” Pdainu mmaanni kheel set setti owng lamda, “khros leen apthoi.”
Ava leiji Pilat ti kurtuwl mii rek plung pngam nuwm da, mtum raan Barabas pthuwk thida; Jisua mmeel kthii lang lang ngi bun da khros leen mdo pthoi nraan mma ngi mhin inni parlaan da.
Ungta rawlmii rekki Mma ava rawlmii ki lusang mun thu ṭhi lamda; ungu rawlmii kunpun lop mkheng own purkuk lamda.
Ungu mmaanni kning ngi ksen phrik kturrown pnaak lamda, ungu tarliing teher luwkhum pkhum lamda.
Ungta mmaanni luwbuk lamda, “Jihudia rek Kruwng roi ksotti ring cha,” kdingi kthe pṭhun lamda.
Ungta mmaanni riijei khatti mluw tha prei lamda, mleen ptil kbal pthot lamda, ungu mning er inni pkhup pi tardiil lamda, luwbuk lamda.
Ungta mmaanni mipnii chaak dok dil thaan, kning ngi ksen phrik kturrown ava khowk pthii lam thida, mdaksaa dona pihiil lamda. Ungu khros leen mdo pthoi nraan ṭhi lamda.
Ungu mmaanni Syrini ki Alekjander leh Ruphas pah Simon, paam khat ki kipjiin kthleng cha, mma ava Jisu khros kukdom ṭhi ra pnam psuk lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Jisua Golgotha ‘Luwruh kdimna mun’ ava thang ngi hanṭhi lamda.
Ungu mmaanni myrrh tdit doi ava tu tpurchuwm ju pii lamda, pdainu Mma va nee me
Ungta mmaanni khros leen pthoi lamda, mdo mna them lamda, ku ngi tak kphang chrang kdingi pchel piik sut nlam da.
Ungu mmaanni khros leen mupthoi in mpha thungva ṭhang kdum ktla.
Ungu Mma kusnuwm kma ngi, “Jihudia rekki Kruwng,” kdingi kjit lamda.
Ungta Mma tu kilṭhi ngi, kuppru rek miilai knii, khatti mchang ktong tha khatti mlee ktong tha pthoi kthen lamda.
Laaika mkurkhum na ngi theda, “Mma ava pnu ktong rek tu tai kthen da.”
Ungu mbe ngi kurlon rekki mluw in hai lamda ning er ri hanto the lamda, “Eh! luwbuk Inn ea krep thida nii kdum daat thung ngi ksa rang daat lo!
adaksaa kartlan ra khros leen ki arjung ṭum lo!”
Anto lulu ngi thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki kipnii chaakki khat leh khatti the lamda, “Mma va mii ktlokka ktlen thida, mdaksaa ava kartlan pchaang me.
Isreel rek Kruwng Khrista ava ngi khros leenki tun tunni arjung ṭum so, mbi ava kdeiji neenni rin chnikaan di!” Ungta Mma tu khros leenni kukthoi vee rek ruk va ning er pau the psuk lamda.
Ungu ṭhang truk mphaak thungta, ṭhang tku kpha dekki, paam mkheng nga pum jiing ngi jiing chda.
Ungta ṭhang tku mphaak le Jisu ngi krowl kparyaa ngi owng da, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabath thani?” Ava ki mleija “Nei ki Isowr, Nei ki Isowr, talu lei Neia atmaak pthia?”
Ungbi mbe tha krip daat mii angṭhe ngi aryaa thida the lamda, “Asuw in, Mma ngi Elija mo ownna.”

Ungu marlak inni krip daat miilai khatti chen teng da, buwphown ava ju kdor thung ngi puhuwm thida, kchung leen daar da mdo neek ra mhan piik chunni theda, “Ardaan, Elija ngi arjung ṭum don kupṭum sik rang mo suw lap in che.”
Ungta Jisu ngi krowl kparyaa ngi owng thida, mṭut na tdaal ṭen chda.
Ungu luwbuk Inn thungki buwkhaar ava karthak ki ngi kurdu kpha karjen bak chda.
Ungta Mma maiṭhuwm mi krip daat rawlmii rek arlakki klin khatti, Jisu ngi mṭut na tdaal ṭen da mdiyo ava mdee thungta, theda, “Kindit katti hava Miilai ava Isowr Chapa thide!”
Ungu lam kla ngi snu rek angṭhe ngi sut pṭoi da, marlak inki ava Magdaleni Mery, Jeems naopa Josi nuh Mery, Salomi,
mmaanni Galil paam ki kupṭhunni mdil ṭoi lamda Mhin sok lo pik chlam da. Ungta Jerusalem kpha ngi Mma dil kṭoi snu rek ava mii knem pok.
Ungta khuw jiing rui rui da, sabath nit ava du ngi mdo purchuwl naan mkurthut leiji,
Isowr Kruwngpaam kurjung ra ksuw pṭoi cha, karseel lop thungki takjat kirvei miilai khat Arimathia ki Joseph pi, plung kta ngar ri, Pilat hin va da, Jisu kluwng ṭhil chda.
Ungu Pilat ti kdiyou dok maryaak thungta, ngak chda; rawlmii klin khat hin kdiyou dok mo, kdingi khewl da.
Ungta mma ngi rawlmii klin khat hinki kdiyou dok maryaak dilli, Jisu kluwng ava Joseph hinni mdo piik nra rot pik da.
Ungu mma ngi plabuw ktarnaal dang ren da, han pṭum da, plabuw ktarnaal dang ngi klum thida, lung kreu da mdo vu thlaan khat ava thung ngi pi iip da; ungta thlaan thurngot ava lung khatti arkam da.
Ungu Magdaleni Mery leh Josi nuh Mery va mdo pi ii naanna dei chlam da.
Ungu sabath nit mvee dok thungta, Magdaleni Mery leh Jeems nuh Mery ungu Salomi, mmaanni mdo pbul chaak raan reidii mikrim kdi lang lang ren lamda.
Ungta mmaanni hapta ki mnii khat na thok, jiingsun kpanma ngi, kniw mthuw ser ser leh thlaan tha va lamda.
Ungu mmaanni khat leh khatti hanto the lamda, “Thlaan thurngot lung nga ku ngi mi kpurlu pik chraan da?”
Ungta mmaanni thlaan mhan sut in thungta, mleija lung ava kpurlup dok da.
Ungu mmaanni thlaan thung ngi mvan luwn thungta, dona kpowl dang ngi kirsim tartlaang nao mchang ktong tha kukong daat dei lamda; ungbi ngak chlam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin thaanni theda, “Ngak maan, khros leen mdo pthoi yown Nasareth ki Jisu kthlaam in pti. Mma kardel dok, hava thung ngi Mma ame; mmaan do pi ii na mun ava asuwn.
Pdainu vang inra, msiikhu rek leh Pitor hin Mma ava mdu inni Galil tha kvang nga adi inra athe pik chaan; Mma ngi mdo the dok heppi, ava tha naanni tdee pha chnaan di.”
Ungbi mmaanni thlaan thungki kurlou lamda vang lamda; mleija mmaanna kunchun lamda ngak chlam da; ungta mṭit lei inni ku mii khat lee hin pau khat lee song lamme.
Tunva hapta ki mnii khat na thok jiingsun kpanma ngi mrin kardel mpha thu, tarnam tikheu mdo rei pthii pik, Magdaleni Mery hin ru kri ver ri ktardet da.
Ungbi kurnung karbaang da kṭap mma miiṭhi rek hin vang da song chda.
Pdainu snu mdak katti kring karheel dok, ungu kdee chaak pi dida mthe kpha thu rin chlamme.
Hava dil tha Mma ngi mrungchen kartleiji knii rek hin ktardet da, mleija mmaanna mkhuwpaam thuwnni chet meek lamda.
Ungbi mmaanni mdil in kinle lamda mmiiṭhi rek hin song lamda, pdainu mmaanni rin chlamme.

Ava dil tha sowm lei khat rekki tebol be ngi mu kon daat arlaan inni Mma ngi mhin inni ktardet da; muplung ril in kapchai ungu mdo rin de maan leiji Mma ngi rai chlam da, mleija mrin kardel dok dil tha, mmaanni kdei rek pauson ava rin chlamme.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Dultipaam mkheng thu echet inra, dulti mii rek mkheng hin kṭha paumin aparyaam in.
Ku mii khatti rin chda baptis mtlot bi, ava kaktlan pik ra, pdainu krin kma mii ava mraal kpii ra.
Ungu krin cha mii rek hin va Nei kbii tinna ngi kthlop lamra: Nei kmiing ngi tarnam rek krei pthii lamra; plei ren ni kpau lamra;
mmaanni pruwl rek chom da, ungu diyo na doi knee kurthuwk lam joso, sul kurnul lam nime; mmaanni kukoi rek leen mkhut kikhiing lamra, ungta mii rek kapdam lamra.”
Ava dilli Mukpu Jisua, mmaan hin pau msaam dok dil thang ngi, parwaan tha hungkal chda, ungu Isowr chang ktong tha ku ong da.
Ungta mmaanni mmun ktai thu chet lamda paryaam lamda, mmaan thung ngi Mukpu ngi nong mtlot khim khai thu, paumin ava titinna rekki tipnet pik lamda. Amen.
Mrot khim khai thu mii knempok ki nenni tup ṭut dok in mkheng hot na lamda,
mupṭhun daat ki mikki sakhi kurthuwk rek ungu pauna ktlo rekki nen nhin inni mido tparlaan in heppi,
nei ktum rukku kṭha kurthuwkka, mpha mruk karvang dok thung ngi, do mkheng nga knai tekki pṭoi chnu, kheel sii ngi kinreel Theophilas nah atumra, parnaak jik nu akikjit pikka,
hava le mlei thung ngi nah do aryaak dok mkindit ava ado dee ra. s1 Baptis Kuptlot Johon ṭou nra mdo Thethut
Judia ki kruwng Herod nit rek thung ngi,Abija rilam thungki mmiing Sakharija tdit thiimpupa khat amda; Ungta Aron chanu mmiing Elijabeth tdit mnu mei khat thloi da.
Ungta mikniing inni Isowr maiṭhuwm thung ngi rinkindit ti am lamda, paureen rek mkheng thu chet lamda, ungu karmang deekki Mukpu Nowlam pṭoi lamda.
Pdainu nao khat lee thloi chlamme, mleija Elijabeth ta nao kuplu kma kurthuwk da, mikniing inni mkum inna der chlam da.
Tunva thiimpu khat kurthuwk ki Isowr maiṭhuwm mi luwbuk Inn thu mnit ki sok mlo chaak slii arlaanni hanto thuwk da.

Thiimpu rekki mdo tlot kcho in nopa khat pchel piik msut in thungta, Mukpu luwbuk Inn thung ngi mikrim kdi rei dii lulu kṭong ava kapkaa rang nga mma kchol lamda, ungbi mma ngi Mukpu luwbuk Inn thu van lut da.
Ungta kurtuwl mii rek mkheng ava mma ngi mikrim kdi reidii kṭong mapkaak arlaanni duwn tha ṭhil chlam da.
Ungta mikrim kdi reidii kṭong mdo pkaak naan kchiir suwlbuwr chang ktong tha Mukpu waan tamsii khat rip da mhin ktardet da.
Ungu Sakharija ngi Mma mdee thungta, kdung ngi piir da ṭi chda.
Pdainu waan tamsii ngi mhin theda, “ṭi ma Sakharija! Ado ṭhil chaakka ataryaak pikka, ungta anumei Elijabeth ti chapa khat akuhur pik ra, ungu mmiing ava Johon di nadi.
Ungta plung ngam mi kanpa ndi, ungu mma ṭou nitti mii knempok ki kanpa chra.
Mma ava Mukpu maiṭhuwm mi klin lang lang kurthuwk ra, mma ngi rik rou dii knee mata kipri tlo nime; mnuh poi thungki kupṭhun ni pthla kchiir ri pum dimmi kdim chra.
Ungta mma ngi Isreel nao rek mii knempok ava, mmaan ki Isowr Mukpu ktong tha kpinle ra.

Ungta Mdu sukki Elijah ki rutan leh pthla ngi kvangra, Mpahle ngi mnaole hin plung mdo pinlet nra ungta, pau kleek rek ava kindit lousing ktong tha kṭhii ra, Mukpu ktongtha mii rek kurchuwl nra kpurthlon pik ra.”
Ungbi Sakharija ngi waan tamsii hin theda, “Tak heppi neiva hava dei nik da? Mleija neia kder kcha ping, ungu knumei rukka kum kder cha.”
Ungta waan tamsii ngi mhin arthawng da, “Neia Isowr am na thung ngi krip Gabriel ava ping; hava kṭha paumin ahin ksin ra, ungu ksong ra Neia mdo tsi.
Ungta asuw, havale mvee dok du khim khai, rim kdi am chna di, pau dei nim ti, mleija mmaan mpha thu kurkhum rang ki Nei kpauna rek ava rin cha mti.”
Ungta mii rek va Sakharija arda daat lamda, luwbuk Inn thung ngi mukto dok leiji mmaanna ngak chlam da.
Ungu mma ngi duwn tha marvan thuw thungta, mhin inni pau chip pchaang mda, ungbi luwbuk Inn thung ngi mik kleng mun na kdi ngi bin lamda; ungta mhin inni khutti partam da mpau kthuwk kma ngi am chda.
Ungu msoklo ava mṭut thungta mma ngi mi inn tha vang da.
Hava nit dil tha mnumei Elijabeth ti nao hur da, ungu thla parnga lik thung ngi kurdowl da, theda,
“Hanto Mukpu ngi mbom chda, mii rek do sut na thung ki ning kja mlo pthii pik chda.
Thla truk diltha waan tamsii Gabriel li Isowr hinki Galil ki Nasareth khuwpii tha Pthla ngi siida.
Devid charuwl thungki mmiing Joseph mdo dit pselpa khat ava ngi mmiing Mery tdit ktlang dang snu ava hin inn thlot dok da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin arjungda theda, “Kdaai am so, O mdo san khat nang, Mukpu ngi atṭhia!”
Pdainu mma ngi kdung plung pja da theda, hava mdo turvuija talu lei ki da kdingi plung ngi bin da.
Ungta waan tamsii ngi mhin theda, “ṭi ma, Mery, Isowr dosan nang ngi aphaak chaakka.
Ungu asuw, apoi thung ngi nao hur ti don Chapa khat plu na di, ungta mmiing ava Jisu di na.
Mma ava klin langlang ra, Ungu kparthaang sii ki Chapa kdira; ungta Mma hin Mukpu Isowr ri, mpah Devid ko onna Mhin kpii ra,
Ungta Mma ngi Jakob charuwl tunni kṭuw knai kma kpaal ra; ungu Mma Kruwngpaam ava kṭuw tdit amnime.”
Ungbi Mery ngi waan tamsii hin theda, “Hava tak heppi kurthuwk rang, neia innpu kdo thloi mak pa?”
Ungta waan tamsii ngi mhin theda, “Pthla kchiir nah aleen kurjung ra, ungu kparthaang sii rutan ava ngi aju kupkhum ra; ava leiji Isowr Chapa Kchiir nao khat plu nadi.
Ungta asuw, nah arilam kthuwk snu khat Elijabeth ruk va kum mder chaak dil thang ngi mma ngi nao mdo hur ava hava ngi mthla truk na a.
Mleija Isowr hinva kurthuwk kma ra do khat lee ame.”
Ungbi Mery ngi theda, “Asuw, neia Mukpu ki khut do seem sra owr khat ping; Nah pauna dil kṭoiji ki hinni kurthuwk so,” Ungta mma hinki waan tamsii ava sunda.
Ava nit rek dil tha Mery ngi kardel da Judia khuwpii khat mulpaam tha kuknotti vangda.
Ungta mma ngi Sakharija inn thu lut da Elijabeth arvui chda.
Ungu Mery do arvui Elijabeth ti maryaak thungta, mpoi thung ki nao ava kunchowm da, ungu Elijabeth ta pthla kchiir ri dim chda.
Ungbi mma ngi kdung owngda, theda, “Nah snu rek arlakki asuw kṭha, ungu apoi thungki thei ava msukṭha!
Ungta talu leiji hava ado trot pikda, ditta neiki Mukpu nuh ava ngi nei kihinni athlen daatta?
Mleija asuw, nah do arvui chaak kaknaa thung ngi mthlen daat le, kpoi thungki nao ava mkanpatti kunchowm da.
Ungta Mukpu hinki pau ava kurkhum ra dida krin cha mii ava msukṭha.”
Ungta Mery ngi theda,
“Kraothla ngi Mukpu panpaak da,
Ungu kapthla ngi nei makaktlan pik Isowr panpaak chda,
mleija ktuwl kcha Mma ki sra owr nei ava msut pik chda.
Mleija asuwn;
tun ki kupṭhunni charuwl mii mkheng ngi
asuwkṭha a,
di donle mo ko own chra.
Mleija mruktang Mma ava ngi nei ktummi,
klin lang lang nong mtlot pik da,
Ungta Mma miing ava Kchiir kurthuwk.
Ungta Mma plungnee ava Mma kṭi charuwl rek
khat thungki ngi,
charuwl khat kpha ngi
am da.
Mkhut ti Mma rutan ava tdet da,
ungta plung ngi purdun susu kpohok mii rek ava,
Mma ngi kpinvei pthii ra,
rutan kthloi rek ava Mma ngi mkon naan thungki kupchowm pthiira,
ungta kchowm langlang ngi ka am rek mii ava kikhiing ra.
Poi ktham rek ava do kṭha ngi papa da ungu,
suwang rekka ktlong ngi sii pthiida.
Mma ngi muplungnee mdobin phaak leiji,
msra owr Isreel bomda,
Mleija nenki npah le hin mdo the heppi,
Abraham leh mma charuwl rek hin tha kṭuw knai kma ngi mdo the!”
Mery ngi thla kdum arveelli Elijabeth am ṭhi da, thida mi inn tha vang kinle da.
Tunva Elijabeth ti nao mdo pluk na ki mpha arvang da, chapa khat mma ngi pluda.
Ungta Mukpu plungnee klin langlang mma hin mdo tdet ava mrilam kthuwk rekki maryaak in thungta, mma tu kilṭhi ngi kanpa chlam da.
Ungta mnii tret na ngi nao ava vunmor kreen ra arva lamda. Ungu mpah miing kdu jikki mmiing ava Sakharija di lam donle mdo thowl raan,
Pdainu mnuh ngi theda, “Anto rang pme Johon dida ti the raan.”
Ungbi mmaanni mhin the lamda, “Nah arilam thu miing kuhur ku khat lee ktaak pa.”
Ungta mmaanni mpah hin partam lamda mmiing ava ku rangda kdingi khewl lamda.
Ungu mma ngi mdo kjit nra phel khat ṭhil lamda, ungu kjit da, “Mmiing ava Johon ra.”
Ungta tun kat daatti mner kparvang da, ungu miplei kurkol da, mma ngi Isowr panpaak da theda,
ungta mveen rek mkheng ngi ṭi lamda. Ungta Judia mulpaam mkheng thung ngi hava ki pau ava karvel da.
Ungta karyaa mii rek mkheng ngi muplung in thung ngi arkhii lamda, the lamda, “Hava naova tak hep kdu lu rang ki da?” Mleija Mukpu khut ti mma ava ṭhida.
Ungta mma pah Sakharija ava Pthla kchiir ri dim chda,
pauphuwng da theda,
“Isreel Mukpu Isowr ava msuw kṭha,
mleija mmii rek kaktlan pik rang ngi velda.
Ungta Mma sra owr Devid inn thu,
nen ntum raan tkirliin nraan ki,
arkii khat mi sin khiin pik inda.
Alraang ki kchiir khulpu rek nerri tipthe thuw dok da.
Nen mi kusnuwm kma rek thungki,
mi kaktlan pik raan,
ungu nen mikipder chaan thungki;
nen npah le hin plungnee
ki chii mdoreel dok ava ktlo ra,
Mma ngi Kchiir paurina ava mdo bin phaak na ngi,
nenki npah in Abraham
hin pau ava mdo reel dok,
nen ava kusnuwm kma rek khut thungki mi do tak ktlan pik dok in,
kṭi liit kma Mma sok talo chaak nraan,
Nenki rinkhu nit rek mkheng thu kseeng deek,
rinkindit deekki ta am nraan kurthuwk.
Ungta nao, nah,
kparthaang sii khulpu di donle ako own ra;
mleija Mukpu maiṭhuwm mi chet ti don,
Mma lam purchuwl pik nadi.
Mma mii rek hin mupnu
ton in mdo ptlot pik naki tkirliinna lousing kpii ra,
kparthaang hin ki nit rek ava nen nleen murjun tlaak mpha thu,
nenki Isowr plungnee thu,
kjiingnu leh kdiyou arlim thung ngi,
kuk ong mii rek hin mar awng kpii rangki,
ungu kdaai lam ava thu nen nkhu in mikpii kchaan kurthuwk.”
Ungta nao ava ruktang ngi pthla ngi lin saang da, ungta mma ngi Isreel mii rek hin maktardet na ki nit mphaak du khim khai kbowklaiji am chdaat da.
Mpha ava thu Akastas Keisar ri dultipaam mii mkheng ngi miing mdo plu nrangki pau pṭum da.
Kuirinia ki Syria paam kpu mkurthut thu hava miing kuplut ava mkhat na thok da.
Ungta mii mkheng ngi miing kuplut ra mpaam mpaam ki khuwpii tha miing kuplut ra chet lamda.
Ungta Joseph ruk ka Galil ki Nasareth khuwpii thungki, Bethlehem mdo dit, Devid khuwpii judia tha hang da, mleija mma ava Devid rilam ungu mphungka ruk kurthuwk da.
Mma ngi inn mdo thlot dok, nao kuhur daat, Mery ṭhida mmiing in kuplut ra hang lamda.
Ungta mmaanni ava tha ma am daat arlaanni Mery nao pluk naki mpha ava vei da.
Ungta Mery ngi ru kri reep ki mchapa ava plu da, ungu Nao ava buw laak thung ngi klum da, sil arkuw thung pi iip da, mleija mthlun nraan inn ktlong ame.
Ungta ava paamkowl tha bil thung ngi jao krung rek am lamda, mjao in arkhii lamda, jaanni sut pṭoi lamda.
Ungu Mukpu waan tamsii ngi mhin inni ktardet da, Mukpu laarneiji tkhul dok lamda, ungbi kdung ngi ṭi lamda.
Ungta waan tamsii ngi mhin inni theda, “ṭi maan, mleija asuwn, mii mkheng thung ngi ka am ra klin langlang ki kṭha pauren naan hinni kurjun hurra.
Mleija snii ngi Devid khuwpii thung ngi kaktlan rang ki khat Mukpu Khrista ava kṭouva.
Ungta hava ngi naan do tinna kurthuwk ra: Naanni nao kdowng khat buwlaak suwnni klum da, sil arkuw khat thung ngi ki iip daat pha naan di.”
Ungta tun kat daatti Waan tamsii tu kilṭhi ngi parwaan ki kurtuwl mii rekki Isowr panpaak da, ungu laa the lamda,
“Kparthaang sii ki Isowr hin tha kunlor,
ungu dultipaam thu Mma ngi plung mdo pngam Mma mii rek arlakki kdaai am so!”

Waan tamsii rekki parwaan tha mmaan hinki mhunkal dok in thungta, jao krung rekki khat leh khatti the lamda, “Nen ni Bethlehem tha hang in chera, kthuwk nong Mukpu ngi mido tithe pik in ava suw inche.”
Ungta mmaanni kuknotti mhan in thungta, Mery leh Joseph pha lamda, ungu sil arkuw khat thung ngi nao kdowng ava iip daat da.
Ungta mmaanni ava mdee in thungta, hava nao mlei thung ngi mdo the pik lam ava song chlam da.
Ungta karyaa mii mkheng nga jao krung rek pau sonni ngak chlam da.
Pdainu hava le mkheng nga Mery ngi muplung ril thung ngi purdun da arkhii da.
Ungta jao krung rekki mdil kinle lamda, mmaan hin mdo son pik lam, mdo aryaak in mkheng leh mdo dee in ava leiji kanpa ngi Isowr panpaak chlam da.
Ungta Mma ava vunmor mdo reen nrang ki mnii tret na mphaak thungta, Mma ngi mnuh poi thung ngi ma am du liitti Waan tamsii ngi miing mdo the dok, Jisu dida thowl lamda.
Ungta Mousi Nowlam dil kṭoiji kartleu naki mpha marvan thungta, Jisua Mukpu hin mdo piik nraan ki Jerusalem tha hanṭhi lamda.
(Mukpu Nowlam thung ngi mdo kjit dok lulu ngi, “Ru kri ver ri poi thungki mdo pluk pselpa khim khaija Mukpu hin kchiir kdi lamra.”)
Mukpu Nowlam do the dil kṭoiva, tlaai kdownni mdo piik chaak ra ava “Uṭhuw sik khat mata msuwn knii rek ra.”
Tunva Jerusalem thung ngi miilai khat mmiing Simion tdit amda, hava miilai ava rinkindit ungu plung klut langlang, Isreel kaktlan pik rangki mlam ksuw chdaat, mma ava pthla kchiir ri mleen dim chda.
Ungta Mukpu Khrista ava mdee du ngi mma ngi kdiyou dei nime dida pthla kchiir ri mhin the pik da.
Ungta pthla do kso dil kṭoiji mma ava luwbuk Inn thu arva da; mleija mhin ni Nowlam ki nopa dil kṭoiji ava ktlora nao Jisu ava mnuh leh mpah ngi arhan ṭhi lamda.
Mma ngi mbaanni Jisua kdom thida, Isowr panpaak da theda,
“Mukpu, Nah apauna dil kṭoiji,
tunva Nah asra owr ra kdaaiji sun chaso;
mleija nei kmik ki Nang ki kirliing ava kdee chaakka,
mii mkheng awng ngi ado purchuwl dok,
Ktlok chati rek hin mar awng khatti ado phuwn,
ungta Nah amii Isreel rek laarnee na kurthuwk.”
Ungta mnuh leh mpah ava Mma mlei thung ngi mdo the ava ngi ngak chlam da;
ungta Simion ni phowl kṭha parlaan lam thida, mnuh Mery hin theda, “Asuw, hava naova ktluw rangki ungu Isreel mii knempok kpardel rangki ngi mdo sii, ungta titinna khat tummi mraal ka amra.
(Ungta nah aplung rukka kchei khat do thun heppi kthuwk ra), ava ngi mii knempok plung binna ktidet ra.”
Ungta Anna, tdit Phanuel chanu, Asher chati thungki khulpi khat amda; mma ava kdung ngi der chda, inn mnei daat ki mi innpu tung ngi kum tikheu daat paal ve chlam da,
ungu meikhunu khatti kum som tret lei plii kpha dok kurthuwk da. Mma ava luwbuk Inn thung ki sun liit me, suwn leh jaanni then mdo ngowl tu kilṭhi ngi luwbuk chda.
Ungta ṭhang ava kat thung ngi arhang da Isowr panpaak chda, ungu Jerusalem mdo ktlan pik nrangki tummi mlam ksuw kcha rek mii mkheng hinni Jisu ki lei thung ngi son pik chlam da.
Ungta Mukpu Nowlam dil kṭoiji do khim khai mtlot dok dil thaanni, mmaanni Galil ki mkhuwpii thaanni mdil kinle lamda.
Ungta Nao ava linsaang da ungu mru tangda, lousing ngi dim chda, ungta mleenni Isowr do purhui amda.
Tunva kum ktaiji mpah leh mnuh ava taplaanna kmaal ra Jerusalem tha hang kchok lamda.
Ungu Mma ngi kum sowm lei knii mphaak thungta, nopa dil kṭoiji hang lamda.
Ungta kmaal ava ṭuw dok da, mmaanni mjun kinlet in thungta, Pselnao Jisua mdil thaanni Jerusalem thung ngi kcheeng daat da. Mnuh leh mpah va dei lamme
pdainu maplap rek tu kilṭhi pak da kdingi nii khat lik klutti jung lamda, ungu mmaanni mi inn khur kthuwk rek leh maplap rek hin thlaam lamda;
ungu mmaanni mdee maan thungta, Mma kthlaam Jerusalem tha mdil kinle lamda.
Nii kdum dil tha luwbuk Inn thu phang lamda, chukpu rek arlakki ku ong daat da, mmaan hin aryaa da paukhewl lamda;
ungta Mma hinni karyaa mii mkheng nga mdo dee pindit leh mpau arthaan rekki ngak chlam da.
Ungu mmaanni Mma ava mdee in thungta, ngak chlam da; ungbi mnuh ngi Mhin theda, “Kchapa, talu leiji hanto ado tatlot inda? Apah tu neenve va kdung ngi alam suw chaannu.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tak heppi naanva ado tathlaam inda? Neia Kpah Inn thung ngi trin kma am nik di tdit naanni dei maan ti mo?”
Ungta mhin inni mdo the pau ava dei pindi chlam me.
Ungta mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi Nasareth tha arjung lamda, ungu mpau theen pṭoi da; ungta mnuh va havale mkheng nga muplung thung ngi arkhii da.
Ungta Jisua lousing ngi dim chda, mdak ruk lin saangda, ungu Isowr leh mii rek do purhuiji amda.

Tiberia Keisar ri mkum sowm lei parngat na mpaal mpha thu, Pontas Pilat ta Judia rek paam kpupa ngi amda, ungu Herod ti Galil paam kpupa ngi amda, ungta mnaopa Philip va Ituria, Trakhonitia, paam kpupa ngi amda,ungu Lysania va Abilini paam kpupa ngi amda.
Annas leh Keiphas ti thiimpu kparthaang ngi ma am lam thu, kbowklaiji Sakharija chapa Johon hinni Isowr ki pauna thleng da.
Ungbi mma ngi Jordon paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi chet da, pnu rek kuptlot pik ki, plung ren hurda baptis ktlo tummi paryaam da.
Khulpu Isaijah pauna rek Laaika thung ngi mdo
kjit dok lulu,
“Kbowklaiji krowl khatti owngda:
Mukpu lam ṭoira apurchuwl,
mkhu ther na arjit pik.
Ka aar khim khai kdim ra,
ungu lown kchuwng leh lown khim khai kneemra,
ungu mkowl kthii karji ra,
ungta lam kparthap ava kparnaal ra;
ungta daksaa mkheng ngi
Isowr ki kirliinna kdei chra.”
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, mma ngi baptis mdo ptlot ra karva kurtuwl mii rek hin theda, “Doi knei pruwl charuwl naan! Plung thit kthlung rang thungki kchen ra aksi inna ku?

Plung ren kuhur akurhui nraanki athei rek in apchui in, ungta ‘Neenki kpah raan Abraham kthloi in,’ dida adaksaa in thung ngi kthe pṭhun maan; mleija neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr ra hava lung rek thung ki Isowr naole kpur owl ra.
Tun kpha thu ruk va ṭhii rek ava ding rek arjuwng leenni ka am daatta, ava leiji kṭha thei kchui kma ding khim khaija phuwr don le mei thung ngi kvar pthiira.
Ungta kurtuwl mii rekki mhin khewl lamda, “Ava mkurthuttu neenni talu tlo ni kaan di?”
Ungbi mma ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Phrik knii kthloi mii va kthloi kma mii tu athem so; then kthloi mii ruk va anto heppi atlo so.”
Khasna klou rek rukva baptis ktlo arva lamda, ungu mhin the lamda, “Chukpu, neenva tak tlo ni kaanda”
Ungbi mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ado lo raan thungki kheelli lou maan.”

Rawlmii rek ruk va mhin khewl lamda, “Ungta neenna talu tlo nikaan da?” Ungbi mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nam trom mi ku mii khat lee lowng maan, mata kindit kma thu mraal pii maan, ungu naan ki arda manni khop in.”
Mii rek va arngai chda, ungta mii mkheng va Johon na Khrista daat ngaal mo kdingi muplung in thung ngi karkhewl lamda.
