Johon ni mii mkheng hin arthawng da, “Neiva dii tu kilṭhi ngi baptis akuptlot in; pdainu kthleng meek mii ava nei kihin nu klin langlang, Mma khu kok rek rii kparthle pik rang ruk neia kurhui chmaang; Mma ava ngi pthla kchiir leh mei tu kilṭhi ngi baptis akuptlot chraan.
Mkhut thung ngi bu jaa na sinda, ungta kehu mchang rek ava ktom thu kthii ra, pdainu mparviit ava kṭuw knai kma meiṭhuwm thung ngi kapkaa pthii ra.”
Ava leiji mdo kso nlam pau knempok tu kilṭhi ngi kṭha paumin mhin inni paryaam da.
Pdainu paam kpupa Herod ti, mnaopa numei Herodia tummi raida, ungu Herod ti kṭha kma mdo tlot rek mkheng,
hava mkheng mdo tpom kthen ava leiji Johon na rowng inn thung ngi mdo khum pthii.
Tunva mii mkheng nga baptis ptlot dok da, Jisu ruk va baptis tlo da mṭhil chaak slii arlaanni, parwaan kparvang da,
ungu pthla kchiir ava daksaa lulu ngi uṭhuw ngi mleen arjung ṭum da, ungta parwaan ki krowl khat thleng da, “Nah Nei Kchapa pti; Nah hin Kning kthlung nga.”
Jisu, Mma ngi mnong mupṭhun mpha thungva kum som kdum arveel, Mma Joseph Chapa, (anto ngi tbin in) Heli chapa,
Mathat chapa, Levi chapa, Meilki chapa, Janai chapa, Joseph chapa,
Matathia chapa, Amos chapa, Nahum chapa, Esli chapa, Nagai chapa,
Math chapa, Matathia chapa, Semein chapa, Josek chapa, Joda chapa,
Joanam chapa, Rhesa chapa, Yerubabal chapa, Sheltil chapa, Neri chapa,
Melkhi chapa, Addi chapa, Kosam chapa, Elmadam chapa, Er chapa,
Joshua chapa, Elijar chapa, Levi chapa,
Simeo chapa, Juda chapa,Joseph chapa, Jonam chapa, Eliakim chapa,
Melea chapa, Mennachapa, Matatha chapa, Nathan chapa, Devid chapa,
Jesse chapa, Obed chapa, Boas chapa, Sala chapa, Nashon chapa,
Aminadab chapa, Admin chapa, Arni chapa, Heron chapa, Peres chapa, Juda chapa,
Jakob chapa, Isek chapa, Abraham chapa, Tera chapa, Nahor chapa,
Serug chapa, Reu chapa, Peleg chapa, Eber chapa, Shela chapa,
Kainan chapa, Arphakset chapa, Shem chapa, Noah chapa, Lamek chapa,
Methuselah chapa, Enok chapa, Jared chapa, Mehalalel chapa, Kainan chapa,
Enos chapa, Seth chapa, Adam chapa, Isowr chapa.
Ungta Jisua pthla kchiir ri dim chda Jordon ki mdil kinle da, ungu pthla ngi ṭhida.
Mleija nii som plii thung ngi kbowklaiji Dijabowlli pthleemda. Ungta ava nit lim thungva Mma ngi then khat lee chaa me, mpha ava mthlan dok thungta, Mma ava mpoi tham da.
Dijabowlli Mhin theda, “Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta, hava lung nga thenpen mkur owl nra pau areen.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin arthawng da, “Hava mdo kjit dok, ‘Miilai ava thenpen daatti ring nime.’”
Ungta Dijabowlli hanṭhida, mpha mruk daat thung ngi, dultipaam ki kruwngpaam rek mkheng tdet da,
ungu Mhin theda, “Hava rutan leh laarnee mkheng neiji Nah hin apii nik di; mleija nei kihin ni mdo tparlaan dok, neiji kdo piik nuwm mii ava hin pii nik di.
Nang ngi nei luw atbuk bi, mkheng nga Nah adora.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin arthawng da, “Ava mdo kjit dok, ‘Nang ngi nangki Isowr Mukpu ava luw ado buk ra, ungu Mma hin daatti sok adolo ra.’ ”
Ungta mma ngi Jisua Jerusalem tha ṭhida, luwbuk Inn thlun leen tha kalṭhida, ungu Mhin theda, “Nah Isowr Chapa akurthutta, hava thungki jung khuwng;
mleija hava mdo kjit dok, ‘Nah akseel rang ngi Mma Waan tamsii rek arju ksiira.
Ungu Akhu ngi lung ado thown ma nra, mmaanni mkhut rek inni akukdom pṭoi lamra.’ ”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin arthawng da, “Ava theda, ‘Nang ngi nang ki Isowr Mukpu ava nang ngi ado pthleem ro nime.’ ”
Ungta Dijabowlli mdo pthleem khim khai mṭut dok thungta, mpha kcha ava mphaak du khim khai ma da sun chda.
Ungta Jisua pthla ava rutan ni Galil tha kinle da, ungu Mma ki mlei pau ava marveel ki khuwpaam mkheng thung ngi kurjou da.
Ungta mii mkheng do punlor dokki, Mma ngi synagog rek thung ngi purchuk da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mlin msaanna Nasareth tha arvang da; ungu sabath nitti mhai kcho nopa ngi synagog tha vada. Ungta kpa rang ngi Mma ngi rip da,
Ungta Mhin khulpu Isaijah Laaika ava pii lamda. Mma ngi Laaika ava phel da mdo kjit na mun ava pha da,
“Mukpu pthla ava kleenni amda,
mleija sra mii hin kṭha paumin kparyaam ra thao mdo pbul dok,
Kparyaam ra ungu paamsuwk kparthlet ra,
ungta mik ktot ti khuw mdo dee chaak nra,
mdo owr rekki kintek mdo phaak chaak nra,
Mukpu ki talo chaak
kurhui kum kparyaam ra,
Mma ngi Neia mdo tsii.”
Ungta Mma ngi Laaika ava pkhum dok da, ungu vaiklou hin pii pinle da, ungta ku ongda; ungbi synagog thung ki mik mkheng va Mma daat suw lam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni kthe pṭhun da, “Snii ngi naan do aryaak naa thung ngi hava Laaika ava kurkhumma.”
Ungu Mma ava mii mkheng ngi plung kngammi pau nlam da,ungta Mner thungki wonsat pauna rek kthuwk ava ngi ngak chlam da; ungbi mmaanni theda, “Hava Joseph Chapa pme mo?”

Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ksoi liit kma pauril ava naanni mtiker psuk naan di, ‘Kdimpa adaksaa kpardam cha; Kaparnahum thung ngi ado tlot neenni kdo aryaak in ava, hava Nah akhuwpaam thu ruk va atlo.’ ”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, khulpu ku mii khat lee ava mdaksaa khuwpaam thugva ro nuwmme.

Pdainu kindit katti Neiji ahin thaanni kthea,Elijah nit rek thungva,Isreel thu meikhunuh knem pok ka am, kum kdum thla truk thu parwaan ava arkam pthii da, paam mkheng thung ngi poi tham klin langlang khat arvang da;
Ungbi Elijah ava ku mii khat lee hin kma, Sidon paam thungki snu meikhunuh Yeriphat hin daatti mdo sii.
Ungta khulpu Elisha mpha thung ngi Isreel paam thu ngi raaichii kthung mii knem pok ka am; pdainu Syria ki Naban hin daat kma donle, ku khat lee pre kartleu me.”
Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta, synagog thung ki mii mkheng nga kdung ngi plung pthit lamda.
Ungbi mmaanni rip lamda khuwpii ava duwn tha Mma ava ṭhi lamda, mkhuwpiin mdo sak naan lown tunni, mdo juk purlu pthii nraan hanṭhi lamda.
Pdainu mmaan arlakki lut da sun chdok da.
Ungta Mma ngi Galil ki khuwpii khat, Kaparnahum tha jungda, ungu Mma ngi sabath nitti mhin inni purchuk da;
Mma do purchu ngi mmaanna ngak chlam da, mleija Mma pauna ava rutan tu kilṭhi da.
Ungta synagog thung ngi tarnam ktobor pthla kthloi miilai khat amda; ungbi krowl kparyaa khatti mma ngi keu da,
“O! Nasareth ki Jisu, neenna talu mpardit chnaan da? Nah ku pti tdit neenni kdee in, Isowr ki Kchiir Khat ava pti.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin raida, theda, “Rim kdi am, ungu mma thungki arvan thuwk dok!” Ungta tarnam ava ngi mmaan arlakki var pthii thida mma thungki arvan thuwk da, sulkpurnul ava tlo me.
Ungta mmaan mkheng nga ngak chda, khat leh khatti the lamda, “Hava talu pauna daat da? Mleija rutan leh rutan pum mi pau mreenna, pthla ktobor rekka arvan kthuwk lamma.”
Ungta marveel ki paamkowl rek mkheng thung ngi Mma mlei ava kurjou da.
Ungta Mma ngi rip da synagog ava ma thida, Simon inn thu lut da. Tunva Simon kternu ava riiphaak ki koi chda, ungbi mmaanni Mhin the pik lam da.
Ungu Mma ngi mbe tha rip da riiphaak ava raida, ungbi ma dok da; ungta snu ava ngi kardel teng da mhin inni sok lo pik lamda.
Tunva kniw mjuntlaak thungta, kukuh daat don msik msik omlaiji kukoi mii rek khim khai ṭhi paphaak lamda, ungu Mma ngi mkhut ava mii pum ktai leen khiin pik da, pdam chlam da.
Ungta tarnam rek ruk mii knempok thungki thuwkda, keu lamda, “Nah Isowr Chapa pti!” Pdainu Mma ngi rai lamda, ungu mpau raanna rot pik lamme, mleija Khrista tdit mmaanni dei da.
Ungu suwn mvee thungta Mma ngi kurlouda mmun ktliing khat thung ngi vada. Ungta mii rekki thlaam da Mhin arva lamda, mmaan ma pthii da msun ra ava ro lam mda;
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji khuwpii murson rek thung ruk va Isowr ki Kruwngpaam kṭha paumin kdo paryaam ma ro me; mleija Neia ava tummi mdo tsii.”
Ungta Mma ngi Judia ki synagog rek thung ngi paryaam da.
Mii rekki Isowr pauna karyaa ra Mma hin mnam kurduwl arlaanni, Mma ava Kenasarit duwm biing ngi rip daat da.
Ungta duwm be ngi arkuwng rek knii Mma ngi dei da; pdainu tuwlva kse rek mii ava mthungki sun chlam da, ungu makchak in arsu meek lamda.
Arkuwng rek arlakki Simon arkuwng leenni tuwng da,laan ki mruk mkursown nra mhin theda; ungta Mma ngi arkuwng leen ko ong thida mii rek hin purchuk da.
Ungta Mma ngi pau saam dok thida, Simon hin theda, “Ado kjown nra kukthuk bet thung ngi akchak rek adeeng.”
Ungbi Simon ni arthawng da, “Chukpu, neenni jaan khat ti deeng innu ungu do khat lee kjowng chmaan ring. Pdainu Nah apauna ngi kchak rek ava deeng ni.”
Ungta mmaanni hava mtlot in thungta, kchak rek kekṭet daat rang ngi, tuwlva knempok khum lamda.
Ktlok arkuwng thung ki mmaan miiṭhi rek ki mdo bom chaak nraan the lam da, ungbi mmaanni arva lamda, ungta arkuwng ava mikniing ngi dim da, ava leiji dii thung ngi kpurlup rang ngi tloda.
Pdainu Simon Pitor ri ava mdee thungta, Jisu khuther ri tluw da Mhin theda, “O, Mukpu, nei kihin ki ekursown dok mleija neia pnu kirvei mii pa ping.”
Mleija tuwlva mdo kjown lei inni, mma leh mmiiṭhi mkheng nga kdung ngi ngak chlam da.
Ungta Jebedi chapa rek Jeems leh mnaopa Johon rukka Simon miiṭhi kurthuwk lamda. Ungu Jisu ngi Simon hin theda, “ṭi ma; tun ki kupṭhun ni nang ngi mii kjowng nadi.”
Ungta mmaanni arkuwng rek ava laan tha mhowl dok inle, do khim khai mmaanni ma pthii lam thida Mma dil ṭoi chlam da.
Khuwpii rek khat thu Mma ngi ma am mpha thu, raaichii kthung miilai khat arva da, mma ngi Jisu mdee thungta, Mmaiṭhuwm mi tluw da Mhin ktham chda, “Mukpu, Nang ngi atrot pik ta nea mhai partleu cha.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mkhut khiing da kmei thida,mhin theda, “Neiva krotta, ekartleu cha.” Ungu tun kat daatti mraaichii ava tlei chda.

Ungta mma ngi ku mii khat lee hin mdo the thut ma nra mhin pau pṭum da; Pdainu vang ra thiimpu hin adaksaa ktardet cha, ungu Mousi paureen dil kṭoiji nang ngi ditta mii rek hin ado tdet na ngi, adaksaa kartleu na ki tlaai adown cha.”
Pdainu Mma mlei thung ngi pau ava duwn thang ngi kdung kurjou da; ungbi karyaa ra kurtuwl mii klin langlang khat thuwk da.
Pdainu Mma ngi kbowklai tha chet da ṭhil chda.

Hava nit rek thung ngi, Mma ngi mpurchu meek arlaanni, Galil ungta Judia ungu Jerusalem khuw ktai ki kthleng Pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek mbe ngi ko ong daat lamda; ungu kapdam ki Mukpu rutanni kurthlo ṭhi da.
Ungta asuwn, mii rekki kyeng miilai khat mi iina kpher tu haiṭhi lamda, Mma hin ṭhida Jisu maiṭhuwm mi mdo pi ii nraan mlam thlaam lamda.
Pdainu mthung ngi mii mkurtuwl reen leiji mvan lu nraan lam am mda, innthlun leen mmaanni hangkal lamda, klong thung ngi mi iina tu Jisu maiṭhuwm mi ju ptla lamda.
Ungu mdo rin chaak in Mma ngi mdee thungta theda, “Miilai nah apnu ton rekka akuptlot pikka.”
Ungbi Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rekki kir khewl lamda, “Isowr kjowm cha ngi kpau Mma ava ku da? Isowr kma donle pnu rek kuptlot pchaang rang nga ku da?”
Mmaanni pau mkarkhewl in ava Jisu ngi deida, mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji aplung in thung ngi karkhewl in pti?
‘Apnu ton rek akuptlot pikka,’ dida tithe, mata ‘Kardel ra echet,’ dida tithe ava tva ngi ko ol rang?

Pdainu Mii Chapa ava ngi dultipaam thung ngi pnu rek mdo ptlot pik na ki rutan mthloija tdit naanni ado dee nraan” kyeng miilai hin Jisu ngi theda, “Nah hinni Neiji kthea, kardel ra a iina achom ra a inn tha vang cha!”
Ungbi tun kat daatti mmaiṭhuwm inni mma ngi kardel da, mma ngi mleen mi iina kpher ava chom da, Isowr panpaak da mi inn tha vang chda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng nga ngak chlam da, ungu kdung kngak cha ngi Isowr panpaak lamda, “Snii va tdee liit maan do ndee chaak inna.”
Hava diltha Mma ngi duwn thuwk da, ungu khasna klou kchok mmiing Levi tdit mma ava khasna inn thung ngi kuk ong daat deida; ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Nei kdil aṭoi cha.”
Ungta mma ngi do khim khai ma thida, rip daat da Mdil ṭoi chda.
Ungta Levi ngi mi inn thung ngi klin lang lang kmaal khat tlo da; ungu khasna klou rek leh mii murson knempok tu tebol be ngi kmaal ra ku ong lamda.
Ungta pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki msiikhu rek hin Mma ava mraal kpii ngi the lamda, “Talu leiji naanva khasna klou rek leh pnu ktong rek tu ado chaak ado neek in da?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Kchun mii rek va kdim kriingme, pdainu kukoi rek daat;
rinkindit rek ku own ra Neia kurjung pmaang, pdainu pnu ktong rek ki plung ren mdo pinlet nraan ki kurjung ping.”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin theda, “Johon siikhu rek va maknem thung ngi then ngowl lamda mdo ṭhil chaak in, ungta Pharisi rek siikhu rek ruk va anto tlo lamda, pdainu Nah asiikhu rek va chaanee lamda.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kphalpa ngi ma am ṭhi daat arlaannu mmal rek va then kngowl lam rang mo?
Mmaan arlakki kphalpa mdo lo dok nrangki mnit rek karvangg ra, ava nit rek thung ro ngi mmaanni then kngowl lamra.”

Mma ngi mhin inni paupurtol ruk va theda, “Ku mii khat lee ngi buw ren khat tunki mlaak khat kṭet da, buw pliw tun ni kleng lot nime, mma ngi ava mtlot bi, ren ava kikṭet pthii ra, ungta ren ava laak va pliw tu kurlo nime.

Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi rik rou dii ren ava, rik rou dii pliw saavun khau ava thung ngi daal nime; mma ngi ava mtlot bi, rik rou dii ren ava ngi saavun ava ksai phok ra, ungu kjaan chra, saavun rek ruk kmaang chra.
Pdainu rik rou dii ren ava rik rou saavun khau ren rek thu mdo daal ra.
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi rik rou dii pliw mneek dil tha, rik rou dii ren nee nuwm nime; mleija mma ngi kthera, ‘Pliw ava ngi kṭha.’ ”
Sabath nii khatti, Mma ngi buh bil rek thu chet da, msiikhu rek va chavui angṭhe pjii lamda, mapjaa thuwnni knuwr lamda, chaa lamda.
Pdainu Pharisi rek mii angṭhe ngi the lamda, “Talu leiji Nowlam do rot ma sabath nitti atlot inna?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Devid ti mpoi mtham thu mdo tlot ava naanva pa maan ti mo? mma leh mmiiṭhi rekki:

tak heppi Isowr Inn thu lut lamda, ku mii khat lee tumva Nowlam do rot kma, mdo down dok thenpen ava louda chaa da, pdainu ava thiimpu daatti mdo chaak ra, ungta mmiiṭhi rek hin rukku mma ngi pii memo?”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Mii Chapa ava sabath ki Mukpu ruk kurthuwk.”
Sabath nit ktlok khat thu, Mma ngi synagog thu lut da mpurchu mpha thu, mchangki khut kyeng miilai khat amda.
Ungta Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rekki Mma ava sut pṭoi lamda. Mmaanni mraal mdo piik nraan, sabath nitti kapdam sik rang mo kdingi suw lamda.
Pdainu muplung reel in ava Mma ngi deida, ungbi mkhut kseek miilai ava hin Mma ngi theda, “Hava tha arvang ra rip.” Ungbi mma ngi hanrip da ava tha rip da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Neiji pau aju khewl inni, Nowlam do the dil kṭoiva sabath nit va kṭha tatlot rang mo mata sul tpurnul rang, rinkhu tiktlen rang mo mata ti ea kre rang?”
Ungta Jisu ngi mii mkheng nga suw ploi lam thida, ungu mhin theda, “Akhut arjii.” Ungta mma ngi arjii da, ungbi mkhut ava dam chda.
Pdainu mmaanna kdung reenni muplung in thiida, Jisua talu pirdit che naanna kdingi karseel psuk lamda.
Hava nit rek thung ngi Mma ngi lown tha kṭhil chra hangda; jaan khatti Mma ngi Isowr hin kurnowl da ṭhil chda.
Ungu khuw mvaar thungta, Mma ngi siikhu rek own da, mmaan thungki sowm lei knii ava kenyee rek kdingi mmiing in thowl da;
Mma ngi mmiing Pitor mdo dit Simon, ungu mnaopa Andrija, Jeems, Johon, Philip, Bartholomio,
Mathi, Thomas, Alphias chapa Jeems, mpaam tummi plung kvar Simon,
Jeems chapa Judas ungta sluk arbiing Iskariot ki Juda hava lim.

Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu jungṭum lamda, mmun khat daam ava thu rip lamda, msiikhu rek klin langlang mii mluwngpa rek leh, Judia leh Jerusalem ki mii mkheng ungu truwn biingki Tyr leh Sidon ki rek ava Mma hin karyaa chra ungu omlai mdo pdam pik lam nra klin lang lang ngi thuwk kurtuwl lamda.
Ungta pthla ktobor rekki suwk mdo pthuw rekka dam chlam da.
Ungta mii mluwngpa mkheng ngi Mma mdo nor chaak nra the lamda, mleija Mma thungki rutan thuwk da mii mkheng ava pdam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mmikki siikhu rek suw rim lam thida, theda, “Sra naan ava asuwn kṭha! mleija Isowr Kruwngpaam ava naan atum.
“Tun poi ktham naanna asuwn kṭha! mleija naanna poi kpa ra.
“Tun kṭap naanna asuwn kṭha! mleija pnii chnaan di.
Mii Chapa ava tummi mii rekki apder chaan da, aneeng pthiin da, ning er aplo inda, ṭha me didon amiing in mlo pthiin mpha thu asuwn kṭha!
Ava nit thung ngi ekanpa chaan, kanpa ngi kunchowm chaan, mleija asuwn, parwaan tha naan ki mnah ava klin ra; mleija mpah le ruk va khulpu rek hin anto mdo tlot in.
“Pdainu suwang naanna asuwn kthi! mleija lungam na ado arlaan chaak dok in.
“Tun poi kpa rek naanna asuwn kthi! mleija naanna apoi in ktham ra.
“Tun kipnii naan ava asuwn kthi! mleija kurnung karbaang da ṭap naan di.
“Mii mkheng ngi kṭha dida mdo the naan ava asuwn kthi! mleija mmaan pah le ruk va kindit kma khulpu rek hin anto mdo tlot in.
“Pdainu Neiji karyaa naan hin kthea, aksnuwm kmaan rek wonsat alo chaan, akipder kcha rek hin kṭha atlown,
pauhur kbuk rek hin phowl kṭha apii chaan, ungu akjowm kchaan rek tummi aṭhil pik chaan.
Abiing thaan aktipeeng in mii ava hin khat ktongki ruk adoi pik; ungta aphrik in ktha klou mii hin aphrik in murson ruk apii tpom in.
Ahin thaan kṭhil mii khim khai hin apii chaan; ungu ado anaan klou mii ava hinki lou pinle maan.
Ungta naan hin mii rek dotlot ra ado ngei in ava heppi naan ruk va atlo in.
“Naan wonsat aklo chaan mii rek daat wonsat alo innu, talu msit ka am da? Mleija pnu kirvei mii rek ruk va mmaan wonsat klo ava wonsat mdolo in.
Ungta naan hin kṭha ktlo mii rek hin daatti kṭha atlot innu, ava talu msit ka am da? Mleija pnu kirvei rek rukva anto mdo tlot in.

Ungta naanni arlaang chnik di kdingi ado bin in mii rek hin daatti apurpuwk innu, ava naan hinni talu msit ka am da? Ava heppi mdo arlaan chaak nra, pnu kirvei rek rukku pnu kirvei rek hin mdo purpuwk in.

Pdainu naan aksnuwm kmaan wonsat alo in, kṭha atlot pik in, kinle ra ngei maan; mbi naanki mnah ava klin ra, ungta naan ki kparthaang sii ava chapa rek kurthuwk naan di; mleija Isowr va plung ksel ungu mthina ngi kparning ruk wonsat mdolo.
Apah in plungnee heppi plung anei in.
“Kṭewl maan, ungu naan ruk akṭewl in nime; mraal pii maan, ungta naan ruk araal apiin nime; aptlot pik in, ungu naan ruk akuptlot pik chraan.
Apiin, ungta naan ruk akpii chraan; kṭha ngi apartee inra, anam inra, atnok purkuk inra, kchuwl jammi naan akhut khiin in thu ka am ra. Mleija naanni partee da ado piik naan thu akpartee pik chraan.”
Mma ngi pau purtol rukva mhin inni theda; “Mik ktot khatti mik ktot khat kṭhi rang mo? Khur thu mikniing inni tla nime mo?
Siikhu khat ava mma chukpu tun tha ka am pme, pdainu mii pum ktaiji kurkhum mi mkurchu dok dil tha, mma chukpu ava hep daat ra.
Naan adaksaan thungki ktobor kdei kma, talu leiji a u anao in mik thungki dangka arko inna?

Mata tak heppi a u anao hin, ‘Ku u knao, neiji amik thungki dangka ava lou pthi dok ni,’ kdingi atheenna, naan adaksaan mik kat thungki ktobor ava dei maan timo? Kṭha do tlot ktlo naan, ru kri ngi naan adaksaan kat thungki ktobor alou pthi dok in, ungta naan a u anao in mik thungki dangka ava adolo pthi nraan kinthiir deekki dei ro naan di.
“Mleija ding kṭha ava ngi thei kṭha kma chui me, mata ding kṭha kma ava ngi thei kṭha chui me;
mleija ding ava mleenki theiji mdo tdet. Mleija kduwt rek ava tirliing leenki pme, mata rik rou ava turmu nowm thungki tchom ava pme.
Kṭha miilai ava muplung thung ngi kṭha mdo purtuwl ava ngi kṭha mdo thuwṭhi, kṭha kma miilai ava muplung thung ngi kṭha kma mdo purtuwl ava mdo thuwṭhi; mleija plung thungki kdim ava ner ri kpau.
“Talu leiji Nei kdo the ava ktlo in kma, Mukpu, Mukpu, diin ti ado to own in?
Nei kihin arva da Nei kpauna rek aryaa da ktlo mii pum ktai ava talu mdut tdit Neiji naan hin aju tdet inni.
Mma ava kukthukki touda, lung leenni inn parkal da ksa ava hep daat, ungta dii linda, dii kluwng ngi deeng daat joso, ava tnok pchaang me, mleija knetti mdo sak dok.
Pdainu aryaa thida ktlo kma mii ava mmun ktaak dul leen ni inn parkal da ksa mii ava hep daat, dii kluwng ngi mdeen daat le kbeiji tluw chda, ungta inn ava mmeel kthi ngi ktluw kcha.
Mma ngi mii rek do aryaak rang ngi pau mdo the mkheng pṭuw dok da Kaparnahum tha valut da.
Tunva rawlmii klin khat, ungta mma ngi kdung wonsat mdolo chaak suwk khat ava kdiyou daat rang ngi koi chda.
Mma ngi Jisu mlei maryaak thungta, arva da Mma ngi msuwk mdo pdam pik chaak nra Mhin kikhewl chra Jehudia kver rek hai siida.
Ungta mmaanni Jisu hin arva lamda, plung klutti Mhin ktham chlam da, the lamda, “Mma tummi hava ado tlot pik ra ava kurhui,
mleija mma ngi neen chati ava wonsat mlo chaan da, synagog msak pik in da.”
Ungta Jisu ngi vanṭoi lamda. Inn ava karlat pa kma thu, rawlmii klin ava ngi maplap rek Mhin haisii da,theda, “Mukpu mhai jat pik chma, mleija nei ki inn thung ngi athlen ra ava neia kurhui chmaang;
ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, nei kdak kat rukva Nah ado kukurdut ṭhira ava kurhui chmaang. Pdainu pauna hehe ngi atithe pik bi, nei ksra owr ava kdam chdaat ra.

Mleija nei kdak kat rukka rutan kurdu ngi ka am miilai ping, nei kukurdu ngi rawlmii rek ka am lam: ungta hava khat ava hinni, ‘Va’ kdit che mma ngi va da, ungu ktlok nitti, ‘Arvang’ kdit che arvang da; neiji ksuwk hinni ‘Hava atlo,’ kdit che mma ngi tlo da.”
Jisu ngi hava maryaak thungta mhin ngak chda, ungbi mdil kṭoi kurtuwl mii rek hin kinle da theda, “Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isreel thung rap klua hanto lu ngi krin kcha Neiji pha chliit maang.”
Ungu mma do haisi rekki inn tha mkinlet in thungta, suwk ava kdam dokki pha lamda.
Ava dil thang bong ngi Mma ngi Nain tdit khuwpii khat thu vada, ungta msiikhu rek leh kurtuwl mii rek mluwngpa ṭhi da.
Mma ngi khuwpii paltong mhai nai thungta, asuwn, kdiyou miilai khat kdom lamda, mnuh meikhunuh ava chapa khat chrel; ungta khuwpii ava thung ki mii mluwngpa tu snu ava kilṭhi da.
Ungu Mukpu ngi snu ava mdee thungta, wonsat lo chda ungu snu hin theda, “ṭap ma,”
Ungta Mma ngi arva da kluwng kmeida, ungbi kukdom rekka rip chdaat da. Ungu Mma ngi theda, “Tartlaang nao ahin Neiji kthea, kardel.”
Ungta kdiyou miilai ava ko ongda, kpau pṭhun da. Ungta mnuh hin Mma ngi piida.
Mkheng inni kdung reenni ṭi lamda; ungu mmaanni Isowr panpaak lamda, “Nen narlak inni klin langlang Khulpu khat kthuwkka!” Ungta “Isowr ri mmii rek mvella!”
Ungta Mma mlei thung ngi hava pau ava Judia paam mkheng thung leh marveel ki khuwpaam mkheng thung ngi kurjou da.
Johon na msiikhu rekki hava do mkheng mhin son pik lamda.
Ungta Johon ni msiikhu rek knii own thida, Mukpu hin haisi lamda theda, “Kurjung ra Mma ava pti mo, mata neenni ktlok khat mlam suw nikaan di?”
Ungta mii rek ava ngi Mhin arva lamda, mmaanni theda, “Neenna baptis kuptlot Johon ni Nah hin mdo hai tsiin, ‘Nah kurjung ra Mma ava pti mo mata neenni ktlok khat mlam suw nikaan di?’ ”
ṭhang ava kat thung ngi Mma ngi omlai knempok rek, tngana rek ungu pthla kṭha kma rek pdam da, ungta mik ktot rek mii knempokki khuw dei chda.

Ungu Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Vang inra Johon hin naan dodee ava leh ado aryaak in ava ason pik in: mik ktot ti khuw deida, kyeng ava ngi kchetta, raaichii kthung rek kartleuva, knaa kbeeng rekki maryaakka, kdiyou ava ngi kardella, sra hin kṭha paumin mparyaamma.
Nei kihinni mkhusiir kparthii kma mii ava msuwkṭha.
Johon siikhu rek msun dok thungta, mii mluwngpa hin Johon mlei thung ngi Jisu ngi kthe pṭhun da: “Naanni talu ksuw ra kbowklaiji kva in pti? Tirthli doraan ding kakna ksuw rang ki mo?
Talu ksuw ra kva in pti da? Dona kparneem deek deek knaa miilai khat mo? Asuwn, kṭha dang dang ngi kurthlongda, nungaiji kpaal mii rek ava kruwng rek amna thung daat.
Ava mkurthuttu naanni talu ksuwra kva in pti? Khulpu khat mo? Oji, Neiji ahin thaanni kthe a, mma ava khulpu khat khewl dek.
Hava mma mlei thung ngi mdo kjit dok, ‘Asuw, Nah du sukki Neiji Ktamsii ksia, Nah adu sukki mma ngi lam akirdit pik ra.’
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, snu do pluk rek mmaan arlakki Johon kheelli klin ku khat lee amme, anto daat joso, Isowr Kruwngpaam thung va kdil sii mma ava ngi Johon hinnu klin ra.”
(Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta, mii mkheng leh khasna klou rek ava baptis kuptlot Johon ni baptis mdo ptlot lamtu kilṭhi ngi rinpindit pik chlam da,
pdainu Pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek va mma hin baptis klou kma, mdaksaan tummi sowr poibin ava pthlei lamda.)
“Ava mkurthuttu hava charuwl mii rekka Neiva talu purtol lam nik di, mmaanna tak kdu pi di lam nik di?
Mmaan ava kmo rek hep daat lam, bajaar mun thu ku ong lamda ungu khat leh khat kur own lamda, ‘Neenni lampe dum innu ungu naanna kardaam maan ti, neenva ṭap ṭei innu, ungta naanna ṭap maan ti.’
Mleija Baptis kuptlot Johon kurjung va thenpen chaa me ungta rik rou dii nee me; ungbi naanva ‘tarnam mthloija kdingi theen tinu.’
Mii Chapa kurjung va chaanee da, ungbi naanva ‘Asuwn, poibuwr kparja, ju kiprii, khasna klou rek leh pnu kirvei rek plap khat,’ kdingi theen tinu.
Anto daat joso lousing ava mnaole mkheng ngi rinpindit pik da.”
Pharisi rek arlakki khatti Jisua mdo maal ṭhi chaak nrangki the chda, ungbi Mma ngi Pharisi inn tha vang da, tebol be ngi kmaalra ko ongda.
Ungta asuwn, khuwpii ava thungki pnu kirvei snu miilai khatti Jisua Pharisi inn thung ngi ku kong daatta tdit aryaa da, reidii thao ava uwm khat ktarnaal deek thung ngi arhai sinda.
Mdilpang tha mkhu ther ri rip da, ṭap da, marthli ngi mkhu kupchor pṭhunda, mluw tun ki msam ava ngi knuwl da, ungu mkhu ava put da, thida reidii thaovi pbul da.
Tunva Mma ko own kcha Pharisi ava ngi deida, mthina ngi theda, “Hava Miilai ava Khulpu khat mkurthut bi, Mma kikmei snu ava ku ungu tak hep kdu miilai tdit kdeira, mleija snu ava pnu kirvei khat.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, theda, “Simon Neiji nah hinni do khat kdo the ra ka amma.” Ungta mma ngi arthawng da, “Talu da, Chukpu?”
“Sum kpurpuwk miilai khatti sum lei ktuwl knii rek thloi da, ungu khatti dinarii arjaa parnga lei tuwl da, ungu khatti som parnga lei tuwl da.
Mmaanni mpiik pchaan maan thungta, mikniing inni ptlot pik lamda. Tunva mmaanve arlakki ku ngi mma va knem betti wonsat mloa?”
Simon ni arthawngda, “Nei kdo bin chaak va mma ngi knem betti mdo ptlot pik khat ava ra.” Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kindit deekki nang ngi akṭewlla.”

Ava dilli snu ava ktong tha kinle thida, Simon hin theda, “Snu hava nangva adea? Neiji nah inn thu klut ping, ungu nangva kukhu kdo alṭhut nra dii mpii mti, pdainu hava snuva marthli ngi kukhu pchor thida msam mi knuwl da.
Nangva mput mti, pdainu Neiji karvan lu daat ki mma ngi kukhu mdo put down liit me.
Nangva kluw thao pbul mti, pdainu mma va kukhu ava reidii thaovi pbul da.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Neiji ahin kthea, mupnu ton knempok ava kuptlot pikka, mleija mma wonsatta nemda, pdainu ktlowm suwnni wonsat klo rek ava ktlowm suwnni kuptlot pik.”
Ungta Jisu ngi snu hin theda, “Apnu ton rekka akuptlot pikka.”
Ava dilli tebol be ngi Mma do ko onṭhi mii rekki msingreel inni hanto kthe pṭhun lamda, “Pnu rek ruk kuptlot pik daat hava ku rang da?”
Ungta Mma ngi snu ava hin theda, “Nah ado rin chaakki ataktlanna; kdaaiji vang cha.”
Ava dil tha ambong thida, Mma ngi khuwpii rek leh khuw rek tha, Isowr Kruwngpaam ki kṭha paumin sin da, paryaam da. Ungta Mma ngi sowmlei knii rek ṭhida,
ungu Mma ngi pthla kṭha kma rek leh omlai mdo pdam pik snu rek angṭhe ruk ṭhida: tarnam tikheu mdo rei pthi pik Magdaleni Mery mdo dit,
Herod sumdowl ksin Chuya numei Joana, ungu Susanna, ungta mmaan sok lo pik da kpurdon snu rek mii angṭhe ruk am lamda.
Ungta khuwpii ktaiki mii rek mluwngpa ngi klin lang lang ngi Mhin kthuwk kurkuk hin tha Mma ngi pau purtolli theda:
“Chii kvar khatti kvar ra chet da; ungu mma ngi hanto mvar thungta, angṭhea lam thu tla da, ava khu ngi ther pthii da, ungta kjuwng puwa rekki chom chda.
Ungta angṭhea lung leenni tla da, marhan mown thungta, mchor ma leiji purvui chda.
Ungta angṭhea tirliing arlakki tlada; tarliing tu mowng veeda, ungu tarliing ngi archuk youda.
Ungta angṭhea duldak thu tlada; ungbi mbel tunni arjaa khatti chuida.” Havale mthe chunni Mma ngi owngda, “Taryaak na knaa kthloi ku mii khatti aryaa chso.”
Ungta hava paupurtol rek mlei thu siikhu rekki Mhin mkhewl thungta,

Mma ngi theda, “Naan hinva Isowr Kruwngpaam ki tuprut pau ado dee nraan ado tpiik chaak in; pdainu murson rek hinva do mkheng nga ksuw daatti mdo dee ma nraan, ungu karyaa daatti mdo aryaak pindit ma nraan paupurtol li kurthuwk.
Tunva paupurtol ava hava: Chiimuh ava Isowr pauna.
Lam thu ktla ava karyaa mii rek; mmaanni rin chda mdo ktlan pik ma nraan, dijabowl thleng da, mmaan plung thungki pauna rek ava mdolo pthii.
Ungta lung leenni ktla rek mmaan na, pauna maryaak thuwnni kanpa ngi arlaang chlam da, pdainu mmaanna arjuwng ame, mmaanni mpha mruk tummi rin chlam da, ungta kepthleem mpha thung ngi ktluw chlam.

Ungta tirliing rek arlakki ktla tumva, mmaanna karyaa mii rek, pdainu mmaanni mche in nopa ava lamtha chet lamda, suwang leh rinkhu dongei ava tuk sut lamda, ava ngi archuk youda, ungta thei ruk mpung phame.
Ungta dul kṭha thungki tumma, mmaan ava pauna karyaa mii rek, plung knet ungu kṭha plung ngi kukjowng mer kcha, ungta mdo diil chaak in tu kilṭhi ngi thei mdo thuwṭhiin.
“Ku mii khat lee ngi meila khat pchuk thida uwm mi khum nime, mata kowm ti ngi thii nime, pdainu klut mii rekki mar awng mdo dee nra, mri na khat leenni kthii ra.
Mleija mdo pandan ma ra kurdowl daat do khat lee ame, mata mar awng thu kandang kma ra tdee mara tuprut do khat lee ame.
Naanni tak heppi aryaak in tdit cheek asin chaan; mleija kthloi mii ava hin kheelli kpii ra, ungu kthloi kma mii ava, mma ngi kthloi chaakka dida mdo bin in ava ruk klou pthii ra.”
Ava dilli mnuh leh mnaopale Mhin ni arva lamda, pdainu mii mluwngpa ngi mlei kurthuwk da kurdut ṭhii pchaang lamme.
Ungta Mma the pik lamda, “Nah nuh leh anaopale ngi duwn tha rip daat lamda, atkurdut ṭhii chaak nuwm lamma.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei knuh leh knaopale ava Isowr pauna aryaa da ktlo mii rek ava kurthuwk.”
Nii khatti Mma ngi msiikhu rek tu arkuwng khat leen tuwng lamda, ungu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nenni duwm raalpha khat ktong tha vang arkaan inche.” Ava tha mmaanni vang lamda,
ungta mmaanni anto mvan slii arlaan inni Jisua iip dok da. Ungta duwm tuwnni tchangkhuw raangda, ungu dii kakna ngi pleeda, sulkurnul lam rang ngi tloda.
Ungta mmaanni Mhin pha lamda, the lamda, “Chukpu, Chukpu, kmaang chra ntheenna!” Ungta Mma ngi kardelda tchangkhuw kraang ngi dii kakna ava rai da; ungu down dok da, pum daaiji daai dok chda.

Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ado rin chaak inna tu ungda?” Ungta mmaanni ṭi lamda, ungta ngak chlam da, khat leh khatti the lamda, “Tchangkhuw leh dii hin Mma ngi pau mreenna mdo pṭoi daat in hava Mma ava ku aen daat rang da?”
Ava dilli mmaanni Galil raalpha khat ki Gerasinis khuwpaam thlung lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi laan tun kal mkhiin daat le, khuwpii ava thung ngi tarnam rek doṭhi miilai khat kurdut ṭhida; mleija mpha roi ksot thung ngi mma ava mdo mna knaa kma am chda, ungu inn thung rukku ame, pdainu thlaan rek arlakki am da.
Mma ngi Jisu mdee thungta,owng da mdu sukki tluw da, ungta krowl kparyaa ngi theda, “Kparthaang sii ki Isowr Chapa Jisu, nea talu mhai pardit chna di? Neiji akaktham chaakka, mhai pja chma.”

Mleija mii ava thungki marvan thuw dok nra Jisu ngi pthla ktobor hin paureen da. Mleija mma ava mii ngi mpha maknem thung ngi kjowngda; kseel rek kurdu ngi thii da, thiir rii ngi bowl lamda, ungta mkhut ktu lamda, pdainu kpot pthiida, ungta mma ava tarnam mi kbowklaiji howl pthii da.
Jisu ngi mhin pau khewl da, “Amiing nga ku da?” Ungbi mma ngi theda, “Nei kmiing nga mpunpa”; mleija tarnam knempok mthung ngi lut da.
Ungta Mma ngi paureen da ungbi sim thung ngi mdo psun pthii ma nlamra mmaanni Mhin ktham chlam da.
Tunva vak rek ava mluwngpa ngi kham kukki maal meek lamda, avale thung ngi mlu chaak nraan Mhin ktham chlam da. Ava leiji msun chaak nraan Jisu ngi rot pik lamda.
Ava dilli tarnam rekki miilai ava thungki thuwk lamda, vak rek thung ngi lut lamda, ungta vak mluwng rek ava kham kukki arjun jaam lamda, duwm thung ngi tla you tir chlam da.
Vak rek kseel cha rekki kthuwk nong ava mdee in thungta, mmaanni chen lamda, khuwpii leh khuwpaam thu song lamda.

Ava dilli mii rekki kthuwk nong ava ksuwra arva lamda, ungta mmaanni Jisu hin arva lamda, ungta tarnam rek sun ndok miilai ava rukka Jisu khuther ri plung kinditti, dona naa da kuk ong daat ti mphaak in thungta, mmaanni ṭi chlam da.
Ungta tarnam rek doṭhi mii ava tak heppi kdam tdit kdei mii rekki mhin inni song da.
Ava dilli Gerasinis arveel ki khuwpaam ki mii rek mkheng ngi, mmaan hin ki msun dok nra Mhin ktham chlam da, mleija kdung reenni mmaanni ṭi lamda; ava leiji arkuwng leen tuwngda mdil kinle da.
Mma ngi tarnam rek mdo rei pthii pik miilai ava ngi aju ṭoi chni dida Mhin ktham chda; pdainu Jisu ngi sii thida, the da,
“A inn tha vang kinle, ungta tija pang Isowr ri ata tlot pik tdit athe thuw cha.” Ungta mma ngi vangda, mma tummi Jisu ngi tija pang mtlot pik tdit ki pau ava khuwpii mkheng thu paryaam da.
Tunva Jisu ngi mkinlet thungta, mii luwngpa ngi Mma arda da kowl chda, mleija mmaan mkheng ngi Jisua arda daat lamda.
Ungta Synagog kpu khat, mmiing Jairas tdit miilai khat arvada; Jisu khu ther ri tluw da, minn tha mhai nra Mhin ktham chda.
Mleija kum sowm lei knii arveel, mchanu khat chrel mma ngi thloi da, ungu ava kdiyou chra theda.
Mma ngi hanto mhai slii arlaanni mii rek va klop dok da.
Ungta kum sowm lei knii lik thung ngi hii ngi kjaan ungu ku mii khat lee ngi mdo pdam pik pchaan ma snu miilai khat amda.
Mma ngi mdil pangtha arhang da, ungta mbuw mor nor chda; ungbi tun kat daatti mhii kjaan ava down dok da.
Ungbi Jisu ngi the da, “Nei mhai kthowng nga ku da?” Mii mkheng ngi nei kme dida mmat sap arlaanni Pitor ri the da, “Chukpu, kurtuwl mii rek va nam kurduwl da aklop dok da!”
Pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Ku miilai khat var ple mukthowng nga: mleija Nei kthungki rutan khat kthuwk kdea.”

Ungu snu ava ngi kukurdowl ronime tdit mdee thungta, mma ngi kunchun ni arvada Jisu du sukki tluw da, mii mkheng maiṭhuwm mi talu lei mma ngi mdo nor ungu tun kat daatti tak heppi kdam cha tdit thethuw chda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kchanu, ado rin chaakki kdam kcha im pti; kdaaiji vang cha.”
Mma ngi hanto mpau slii arlaanni, synagog kpupa inn thungki miilai khat karva ngi theda, “Achanua kdiyou dok cha a, Chukpu ning tpumul bong ma.”
Pdainu hava karyaa daatti Jisu ngi mhin theda, “ṭi ma, arin chdaat, mma ava kdam chdaat ra.”
Ungu Jisu ngi inn ava thu mvan thungta, Pitor, Johon, Jeems, ungu nao ava pah leh mnuh daat kma donle, ku mii khat lee ngi mdo lu ṭhi raan ro me.
Ungta mii mkheng nga kurnung karbaang da mma ṭat da; pdainu Mma ngi theda, “ṭap maan, mleija nao hava kdiyou pme, pdainu ki iip kcha ngaal.”
Ungta mma ava kdiyou dok tdit mdo dee lei inni, mmaanni Mhin pnii chaak lamda.
Pdainu mkhut tha kjowngda own thida, theda, “Nao nang ekardel.”
Ungta mraothla kinle da, ungu kardel tengda; ungta mdo chaak ra then mruk mdo piik chaak lam nra Jisu ngi the pik lamda.
Ungta mpah leh mnuh lea ngak chlam da, pdainu kthuwk nong ava ku mii khat lee hin mdo son ma nraan Jisu ngi pau pṭum da.
Ungta Mma ngi sowm lei knii rek own purkuk thida tarnam rek mkheng tun ni rutan mdo thloi nraan ungu omlai rek mdo pdam nraan rutan pii lamda.
Ungta Isowr Kruwngpaam paryaam da, ungu mdo pdam nraan sii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni ache thungki ra do khat lee hur maan, kchung daat don, thowngja daat don, thenpen daat don, sum daat don, dona knii karsak ki kuhur rome.
Ungta naanni asun duwn khim khai, alu naan inn ava thung ngi am daat in.
Ungta talu talu thung daat joso mmaanni atupthlun chaak maan ta, khuwpii ava ma da asun in mpha thu mmaan rinpaumin kupsulli, akhuwn arbaat akṭho pthiin.”
Ungta mmaanni khuw rek mkheng thu kṭha paumin kparyaam ra chet lamda, mmun ktai thung ngi pdam lamda.
Tunva hava mdo tlot mkheng ava paam kpupa Herod ti aryaa da, ungu muplung ava chei karche chowp chda, mleija mii angṭhe ngi kdiyou dok Johon kring karheella dida the da.
Mii angṭhe va Elijah kandang nga dida, mii murson rek nowl va chodu ki khulpu rek arlakki khat kardella dida theda.
Herod va theda, “Hava mlei mkheng kdo aryaak ava ku da?” Ungbi kdei chra mma ngi thlaam da.
Kenyee rekki kinle lamda mnong tlot in ava Mhin song chlam da. Ungta Mma ngi ṭhi lamda Bethsaida tdit khuwpii khat thung ngi thliir lamda.
Mii mluwngpa rekki ava mdee in thungta, mdil ṭoi lamda, ungbi Mma ngi kowl chlam da, mhin inni Isowr ki Kruwngpaam the pik lamda, ungu kdam nuwm hin pdam pik lamda.

Tunva khuw mjiin rui rui thungta, sowm lei knii rekki Mhin arva lamda, the lamda, “Mii luwng rekka apsun chlam, marveel ki khuwpaam rek leh khuw rek tha chet lam sora, miprii chaak nraan leh mdo chaak raan apha chlam so, mleija nenni ta am naan hava munna ktliing.”

Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Mdo chaak raan do mruk naanni apii chaan.” Mmaanni theda, “Neenni chet da hava mii mkheng tumra then kren kma donle, thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii kheelli do thloi chmaan ring.”
Mleija mii rekka mii pun parnga arveel kurthuwk da. Ungta Mma ngi siikhu rek hin theda, “Lop som parnga nga arveelli mko on nraan atloin.”
Ungta mmaanni anto tlo lamda, mii mkheng nga pkong lamda.
Ungta thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii Mma ngi lou da parwaan hansuw da, phowl kṭha pii thida khuida ungu miiluwngpa rek maiṭhuwm mi mdo down nra siikhu rek hin pii da.
Ungta mii mkheng ngi mpoi in kpa ngi chaa lamda. Ungu mkikleem kṭik ava tomkal sowm lei knii ngi purkuk lamda.
Tunva hanto thuwk da, Mma ngi msangtlaakki mṭhil chaak meek arlaanni, siikhu rekki Mhin thleng lamda; ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni pau khewl lamda, “Mii rek va Nea ku pi mtidit lamda?
Ungta mmaanni arthawng da, “Baptis kuptlot Johon; pdainu angṭhe rek va Elijah pi di lamda, ungta angṭhe rek nowlva chodu ki khulpu rek thungki khat kring kardel pi dilam da.”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Pdainu naanva Nea ku pi atidit inna?” Ungbi Pitor ri arthawng da, “Isowr ki Khrista ava pti.”
Pdainu Mma ngi pau pṭumda hava ku mii khat lee hin mdo the thut ma nraan, mhin inni paureen da,
theda, “Mii Chapa ava ngi do knempok thu suwkthuw kphara, ungta kver rek, thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rekki pthlei lam donle, ke eayou ra, ungu nii kdum diltha kring kardel ra.”
Ungta Mma ngi mii mkheng hin theda, “Ku mii khatti kdil mṭoi nuwm bi, mdaksaa kulro mso ungu mnii ktaiki mkhros alou sora kdil aṭoi chaso.
Mleija mrinkhu kaktlan nuwm mii ava kmaang chra, ungu kuku daat don Nei ktum mi mrinkhu mapmaan bi, mii ava kaktlan pik ra.
Mleija mii ava ngi dultipaam mkheng pha sthi sora, mmaan chaak, mata mdaksaa mmaan chaakku ava tak ksi rang da?
Mleija Nei ungta Kpauna rek tummi ning kja ksoi ku mii khat ava tumva, Mii Chapa ngi mlaarnee ngi ungta Mpah laarnee tung ngi Kchiir Waan tamsii rek tu murjun mpha thu ning kja ksoi psuk ra.”
Pdainu naan hinni Neiji mkindit kthea, hava thung ngi krip daat mii angṭhe va Isowr ki Kruwngpaam mdee du khim khai kdiyou du nime.
Tunva hava mdo the naki mnii tret na dil tha Mma ngi Pitor leh Jeems ungu Johon ṭhida, lown leenni kṭhil chra hang lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mṭhil chaak slii arlaanni, Mmai rungchen kirthleng da, mdona ava kipleu dang ngi powlda.
Ungta asuwn, Mousi leh Elijah miilai knii rekki karbiik ṭhida.
Mmaanni mlaarnee inni ktardet lamda, Jerusalem thu Mma ngi purkhum da, msun chaak nrang ki the pik lamda.
Tunva Pitor leh mmiiṭhi rekka kdung ngi mmik in khu da kurngui lamda, mkarsaal khot in thungta, Mma laarnee leh miilai knii mbe ngi krip daat dei lamda.

Ungta Mma hinki miilai knii ava msun slii arlaanni, Pitor ri Jisu hin theda, “Chukpu, hava thung ta am daat inna kṭha a, nenni buw inn kdum sa in che, Nah atumra khat, Mousi tumra khat, ungu Elijah tumra khat” mma ngi mdo the ava dei chme.
Mma ngi hava mthe arlaanni, armei khat kurjung ngi arjiil dok lamda, ungta armei thung ngi mlu dok lei inni mmaanni ṭi lamda.
Ungta armei thungki krowl khat kthleng ngi theda, “Hava Nei Kchapa, Nei Kdo kchol dok; Mhin ni aryaan!”
Ungta krowl ava ngi mthe dok le Jisua mthi ndaatti pha lamda. Ungu mmaanna rim kdi am lamda, ungta ava nit rek lim thungva, mmaanni mdo dee in ava ku mii khat lee hin do khat lee pre song lamme.
Mupduk nii ngi mmaanni lown leenki murjun in thungta, klin langlang khat mii rek mluwngpa ngi kurdut ṭhi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, mii mluwngpa thungki miilai khatti ṭap da, “Chukpu, kchapa mhai sut pik cha dinu akaktham chaakka, mleija mma knao mkhat chrel;
ungta asuw, pthla khatti kjowng da, ungu tun kat daatti owngda, mhuwn mṭhut du khim khai tnok da, ungta lim tlit kchok da, mrow kparsa ngi ma kchok da.
Ungta ava mdo trei pthii pik nlamra asiikhu rek hin kaktham kcha ping, pdainu pchaang lam mda.”
Jisu ngi arthawng da, “O, krin dei kma ungu karmak charuwl rek, tak hep pang roi ksotti Neiva aṭhiin nik don adiil ṭhiin nik da? Hava tha achapa ava arvan ṭhi.”
Mma ngi marvan slii arlaanni tarnam mi tnok ptluwda. Pdainu Jisu ngi pthla ktobor ava raida, ungta pselnao ava pdam da, ungu mpah hinni pii pinle da.
Ungbi mii mkheng nga Isowr kullaar ava tun ngak chda.
Pdainu Mma nong tlotti mii mkheng mnga chaak slii arlaanni, msiikhu rek hin Mma ngi theda,
“Hava pauna rek ava aknaa khur in thung ngi aplut in; mleija Mii Chapa ava mii rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthii ra.”
Pdainu mmaanni hava mdo the ava dei pandi chlam me, ungu mmaanni mdo dee pandit ma nraan, kurdowl kcha a; ungta hava mdo the mlei ava Mhin mdo khewl raanna ṭi chlam da.
Ungta mmaan arlakki ku ngi klin sii kdingi karteen nlam da.
Pdainu muplung thuwnni mdo reel in ava Jisu ngi deida, Mma ngi nao khat louda, msiir ri thiida,

ungu mhin inni theda, “Ku mii khatti hava nao marlaan chaak bi Nei mdo tarlaan chaak, ungta Nei mkarlaang kcha ku mii khat va Nei mju ksi Mma mdo arlaan chaak; mleija naan arlakki kdil sii mii ava ngi klin khat ra.”
Johon ni arthawng da, “Chukpu, Nah amiing ngi tarnam rek krei pthi neenni dei innu, ungbi pdown pthiinnu, mleija mma va nen ndil ṭoi mda.”
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Pdown maan; naan akahal kmaan mii ava naan atum.”
Jisua mdo arjuk arlaan chaak nra nit rek mnai thungta, Mma ngi Jerusalem ktong tha Mmai tarngai da.
Ungta Mma ngi mdu thang ngi tamsii rek haisiida, Mma tummi kpurchuwl pik rang ngi Samaria khuw khat thung va lut lamda;
pdainu mii rek va arlaang chlam me, mleija Mma ngi Jerusalem ktong tha Mmai tarngai da.
Ungta Mma siikhu rek Jeems leh Johonni ava mdee in thungta, Mhin the lamda, “Mukpu, parwaan ki mei arjung ṭumda mmaanna mukbun chaak nraan neenni kdo own raan angeija?”
Pdainu Mma ngi kinle da rai lamda.
Ungta khuw murson tha mmaanni va lamda.
Mmaanni hanto lam thu mche slii arlaan inni, miilai khatti Mhin theda, “Nah ache na ktai thung ngi aju ṭoi chni.”
Tkei rekka mkhur ka am, kjuwng puwa rekka mbuw ka am; pdainu Mii Chapa ngi mluw thiida mkarngat chaak nra mun khat lee amme.”
Ktlok mii khat hin Mma ngi theda, “Kdil aṭoi cha.” Pdainu mma ngi theda, “Mukpu, ru kri ngi vang nira kpah alruwl chdok ni.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin theda, “Kdiyou rekki mdaksaa in diyo mdo alruwl chaak nlamra ama pthi; pdainu nah tumva vangra Isowr Kruwngpaam aparyaam.”
Ktlok mii khatti theda, “Nah dil ṭoi chnik di, Mukpu; pdainu inn tha ka am mii rek hin ru kri ngi thaan chlam ni.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Mdo hoi nrang leen khut kikhiing dokki, kinle da khuw ksuw ku mii khat lee ngi Isowr Kruwngpaam kirang nga kurhui me.”
Hava dilli Mukpu ngi murson rek som tikheu ava Mma che nra khuwpii ktai leh mmun ktai thu knii nii ngi mdu tha sii lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tkhau ra ava knempokka, pdainu kakhau ra mii amme, ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Mukpu ngi takhau nrang thung ngi kakhau ra mii knempokki mdo sii nra aṭhil chaan.
Alamṭoi nraan tha chet in, asuwn, Tkei rek arlakki jao rek lulu ngi, Neiji naanna aksii inna.
Sum khau, thongja, khukok rek, khat lee kuhur rome; ungta lam thung ngi ku mii khat lee hin salaam ktlo rome.
Naanni inn thung ngi aluwn mpha thu ru kri ngi ‘Hava inn thung ngi kdaai am so!’ adiin ra atheen.
Ungta ava thung ngi kdaaiki chapa ma ambi, naan thungki kdaai ava mma leenni amso, pdainu ma am mabi, ava naan leenni kinle chra.
Ungta mmaan do piik ava achaa anee in, inn ava thung ngi jiam daat in, mleija nong klou mii ava ngi marda man mdo ngeen chaak; inn khat ki ngi inn khat tha kun thot maan.
Naanni khuwpii khat thung ngi alu in mpha thu, mmaanni atarlaan chaak inta, naan hin ado tdown pik in then ava achaan;
ava thu kukoi mii ava apdam pik chaan, ungta mhin inni atheen, Isowr Kruwngpaam ava naan hin knai tekka.
Pdainu naan luna khuwpii ava ngi atarlaan chaak maan ta, mlam ktai thung ngi chet inra atheen,
‘Naan khuwpii thungki vaiphul neen kukhu leen inni kpop ava, naan ado kupsul naan ni kukṭhot pthiinna; anto daat joso hava adei in, mleija Isowr Kruwngpaam ma knai tekka.’
Neiji naan hin kthea,nit ava thu khuwpii ava hinva Sodom mi kdiil pchaang bet ra.

“Khorasin nah tija thung ngi asuwkthi daatta! Bethsaida nah tija thung ngi asuwkthi chdaatta! Mleija naan thung ngi nong rek klin klin kthuwk ava Tyr leh Sidon thu ktlo mkurthuw tlaangbi, alraang raang ngi buwkthi kpurkhum lam donle, purvut kurbuk lamdon, plung ren kuhur chdok lamra.
Pdainu makṭewl nit thungva, naan hinva Tyr leh Sidon ni kdiil dei bet chra.
Ungta Kaparnahum nah parwaan kpha dekki kchuwng pti mo? Nah sim thu kbuk chna di.
Naan hin karyaa kcha mii ava ngi Nei kihin mdo taryaak, naan akipthlei in mii ava ngi Nei mdo tipthlei, ungta Nei mkipthlei mii ava ngi Nei mju ksii Mma ava mdo pthlei.”
Kanpa ngi som tikheu ava kinle da, theda, “Mukpu, Nah amiing ngi tarnam rek ruk neen kukurdu tha am chda!”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Parwaan ki kowl kiplek heppi seitaan ktla Neiji kdee.
Asuwn, naanni pruwl rek leh ruwlparthi tun ado ther tap nraan, ungu aksnuwm kmaan ava rutan mkheng leen, Neiji rutan ado kpiik dok in; ungta do khat lee ngi sul apurnul in nime.
Anto daat joso pthla rekki naan kurdu ngi ka amma kdingi kanpa maan; pdainu naan amiing in ava parwaan tha mdo kjit dok kdingi kanpa chaan.

Ṭhang ava kat thung ngi Jisua pthla kchiir ri kanpa da theda, “Apah, parwaan leh dulti ki Mukpu, Neiji akpanpaak chaakka, mleija Nang ngi hava lea ksing leh kdei pandi thungki kurdowlli thii tinu, ungta nao kdowng rek hin purphuwng tinu; O, Apah, hava lea Nah plungnee dongei chaak.

“Hava le mkheng nga Kpah ngi Nei kihin mdo tparlaan dok; ungta Mpah kma donle Mchapa ava ku tdit ku mii khat lee ngi dei me, mata, Mchapa ungu Mchapa ngi mdo purphuwn nra mdo kchol rek ku mii khat ava kma donle, Mpah ava ku tdit ku mii khat lee ngi dei me.”
Ava dilli siikhu rek hin karheel da tuprut ti Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan do dee kdei cha mii rek ava msuw kṭha!
Mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, khulpu rek leh kruwng rek maknem mi, naan dodee ava dei chnuwm lamda, pdainu dei chlamme, ungta naan do aryaak ava aryaa chnuwm lamda, pdainu aryaa chlam me.”
Ungta asuwn, Nowlam chukpu khatti rip da mdo pirsin na ngi Mhin theda, “Chukpu, neiji talu tloda kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava pha chnik di?”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nowlam thu talu mikjit da? Tak heppi apat?”

Ungta mma ngi arthawngda, “Nang ngi nang ki Mukpu nangki Isowr ava aplung ril mkheng, araothla mkheng, arutan mkheng, ado bin chaak mkheng tu wonsat adolo ra; ungta aveen ava adaksaa lulu ngi wonsat adolo ra.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Kindit deekki nang ngi arthaanna, hava atlo ungu ring nadi.”
Pdainu mma ngi mdaksaa kpindit nuwm da, Jisu hin theda, “Nei kveenna kule da?”

Jisu ngi arthawng da, “Miilai khat ava Jerusalem ki ngi Jerikho tha jungda, ungbi namtrom rek khut thung ngi tla da, ungu mdomna lowng chlam thida bun lamda, kdiyou lulu ngi ma pthii lamda, ungu sun chlam da.
Tunva mpha ava kat thung ngi thiimpu khatti ava lam junṭoida, ungu mma ngi ava mdee thungta, khat ktong tha lam lep da jung da.
Ava lulu ngi Levi khat rukka mmun ava thung ngi thleng da, mma ngi mdee thungta khat ktong tha lam lep da jung da.
Pdainu Samaria miilai khat va kipjiin kcha ngi mma amna tha thlengda, mma ngi mdee thungta wonsat lo chda,
hai pha da, mlim na rek ava thao leh rik rou dii pbul pik thida bowl pik da, mma saaṭhi ava leenni ptuwngda, malthlun na inn khat thung ngi ṭhida, ungu sok lo chda.

Ungta mupduk nii va mma ngi dinarii knii louda malthlun na ksut pṭoi mii ava hin theda, ‘Mma ava tuk mhai sut pik cha, ungu nang ngi kheelli ado pche ava neiji karvan kinlet thung ngi achoi chdaat nik di.’
Hava miilai kdum rek arlakki ku ngi namtrom khut thung ngi ktla mii ava veen kurthuwkka, nang va ku rang ngi abinna?”
Mma ngi theda, “Mma wonsat klo cha mii avara.” Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Vangra ava heppi atlo.”
Tunva mmaanni lam tha hanto mche slii arlaanni, Mma ngi khuw khat thu lut da, mmiing Martha tdit snu khatti mi inn thu pthlung chda.
Ungta Mukpu khu ther ri ku ongda Mma do purchu karyaa kcha mmiing Mery tdit mnaonu khat amda.

Pdainu Martha ava msoklo ra mnem leiji mning mulda, Mhin vada theda, “Mukpu, knaonuva nei kthii ndaat sok klou rang nga mhai ma pthiida, ava Nangva tuk msut pik nim timo? Mdo tbom nra mhai the pik cha.”
Pdainu Mukpu ngi mhin arthawng da, “Martha, Martha, nangva do knempok leen aning mulda aplung kjiing nga;
do khat pang akriinna. Mery va mma thungki talo pchaan mara kṭha ava mtum rang ngi mukchol chaakka.”
Mma ngi mmun khat thung ngi ṭhil slii da, ungta mupṭut dok thungta, msiikhu rekki Mhin theda, “Mukpu, Johon ni msiikhu rek mdo purchu heppi tiṭhil chaak na mhai purchuk chaan.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda,
“Naanni aṭhil chaak in mpha thu hanto aṭhil chaan:
“Apah, Nah amiing kunlor kurthuwk so. Nah Akruwngpaam kurjung kurthuwk so.
Mnii ktaiki thenpen mnii ktaiji mhai pii chaan,
ungta kupnu ton in mhai ptlot pik chaan, mleija neen kdaksaan rukva neenki lei ktuwl rek kdo ptlot pik in; ungu kepthleem thu mhai ptla chmaan.”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan arlakki plap kthloi ku mii khat ti than ṭimmi mhin vada, ‘Cham, thenpen kdum pang mhai purpuwk cha;
mleija kaplap khat kipjiing thlungda, mhin kdo piik chaak ra do khat lee thloi chma nu,’ dida mthe chaakku;
mthung ki ngi, ‘Mhai pja ma; tunva thurngot arkam dok nu, knaole tu kowm leen ki iip dok in ping; kardel da do khat lee apii pchaang ni maang,’ di donle mmava karthawng rang mo?
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mma plap kat mkurthut leiji, mma ngi kardel da do khat lee pii mdaat rang joso, maplap kurthuwk da, mdo ṭhil reen leiji kardel donle mdo kriin chaak khim khai kpii ra.
“Ungta Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, aṭhil chaan, akpii chraan, athlaam in, ungu pha chnaan di; thurngot aṭhil in, akpvan pik chraan.
Mleija kṭhil cha mii pum ktaiji arlaang chda, ungta kthlaam kcha mii ngi pha chda, ungu thurngot kṭhil mii ava hin kapvan pik ra.
Naan arlakki tak hep kdu lu mpah hin mchapa ngi tuwlva khat mṭhil na tuwlva khat kchang mhin pruwl khat kpii rang mo;
Mata mma ngi harpardi khat mṭhilna, mhin ruwl parthi khat kpii rangmo?
Naanni kṭha kma kurthuwk daat jownti, anao le hin do kṭha apiik de innu, parwaan tha ka am Apah in ngaalva Mhin kṭhil cha rek hinni kheel sii ki pthla kchiir ava kpii chra!”
Tunva mpao kthuwk kma tarnam khat Mma ngi rei pthiida; tarnam ava msun dok thungta, mpau kthuwk kma miilai ava pauda, ungbi mii rekka ngak chda.
Pdainu mii murson rek va theda, “Tarnam rek kruwng chapa Belyebul rutan ni Mmava Tarnam rek mdo rei pthi.”
Mii angṭhe ngi Mhin mdo pirsin naanni, parwaan ki titinna khat thlaam lamda.
Pdainu Mma ngi muplung bin in ava deida, mhin inni theda, “Kruwngpaam khim khaiji mraal karpii sora mthii na ngi mkinṭhen chaak bi ava do si nime, ungu mdo ṭhen inn ava ktluw chra.
Ungta seitaan rukva mdaksaa mṭhen chaak bi, mukruwng paam ava tak heppi krip rang? Mleija Neiji tarnam rek kdo rei pthii ava naanva Belyebul rutan pi kdingi theen tinu.
Belyebul rutan ni Neiji tarnam rek krei pthii kukurthut tu, naan achapa leva ku rutanni mdo rei pthiin da? Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, mmaanni naanna akikṭewl raan.
Pdainu Neiji Isowr khut chel rutan ni krei pthii kukurthut bi, Isowr Kruwngpaam ava naan leenni kurjung nga.
“Ruktang miilai khatti rawl dona kurthlong da, mdaksaa amna munna mseel chaakbi, mdo mna rekka kurkhum ra,
pdainu mma hinni mruktang bet khat thleng sora mapchaan chaak bi, mma lamrin chaak rawl dona ava klowng chra, ungu kmaang chdok ava kthamve lamra.
Neitu kilṭhi kma mii ava Nei kraal mikpii, ungta Nei tu kurkuk kma mii ava kinvei chra.

“Pthla ktobor ri miilai khat thungki msun dok mpha thu, mkarngat nra mun rek kthlaamra dii amna ma thu chet da, ungu khat lee mphaak ma thungta, mma ngi theda, ‘Neiji karvan thuw dokna inn ava thung ngi kinle chdaat ni.’
Ungu mma ngi marvan thungta, tru deek ungta kintiing deekki mma ngi pha da.

Ava dilli mma ngi chet da mma hinva kheel sii ngi kṭha kma ktlok pthla rek tikheu arvan ṭhida; ungu mmaanni lut lam da, ava thung ngi am lamda; ungbi mdonna thangva miilai ava chodu ki hinva kheel sii ngi jul chda.”
Mma ngi hava mthe slii arlaanni, mii mluwngpa arlakki snu miilai khatti kdung owngda Mhin theda, “Nah ado tuhurna poi, ungta Nah dojown arnuw ava msuw kṭha!”
Pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Isowr pauna aryaa da kirkhii mii ava ngi msuwkṭha!”
Miiluwng rekka mnem bet bet thungta, Mma ngi kthe pṭhunda, “Hava charuwl rekka kṭha kma charuwl rek lam, titinna khat thlaam lamda, pdainu Jonah ki titinna kma donle, titinna khat lee kpii rome.
Mleija Jonah ngi Ninevah mii rek biitinna mkurthut ava lulu ngi, Mii Chapa rukka hava charuwl rek biitinna kurthuwk ra.

Kurdu ktong ki kruwngnuh ngi hava charuwl rek tu kilṭhi ngi makṭewl nitva rip donle mraal kpii lamra; mleija dultipaam mdon na kingi Solomon lousing karyaa chra thleng da, ungu asuwn, Solomon hinnu klin khat hava thung ngi ka am daatta.

Makṭewl nitva Ninevah mii rekki hava charuwl mii rek tu kilṭhi ngi krip ra, ungu mraal kpii lamra; mleija mmaanni Jonah doparyaam thung ngi plung ren hur lamda; ungu asuwn, Jonah hinnu klin khat hava thung ngi ka am daatta!
“Ku mii khat lee ngi meila pchuk thida innden mata tomkol tingi thii nime, pdainu klut mii rekki mar awng mdo dee nra, mrina khat tunni kthii ra.
Naanki daksaa meila ava mik, naan ki mik ava mdam bi, adaksaan mkheng nga mar awng ngi kdim chra; pdainu ava mdam mabi, adaksaanna pum jiing ngi kjiing chra.
(Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, naan thungki mar awng mjiin ma nra cheek asin dei chaan.)
Naan adaksaan mkheng nga mar awng ngi mdim bi, mjiin nra mun amni me, meila ar awng ngi kleng lulu ngi mkheng nga kleng ra.”
Mma ngi mpau slii arlaanni, Pharisi khat ti mdo maal ṭhi chaak nra Mhin the chda; ava leiji Mma ngi vanṭoi da tebol be ngi ku ongda.
Mma ngi mmaal du ngi mkhut mdo alṭhut ma mdee thungta, Pharisi ava kdung ngi ngak chda.
Ungta Mukpu ngi mhin theda, “Tunva Pharisi rek naanni tong leh arkuw ava mduwn knowt in tinu, pdainu naan aril inna kṭha kma ngi pum dimmi dim chda.
Ka aak rek naan! Mduwnki ki kseem Mma va mthungki ruk mdo seem pme mo?
Pdainu mthung ngi ka am dona ava karpii dei chaan; ungu asuwn, naan atum inva do mkheng nga kartleu dok kurthuwk.

“Pdainu Pharisi rek naanna sukthi! mleija naanni chiibaal, chasowm,mkheng tholowm piin ti, ungta mkindit leh Isowr wonsat leek psuk inti; hava lea naanni ado tlot raan kurthuwkka, ktlok rek ado leek daak in ro nime.
Pharisi rek naanna asuwnkthi! mleija synagog rek thung ngi longkhom kṭha ngeen inti ungu mii kurtuwlna mun rek thung ngi salaam ngei intinu.
Naanna asuwn kthi! mleija naanna tdee ma thlaan rek hep daat in pti, ungu avale tun ni mii rekki kdei kma ngi mdo ther chown in thlaan rek ava hep daat in pti.”
Nowlam chukpu rek thungki khatti Mhin arthawng da, “Chukpu, hava ado the ngi neen ruk mhai rai chaan in pti.”

Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Nowlam chukpu rek naan rukka asuwnkthi! mleija miirek do diil pchaan mara bowr krik puhur in thiin tinu, naan adak saanva bowr krik ava akhut chel in daat rap rukva thowng maan ti.
Naan ava asuwnkthi! mleija naanki apah le do eayo khulpu rek thlaan sa in tinu.
Hanto naanni sakhi rek kurthuwkki apah leen do tlot ava rot pik in tinu; mleija mmaanni eayou lamda, naanni mthlaan rek sak pik in tinu.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Isowr lousing rukva theda, ‘Neiji khulpu rek leh kenyee rek sii nik di, murson rekka mmaanni eayou lam don tjat traan kpii lamra.’
Dultipaam mapṭhan daat ki khulpu rek mkheng hii,

Abel hii thungki ngi Sakharija hii kpha, kchiir suwlbuwr leh mmun kchiir arlakki kmaang kcha mkheng ki hii ava hava charuwl rek thung ngi karngai ra. Oji, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava charuwl rek thung ngi karngai kat ra.
Nowlam chukpu naanna asuwnkthi! mleija tdee naki chungkam naanni lou dok thiin ti, adaksaan ruk lut maan ti, ungu klut ra mii rek ruk khaan pthiin tinu.”
Mma ngi hava thungki msun dok thungta, nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rekki, pau knempok kikhewl pṭhun lamda, ungta mplung apthit sora do knempok mdo the nra,
Mma ngi do mruk mthe ta, tukjown nraan kdingi Mhin arda lamda.
Ungta ava arlaanni mii rek mpunpa rek knempok ki karthel da mthuw kurtuwl in thungta, ru kri reeppi msiikhu rek hin kthe pṭhun da, “ṭha tlot ktlo Pharisi rek thowl ava cheek asin dei chaan.
Kandang kma ngi mdo khum daat ra do khat lee ame, mata tdee mara kurdowl daat do khat lee ame.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, naanni kjiing thung ngi ado theen ava mar awng thung ngi karyaa ra, ungu tuprutti innka thung ngi akarbiik in ava innthlun tunni kparyaam ra.
“Kaplap rek, naan hinni kthea, daksaa daat eayou pchaang thida ava diltha kheelli do khat lee ktlo pchaang kma mii rek ava ṭi chmaan.
Pdainu naanni ado ṭit raan mii ava lamchi Neiji pau aju kham pik in ni, mii mi eayo dok diltha sim thung ngi kvar pchaangki rutan kthloi Mma lamchi aṭi chaan!
“Priit rek parnga ava peisa knii ngi mdo jur pme mo? Ungta Isowr maiṭhuwm va khdaat pre parngiil me.
Talu lei da, naan aluw leen inki sam mkheng rukka mdo tai dok ma, ṭi maan, naanna priit rek knempok kheel dekki mman klu kurthuwk in pti.
“Ungta Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mii rek maiṭhuwm mi kandang ngi makthe thuw kcha mii pum ktaija, Mii Chapa rukva Isowr ki Waan tamsii rek maiṭhuwm mi kandang ngi kthe thut pik ra;
pdainu mii rek maiṭhuwm mi mkipthlei mii ava, Isowr Waan tamsii rek maiṭhuwm mi kipthleira.
“Ungta Mii Chapa ava mraal kpii ngi pauna kthe mii pum ktai ava kuptlot pik ra; pdainu pthla kchiir tun ni plaal da mraal kpii mii pum ktai ava ptlot pik nime.
Ungta mmaanni synagog rek paam kpu rek, ungu ruktang rek maiṭhuwm mi at ṭhiin mpha thu, tak heppi, mata talu arthawng nik di, mata talu naanni the nikaan di dida plung pjiin maan;
mleija ṭhang ava kat thung ngi ado the raanna pthla kchiir ri akpurchuk chraan.”
Kurtuwl mii rek thungki khat ti Mhin theda, “Chukpu, ku u pa tu alrou kdo panthem ve nraan mhai the pik cha.”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin theda, “Miilai, ku ngi Neia kekṭewl ra mata naanve akthem pik raan mdo tsii da?”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tuk asut dei chaan, ungu hangmal mii mkheng asuw pṭoi dei chaan, mleija miilai khat rinkhu ava alrou knempok mdo thloi lei pme.”
Ungta mhin inni Mma ngi pau purtolli theda, “Paam kthloi suwangpa khatti chasowm knempokki arkun da;
ungu mthii na ngi hanto bin da, ‘Neiji talu tlo nik damma, mleija chasowm kdo purtuwl nra ame’.
Ungta mma ngi theda, ‘Neiji hava etlo ni; kuktomma ṭhit pthii ni, ungu klin betti khat sa ni; ungta ava thung ngi chasowm leh kdona mkheng nga purtuwl ni.
Ungu neiji kraothla hin the ni, raothla, adona rekka kum roi ksot kira knempokki ra nang ngi athloija, nang ngi tik kinteuvi achaa aneera am cha.’
Pdainu Isowr ri mhin theda, ‘Ka aak! Snii jaan ni nah araothla ava mṭhilla; ungu nah do purchuwl dona rekka kule do rang da?’ ”
Isowr ktong tha suwang kthuwk kma daksaa tummi alrou kpurtuwl mii ava anto ra.

Ungta Jisu ngi msiikhu rek hin tha theda, “Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni rinkhu tummi talu chaa nik di, mata adaksaan tummi talu hiil naa ni kaan di kdingi plung pja maan.
Mleija rinkhua then kikheel dek ungu daksaa ava dona kikheel dek.

Pa aah rekka asuwn, tapṭau ruk pṭau lamme, chasowm ruk arvei lamme, mdo purtuwl nraan ktom ruk thloi lamme, mdo thiik nraan ruk ame, joso Isowr ri mdo pmaal chaak lam, ungu puwa rek kikheel dekki naanna mman klu in pti!
Ungta naan ni plung ado pjat lei inni arinkhu inna khutup khdaat pang rap klu apursown pchaan in mo?
Hava mikdil sii mak rap klu ktlo pchaang kma va, talu leiji ktlot mursonna plung apjat psuk inna?

Duwm rei rekka tak heppi kmowng tdit abin phaak in, nong kmei lamme, plaa ruk arvai lamme, anto daat joso ahin thaanni Neiji kthea, Solomon daat rap klua mlaarnee mkheng nga havale hep daatti hiilnaa me.

Pdainu snii ngi bil thung ngi kring daat pduk nii ngi lungplu thung ngi tvar pthiira arnaa rek mak klua Isowr ri mipihiil mapnaakku, naanna tak hep pang thung ngi akipihiil akapnaak chraan, O, mruk suwnni krin mii rek naan!
Ungta naanni talu chaa nik di talu nee nik di kdingi thlaam da plung pja maan.
Mleija dultipaam thungki chati rek mkheng ngi havale mdo thlaam, ungu naan do kriin ava naanki Apah ngi mdo dee dok.
Ava kchang nga, Mma Kruwngpaam athlaam chaan, ungta havale mkheng nga ak tpom pik chraan.
“Ṭi maan, jao suwn rek, mleija naanki Apah in va Kruwngpaam kṭha ado tpiik chaak raanna mdo ngei kurthuwk.

Naanni sum alrou ajur inra, ekkarpii chaan, kṭuw knai kma ki sumbuwr atum raan arkhii chaan, mleija kupru ngi knai pchaang kma, reiṭha ngi mdo pṭum kre pchaan ma, parwaan ava tha kchuwl liit kmara alrou apurtuwl chaan.
Mleija asumbuwr in amna thung ngi aplung bin in rukka ka amra.
“Naanni arkowl apnet inra meila kṭuwng ngi am in;
Ungta kphal kmaal kchet mmaan ki Kpupa ngi thlungda thurngot mṭhil daat le mmaanni mdo pvan pik teng nra karda cha mii rek lulu kurthuwk in.

Mma ngi murjun mpha thu mik khut kahar daatti sra owr rek mdo phaak ra ava msuwkṭha; kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Mma ngi mdaksaa ki arkowl pnet thidonle, mmaanna tebol be ngi pkong lam don, ungta Mma ngi arjung donle sok klo pik lamra.
Mma ngi mvei knit na mata mvei kdumna murjun thu anto heppi mphaak lambi, sra owr rek mmaanna msukṭha!
Pdainu hava adei in, innkpupa ngi kupru thlen naki mpha mdee chaak daat tlaangbi, minn mdo kruwl ma nra tlown daak nime.
Naan rukka apurchuwl inra jiam in, mleija Mii Chapa ava naan dobin phaak liit ma ṭhang thu kurjung kro.”
Pitor ri theda, “Mukpu, hava pau purtol ava neen daat mo mata mkheng ki tummi ado theda?”
Ungbi Mukpu ngi theda, “Mpha kcha ngi mmaan hin mtum in then mdo piik nlamra, mmaanki innkpupa ngi inn ava tun mkheng ksut pṭoira mdosi, trin chaak kro ksing nong kpuw ava ku rang da?
Chukpu ngi mthlen mpha thu ktlo slii ngi mdo phaak sra owr mma ava msukṭha.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mma ava mdo thloi khim khai kpaa nra kthii ra.
Pdainu, ‘Neiki Chukpua kukto ngi kthlung ra,’ dida sra owr mdaksaa mthi nangi athe sora, sra owrpa rek leh sra owrnu rekka bunda, chaanee da, prida ma ammu,
sra owr avaki Chukpu ngi mma dobin phaak liit ma nit khat thu, mma dodee ma ṭhang ava thu, mthlenbi, mma ava mraal pii donle krin dei kma rek tu kilṭhi ngi kthii pthiira.
Ungta mma Chukpu do ngei kdei, pdainu kpurchuwl kma mdit mata, mma dongei dil kṭoiji ktlo kma mii ava kdung ngi kchung karlaang chra.

Pdainu kdei cha kma ungu kchung kuhur jap ra mii ava ko ol haiji kchung kuhur ra. Ungu knemmi mdo piik mii khim khai hinni knemmi karngai ra, ungta mii rek hin knemmi mdo silna hinki mmaanni knemmi kingeenra.
“Neia dultipaam thung ngi mei kthlaar kurjung ping; ungta ava kbuwng slii meek da ka amma!
Neiji baptis kdo tlot ṭhira baptis khat ka am, ungta ava mkurkhum du khim khai Neiji tak heppi namduwl nik da!
Neia dultipaam thung ngi kdaai kpii ra kurjung pi kdingi abin inmo? Ava pme, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, kṭhen rangki ping;
mleija tunki kupṭhunni inn khat thungki miilai parnga ava miilai kdummi miilai knii mraal kpiira ungta miilai knii ngi miilai kdum mraal pii donle kinṭhen ra;

mpah ngi mchapa raal pii don mchapa ngi mpah raal kpii ra, mnuh ngi mchanu raal pii don mchanu ngi mnuh raal kpii ra, makternu ngi makmou raal pii don makmouvi makternu raal pii donle mmaan ava kṭhen pthiira.”
Kurtuwl mii rek hin rukva Mma ngi theda, “Naanni kniw tlaak na ktongtha armei kparniim adee in mpha thu, naanni the teng inti, ‘Khuw krara,’ ungu anto katti thuwkda.
Ungta kurdu ktongki tirthli mraan che, naanni theen ti, ‘Kdung ngi kang kthlungra,’ ungu anto katti thuwkda.
ṭha tlot ktlo naan! Dultile parwaan mo owng kdeiji pau apurlup in, pdainu mpha ava tak heppi tpurlu rang tdit dei maan timo?
“Ungta naan adaksaan kat tumva talu lei kinditti kṭewl maan ti?

Naan akro kmaan miitu kikṭewl ra ache slii arlaan inni, lam tha akulrot dok nraan atloin, anto mkurthut mabi, kikṭewl rang hin akṭhiraan, ungta kikṭewl miiva nong klin kpuw hin akpii pthii raan, ungu nong klin kpuwva rowng inn thung ngi akdaal raan.
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naan do piik ra mṭut naki sum ava apiik dok du in khim khai mun ava thungki thuwk pchaang ni maan ti.”
Mpha ava kat thung ngi Pilat ti Galil mii rek hii ava tlaai mdo down tu mpur chuwmma tdit mii angṭhe ngi Mhin son pik da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni arthawng da, “Galil mii rekki suwk mthuw lei inni Galil mii rek mkheng nga kheel sii ngi pnu kirvei rek pi kdingi abin inmo?
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ava liit pme; pdainu naanni plung apinlet maanbi, naan akheng in rukka anto maang chnaan di.
Mata Siloham thungki innmai ktluw ngi mdo nenyo mii sowm lei tret ava Jerusalem thu ka am mii rek mkheng hinnu kheel sii ngi ktuwl riim cha rek kdingi naanni abin inmo?
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ava liit pme; pdainu naanni plung ren ahur liit maanbi, anto heppi naan rukka maang chnaan di.”
Ungta Mma ngi hava paupurtolli theda, “Miilai khatti rikrou bil thung ngi kduwt ding khat phunda; ungta mma ngi mthei kthlaamra arva da, ungu khat lee pre pha mda.
Ungbi mma ngi rik rou bil knum hin theda, ‘Asuw, hava kum kdum lik thung ngi neiji kduwt thei kthlaamra arva kchok nu, ungu pha maang, Talu leiji dul kpartlai krep rangda, aphur pthii lo?’
Ungbi mma ngi mhin arthawngda, ‘Ocha, hava kum rukva am chdaat so, neiji ploi nira vuwr thida haar thlaak ni.
Ungta taikummi thei mchui ta, ṭha che; pdainu thei mchui mata, phuwr pthii daat ndi.’ ”
Tunva Mma ngi sabath nitti synagog khat thung ngi purchuk da.
Ungta kum sowm lei tret lik thung ngi pthla khat omlai kirvei cha snu khat amda, mdaksaa ava kirjii pchaang kma ngi tkum chda.
Ungu Jisu ngi mdee thungta, ownda mhin theda, “Snu, nah a omlai thungki karthlet kcha im pti.”
Ungta Mma ngi mleenni mkhut khiin pikda, ungbi tun kat daatti mma ava kirjii da, Isowr panpaak chda.

Pdainu synagog kpupava kdung ngi plung pthit da, mleija sabath nitti Jisu ngi mii pdamda, mma ngi mii rek hin theda, “Nong tatlot nra nii truk lik ka am, ava nit rek thung ngi arva ra apdam, ava sabath nit rek thung rang pme.”
Ava dilli Mukpu ngi mhin theda, “ṭha tlot ktlo nang! Naan mii pum ktaiji sabath nitti asil in mata, askowlraam in ado kom in thungki parthlet inti, dii kpii ra ṭhi maan timo?
Ungta Abraham chanu khat kthuwk hava snu ava, seitaan ni kum sowm lei tret lik thung ngi mdo bowl, ava sabath nit khat thung ngi tparthle pik ro memo?”
Hava theda Mma ngi Mma kusnuwm kma mii rek khim khaija ning kja piida; ungta kunlor nong mkheng Mma dotlot ava ngi mii rek mkheng nga kanpa chda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Mma ngi theda, “Isowr Kruwngpaam ma tak mdutta? Ungu ava Neiva talu purtol nik di?
Ava miilai khatti anruwng muh louda innbil thung ngi mdovar lulu; ungta mowngda, ding klin khat kurthuwk da, ungu kjuwng puwa rekki mbaak rek leen mbuw sa chlam da.”
Ungta Mma ngi the nowl da, “Isowr Kruwngpaam ma tak purtol nik damma?
Ava snu miilai khatti tpartee na jaam ava kdum louda, thowl thlaak da, mkheng mkurhou du khim khai mdo parhou ava hep daat kurthuwk.”
Jerusalem kphara Mma ngi khuwpii rek leh khuw rek tha chet da purchuk da.
Ungta ku mii khatti Mhin theda, “Mukpu, mdo ktlan dok mii rekka mruk daat mo?” Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda,
“Thurngot ktarbik thu alu nraan kanthi atloin; mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mii knempok ki klut rangki kthlaamra ungta pchaang nime.

Inn kpupa ngi kardel da thurngot markam dok diltha, naanni duwn tha rip da thurngot ṭhilda, ‘Mukpu, thurngot mhai pvan pik chaan,’ dida kthe pṭhun naan di, pdainu Mma ngi naanna adei maan ring, tva ki kthleng in pti di donle akarthawng raan.
Ava dilli naanni kthe pṭhun naandi, nah a awng ngi neenni chaanee innu, neen ki inn lam in thung ngi Nang ngi purchuk tinu.
Pdainu Neiji naan hin kthea, ‘Naanna tva ki kthleng in pti Neiji adei maan ring, Kihin ki sun dok in, kṭha kma ktlo naan akheng in,’ didon Mma ngi kthera.
Naanni Abraham, Isek, Jakob ungta khulpu rek mkheng Isowr Kruwngpaam thung ngi adee in mpha thu ṭap da ahaa in kril naan di, ungta naan adaksaa in katta akikneng pthii raan.
Ungta mii rekki kniw thuwna ki leh kniw tlaak naki, ungu karthak ki leh kurdu ki thleng donle Isowr Kruwngpaam tha tebol be ngi kmaal kuk ong lamra.
Ungta asuwn, ru kri kira dil knau kcha mii ka amma, ungu dil knau rangki ru kri kcha mii angṭhe ka amma.”
Mpha ava kat thung ngi Pharisi rek mii angṭhe ngi arva da Mhin theda, “Hava thungki sun dok, mleija Herod ti ake eayou ra mthlaam ma.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Vang inra tkei ava hin atheen, ‘Asuw, snii ruk pduk ruk neiji tarnam rek rei pthiida, ungu kapdam tlo nik di, ungta mnii kdumna ngi Nei knong tlot ava kurkhum ra.’
Anto daat joso snii ruk pduk ruk ungta adai nii rukva Neiji tlo daat nik di; mleija Jerusalem duwn tha khulpu khat lee kmaang rome.

O,Jerusalem, Jerusalem, nah hinni kdo juk sii khulpu rek ava eayou tinu lung ngi ado deen lam! Harnuh ngi mapthla tingi msuwn rek mdo om purku lulu ngi Neiva nah naolea tak hep pang kurnowlda, om purkuk lam nik da, pdainu nangva ro nuwm mti.
Asuw, nah inn ava kmaak pthia, ungta Neiji ahin kthea, ‘Mukpu miing ngi kurjung Mma ava msuw kṭha,’ dida athe du khim khai nang ngi mdei liit nim ti!”
Sabath nii khatti Mma ngi Pharisi rek arlakki paam kpupa khat inn thung ngi kmaal ra chet da, ungbi mmaanni Mma sut pṭoi lamda.
Ungta asuwn, Mma du sukki ktar thliing miilai khat amda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi Nowlam chukpu rek leh Pharisi rek hin theda, “Sabath nitti kapdam ava Nowlam do rot mo mata do rot pme?”
Pdainu mmaanni rim kdi am lamda. Ava dilli Mma ngi kjowngda pdam pik thida, psun da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan ku mii khat ki chapa khat mata msil ava sabath nitti diirum thung ngi mtlaak dokku, ava ṭen pthuwk teng ni maan timo?”
Ungta mmaanni hava arthawng pchaang lamme.
Tunva mdo own chaak rekki mun takjat mdo arkal in leiji paupurtol khatti mhin inni theda,
“Ku mii khatti kphal thu kmaal ra atu own chaak in mpha thu, takjat mun thu ko ong maan, mleija naan hinva ksong bet khat mma ngi ku own kcha ruk kro;
ungu naanve knii aku own kchaan mii ava ngi arvang donle, ‘Hava mma hin ako onna apii cha,’ mata mmun kchowm leen ku ong dida mthebi, aning kakjak kupṭhun ra.

Pdainu naan ato own chaak in mpha thu mmun kchowm sii tun arvaan ra ku ong in, ungta ako own kchaan mii ava ngi arvang don atdee in bi, ‘Cham, kchuwng bet tunni vang ko ong,’ kdira ungta tebol be ngi ado ko onṭhin maiṭhuwm mi naanna takkjat khat kurthuwk naan di.
Mleija ku mii khatti mdaksaa kpunlor kcha mii ava kjuwm mi kthii ra ungu mdaksaa kjuwm mi ka am mii ava kpunlor ra.”

Mma ko own kcha mii ava hin rukva Mma ngi theda, “Nang ngi kjiingki kmaal mata kmaal khat a own chaak ki mpha thu, nah aplap rek, a u anao rek, arilam rek, mata suwang aveen rek daat own ma, mmaan rukva akpinlet pik rang ngi aku own purthul kcha kro.
Pdainu nang ngi kmaal khat apiik mpha thu, sra mii rek, kyeng rek, mkhu kyeng, mik ktot rek, a own cha,
ungu nah sukṭha kurthuwk na di, mleija mmaanni apurthul pik pchaang nime. Nang ava rinkindit mii ngi mrin karheel mpha thu akpii purthul pik chra.”
Tebol be ngi Mma do ko onṭhi khatti ava aryaa da, Mhin theda, “Chukpu, Kruwngpaam tha thenpen kchara mii ava msuw kṭha!”
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin theda, “Mpha khat thu miilai khatti kmaal klin langlang khat tlo da, ungu mii knempok own chda;
ungu kmaal pha mve thungta, mdo own rek hin msra owr rek siida, theda, ‘Arvaan, mleija tunva mkheng kurchuwl dokka.’
Pdainu mmaan mkheng ngi kinṭim sappi maap kṭhil pṭhun sap lamda. Ru kri ki ngi theda, ‘Neia bil khat ren chnu, ungu chet da kdo sut ma ro mda; ahinni kthe chaakka, maap mhai tlot pik cha.’
Ungta khat nowlli theda, ‘Neia silpa sik parnga ren chnu, neiji va nira mthit maṭhat suw lap chni; ahinni kthe chaakka, maap mhai tlot pik cha.’
Ungta ktlok khat nowlli theda, ‘Neia numei khat lou chnu, ungu ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da kva pchaang chrang maang.’

Ava leiji sra owr ri arvang da mma chukpu hin song chda. Ava dilli inn kpupa ngi plung pthit da sra owr hin theda, ‘Kbeiji khuwpii ki paam rek lamṭhuwm ktai thung ngi chet ra, sra rek, kseek rek, ungu mik ktot rek arvan ṭhi lam.
Ungta sra owr ri theda, ‘Ocha, nah paureen khim khai ktlot dokka, ungu ktlong ngi ka am pok daatta.’
Ungta chukpu ngi msra owr hin theda, ‘Vara lampii rek leh inn arlak rek thung ngi chet ra mii rekka trinkma ki inn mdim nra arvan ṭhi lam.
Mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, kdo own rek ku mii khat lee ngi Neiki kmaal ava partem chlam nime.’ ”
Tunva klin langlang kurtuwl mii rek tu kilṭhi da, ungbi Mma ngi kinle da mhin inni theda,
“Ku mii khatti Nei kihin marvan rang bi, mpah, mnuh, mnumei, mnaole, mṭapa, mchernu, mdo maak ra, Oji, mma mdak kat rinkhu ruk mapder chaak mabi, Nei ksiikhu kurthuwk pchaang nime.
Mdaksaa khros hurda Nei kdil kṭoi kma mii ava, Nei ksiikhu kurthuwk pchaang nime.
Mleija innmai kchuwng ngi ksa rangki ku mii khatva, ava mdo pṭut nrang ki mman tai donle ungu khop mo khop nime di don ru kri ngi ku ongda plung parseel nime mo?
Anto mkurthut mabi, mma ngi berkcho phun dok thida, ungta mupṭut pchaan mabi, kdei mii mkheng va kipnii chaak pṭhun donle,
kthera, ‘Hava miilai va ksara pṭhun dok thida pṭuw pchaang me.’

Mata rawlmii rek mii punsowm daat kthloi kruwng khatti rawlmii rek mii pun som knii kthloi kruwng khat hin rawl mdo karnaak ṭhi rang ava, mma dothloi limva pchaang mo pchaang nime di donle ru kri ngi ku ong da plung parseel nime mo?
Mma ngi mapchaanma rangbi, ktlok khat ava ngi lam mkarlat slii daat thung ngi mdo pdaai dok nra pau ksongra mii ksira.
Ava hep daat lulu ngi naan ku mii khat rukva, mdo thloi mkheng mmaak pthii mabi, Nei ksiikhu kurthuwk pchaang nime.
“Ptih ava kṭha; pdainu ma al mmaan chaakbi, tak heppi ka al nowl rang?
Ptih ava paam tum daat don, haar rang daat don do sime, mii ngi mdo var pthii. Taryaak na knaa kthloi ku mii khatti aryaa chso.”
Tunva khasna klou rek leh pnu kirvei rekva Mhin karyaa chra nai lamda.
Ungta Pharisi rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki tuprutti karseel psuk lamda, the lamda, “Hava miilaiva pnu kirvei mii rek kowl lamda mmaal ṭhi lamma.”
Ava leiji Mma ngi hava paupurtol li mhin inni theda:
“Naan ku mii khatti jao arjaa khat mdo thloi thungki khat mmaan chaakku, som tku lei tku ava kbowk laiji mapthii donle, kmaang cha khat ava mphaak du khim khaiji mdil ṭoida thlaam ni memo?
Ungu mma ngi mphaak thungbi, kanpa da, mlukou leen thiida.
Ungta mma ngi inn thlungda maplap rek leh mveen rek own purkuk da, mhin inni theda, ‘Mhai kanpat ṭhi chaan, mleija kmaang dok kcha nei kjao ava pha chnu.’

Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava hep hep daatti, plung ren mdo hur nra arleek setti ka am kma, rinkindit dok rek mii som tku lei tku hinva pnu kirvei khatti plung ren mdo hur ava tummi parwaan tha kanpa ka amra.
“Mata snu miilai khatti thiir sum sowm mdo thloi thungki khat mmaan leiji meila pchuk da innruwt da mphan du khim khai ktippi suwda thlaam ni memo?
Ungta mma ngi mphaak thungta maplap rek leh mveen rek own purkuk da theda, ‘Mhai kanpat ṭhi chaan, mleija neiji kdo pmaan chaak dok thiir sum ava pha chnu.’
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, anto hep daatti, pnu kirvei khatti plung ren mdo hur leiji Isowr waan tamsii rek maiṭhuwm mi kanpa ka am.”
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Chapa knii kthloi miilai khat amda.
Ungu mnaopa ava ngi mpah hin theda, ‘Apah nei ktum alrou ava mhai pii cha.’ Ungta mdo thloi rek ava mikniing inni them pik lamda.
Ungu nii mruk diltha mchapa kmova mtum mkheng purkuk thida, khuwpaam lamkla tha pveet chda, ava tha mma alrouva do kipsit kma partlai tir krep da.
Ungta mma ngi do khim khai mpartlai dok diltha, khuwpaam ava thung ngi poi tham klin langlang khat amda, ungta mma ngi kikriing pṭhunda.
Ava leiji mma ngi chetda khuwpaam ava thungki miilai khat hinni am chda; mma ava bil thung ngi vak kapmaal siida.
Ungta vak rek do chaak vak then ava kdung ngi chaa chnuwm da; ungu mma ava ku mii khat lee ngi do khat lee pii chme.
Pdainu mma mthi na ngi hanto theda, ‘Knemmi kpah dovai sra owr rek va thenpen kekleem lut lutti chaa lam imde, pdainu nea hava tha poi kthammi kmaang chra kthea.
Neiji kurlou nira kpah hin vang nira ungu mhin the chni, Apah, parwaan leh nah amaiṭhuwm mi neiji pnu kirve chaakka;
nah achapa rang nga kurhui chmaang, asra owr rek khat lulu ngi mhai kowl cha.’
Ungta mma ngi rip daat da mpah hinni arvangda. Pdainu mma ngi arvang da leer khatti ma am daat arlaanni, mpah ngi deida ungu wonsat lo chda, ungta mma ngi vachenda arpom thida put da.
Ungu mchapa ngi mpah hinni theda, ‘Apah, neiji parwaan leh nah amaiṭhuwm mi pnu kirve chaakka; neia nah chapa rang nga kurhui chmaang.’
Pdainu mpah ngi msra owr rek hin theda, ‘Kbeiji dona kṭha arvan sin inra, mleen apnaak in; ungta mkhut leen panthla khat apnaak in, ungta mkhu tun ni khu kok rek apnaak in;
thiinra silsuwn kmar dam khat arvan sin inra, akihe you in, nenni chaa in chera kanpa inche;
mleija kchapa hava kdiyou kcha thungki kring nowl; mma ava kmaang kcha thungki kdo phaak chaak.’ Ungta mmaanni kanpa pṭhun lamda.
“Tunva mchapa kver ava bil tha am daat da; ungu mma ngi arvangda inn mnai thungta, khung kdum leh kardaam aryaa da.
Ungta mma ngi sra owr rek thungki khat ownda, hava talu lei kida kdingi paukhewl da.
Ungbi mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Anaopa thlungda, apah ngi silsuwn kmar khat eayou da, mleija mma ngi kuhui deekki pha chda.’
Pdainu mma ngi plung pthit da vanglut nuwm mda. Mpah ngi arva da theem da,

pdainu mchapa ngi mpah hin theda, ‘Asuw, hava kum tija thung ngi neiva sok alo chnu, apaureen rekka neiji leek liit maang, anto daat joso neiji kaplap rek kdo kanpat ṭhira keelsuwn khdaat ruk mpii mti.
Pdainu achapa khatti ado thloi ava ko ok kma rek tu partlai dok thida, marvanna silsuwn kmar khat eayo pik chti nu!’
Ungbi mpah ngi mhin theda, ‘Kchapa, mpha ktai thu nangva ado ta am ṭhi daat, ungta nei kdo thloi mkheng ava nah ado.
Ungu plung kngammi tkanpat kat raan, mleija hava anaopa ava kdiyou thungki kring, mma ava kmaang kcha thung ki tphaak chaak.’ ”
Jisu ngi siikhu rek hin rukva theda, “Sum vaiklou khat kthloi suwangpa khat amda, ungu sum vaiklou mii ava ngi mdo thloi ava mpartlai kre thutta kdingi mhin son pik lamda.
Ungta suwangpa ngi mma ava own thida theda, ‘Nah mlei thung ngi kdo aryaak hava talu da? Nang ngi ado phaak leh ado plu mkheng apindit dok, mleija nang ngi sumvai lou nowl nimti.’
Ungbi sum vai klou ava ngi mthi na ngi theda, ‘Neiki chukpu ngi sum vai kdolo ava mlo pthii bi, neia tak tlo nik da? ktou rang ruk kru tang me, ungu kdo ktham rang ruk kning kakjak ka.
Neiji sum vai ava kdolo thung ki mtiknen pthi mpha thu, mii rek ava ngi mi inn thaanni mdo tkowl chaak lam nra, neiva tak tlo nikdamma.’
“Ava leiji mma ngi mma ki chukpu lei ktuwl rekka khat khatti own thida, ru kri ava hin mma ngi theda, ‘Neiki chukpu hinki lei tija atuwl da?’
Mma ngi theda, ‘Tpartena ava arjaa khat thao.’ Ungta mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Ado kjitta alou pthii, ungu ku ong tengra som parnga adira akjit.’
Ava dilli mma ngi ktlok khat hin theda, ‘Ungu nangva tija atuwlda?’ Mma ngi theda, ‘Tpartena ava arjaa khat kehu.’ Mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Ado kjit ava alou pthii ungu som tret adira akjit.’
Chukpu ava ngi plung kseeng kma sum vai klou hin paureen da; mleija hava dultipaam naoleva kleng mar awng naole hinva mmaan charuwl rektu ksing ngi diil ṭhida.”
“Ungta Neiji naan hin kthea, rinkindit kma alrou rektu adaksaanki ra plap atlo chaan, anto mkurthut bi naanni apchaan maan mpha thu, mmaanni kṭuw knai kma ma am naan thung ngi akukowl chraan.
Kdil suwn thung ngi trin chaak kro mii ava klinpa thung rukva trin chaak kro; ungta kdil suwn thung ngi plung ktobor mii ava klinpa thung rukva plung ktobor.
Naanni kindit kma alrou thung ngi trin chaak kro akurthut maannu, kindik suwang thuwna ava ku ngi aksil nraan?
Ungta naanna ktlok mii hinni trin chaak kro akurthut maannu, tak heppi naan adak saanna ku ngi akpii raan?

“Sra owr ku khat lee ngi chukpu rek knii soklo nime; mleija mma ngi khat pder chthi donle, khat wonsat klora, mata khat hin plung plut bet thi donle, khat ava kleek psuk ra. Naanni Isowr leh alrou sok klou pchaang ni maan ti.”
Hava mkheng nga sum wonsat klo Pharisi rek ki aryaa lamda. Ungta mmaanni ning punṭhuwm psuk lamda.
