Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Mii rek do sut na thung ngi naanni adak saanna pandit chaan tinu, mleija tdet in tinu, pdainu Isowr va aplung ril in mdo dee dok; mleija mii rek do sut na thung ngi kunton rek rek ava Isowr do sut na thungva tipder chaak kurhui.
“Nowlam leh khulpu rekka Johon mpha kpha dekki ka am lam, mpha ava thungki kupṭhun ni Isowr Kruwngpaam ki kṭha paumin ava mdo paryaam, ungta mii pum ktaiji plung kngarri klut cha.
Pdainu Nowlam thungki bindu khat mkurlo dok hinva parwaan leh dulti mmaan chaakki ko ol sii ra.
“Numei rek bowr tlo pthii thida numei khat klou mii pum ktai ava losang mṭhia; ungta mi innpu ngi bowr mdo tlot pthii snu ava klou mii rukva losang mṭhia.
“Mpha khat thung ngi suwangpa khat amda, mma ngi dona kning ngi ksen kparneem hiil naada, ungta mnii ktaiji then kdi chaa nee da.
Ungta mdak mkheng ngi kpaan mmiing Lasar tdit miilai khat ava mma paltong bulli amda.
Mma ngi suwangpa tebol tun ki bu ktla ava chom chnuwm da; ava daat kma ui rek rukva arva da kpaan rekka pliik da.
“Sra miilai ava diyouda, ungbi waan tamsii rekki mma ava Abraham plung tun ni hun ṭhi da. Suwangpa ruk diyouda ungbi alruwl lamda;
ungta sim thung ngi kja langlang ngi, mmik pkhap da khuw hansuw da, ungta lam kla ngi Abraham leh mma plung tun ni Lasar han deida.

Ungbi mma ngi ownda, ‘Apah, Abraham, plungnee mhai tdet cha, ungu Lasar mju sii pik ra, kto owr kṭong kdo pdai chaak nra, mkhut chelli dii mruk mhai pchai pik chaso; mleija hava mei kṭuwng thung ngi neia kja kchaam ping.’

“Pdainu Abraham mi theda, ‘Kchapa, nang ngi arin mpha thu do kṭha arlaang chtinu, ungta ava lulu ngi Lasar rukva kṭha kma arlaang chda; pdainu tunva mma ngi kanpa mphaak chaakka, ungu nah kja im pti, ava nang ngi abin phaak.
Ungta ava daat kma, hava ki ngi naan kphara kjung mdo pchaan ma nra, ungu ava ki ngi neen mdo tphaak pchaan ma nraan, nen narlak inni khurpii khat ka am.
Ungta, suwangpa ngi theda, ‘Akaktham chaakka, apah, nei kpah le inn tha mju sii pik cha,
Mleija knaopa le miilai parnga ka am lam, hava suwk kthuwk mun thung ngi mmaanni mthlen ma nraan, mma ngi pau akham pik lamso.’
Pdainu Abraham mi theda, ‘Mmaan hinni Mousi leh khulpu rek ka am lam, mmaan hinki aryaa chlam so.’
Ungbi mma ngi theda, ‘Anto pme, apah, Abraham, pdainu kdiyou rek thung ki ku mii khat mjunbi, mmaanni plung ren kuhur ro lamra.’
Mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Mmaanni Mousi leh khulpu rek dothe maryaak maanbi, kdiyou rek thungki ku mii khat ring kinle daat joso, mmaanni plungren hur pchaang lam nime.’ ”
Ungta Jisu ngi msiikhu rek hin theda, kepthleemmi pnu thung ngi ktlara ava kthuwk kat ra; pdainu mii ngi khusiir mdo pirthit nra ktlo mii ava msukthi!
Mma ngi hava kdil sisi hin pnu mdo ptlaak rang kchang nga, mlowl leenni lung krik pthoida truwn thung ngi tvar pthii ava ngi mma tumva kursuk siira.
Naan adak saanna tuk kursut chaan, naanki a u anao in khatti pnu marveta, mma ava arkowk in, ungta mma ngi plung ren mhurta, aptlot pik chaan;
ungu nii khat thung vei tikheu aju psul in sora pnu mtlaak ta, ahin inni vei tikheu vi kinle da, plung ren kuhur chaakka, dida mthe ta, mma ava ado ptlot pik raan.
Kenyee rekki Mukpu hin theda, “Neen kdo rin chaak in mhai pnem pik chaan!”
Ungbi Mukpu ngi theda, “Naanni anruwng muw di pang arin chaak inbi, kaprang ding nah kurphui ra truwn thu kurphun cha, dida naanni athe inbi, naan akupṭoi raan.
“Naan arlakki sra owr khat kthloi ku mii khatti, mma ngi bil hoida, jao seel da, bil ki mthlun mpha thu, ‘Arvang teng ra tebol be ngi kmaalra eko ong dida kthe ka am in pti mo’?
Ava kchang mma ngi, ‘Kjiing von mhai vai pik, ungu neiji kchaak kneek dok du khim khaiji, arkowl apnet ra sok mhailo, ungta ava dil thang ro ngi nang ngi chaanee ndi, didonle mhin the nime mo?
Mma paureen sra owrri mdo tlot leiji mhin mpanpaak mo?
Ava leiji naan rukva ahin inni pau mdo reen mkheng atlot dok inle, neenna kurhui kma sra owr rek in ping, neenni kdo tlot kat raan ava ktlo kcha in ping, kdingi atheen.”
Jisu ngi Jerusalem kphara kchetti, Galil leh Samaria arlakki lam ṭoida.
Ungu Mma ngi khuw khat thu mlu thungta, leer khatti krip daat raaichii kthung miilai sowm kurdut ṭhida
ungta mmaanni owng lamda the chlamda, “Jisu, Chukpu, aplungnee mhai tdet chaan.”
Mma ngi mdee lam thungta mhin inni theda, “Vang inra adak saanna thiimpu rek hin ktardet chaan.” Ungta mmaanni mvan slii arlaan inni kartleu chlam da.
Ava dilli mmaan thungki khat va kartleu kchaam ping tdit mkardee thungta, mdil kinle da kdung ngi owngda Isowr panpaak chda.
Ungta mma ngi Jisu khu ther ri tluw teng da, Mhin panpaak chda. Tunva Mma ava Samaria mii.
Ava dilli Jisu ngi theda, “Kartleu va miilai sowm pmaan ti mo? Miilai tku rek be?
Paam ktlokki miilai hava kma donle, Isowr kpanpaak ra mdil kinle khat lee amemo?”
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kardel ra alam tha vang; ado rin chaakki kdam kcha im pti.”
Pharisi rekki Isowr Kruwngpaam ava tden kurjung rang kdingi Mhin mkhewl in thungta, Mma ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Isowr Kruwngpaam ava titbit rim rang kingi titinna rek tu kilṭhi ngi arjung nime.
Mmaanni ‘asuwn, hava tha,’ mata ‘Va tha!’ di donle kthera, mleija asuwn, Isowr Kruwngpaam ma naan arlakki ka am.”
Ungta Mma ngi siikhu rek hin theda, “Mii Chapa ava naanni ado dee nuwm in nit rek thungki nii khatti kurjung ra ungu naanni dei chni maan ti.
Ungta mmaanni ahin thaanni kthera, ‘Asuwn, va tha!’ mata ‘Asuwn, hava tha!’ kdi lamra pdainu chet maan, mdil in ṭoi maan.
Mleija kowl kiplekki parwaan khat ktong kingi khat ktong tha mlen ava lulu ngi, Mii Chapa nit rek rukka anto hep daat kurthuwk ra.
Pdainu Mma ava ru kri reeppi kjakakham kparteel ra ungu hava charuwl rekki kipthlei ra.
Noha nit rek thungki lulu ngi Mii Chapa nit rek thung rukka kurthuwk ra.
Noha ngi arkuwngpii thung ngi mlu du ki nit kpha thu, mmaanni chaanee lamda, phal lamda, innknei snu klou tlo lamda, ungta diipa kinle da mkheng inni kmaang kcha lam.
Anto hep daatti Lot nit thung ruk va mmaanni chaanee lamda, ren lamda, jur lamda, phun lamda, sa lamda,
pdainu Lot ti Sodom thungki msun nitti parwaan ki mei leh kantup tla da mkheng kheng inni kmaang chlam.
Ava lulu ngi Mii Chapa mkandan nit thung rukva anto hep daatti kthuwk ra.
Ava nit thu innthlun leen ka am miiva inn thungki mdo mna kloura jungṭum mso; ungu ava lulu ngi bil thu ka am mii rukva mdil kinle mso.
Lot numeija abin phaak in.
Mrinkum kakal ra kthlaam mii ava kmaang chra, pdainu mrinkum kmaang mii ava kpurhui ra.
Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Ava jaan va kowm khat leen miilai knii ka amra, khat lou thidonle khat ava kma pthiira.
Snu miilai knii ngi buh ksura, khat lou thidonle khat ava kma pthiira.
Bil thu miilai knii ka amra, khat lou thi donle khat ava kma pthiira.”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin theda, “Tva thung rang da, Mukpu?” Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Daksaa kluwng amna thung ngi laanta rek kthuwk kurtuwl ra.”
Ungta Jisu ngi siikhu rek hin paupurtolli theda, mleija mpha ktai thu mmaanni plung kpinle kma mdo ṭhil chaak nraan kurthuwk.
Mma ngi theda, “Khuwpii khat thu Isowr kṭi kma, mii ruk tut ksut pik kma kekṭewlpa khat amda.
Ungta khuwpii ava thungva meikhunuh khat ruk amda, mma ngi mhin thleng kchok da, mma kusnuwm kma rek phuw mdolo pik chaak nra the chda.
Mpha mruk thu mma ngi mat da, pdainu am bong thida mma ngi theda, ‘Neiji Isowr ṭi maang, mii ruk tuk sut maang,
anto daat joso hava meikhunuh va kning mpumul reenna, neiji mphuw lo pik daat ni, anto mkurthut mabi mma ngi thleng thleng donle kning kpumul ra.’”
Ungta Mukpu ngi theda, “Rinkindit kma do kṭewl ava talu tdit aryaa chaan.
Ungta suwn jaanni Mhin kṭap Mma do kchol rek phuw ava lo pik nime mo? Roi ksotti kikrem pik lam rang mo?
Neiji akthe pik inna, Mma ngi kbeiji mphuw klo pik chlam ra. Anto daat joso Mii Chapa ngi murjun mpha thu, dultipaam thung ngi krin kcha mii kpha rang mo?”
Ungta mii mursonna do ksi pme dida kbin, ungu mdaksaa daat rinkindit ping ngi dida kilrin kcha mii angṭhe hin Mma ngi hava paupurtol rukva theda;
Luwbuk Inn thu kṭhil chra miilai knii hangda, khatta Pharisi ungu khat ava khasna klou.

Pharisi ngi rip da mdaksaa hanto kirthe da ṭhil chda, ‘Isowr, akpanpaak chaakka, mleija nea mii murson lulu pmaang, hangmal, kindit kma, snu ktukui, mata hava khasna klou miilai lulu ruk kurthuwk maang.
Neiji hapta khat thung ngi then vei knii ngowl nu, kdo phaak chaak mkheng thungki tholowm ado kpiik chaak.’
“Pdainu khasna klou mii ava ngi lam kla ngi rip da, parwaan hansuw da mmik kapkhap pchaang kma ngi, muplung tpeengda, theda, ‘Isowr, pnu kirvei kcha neia aplungnee mhai tdet cha!’

Neiji naan hin kthea, hava miilaiji mdaksaa ava mii murson hinva kindit kdingi mi inn tha jungda; mleija mdaksaa karkhiing nuwm mii pum ktai ava kupchowm pthiira, pdainu mdaksaa kchowm riimmi ka am mii ava kikhiing ra.”
Tunva Jisu ngi mdo kmei pik chaak nlam ra kmo rek sisi mmaanni arhai ṭhi lamda; ungu siikhu rekki ava mdee in thungta arkowk lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi own lam thida, theda, “Kmo rekka ki hinni arva chdaat lamso, khaan maan, mleija Isowr Kruwngpaam ma hava mmaan lulu thung ngi ka am.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr Kruwngpaam ava hava kmo rek lulu ngi ku mii khatti marlaan chaak mabi, lut chip pchaang nime.”
Ungta paam kpupa khatti Jisu hin theda, “Kṭha, Chukpu, kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu kdo phaak chaak nrangki neiji talu tlo nik da?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Talu leiji kṭha diti ado to ownda? Isowr kma donle kṭha ku khat lee ame.
Paureen rekka nang ngi ado dee: ‘Nala tukui chma, mii eayou ma, pruma, kindit kma thu ripik ma, apah leh anuh akjat cha.’ ”
Ungta mma ngi theda, “Hava mkheng nga neiji keksenao daatki kdo pṭoi chaak.”

Ungu Jisu ngi ava maryaak thungta, mhin theda, “Kvaat do khat ka am daatta, ado thloi mkheng ajur dok thira sra hinni athem pik, ungta parwaan tha alrou nang ngi thloi chna di; ungu arvara Nei kdil aṭoi cha.”
Pdainu mma ngi hava maryaak thungta, suwang mkurthut leiji kdung ngi muplung pja chda.
Jisu ngi mma msut chunni theda, “Suwang rekki Isowr Kruwngpaam mlu rang nga tija thung ngi kparsa chdaat ta!
Mleija suwang miilai khatti Isowr Kruwngpaam mlu rang kchang nga, ut khatti prou khor thung ngi mlu ava ngi ko ol sii ra.”
Karyaa mii rekki theda, “Ava mkurthut tu mdo ktlan rang nga kule rang da?”
Pdainu Mma ngi theda, “Mii rek hin kurthuwk pchaang kma lu ava Isowr hinva kurthuwk lu.”
Ungta Pitor ri theda, “Asuw, neenni ki inn ma pthii thiinnu Nah dil kdo ṭoi chaak in.”
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr Kruwngpaam tummi inn,mata mnumei, mata mu u mnao, mata mnuh mpah, mata mnaole kma pthii ku mii khat ma ambi,
mma ngi hava mpha thu mtum ava kheelli kpha chra, ungu karvang ra kum thung ngi kṭuw knai kma rinkhu karlaang chra.”
Ungta sowm lei knii ṭhida Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Asuwn, nenni Jerusalem kphara kahang in min, ungu Mii Chapa mlei thung ngi khulpu rek do kjit mkheng ava kurkhum ra.
Mleija Mma ava ktlok chati rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthii ra, ungu kipnii chaak lamra, ungta ningkja kuhui rakki tlo lamdonle kupthot lamra;
mmaanni prei lam donle ke eayoura; ungu mnii kdumna nitti kring kardel ra.”
Pdainu hava lea mmaanni khat lee pre deipandi chlamme; mdo the ava mmaan thungki kurdowl kcha a, ungta Mma do the ava talu tdit mmaanni dei chlamme.
Jisu ngi Jerikho mhai nai thungta, then kṭhil miktot khat ava lam siir ri ko ong daat da.
Ungu kurtuwl mii rek kchet mma ngi maryaak thungta, hava talu leiki da kdingi mma ngi mii khewl chda.
Mmaanni mhin theda, “Nasareth ki Jisu kthleng.”
Ungbi mma ngi owngda, “Devid Chapa, Jisu, aplungnee mhai tdet cha!”
Ungu mma dusukki ka am mii rekki arkowk lamda, rim kdi jiam, kdingi the lamda; pdainu mma ngi kheel set setti owngda, “Devid Chapa, aplungnee mhai tdet cha!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi rip da, ungta Mma hinni mdo arhai ṭhi nraan paureenda; ungu mma ngi mhai nai thungta, Jisu ngi khewl da,
“Talu ado ktlot pik ra angeija?” Mma ngi theda, “Mukpu, khuw dei chni.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Khuw adei cha; ado rin chaakki kdam im pti.”
Ungta tun kat daatti mma ngi khuw deida, Isowr panpaak da mdil ṭoi chda, ungu mii mkheng ngi ava mdee thungta Isowr panpaak chlam da.
Jisu ngi Jerikho lut da, ungta sethleng ngi chet da.
Ungta mmiing Sakhaja tdit kinreel miilai khasna klou suwangpa khat amda.
Ungta mma ngi jisua ku tdit dei chnuwm da, pdainu kurtuwl mii rekki mlei kurthuwk da pchaang me, mleija mma ava toi da.
Ava leiji mma ngi mdu sukki va chenda, Mma mdo dee chaak nra, bungba ding khat lownda, mleija lam ava ktong tha Jisu ngi chet da.
Ungta Jisu ngi mun ava thung ngi marvan thungta, hansuw thida, mhin theda, “Sakhaja, koknotti arjun ṭum; mleija sniiva nah inn thung ngi kthlun ma rome.”
Ava leiji kok notti mma ngi arjungṭum da, ungta kanpa ngi Mma ava arlaang chda.
Ungu mmaanni ava mdee in thungta, mkheng inni karseel sop sop lamda, “Mma ava pnu kirvei miilai ava hinni malpa khatti kvang nga.”
Ungta Sakhaja ngi rip thida Mukpu hinni theda, “Asuw, Mukpu, kdona thloi mṭim ava neiji sra hin pii chnu, ungu kindit kma ngi ku mii khat hinki do klo cheva, kret vei plii ngi kdo pinlet pik.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Sniiva hava inn thung ngi kirliinna kurjung nga; mleija mma rukka Abraham chapa khat kurthuwk.
Mleija Mii Chapa ava kmaang kcha kthlaam ra ungu kaktlan pik ra kurjung.”
Mmaanni hava le maryaak slii arlaanni, Mma ngi pau purtol khatti the purjom da, mleija Mma ngi Jerusalem naida, ungta mmaanni Isowr Kruwngpaam ava kbeiji kandang rang pak da kdingi bin lam da.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da Mma ngi theda, “Klin nong kpuw miilai khatti kruwngpaam khat karlaang chra khuwpaam lamkla tha kthlung kinle rangki pjiin da.
Ungta mma ngi msra owr rek miilai sowm own thida, mhin inni jeering sum pii lamda, ungta mhin inni theda, ‘Nei kthlun du khim khai hava ngi sumdowl alo naan.’
Pdainu mma ava mii rek va pder chda, ungu mdil pṭoi lamda pau pthla lamda, ‘Neen ktun inni hava miilaiji mpaal ra ava ngei maan ring,’ kdingi the lamda.
Mma ngi kruwngpaam arlaang da mkinlet mpha thu, mma ngi jeering sum mdo piik sra owr rek ava, talu sumdowl lo nlamda tija mphaak chaak inna tdit mdo dee nra, mma hin mdo own lam nra pau pṭum da.
Ru kri ki ava ngi arvangda mmaiṭhuwm mi rip da, theda, ‘Mukpu, nah do piik jeering sum ava ngi sowm lot tpom chnu,’ dida.
Ungbi mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Kṭha deekki atlotta, kṭha sra owr, nang ngi nong kdil suwn thung ngi trin chaak akurhui leiji, khuwpii rek sowm tun ni nang ngi rutan thloi ndi.’
Ungta miknit na ngi arvang da, theda, ‘Mukpu, nah do piik jeering sum ava ngi parnga lot tpom chnu.’
Ungbi mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Ungta nah khuwpii rek parnga tun ni am ndi.’
Ava dilli ktlok khat nowlli arvang da, theda, ‘Mukpu, nah ajeering summa hei, buwlaak khatti klumnu kdo arkhiik daat.
Mleija nah aril khaa reenda, nang ngi ado thiik ma lou tinu, ungu ado pṭau ma ava khau tinu, ava leiji aṭi chnu.’
Mma ngi mhin theda, ‘Kṭha kma sra owr nang, aner kat dothe ava ngi neiji araal lou nik di! Neia kril kakhaa miilai kurthuwk nu, kdo thiik ma lounu, kdo paṭau ma kdo khau ava nang ngi adee mo?
Neiji kthlun kinlet mpha thu sum mdo lot tpom tu kdolo chaak nra, talu leiji ksum ava sum lot na thung ngi thii mti?’
Ungta mma ngi mbe krip rek hin theda, ‘Mma hinki jeering sum ava alou inra, jeering sum sowm kthloi hinni apiin.
(Ungbi mmaanni mhin theda, ‘Mukpu mma jeering sum sowm mdo thloi ma!’)
‘Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, ditta kthloi ku mii khat hinni kheel betti kpii ra; pdainu kthloi kma mii ava mdo thloi chaak mruk suwn rukka klou pthiira.
Pdainu mmaan tun ni nei kpaal ra kngei kma nei mukusnuwm kma rekka hava tha arvan ṭhiinra kmaiṭhuwm mi asur you tir in,’ ”
Ungta Mma ngi hava the thida mdu bet inni Jerusalem tha hang da.
Mma ngi kruwn lown tdit Bethphas leh Bethania mnai thungta, siikhu rek knii Mma ngi va siida,
theda, “Adu suk inki khuw ava thung ngi va lut in, naanni ava lu inbi, ku mii khat lee ko on nma skowlraam suwn khat kupsuk daat pha naan di, ava aparthlet inra, hava tha arvan ṭhiin.
‘Talu leiji aparthle inna? dida ku mii khatti mthe ta, Mukpu ngi kriing da,’ adiinra atheen.”
Ungu Mma dosii rekki mhai in thungta, mdo the pik lam ava hep heppi pha chlam da.
Ungu mmaanni mparthle in thungta, mma kpupa ava ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji skowlraam ma aparthle inna?”
Ungbi mmaanni theda, “Mukpu ngi kriing da.”
Ungta mmaanni Jisu hin arvan ṭhi lamda, skowlraam leenni buw phat lamda, mleenni Jisua ko ongda.
Ungta Mma ngi hanto mche slii arlaanni, miirek va lam thung ngi buw phat lamda.
Mma ngi arjung naida, kruwn lown thang ngi murjun thungta, kurtuwl siikhu rek mii mkheng va Mma nong tlot klin klin mdo dee lei inni, kanpa pṭhun lamda, ungu krowl khdaatti Isowr panpaak chlam da,
the lamda, “Mukpu miing ngi kurjung Kruwng ava msuw kṭha! Parwaan tha kdaai ungu kheel sii ngi kparthaang ekurthuwk so!”
Ungta kurtuwl mii rek thungki Pharisi rek mii angṭhe ngi Mhin theda, “Chukpu, asiikhu rekka arai lam.”
Mma ngi arthawngda, “Neiji naan hinni kthea, hava mmaanni rim kdi ma ambi, lung rek katti ko owng pthuwk lamra.”
Ungta Mma ngi arjung naida khuwpii ava mdee thungta ṭap da,
theda, “Snii kat rukva nang ngi kdaai adee chaak daat tlaangbi! Pdainu tunva amik sut na thungki kurdowl kcha lamma.
Mleija aleen nit rek ava kurjungra, nah aksnuwm kma rekki aploi donle rowng aktlot psuk ra, aktu khul dokra, markil plii thung ngi karkam pthii ra;
ungu nang leh anaolea dul akikcheen nraan, ungu nah athung ngi lung khat leenni lung khat kurtuwn daatti am nime; mleija nah ado tvel nra mpha ava dei chi mti.”
Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk Inn thu lut da kjur rekka krei pthii pṭhun da,
mhin inni Mma ngi theda, “Mdo kjit dok, ‘Nei Ki inn na tiṭhil chaak na Inn khat ra; pdainu naanva kup pru rek khur apurthut pthiinna.’ ”
Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk Inn thung ngi mnii ktaiji purchuk da. Thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rek, ungu nong klin kpuw rekki mdo eayo nraan mlam thlaam lamda.
Pdainu mdo tlot raan ava mmaanni do khat lee pha lamme, mleija mii mkheng ngi Mma pauna plung plut da.
Mma ngi luwbuk Inn thu nii khatti purchuk da, kṭha paumin mparyaam slii arlaanni, thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rek, ungu kver rek Mhin arhang lamda.
Ungta Mhin the lamda, “Nangva talu rutan ni hava lea ado tlot; mata hava rutan akpii miia ku, mhai the pik in?”
Mma ngi arthawng da, “Nei rukva pau khat aju khewl inni; tun mhai the pik in,
baptis kuptlot Johon na parwaan ki mo mata dulti mii rek hinki da?”
Ungta mmaanni khat leh khatti karseel psuk lamda, the lamda, “ ‘Nenni parwaan ki pi’ ndit inbi, Mma ngi kthera, ‘Talu lei naanva mhin rin chmaan ti?’ di donle kthera.
Pdainu nenni ‘Dulti mii rek hinki pi’ ndit inbi, mii mkheng ngi lung ngi mii kdeeng raan; mleija Johon na khulpu khat pi dida mii rek va bin da.”
Ava leiji mmaanni theda,tva ki tdit neenni dei maan ring kdingi arthawng lamda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei rukva talu rutanni hava lea kdo tlot tdit athe pik ni maan ring.”
Ungta Mma ngi mii rek hin hava pau purtol li kthe pṭhunda: “Miilai khatti bil thung ngi rik rou phunda, knum rek hin sil na thida, khuwpaam ktlok tha mpha ksotti pjiin chda.
Mpha mve thungta, mma ngi knum rek hinki rik rou thei mruk mdo piik nlamra, msra owr khat mhin inni va siida; pdainu knum rek va bun thida do khat lee kipsin kma vansi pthii lamda.
Ungta mma ngi msra owr khat nowl vasiida, mma rukka bun lamda, mning kakjak rakki, mkhut thu do khat lee kipsin kma si pthii lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mukdum na sii nowlda, hava mma ava sul purnul lam thida var pthii dok lamda.
Ava dilli rikrou kpupa ngi theda, ‘Neiji talu tlo nik damma? Kwonsat lo kchapa neiji vasiini; mma ava kakjat kcha ruk kro lam.’
Pdainu knum rekki mdee in thungta, mmaanni msingreel inni the lamda, ‘Hava lamchi pipa, nenni eayou inche, mbi alrou mkheng nga nen ndo kurthuwk ra.’
Ungta mmaanni rikrou nowm bengi var pthii lam thida, eayou lamda. Ava mkurthut bi, rik rou kpupava tak ktlo rang?
Mma ngi arva donle knum rekka ke ea krep ra, ungu rik rou bil ava ktlok hin kpii pthiira.” Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta, the lamda, “Isowr va ro nime!”
Pdainu Mma ngi suw lam thida theda, “Ava mkurthuttu hava mdo kjitta talu da:
‘Inn ksapa do pthlei lung ava katti markil ki kcho bul kurthuwkka.’
Lung ava leenni ktluw mii pum ktaija mikṭik mikṭikki kukui chra; pdainu hava tlaak na ku mii khat ava purvutti kjuwng chra.”

Mpha ava kat thung ngi thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki Mma ava khut kjownni kjowng nuwm lamda, pdainu mmaanni mii rek ṭi lamda; mleija hava pau purtolli mdo the ava mmaan ki mraal mdo piik na tdit dei lamda.

Ava leiji mmaanni Jisua mpau the thu mdo kjown nraan sut pṭoi lamda, ungta rutan kthloi rek leh paamkowl avaki kpupa rek hin Mma ava mdo parlaan nraan, tuprut pau kloura plung klut do tlot ktlo mii si lamda.
Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Chukpu Nangva kindit deekki theti, ado purchu, ungu ksan ksui tlo mti, pdainu Isowr lam kindit purchuk tinu ava neenni kdee chaak in.
Keisar hin khasna tpiik ava Nowlam do rot mo mata do rot pme?”
Pdainu mmaanni kṭha do tlot mdo tlot in ava Mma ngi deida, mhin inni theda,
“Thiir summa mhai piin. Hava ku mdutta, ungu ku miing mikjitta?” Mmaanni theda, “Keisar.”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Keisar do rek ava Keisar hin apiin, ungu Isowr do rek ava Isowr hin apiin.”
Ungta mii rek ma am daat arlaanni, mpau the leiji kjowng pchaang lamme; pdainu mpau arthaanni ngak chlam da rim kdi am lamda.
Ungta kdiyou thungki kring karheel ame dida kthe sadusi rek mii angṭhe Mhin arva lamda.

Ungu mmaanni Mhin pau khat khewl lamda, the lamda, “Chukpu, Mousi va hanto mikjit pik inda, mleija u pa khatti snu lou thi sora nao khat lee kuplu kcha mlaiji mdiyo chaak bi, mnaopa ava ngi mnumei ava lou donle, mu u pa tummi nao mdo pluk pik ra.
Tunva unao tikheu rek am lamda; ru kri reep ki ngi snu khat louda, ungu naole khat lee kuplu kcha mlaiji diyou chda;
Ungta miknit na
ungu mukdumna ngi mma ava louda, anto hep daatti mtikheu kheu inni nao khat lee kthloi kcha kma ngi mkheng inni diyou chlam da.
Ava diltha snu ava ruk diyou chda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, kring karheel nit thungva snu ava ku numei rang? mleija mtikheu kheu inni numei purthut sap lamda.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Hava dultipaam naole va phal lamda innknei snu klou tlo lamda;
pdainu karvangra kum thung ngi ka am rang rek, kdiyou thungki kring karheel kurhui mmaan ava kphal tlo me ungu innknei snu klou ame.
Mleija mmaanna kring karheel naole mkurthut lei inni, diyou pchaang lam nime, mmaan ava Waan tamsii rek tu kinṭimmi, Isowr naole kurthuwk ra.
Ungta kdiyou rekka kring kardel kat, mleija Mousi rukva chanchiim mei Kṭuwng phel ava thung ngi tdet da, mma ngi Mukpu mo own mpha thu, Abraham ki Isowr, Isek ki Isowr, Jakob ki Isowr, dida ownda.
Tunva mma ava kdiyou rekki Isowr pme; pdainu kring ki Isowr; mleija mkheng nga Mma thu kring.”
Ungbi Nowlam chukpu rek angṭhe ngi theda, “Chukpu, kṭha deekki athea.”
Mleija mmaanni kurnowl bong da Mhin paukhewl nuwm lamme.
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tak heppi Khrista ava mmaan va Devid Chapa pi mdo dit inda?
Mleija laa thung ngi Devid mdak katti theda,
‘Mukpu ngi neiki Mukpu hin theda,
Neiji nah arawlmii rek,
akhu tingi kthiik du
khim khai,
Nei kukhut chang ktong tha ko ong.’
Devid ti Mukpu dida mdo
own leiji;
tak heppi mma Chapa rang?”
Ungta mii mkheng ngi maryaak slii arlaanni, Mma ngi siikhu rek hin theda,
“Phrik kturown tu kchet nuwm, mii kurku na bajaar mun thung ngi salaam kngei, ungta synagog rek thung ngi longkhom kṭha kngei, ungu kmaal thung ngi takjat mun kngei,
meikhu owr da, mi inn thungki klowng, ksaangpa ngi kṭhil kcha do tlot ktlo, Nowlam chukpu rekka chek asin chaan. Mmaanna kheel sii ki mraal karlaang chlam ra.”
Mma ngi hansuw da ungbi suwang rekki sumbuwr thung ngi mdo daal in ava deida;
ungta sra meikhunuh khatti thiir sum sisi knii mdo daal chaak deida.
Ungta Mma ngi theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava mii mkheng arlak va sra meikhunuh ngi kheel sii mdaal chaakka.
Mleija mmaan mkheng inva mdo thloi in knempok thungki mdo daal in; pdainu mmava mdo thloi chaak suwn lou dek da mdaal chaakka.”
Ungta lung rek kṭha pa daat le mdo piik chaak in ava tija thung ngi kṭha chdaatta, dida mii angṭhe ngi luwbuk Inn mlei thung ngi mthe thungta, Mma ngi theda,
“Naan do sut havale ki mnit rek karvangra, mdo var pthii mara khat lee ame, lung khat leenni lung khat kurtuwn daatti ma nime.”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin pau khewl chlam da, “Chukpu, hava lea tden kthuwk rang da, ungu hava kthuwk rangki titinna rekka talu rang da?”

Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Lam lele tha mii ngi ado tiṭhi ma nraan, tuk kursut dei chaan; mleija Nei kmiing ngi mii knempok thleng donle, ‘Nea Mma ping!’ ungta ‘Mpha knaija!’ di donle kthera, mmaan dil ṭoi maan.
Ungta naanni rawl rek leh rawlki paujuwn aryaak inki mpha thu, plung purthlowng maan, mleija ru kri ngi havale kthuwk ra, pdainu mṭut nrang ava pme.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Paam khatki mii ngi paam khatki mii mraal kpii ra, ungu kruwngpaam khatti kruwngpaam khat mraal kpiira,
klin langlang ringnaang kthuwk ra, ungu mmun ktai thung ngi poi tham leh omlai ka amra, ungta parwaan ki tiṭit kirvei kling langlang titinna rek kthuwk ra.
Pdainu hava mkheng mthuw du ngi mmaanni akjowng in donle suwk akupthuwk raan, synagog rek thu, rowng inn thu, ungu paamkpu rek hin, kruwng rek hin Nei kmiing tummi akṭhi raan.
Rinpaumin ado hur nraan hava mpha ava kthuwk kat ra.
Naanni ado arthaan nraan ava mdu ngi plung purdun nimaang kdingi abin in.
Mleija naan aksnuwm kma rek mata akro kma rekki atun thaanni mri pchaan ma nraan, Neiji ner ungta lousing apii nikaan di.
Ungta anuh apah in, a u anao in, arilam in, aplap inni akparlaan pthii raan, ungta mii angṭhea ke eayou lamra;
Nei kmiing tummi naanna mii mkheng ngi akipder chraan.
Pdainu aluw leen inki sam arjik khdaat pre maang nime.
Naanni ava adiil pchaan inbi kring pha chnaan di.
“Ungta naanni Jerusalem ma rawlmii rek do tkhul dok adee in mpha thu mmaan chaak nra knaija tdit adei chaan.
Ava dilli Judia tha ka am mii rekki lown tha kchen ra, ungta khuwpaam ava tha ka am mii rekva mthu lut mso;
mleija mdo kjit dok mkheng mkurkhum nra, phuw klouki nit rek ava havale kurthuwk.
Mpha ava thu nao kuhur rek leh nao kakai mii rekka tija thu msuwkthi chdaatta! Mleija dultipaam thung ngi klin sii ki suwkthuwk ungu hava mii rek leen plung thit kthlung ra.
Mmaanna kaangksaang tun ktla lamra, mmaanna paamsuwk ki chati mkheng thung ngi kṭhi lamra, ungta mpha mkurkhum du khim khai Jerusalem ava ktlok chati rekki kther pthiira.
“Ungta kniw, ungu thla, leh bursi rek thung ngi titinna rek ka amra, ungta dultipaam ki chati rekki truwn archaang leh dii kakna ngi plung kpurthlown don kṭi chlamra.
Mṭit lei in leh dultipaam thu talu kthuwk rang tdit mdo bin lei inni ktet lamra; mleija parwaan rutan rekka kunchun ra.
Ungta Mii Chapa ngi armei thung ngi mrutan klin langlang leh mlaarnee ngi kurjung mmaanni kdei lamra.
Tunva hava mkheng kthuwk rangki mupṭhun mpha thu, tan aan inra khuw hansuwn, mleija naan kirliin nrang nga knaija.”
Ungta mhin inni Mma ngi pau purtolli theda, “Kduwt ding leh ding mkheng nga asuwn;
marnaa muksun daat le, ṭhaal khuw kveija tdit naan adak saanni ado dee in.
Anto hep daatti, havale kthuwk adee in mpha thu, Isowr Kruwngpaam ma knaija tdit adei chaan.
Kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava mkheng mthuw du khim khai, hava charuwlla maang nime.”
Parwaan leh dultia kmaang chra, pdainu Nei kpauna rek ava maang nime.

“Pdainu naan adak saanni hava rinkhu tuk sut da, kheel reenni chaanee da priida, krikki am maan, ungta nit ava ngi ktaang heppi kdei chdok mangi maanni aleen thaanni mthlen ma nra, asut pṭoi dei chaan.
Mleija hava dultipaam thu ka am mii mkheng leen kthlengra.
Pdainu kthuwk rangki hava rutan mkheng thungki akarthle nraan, ungta Mii Chapa ava maiṭhuwmmi krip ado pchaan nraan, mpha ktai thung ngi aṭhil chaanra asut pṭoi chaan.”
Ungta Mma ngi suwn ktaiji luwbuk Inn thung ngi purchuk da, pdainu jaan ktaiva Mma ngi kruwn lown tha han priik da.
Ungta mii mkheng nga Mma hinni karyaa chra, luwbuk Inn thu jiingsun kpanma ngi thleng lamda.
Tunva taplaanna ditta thowl ktaak thenpen kmaal ava naida.
Ungta thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki, Mma ava tak heppi kjowngda te eayo rang kdingi mlam thlaam lamda; mleija mmaanni mii rek ṭi chlam da.
Ungta sowm lei knii thungki Iskariot tdit Juda thung ngi seitaan lut da.
Mma ngi thiimpu kinreel rek leh nong klin kpuw rek hin tak heppi parlaan pthii nikdi kdingi chet da karbiik ṭhi lamda.
Ungta mmaanna kanpa lamda, mma hinni sum mdo piik nraan kulrot ndok lamda.
Ava leiji mma ngi roda, kurtuwl mii rek dodee ma ngi mhin inni mdo piik pthii nra mpha kcha mma ngi thlaamda.
Ungta taplaanna jao ava tlaai mdo down nraanki, thowl ktaak thenpen kmaal nit ava veida.
Ava leiji Jisu ngi Pitor leh Johon hinni theda, “Vaanra, nenni taplaanna ava tmaal nraan apurchuwl in.”
Mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Talu thu neenni purchuwl chnikaan da?”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Asuwn, naanni khuwpii thu ahai lu in mpha thu, uwm thung ngi dii kukdom miilai khatti aju kurdut ṭhi raan, mma luna inn ava thu alu pṭoi in.
Ungta inn kpupa hin atheen, ‘Chukpu ngi ahin theda, malli thlungda, ksiikhu rektu taplaanna kmaal chaak nraan innka ava tu ung rangda?’
Ungu mma do purchuwl dok tun knuwng reep innka khat akti det raan, ava thung ngi apurchuwl in.”
Ungta mmaanni va lamda, mdo parseel lam anto jikki pha chlam da, ungu mmaanni taplaanna ava purchuwl chlam da.
Ungta ṭhang veida, ungu kenyee rek tu kilṭhi ngi Mma ngi tebol be ngi ko ongda.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji suwkthuw du ngi hava taplaanna ava naantu kdung reenni maal chnuwm nu;
mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr Kruwngpaam tha hava mkurkhum du khim khai, Neiji chaa purson nimaang.”
Ungta Mma ngi tong khat louda, mpanpaak diltha Mma ngi theda, “Hava alou in, ungu arlak inni athem in;
mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Isowr Kruwngpaam murjun du khim khai, snii ki kupṭhun ni rikrou dii ava Neiji nee pursom nimaang.”
Ungta Mma ngi thenpen louda, mpanpaak diltha khuida, mhin inni pii thida, theda, “Hava Nei kdaksaa ado kpiik chaak in. Hava Nei ado tbin phaak naanni atlo in.”
Ungta anto lulu ngi mmaal dil thaanni tong louda, theda, “Hava tong thung ngi kdo ptlon ava naan tumra kdo pbuwk ren paurina Nei kihii.
Pdainu asuwn, Nei mkipthlei rangki miilai ava khutta tebol tun Neiji ka am ṭhi daatta.
Mleija mdo reel dok dil kṭoiji Mii Chapa ava kchet; pdainu Nei mkipthlei miilai ava msuw kthi!”
Ungta marlak inki ku ngi hava nong nga ktlo rang kida kdingi khat leh khatti karkhewl pṭhun lamda.
Ungta mmaan thungki ku ngi klin siia kdingi karteen psuk lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ktlok chati rekka mmaan tun tha kruwng rekki kinreelli nong mdo tlot, ungu mmaan leen rutan kthloi rek ava plap mdo dit in.
Pdainu naan thungva anto lua kurthuwk me; anto kchang naan arlakki klin sii va kmo lulu, ungta ber ksu miiva sok klou khat lulu ngi ka amra.
Mleija klin sii rang nga kmaal ra kuk ong khat ava rangmo, sok klou khat ava rang? Tebol hin kmaal ra ku ong ava pme mo? Pdainu Neia naan arlakki sok klou khatti ka am ping.
Naanna Nei kjat kakham thu kdo parteel ṭhi jesang in pti;
Ungta Kpah ngi Nei kihin Kruwngpaam khat mdo tsil na ava lulu ngi,
Nei Ku kruwngpaam tha naanni ado chaak ado neek nraan, Isowr ku onna leen ku ongda Isreel rek sumkhur sowmlei knii ado kṭewl nraan, Neije naan hin Neiki Kruwngpaam ava aksil naanna.
“Simon, Simon, asuw, nang nga kehu kupkhui lulu ado tupkhui nra, seitaan ni atarngai daatta.
Pdainu ado rin chaak thungki msoi ma nra, Neiji atumra kṭhil chaakka, plungren ahur diltha, a u anao rek ru aptan pik cha.”
Ungta mma ngi Mhin theda, “Mukpu, nea Nah tu kilṭhi ngi rowng inn thung daat don kdiyou kpha thung ngi kurthlong kcha ping.”
Mma ngi theda, “Neiji ahin kthea, Pitor nang ngi Neia vei kdum at mat du khim khai, snii va harkhuwng ngi khuwng nime.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji naan ava sumkhao, thongja ungu khukok rek ktaakki aksii in mpha thu kvaat do ka am ngaal mo?” Mmaanni theda, “Kvaat do khat lee ame.”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Pdainu tunva sumkhao kthloi miiva ahur so, anto lulu ngi thongja ruk, ungta kaangksaang kthloi kma mii rukva mdo mna ajur sora khat aren chaso.
Mleija Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, hava Laaika ava Nei kthung ngi kurkhum kat ra, ‘Ungta Mma ava pnu ktong rektu ktai kthenra’; mleija Nei ki mlei thung ngi mdo kjit dokka kurkhum sliia.”
Ungta mmaanni theda, “Asuw, Mukpu, hava thu kaangksaang rek knii ka amma.” Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Kokhoppa.”
Ungta Mma ngi arvan thuwkda, kruwn lown tha Mma nopa ngi hangda; ungta msiikhu rekki mdil hanṭoi lamda.
Ungu Mma ngi mun ava mhanphaak thungta, mhin inni theda, “Kepthleem thu atlaak ma nraan aṭhil chaan.”
Ungta lung tipthii pang karlatti mmaan hinki vakursown da, pkhuppi tardiil da ṭhil chda.
“Apah Nah plung bin mkurthutta, Nei kihin ki hava tong ava mhailo pik cha, anto daat joso Nei kdo bin ava rang pme, pdainu Nah poi bin daat so.”
Waantamsii kandang ngi Mhin rutan pii chda.
Ungu Mma ngi plung kurthlutti kja reenni mṭhil chaak thungta, mparthlen ava hii kchai lulu ngi dul leenni chaida.
Ungta Mma ngi mdo ṭhil chaak thungki rip da, siikhu rek hinni arvang da, ungbi kja langlang ngi ki iip daatti pha lamda.
Ungbi Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji ki iip daat in ptida? Naanni kepthleem thu atlaak ma nraan kardel inra aṭhil chaan.”
Ungta Mma ngi mpau slii arlaanni, sowm lei knii thungki khat, Juda tdit mma ngi bersu da, miiluwngpa ṭhida arva da;
Kput rangki Jisu hin han naida, pdainu Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Juda, Mii Chapa ava put da parlaan pthi daat nmo?”
Ungta Mma kuklop dok mii rekva kthuwk ra ava deida, mmaanni theda, “Mukpu, hava lea kaangksaang ngi sur in nimo?”
Ungta marlak inki khatti thiimpu kparthaang knaa mchang ktongki sel bukda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi theda, “Hava nowl maan!” Ungu maknaa ava kmeida pdam pikda.
Ungta Jisu ngi karva rek thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rek, kver rek mraal kpii ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni namtrom hal chda kthleng lulu, kaangksaang leh kchung rek sin inti kthleng in ptimo?
Nit kurnowlli luwbuk Inn thu Neiji aka amṭhiin mpha thu, naanni khut khiingda mukjowng maan ti. Pdainu hava naanki ṭhang ungu kjiing rutan.”
Ava dilli mmaanni kjowng lamda, thiimpu kparthaang inn tha ṭhi lamda. Leer khatti Pitor va mdil ṭoida;
ungta mmaanni dulbuk ṭimmi mei pchok lamda ku ong lamda, marlak thaanni Pitor ruk ko ongda.
Ungta mma ngi mei ar awng thung ngi mkon daat arlaanni, sra owr snu miilai khatti deida, ungbi mma ava suw rim thida theda, “Hava miilai rukka Mma doṭhi.”
Pdainu mma ngi mat da, theda, “Snu, Mma ava neiji dei chliit maang.”
Ungta ma ambongle ktlok khatti deida the nowlda “Nang rukka mmaan arlakki khat pti.” Pdainu Pitor ri theda, “Miilai, neia ava pmaang.”
Ungta ṭhang khat arveel diltha, ktlok khat nowlli kdung theda, “Trinkma hava miilai rukka mmaan doṭhi munra; mleija mma rukka Galil mii khat.”
Pdainu Pitor ri theda, “Miilai nah dothe slii ava neiji dei chliit maang.” Ungbi mma ngi mpau meek daat arlaanni, tun kat daatti harkhuwng ngi khuwngda.
Ungbi Mukpu ngi mdil kinle da Pitor ra suwda. Ungta Mukpu ngi mhin tak heppi pauna mthe tdit Pitor ri bin phaak da, “Snii katti harkhuwng ngi mkhuwn dungi nangva vei kdum mro nimti.”
Ungbi mma ngi duwn tha thuwkda mning ksiinni ṭap chda.
Tunva Jisu kukjowng mii rekva pnii chaak lamda ungu bun chlamda.
Mmaanni mmik kuhuwm lamda ungu paukhewl lamda, “Apurphuwng! Nah akipreija ku?”
Ungta mmaanni mraal kpii ngi pau knempok the psuk lamda, ning er pau lo psuk lamda.
Ungu khuw mvar thungta, mmaanni thiimpu kinreel rek, Nowlam chukpu rek, mii rekki kver rek, own purkuk lam thida, Jisua karseel lop hin ṭhilamda the lamda,
“Nah Khrista akurthutta mhai the pik in.” Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji athe pik jown ringva rin chni maan ti;
ungu Neiji pau ajukhewl jown ringva marthawng nimaan ti.
Pdainu tun ki kupṭhunni Mii Chapa ava Isowr rutan chang ktongtha ku kongra.”
Ungbi mmaan mkheng ngi theda, “Ava mkurthuttu Nah Isowr Chapa ptimo?” Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan dothe ava Nei ping.”
Ungta mmaanni theda, “Arleek setti talu rinpaumin tathlaam raan? Mma ner katti mdo the ndak saanni taryaak sap inna.”
Ungta mmaan mkheng kheng inni rip lamda, Pilat hinni vanṭhi lamda.

Ungta mmaanni mraal kpii pṭhun lamda, “Nen nmii rekka hava Miilaiji lele tha ṭhida, ungu Keisar hin khasna tpiik ruk ro mda, ungta mdak katti Khrista Kruwng khat ping ngi dida mdothe neenni pha innu.”
Ungbi Pilat ti Mhin khewlda, “Nah Jihudia rek Kruwng ptimo?” Ungta Mma ngi mhin arthawngda, “Ado the ava ping.”
Ungta Pilat ti thiimpu kinreel rek leh kurtuwl mii rek hin theda, “Hava Miilai doparma do khat lee neiva pha chmaang.”
Pdainu mmaanni the teng lamda, “Judia paam mkheng, Galil thung ki ngi hava mun kpha mii rek ava Mma ngi purchukda kthlowng krep da.”
Ungu Pilat ti hava maryaak thungta, Mma Galil Mii mo kdingi paukhewl da.
Ungta Mma Herod paamkowl thungki tdit maryaak thungta, mpha ava thung ngi Herod mdak kat rukka Jerusalem thu ma am daat leiji Jisua mma hin vasiida.
Herod ti Jisu mdee thungta, kdung ngi kanpa da, mleija mpha roi ksotti dei nuwmda, mleija Mma mlei thung ngi aryaa da, ungta Mma dotlot titinna dei nuwm da.
Ava leiji mma ngi pau knempok khewlda; pdainu Jisu va arthawngme.
Ungta Mbe tha krip daat thiimpu kinreel rek leh Nowlam chukpu rekki kdung ngi Mma ava mraal pii lamda.
Ungta Herod ti mrawlmii rek tu kilṭhi ngi do ksi thleer ma tlo lamda pnii chaak lamda ungu buw kṭha langlang pihiil da, Pilat hinni vasi pinle da.
Ava nit kat rongi Herod leh Pilat ta plap kurthuwk lamda, mleija chodu chodilva karhal chlam.
Ungta Pilat ti thiimpu kinreel rek leh paam kpupa rek ungu mii rek own purkuk da,

ungta mhin inni theda, “Mii rek ava lele dung ngi kṭhi lulu naanni hava Miilai ava arhai ṭhiin tinu, ungta asuwn, naan amaiṭhuwm inni kpirsin na thungta, Mii hava thu naanni mraal ado piik in mraal ava khat lee pha maang.
Herod rukva phame, mleija nen nhin mdo arhai sii pinlet. Asuwn, Mma ngi mdiyo nrangki mlei kat ava do khat lee ame.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, neiji bunrai thida pthla pthii nik di;”
hava kmaal thungva mma ngi mmaan tumra miilai khat khat mdo pthuw kcholu.
Pdainu mmaan mkheng ngi krowl khdaatti owng lamda, “Hava Mma aṭhii dok, neen ktum raanna Barabas mhai pthlat pik in”
mma ava khuwpii ki paukthuwk thu mii eayouda, ava leiji rowng inn thu mdo khum pthiin.
Pilat ti Jisu mdo pthuw nuwm leiji vei khat nowlli mma ngi mhin inni theda;
pdainu mmaanni owng lamda, “Mma ava khros leen apthoi pthii, khros leen apthoi pthii!”

Ungta mma ngi mvei kdumna ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu lei, talu kṭha kma Mma va mtlot da? Mdiyo nrang kuhui mdo parma khat lee neiji pha chmaang, ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, neiji bunrai thinira pthla pthii ni.”
Pdainu mmaanni kdung owng lamda, kbeiji khros leen mdo pthoi pthi nra ngeen lamda. Ungta mmaan krowlli pchaang chda.
Ava leiji Pilat ti mmaan dongeen rot pik lamda, mdiyo nra palreenda.
Mmaan tumra mdo ngeen in paukthuwk thu mii ke eayou, rowng inn thu mdo khum miilai ava pthla pthiida; pdainu Jisua mmaan do ngei thu pii pthii lamda.
Ungta mmaanni mhan ṭhi slii arlaan inni, Syrini ki Simon, paam khat ki kipjiin kcha, mma ava Jisu dil pang tha khros mdo kdom ṭhi nra kjowng lamda pnam psuk lamda.
Ungta kurtuwl miiluwngpa rek leh kurnung karbaang da kṭap snu rekki mdil ṭoida.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mdil kinle da theda, “Jerusalem chanu rek, Nei ktummi ṭap maan, pdainu naan adaksaan leh anaoleen tummi ṭap in.
Mleija asuwn, ‘Kdong mii, nao kuhur kmalai, ungu arnuw nao kakai kmalai, mmaan ava msukṭha dida mmaanni mdo the nrangki nit rek kthlengra!’
Ungta mmaanni lownpii rek, ‘Neen ktunni arjun tluw,’ ungu lown rek hin, ‘Neen mhai pkhum chaan’ dida kthe kupṭhun lamra.
Mleija mmaanni ding me er slii daat thung ngi hava mtlot inbi, mṭon mpha thung ngaallu tak kthuwk chrang da?”
Ungta mraal ka am miilai knii rek rukka Mma tu kilṭhi ngi mdo eayo nraan hanṭhi lamda.
Ungta mmaanni luwru kdimna mun tdit ava mhan phaak in thungta, ava thu khros leen pthoi lamda, ungu mraal pum rekka mlee leh mchang tha pthoi kthen lamda.
Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Apah aptlot pik chlam; mleija mmaanni talu ktlot inna tdit dei chlamme.” Ungta mmaanni mdona ava kthem rangki pchel piik sut nlamda.

Ungta Mbe ngi krip mii rekki, sut pṭoi lamda; pdainu paam kpupa rekki Mma ning er plo psuk lamda, the lamda, “Mma va mii mursonna mdo ktlan; Mma ava Isowr ki Khrista, mdo Kchol Khat mkurthutta; mthina ngi ekartlan chaso!”
Rawlmii rek rukva Mhin arhang lamda, ju kdor dii pneek lamda, pnii chaak lamda,
ungu the lamda, “Nah Jehudia rek Kruwng akurthutta athi na ngi kartlan chalo!”
Mluw leen rukva, “Hava Jihudia rek Kruwng” dida tikjit jiik khat ruk amda.
Ungta kukthoi daat mraal ka am rek thungki khatti do ksi thleer kma Mhin theda, “Nah Khrista mti mo? Adaksaa ruk neen ruk mhai ktlan in!”
Pdainu khatti mhin raida theda, “Nang ngi Mma tu kinṭim chakki mraal ado phaak meek slii, nang ngi Isowra ṭi mti mo?
Ungta nenna kindit katti nnong tlot dil kṭoiji tarlaan chaak, pdainu hava Miilai ava karmak nong khat lee tlome.”
Ungta mma ngi theda, “Jisu, Nang ngi Akruwngpaam tha ahun mpha thu neia mhai bin phaak cha.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, snii katti nang nga Nei tu kilṭhi ngi paradais tha ta amra.”
Tunva ṭhang truk (ṭhang tku mdo thena) arveel mphaak thungta, mpaam mkheng nga ṭhang tku (ṭhang sowm lei knii mdo thena) kpha dekki pum jiing ngi jing chda.
Kniw ar awng ma amma thu; luwbuk Inn buwkhaar ava knii kthuwkki karjen chda.
Ava dilli krowl kparyaa ngi owngda theda, “Apah Nah akhut thung ngi Kraothla kparlaan chaakka!” Ungta hava theda mṭutna tdaal ṭen chda.
Tunva rawlmii ki klin khatti kthuwk nong ava mdee thungta, mma ngi Isowr panpaak da theda, “Mkindit katti hava Miilaiva parmak chme!”
Ungta ava ksuwra kthuwk kurtuwl mii mkheng ngi, kthuwk nong ava mdee in thungta, muplung in tpeeng lamda mi inn thaanni kinle lamda.
Ungta Mma maidee rek leh Galil ki Mma dil kṭoi snu rek mkheng ngi hava nong khim khaija leer khatti va dei lamda.
Tunva Jihudia rek khuwpii Arimathia ki mmiing Joseph tdit miilai khatta ava thu amda. Mma ava karseel lop thungki kṭha, rinkindit miilai khat,
mmaan poibin leh mnong tlot thuwnni plung piime, ungta mma ava Isowr Kruwngpaam mlam ksu slii kcha kurthuwk da.
Hava miilaiji Pilat hinni vada Jisu kluwng nga ṭhil chda.
Ava dilli mma ngi han pṭumda plaa buw ktarnaal dang ngi klum thida lung khat kreuda mdo vu thlaan khat, ku mii khat lee iina mlai ava thu pi iip chda.
Mmaanni mdo purchuwl naan nit, ungta sabath nitta vei slii da.
Ungta Mma doṭhi Galil ki snu rekki ṭoida, tak heppi mukluwng ava mpi iia, kdingi thlaan ava suw lamda.
Ava dilli mmaanni kinle lamda, ungu reidii leh thao purchuwl chlamda. Paureen dil kṭoiji sabath nit va karnga lamda.
Ungta hapta ki mnii khat na thok jiingsun kpanma ngi, mmaanni mdo purchuwl chaak in reidii sin lamda, thlaan tha va lamda.
Ungbi thlaan thung ki lung nga kpurlup dokki pha lamda.
Ungu mthung ngi mvan lu in thungta, mukluwng ava mmaanni pha chlam mda.
Mmaanni hava mlei thung ngi mnga chaak slii arlaan inni, asuwn, mbe thaanni mdo mna kipleu dang dang miilai knii rip daat lamda.
Ungbi mmaanni ṭi chlamda, dul tunni mju tpet tir chaak arlaan inni, miilai knii rekki mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji kdiyou rek arlakki kring karheel ava naanni ado thlaam inda?
Mma ngi Galil thung ngi ma am daat mpha thu, tak heppi ahin inni mthe tdit abin phaak in.
Mii Chapa ava pnu kirvei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthira, ungu khros leen kupthoi lamra, ungta mnii kdumna nitti kring kardel ra.”
Ungbi mmaanni Mma pauna ava bin phaak lamda.
Ungta mmaanni thlaan thungki mdil kinle lamda, hava mkheng nga sowm lei khat leh mii murson rek hin song chlam da.
Tunva kenyee rek hin hava ksong rekka Magdaleni Mery, Joana, Jeems leh nuh Mery ungu mmaan doṭhi snu rek murson;
pdainu hava pauna rek ava do ksikma bin lamda, ungta mhin inni rin chlam me.
Pdainu Pitor ra rip daat da thlaan tha vachen da; tpeda mthu mhai sut thungta, buw daat kma donle do khat lee dei me, ungbi kthuwk nong ava leiji kngak tleiji inn tha vangda.
Ungta ava nit katti miilai knii rek ava Jerusalem thungki ngi meel tikheu arveel karlat, Emmaus tdit khuw khat tha chet slii lamda.
Ungta kthuwk dok hava nong rek mkheng mlei thung ngi khat leh khatti pau saam lamda.
Mmaanni pau saam lamda, mkarteen meek slii arlaanni, Jisu mdak katti mbe thaan nai da, mmaan tu van kilṭhi lamda.
Pdainu mmaan mikki suwtin chdei lam mda.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni ache slii chun inni khat leh khatti theen tinu ado saam inna talu da?” Ungbi mmaanni kurnung lamda rip mer chdaat lamda.
Ungta mmiing Kleupas tdit marlak inki khatti Mhin arthawngda, “Harvaiji kthuwk nong rek kdei kma, Jerusalem kvel mii ava nang daat ra?”

Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Tak kthuwk da?” Ungta mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Nasareth ki Jisu mlei thu, Mma ava Khulpu khat ungu mnong tlot leh mpauna ava Isowr leh mii mkheng maiṭhuwmmi klin langlang khat.
Ungta nenki thiimpu kinreel rek leh paamkpupa rek va tak heppi mraal pii lamda, khros leen pthoi lamda, mdo eayo nraan mdo parlaan pthiin varple.
Pdainu Isreel kpirliing ra ava Mma daat kdingi neenva kdo bin chaak in. Oji, ungu hava mkheng daat kma, nong mthuwna ava snii ngi mnii kdumna mphaakka.
Ava daat nowl kma, snu rek angṭhe ngi mhai pngak tir chaanda. Jiinsun kpanma ngi mmaanni thlaan tha va lamda,
ungbi mukluwng ava pha chlam mda; ungta mmaanni arvang kinle lamda, Mma kring kinle dok pi dilam da, Waantamsii ruk dei innu kdingi song lamda.
Neen kmiiṭhiin angṭhe rukka thlaan tha va lamda, ungbi snu rek pau son hep heppi pha nowl lamda; pdainu mmaanva dei chlam me.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “O, ka aak rek, khulpu rek mkheng pau son dok ava tija thu ktappi arin chaak daat inna!
Khrista ngi suwkthuwk parteel thidonle, Mma laarnee thung ngi trin kma mlu rang pme mo?”
Ungta Mousi thung ki ngi khulpu rek mkheng thu pṭhunda, Mma mlei thung ngi laaika mkheng thungki ava the purlu pik lamda.
Ungu mmaanni mlu nraan khuw ava mnai thungta, Jisu va lamkla bet thang ngi kchet rang heppi tloda.
Pdainu mmaanni Mhin kdung ngi thlot chlam da, the lamda, “Neen tu kcheeng sap in che, mleija nit sowt dok da khuw kjiing chra.” Ava leiji mmaan kiprii ṭhi rang ngi vanṭoi lamda.
Jisu ngi mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi kmaal ra tebol be ngi mkon thungta, Mma ngi thenpen louda phowl kṭha parlaan thida, khuida, mhin inni pii lamda.
Ungbi mmik in kparvang da, Mma tin chlam da, pdainu Jisua mmaan do sut na thungki maang dok da.
Mmaanni khat leh khatti the lamda, “Mma ngi lam tha paumin mi tsaam pik in thu, laaika rek mpvan mpha thu, nuplung inna kdung mdo pkaak pda?”
Ungta ṭhang ava kat thu mmaanni kurlou lamda Jerusalem tha kinle lamda, sowm lei khat rek leh mmiiṭhiin kthuwk kurkuk pha lamda.
“Do dak kat katti Mukpua ring kardel da Simon hin ktardet da,” dilam da the lamda.
Ava dilli lam tha kthuwk nong ava leh thenpen khuida mhin inni tak heppi ktardet tdit ki pau song chlam da.
Ungta mmaanni hava mthe slii arlaan inni Jisu mdak kat ava marlak inni rip daat da.
Pdainu mmaanna raothla khat kdei heppi kdung ngi piir lamda ṭi chlam da.
Ungta Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Talu leiji kunchun in pti, ungu talu leiji aplung inna kinṭheekki ado reel in?
Nei kukhut leh kukhu asuwn, Nei kat ping; mhai kmei inra asuwn, mleija ru leh dak pummi ado dee in lulu ngi pthla va kurthuwk me.”
Mma ngi hava the thida mkhut mkhu mhin inni tdet lamda.
Ungta mmaanva krin khot cha kma kdung reenni kanpa lamda, ungu mnga tlei arlaan inni mhin inni Mma ngi theda, “Hava thu tchaak raan do athloi in mo?”
Ungbi mmaanni tuwlva tro khat Mhin ni pii lamda,
ungbi Mma ngi louda mmaiṭhuwm inni chaa da.

Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Neiji naan tu kilṭhi ngi ka am mpha thu, Nei kdo the pauna rekka havale, mleija Neiki mlei thu Mousi Nowlam thung ngi, ungu khulpu rek leh laa rek thung ngi mdo kjit khim khaija kurkhumma.”
Ava dilli laaika rek mdo dee pandit chaak nraan, Mma ngi muplung in pvan pik lamda.
Ungta mhin inni theda, “Khrista ngi suwkthuw parteel thi donle, mnii kdum na thung ngi kdiyou rek thungki kring kardel ra,
ungu Jerusalem thu pṭhunda, chati mkheng thu Mma miing ngi plung ren hurda, ungta pnu rek kuptlot pik ava karyaam ra, dida anto mdo kjit dok.
Naanna havale ki sakhi rek in pti.
Ungta asuwn, Nei ki Kpah paureel dok ava aleen thaanni arju sii nik di, pdainu naanna kparthaang sii ki rutan atpihiil du in khim khai khuwpii hava thung ngi am daat in.”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi Bethania kpha dekki ṭhi lam thida, mkhut khiing da phowl kṭha parlaan chlam da.
Mma ngi phowl kṭha mparlaan slii chunni mmaan hinki sunda, ungu parwaan tha hunkal chda.
Ungta mmaanni kdung kanpa kcha ngi Jerusalem tha mdil kinle lamda,
ungu luwbuk Inn thu kdet liit kma Isowr panpaak chlam da.
Mupṭhun daat le pauna ava amda, ungta pauna ava Isowr tu kilṭhida, ungu pauna ava Isowr kurthuwk da.
Mma mupṭhun daat le Isowr tu kilṭhida;
Mma thu do mkheng nga seemda, ungta mdo seem thung ngi Mma ktaakki mdo seem do khat lee ame.
Mma thu rinkhu amda, ungu rinkhu ava dultimii tummi mar awng kurthuwk da.
Mar awng ava kjiingnu thu lengda, ungta kjiingnu ngi do khat lee pchaang me.
Isowr do arjun sii mmiing Johon tdit miilai khat amda.
Mma ngi mar awng hin sakhi piida, mleija Mma thu mii mkheng ngi mdo rin chaak nra, rinpaumin ava tummi arjungda.
Mma mar awng ava pme, pdainu mar awng ava sakhi kpiira kurjung.
Mii pum ktai leenni kleng rangki kindit mar awng ava dultipaam thu arjungda.
Mma dultipaam thu am dokda, ungta dultipaamma Mma thung ngi seemda, anto daat joso dultipaamva Mma dei me.
Mma ngi mdak kat ki inn thu arjungda, ungta Mma ava mmii rek kat va arlaang chme.
Pdainu Mma karlaang kcha, Mma miing krin kcha mii mkheng nga, Isowr naole mkurthut nraan rutan pii chlam da.
kṭou mii rek ava hii lei pme, mdit mata daksaa lei pme, mdit mata miilai do ngei lei pme, pdainu Isowr thung ngi kṭou.
Ungta pauna ava dulti miilai khat kurthuwk da, ungu nen narlak inni amda, plungnee leh kindit ti dim chda; nenni Mma laarnee dei chaan minnu, laarnee ava Mpah hinki Mchapa khdaat chrel ava.
Johon na Mma sakhi kurthuwk da, ungta owngda, “ ‘Nei kdil tha kurjung Mii ava nei kihinva klin langlang, mleija Mma nei kdu ngi ka am dok,’ dinu neiji kdo the ava hava.”
Ungta nen nkheng inna Mma plungnee thu, plungnee tunni plungnee tarlaan chaak in.
Mleija Mousi mpha thung ngi Nowlam piida; ungta plungnee leh kindit ava Jisu Khrista mpha thu kurjung.
Mpah awng ngi ka am Mchapa khat chrel ava hinni mdo tdet kma donle, Mpah kdei ku khat lee ame.
Ungta Jihudia rek ava ngi Jerusalem ki thiimpu rek leh Levi rek mhin vasii lamda, paukhewl lamda, “Nah ku ptida?” dida mtheen mpha thungki Johon rinpauminna hava.
Mma ngi karthe thuwda, mmava mat me, pdainu, “Neia Khrista pmaang,” dida.
Ungbi mmaanni mhin khewl lamda, “Ava mkurthuttu nah ku ptida? Nah Elijah pti mo?” Mma ngi theda, “Neia mma pmaang.” “Nah khulpu khat pti mo?” Ungbi mma ngi arthawngda, “Eme.”
Mmaanni mhin theda, “Ava mkurthuttu nah ku pti da? Neen mhai ksii rek hin kdo arthaan chaak nraan, nah mlei thu ku ping ngi kardi ptida?”
Mma ngi theda “‘Mukpu lamṭoira arjii,’ dida khulpu Isaijah ngi mdo the lulu ngi, neia kbowklaiji ko owng krowl khat ava ping.”
Tunva Pharisi rek do haisii mmaanni,
mhin khewl lamda, “Khrista akurthut ma, mdit mata Elijah ruk akurthut ma, mdit mata khulpu akurthut mau, talu leiji nangva baptis ado ptlot da?”
Johon ni mhin inni arthawngda, “Neiva dii tu kilṭhi ngi baptis kuptlot, pdainu naan arlakki krip rek thungki Khat ava naanni dei maan ti.
Nei kdil ṭoida kurjung Mma ava mkhukok rii daat mak klua kparthle pik ra nea kurhui chmaang.”
Hava nong nga Johon ni baptis muptlot lamthu, Jordon raalpha ngi mmun Bethania thu kthuwk.
Ungta mupduk nii ngi mhin Jisu karva slii deida, ungu theda, “Dultipaam thungki pnu klou pthii ra Isowr ki Jaonao ava asuwn!
‘Nei kdil ṭoida kurjung Mma ava klin langlang, mleija Mma nei kdu ngi ka am dok,’ dinu kdo the Mma ava hava.
Nei kdak kat daat rukva Mma dei chmaang; pdainu Mma ngi Isreel mii rek hin mdo pandan nra, hava tummi neiva dii tu kilṭhi ngi baptis ado kuptlot in.”
Ungta Johon ni sakhi piida, “Parwaan ki pthla uṭhuw heppi arjungda Mma leen kchu neiji deinu.
Nei kdak kat rukva Mma dei chmaang; pdainu dii tu kilṭhi ngi baptis kdo ptlot rangki mju ksii Mma ngi kihin theda, ‘Pthla ngi arjungda mleen kchu ado dee hava Mma ngi pthla kchiir ri baptis ktlo ra.’
Ungta Isowr Chapa tdit neiji deinu ava sakhi kpiik chaakka.”
Ungta mupduk nii va Johon na msiikhu rek knii tu rip daat lamda;
Ungta mma ngi mche slii chunni Jisu suwda, ungu theda, “Isowr Jaonao asuw in!”
Msiikhu rek miilai knii ngi hava mdo the aryaa da, ungbi mmaanni Jisu dil ṭoi chlam da.
Jisu ngi mdil mkinlet thungta, mmaanni mdil mdo ṭoi slii lam deida, ungbi mhin inni theda, “Talu da ado thlaam inna?” Ungta mmaanni Mhin the chlamda, “Rabbi,” (mleija Chukpu) “Tva tha ka am pti da?”
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Arvaan, ungu asuwn,” ungta mmaanni arva lamda, ma amna dei lamda, ava nit va amṭhi lamda, mleija ṭhang sowm arveel kurthuwk da.
Johon do the aryaa da Mma dil kṭoi cha miilai knii thungki khat ava Simon Pitor upa Andrija.
Rukri ngi mma ngi mnaopa Simon pha da, ungu mhin theda, “Neenni (Khrista tdit) Masija kphaak chaak inna.”
Mma ngi Jisu ṭhi paphaak da, Jisu ngi mma suw thida, theda, “Nah Johon chapa Simon pti mo? Nang nga Siphas di nikdi.” (Mleija Pitor)
Mupduk niiva Jisua Galil tha vang nuwm da. Ungta Mma ngi Philip phada, ungu mhin theda, “Nei kdil aṭoi cha.”
Tunva Philip ava Andrija leh Pitor khuwpii Bethsaida ki kurthuwk da.
Philip pi Nathaniel phada, ungu mhin theda, “Mousi Nowlam thung ngi mdo the, ungta khulpu rek ruk va mdo kjit dok, Joseph chapa, Nasareth ki Jisu, neenni pha chaannu.”
Nathaniel li mhin theda, “Nasareth thung ngi do kṭha khat kthuwk rang mo?” Philip pi mhin theda, “Arva ungu asuw!”
Jisu ngi Mma hin Nathaniel karva slii deida, ungu mhin theda, “Isreel mii kat ava asuwn, mkarma nra ame!”
Nathaniel li Mhin theda, “Tak heppi nea ado tdee da?” Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Philip pi ato own du ngi, kduwt ding ti ngi a am daat mpha thu Neiva ado kdee.”
Nathaniel li Mhin arthawngda, “Rabbi, Nah Isowr Chapa pti! Nah Isreel rek Kruwng ava pti!”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Mleija Neiji kduwt ding ti ngi ado kdee dinu kdo the leiji arin chaak mo? Havale hinva klin klin nong nang ngi dei nadi.”
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, nang ngi parwaan kparvang, ungta Isowr Waantamsii rekki Mii Chapa leen kuhung kal ungu kurjung ṭum slii meek nang ngi dei nadi.”
Ungta mnii kdumna nitti Galil thungki Kana thu kphal khat amda, ungu Jisu nuh rukka ava tha amdaat da;
ungta Jisu rukka msiikhu rek tu kphal ava thung ngi kowlla chlam da.
Rikrou dii mtlan dok thungta, mnuh ngi Jisu hin theda, “Rikrou dii thloi chlamme.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “O snu, talu mtlot ṭhi nda? Nei ki ṭhang vei mlai.”
Ungta mnuh ngi sra owr rek hin theda, “Mma do the khim khai atlo in.”
Tunva lung ksowr truk thii lamda, mleija Jehudia rek kinditki kartleu nrang leiji ksowr ktaiji uwm som knii nii mdit mata som kdum dum luna.
Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Ksowr rekka dii apdim in.” Ungbi kiplee daatti pdim lamda.
Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Tunva angṭhe alou inra kmaal supkchil rek hin vang sin in.” Ava leiji mmaanni lou lamda.
Kmaal supkchilli diia mpartem thungta, tunva rikrou dii kur owlda, ungu tva ki kthleng tdit dei lamme, (dii ksuwk sra owr rek va deida.) kmaal sup kchilli kphalpa ownda,
ungu mhin theda, “Mii khim khaiva rukri ngi rikrou dii makṭha themda; ungta mii rekki mneek prit thung ro ngi mjasee mdo them; pdainu tun kpha thung ngi rikrou dii kṭha thloi tlit daat tinu.”
Hava Galil ki Kana thung ngi ru kri reep ki titinna ava Jisu ngi tloda, ungu ava thu mlaarnee kandang da; ungu msiikhu rekki Mhin rin chlam da.
Hava dil tha Mma ngi Kaparnahum tha mnuh leh mnaopale ungu msiikhu rek tu kilṭhida sunda; ava tha mmaanni niikhuw kcheeng bong lamda.
Jihudia rek ki taplaanna ava nai tekda, ungu Jisu ngi Jerusalem tha hangda.
Luwbuk Inn thu sil, jao, ungu uṭhuw rek kjur, ungta sum kparthleng rekki sumdowl mdolo in phada.
Luwbuk Inn thungki jao, sil ava riijei khat seemda rei pthiida, ungta sum kparthleng rek thiir sum ava ptlong pthii da ungu tebol la parlup parthel pthiida; rei pthii lamda.
Ungta uṭhuw rek kjur hin Mma ngi theda, “Hava lea alou pthiin, naanni Kpah Inn na sum dowl adolo naanni ktlo rome.”
“Nah Inn kuplung mlut reen leiji makchaa dok ra,” dida mdo kjit ava siikhu rekki bin phaak lamda.
Ava dilli Jehudia rekki Mhin the lamda, “Hava ado tlot naki titinna rek talu mti det naan di?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Hava luwbuk Inn ava ae krep da ungu nii kdum daat thung ngi prip nik di.”
Ava dilli Jihudia rekki theda, “Luwbuk Inn ava kum somplii lei truk klutti tsak, ungta Nangva nii kdum daat thung ngi prip namo?”
Pdainu Mmava luwbuk Inn ava mdaksaa mdo thena kurthuwk da.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mrin kardel mpha thu, msiikhu rekki hava mdo the ava bin phaak lamda; ungta mmaanni Laaika leh Jisu dothe dok pauna ava rin chlam da.
Tunva Mma ava taplaanna kmaal mpha thu Jerusalem tha am daat da, Mma ngi titinna rek mdo tlot mdo dee lei inni, mii maknem mi Mma miing rin chda.
Pdainu Jisu va mdaksaa ava mmaan hin kalrin chme.
Ku mii khatti Mii ava ki sakhi mdo ri pik nrangki arleek setti ame, mleija mii mkheng nga Mma ngi dei dok da; mleija miilai thu ka am ava Mma mdakki dei dok da.
Tunva Jihudia rek paam kpupa khat mmiing Nikodimas tdit Pharisi miilai khat amda.

Hava miilaiji jaanni Jisu hin arva da ungu Mhin theda, “Rabbi, Nah Isowr hinki kurjung Chukpu khat tdit neenni kdee chaak in; mleija Isowr ri ado tiṭhi kma donle, Nah dotlot hava titinna rekka ku khat lee ngi tlo pchaang me.”
Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, miilai khat ava renni kṭou kma donle, Isowr Kruwngpaam mma ngi dei chip pchaang nime.”
Nikodimas ava ngi Mhin theda, “Miilai khat ava mder chaakku tak heppi kṭou rangda? Mvei knitna ngi mnuh poi thu lut da mma kṭou rang mo?”
Jisu ngi arthawngda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, miilai khat ava dii leh pthla ngi mṭou mabi, Isowr Kruwngpaam lut chip pchaang nime.
Mleija dakki kṭou ava dak, ungta pthla ngi kṭou ava pthla.
Nah hinni hava kdo the leiji ngak chma, ‘Ren ni aṭouma rome.’

Tarthli ngi mraan nuwm na thung ngi kraang, ungta nang ngi marchaang ava aryaa nadi, pdainu nang ngi tva ki kthleng mdit mata tva tha kchet tdit dei mti; ava leiji pthla ngi kṭou mii pum ktaija anto lu hep daat.”
Nikodimas ava ngi Mhin theda, “Tak heppi hava kthuwk rang da?”
Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Nah Isreel rek chukpu khat pti, ungu tak heppi hava dei pandi mti da?
Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin kthea, neenva kdo dee in ava ktheen ping, ungta kdo dee chaak in ava sakhi kpii in ping; pdainu neenki rinpauminna naanni arlaang chmaan ti.
Neiji dultipaam ki do kdothe ava nang ngi arin chaak mau, tak heppi parwaan ki do kdothe ava nang ngi rin chna di?
Ku khat lee ngi parwaan tha hung pchaang me, pdainu Mii Chapa ava parwaan ki kurjung kṭum.
Kbowk laiji Mousi ngi pruwl mdo khiin heppi, Mii Chapa mdo khiin ma rome.
Mleija Mma krin kcha ku mii khat ava kṭuw knai kma rinkhu kpha chra.
Mleija Isowr ri dultipaamma tija thu wonsat loda, ditta Mchapa khat chrel pii chda, Mma krin cha ku mii khat ava mawng nime pdainu kṭuw knai ma rinkhu kpha chra.
Mleija Isowr ri Mchapa ava dultipaam thung ngi arjun siida, dultipaam mraal kpii rang lei pme, pdainu Mma ngi dultipaamma kaktlan pik ra.
Mma krin cha mii ava mraal pii nime, Isowr Chapa khat chrel miing krin kma mii ava mma ngi mdo rin chaak ma leiji mraal mdo piik dok.
Ungta mdo kṭewlla hava, ditta dultipaam thu mar awng arjungda, ungta mii rekva mar awng ava kchang nga, kjiingnu wonsat loda, mleija mnong tlot inna ṭha me.
Mleija kṭha kma ktlo mii pum ktaiva mar awng pdar chda, mnong tlot in mdo pandan nuwm maan leiji, mar awng tha arvang nuwm lamme.
Pdainu kindit ktlo miia Isowr ri mrot pik tdit mar awng ngi mdo tdet nra, mar awng tha karvang.
Hava dil tha Jisu leh msiikhu rekka Judia paam tha vang lamda; Mma ngi avatha mmaan kcheen ṭhida baptis ptlot lamda.
Johon rukva Salim be tha Aenon thung ngi baptis ptlot slii da, ava thu dii mnem bet leiji, mii rek arva lamda, ungta baptis ptlot pik chlam da.
Mleija Johon na rowng inn thu am mlai.
Tunva Johon siikhu rekki Jihudia miilai khat hin kartleu mlei thu karteen ṭhi lamda.

Ungta mmaanni Johon hin arvang lamda, ungu mhin the lamda, “Rabbi, Jordon raalpha ngi nang tu kilṭhi, nah sakhi hurpik, Mma ava tha ka am daatta, Mma hin kthleng mii mkheng Mma ngi baptis ptlot pik lamda.”
Johon ni arthawngda, “Parwaan ki ngi Mhin kpii kma donle, ku khat lee ngi do khat lee arlaang nime.
Neia Khrista pmaang, pdainu Mma du sukki nea mdo tsii dinu ado kthe pik dok in, ava naan adaksaan katti sakhi.
Jur kphal la kphalpa; ungta ripda karyaa kcha rek kphalpa plap rekki kphalpa krowl aryaa da, kdung ngi kanpa kcha a; ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, hava ngi neiki kanpa ava kurkhumma.
Mma klin thang ra, pdainu nea kdil thang kat rang ping.
Tun knungki kurjung Mma ava mkheng leenni tun knung ra; dultipaam ki mii ava dulti mii do, ungta dulti mii pauvi kpau; parwaan ki kurjung Mma ava mkheng tun riimmi ka amra.
Mma va mdo dee leh mdo aryaak ava sakhi mdo piik, anto daat joso Mma rinpaumin na ku mii khat lee ngi arlaan pik me.
Mma rinpaumin karlaang cha miia, kindit kdiki Isowr kbiinam mi mdo nam pik dok.
Mleija Isowr dosii Mma va Isowr pauna rek mdo the, mleija tparte, na thung ngi parte da pthlava Mhin mdo piik pme.
Mpah ngi Mchapa ava wonsat loda, ungta do mkheng nga Mma khut thu mdo piik dok.
Mchapa hin krin cha miia kṭuw knai ma rinkhu kpha chra; Mchapa kleek miia rinkhu dei nime, pdainu Isowr plung thit mleen kthlung ra.
Tunva Mukpu Jisu ngi baptis ptlot lamda, Johon hinva siikhu rek knem mi mseemma tdit ki pau Pharisi rekki mdo aryaak Mukpu ngi deida.
(Jisu mdak kat va baptis plo lamme, pdainu msiikhu rek daatti plo daat joso),
Mma ngi Judia paam ma pthii thida Galil tha kunsun nowlda.
Mma ngi Samaria mdo klaan ra kurthuwk da.
Ava leiji Mma ngi Sykhar tdit Samaria khuwpii khat tha, Jakob pi mchapa Joseph hin mdo piik bil ava be thang ngi arvang da.
Ava thu Jakob diirum amda, ava lei Jisua lam kchet kipjiin mkurthut leiji kham chda diirum be ngi karnga da. Ava ṭhang truk arveel.
Ava thu Samaria snu miilai khatti dii ksuwk ra arva da. Ungta Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kdo neek ra mhai pii cha.”
Mleija msiikhu rekka khuwpii tha then krenra va dok lamda.
Samaria snu ava ngi Mhin theda, “Tak heppi Jihudia khat Nangva, Samaria snu nei kihin ki ado neek ra dii ado ṭhilda?” Mleija Jehudia rek leh Samaria rekka kurchom nlamme.
Jisu ngi mhin arthawngda, “Nang ngi Isowr chla deida ungu nah hinni kpau slii Mma ava ku tdit adee tlaangbi, ‘Kdo neek ra dii mpii tidonle,’ nang ngi Mma hinki kring dii ava ṭhil chna di.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin theda, “Ocha, adii su nra ado thloi makpa, ungta diirum rukka ktlum, Nangva kring diia tva ki pha na da?
Hava diirum mikpii kchaan, ungta mma mdak, ungu mchapa le, ungta msil rek rukva mthungki dii mdo neek, neenki kpah in Jakob hinva Nah klin pti mo?”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Hava thungki dii knee mii pum ktaija mning kakraal nowlra,
pdainu Neiji kdo piik ra dii ava knee ku mii khat ava, tden thung preva mning kraal nime. Neiji kdo piik ra dii ava mma thung ngi diitlaang kur owl donle, kṭuw knaima rinkhu ngi kphul ra.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin theda, “Ocha, neiji kning makraal ma nra, mdit mata dii kdo su ma nra,ava diia mhai pii cha.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Vang, a innpu vang ownra, ungu hava thu arhai ṭhi.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin arthawngda, “Ki innpu thloi chmaang.” Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nang ngi ki innpu ame diti mkindit athea;
mleija nang ngi innpu miilai parnga ado thloi, ungta tun tunni ado thloija a innpu pme; hava mkindit nang ngi athea.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin theda, “Ocha, Nah khulpu khat pti tdit neiji kdee chaakka.
Neenki kpah leva hava lownpii luwbuk lamda; ungta Nangva mmun Jerusalem tha luw ado buk raan pi ditinu.”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Snu, naan ki Apah in ava hava lownpii mdit mata Jerusalem tha luw ado buk ma nraanki ṭhang ava karvang sliia.
Naanva ado dee maan luwbuk inti; neenva kdo dee in luwbuk innu, mleija kirliing ava Jihudia thung ngi kthuwk.
Pdainu tun rukva mkindit luw kbuk rekki Mpah ava pthla leh kindit ava ngi luw mdo buk nraanki ṭhang ava karvang sliia, mleija Mpah rukva Mhin anto lulu ngi luw kbuk ra ava mdo thlaam.
Isowra Pthla, ungta Mhin luwkbuk miirekva pthla leh rinkinditti luw mdo buk ra.”
Snu ava ngi Mhin theda, “Masija kurjung nga tdit neiji kdee chaakka. (Mma ava Khrista) Mma ngi murjun mpha thu do mkheng mhai ktidet chraan.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nang hinni kpau meek slii Nei ava Mma ping.”
Ava dilli siikhu rek arvang lamda. Snu miilai khat mdo karbiik ṭhi leiji ngak chlam da, pdainu “Talu angei da?” mdit mata “Talu leiji mma ado karbiik ṭhida?” dida ku khat lee ngi the pchaang me.
Ava leiji snu ava ngi mdiiuwm ma thida khuwpii tha vangda, ungta mii rek hin theda,
“Nei kdo tlot mkheng kthethuw Miilai khat ava arva inra asuwn. Hava Khrista ngaal mo?”
Mmaanni khuwpii ki thuwk lamda Mhin arva lamda.
Ava arlaanni siikhu rekki, “Rabbi, maal,” dilam da Mhin ktham chlam da.
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naan dodee ma then kdo chaak ra ka am.”
Ava leiji siikhu rekki khat leh khatti the lamda, “Mma hinni then ksin ku mii khat ka am ngaal in pti mo?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei miksii Mma dongei ktlo dok ava Nei kthen.
‘Thla plii diltha buh khau pha kveira,’ dida naanva the maanti mo? Neiji akthe pik inna, amik inni tan aan inra hansuwn, bil rekka min dok da buh khau pha kveija.
Kakhau mii ava ngi marda man karlaang chra, ungta kṭuw knai kma rinkhu tummi thei kpurkuk chra, ava leiji kakhau leh kapṭau ava kanpave lamra.
Mleija ‘khat do pṭau khatti kakhaura’ dida mdo the kcho ava mkindit kat.
Naan nonglo nma, ktlok rek nonglo dok nthu kakhaura Neiji aksii inna, ungta naanna mmaan nonglo thung ngi klut kcha in pti.”
Snu ava rinpaumin ni mlei kurthuwk da, khuwpii thungki Samaria mii knempok ki Mma hin rin chda, “Nei knong tlot mkheng Mma ngi thethuw dokda.”
Ava leiji Samaria rekki Mma hin arva lamda, mmaan hinni makcheen daat nra ktham chlam da, ungbi nii knii kcheengda.
Ungta Mma pauna leiji mii knempokki Mhin rin chda.
Mmaanni snu ava hin the lamda, “Nah apauna leiji neenni kdo rin kurnowl in pme, mleija neen kdak kat inni aryaa chaannu, ungta hava ava ngi dultipaam kaktlan pik ra tdit neenni kdo dee chaak in.”
Nii knii diltha Mma ngi Galil tha vangda.
Mleija Jisu mdak rukva khulpu khatta mdaksaa ki khuwpaam thangva kjat pik me tdit deida.
Ava leiji Mma ngi Galil tha arvangda, mleija mmaan rukka kmaal mche lei inni, Jerusalem tha kmaal thung ngi mdo tlot mkheng dei lamda, Galil mii rekva Mma kowl chlam da.
Ava leiji Mma ngi Galil ki Kana tha dii ava rikrou dii mdo pur owl na thang ngi arvangda. Ungta Kaparnahum thung ngi nong klin kpuw miilai khat chapa ava kukoi amda.
Jisu ngi Judia ki Galil tha marvan maryaak thungta, Jisu ngi ju da mchapa mdo pdam pik nra, mma ngi hangda Mhin ktham chda, mleija mchapa ava kdiyou daat rang ngi koi chda.
Ava leiji, Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Nang ngi titinna rek leh tngana rek adee du khim khaiji rin chnim ti.”
Nong klin kpuw ngi Mhin theda, “Ocha, knao mdiyo du ngi mhai thlen pik cha.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Jung, achapa kring chra.” Mma ngi Jisu dothe pik pauna rin chda mlam tha jungsunda.
Mma ngi hanto mjun slii arlaanni, mma sra owr rekki kurdut ṭhida, achapa kring kcha a kdingi song lamda.
Ava leiji mma ngi kdam mdo pṭhun na ki ṭhang mhin inni khewl lamda, ungbi mmaanni mhin the lamda, “Janii ngi ṭhang tikheu thu riiphaak va ma da.
Jisu ngi “Achapa kring chra,” dida mhin mdo thena ṭhang thung katta mpah ngi dei da; ungta mma mdak kat ungu mphungka mkheng ngi Mhin rin chlam da.
Jisu Judia ki Galil tha marvan mpha thung tunva hava mvei knit naki titinna rek mdo tlot.
Hava diltha Jihudia rek kmaal khat amda, ungbi Jisua Jerusalem tha hangda.
Tunva Jerusalem thung ngi jao paltong ava be tha dulbuk parnga amda, Hebru pauva Bethjatha mdo dit, ava thu liibum khat amda.
Havale thung ngi kukoi, mik ktot, khu kseek, kyeng rek kurtuwl pok lamda.
(Mleija mkret mkretti Mukpu Waantamsii ngi liibum thu arjungda, diia tnok kchokda, ungu dii maknat thung ngi ru kri ngi jungkṭum mii ava mo omlai khim khai kdam cha.)
Ava thung ngi kum som kdum lei tret lik thung ngi kukoi kcha miilai khat amda.
Jisu ngi mma deida, ungta mpha roi ksotti koida ava thung ngi ki iip chdaat tdit deida, Mma ngi mhin theda, “Kdamra angei mo?”
Kukoi miilaiji Mhin theda, “Ocha, liibum dii maknat mpha thu, mikṭhi chra ku khat lee thloi chmanu, ungta neiji kjun ṭum slii arlaanni, nei kdu ngi ktlok khatti ṭum chdok khot kchokda.”
Jisu ngi mhin theda, “Kardel, ungu a iina aloura, chet.”
Ungta mpha ava kat thung ngi mma dam chda, ungta mma ngi mi iina louda, ungu chetda.
Tunva ava sabath nit kurthuwk da.
Ava leiji Jihudia rekki kdam miilai hin theda, “Sabath nit kurthuwkka, a iina ado loa Nowlam dorot pme.”
Pdainu mma ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Nei mkapdam Mma ngi ‘A iina aloura echet,’ dida theda.”
Ungbi mmaanni mhin khewl lamda, “ ‘A iina alou ungu echet,’ dida ahin kthe Miia kuda?”
Tunva kdam miiva Mma ava ku tdit dei me, mleija mun ava thu mii mkurtuwl pok leiji Jisua kunsun dok da.
Dil thang ro ngi, luwbuk Inn thu Jisu ngi phada, ungu mhin theda, “Asuw, kdam kcha im ptine! kheel sii aleenni mtlaak ma nra, pnu tla kurnowl ma.”
Miilai ava ngi sunda mma kapdam ava Jisu tdit Jihudia rek hin songda.
Ungta Mma ngi sabath nitti hava mdo tlot leiji, Jihudia rekki Jisua kja kakham pii lamda.
Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Kpah ngi tun kpha thu nong tloda, ungbi Nei rukva nong kdo tlot.”
Hava leiji Jihudia rekva kheel sii ngi Mma mdo eayo nraan mlam thlaam lamda, mleija Mma ngi sabath nit daat pkuime, pdainu Isowra Mma Pah pi dida, mdakka Isowr tu kpinṭim da.

Ungta Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin inni kthea, Mchapa mthi na ngi do khat lee tlo pchaang me, pdainu Mpah do tlot slii mdo dee ava daat, mleija Mma do tlot khim khaija Mchapa rukva anto lulu ngi mdo tlot.
Mleija Mpah ngi Mchapa wonsat loda, ungu Mma do tlot slii mkheng Mhin tdet da; ungta anga chaak nraan havale hinva klin sii nong rek Mma ngi akti det raan.
Mleija Mpah ngi kdiyou dok rek pring pardel da rinkhu mdo piik lulu ngi, Mchapa rukva mdo ngei rek hin rinkhu kpii ra.
Mpah va ku mii khat lee kṭewl me, pdainu mdo kṭewl ra mkheng nga Mchapa hin mdo piik dok.
Mmaanni Mpah mdo kjat chaak in lulu, mii mkheng ngi Mchapa mdo kjat chaak nrang lei kurthuwk. Mchapa kakjat kma miiva Mma arjun ksii Mpah ruk kjat chme.

Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, Nei kpauna aryaa da ungta Nei mju ksii Mma krin cha mii ava, kṭuw knai kma rinkhu mthloija, Mma dokṭewl rang thung ngi thleng nime, pdainu kdiyou rang thungki rinkhu tha maklaan chaak dokka.
“Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, tun tun rukva kdiyou dok rekki Isowr Chapa krowl mdo aryaak nraan, ungta kdiyou dok rekki kring mdo phaak chaak nraan ki ṭhang karvang sliia.
Mleija Mpah ngi mdaksaa thung ngi rinkhu mdo thloi lulu ngi, Mchapa rukva mdaksaa thung ngi rinkhu mdo thloi nra Mhin kpii dok.
Mma ngi Mii Chapa mkurthut leiji mdo kṭewl nra Mhin mdo piik dok.
Hava ngi ngak chmaan; mleija thlaan thungki mii mkheng ngi Mma krowl mdo aryaak nraanki ṭhang ava karvang nga.
Ungta kṭha ktlo rekka rinkhu mdo piik nra kring kardel ra, ungu kṭha kma ktlo rek ava mdo kṭewl nrangki ngi kardel ra.
Neiva kthi naki rutanni do khat lee tlo pchaang maang; Neiji kdo aryaak ava heppi, kdo kṭewl; ungta Nei kdo kṭewl ava mkindi,t mleija Nei mju ksii Mma do ngei kma donle, kthina ki Neiji thlaam maang.
Neiji kdaksaa kthina ki sakhi kpiikbi, Neiki krinpaumin ava kindit me;
Neiki sakhi mikpiik pik ktlok khat rukka ka am, mma ngi Neiki rinpaumin mdo piik ava kindit tdit Neiji kdee.
Naanni Johon hin mii sii inti, ungu mma ngi kindit sakhi piida.
Nei kdo arlaan rinpaumin ava mii rek hinki pme, pdainu naan ado tiktlan pik chaak nraan, Neiji hava kdo the.
Mma ava kṭuwng slii ungu kleng daat meila, ungta naanna mpha mruk tummi Mma ar awng thung ngi kanpa kcha nuwm inpti.

Pdainu Nei kdo thloi rinpauminna Johon hinki hinva klin sii; mleija Nei kdo pṭut chaak rangki nong rek ava Kpah ngi mrot pik chda, Neiji kdo tlot slii hava nong rek kat daat rukva, Neia Kpah dosii tdit ki sakhi piida.
Ungta Nei mjuksii Kpah mdak kat rukva, Neiki sakhi mpiik pik chda. Naanni Mma krowlla aryaa liit maanti, mrungchen dei maanti;
ungta naan plung ril thung ngi Mma pauna arkhii maanti, mleija Mma ngi mdo sii Mii ava naanni rin chmaanti.
Mleija naanva Laaika rek thung ngi kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu pha chraan pak innu kdingi thlaam intinu; ungta mmaanva Neiki sakhi kpii kurthuwk;
anto daat joso naanni rinkhu ado phaak chaak nraan, Nei kihinni thleng nuwm maan ti.
Neiva mii rek hinki laarnee ava arlaang maang.
Pdainu Isowr wonsat naanni thloi maanti tdit Neiji kdea.
Kpah miing ngi Neia kurjung ping, ungta naanva marlaang chmaanti; mdaksaa miing ngi ktlok khat mthlenbi, mma ava arlaang naandi.
Isowr khdaat ava hinki laarnee kthlaam kma ungu khat leh khat hinki laarnee kthlaam miia tak heppi arin chaak inna?
Kpah hinni Neiji araal in kpii rang heppi bin maan; naanki mraal akpii raanna naanni ado bin chaak in Mousi avara.
Naanni Mousi arin chaak inbi, Nei mrin chnaandi, mleija mmava Neiki mlei mdo kjit.
Pdainu naanni mma do kjit arin chaak maannu, tak heppi Nei kpauna rekka rin chnaandi?”
Hava diltha Jisua Tibarias truwn mdo dit, Galil truwn raalpha khat tha vangda.
Ungta kurtuwl mii rekki mdil ṭoida, mleija Mma ngi kukoi mii rek hin titinna rek mdo tlot dei lamda.
Ungta Jisu ngi lownpii tha hangda, ava tha msiikhu rektu ku ong lamda.
Tunva Jihudia rek kmaal taplaanna ava nai tekda.
Mma ngi tan aanda mmik mpahar thungta, kurtuwl mii rek Mhinni karhang deida, Jisu ngi Philip hin theda, “Tak heppi thenpen ren min don hava mii rekka tapmaal raanda?”
Mmava mdo pirsin nangi hava theda, mleija Mma mdakki mdo tlot rang nga dei dok da.
Ungta Philip pi Mhin arthawngda, “Dinari arjaa kniiva mii pum ktaiji mruk sisi mdo phaak raan ruk khop nime.”
Ungbi msiikhu khat Simon Pitor upah Andrija ngi Mhin theda,
“Tjun thenpen parnga leh tuwlva knii kthloi pselnao khat ka amma; pdainu hava mii knempok arlak va tak hep rangda?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi theda, “Mii rekka apkong in.” Tunva mmun ava thu nowmsuwl pa amda; ava leiji pun parnga nga ngi ko ong lamda.
Ava dilli Jisu ngi thenpen louda, Mma ngi mpanpaak dok dilli, ko kong mii rek hin them pik lamda; mmaan dongei ja ngi tuwlva ruk anto tlo lamda.
Ungta mmaanni poi kpa ngi mmaal dok inle, msiikhu rek hin Mma ngi theda, “Kekleem kṭikka kma liit kma apurkuk dok in.”
Ava leiji mmaanni tjun thenpen parnga, mii do chaak don mkekleem kṭik ava bowr sowm lei knii kdimmi purkuk lamda.
Mii rekki titinna rek mdo tlot mdee in thungta, mmaanni the lamda, “Hava dultipaam thung ngi kurjung rangki Khulpu ava kat!”
Ava dilli mmaanni arva lamda, namtrom mi kjowngda kruwng mdo tpurthuw nraan mdo tlot in Mma ngi deida, spar jikki lownpii tha mthina ngi Jisu ngi kikneeng dokda.
Ungu khuw mjiin thungta, msiikhu rekka truwn leen jung lamda,
arkuwng khat leen tuwng lamda, Kaparnahum kphara, truwn kvang arkaan pṭhun lamda. Tunva khuw jiingda, ungta Jisu va arjun pha mlai lamda.
Truwn ava tnokda, mleija tirthli kdung ngi raangda.
Mmaanni meel kdum mdit mata plii arveel arkuwng tunni mvan slii arlaanni, truwn leen Jisu chetda arkuwng ktongtha mnai dei lamda, kdung ngi piir chlamda,
Pdainu Mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Nei ping, ṭi maan.”
Mmaanni arkuwng leen mdo tuwn ṭhi nraan leiji kanpa chlam da, ungta kbei sekki mdo phaak raan laan ava thlung lamda.
Mupduk nii ngi mii rekva truwn raalpha khat tha ka am arkuwng khdaat chrel dei lamda, ungta Jisua arkuwng thung ngi msiikhu rek luṭhi lamme, pdainu msiikhu rekka mthi naanni sun lamda.
Mukpu ngi mpanpaak dok diltha thenpen mdo chaak naan mun be tha Tiberia ki arkuwng rek arvada.
Ava leiji mun ava thungva Jisu daat don msiikhu rek daat don am lamme tdit mii rekva deida, mmaanni arkuwng leen tuwng lamda, Jisu kthlaam Kaparnahum tha vang lamda.
Ungta truwn raalpha khat ktong tha mmaanni pha chlamda, Mhin the lamda, “Rabbi, hava thangva tden ni karvang ptida?”
Ungbi Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni Nei ado tathlaam in ava, titinna rek ado dee lei inpme, pdainu poi kpa ngi thenpen ado chaak lei in.
Kmaang chrangki tummi nong lou maan, pdainu Mii Chapa ngi ado tpiik chaak raan, kṭuw knai ma rinkhu ado phaak chaak raan ki tummi alou in, mleija Mma leenni Isowr ri kbiinam namda mdo piik dok.
Ava dilli mmaanni Mhin theda lamda, “Isowr, Nah anong rek ktlo kukurthut nraan neenni tak tlo chnikaan di?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Mma ngi mdosii Mii ava naanni arin chaak inbi, hava Isowr nong.”
Ava leiji mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Ava mkurthuttu, neenni deida kdo rin chaak nraan, titinna talu tlo nadi? Talu nong tlo na?
Mdo kjit dok lulu ngi, kbowklaiji neenki kpah leva manna chaa lamda, ‘Mdo chaak raan parwaan ki thenpen Mma ngi pii chlamda.’ ”
Ava dilli Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, parwaanki thenpen na Mousi do piik pme; kindit thenpen ava Kpah ngi parwaanki ado tpiik chaak in.
Mleija Isowr thenpen na parwaanki kurjung, ungta dultipaam thung ngi rinkhu mdo piik.”
Ungta mmaanni Mhin the lamda, “Mukpu, hava thenpenna mpha ktai thung ngi mhai pii chaan.”
Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Neia rinkhu thenpen ava ping; Nei kihin karvang miia mpoi tham nime, ungu Nei mikrin kcha miia mning kraal nime.
Pdainu Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, mleija naanni mdei daat jown ti mrin chni maanti.
Kpah do piik mkheng Nei kihin karvangra; ungta Mma hinni karvang mii ava Neiji reipthi nimaang.
Mleija Neia kthina ki kdongei ktlora parwaanki kurjung pmaang, pdainu Nei mjuksii Mma plungbin ktlo rangki kurjung ping.
Ungta Nei kihinni mdo tpiik chaak mkheng kdo pmaan ma nra; ungu mṭutna nitti kdo prin pardel lam nrangki ava Nei mjuksii Mma plungbin kurthuwk.
Mleija Mchapa deida ungu Mma hin krin cha mii pum ktai ava kṭuw knai ma rinkhu kpha chra; ungta mṭutna nitti Neiji pring pardel nikdi, hava Nei Kpah plungbin.”
Ava dilli Jihudia rekki mkho the chlam da, mleija “Neia parwaanki kurjung ṭum thenpen ava ping,” dida Mma ngi theda.
Mmmaanni theda, “Hava Joseph Chapa, mpah leh mnuh nenni tdee in, Jisu ava pmemo? Tak heppi Mma va tunva ‘Parwaanki kurjung ping,’ dida mdo theda?”
Jisu ngi mhin inni arthawngda, “Asingreel inni kukho the maan.”
Nei mju ksii Kpah dohowl kma donle, ku khat lee ngi Nei kihinni arvang nime; ungta mṭutna nitti Neiji pring pardel nikdi.
Khulpu rekki hanto kjitda, ‘Ungta mmaan mkheng nga Isowr ri kpurchuk ra,’ Kpah hin karyaa kcha ungu kurchuk mii pum ktai ava Nei kihinni karvangra.
Isowr hinki Mma ava kma donle ku mii khat lee ngi Mpah ava deime; Mmava Mpah ava mdo dee dok.
Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, krin kcha mii ava ngi kṭuw knai maki rinkhu mthloi chaakka.
Neia rinkhu thenpen ava ping.
Naan pah leva kbowk laiji manna mchaak in, ungta mmaanna kdiyou chlam.
Mii ngi chaa da mdiyo ma nra; hava thenpen na parwaan ki kurjung ṭum.
Neia parwaanki kurjung ṭum kring thenpen ava ping; ku mii khatti hava mchaakbi, kṭuw knaima kringra; ungta dultipaam tumra kdo piik thenpen ava Nei kdaksaa.”
Ava dilli Jihudia rek thung ngi msingreel inni karteen psuk lamda, the lamda, “Tak heppi hava Miilai va tchaak raanni mdaksaa mikpii raanda?”
Ava leiji Jisu ngi mhin inni theda, “Kindit, kinditti, Neiji ahin thaanni kthea, naanni Mii Chapa ava daksaa chaada, ungta mhii aneek du in khim khai rinkhu thloi nimaan ti;
Nei ki kdaksaa ava chaada, Nei kihii knee mii ava kṭuw knai kma rinkhu kpha chra, ungta mṭutna nitti Neiji pring pardel nikdi.
Mleija Nei kdaksaa ava tchaak rangki kat, ungta kihii ava tneek kat ra.
Nei kdaksaa chaada, ungta kihii knee mii ava, Nei kihinni ka am, ungu Neiji mma hin ka amping.
Kpah ngi Neia msiida, ungta Kpah leiji Neiji ringnu ka am lulu ngi, Nei mhai kchaa mii ava Neiji mlei kurthuwk nu kringra.
Hava parwaanki kurjung ṭum thenpen ava, apah leenni chaada mdiyo ava lulu pme; hava thenpen kchaa mii ava kṭuw knai kma kring ra.”
Hava Kaparnahum thung ngi mpurchu mpha thung, synagog thung ngi mdo the.
Msiikhu rek mii maknem mi maryaak thungta the lamda, “Hava kparsa lang lang khatti mthea, ku do aryaak pik rang da?”
