Ungta tun kat daatti tirthli kraang heppi parwaanki krowl khat thlengda, ungu mmaan ko onna innka ava pum dimmi dim chda.
Ungta mei lulu ngi mhin inni ktardet da, ungu mii pum ktai leen tuwngda themda.
Ungu mkheng kheng inni pthla kchiir ri dim chlamda, ungta pthla do the dil kṭoiji msik msik pauvi kpau pṭhun lamda.
Tunva parwaan kurdu ngi ka am chati khim khai thungki plung klut Jihudia mii rek Jerusalem thung ngi am lamda.
Ungta hava krowlli miiluwngpa thuwk kurkukda, ungu mmaanna psum chda, mleija mpau inna mdak mdak inki pauvi mii pum ktaiva aryaa da.
Ungu mmaanni ngak chlam da, ungta tngana a kdingi the lamda, “Hava kpau mii mkheng nga Galil ki lam pme mo?
Ungta nen nenki nkhuwpaam pauvi mii pum ktaiva naryaak daat inmo?
Parthia, Media, Elamait, ungu Misopotamia ki mii rek, Judia leh Kapadosia, Pontas leh Asia,
Phrygia leh Pamphylia, Egypt leh Kurini ki Libia arveelli ka am mii rek, Romia ki kvel kcha rek, Jihudia leh Jihudia no kupṭoi kcha rek,
Kritan leh Arabia rek, hava klin langlang ngi Isowr nong rekki kpau ava npau npau inni naryaak chaak inna.”
Ungta mkheng kheng inni ngak chlam da, kupsum kcha ngi khat leh khatti the lamda, “Hava talulu daat da?”
Pdainu ktlok rekva kipnii chaakki the lamda, “Mmaanni rikrou dii nee reen lamda kipri kcha lamma.”
Pdainu sowm lei khat tu kilṭhi ngi Pitor ri ripda, mukrowl kparyaa ngi mhin inni theda, “Judia leh Jerusalem thung ngi ka am mii mkheng naanni hava adei chaan, ungu nei kpauna rekka knaa atkiin in.
Mleija naan dobin lulu ngi hava mii rekka kipri ava pme, mleija nit avaki ṭhang kdum daat roa;
Pdainu hava ava khulpu Joel li mdo the dok:
‘Isowr ri theda, mṭutna
nitti kthuwkra,
Neiji dulti mii mkheng leen kapthla ptlong nikdi,
ungta achapa rek leh achanurek inni pau kphuwngra,
ungu ksenao rekki mik kleng kdei kpha chra,
ungta kder rekki mer kmer lamra.
Oji, ungu hava nit rek thung ngi,
Nei ksra owrpa rek leh ksra owrnu rek tunni,
Neiji Kapthla ptlong nikdi;
ungu mmaanni pau kphuwng lamra.
Ungta tun knungki
parwaan tha tngana,
ungu kurdu dulti thung ngi titinna ki hii,
ungu mei ungta meikhut Neiji tdet lam nik di.
Mukpu ki klin lang lang leh kunlor nit mthlen dungi,
kniw ava kvom chra ungu thla ava hii kur owl chra.
Ungta hava kthuwkra, Mukpu miing
ko own kcha mii khim khaija kaktlan pikra.’
Isreel mii rek hava pauva aryaa chaan: Nasareth Jisua Isowr ri klin klin nong rek, ungta tngana rek ungu titinna rek mdo ptlot ava ngi Mma Isowr do rot Miilai khat tdit adak kat inni adodee in
Hava Jisua, Isowr ri krip merri mdo bin, ungu mdungi kdei chdok dil kṭoiji parlaan da, naanki Nowlam kṭoi kma mii rek khutti khros leen pthoi lamda, ungu eayou da.
Pdainu Isowr ri suwkthuwkki mdiyo thungki parthlet da, pring pinle da, mleija ava ngi khut pnen pchaangme.
Ditta Mma mlei thung ngi Devid ti theda,
‘Neiji Mukpu a mpha ktai thu kdu sukki dei chnu,
mleija neiji kukunchun ma nra,
Mma ngi kchang ktong tha amda;
ava leiji kuplung ngam chda,
ungta kiplei kanpa chda;
ava kheelli kdaksaa rukva plung pnet psuk da am nik di.
Mleija kraothla ava sim thu sii nimti,
mata Nang ki kchiir khat ava kmawng pdee nimti.
Nang ngi rinkhu lam rek mipdee chtinu;
Nah awng ngi kdung plung kngam mpur owl nadi.’
“Ku u knao rek, charuwl Devid mlei thung ngi mma diyou dokda, kulruwl dok, ungta mma thlaan ava snii kpha thung ngi ta am ṭhi daat in dinu neiji plung ktangarri kthe chaakka.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, ungta khulpu khat kurthuwkki mma charuwl rek thungki khatti mma ku onna tunni kuk ongra, dida mhin inni Isowr ri paureel khatti mdo reel pik dok lam tdit deida.
Mma ngi mdungi deida ungta Khrista rinkarheel nrangki theda, mleija Mma ngi sim thu siime, mdit mata mdaksaa ngi kṭop deime.
Hava Jisua Isowr ri pring pinle da, ungu ava leiji nen nkheng ngi sakhi tkurthuw in.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Isowr chang ktong tha khiingda, ungta pthla kchiir paureel Mpah hinki arlaang chda, naan dodee ungu do aryaak hava aptlon pik chaanda.
Mleija Devid ta parwaan
tha hunkal me;
pdainu mma mdak katti theda,
‘Mukpu ngi neiki Mukpu hin theda,
Neiji Nah arawlmii rek akhu tingi kthiik du
khim khai,
Nei kukhut chang ktong tha ko ong cha.’
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, naanni khros leen ado pthoi in Jisu ava Isowr ri Mukpu ungu Khrista mdo tpur owl tdit Isreel innbung mkheng ngi adeiso.
Tunva mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta muplung ril inna kdetbuk heppi tloda, ungbi Pitor leh kenyee rek angṭhe hin the lamda, “Ku u knao rek neenva tak tlo nikaan da?”

Ungbi Pitor ri mhin inni theda, “Apnu ton in ado tuptlot pik nraan leiji plung ren ahur chaan, ungu Jisu Khrista miing ngi naan mii pum ktaiji baptis alou chaan, ungta naanni pthla kchiir chla arlaang chnaandi.
Mleija naan hin tha ungu anaoleen hin, ungu lam kla ngi ka am mii mkheng hin, nenki Isowr Mukpu do own ava mii pum ktai hin mpaureella ka am.”
Ungta pauna rek knempokki sakhi purthuwda, ungu ksop lamda theda, “Hava kṭha kma charuwl thungki adaksaan kirtleu chaan.”
Ava leiji mma pauna karlaang cha rekka baptis ptlot lamda, ungu ava nitti raothla pun kdum arveelli tpom chlam da.
Ungta mmaanni kenyee dopurchu thu, ungu kurbuk thu thenpen kupkui thu ungta kṭhil cha thung ngi plung plut lamda.
Ungta raothla khim khai leen kṭi amda; ungu kenyee rekki tngana leh titinna knempok tlo lamda.
Ungta krin cha mii mkheng ngi kurkuk lamda ungu do mkheng nga khdaat ti tlo lamda.
Ungta mdo thloi mdothloi in jur lamda, ku mii khat kikriing hin them pik lamda.
Ungta mnii ktaiji luwbuk Inn thu thuwk kurkuk lamda, ungu innbung kteen thung ngi thenpen pkui lamda, ungta plung kngam leh plung kneiji chaanee lamda,
Isowr panpaak lamda mii mkheng dosanni am lamda. Ungta mdo ktlan dok rek ava Mukpu ngi mnii ktaiki tpom pik lamda.
Tunva Pitor leh Johon na kṭhil chaki ṭhang mtukut na thung ngi luwbuk Inn tha hanglamda.
Ungta kyeng ngi kṭou miilai khat arva kdom lamda, luwbuk Inn thung ngi klut mii rek hin plungnee mdo ṭhil chaak nra, luwbuk Inn Rungchen kṭha mdo dit ava paltong thung ngi mnii ktaiji amda.
Luwbuk Inn thung ngi Pitor leh Johon klut rangki ava mdee thungta, mma ngi plungnee ṭhil chda.
Ungta Pitor ri Johon tu kilṭhi ngi suw rim thida theda, “Mhai suw in.”
Ungta mhin inki do khat arlaang chrang paknu kdingi plung klutti suw mer daat lamda.
Pdainu Pitor ri theda, “Neia thiir kpowl mata jeering thloi chmaang pdainu kdo thloija akpiik chaakka; Nasareth Jisu Khrista miing ngi chet.”
Ungta mma ngi mkhut chang ktongki kjowngda tipripda; ungbi tun kat daatti mkhu armik rekka mru tang chda.
Ungu mma ngi kunthowm da ripda ungu chet da ungta mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi luwbuk Inn thung ngi lutda, ungu kunthowmda chetda Isowr panpaak chda.
Ungta mma ngi chetda Isowr mdo panpaak slii ava mii mkheng ngi deida,
ungu luwbuk Inn rungchen kṭha mdo dit paltong thung ngi plungnee kṭhil chra kuk ong daat kchok miilai khat ava thide tdit dei lamda; ungu mma hin kthuwk ava ngi kdung kpiir ri ngak chlam da.
Mma ngi Pitor leh Johon mukjown daat arlaanni, mii mkheng nga ngak chda Solomon tdit ava dulbukki arva chen kurkuk lamda.

Ungu Pitor ri ava mdee thungta mii rek hin theda, “Isreel mii rek, hava leiji talu lei kngak in pti, mdit mata neen kdak kat in rutan, mdit mata Isowr kdo rin chaak lei inni mma kdo pche in kdingi talu lei atsut rim inna?

Abraham ungta Isek, ungu Jakob ki Isowr, nenki npahle ki Isowr, ava ngi msra owr Jisu mi punlor pikda, naanni parlaan pthiin ti, Mma ava Pilat ti mupthuw nuwm kpha thu, naanva mmaiṭhuwm katti ro maanti.
Pdainu naanva Kchiir ungu Rinkindit Khat ro maan thiin tinu, mii ke eayou khat ado trot pik nraan ṭhil in tinu,
ungta rinkhu thuwna eayou intinu, Mma Mukpu ngi kdiyou thungki pring pinle da. Neenva hava sakhi kpii kcha in ping.
Ungta Mma miing, Mmiing krin cha ngi naanni ado dee in hava miilai ava maptan pikka; ungu Jisu krin cha naan akheng inki maiṭhuwmmi pum dammi kdam kcha mpiik chaakka.
“Ungta tunva ku u knao rek, naanki paamkpu rek lulu ngi, naan rukva kdei chdok kmangi ado tlot in tdit neiji kdo dee.
Pdainu Isowr ri Mma ki Khrista jat kham nra ava khulpu rek mkheng ner thung ngi alraang mdo the dok Jisu ngi purkhum da.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, plung ren ahur chaan, ungu apnu ton in ado tuknuwl pik nraan kinle nowl in, ditta Mukpu awngki rinkindit mthlen nra,
ungu naan tummi mdo kchol dok Jisu Khrista ava mdo sii nra,
do mkheng nga mdo pur owl naki mpha mve du khim khai parwaan tha ktapa amra, dida Isowr va alraangki kchiir khulpu rek ner ri mdo pthe dok.
Mousi ngi theda, ‘Mukpu Isowr ri naanki a u anao rek thungki naan tumra, nei mdo tsi lulu ngi, Khulpu khat ksira. Naan hin Mma dothe khim khaija ado aryaak raan.
Ungta hanto kthuwkra, ditta Khulpu hin karyaa kma raothla khim khaija mii rek thungki kpamawng pthiira.’
Ungta Samuel leh mma diltha karvang khulpu rek mkheng rukva, hava nit rek theda paryaam lamda.
Naan ava khulpu rek ungu apah le hin mdo piik paurina ava naole in pti, Abraham hin theda, ‘Ungu nah charuwl thung ngi dultipaam ki phungka mkheng nga msuw kṭha ra.’
Rukri ngi Isowr ri naan hin msra owr ava mii pum ktai hin aṭhat nmaan thungki plung pinle da suw kṭha ado phaak chaak nraan asii pik chaanda.”
Ungta mmaanni mii rek hin mpau slii daat arlaanni, thiimpu rek ungta luwbuk Inn thungki berksu rek ungu sadusi rek mhin inni kthleng,
mmaanna plung purda, mleija mmaan ava mii rek hin purchuk lamda ungta kdiyou thungki kring karheel Jisu paryaam lamda.
Ungta mmaanni kjowng lamda ungta khuw mtlei du khim khai, rowng inn thung ngi khum lamda, mleija khuw tmul dokda.
Pdainu pauna karyaa mii maknemmi rin chda; ungu kthleng mii rek ava pun parnga arveel.
Mupduk nii ngi mmaanki paam kpu rek leh kver rek ungu Nowlam chukpu rek Jerusalem thung ngi thuwk kurkuk lamda.
Thiimpu kparthaang Annas ungta Keiphas ungu Johon leh Alekjander, ungta thiimpu kparthaang rilam kthuwk rek mkheng tu kilṭhi lamda.
Ungta mlaiṭim inni thii lam thida, mmaanni khewl lamda, “Talu rutan mata talu miing ngi hava ado tlot in?”
Ava dilli Pitor ra pthla kchiir ri dimda ungu theda, “Mii rek paamkpu rek naan ungu kver rek,
snii ngi kyeng miilai khat hin kṭha nong khat kdo tlot lei inni, tak heppi miilai ava kdam dida athe inbi,

naan akheng in ungu Isreel mii mkheng hin ktidet chaakka, mleija naanni khros leen ado pthoi in, Isowr ri kdiyou thungki mdo prin pinlet, Nasareth ki Jisu Khrista miing ngi hava miia pdam dokda naan maiṭhuwmmi rip daat da.
Inn ksa rek naanni ado pthlei in, pdainu markil ki ksuwt kcho ava hava.
Ungta kirliinna ava ku khat lee hinki pme, mleija ava ngi nen tkartlan nraan mdo piik mii rek arlakki miing khat lee pre parwaan tingi ame.”
Tunva mmaanni Pitor leh Johon plung tngar leh kurchuk kma mii cham thlaang thlaang ngal tdit mdee in thungta, kdung ngi ngak chlamda, ungta Jisu ngi mkurthlo ṭhi lamma tdit dei lamda.
Pdainu kdam kcha mii ava ngi mmaan tu krip daat mdee in thungta, do khat lee ngi mraal piida the lamme.
Pdainu mmaanni mmaanna karseel lop thung ki duwn mthuw nraanki pau mupṭum in thungta, mmaanni khat leh khatti karteen psuk lamda,
the lamda, “Hava mii rekka tak pardit che naandi? mleija mmaanni kunton siiki titinna rek tlo lamda Jerusalem thung ngi ka am mii mkheng hin kandang dokka, ungu nenva tmat pchaan in nime.
Pdainu mii rek arlakki mkurjou kurnowl ma nra, mmaanni ku mii khat lee hin hava miing ngi mpau ma nraan pauvi kham inche.”
Ava leiji mmaanni own lamda, ungu Jisu miing ngi mpau liit ma nraan mdit mata mdo purchu ma nraan pau pṭum lamda.
Pdainu Pitor leh Johonni arthawng lamda, “Isowr hin kma naan do aryaak ava Isowr dosut nathung ngi kindit mo kindit me, tdit akṭewl in.
Mleija neenni kdo dee in leh kdo aryaak in kthe kma ava pchaang chmaan ring.”
Mii rekki mlei kurthuwk da, mraal mdo piik nraanki mlei ame, mmaanna kdung pṭit lam thida, psun lamda, mleija mii mkheng ngi kthuwk nong leiji Isowr panpaak lamda.
Mleija kum somplii kikheel li kder miilai khat hin titinna ava thuwkda.
Mmaanni mupthuw dok in thungta maplap rek hin chet lamda thiimpu kinreel rek leh kver rekki mhin inni mdo the pau ava song chlamda.
Ungta mmaanni ava maryaak in thungta, krowl kinṭimmi owng sap lamda, Isowr hin the lamda, “Parwaan leh dulti kseem ungu truwn leh do khim khai kseem, kṭuw knai kma ki Mukpu,
Pthla kchiir do pthe ngi neenki kpah in Devid nerri theda,
‘Talu leiji ktlok chati rekki plung pthit lamda,
ungta mii rekva do ksikma plung mdo reel inda?
dultipaamki kruwng rekki mdaksaan kirsim lamda,
ungta paamkpu rek thuwk kurkuk lamda,
Mukpu raal pii lamda ungu,
thao mdo pbul dok ava raal pii lamda.’
Mleija Nang ngi thao ado pbul dok asra owr kchiir Jisu mraal kpii ngi, Herod leh Pontas Pilat ti ktlok chati rek leh Isreel mii rek tu kilṭhi ngi,
Nah akhut leh aplungbin dil kṭoiji kthuwk rangki ado purchuwl dok ava ktlora, kindit katti khuwpii hava thung ngi ktlora kthuwk kurkuk lamma.
Ungta tunva Mukpu, mmaanni mdo tipṭit inna mhai sut pik chaan, ungu Nah sra owr rekki Nah apauna ava plung ktangar mkheng ngi mdo the thut chaak nraan,
Nah akhut atkhiin pik slii arlaan inni kdo pdam chaak nraan, ungta Nah sra owr kchiir Jisu miing ngi titinna rek leh tngana rek kdo tlot chaak nraan mhai rot pik chaan.”
Ungta mmaanni mṭhil chaak dok inle, mmaan kurkuna mun ava kunchunda; ungu mmaan mkheng nga pthla kchiir ri dim chda, ungta Isowr pauna ava plung ktangarri saam lamda.
Tunva krin charek lop ava plung khdaat ungta raothla khdaatti am lamda, ungu mmaan ku khat lee ngi mdo thloi ava mdaksaa ki ngi karthe me, pdainu do khim khaija mkheng kingi thloi lamda.
Ungta kenyee rek ava klin langlang ki rutan ni mmaan rinpaumin ava Mukpu Jisu Khrista rinkarheel natu kilṭhida, ungta mkheng leen plungnee klin langlang amda.
Mmaan arlakki kikriing ku khat lee ame, mleija paam kthloi inn kthloi mii maknemva mma mmaki jurda, mdojur naan man ava arhai sin lamda,
kenyee rek khuther ri thii lamda; kikriing mii pum ktai hin them pik lamda.
Kupras ki mii, Levi miilai khat, kenyee rekki Barnabas mdo dit in (kuksop chapa mdo ditna) Joseph pi,
bil khat mdo thloi jurda, ungu sum arva sinda kenyee rek khuther ri thiida.
Pdainu mmiing Anania tdit miilai khatti mnumei Saphira tu kilṭhi ngi paam mruk suwn jur lamda,
ungta mnumei tu kilṭhi ngi mdojur in paam man angṭhe arkhii chlam thida angṭhe daat arva sin lamda, kenyee rek khuther ri thii lamda.
Pdainu Pitor ri theda, “Anania, pthla kchiir hin pleinei imti, seitaan ni aplung nga kdim kcha a, ungu talu leiji paam manna angṭhe ado arkhiik pinlet da?

Athloi slii daat thungva ava nah athina ki ado pmemo? Ungta ajur dok thung rukva nah plungbin daat rang pmemo? Tak heppi aplung thungva hava lu ado tlot nuwmda? Nang ngi mii rek hin pleinei mti pdainu Isowr hin.
Anania ngi hava pauna rek maryaak daat le tluwda diyou chda. Ungu hava karyaa mii mkheng hin kṭi amda.
Ksenao rekki rip lamda mma klum lamda kulruwl rangki vakdom lamda.
Ungta ṭhang kdum arveel dilthang ngi tak kthuwk tdit kdei cha kma ngi mnumei arvang lutda.
Ungu Pitor ri mhin theda, “Paamma naanva hava lim daatti ajur inmo, nei kihin athe.” Ungta mma ngi theda, “Oji, mleija hava lim daat.”
Pdainu Pitor ri mhin theda, “Mukpu pthla ado pirsin naanni tak heppi kulrot naan pti? Asuw, thurngot bulli nah innpu kulruwl rek khua ka am daatta, ungu mmaanni nang rukka akukdom lamra.”
Tunkat daatti mma ngi mkhu therri tluwda, ungu diyou chda. ksenao rek marvan lu in thungta, kdiyou dokki pha lamda, ungu mmaanni duwn tha kdom lamda, mi innpu bengi alruwl lamda.
Ungta hava karyaa rinlop mkheng leh mii rek mkheng leen kṭi amda.
Tunva kenyee rek khutti mii rek arlakki tngana rek leh titinna rek tlo lamda, ungu mmaan mkheng nga Solomon dulbukki kurbuk lamda.
Mii murson va ṭoinuwm lamme, pdainu mii rekva mmaanna kparthaang ngi kjat chlam da.
Ungta snu psel mikniing ngi tpomda Mukpu rin chlamda miiluwngpa ngi kheel sii kurthuwkda.
Ava leiji Pitor mthleng thu marlim pang daat ruk mdo phaak chaak nraan, mii angṭhe ngi lamṭhuwm thung ngi kukoi rek thii lamda, mkowm in ungu mi iinaan tun pi iip lamda.
Jerusalem kloi khuwpii thungki mii rek ruk thuwk kurkuk lamda, kukoi ungta pthla ktobor doṭhi arhai ṭhilamda, ungta mmaan mkheng nga pdam pik lamda.
Pdainu thiimpu kparthaang ngi mma miiṭhi rek mkheng leh sadusi rek lop tu rip lamda, kdung kheithe nlamda.
Mmaanni kenyee rekka kjowng lamda ungu rowng inn thlaang thlaang thung ngi khum lamda.
Pdainu jaanni Mukpu Waantamsii ngi thlengda, rowng inn thurngot pvangda duwn thuwṭhi lam thida theda,
“Va inra luwbuk Inn thung ngi rip inra mii mkheng hinni hava rinkhu pauna ava ason pik in.”
Ungu mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta, khuw mtleile luwbuk Inn thung ngi lut lamda ungta purchuk lamda.
Tunva thiimpu kparthaang leh mma miiṭhi rek arva lamda ungta karseel lop rek leh Isreel mii kver rek mkheng own purkuk lamda, ungta rowng inn thungki mdo arvan ṭhii nraanki mii haisi lamda.
Pdainu nong klin kpuw rek, ava ngi rowng inn thung ngi marhai in thungta, am lam mda, ungbi sun kinle lamda pau ava song lamda.
“Rowng inn ava knetti karkam daat, ungu thurngot krung rekka krip daat lam kdo dee in, pdainu kvanlu in thungta mthungva ku khat lee ame.”
Tunva luwbuk Inn rawl berksu ungu thiimpu kinreel rekki hava pau aryaa lamda, mmaan mlei thung ngi kdung kngakki tak kthuwk rang kdingi ngak chlam da.
Ungta miilai khatti arva da mhin inni songda, “Naanni rowng inn thu ado khum in mii rekka, luwbuk Inn thung ngi rip daat lamda mii rek hin mpurchu slii inna.”
Ava dilli berksu ki nong klin kpuw rektu valamda arvanṭhi nowl lamda, pdaiinu namtrom nong tlo lamme, mleija mii rekki lung ngi mikdeeng raan kdingi ṭi lamda.
Ungta mmaanni kenyee rekka arvanṭhi thilamda, karseel lop maiṭhuwmmi prip lamda. Thiimpu kparthaang ngi paukhewl lamda,
theda, “Hava miing ngi purchuk maan dinu kdung ngi pau kdo pṭum in, anto daat joso naan do purchu ngi Jerusalem ma kdim kcha a, ungta hava Miilai hiia neen kleenni apbuwk nuwm inna.”
Pdainu Pitor leh kenyee rekki arthawng lamda, “Miirek ava hinva neenni Isowr pṭoi chnikaan di.
Naanni ding leen pthoi inti ado eayown Jisu ava neenki Kpah ungu Isowr ava ngi pring pinleda.
Isreel mii ngi plungren mdo hur nra ungu pnu rek mdo ptlot pik nra, Isowr ri Mma berksu ungu kaklan pik rangki Mma khut chang ktongtha khiingda.
Ungta neenva hava sakhi kdo piik in, ungu Isowr ri Mma dothe kupṭoi rek hin mdo piik pthla kchiir ava rukva sakhi.”
Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta kdung plung pthit lamda ungu eayou nuwm lamda.
Pdainu karseel lop thungki Pharisi miilai khat, mmiing Gamaliel mdo dit, mii mkheng do kjat chaak, Nowlam chukpu khatti ripda, mii rek ava mpha mruk tummi duwn mdo pthuw nraan pau pṭumda.
Ungta mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Isreel mii rek kurthuwk hava mii rek hin ado tlot in ava tuk asut chaan.

Mleija hava mii rek dungi mdaksaa kpirlin kcha Theodas tdit miilai khat thlengda, mii arjaa plii arveelli mdil ṭoida; pdainu mma eayou lamda, ungu mma dilkṭoi mii rek ava doksi liit kma kinṭheu tir chlamda.
Mma diltha miing kuplut nit rek mpha thung ngi Judas tdit Galil miilai khat thleng da, mdilkṭoira mii angṭhe archil dokda; mma ruk maang chda ungu mdil kṭoi mii mkheng nga kinṭheu tir chda.
Ava leiji tun tunva neiji akthe inna, hava miirek thungki karneeng inra msangtlaak inni ama pthiin; mleija mdo bin in ungu mii rek thungki hava lea kthuwk mkurthutbi, ava dosi nime.
Pdainu Isowr hinki mkurthutbi, mmaanna naanni var pthi pchaang nimaanti. Naanni Isowr kapkhaan kurthuwk naandi!”
Ava leiji mmaanni mma do parseel lou lamda, ungu kenyee rekka own lamda, Jisu miing ngi mpau ma nraan pau pṭum lamda, ungta bun lamthida psun pthii lamda.
Ava dilli mmaanni miing ava tummi ningkja ktaakki kja kakham mdo phaak in ava kuhuija kdingi kanpa ngi karseel lop ma lamthida sun chlamda.
Ungta mnii ktaiji luwbuk Inn thu ungu innbung kteen tha Jisua Khrista pi dilamda kpurchuk leh kparyaam thung ngi down liit lamme.

Tunva hava nit rek thung ngi siikhu rekka nem set set lamda, Grik pauvi kpau Hebru rekki Hebru mii rekka mraal pii lamda mkho the chlamda, mleija meikhunuh rekki mnii ktaiki kthem pik nong thung ngi mnong in mleek inna kdingi mmaanni the lamda.
Ungta sowm lei knii rekki siikhu rek own lamda, ungu the lamda, “Kchaa knee tum daatti nenni Isowr pauna tmaak pthiin ronime.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda ku u knao rek, kṭha nong ktlo rek, pthla leh lousing ngi kdim miilai tikheu naan arlakki atiker in, hava nong ktlora neenni kchol inni.
Pdainu neenva kṭhil cha thu ungta pauna nong ktlo thung ngi kdak saanna plung plut inni.”

Ungta mmaan dothe ngi kurtuwl mii mkheng plung pngamda, ungta mmaanni krin cha leh pthla kchiir ri kdim miilai kurthuwk, Stiphan leh Philip, ungta Prokhoras leh Nikanor ungu Timon leh Parmenas ungta Antia ki Jihudia rek dhormo kchet Nikolas havale lim kchol lamda.
Kenyee rek maiṭhuwmmi hava mmaan prip lamda, ungta mleen thaanni mkhut in khiing lamda, ṭhil chlamda.
Ungta Isowr pauna kurjouda ungu Jerusalem thung ngi siikhu rek kdung ngi nem set setda, ungta thiimpu rek knempokki krin cha thung ngi pṭoi lamda.
Ungta Stiphan na plungnee leh rutanni dim chda, miirek arlakki klin langlang titinna rek leh tngana rek tloda.
Ava dilli synagog thungki kintek mii rek angṭhe, (anto mdodit) ungta Kuirini kirek, ungu Alekjandria kirek, ungta Silisia leh Asia ki mii rekki rip lamda Stiphan karteen ṭhi lamda.
Pdainu mma ngi pthla leh lousing ngi mpau nathung ngi rip bong pchaang lamme.
Ava dilli mmaanni tuprutti mii rek parseel lamda tipthe lamda, “Mma ngi Mousi leh Isowr kjowm kcha ngi mpau neenni karyaak in.”
Ungta mmaanni mii rek leh kver rek ungu Nowlam chukpu rek sinchaak nlamda ungta mmaanni arva lamda kjowng lamda karseel lop maiṭhuwmmi ṭhi lamda.
Ungu “Hava miilaiji mun kchiir leh Nowlam mraal kpii ngi pauna mdothe down liitme;
mleija Nasareth ki Jisu ngi hava munna eakrep da, Mousi ngi nen nhin miido tpiik in nopa ava karthlengra dida mma dothe neenni karyaak in,” dida kindit kma sakhi kpii tiprip lamda.
Ungta karseel lop thung ngi kukong mii mkheng ngi mma msut rim in thungta mmaija Waantamsii mai heppi dei lamda.
Ungta thiimpu kparthaang ngi theda, “Hava anto mo?”
Ungu Stiphan ni theda:
“Ku u knaorek, ungu kpah le mhai aryaak pik chaan. Nenki npah in Abraham mi Haran thu ma am du Mesapotamia thu ma am mpha thu Isowr laarnee ngi mhin ktardetda,
ungu mhin theda, ‘Nang ngi apaam leh asumkhur thungki kurloura Neiji ado ktidetra paam ava tha vang.’
Ava dilli mma ngi Chaldia paamki sunda Haran tha vang amda. Ungta mpah mdiyo dok diltha, tun tunni naan amnaan paam ava thu Isowr ri punthotda;
anto daat joso Mma ngi mhin alrou khat lee piime, mkhu thiik nrang ruk piime, pdainu mma diltha mcharuwl rek hin paamkpu ra ava pii nikdi dida mma ngi nao thloi chma daat joso paureel pikda.
Ungta Isowr ri hava kat leiji theda, ditta mma charuwl ava ngi miipaam ktlok tha malpa ngi amdonle, kum arjaa plii lik thung ngi suwk owrri owr donle ka amra.
‘Pdainu mmaanni sok mdolo in chati ava Neiji kṭewl nikdi, ungta ava dil rongi mmaanni thuwk lamdonle mmun hava thung ngi Nei luw mukbuk ro lamra,’ dida Isowr ri theda.

Ungta Mma ngi vunmor kreenki paurina ava pii lamda. Ava leiji Abraham mi Isek pah, ungta mnii tretna nitti vunmor reenpik da, ungu Isek ki Jakob pah, ungta Jakob pi nen npah le sowm lei knii avale pah.
“Ungta npahle ngi Joseph kheithe nlamda, Egypt tha jur lamda; pdainu Isowr ri kurthlo ṭhida,
ungta kjakham mkheng thung ngi ktlan pikda, ungu Egypt kruwng Pharon awng ngi ksan leh lousing ava piida, Joseph pi Egypt leh mphungka mkheng tun paamkpu ngi paalda.
Tunva Egypt leh Kanan paam mkheng nga poitham arveida, ungta kdung suwkthuwk lamda, ungta nenki npahleva then pha chlam mda.
Pdainu Egypt paam thang ngi then ka amma tdit Jakob pi aryaa da, rukri verki nenki npahle ava siilamda.
Ungta kvel mvei knitna thung ngi Joseph pi mu upale hin ktardetda, ungu Joseph phungka rekka Pharonni deida.
Ungta Joseph pi mii siida mpah Jakob leh msumkhur rek mkheng raothla somtikheu lei parnga ava mhin own lamda.
Ungta Jakob pa Egypt tha jungda. Ungu mma mdak kat ruk ungta nenki npah le ruk diyou chda.
Ungta mmaanna Shekim tha kdom pinle lamda, Abraham mi Shekim thung ngi Hamor chapa rek hinki thiir kpowl li mdoren thlaan ava thung ngi alruwl lamda.
“Pdainu Isowr ri Abraham hin mdo rot pik paureel avaki mpha mve der der thungta, Joseph kdeikma Egypt kruwng ktlok khat mthuwdu khim khai,
mii rek ava Egypt tha linsaang lamda pung lamda.
Mma ngi nenki nsuruwl rekka kdung owr chlamda, nao kdowng rekka mrin ma nraan var pthii lamda, nen npahle namtrom ptlot lamda.
Mpha ava thu Mousi ṭouda, Isowr dosut nathung ngi kdung mrungchen ṭhada. Ungta mma mpah inn thung thla kdum juwk chda;
ungu mma mvar pthii mpha thu Pharon chanu ngi mma mdaksaa katki chapa rang ngi juwk chda.
Ungta Mousia Egypt rek lousing mkheng kurchuk dokda, ungu mma ava mpauna rek leh mnong tlot thung ngi ruktang riim.
“Mma ava kum somplii mphaak thungta, muplung thung ngi mu u mnao rek, Isreel chapa rek vel chnuwmda.
Ungta mmaan arlakki miilai khat ava kindit liit kma mdo owr chaak mdee thungta mma ngi pkhaan pikda ungu Egypt mii ava knuwr youda mphuw lopikda.
Mma khutti mu u mnao rek ava Isowr ri kṭenthuwra tdit dei lam pakda kdingi bin chda, pdainu mmaanva deipandi lamme.
Ungta mupduk nii ngi mmaan msingreel in kalrai deida, ungbi mkarṭhat nraan theda, ‘Mii rek, naanna unao in pti, talu leiji khat leh khat hin karmak nong atlot inna?’
Pdainu mveen hin karmak ktlo mii ava ngi duwl pthii thida, theda, ‘Neen kleen kekṭewl khat rangki ku ngi paamkpu atpur owlda?
Janii ngi Egypt miilai khat ado eayo heppi eayou ni ati ditmo?’
Hava mdo the leiji Mousia chen chda, Median paamtha amchda, ava tha chapa knii rek pah ngi amda.
“Tunva kum somplii mve dok thungta, kbowklaiji Sinai lown tunni Waan tamsii khatti chanchiim khat thu meikṭuwng thung ngi mhin ktardetda.
Mousi ngi ava mdee thungta ngak chda; ungta ksuw rangki mhan nai thungta, Mukpu krowl kthleng ngi theda,
‘Neia nah pahle ki Isowr ping, ungta Abraham, Isek ungu Jakob leki Isowr ping.’ Ungta Mousi va kunchunda suw bong pchaangme.
Ungta Mukpu ngi mhin theda, ‘Akhu tunki khukok rekka asuwt dok, mleija arina mun ava dul kchiir.
Egypt thungki kmii rek suwkthuwk ava kinditti Neiji deinu ungu mchelchan in Neiji aryaanu, ungu mmaan kṭenthuwra kurjung ping. Ungta tunva arvang, Egypt tha asii nikdi.’
“‘Nah ku ngi paamkpu ungta kekṭewlra ado tsii,’ kdingi mdo theen Mousi hava chanchiim thung ngi mhin ktardet Waan tamsii ava dobommi paamkpu leh kṭenthuwra Isowr ri siida.
Mma ngi Egypt thu ungta truwn ksen thu ungu kbowklaiji kum somplii lik thung ngi tngana rek leh titinna rek tloda mmaan ava ṭenpthuwkda.
‘Isowr ri naanki a u anao rek thung ki naan tumra nei klulu khulpu khat kupthuwkra,’ dida Isreel mii rek hinni kthe Mousi ava hava.
Sinai lownni mma hin paukthe Waan tamsii ungta nenki npahle tu kilṭhi ngi kbowklaiji kunlowm lop rektu ka am mma ava hava, ungta nen nhin inni miido tpiik raanki kringki pau ava mdo arlaan chaak dok.
Nen npahle ngi mpau leek lamda, pdainu msiir inni kneng pthii lamda, ungu muplung reel inna Egypt ktongtha pinle lamda,
Aron hin the lamda, ‘Nen ndusuk inni kvangra neen ktum raan mukpu rek mhai seem pik in, mleija Egypt ki nen mikṭenthuw in Mousia tak kdi kcha tdit dei maanmin.’
Ungta ava nit rek thung ngi mmaanni silsuwn khat seem lamda, ungu khut doseem pthla hin tlaai down lamda, khut nong rek tun kanpa lamda.
Pdainu Isowr ri pinle lamda, ungta parwaanki bursi rek luw mdo buk nraan pii lamda, ava khulpu rek laaika thung ngi hanto mdo kjit hep daat;
‘O, Isreel miirek, kbowklaiji kum som plii thu,
Nei kihin tlaai ado down nraan saa eayou maanti mo?
Ungta Maloch buw inn leh Isowr Rephan tdit,
bursi ava naanni luw ado buk nraanki,
pthla ado seem in lou dok intinu;
Bebylon kheel dekki aju punthot pthii nikaan di.’
“Nenki npah le ngi kbowklaiji sakhi ki buwinn thloi lamda, mdodee dil kṭoiji ava kdujikki ado seemra dida Mousi hin kpau Mma ngi the pik lamda.
Nenki npah le dungi Isowr dorei pthii ktlok chati rek paam thung ngi ma am in mpha thu nen npah le ngi Joshua tu kilṭhi ngi buwinn ava kdom dok lamda. Ava leiji Devid nit rek kpha thung ngi amda.
Mma ngi Isowr dosan pha chda, ungta Jakob pi Isowr tumra ma am nraan ṭhil chda.
Pdainu Solomon ni Mma Inn khat sak pikda.
Anto daat joso Kparthaang sii ava khut dosak Inn thung ngi ame; khulpu dothe hava lulu,
‘Parwaanna Nei kuk onna,
ungta dultia Nei kukhu therna.
Mukpu ngi theda,
Nei ka am nra talu Inn sa naandi,
mdit mata Nei kakarngat nra munna tu ungda?
Nei kukhutti havale
mkheng nga mdo sak
pme mo?’
“Lowl kakar miirek, plungril leh knaa ngi vunmor kreen kmarek naanni pthla kchiir ra mpha ktai thung ngi ro maanti. Naanni apah le dotlot lulu ngi atlot inna.

Apah lengi kjakakham mdo piik maan khulpu ku ka am da? Ungta rinkindit Khat kurjung rangki mlei thung ngi mdungi kthe pik ava mmaanni eayou lamda, tunva naanna kro kmarek ungu ke eayou rek kurthuwk in pti.
Naanna Waantamsii dopiik Nowlam ava karlaangrek in pti ungu arkhii maanti.
Tunva mmaanni havale maryaak in thungta kdung plung pthit lamda, mma raal kpiingi mhaa kril psuk lamda.
Pdainu mma ava pthla kchiir ri pum dimmi dim chda, parwaan mhansut rim thungta Isowr laarnee ungu Isowr chang ktongtha Jisu krip daat deida.
Ungta mma ngi theda, “Asuwn, parwaan kparvang nga, ungu Isowr chang ktongtha Jisu krip daat kdea.”
Pdainu mmaanni kdung owng lamda ungu knaa kuhuwm lamda ungta kut,lur lamda mma nam knuwr lamda.
Ava dilli mmaanni duwn tha kneng pthii lamthida lung ngi deeng lamda; ungu mmaan dona ava msakhi rang ngi ksenao khat mmiing Soul mdo dit ava khuther ri thii lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Stiphan na lung ngi mdeen slii arlaanni, “Mukpu Jisu nei kapthla mhailo pik cha,” dida mma ngi ṭhil chda.
Ungta mma ngi tardiilda krowl kparyaa ngi owngda, “Mukpu hava pnu ngi mraal pii chlamma,” dida theda. Ungu mma ngi hava mthe dokle iip chdok da!”
Ungta Soul ava mma ke eayou thung ngi kro khat kurthuwkda.

Ungta nit ava thung ngi Jerusalem thungki rinlop mraal kpii ngi kja kakham klin langlang khat piida; ungu kenyee rek kma mmaan mkheng nga Judia leh Samaria paamkowl mkheng thung ngi kinṭheu tir chlamda.
Plung klut miirekki Stiphan na alruwl chlamda, ungu kdung kurnung karbaan psuk lamda.
Pdainu Soul va rinlop ke eakrep rangki innbung ktaiji lutda psel rek leh snu rekka rowng inn thung ngi mdo khum rangki howl lamda.
Tunva kinṭheu miirek va chet lamda kṭha paumin paryaam lamda.
Philip va Samaria khuwpii khat thung ngi jungda, ungta mhin inni Khrista paumin paryaamda.
Ungta miiluwngpa ngi Philip pauthe aryaa lamda ungu mma dotlot titinna rek mdee in thungta plung kinṭim sappi plut lamda.
Mleija mii knempok thungki pthla ktobor rekki krowl kparyaa ngi owng lamda duwn thuwk lamda; ungta kyeng leh khu kseek mii knempok pdamda.
Ava leiji khuwpii ava thung ngi kdung ngi kanpa amda.

Pdainu khuwpii ava thung ngi chodu chodilli kupsumki doi kṭha kma ktlo kchok mmiing Simon tdit miilai khat amda, ungu Samaria chati rekka ava ngi ngak chda, ungta mthina ngi klin lang lang khat ping kardida.
Mmaan mkheng ngi kver kingi kmo kpha plung krippi the lamda, “Hava miilaija Isowr rutan klin mdodit ava.
Ungta mma ngi mpha roiksot thu kupsumki doikṭha kma mdotlotti psum tir chlamda ava leiji plung pii lamda.
Pdainu Philip pi Isowr Kruwngpaam ungu Jisu Khrista miing ngi kṭha paumin paryaamda ava lei mmaanni rin chlamda, snu psel knempok baptis ptlot lamda.
Simon mdak kat rukva rinchda, ungu baptis mlo diltha Philip kurthlo ṭhida. Ungta titinna rek leh tngana rek klin klin mdee thungta kdung ngak chda.
Tunva Samaria rekki Isowr pauna maryaak inna tdit Jerusalem ki kenyee rekki maryaak in thungta, mhin inni Pitor leh Johon sii lamda,
mmaanve ngi junglamda, ungu pthla kchiir mdo arlaan chaak nraan ṭhil pik lamda;
mleija mmaan ku khat lee tunni pthla kchiir arjung mlaida, pdainu Mukpu Jisu miing ngi baptis kuptlot pik ngal lam.
Ava dilli mmaanni mleen thaanni mkhut in khiin pik lamda, ungu mmaanni pthla kchiir arlaang chlamda.
Tunva kenyee rekki khut mdo khiin pik lam leiji pthla kchiir mdo piik lam ava Simon ni mdee thungta, mhin inni sum piida,
theda, “Nei rukva ku mii khat leen khut khiingda pthla kchiir kdo arlaan chaak nra, nei rukka hava rutan ava mhai pii chaan.”
Pdainu Pitor ri mhin theda, “Athiir kpowl tu kilṭhi ngi maang chnadi; mleija Isowr chla ava sum mi pha chrang paknu kdingi binma!
Hava nong thung ngi atum mata ado phaak ra ame, mleija Isowr maiṭhuwmmi aplungril kindit me.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda aṭhat ma nong thungki plung ren ahur cha, ungta mrot rangbi, plungril thu adobin, ado tuptlot pik nra Mukpu hin aṭhil cha.
Mleija nah aril kakha ungu kṭha kma nong dobowl tdit neiji kdea.”
Ungbi Simon ni arthawngda, “Kleenni nah dothe mthlen ma nra, Mukpu hin ktum mhai ṭhil pik cha.”
Tunva mmaanni Mukpu pauna karmang deekki mthe dok inle, Samaria khuw knempok thung ngi kṭha paumin paryaam lamda, Jerusalem tha mdil kinle lamda.
Pdainu Mukpu Waan tamsii ngi Philip hin theda, “Kardel ungu Jerusalem kingi ti ktongtha Gaja kpha ngi kjung lam ava tha jung.” Hava kbowklai ki lam kurthuwkda.
Ungta mma ngi kardelda jungda. Ungu asuwn, kukhong kcha, Ethiopia miilai khat, mma ngi Jerusalem tha luwkbuk arhangda, Ethiopia ki kruwngnu Kandas nong klin kpuw, mma sumbuwr vaiklo pik, kurthuwk da.
Ungta mma ngi mjun kinlet slii chunni; saa arka leen ku ongda, khulpu Isaijah laaika pa da.
Ungta pthla ngi Philip hin theda, “Hang ungu hava saa arka tu kilṭhi.”
Ava leiji Philip pi mhin hanchen tengda, ungu Isaijah laaika mdo pat aryaa da, ungbi mhin khewlda, “Ado patta adee pandit ta?”
Ungta mma ngi theda, “Ku mii khatti mikthe pik kma donle neiva tak heppi dei pandi nikda?” Ungu mdo ko on ṭhira Philip ava archil da.
Tunva mma dopat slii laaika phel ava hava:
“Jao mdo eayora mdoṭhi lulu,
mdit mata jaonao mul mngeu slii arlaanni miprin ma lulu ngi,
Mma ngi do khat lee pre
the me.
Muplung mparneem reen leiji kekṭewl pik cha ame.
Mma charuwlla ku ngi kthe pchaang rang da?
Mleija Mma rinkhua dulti thungki mdolo pthii.”
Ungta kukhong ava ngi Philip hin theda, “Aka ktham chaakka, hava khulpuva ku mlei thung ngi mdo theda, Mma mdaksaa mo ktlok mlei thu mdo theda?”
Ava dilli Philip pi mner pvangda, ungta laaika hava tu kilṭhi ngi Jisu ki kṭha paumin paryaamda.
Ungta mmaanni lamtha hanto mche slii in thungta dii mruk amna pha lamda, ungbi kukhong ava ngi theda, “Asuw, hava thung ngi dii ka amma! Neiji baptis kdolo chaak nrangki kapkhaan tak ka am rangda?”
Ungbi Philip pi theda, “Nang ngi aplungril mkhengtu kilṭhi ngi arin chaakbi, krora.” Ungta mma ngi arthawngda, “Jisu Khrista ava Isowr Chapa tdit neiji krin chaakka.”
Ungta saa arka mri nrangki mma ngi paupṭum da, ungu mikniing inni dii thu jungṭum lamda, Philip pi kukhong ava baptis ptlot pik chda.
Ungu mmaanni dii thungki murhun thuw in thungta, Phiilip ava Mukpu pthla ngi ṭhi dokda, mma ava kukhong va dei purnowl chme, ungu mlam tha kanpa ngi jungsun da.
Pdainu Philip ava Ajatas tha karpha khot chda, ungu mma ngi Kaisaria mphaak du khim khai mchena ktai thu khuwpii mkheng thung ngi kṭha paumin paryaam da.
Pdainu Soul la ktadaal luwp luwp daatti, Mukpu siikhu rek ke eayou rang ngi thiimpu kparthaang hin chetda
mleija mma ngi lamthu snu psel ku mii khat mdo dut thok khat ava bowlda Jerusalem tha mdoṭhi lam nra, Damaskas ki synagog rek hinkira mhin chethi khewlda.
Tunva hanto kchetti Damaskas naida, ungu tunkat daatti parwaan ki mar awng khatti klop dokda.
Ungta mma dul leenni tluwda, ungta Soul, Soul, talu leiji suwk atupthuw a?” dida mhin kthe krowl khat mma ngi aryaa da.
Ungta mma ngi theda, “Nah, ku ptida, Mukpu?” Ungbi Mma ngi theda, “Neia nang ngi suwk ado pthuw slii Jisu ava ping.
Pdainu kardel ra khuwpii ava thung ngi valut, ungta nang ngi tak tlo nadi tdit akthe pik chra.
Mdo cheṭhi mmiiṭhi rekva krowl aryaa lamda, ungu ku khat lee mdodee maan leiji, kpau pchaang kma rip chdaat lamda.
Soul li dul leenki kardelda; ungu mmik mpahar thungta, do khat lee pre mma ngi deime; ava leiji mmaanni mkhut tha kjowng lamda Damaskas thu lu ṭhi lamda.
Ungta nii kdum lik thung ngi khuw deime, ungu kchaa knee kma am chdaat da.
Tunva mmiing Anania mdo dit siikhu khat Damaskas thung ngi amda. Mukpu ngi mhin ktardet da theda, “Anania.” Ungta mma ngi theda, “Mukpu hava thu ka am daat imping.”
Ungta Mukpu ngi mhin theda, “Kardel ra sekthleng ring mdodit lamṭhuwm thung ngi va, ungu Judia phungka thung ngi Tarsas ki mmiing Soul mdodit miilai khat athlaam; mleija asuw, mma ngi mṭhil chaakka,
ungta mmiing Anania tdit miilai khatti arvang lutda, mma ngi khuw mdodee chaak nra mleen mkhut kikhiin pik chra ava deida.
Pdainu Anania ngi arthawngda, “Mukpu, hava miilai mlei thung ngi Jerusalem thu ka am kintiing rek hin kṭhakma mdo tlot knempok neiji aryaa chnu.
Ungta hava tha Nah amiing ku own mii mkheng mdo bowl nra thiimpu kinreel rek hinki rutan mdo phaak dok.”
Pdainu Mukpu ngi mhin theda, “Va, mleija ktlok chati rek, ungta kruwng rek ungu Isreel chapa rek hinni Nei kmiing kuhur rangki sok muklo ra kdo kchol chaak dok.
Mleija mma ngi Nei kmiing tummi kja kakham kdung ngi kparteelra.

Ava leiji Anania ngi vada ungu inn ava thung ngi lutda. Ungta mleen ni mkhut khiingda theda, “Ku u knao Soul, ditta nang ngi khuw adodee chaak nra, ungu pthla kchiir ri adim nra, nang ngi arvatna lamtha ahin ktardet Mukpu Jisu ngi neia mdo tsii ava ping.”
Ungta tunkat daatti mmik leenki do klip khat hepdaat dokhat tlada, ungbi mma ngi khuwdeida. Ava dilli mma ngi ripda baptis louda
ungu then chaada mrutangda.
Mleija mma ngi Damaskas thung ngi siikhu rektu nii ksotti kcheengda.
Ungta synagog thung ngi mma ngi Jisu paryaam tengda, theda, “Mma Isowr Chapa.”

Ungbi karyaa mii mkheng nga ngak chda, ungu the lamda, “Jerusalem thu hava miing ku own kcha rek ke eayou miilai ava pme mo? Ungta bowl lamda thiimpu kinreel rek maiṭhuwm mi mdoṭhi nrangki hava tha kthleng.”
Pdainu Soul ava kheel set setti mrutangda, ungta Jisua Khrista ava kat dida Damaskas thungki Jihudia rek hin plungren mdohur nraanki theda.
Nii roiksotti ma am diltha, Jihudia rekki mma ke eayoura kurthlong lamda,
Pdainu mkurthlon in Soul li deida. Mmaanni ke eayou rangki suwnjaan knai kma paltong sut pṭoi lamda,
pdainu msiikhu rekki bowr thu kdom lamda jaanni rowngbang taplaan lamda.
Ungta mma ngi Jerusalem tha arvangda siikhu rek arlakki lut chnuwmda; ungta mkheng inni mma ṭi chlamda, mleija siikhu khatti rin chlamme.

Pdainu Barnabas ava ngi lou chda, ungu kenyee rek hin arvan ṭhida, ungta tak heppi mma ngi lam tha Mukpu deida mkarbiik ṭhii chaak, ungu Damaskas thung ngi tak heppi Jisu miing nga plung ktangar ri mparyaam tdit thethut pik lamda.
Ava leiji mma ngi Jerusalem thu lutda thuwkda,
Mukpu miing ngi plung ktangar ri paryaamda. Ungta mma ngi Grik pauvi kpau Jihudia rek mraal kpii ngi karteen ṭhi lamda; pdainu mmaanva ke eayoura thlaam lamda.
Ungta mu u mnao rekki ava deida, Kaisaria tha arjung ṭhi lamda, ungu Tarsas tha sidok lamda.
Ava dilli Judia ungta Galil ungu Samaria rinlop mkheng kdaai ungta kpunchoi pik pha chlamda; ungta Mukpu kṭi ungu pthla kchiir lungam piikki tlowngda tipnem set setda.
Tunva Pitor ra mmaan mkheng thung ngi chet tlowngda, Lydda tha ka am kintiing rek hin rukva arjungda.
Ava tha mma ngi mmiing Anias mdo dit kum tret lik thung ngi karjam chdaat, kyeng kcha miilai khat kurdut ṭhida.
Ungta Pitor ri mhin theda, “Anias, Jisu Khrista ngi atipdam chaakka, kardel ra akowm apintiing.” Ungbi tunkat datti mma ngi kardelda.
Ungta Lydda leh Sharon thung ngi ka am mii mkheng ngi mma deida, ungu mmaanni Mukpu hin kinle chlamda.
Tunva Joppa thungki siikhu khat mmiing Tabitha tdit Dorkas am ntha vangda. Mma ava kṭha nong leh plungnei ji dim chda.
Nit ava thung ngi koida diyou chda; ungbi mmaanni alṭhu dok lamthida, tuwn knung reep innka thung ngi pi iip lamda.
Lydda ava Joppa ktinel tekki ma am leiji, Pitor ra ava tha ka am daatta tdit siikhu rekki aryaa lamda, “Neen kihin kbei sekki mhai thlen pik chaan,” dida mhin kaktham chra miilai knii sii lamda.

Ava leiji Pitor ri ripda mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi vangda. Ungta mma ngi marvan thungta, tun knung reep innka thung ngi hankal ṭhi lamda. Ungu meikhunu mkheng ngi ṭap lamda, Durka ngi mrin mpha thu mdo trit buw rek leh phrik rek mhin tdet lamda, rip daat lamda.

Pdainu Pitor ri mmaan mkheng nga duwn pthuwk lamthida, tirdiilda ungu ṭhil chda; ava dilli mma ngi kdiyou kluwng ktong tha karheelda theda, “Tabitha, kardel.” Ungbi mma ngi mmik pakhap da, ungu Pitor mdee thungta kardelda ko ongda.
Ungbi Pitor ri mkhut piida tiprip da. Ava dilli kintiing rek leh meikhunuh rek own da mhin inni parlaan da.
Ungta Joppa mii mkheng ngi ava deida, ungu Mukpu hin mii knempokki rin chda.
Ungta mma ngi Simon mdo dit saavun kukhok miilai khat ava hin niikhuw ksotti Joppa thu kcheen ṭhi lamda.
Kaisaria thung ngi Italia rawlmii berksu mmiing Kornelia mdodit miilai khat amda.
Mma ava mphungka mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi plung klut ungu Isowr kṭi mii rek hinni chang tlaak ktaakki kpurdon pik, ungta Isowr hin kdet liit kma kṭhil cha miilai khat.
Kunthunki ṭhang tku arveelli mik kleng khatti Isowr Waan tamsii ngi arjungda mhin theda, “Kornelia!”
Ungta mma ngi suw rimda, ungu kpiir ri theda, “Talu da Mukpu?” Ungbi Mma ngi mhin theda, “Nah doṭhil chaak leh chang tlaak ktaak liitti ado purdon ava Isowr hintha mdo bin phaak nangi kthlung nga.
Ungta tunva Joppa tha Pitor mdodit Simon kṭhira mii asiilam.
Mma ava Simon mdodit saavun kukhok hin kipriik daatta, mi inn na truwn biing ngi ka am.”
Mma hin pau kthe Waan tamsii msun dok thungta, mma sra owr rek miilai knii ungu rawlmii rek arlakki miilai khat ownda,
ungta parseel jik lam thida, Joppa tha mma ngi sii lamda.
Mupduk nii ngi mmaanni hanto kchet slii ngi, khuwpii mnai in mpha thu, Pitor ra ṭhang truk arveelli kṭhil chra inn tun tha hangkal da.
Ungu mpoi thamda, ungta do khatta chaa nuwm chda; pdainu mmaanni von mvai slii arlaan ni mik kleng khat ti,
parwaan kparvangda, dultipaam markil plii thung ngi buwklinpa hep daat mdo arjuk ptlaak mma ngi deida.
Mthung thang ngi msik msik saa mkheng leh muplung ngi kunkhow khauṭit khaujaar ungu kjuwng puwa rek amda.
Ungta mhin krowl khat thlengda, “Kardel, Pitor; a eayoura achaa.”
Pdainu Pitor ri theda, “Eme, Mukpu; mleija kbuwr mata kartleu kma do khat lee cha kchok maang.”
Ungta krowl ava mvei kniitna ngi mhin thleng nowlda, “Isowr dopartleu dok ava nang ngi kbuwr pi adodit ro nime.”
Hava vei kdum chak thung ngi thuwkda, ungta do ava parwaan tha arju ṭen dok tengda.
Tunva Pitor ri mik kleng mdodee ava talu mlei da kdingi muplung thu mpurdun slii arlaanni, asuwn, Kornelia dohaisii miirekki Simon inn thlaam lamda, paltong bengi rip daat lamda
ungta Pitor mdo dit Simon kipriik mo kdingi ownda khewl lamda.
Ungta Pitor ri mik kleng mpurdun slii arlaanni, pthla ngi mhin theda, “Asuw, miilai kdum rekki at thlaamma.
Ungta kardelra jungṭum, kṭoi nuwm kmalua tloma; mleiija Nei kdosii lam.”
Ungta Pitor ri jung ṭumda, ungu miirek hin theda, “Naan dosut thlaam ma neiping; talu leiji kthleng in ptida?”

Ungta mmaanni theda, “Rawlmii rek berksu Kornelia ava rinkindit ungu Isowr kṭi miilai khat, Jihudia chati rek mkheng ngi kunton dokki mpau naan miilai khat, mma inn thang ngi ado kṭhi nraan, ungu nang ngi mhin ado thera ava karyaa chra, kchiir Waan tamsii khat dothe pik dil kṭoiji kthleng kchaan ping.”
Ava leiji mmal rek rang ngi mma ngi own chlam da.
Mupduk nii ngi mma ngi ripda ungu mdil in ṭoida, ungta Joppa ki mu u mnao rek angṭhe tu kilṭhida.
Ungta adai nii ngi Kaisaria lut lamda. Kornelia va mphungka kthuwk rek leh mplap rek own purkukda mmaan arngai chlamda.
Pitor ri mlu thungta, Kornelia va ardada ungta mkhu therri kuwnda mma luwbuk da.
Pdainu Pitor ri tipripda theda, “Hangrip; nei rukka mii ping.”
Ungta mma tu pau saamda vanglutda, ungu mii knempok kthuwk kurkuk pha da.

Ungbi mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Jihudia khat kurthuwk ki ktlok chati tu kurchuwm mdit mata ka amve ava Nowlam mi mdorot ma naan adak kat inni adodee in; pdainu neiji ku mii khat lee ava kbuwr mata kartleu kma kdo dit rang pme dida Isowr ri mtidet chda.
Ava leiji nei atu own in mpha thu do khat lee kthe pkhaan kma kthleng kcha ping; talu leiji ado to own chaak inda dinu akikhewl chaak inna.”
Ungta Kornelia ngi theda, “Nii plii dungi ṭhang hava thu neiji ki inn thung ngi ṭhang tku ki kṭhil cha tlonu; ungu asuw, kpowl dang miilai khatti kmaiṭhuwmmi ripda,
theda, ‘Kornelia, ado ṭhil chaakka aryaak pikda, ungu changtlaak ktaakki ado purdon ava Isowr maiṭhuwmmi mbin phaakka.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Joppa tha Pitor mdo dit Simon hin mii asii; mma truwn biing ngi Simon mdo dit saavun kokhowk inn tha kipriik daatta.’

Ava leiji nah hin ku knotti kdo haisii chaak lam kurthuwk, ungu nah awonsat ti ado tithlen pik chaak in kurthuwkka. Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda tunva, Mukpu ngi nah hin pau mdoreen mkheng karyaa chra, neen kikheng inni Isowr dosut na thung ngi ka am kchaan ping.”
Ungta Pitor ri mner pvangda ungu theda: “Kinditti, neiji kdea, ditta Isowr va ksanksui tlome.
Pdainu chati khim khai thung ngi Mma kṭi miirek ungu kindit ktlo Mma ngi mdo rot kurthuwk.
Mma ngi Isreel hin pauna mdosi ava naanni adee in, (Mma ava mkhengki Mukpu) ditta Jisu Khrista ngi kdaaiki kṭha paumin paryaamda.
Johon ni baptis ktlo ki paumin mparyaam diltha, Galil ki pṭhunda Judia paam mkheng thu pauna ava paryaamda:
Nasareth ki Jisua Isowr ri thao pbulda; Mma ngi tlowngda kṭha nong tloda ungu tarnam do owr mii mkheng nga tak heppi mapdam pik, mleija Isowr ri mdo kurthlo ṭhi kurthuwk.
Ungta neenna Jihudia rek khuwpaam leh Jerusalem thung ngi Mma dotlot mkheng avaki sakhi in ping. Mma ava dingleen pthoi lamda mmaanni eayou lamda.
Pdainu mnii kdumna nitti Isowr ri pring pinleda pandang da,
Mii mkheng hin pme pdainu Isowr do kchol dok neenni sakhi kdo hur pik in, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mrin kinlet diltha, mdo chaak mdo neek ṭhi neen kihin kurthuwk.
Ungta mii rek hinni paumin kparyaamra, ungu ksing leh kdiyou kekṭewl ra, Isowr dopurthuw dok ava sakhi kpiira neen kihin pau mreen pik inda.
Mma hinni khulpu rek mkheng ngi sakhi piida, ditta Mma krin kcha mii pum ktaija Mma miing ngi pnu rek kuptlot pik marlaan chaak inna.”
Pitor ri hava mthe slii arlaanni, pthla kchiir ava mii mkheng tunni arjungda.
Ungta Pitor doṭhi krin cha miirek vunmor kreen rekka ngak chlamda, mleija ktlok chati rek tun rukva pthla kchiir ki chla ava ptlon pikda.
Mleija mmaanni msik msik pauvi pau lamda ungu Isowr mdo panpaak chaak in aryaa lamda. Ava dilli Pitor ri thethuwda,
“Nentu kinṭimmi pthla kchiir karlaang cha mmaan ni baptis mdolo chaak nraan dii kthlot ku mii khat ka am ngaal in pti mo?”
Ungta Jisu Khrista miing ngi baptis mdotlot nraan mma ngi pau pṭumda. Ava dilli mma ngi mado kcheen ṭhi bong nrangki ktham chlamda.
Tunva ktlok chati rek rukva Isowr pauna marlaan chaak inna tdit kenyee rek leh Judia tha ka am mu u mnao rekki aryaada.
Ava leiji Pitor ri Jerusalem tha mhan thungta vunmor kreen lop rekki mkho the chlamda,
the lamda, “Talu leiji vunmor kreen kma rek hin chetti then ado maal ṭhi lamda?”
Pdainu Pitor ri parnaak jikda mhin inni kpau pṭhunda:
“Neiji Joppa khuwpii thung ngi ṭhil chnu; ungta mik kleng khatti deinu, buwklinpa dum khat hepdaat, parwaanki markil plii thung ngi arjung ṭumda, ungu nei kihin arjung kṭum do khat deinu.
Knai tekki neiji suw rimnu plung kpurdun slii thungta, saarek, downkhaal rek, plung ngi kundowt khauṭit khaujaar, kjuwng puwa rek deinu.
Ungta, ‘Kardel Pitor; a eayoura achaa,’ dida kihin kthe krowl khat neiji aryaanu.
Pdainu neiji thenu, ‘Eme, Mukpu; mleija kbuwr mata kartleu kma do khat lee kner thung ngi junglut mlai.’
Pdainu parwaanki krowl ava ngi mvei knit nangi kihin arthawngda, ‘Isowr do partleu dok ava nang ngi kbuwr pi ado dit ronime.’
Hava vei kdum chak thung ngi thuwkda, ungu mkheng ngi parwaan tha arjuk ṭen dok nowlda.
Mpha ava kat thung ngi nei kihin mdosii Kaisaria ki miilai kdummi neen ka am ndaat in inn ava thlung lamda.
Ungta kipjiir kma ngi mmaan kdo vanṭoi lam nra pthla ngi kihin theda. Ungta ku u knao rek hava miilai truk rukva mhai kurthlo ṭhi chlamda, ungta neenni mii ava inn thung ngi lut innu.
Ungta mma ngi tak heppi mdee tdit ki pau songda, mleija Waan tamsii ngi inn thung ripda theda, Joppa tha mii haisira Pitor mdodit Simon arvan ṭhi;
mma ngi nang ruk ungta aphungka mkheng ngi kartlen kcha ado phaak nraan paumin khat akparyaam pik chraan.’
Neiji kpau kupṭhun thungta, nen ntuwn ni chodu chodilli kurjung ava lulu ngi pthla kchiir mleen thaanni arjungda.
Ungta, ‘Johon va diitu kilṭhi ngi baptis aptlot inda, pdainu naanna pthla kchiir ri baptis akuptlot raan,’ dida Mukpu ngi tak heppi mthe tdit pauna neiji bin phaak chnu.
Ava mkurthutbi Mukpu Jisu krin changi Isowr va mmaan hin ruk nen nhin ruk kinṭim chakki chla ava mitpiik inbi, neia ku kurthuwk nu Isowr ava mat nikda?”
Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta rim kdi am chlamda. Ungta Isowr panpaak lamda the lamda, “Ktlok chati rek hin rukva rinkhu mdo phaak chaak nraan Isowr ri rot pikda.”

Tunva Stiphan leenni kja kakham mthuw leiji kinṭheu tir kcharek ava ngi ku khat lee hin kma Jihudia rek hin daatti pauna ava Phonesia, ungta Kupras, ungu Antia kpha dekki lamkla ngi chet lamda the lamda.
Pdainu mmaan arlakki mii angṭhe Antia tha kthleng Kupras leh Kurini mii rek rukva Grik mii rek hinni Mukpu Jisu paryaam lamda.
Ungta Mukpu khutti kurthlo ṭhi lamda, ungu mii msing knempokki plung pinle da Mukpu hin rin chda.
Hava pauren ava Jerusalem ki rinlop knaa thlungda, ungbi mmaanni Antia tha Barnabas sii lamda.
Mma ngi arvangda Isowr plungnee mdee thungta, mma kanpa chda; mmaan mkheng ngi plung knetti Mukpu hin mdo rin chaak nraan, ksop lamda.
Mleija mma kṭha miilai khat, pthla kchiir leh krin changi dim chda. Ungta lop klin langlang ngi Mukpu hin tpom chlamda.
Ava leiji Barnabas ava Soul ksuwra Tarsas tha vangda.

Ungu mma ngi mkurdut ṭhi thungta Antia tha arvan ṭhida. Mleija mmaanni kum khat lik thung ngi rinlop kurthlo ṭhi lamda, ungu lop klinpa hin purchuk lamda; ungta Antia thung ngi siikhu rek ava rukri verki khristen di lamda.
Tunva hava nit rek thung ngi Jerusalem ki khulpu rekka Antia tha arjung lamda.
Ungta mmaan thungki khat mmiing Agabas ava ngi ripda, ungu dultipaam mkheng thung ngi poitham klin langlang kthuwkra dida pthla ngi theda; ungu hava Kloudia mpha thu kurthuwk.
Ungta Judia thung ngi ka am mu u mnao rek hinni mii pum ktaiji mma mma dopchaan ni mdo purdon pik chaak nra, siikhu rekki pau rip lamda.
Ungta mmaanni anto tlo lamda, Barnabas leh Soul khut thung ngi kver rek sii lamda.
Mpha ava thung ngi kruwng Herod ti Rinlop thung ki mii angṭhe hin kja kakhamki khut khiingda.
Mma ngi Johon upa Jeems ava kaang ksaang ngi eayouda.
Ungta Jihudia rek plung ngam mma ngi mdee thungta, Pitor ruk mdo kjown nraan mma ngi tloda. Hava ava thowl ktaak thenpen kmaal nit rek mpha thung ki.
Ungu mma ngi mukjown thungta, rownginn thung ngi khumda, ungu mmun plii thung ngi rawlmii plii lii pruwnda, taplaanna diltha miirek hin pthuwk nuwmda.
Ava leiji Pitor ra rownginn thung ngi khumda, pdainu rinlop va mma tummi Isowr hin plung klutti ṭhil chda.
Herod ti mdo pthuw nuwm na ava nit jaan katti, Pitor ra rawlmii knii arlakki thiir ri knii dobowlli iip daatda, ungu kseel rekki rownginn thurngot bengi rung lamda;

ungta asuwn, Mukpu Waan tamsii ngi mhin ktardetda, ungu mthung ngi mar awng khat lengda; ungta Pitor ra mturnguk tha tpeengtik da ungu pardelda, theda, “Kbeiji kardel dok.” Ungta mkhut leenki thiir ri rekka detda tla chda.
Ungta Waan tamsii ngi mhin theda, “Adona leh akhukok rek anaa.” Ungta mma ngi anto tloda. Ungu Mma ngi mhin theda, “Abuw ahiilra kdil aṭoi.”
Ungbi mma ngi duwn thuwkda mdil ṭoida; Waan tamsii dotlot ava mlangkat tdit mma ngi deime, pdainu mik kleng dei chpaknu kdingi mmava binda.

Ungta mmaanni rukri verki leh miknitna thurngot kseel kheel dok lamda, khuwpii sekthleng ring thiir paltong mphaak in thungta, paltong nga mmaan tummi mthina ngi kparvangda, ungta mmaanni lam khat ṭoi lamda, ungu tunkat daatti Waan tamsii va ma pthiida.
Ungta Pitor mdaksaa ngi dei chda theda, “Tunva kindit chelli kdee chaakka, ditta Mukpu ngi Waan tamsii msii pikda, Mma ngi Herod khut thungki ungu Jihudia miirek plungbin thungki mtiṭenthuw chaakka.”
Mma ngi hava mdee dokle, mii knempokki thuwk kurkukda mdo ṭhil sliina, mmiing msik khat Mak mdo dit Johon ava nuh Mery inn tha vangda.
Ungu mma ngi paltong thurngot mprei thungta, mmiing Rhoda mdodit sra owr khat ava ngi karthawngra arvada.
Pitor krowl maryaak thungta mkanpat chaak reenni paltong kapvan pik kma, paltong bengi Pitor krip daatta dida vangchen da songda
Mmaanni mhin theda, “Nah mong kukto kchaamti.” Pdainu mmava klang katpi dida mhin inni theda, “Ava mma Waantamsii ngaal!”
Pdainu Pitor va prei thlit daatda; ungu mmaanni mapvan thungta mma dei lamda ungta ngak chlamda.

Pdaiinu rim kdi ma am nraan mkhutti partamda. Tak heppi Mukpu ngi rownginn thungki mthuwṭhi tdit mhin inni song chda. Ungta mma ngi theda, “Hava Jeems leh mu u mnao rek hin ason pik chaan.” Ava dilli mma ngi kurlouda mmun ktlok tha sunda.
Tunva khuw mvar thungta, Pitor hin tak kthuwk kdingi rawlmii rek arlakki kut, lur ri vawnglum khat amda.
Ungta mma Herod ti thlaamda mphaak ma thungta, kseel rekka parsinna thida mdo eayo nraan pau pṭumda. Ava dilli mma ngi Judia ki Kaisaria tha jungda, ungu ava tha kcheengda.

Tunva Herod va Tyr leh Sidon mii rek hin plung pthitda; ungbi mmaanni plung khdaat ti mhin thleng lamda, kruwng amna thungki vaiklou Blastas archil lamda, kdaai rangki tummi ktham chlamda, mleija mpaam in ava kruwng paam ava ngi then purdon pik chlamda.
Herod ta mdo palreen naan nit katti, kruwng dona ngi kirsimda, mko onna leen ko ongda, mii rek hin paryaam da.
Ungta mii rekva owng lamda, “Isowr khat krowl ungu miilai krowl ava pme!”
Ungu tun kat daatti Mukpu Waan tamsii ngi eayouda, mleija mma ngi Isowr punlor me; ungu mma ava pdenni chaada ungta diyou da.
Pdainu Isowr pau ava linda ungu kurjouda.
Ungta Barnabas leh Soul la mnong tlot in mkurkhum dok thungta, mmiing Mak mdodit Johon ṭhi lamda Jerusalem tha mdil kinle lamda.
Tunva Antia ki rinlop thungki khulpu rek ungta chukpu rek, Barnabas, Niger mdodit Simeon, Kurini ki Lusias, paamkpu Herod dojuw chaak Manaen, ungu Soul am lamda.
Mmaanni then ngowl lamda Mukpu luw mbuk slii arlaan inni, Pthla Kchiir ri theda, “Barnabas leh Soul la Nei knong tummi kdo own lam, Nei ktumra mhai pankai pik in.”
Ava dilli mmaanni then ngowl lamda mṭhil chaak in diltha, mleen thaanni mkhut in khiin pik lam thida sii lamda.
Ava lei Pthla kchiir dosii ngi, mmaanni Silusia tha jung lamda; ava thungki Kupras tha vang lamda.
Mmaanni Salamis mthlun in thungta, Jihudia rek synagog thung ngi Isowr pauna paryaam lamda. Ungta mmaan kukthowra Johon ṭhi lamda.
Mmaanni prahpaam mkheng klaan lamda Paphos thlung lamda, Jihudia mii kurthuwk, mmiing Barjisu mdodit doi kṭhakma ktlo kinditkma khulpu miilai khat pha khot lamda.
Mma ngi prahpaam ava kpupa ksing langlang miilai Sergias Poulas ava tu kilṭhida, mma ngi Barnabas leh Soul ownda, Isowr pauna aryaa nuwm chda.
Pdainu doi kṭha kma ktlo Eluma ngi (mma miing mdothe na) ripkhaan lamda, prahpaam kpupa ngi mdo rin chaak thungki mdil mkinlet nra mlam thlaamda.
Pdainu Pthla kchiir ri kdim Poul mdodit Soul li, mma suw rimda
ungu theda, “Rinkindit rek mkheng kipteng, pleiknei leh kuhuwng cha mkheng ngi kdim, dijabowl chapa nang, Mukpu lam kirjii deek ado punkoi slii thungki down nipti mo?
Ungta tunva asuw, Mukpu khut aleenni ka amma, ungta mpha mruk tummi amik tot donle kniw dei nimti.” Tun kat daatti mmik totda pum jiing kjiing ngi mkhut tha kṭhi pikra mii thlaamda.
Ava dilli prahpaam kpupa ngi kthuwk nong ava mdee thungta rin chda, mleija Mukpu mlei thung ngi mdo purchu inni mma ngak chda.
Tunva Poul leh mmiiṭhi rekka Paphos thungki Pamphylia ki Perga tha arvang lamda. Ungta Johon ni ma lamthida Jerusalem tha mdil kinle da;
pdainu Perga thungki mmaanni Antia ki Pisidia thlung lamda. Ungta sabath nitti mmaanni synagog thung ngi lut lamda ku ong lamda.
Nowlam leh khulpu rek laaika mpat dok inle, synagog ki paamkpu rekki mhin inni siilamda, the lamda, “Ku u knao rek mii rek hin ado kso naanki pauna athloi inta, atheen.”
Ava leiji Poul li ripda mkhut haida theda:
“Isreel mii rek, ungu Isowr kṭi rek aryaan.
Isreel mii rek Isowr hava ngi nen npahle kcholda, ungta Egypt paam thung ngi ma am in mpha thung mii rekka plin psaangda, ungu ava thungki Mma ngi mbaanbul khiingda ṭhi pthuwk lamda.
Ungta kum somplii arveel kpha thung kbowklaiji Mma ngi diilṭhi lamda.
Ungta Mma ngi Kenan paam thungki chati rek tikheu eakrep thida, mpaam in ava mmaan do ngi pur owlda, kum arjaa plii som parnga kpha thung mhin inni piida.
Ungta ava diltha Mma ngi khulpu Samuel kpha thung, kekṭewl rek mhin inni piida.
Ava dilli mmaanni kruwng khat ṭhil lamda; kum som plii tumra, Benjamin sumkhur thungki miilai khat, Kish chapa Soul Isowr ri pii lamda.

Ungta Mma ngi kneng pthii thida, kruwngra Devid pii lamda; mma hin Mma ngi sakhi piida theda, ‘Nei kuplungril dil kṭoira miilai, Jessi chapa Devid, Neiji kphaak chaakka, mma ngi Nei kdo ngei mkheng ktlora.
Hava miilai charuwl thungki Isowr ri Isreel mii rek kaktlan pik rangki, mpaureel dok Jisu pṭouda.
Mma murjun dungi plungren hurda baptis ktlo ava Isreel miirek mkheng hin Johon ni paryaamda.

Ungta Johon ni mnongtlot mupṭut tiingtiing le, mma ngi theda, “Neia ku pi atidit inna? Neia Mma pmaang. Eme, pdainu nei kdil ṭoida karvang Miilai Khat ava mkhukok ri daat rapklua kparthle pikra neia kurhui chmaang.’
“Ku u knaorek, Abraham phungka chaparek, ungta naan arlakki Isowr kṭirek, nen nhinni hava tkirliinna paumin ava mdosii.

Mleija Jerusalem thung ka amrek, ungta mmaanki paamkpurek, ava ngi sabath nit ktai thung ngi mdopat in khulpurek ner dothe dok ava deipandi mda, mata mdotin ma lei inni, Mma mraal pii lamda hava lea kurkhum.
Mmaanni mdo aeyo nraanki mlei do khat lee pha lam mjoso, mmaanni mdo eayo nraanki Pilat hin ṭhil lamda.
Ungta Mma mlei thung ngi mdo kjit dokrek mkheng mpurkhum dok inle, ding leenki mmaanni hanpṭum lamda thlaan khat thung ngi alruwl lamda.
Pdainu Isowr ri kdiyou thungki pring pinleda;
Ungta Galil kingi Jerusalem tha kahang Mma tu kilṭhi miirek hin ktardetda, tuntunni mmaanni miirek hin sakhi kpii lam.
Ungu npahle hin Isowr paureel dok kṭha paumin ava neenni akuhur pik inna.
Hava Jisu mdo prin pinletti mnaoleen ava nen nhin purkhum da; laa miknitna thung rukva kjitda,
‘Nah Nei Kchapa pti, sniingi akupluk chaakka.’
Ungta kdiyou thungki mdo prin pinlet kat ava ngi kṭop ktobor thung ngi mkinlet kurnowl ma nra, hava ktongtha Mma ngi theda,
‘Neiji Devid ki mkindit kat Kchiir phowl kṭha apii nikaandi.’
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda laa murson thung rukva Mma ngi theda,
Nangki Kchiir Khat ava kṭop ktobor tipdee nimti.’
Mleija Devid ti mma mdak kat charuwl thung ngi Isowr ki karseel lop ava sok mlodok diltha, diyouda, ungu mpahle thlaan thung ngi alruwl lamda, ungta kṭop ktobor ava deida.
Pdainu Isowr do prin pinlet Mma va kṭop ktobor deime.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, ku u knaorek, naanni hava adei in, ditta hava Miilaiji mlei kurthuwkda, naan hinni pnurek kuptlot pik ava kdo paryaam chaak in.
Ungta Mousi Nowlam mii kintek mdo phaak chaak maan ava khim khai thungki krin cha miipum ktaiji kintek mphaak chaakka.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, khulpu rek dothe aleen thaanni mthlun ma nra, tuk kursut chaan; ava thu hanto theda:
‘Asuwn, ning ku uikma rek,
ungta ngak in ungu mawng chaan;
mleija naan mpha thu Neiji nong khat tlonu,
naan hinki nong ava ku mii khatti mthe thut chaakbi,
naanni rin chni maanti!’ ”

Mmaanni duwn mthuw slii arlaanni hava lea mvei knit naki sabath nitti mhin inni mdosaam pik nlamra mhin inni ktham ki kurkuk mkui in thungta, Jihudiarek leh Jihudia dhormo thung ngi plung klut mii knempokki Poul leh Barnabas dil ṭoi lamda, mmaan hin parseel lamda, Isowr wonsat thung ngi kdet liit kma ma am nraan parseel chlamda.
Mupduk niiva Isowr pauna karyaa ra khuwpii thungki mii mkheng thuwk kurkuk lamda.
Pdainu Jihudiarek ki miiluwngpa mdee in thungta, kheithe ngi dim chlamda, ungu Poul pauthe leek psuk lamda ungu ning er pauvi the psuk lamda.

Poul leh Barnabas ava ngi plung ktangar pauvi the lamda, “Rukri verri Isowr pauna ava naan hin katti tsaamra. Naanni naan thungki kṭuw knai kmaki rinkhu kpha chrang nga kurhui maanring diinti ado kṭewl lei inni, asuwn, ktlok chatirek hin kinle kchaan ping.
Mleija Mukpu ngi neen kihin hanto pau mreen pik inda, theda,
‘Dultipaam mdonna dek thung ngi kirliing mdo phaak chaak nraan, ktlok chatirek tummi mar awng khat akpurthuw inna.’ ”
Ktlok chatirek ki hava maryaak in thungta, kdung kanpa chlamda, ungu Isowr pauna punlor lamda, kṭuw knai kmaki rinkhu krin cha thung, mii knempok kchol khiin lamda.
Ungta Mukpu pauna ava paamkowl mkheng thung ngi kurjouda.
Pdainu takjat kirvei snurek ungta khuwpii thungki pselpa kinreel rek, Jihudia rekki ksop lamda kdung kut, lur ri Poul leh Barnabas tun kja kakham pii lamda, mpaamkowl in thungki reipthii lamda.
Pdainu mmaanni mmaanki mraal kpiingi mkhuwn tunki khu arbaat, kṭho pthii lamda, ungu Ikoniam tha vang lamda.
Ungta siikhu rekka pthla kchiir kdimmi kanpa chlamda.
Tunva Ikoniam thungki Jihudia rek synagog thung ngi lutve lamda, mpau lei inni mii knempok mikniing Jihudiarek leh Grik rekki rin chlamda.
Pdainu krin kma Jihudia rekki ktlok chatirek plung thung ngi mu u mnao in mraal mdo piik nraan kruw daal lamda.
Ava leiji mpha roi ksotti kcheeng lamda, Mukpu tummi plung ktangar ri pau lamda, Mma wonsatki pauna sakhi pii lamda, mkhut inni titinna rek leh tngana rek tlo lamda.
Pdainu khuwpii ava thungki miirek ava kinṭhen lamda; mii angṭhe ngi Jihudia rek ungu mii angṭhe ngi kenyee rek ktongtha am lamda.
Ktlok chati rek leh Jihudia rek mikniing ava ngi paamkpu rek tu kilṭhi ngi ningkja pii lamda, lung ngi kdeeng rangki mkurthlon in thungta,
mmaanni dei lamda ungbi Lykonia khuwpii leh Lystra ungu Derbe tha ungu marveelki khuwpaam tha kunthot lamda;
ungta ava tha kṭha paumin paryaam lamda.
Tunva Lystra thu mkhu ksinton kma miilai khat ku ong daat da; mma kchet pchaang liit kma kseekki ṭou chda.
Mma ngi Poul pausaam knaa tkiin rimda, ungbi Poul li mma suw rimda, ungu mdo rin chaakki kdam ra mdee thungta,
krowl kparyaa khatti theda, “Akhu arjiira rip.” Ungbi mma ngi kunthowm da chetda.
Ungta kurtuwl miirekki Poul nongtlot mdee in thungta Lykonia pauvi “Miilai kdujik mukpu rek nen narlak inni kurjung nga!” dilamda krowl kparthaang ngi the lamda.
Mmaanni Barnabas ava Yias di lamda, ungta Poul la kinreel li mpau leiji Hermes kdingi own lamda.
Ungta khuwpii maiṭhuwm ki Yias luwbuk inn thungki thiimpu ngi silrek leh reipṭhi ava paltong thung ngi arhai sinda ungta miirek tu kilṭhi ngi tlaaidown nuwm lamda.
Pdainu kenyeerek Barnabas leh Poul li ava maryaak in thungta, mdo mna in jen lamda miiluwngpa arlakki vachen lamda, owng lamda,

“Miirek, talu leiji hava atlot inna? neen rukka naan alulu miilai inping, mleija naanni do ksikma rek thungki, parwaan leh dulti ungu truwn leh do mkheng kseem kring Isowr ava hintha akinlet nraan hava kṭha paumin ado kuhur pik in.
Alraangki charuwl rek chati rek mkheng va mma mma dongeiji mche chaak in ava mdo rot pik;
anto daat joso mdaksaa ava sakhi ktaakki ma pthiime, mleija Mma ngi kṭha tloda parwaanki khuw tipra da ungu chasowm ado arve nraanki mkaal apiinda, aplung inna then leh kanpa ngi kdim kcha.”
Hava pauvi mhin inni tlaai kdown rangki ava kparsa langlang ngi neeng lamda.
Pdainu ava tha Antia leh Ikoniam ki Jihudia rek thleng lamda, ungu mmaanni miirek ksop lamda, Poul la lung ngi deeng lamda, kdiyou kcha a kdingi khuwpii duwntha ṭen pthuwk lamda.
Pdainu siikhu rekki muklop dok thungta, mma ngi kardelda khuwpii lutda; ungu mupduk nii ngi Barnabas tu kilṭhida Derbe tha vang lamda.
Mmaanni ava khuwpii thung ngi kṭha paumin paryaam lamda, siikhu knempok seem lam thida, Lystra ungu Ikoniam ungta Antia tha kinle lamda.
Siikhu rek plung tipnet pik lamda, krin cha thung ngi mkurnowl thlit daat nraan ksop lamda, ungta suwkthuw knempok ava ngi Isowr Kruwngpaam lut chenaan di kdingi the lamda.
Ungta rinlop ktai thung ngi mtum raan kver rek kchol khiin pik lamda, then ngowl lamda mdo ṭhil chaak intu kilṭhi ngi mdo rin chaak in ava Mukpu hin sil nlamda.
Ava dilli Pisidia arkaan lamda Pamphylia tha arvang lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Perga thung ngi pau msaam dok inle, Atalia tha jung lamda;
ava thungki mmaan do purkhum nong ava tummi Isowr wonsatti nong mdo sil naan mun Antia kphara arkuwng leen tuwng lamda.
Ungta mmaanni mthlun dok in thungta, rinlop own purkuk lamda ungu mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr nong tlot mkheng ungta tak heppi ktlok chati rek hin thurngot mapvan pik tditki pau song chlamda.
Ungta mmaanni siikhu rektu kilṭhi ngi mpha roiksotti kcheeng lamda.
Pdainu Judia ki kurjung mii angṭhe ngi, “Mousi nopa dil kṭoiji vunmor areen maanbi, kartlen pchaang nimaanti,” dilamda mu u mnaorek hin purchuk lamda.
Ungta Poul leh Barnabas ava ngi karteen ṭhi lamda, mkarteen naan hava pau mlei thung ngi Poul leh Barnabas ungta mii angṭhe kchol khiin lamda Jerusalem ki kenyee rek hin hansii lamda.
Ava leiji rinlop rekki lamtha han arda chlamda, ktlok chati rekki plung ren mdohur in ava son pik lamda Phonesia leh Samaria klaan lamda, ungu mu u mnaorek mkheng hin kanpa plung ngam pii chlamda.
Mmaanni Jerusalem mthlun in thungta, mmaanna rinlop ungu kenyee rek, kver rekki kowl chlamda, ungta mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr dotlot mkheng song chlamda.
Pdainu Pharisi rek lop thungki krin charek mii angṭhe ngi rip lamda, ungu the lamda, “Vunmor mdo reen kat raan, ungta Mousi Nowlam mdo arkhiik nraan pau tkham ra.”
Hava pau mlei thung ngi mkaryaak nraan kenyee rek leh kver rek thuwk kurkuk lamda.

Ungta mmaanni kdung mkarteen dil thaanni, Pitor ri ripda mhin inni theda, “Ku u knaorek, ktlok chati rekki nei kner thungki kṭha pauminki pauna ava aryaada, mdo rin chaak nraan, Isowr va chodu ngi naan arlakki mdo tukchol ava ado dee in.
Ungta plungril kdei Isowr ri sakhi kurthuwkda, nen nhin mdo tlot heppi, pthla kchiir pii chlamda;
ungta mmaan leh nen narlakki mkirthlei nra tlome, pdaiinu krin changi muplung inna partleuda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, tunva npah le daat ruk mata nen rukva tuhur pchaan maan bowr krik ava siikhu rek lowl tunni athiik inna, talu leiji Isowr apirsin naanna?
Pdainu Mukpu Jisu wonsat ti mmaan lulungi nen rukka tkartlen chaak raan kdingi neenni krin chaak inna.”

Ungta kurtuwl mii mkheng nga rim kdi am chda; ungta Barnabas leh Poul li ktlok chati rek arlakki, mmaanve thung ngi titinna rek leh tngana rek Isowr ri mdo tlot mson chaak in thungta aryaa tkiin rim lamda.
Mmaanni pau msaam dok inle, Jeems ava ngi arthawngda, “Ku u knaorek, mhai aryaak pik chaan.
Mma miing ngi mmaan thungki miilai khat mdolo nra, tak heppi Isowr va rukri ngi ktlok chati rekka mvel tdit Simeon ni theda.
Ava tu kilṭhi ngi khulpu rek do kjit dok pauna ava kulrot nlamda,
‘Hava diltha Neiji kinle nikdi,
ungu Devid amna mun ktluw kcha ava sa nowl nikdi,
kukrop kcha ava Neiji tiprip nikdi,
Mkekleem miirek leh Nei kmiing ngi,
mdo own ktlok chati rek mkheng ngi,
Mukpu mdo thlaam nraan leiji hava lea,
alraang Mukpu ngi tidet
dok da mdo the dok.’
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Isowr hin kinle ktlok chati rekka nenni owr chmaan che, dinu neiva kekṭewl chaakka.
Pdainu khut dosak pthla thungki kbuwr, ungta pang turkuiji kturkui ungu kakraak you saa ungta hii hava lim mdo kdaan nraan nenni kjit pik inche.
Mleija alraangki charuwl rek thungki kupṭhunni, khuwpii ktai thung ngi Mousi paryaam lamda, sabath nit ktaiji synagog thu ava pa lamda.”

Ava dilli mu u mnaorek arlakki berksu rek, ungta Barsabas mdodit Judas leh Silas mmaan thungki kchol lamda, Poul leh Barnabas tu kilṭhi ngi Antia tha mdosi nraan kenyee rek leh kver rekva rinlop mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi kṭha rangmo kdingi bin chlamda,
hanto kjit lamda puhur lamda: “A u anao in kenyee rek leh kver rekki, Antia leh Syria ungu Silisia ki ku u knaorek naan hin tha, akurvui chaak inna.
Neen kdo parseel maanni neen karlak inki mii angṭhe ngi, aplung in tipja lamda, pauna ava ngi aning in kmulla tdit neenni kdo aryaak lei inni,
neenni plung khdaat ti, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista tummi mrinkhu kvardeen kcha miirek,
neen kwonsat lo in Barnabas leh Poul tu kilṭhi ngi, miirek kdosi chaak in ava ngi kṭha rangmo kdingi kbin chaak inna.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, neenni Judas leh Silas ksii chaak inna, mmaan mdaksaa kat inki nerri anto jikki akthe pik chraan.
Mleija havale kheelli bowr krik aleen thaanni tithiik ma ngi kṭha ra diinnu pthla kchiir ruk neen rukva kbin chaak inna.

mleija naanni khut dosak pthla hinki tlaaidown thungki hii thungki ungta kakraak you saa leh pang turkuiji kturkui thungki akdaan chaan. Naan adaksaan thung ngi havale akdaan chaak inbi, kṭha kurthuwkra. Akthaan chaak inna.”
Ava leiji mmaanna sii dok lamda, mmaanni Antia tha jung lamda; ungta miirek purkuk lam thida, chethi ava parlaan chlamda.
Ungu mmaanni mpat in thungta, mdo kso lei inni kdung kanpa chlamda.
Ungta mdaksaan khulpu kurthuwk Judas leh Silas rukva mu u mnao rekka ksop lamda pauna knempokki ruptan pik lamda.
Ungta mmaan amṭhi bong lam thida, mu u mnao rekka mmaan ksiirek hin plung kdaaiji sii pinle chlamda.
Pdainu Silas ava maktaan daatti kṭha rangmo kdingi bin lamda.
Poul leh Barnabas ava Antia tha ktaang daat lamda, do knempok tu kilṭhi ngi Mukpu pauna purchuk lamda paryaam lamda.
Ungta mpha mruk diltha Poul li Barnabas hin theda, “Nenni Mukpu pauna tparyaam na khuwpii tha tak heppi ka am lamma kdingi ksuwra nu u nnaorek hin kvelra ndil kinle che.”
Ungta Barnabas va Mak tdit Johon ṭhi nuwmda.
Pdainu mmaanna Pamphylia thu ma pthii lamda nong thung ngi mmaan tu kilṭhi kma ava mdo ṭhi raanna ṭha memo kdingi Poul va binda.
Ungta kdung karteen nlamda, ava leiji khat leh khat kanṭhen lamda; Barnabas va Mak ṭhida Kupras kira arkuwng tuwngda,
pdainu Poul va Silas kcholda, mu u mnaorek ki Mukpu wonsat thu sil nlam thida psun chlamda.
Ungta mma ngi rinlop rek ruptan pik lamda ungu Syria leh Silisia klaan lamda.
Ungta mma ngi Derbe leh Lystra tha arvangda. Jihudia snu miilai khat ava chapa mmiing Timothi tdit siikhu khat amda; pdainu mpah ava Grik.
Mma ava Lystra leh Ikoniam thung ngi mu u mnaorekki kunton dokki mpau naan miilai.
Poul li Timothi ava ṭhi nuwmda; mmun hava thung ngi Jihudia rek ma am leiji vunmor reen pikda, mleija mpah Grik mii tdit mii mkheng ngi deida.
Khuwpii thu mmaanni mche slii chun inni, Jerusalem ki kenyee rek leh kver rek do kulrotna pau ava mdo dan nraan parlaan lamda.
Ava leiji rinlop rekka krin cha thung ngi ruptan pik lamda, ungta mnii ktaiki mii ava nem set setda.
Ungta Asia thung ngi pauna mdo saam raan pthla kchiir ri mdo mat leiji, mmaanni Phrygia Galatia paamkowl ava klaan lamda.
Ungta mmaanni Mysia raalpha tha marvan in thungta, Bethynia lut nuwm lamda, pdainu Jisu pthla ngi rot pik lam mda;
ava leiji Mysia klaan lamda Troas tha jung lamda.
Ungta jaanni mik kleng ngi Poul hin ktardetda: Masidonia ki miilai khatti ripda mhin ktham chda, “Masidonia tha mhai thlen pikra mhai bom chaan.”
Ungta mma ngi mik kleng tdit mdee thungta, mmaan hin kṭha paumin kparyaamra Isowr ri miitu own inna tdit dei innu, kuknotti neenni Masidonia tha ksun rangki thlaam innu.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, lam sekthleng ring ngi Samathas pha innu, ungta mupduk nii ngi Nepolis pha innu,
ava thungki ngi Romia khuwveen khat Masidonia paamkowl ki kinreel sii khuwpii Philippia tha arvang innu. Hava khuwpii thung ngi neenni niikhuw kcheeng bong innu;
ungta sabath nitti paltong duwnni kreng biing tha tiṭhil chaak na mun ka am munra kdingi va innu; ungta neenni ku ong innu snu rek kthuwk hin pausaam innu.
Ungta khuwpii ki mmiing Lydia mdo dit kning ngi ksen dona vaiklou, Isowr luwkbuk kcha snu miilai khat ava neen mkaryaak pik in thung ngi amda.

Ungu mma leh mphungka mkhengtu kilṭhi ngi baptis mlo in thungta, neen kihin mma ngi ktham da, theda, “Neia Mukpu krin kcha miilai khatti atikṭewl pik inta, nei ki inn tha mhai thlen pik inra, ungu am in.” ungta mma ngi kdung marchil chaanda.
Neenni kṭhil chra kche slii arlaan inni dil kira kthethuw, pthla kṭha kma doṭhi suwk owr nala khat kurdut ṭhiinnu, ungu mma ktlaa sutti mma kpupa rekka kdung do psit nlamda.
Mma ngi Poul leh neen kdil in ṭoida owngda, “Hava lea kirliinna lam kparyaam kparthaang sii ki Isowr sra owr rek lam.”

Ungta mma ngi hava mpha ksot thung ngi tloda. Pdainu Poul va plung kpur ri binda ungbi mdil kinle da pthla hin theda, “Jisu Khrista miing ngi neiji pau kakthamma mma thungki arvan thuwk dok.” Ungta ṭhang ava kat thung ngi arvan thuwk dokda.
Pdainu mma kpupa rekki mlam rin chaak in ava ksun dok mdee in thungta, mmaanni Poul leh Silas ava kjowng lamda, mii amna bajaar thung leh paam kpurek maiṭhuwmmi ṭhi lamda;
mmaanni kekṭewl rek hin ṭhi lamda the lamda, “Hava lea Jihudia mii rek lam ungu mmaanni nkhuwpii inna vawng muplum inna.
Romia mii nnenni karlaang kcha mata kupṭoi thung ngi Nowlam kleek nopa mmaanva mpurchu inna.”
Miiluwngpa ngi kurdutda mraal pii lamda, ungta kekṭewl rekva mdo mna in suwt pthii lamda, kchung ngi mdo bun nraan pau pṭum lamda.
Mmaanni bun dip ardip lamthida, rownginn thung ngi khum lamda; kuhuiji mdo arkhiik nraan kseelrek hin paukham lamda.
Mma ngi hava paukham arlaangda, rownginn korchip thung relli khum lamda ungu mkhuwnna dingthum bowl psuk mer lamda.
Pdainu thanṭim arveelli Poul leh Silas va Isowr laa the lamda ṭhil chlamda, ungu rownginn thu ka am rekva knaa tkiin lamda,
ungta tun kat daatti ringnaang kdung ngi thuwkda, ava leiji rownginn kcho tnokda; ungu thurngot rek mkheng kparvang teng chda, ungu mdobowl miipum ktaija karthlet tir chda.
Kseel miilai ava ngi kardelda rownginn thurngot kparvang mdee thungta, mdo khum rekka chen chpakda kdingi, mkaangksaang turthuwda mthina kurthun you rangki karsimda.
Pdainu Poul li krowl kparyaa ngi owngda, “Athina ngi kirlimma, mleija kikheng inni hava thu ka am daat in ping.”
Mma ngi meila ṭhilda kjaang ngi mvanlu thungta, mkunchun leh mṭitti Poul leh Silas maiṭhuwmmi tluwda,
Ungta duwn pthuwk lam thida theda, “Miirek, nei mdo taktlan nra tak tlo nikda?”
Ungta mmaanni theda, “Mukpu Jisu arin cha, ungu nang leh aphungka mkheng nga kaktlan pikra.”
Ungta mma leh mi inn thungki ka am mii mkheng hin mmaanni Mukpu pauna saam pik lamda.
Ungta ava jaanki ṭhang kat thung ngi, mma ngi ṭhi lamda, klim kbii alṭhut pik chlamda, ungu mpha ava kat thung ngi mma mdak leh mphungka mkheng nga baptis ptlot lamda.
Ava dilli mma ngi mi inn tha hunṭhi lamda; ungta then down pik lamda, Isowr mdo rin chaak inni mma ngi mphungka mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi kanpa chda.
Pdainu khuw mvar thungta, kekṭewl rekva pulis siida, the lamda, “Miirekka sun chlamso.”
Kseel ava ngi pauna ava Poul hinni songda, theda, “Kekṭewl rekki asun chaak nraan mii msia; ava leiji, tunva arvan thuwk inra kdaaiji sun chaan.”

Pdainu Poul li mhin inni theda, “Kekṭewl liit kma Romia mii neen ava miirek dodee ngi kandang ngi mbun in thida, rownginn thu mkhum inda, ungu tunva tuprutti mkupthuwk raanmo? Ronime! Mmaan mdaksaa kat inni arva lam sora mhai pthuwk inso.”
Hava pauna rek ava pulis rekki kekṭewl rek hin song lamda, mmaan rukka Romia miirek lam tdit maryaak in thungta ṭi chlamda;
ava leiji mmaannii arva lamda ktham chlamda. Ungta mmaanni ṭhi pthuwk lamda, khuwpii mdo maak nraan ktham chlamda.
Ava leiji mmaanni rownginn thungki thuwk lamda Lydia vel lamda; ungu mmaanni mu u mnaorek mdee in thungta, ksop lam thida sun chlamda.
Tunva mmaanni Amphipolis leh Apolonia klaan lamda Jihudia synagog khat amna Thessalonikia tha arvang lamda.
Ungta Poul li mma nopa ngi lutda, hapta kdum chak thung ngi laaika thungki karteen psukki,
the pjiir pik lamda, mleija Khrista ngi kja kakham mparteel diltha kdiyou thungki mrin kinlet kat ra, ungu theda, “Neiji naan hinni kdo paryaam Jisu ava Khrista hava,” dida.
Ungta mii angṭhe ngi plungren hurda Poul leh Silas ṭoida; ava lulu ngi plung klut Grik miirek knempok leh kinreel snu rek maknem rukva anto tloda.

Pdainu Jihudia rekki kheithe nlamda, ungta kṭha kma doksi kmarek knempok purkuk lamda, khuwpii thu vawnglum t,lur lamda, ungu Joson inn duwl lamda, mmaanna miirek hin duwn mdo pthuw nraan thlaam lamda.

Ungta mmaanni mphaak maan thungta Joson leh mu u mnaorek angṭhea khuwpii ki rutan kthloi rek maiṭhuwm mi ṭen pthuwk lamda, owng lamda, “Dultipaam kpurlup kparthel miirekka hava thang rukva kthleng lamma.
Ungta mmaanna Joson ni kowl lamda, ditta Jisu tdit ktlok Kruwng ka am dilamda, mmaan mkheng ngi Keisar paudon tunni mraal kpii ki nong tlo lamda.”
Ungta miirek leh khuwpii ki rutan kthloi rekka hava maryaak in thungta mning in mulda.
Ungta Jason leh mmiiṭhi rekka summi parthleng lamda, mmaanni psun lamda.
Mu u mnao rekki Poul leh Silas ava kuknotti Beria tha jaanni siidok lamda; ungta mmaanni mthlun in thungta, Jihudiarek synagog thung ngi lut lamda.
Tunva hava Jihudia miirek ava Thessalonikia ki miirek hinva plung kuprol kurthuwkda, mleija pauna ava kdung ngi arngai chlamda, hava lea antomo kdingi mnii ktaiji laaika tu suwpurtol lamda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, mii knempok takjat kirvei Grik snurek leh pselrek tu kilṭhi ngi rin chlamda.
Pdainu Thessalonikia ki Jihudia rekki Beria thung rukva Poul li Isowr pauna mparyaamma tdit mdee in thungta, ava thang rukva thleng lamda miiluwngpa ksinchaak ki ksop lamda.
Ava dilli mu u mnaorek ki Poul la kuknotti truwn lamtha siidok lamda, pdainu Silas leh Timothi ava thang ngi ktaang daat lamda.
Poul kda kcha rekva Athenia kpha lamkla ngi da chlamda, ungta mrot khim khai thu Silas leh Timothia ngi kbeiji mma mdo phaak nraanki paureenda, mmaan ava sunlamda.
Tunva Poul li Athenia thu mmaan karda slii ngi, khuwpii thungki khut dosak pthlarek deida kdung ngi muplung purda.
Ava leiji mma ngi synagog thung ngi Jihudia miirek leh plung klut rek tu karteen nlamda, ungta bajaar mun thung rukva mmangi mdo kurdut ṭhi thok hin karbiik ṭhira mnii ktaaiji chetda.

Kinreelli kurchuk Epikuria leh Stonikia mii angṭhe rukva karteen ṭhida. Ungta mii angṭhe ngi theda, “Paukpur nuwm mii hava va tak mthea?” Murson rekki theda, “Mma paam ktlokki Isowr kparyaam hep daatta.” Mleija mma ngi Jisu leh mrin karheelna paryaamda.
Ungta mmaanni mkhut kjowng lamda Areopags tdit (khuwpiiki karseel lop) thu ṭhida, the lamda, “Nah dothe pauren ado purchu slia neenni kdodee kromo?
Mleija nang ngi neen kaknaa thuwnni msik liklik pau thetinu, ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, havalea tak adothena tdit kdee nuwm inna.
Tunva avatha ka am Atheniarek leh paamktlok ki miirek mkheng ngi kpau mata pauren karyaa kma donle mmaanni do khat lee ktlokma mpha partlai lamda.
Ava leiji Poul li Areopags mdodit (karseel lop) ṭim mi ripda, theda, “Athenia miirek, naanna mlam khim khai thung ngi Isowr hin plung klut tdit neiji kdee chaakka.

Mleija neiji tlowngnu naan luwbuknaa ava suw rimnu, suwlbuwr tun rukva hanto tikjit neiji pha chnu, ‘Tdeema mukpu hin.’ Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, naanni kdeikma luw adobuk in hava neiji akparyaam pik inna.
Dultipaam leh mthungki khim khai kseem Isowr ra parwaan leh dulti ki Mukpu kurthuwk, khut dosak kukdown inn thung ngi ame,
Mma ngi do khat lee mdo kriin maleiji, dulti mii khutti sok tulo pik nrangki arleek set do ame, mleija Mma mdaksaa ngi mii mkheng thung ngi rinkhu leh tdaal ungu do khim khai pii chda.
Ungta Mma ngi khdaat thungki dulti mii chati khim khai, dultimai leen ma am nrangki seem pikda, mpha palreen pik lamda, ungu tilrii jam pik lamda,
ditta mmaanni Isowr thlaam lamda, Mma bin psukda mdo phaak chaak nraan kurthuwk. Anto daat joso Mma nen miipum ktai thungki lam karlat me.
Mleija, Mma thung ngi am min nenni kring ngi,
kchet ktlowng tphaak chaak in;
naanki pauril kikjit mii angṭhe rukva hanto the da,
‘mleija nenna Mma charuwl kat in pmin.’
Isowr charuwl nenni nkurthut inbi, Isowr ava jeering mata, thiir kpowl, mata dimknei leh miilai poibin ava ngi makchang tpurdon susu kro pakda kdingi nenni bin maanche.
Tdee panditma ki mpha thungva Isowr ri lee mdo sut daak, pdainu tunva Mma ngi mii mkheng nga mmun ktai thung ngi plungren kuhurki pau mdo reen pik,
mleija Mma do kchol khiin miilai khatti dultipaamma rinkindit do kṭewl li mdo kṭewl nrangki nii khat palreenda, ungta kdiyou thungki mdo prin pinlet ava ngi mii mkheng nga rinkindit pii chda.”
Tunva mmaanni kdiyou thungki kring karheel maryaak in thungta, mii angṭhe ngi pnii chaakda; pdainu murson rekva theda, “Hava mlei thung ngi neenni aryaa chnowl inni.”
Ava leiji mmaan arlakki Poul li duwn thuwkda.
Pdainu mii angṭhe ngi mdil ṭoida ungu rin chlamda, krin cha rekka mmaan thungki Areopags Dionias leh mmiing Damaris mdodit snu miilai khat ungta mma tu kilṭhi ngi angṭhe rek ruk ka am.
Hava diltha mma ngi Athenia ma thida Korinthia tha vangda.
