Ungta mma ngi Pontas ki mmiing Akuila mdodit Jihudia miilai khat kurdut ṭhida, mma ava mnumei Prisila tu Italy ki kukto ngi arvangda, mleija Jihudia mii mkheng ngi Romia mdo maak nlamra Kloudia ngi pau pṭumda. Ungta mmaan ksuw vada;
ungu mnong tlot in mkurdut jik leiji amṭhi lamda, nong kmei lamda, mleija buwinn ksarek lam.
Ungta sabath nit ktaiji synagog thung ngi karteen lamda, ungu Jihudia rek leh Grik rekki plungren mdohur nraan tloda.
Silas leh Timothi ngi Masidonia ki mthlun in thungta, Jisua Khrista ava pi dida Poul va Jihudia miirek hin sakhi piida kparyaam thung ngi muplung plutda.
Mmaanni ro mda mrai chaak in thungta, mma ngi mbuw kṭhik thida mhin inni theda, “Aluw tun inni ahii in am chaso! Neia parmak maang. Tunii ki kupṭhunni ktlok chati rek hin chet chnikdi.”
Ungta mma ngi mun ava mathida, mmiing Titia Jastas mdodit Isowr luwkbuk miilai khat ava inn tha vangda, mma inn na synagog tnel tekda.
Synagog paamkpu Krispas, ava ngi mphungka mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi, Mukpu rin chda; ungta Poul hinni knaa ktikiin Korinthia mii knempokki rin chda ungu baptis ruk lou lamda.
Ungta Mukpu ngi jaankhat ti Poul hinni mik kleng ngi theda, “ṭi ma, pdainu pau asaam, rim kdi amma;
mleija Neiji akṭhi daatta, ungu ku mii khat lee ngi nah aplim nime; mleija hava khuwpii thung ngi mii knempok kdo thloi.”
Ungta mma ngi kum khat thla truk marlak inni amda Isowr pauna purchukda.
Pdainu Gallio ngi Akhaija paam kpu mkurthut thungta, Jihudia rekki plung kinṭimmi Poul kjowng lamda, kekṭewl maiṭhuwm mi arvanṭhi lamda,
the lamda, “Hava miilaiji Nowlam parthleng jek arjekda miirekki Isowr luw mdobuk nra marchilla.”
Pdainu Poul li mta atdut arlaanni Gallio ngi Jihudia rek hin theda, “Mdo parma mata kṭha kma mdo tlot ma ambi, neiji ado kdiil ṭhi nraanki mlei ka amra, O Jihudiarek;
pdainu pauna rek ungta miingrek ungu naan adaksaa kat inki Nowlam mlei thu ado khewl in mkurthut leiji, naan adaksaan ni asuw chaan, havale tunni kṭewl nuwm maang.”
Ungta mma ngi kekṭewl mun thungki rei pthii lamda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng ngi synagog paamkpu Sosthenis kjowng lamda, ungu kekṭewl mun maiṭhuwm mi bun lamda. Pdainu Gallio va ning pu uilamme.
Ava diltha Poul li niikhu ksaang betti kcheeng thida, mu u mnaorek mada, Prisila leh Akuila ṭhida, Syria kira arkuwng tunni tuwng lamda. Mpaureel dok leiji Kenkhria thu mluw ngeuda.
Ungta mmaanni Ephisia tha arvang lamda, ava thu mmaanna ma lamda; pdainu mma mdaksaa ava synagog thung ngi lutda, Jihudia rek karteen ṭhida.
Mmaanni mpha roi ksot bong ngi mdo amṭhi nlamra maktham chaak in thungta mat da;
pdainu mmaan hinki ksunni theda, “Isowr dongei mkurthutbi, naan hin kdil kinle nikdi,” Ungta mma ngi Ephisia ki arkuwng tun ni tuwngda.
Mma ngi Kaisaria mthlun thungta, rinlop tha hangda arvui chlamda, ungu Antia tha jungda.
Mpha mruk ma am diltha, mma ngi Galatia leh Phrygia paamkowl mun ktai thu tlowngda siikhu rek ruptan pik chda.
Tunva Alekjandria ki mii mmiing Apollo mdodit Jihudia miilai khat Ephisia tha arvangda. Mma ava mner kjaang laaika maalam kdei kurthuwkda.
Mma ava Mukpu lam kurchuk dok ksa; ungta kdung plung klutti Jisu mlei thung ngi purchukda, anto daat joso Johon baptis tlot hehe daat deida.
Mma ngi synagog thu plung ktangar ri kpau pṭhunda; pdainu Prisila leh Akuila ngi maryaak in thungta, Isowr lamma kheel betti karmang betti the pjiir pik lamda.
Mma ngi Akhaja mphaak nuwm thungta, mu u mnaorek ki ksop chlamda, ungu siikhu rekki mdo kowl chaak nlamra kjit lamda. Mma ngi mthlun thungta plungnee krin cha rekka kdung ngi bom chlamda,
mleija Jisu ava Khrista dida mma ngi laaika rek tdetda, miirek dodee ngi Jihudia rekka kapchaiji pngam dok lamda.
Apollo ngi Korinthia thung ngi ma am daat arlaanni Poul va tun ktongki khuwpaam klaanda Ephisia tha arjungda. Ava thung ngi siikhu rek angṭhe pha lamda.
Ungta mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Naanni arin chaak in thungva pthla kchiir arlaan inmo?” Ungta mmaanni theda, “Eme, pthla kchiir khat ka am tdit neenni aryaa chliit maan ring.”
Ungbi mma ngi theda, “Ava mkurthut tu tva tha baptis alo inda?” Mmaanni theda, “Johon baptis tlot na thu.”
Ungta Poul li theda, “Mma dil ṭoida karvang Jisu ado rin chaak raan dida miirek hin theda, Johon va plungren kuhur ki baptis mdo ptlot.
Hava maryaak in thungta mmaanni Mukpu Jisu miing ngi baptis tlo lamda.
Ungta mleen thaanni Poul li mkhut mkhiin pik lam thungta, pthla kchiir mleen thaanni arjungda, ungu mmaanni pleiji pau lamda, pauphuwng lamda.
Mmaan mkheng nga sowm leiknii arveel lam.
Ungta mma ngi synagog thung ngi lutda, Isowr Kruwngpaam mlei thung ngi karteen ṭhi lamda ungu archil lamda thla kdum lik thung ngi purchuk lamda.

Pdainu mii angṭhe ngi plung kapchaiji mdo rin ma lei inni kurkuk loprek maiṭhuwm mi pau kṭha kma mdo the lei inni, mmaan arlakki siikhu rek angṭhe ṭhida sun chda. Ungta mnii ktaiji Tyranias mdodit karteenna inn thung ngi karteen ṭhi lamda.
Hava kum knii thung ngi kurnowl thlit da, ava leiji Asia thu ka am mii mkheng Jihudia rek leh Grikrek mikniing ngi Mukpu pauna aryaa chlamda.
Ungta Isowr ri tatlot pchaan liit mara tngana rek ava Poul khut ti ptlotda.
Ava leiji mma mdaksaa ki buwlaak, mata mdona ava kukoi rek hin sin lamda, ungu mu omlai thuwnki dam lamda, ungta mmaan thungki kṭha kma pthla rekka duwn thuwk chlamda.

Ava dilli pang tlowng ngi ktlowng Jihudia rek mii angṭhe ngi pthla kṭhakma rek luna miirek hin mhaimeeng inni Mukpu Jisu miing ktham psuk lamda, “Poul doparyaam Jisu miing ngi pau kupṭum inna,” kdingi the lamda.
Jihudia rek thiimpu kparthaang chapa rek tikheuvi hava tlo lamda.
Pdainu pthla kṭhakma rekki mhin inni arthawngda, “Jisua kdee in ungu Poul ruk kdee in; pdainu naanna kule in pti?”
Ungta pthla kṭhakma amna miilaiji mleen thaanni kunchowmda, mkheng kheng inni kjuwm tapda rutan pnen pthii lamda, ava leiji mmaanna inn ava thungki mchai daat inni, klimmi chen chlamda.
Ungta hava Ephisia thu ka am mii mkheng, Jihudia rek leh Grikrek mikniing ngi dei lamda, ungta mmaan mkheng leen kṭi amda; ungu Mukpu Jisu miing nga kdung kurjouda.
Tunva krin charek arlakki mii maknemmi thuwkda, mnong tlot in kṭha kma thethuw chlamda pandang lamda.
Ungta haimeeng kthloi mii knempok rukva mlairik in purkuk lamda, mii mkheng dodee ngi meithung ngi buwng pthii lamda, ungu mmaanni mman ava mtai in thungta, thiir kpowl sum pun somparnga.
Ava leiji Mukpu pauna ava kurjouda kdung ngi tang setsetda.
Tunva hava nongrek mṭut dok diltha, Poul li Masidonia leh Akhaja klaanda, Jerusalem tha mhun nrangki muplung bin theda, “Neiji ava tha hung thinira Romia ruk kdodee ma rome.”
Ungta mma ngi mma kbom cha rek miilai knii, Timothi leh Erastas ava Masidonia tha sii lam thida, mma mdakka Ephisia thung ngi mpha mruk tummi kcheeng daatda.
Mpha ava arveel bing thung ngi lam mlei thu kdung kut,lur amda.
Mleija mmiing Demetria mdodit thiir kpowl ksa miilai khatti Artamia kukdown inn ava thiir kpowlli sada, dimdowl klourek hin mnong in knempok piida.
Mma ngi nong mdo ptlot miirek own purkuk thida, theda, “Miirek hava dimdowl klouvi alrou knempok tphaak chaak in ava naanni ado dee in.
Ungta khut dosak isowr rekka isowr pme, dida Poul li Ephisia rek hin daat kma Asia mmun mkheng thung ngi tlowngda mii knempok mdo archil dok ava naanni dei inti ado aryaak in.

Ungta nenki sumdowl lona ava khusiir parthit nrang daat kma, nkho ndan in ruk ka amra. Ungta Asia paam leh dultipaam mkheng ngi luw mdobuk klin langlang isowrnu Artamis luwbuk inn rukka dosinime, ungu mkunlor rukka mma thungki kukrowt chra.”
Mmaanni hava maryaak in thungta, kdung reenni plung pthit lamda, ungu owng lamda, “Ephisia Artemis ava klin langlang!”
Ava leiji khuwpii ava kdung ngi plung chei karche chowp chda; ungu ktlowng thung ngi Poul doṭhirek, Masidonia ki Gajas leh Aristarkas howl lamda kumhai inn thung ngi namduwl lamda.
Poulva miiluwng rek arlakki chet nuwmda, pdainu siikhu rekki mat lamda.
Asia ki mii angṭhe mma ngi kdung ngi plap mdo kurthut ṭhirek rukva kumhai inn thung ngi maktardet ma nra mii siilamda ktham chlamda.
Tunva mii angṭhe ngi ktlok khat, angṭhe ngi msik liklik khatti owng lamda; mleija kurtuwl miirekka plung kinṭhen chowp chda, ungta mii maknemva mkurku naanki mlei ruk dei lamme.
Miiluwng rek angṭheva Jihudia rekki mdusuk inni mdo namduwl in Alekjander pakda kdingi bin lamda. Ungta Alekjander va miirek hin mkhut haida kirthe ploi chda.
Pdainu mma Jihudia mii tdit mdee in thungta, ṭhang knii arveel klutti mkheng inni krowl khdaatti owng lamda, “Ephisia Artemis ava klin langlang!”

Ungta khuwpii thungki lairik nong ktlo lik mma ngi miiluwngpa rekka pdown pthii lamda, mma ngi theda, “Ephisia miirek, Ephisia khuwpii ava klin langlang Artemis leh parwaanki ktla tuprut ki lung luwbuk inn karkhii pi tdit kdeikma ku ka am in ptida?
Havale kro kmara ame tdit adei inra, rim kdi amchaan ungu kuknot reenni do khat lee tlo maan.
Mleija naanki luwbuk inn thungki ruk kulrowt kma mata mukpu nuh ruk kjowm cha kma hava miirekka aṭhiinna.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Demetria dimknei rekki ku mii khat hin mraal mpiik inbi, kekṭewl inn ava kparvang nga, ungu ava thung ngi paam kpurek ka am lam; mmaanni khat leh khat mraal kirpii chlam so.
Pdainu naanni murson athlaam inbi, ava paamki kunpun lop thung ngi kṭuw rora.
Mleija snii ki kthuwk nong ava ngi khusiir tparthit naan kurthuwk ra, hava mlei thung ngi nenni sakhi tpiik pchaan in nime.”
Ungta mma ngi hava the thida kunpun lop ava psun pthiida.
Vawngklum mdown dok diltha, Poul li siikhu rek tumra mii siida, ungu ksop lamthida mmaan hinki kurlouda Masidonia kira sun chda.
Mma ngi hava marveel ki klaanda ungu kdung ngi ksop chlam thida, Kris tha arvangda.
Ava tha thla kdum amda, ungu Jihudia miirekki mma raal kpii ngi mkurthlon in thungta, mma ngi Syria kira arkuwng ktuwng slii ngi Masidonia klaanda mdil kinle nuwmda.
Beria ki Pirhas chapa Sepater; ungu Thessalonikia ki Aristarkas leh Sekandas; ungta Derbe ki Gajas leh Timothia; ungu Asia miirek, Titikas leh Trophimas, mmaanni mdil ṭoi nuwm lamda.
Hava mmaanni vang lamda Troas thung ngi marda daat inda,
pdainu thowl ktaak thenpen nit rek diltha arkuwng tuwng innu Philippia ki sun innu, ungta nii parnga thung ngi Troas tha arvang innu, ava tha nii tikheu kcheeng innu.
Hapta ki mnii khatna thok nitti, thenpen kupkuira neenni kthuw kurku in thungta, mupduk niingi msun nuwm leiji, Poul li pausaamda; ungta thanṭim kveiji mma ngi pauda.
Neen kukurku naan tuwn knung reep innka thungva meila knempok lengda.

Ungta mmiing Eutikas mdodit ksenao ava khirki bengi ku ongda; Poul li ksaang ngi mpau slii arlaanni iip dokda; ki iippi mdo pngam leiji, inn kchuwng mukdum na thungki arjung tlada ungu kdiyouvi chom lamda.
Pdainu Poul li jungṭumda mleen tpeeda, ungu arpom mer thida theda, “Plung pja maan, mleija mma thung ngi rinkhu ka am daatta.”
Ungta hangkal da thenpen khuida, ungu kmaal dok inle, roi ksotti khuw mtlei du khim khai pauda, ungta kurlouda sunda.
Ungta mmaanni ksenao ava kring ngi ṭhi lamda, ungu muplung ngam inna kṭowm tekka kurthuwk me.
Pdainu neenni kpanma betti Assos kira arkuwng tuwng innu, ava tha Poul lou nuwm innu, mleija mma mdaksaa ngi laan tha chet nuwmda.
Ungta neenni Assos thung ngi kukurdut in thungta, neenni tuwnṭhi innu Miletia tha arvang innu.
Ungta hanto howl innu ava thungki mupduk niingi Khias tha arvang innu; mupduk nii nowlli Samia nowr thiinnu; adai niingi Miletia tha arvang innu.
Mleija Poul li Asia tha makcheen ma nra Ephisia kaklaan arkuwng tuwng nuwmda, mleija mrot khim khai thu mma ngi Pentikos nitti Jerusalem tha ma am nra knotda.
Ungta Miletia ki Ephisia tha mii sida, ungu rinlop ki kverrek mma ngi ownda.
Ungu mmaan mthlen in thungta, mma ngi mhin inni theda,
“Neiji Asia thung ngi kal kikhiin daatki kupṭhunni, neiji naan arlakki tak heppi ka am ping tdit mpha ktai thu naan adaksaanni ado dee in,
plung kdowng arthli kbu, ungta Jihudia rek karsin chaakna ngi kja kcha tu kilṭhi ngi Mukpu sok kdolo chaak;
neiji do khat lee kṭheek kma naan akukthow ngi, miirek leh innbung ktai thu,
Jihudia rek leh Grikrek mikniing hin sakhi piinu Isowr hin plungren mdo hur nraan ungta nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista hin mdo rin chaak nraan paryaamnu kdo purchu naanni ado dee in.
Ungta tunva, asuwn, pthla dobowlli neia Jerusalem tha kuhung imping, ava tha nei kleenni tak kthuwk rang tdit dei chmaang.
Hava daat ditta khuwpii ktai thung ngi rownginn leh kja kakhammi mdo tardat daat, ava pthla kchiir ri sakhi mhai pii chda.
Pdainu neiki knong leh neiji Mukpu Jisu hinki kdo arlaan chaak knong tlot ava Isowr wonsatki kṭha paumin sakhi ngi kpurkhum chaakbi, nei krin khua mman kluva bin chmaang.
Ungta tunva, asuwn, neiji naan arlakki tlowngnu Kruwngpaam kdo paryaamna naan akheng inni nei kmai dei kurnowl chni maanti.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, naan akheng inki hii thung ngi neia kparmak pmaang dinu snii ngi sakhi kpiik chaakka.
Mleija Isowr dobin mkheng ava kṭheek liit kma ado kthe pik dok in.
Isowr mdak katki Chapa hii ngi mdo ren dok rinlop tuk ado sut nraan naan adaksaa in leh jao lop mkheng tuk ado sut nraan pthla kchiir ri ado tpiik chaak dok in.
Nei ksun diltha tkei kraang thleng donle jao loprek ṭheek nime tdit neiji kdea;
ungta naan asingreel kat in thungki mmaan dil kṭoi rangki siikhu rek ava ngi ahuwn chaak in donle kpau lamra.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda kum kdum lik thung ngi suwn jaan knai kma naan miipum ktai hin arthli kbu ngi kdown liik kma ado kpurchu in ava abin phaak inra cheek asin chaan.
Ungta tunva naanna neiji Isowr hin thang leh Mma plungnee ki pauna hin aksil naanna, naan akpunchoi raan ungu kpinchel dok naan akheng in thung ngi alrou ado tpiik chaak dok in.
Neiji ku khat lee hinki thiir kpowl mdit mata jeering mdit mata dona chang ptlaak maang.
Hava kukhut knii ngi nei kdaksaa leh kmiiṭhi rek kdo purdon chaak nra nong kdolo ava naan adak kat inni adodee in.

Do mkheng nga neiji ado ktidet dok, mleija Mukpu Jisu pauna kbin phaakki, kdung nong klouvi ksowl khatta ksowl kma khatti mdo bom nrangki, tak heppi Mma ngi mthe, ‘Karlaang cha hin va kpii cha ngi kheel sii ngi msuwkṭha.’ ”
Ungta mma ngi hava the dok thida, tardiilda mmaan mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi ṭhil chda.
Ungta mmaan mkheng ngi ṭap lamda Poul arpom lamda ungu put lamda,
mleija mmaanni mmai dei kurnowl lam nime dida mma ngi pauna mdo the dok leiji mii mkheng plung kurkhol da. Ungta mmaanni arkuwngpii kpha dekki da chlamda.
Ungta neenni mmaan kinṭhen ṭhi innu arkuwngpii leen tuwng innu, Kos kpha rangki lam kthi ring kṭoi in thungta, mupduk niingi Rhodes pha innu ava thungki ngi Patara pha innu.
Ungta klaanda Phonikia kpha rangki arkuwngpii khat tun tuwng innu neenni sun innu.
Kupras kandan na kphaak in thungta, malee ktongtha lep innu, Syria ktong kitha tuwng innu Tyr thlung innu, mleija ava tha arkuwngpii tunki dona kupṭum ra kurthuwkda.
Ungta siikhu rek pha chaannu, ava tha nii tikheu kcheeng innu. Jerusalem tha Poul mhan ma nra mmaanni pthla ngi the chlamda.

Ungta neenki niikhu sot dokda, neenni sun innu hanto kche slii in thungta, mkheng inni mnumei in leh mnaoleen ṭhi lamda, khuwpii duwn kpha dekki mda chaanda; ungu diibiing ngi tardiil innu ṭhil chthiinnu, khat leh khat karthaan innu.
Ava dilli neenni arkuwngpii tuwng innu sun chaannu, ungu mmaan ruk mi inn thaanni kinle chlamda.
Neenni Tyr ki diilam kchet kupṭut dok inle, Ptolemia thlung innu; ungta ku u knao in arvui innu nii khat kcheen ṭhi chaannu.
Mupduk niingi sun innu Kaisaria thlung chaannu, tikheu thungki miilai khat, paumin ksi Philip inn tha lut innu amṭhiinnu.
Ungta pau kphuwng mchanu rek miilai plii mma ngi thloida.
Neenni ka am bong arlaan inni Judia ki Agabas mdodit khulpu khat arjungda.

Ungta mma ngi kihin thaanni thlengda, Poul dona louda ungu mkhut mkhu ktuda, ungu theda, “Pthla kchiir ri hanto theda, ‘Hava dona kpu miilai ava Jerusalem thungki Jihudia miirekki ktu donle ungu ktlok chati rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthiira.’ ”
Neenni hava pauna rek karyaak in thungta, neen leh miirek ava ngi mma Jerusalem tha mhan ma nra ktham chaannu.

Ava dilli Poul li arthawngda, “Tak leiji ṭap inti kuplung apkui inna? Mleija neia rownginn thung ngi mdo tkhum rang daat kma, pdainu Mukpu Jisu miing ngi Jerusalem thung ngi kdiyou kpha thu kurthlong dok ping.”
Ungta kthlot mapchaan ma raan thungta, neenni ma pthiinnu, “Mukpu poibin kurthuwk so,” diinnu.
Hava nit rek diltha neenni kurthlong innu Jeruselem tha hang innu.
Ungta neentu kilṭhi ngi Kaisaria ki siikhurek angṭhe hanṭhi innu, mmaanni neen kthlun nraan kupras ki mii Mnason mdodit chodu ki siikhu khat inn thu mṭhi chaanda.
Neenni Jerusalem kthlun in thungta, ku u knaorek inni kanpa kanpa ngi mkowl chaanda.
Mupduk nii ngi Poul li neen mṭhiin da Jeems hintha vada; ungta kver rek mkheng nga am lamda.
Neenni kurvui chaak in diltha, mma nongtlot thung ngi ktlok chati rek arlakki Isowr dotlot ava khat khatti saamda.

Ungu mmaanni ava maryaak in thungta Isowr punlor chlamda. Ungta mmaanni mhin the lamda, “Neenki ku u knao in nang ngi ado dee, Jihudia rek arlakki krin kcha mii pun knempok ka am, mmaan mkheng ngi Nowlam thu plung plut lamme,

ungu mmaanni nah mlei thung ngi the lamda, mleija nang ngi ktlok chati rek arlakki ka am Jihudia miirekki mnaoleen vunmor mdo reen ma nra mata nopa mdo dan ma nraan, mmaanni Mousi mdo maak pthii nraan athe pi dilamda.
Ava mkurthutbi, tatlot rang nga talu da? Nah athlenna mmaanni karyaa mun lamra.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, neen kdothe ava atlo. Paukreel dok miilai plii ka am lam;

hava miirek aṭhira ungu mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi nah adaksaa kartleu cha, ungta mmaanni mluw mdo ngeu chaak nraan, mman apii chlam, hanto ngi nah mlei thung ngi mpau theen ava anto pme pdainu nah adak kat rukva Nowlam adanna tdit mkheng inni kdeira.

Pdainu krin kcha ktlok chati rek tumva, khut do sak pthla hin tlaai kdown thungki, hii thungki, kakraak you saa, ungu pang turkuiji kturkui thungki, hava mkheng mmaanni mdo kdaan nraan, neenni kṭewl innu chethi kdo pthlat dok in.

Ava dilli poul li miirek ṭhida, ungu mupduk niingi mdaksaa kpartleuda, mmaan mii pum ktaiji tlaai mdo down in kpha thu, kartleu nit rek ava tden kurkhum rang tdit kdeira, mmaan ṭhida luwbuk Inn tha hangda.
Mnii tikheuna mṭut tiing tiingle, Asia ki Jihudia rekki luwbuk Inn thung ngi ma am deida, kurtuwl miiluwng mkheng vawngplum lamda, mma kjowng lamda,

owng lamda, “Isreel miirek mhaibom chaan! Hava miilaiji mmun kteen thu miirek ungta Nowlam ungu hava mun rukka mraal kpiingi purchukda; ava daat kma, luwbuk Inn thu Grik miirek luṭhida, ungta mma ngi hava mmun kchiir ava kchou krepda.”
Mleija chodu ngi khuwpii thu mma ngi Ephisia ki Trophimas mdoṭhi dei lamda, ungta mma ava Poul li luwbuk Inn thu mdolu ṭhi kdingi bin lamda.
Ava dilli khuwpii mkheng nga vawnglum chechu daatda, ungta miirekki chen kurkuk lamda; luwbuk Inn thungki Poul kjowng lamda, ungu koknotti paltong rekka sul pthii lamda.
Ungta mmaanni ke eayoura mkirsim slii arlaanni, Jerusalem mkheng nga plung chei karche chowppa kdingi Romia rawlmii klin sii hin pauna thlengda.
Koknotti mma ngi rawlmiirek leh rawlmii berksu rek ṭhida juchen lamda; ungta mmaanni rawlmii klin sii leh rawlmii rek mdee in thungta, Poul mdo bun inna down lamda.
Ava dilli rawlmii klin sii ngi mma ava han kjowngda, ungta thiirri knii ngi mdobowl nraan paupṭum da. Mma kuda ungta tak mtlot tdit mhin pau khewlda.

Kurtuwl miirek thungki mii angṭhe ngi paukhat, ungu angṭhe ngi pau msik khat the lamda, owng lamda; ungta mpau inni vawng mlum reen thungta, mlei kat ava mmaanni dei mda, rawlmii innpii thung ngi mdo thiik nraan mma ngi paupṭum da.
Ungta mma ngi kal khat mkhiin thungta, kurtuwl miirekki marhai jaam reen leiji, mma ava rawlmii rekki kdomda;
mleija kurtuwl miiluwng rekki mdil ṭoida, “A eayou dok in,” kdingi owng lamda.
Poul la rawlmii innpii thung ngi kṭhi rangki mkurthlon slii arlaan inni, mma ngi rawlmii klin sii hin theda, “Nah hin pau khat the chnik mo?” Ungbi mma ngi theda, “Grik pau adee mo?
Ava mkurthuttu, haarvai knai tekki mii pun plii ṭhida nowm miira kbowk laiji kchet Egypt ki mii ava nang kma ptimo?”
Poul li arthawngda, “Neia Silisia thungki Tarsas ki Jihudia miilai ping, kthok sii khuwpii ki ping; akaktham chaakka, miirek hin pau chlap ni.”
Ungu mma ngi mrot pik thungta, Poul li kalṭum tunni ripda, miirek hin mkhut haida; rim kdi ma am in thungta, Hebru pauvi pauda, mma ngi mhin inni theda:
“Ku u knaorek leh kpahle, tun neiji naan amaiṭhuwm inni kdo the loi chaak ra ava mhai aryaak pik chaan.”
Ungta mmaanni Hebru pauvi mhin thaanni mpau maryaak in thungta, kheel betti rim kdi am lamda. Ungu mma ngi theda,

“Neia Silisia ki Tarsas thu kṭou Jihudia miilai khat ping, pdainu hava khuwpii Gamaliel khu ther ri klin ksaang, nenki npahle Nowlam dil kṭoiji kurchuk kcha miilai ping, snii ki naan alulu inni Isowr tummi plung klut cha ping.
Pselrek ungu snurek mikniing bowlnu rownginn thu parlaannu, kdiyou kpha thu neiji suwk pthuwk lamnu,

thiimpu kparthaang leh kver rekka neiki sakhi kurthuwk lam. Neiji Ku u knaorek hinkira, mmaan hinki chethi arlaangnu, Damaskas tha ka amrek suwk kupthuwk rangki, ungta bowlda Jerusalem kpha kdo ṭhilam nrangki ava tha kchet ping.
Neiji hanto chetnu Damaskas kphaak tiing tiingle, kunthun ṭim arveelli parwaanki mar awng klin langlang khat tun kat daatti lengda.
Ungta neia dul tun tluwnu, ungu krowl khatti, ‘Soul, Soul, talu leiji Neia atapjat chaakka,’ dida mdo the aryaa nu.
Ungta neiji arthawngnu, ‘Nah ku ptida, Mukpu?’ Ungta Mma ngi kihin theda, ‘Neia nah dopjat slii Nasareth ki Jisu ping.’
Tunva nei kmiiṭhi rekva mar awng nga deilam da, pdainu nei kihin kpau slii krowl khat ava aryaa lamme.
Ungta neiji thenu, ‘Neiji tak tlo nikda, Mukpu?’ Ungta Mukpu ngi kihin theda, ‘Kardelra Damaskas tha va, ungu ava tha anong tlot ra mdo purthlon mkheng nga akthe pikra.’
Ungta mar awng kleng reen ava ngi khuw kdee ma thungta, kmiiṭhi rekki kukhut tha mṭhi lamda, ungu Damaskas thu valut innu.
“Ungta hava tha ka am Jihudia rek mii mkheng ngi kunton siingi mpau naan, Nowlam dil kṭoiji plung klut miilai khat Anania ngi,
kihin thlengda, kbetha krip daatti theda, ‘Ku u knao Soul, kvaar adei cha,’ Ungta ṭhang ava kat thung ngi khuw deinu ungu mma ava dei chnu.
Ungta mma ngi theda, ‘Nenki npahle ki Isowr ri Mma dongei adodee nra atukchol khiinna, kindit Mma deida, ungu Mma ner thungki krowl khat ado aryaak nra;
mleija mii mkheng hinni adodee leh ado aryaak ava sakhi pii nadi.
Ungta tunva talu leiji ardat daatta? Erip rang ngi baptis atlo, ungta apnu tonrek alṭhu pthii thira, Mma miing a own cha.
Neiji Jerusalem tha kdil kinle nu, ungu luwbuk Inn thu kṭhil chaak slii thungta, mik kleng ngi
neiji Mma deinu, ungu kihin theda, ‘Kbeiji ungta kuknotti Jerusalem thungki thuwk dok, mleija Neiki rinpaumin thu mmaanni aju arlaan pik nime.’
Ungta neiji thenu, ‘Mukpu, Nah akrin cha miirekka synagog khim khai thungki kjowngnu rowng inn thu daalnu kdobun lam tdit mmaan mdaksaan katti mdodee in.
Ungta Stiphan hii mthuw mpha thu, nei rukka rip daatnu, ungu mma ke eayou rek dona neiji kdo arkhiik.’
Ungta Mma ngi kihin theda, ‘Sun dok; mleija ktlok chati rek hin lamkla ngi Neiji asii nikdi.’ ”

Mmaanni mma pauna ava hava kpha lim aryaa lamda; ava dilli mmaanni krowl khdaatti owng lamda ungu the lamda, “Hava dultipaam thungki antolu hep kdu miilai ava a eayou in! Mleija mma ava mrin rang pme.”
Ungta mmaanni owng lamda, mdona in suwt lamda ungu vaiphul mpunthowm in thungta;
rawlmii klin sii ngi rawlmii innpii thu, mdo arvan ṭhi nraan paureenda, ungta mraal kpii ngi tak lei ku owng lam tdit mdodee nrangki bunraida mdo parsin nraan paupṭumda.
Pdainu mmaanni saavun ringi mbowl in thungta, Poul li mma bengi krip daat rawlmii berksu hin theda, “Romia miilai khat ava kekṭewl kma pava kbun krai ava Nowlam dorot mo?”
Rawlmii berksu ngi ava maryaak thungta, mma ngi rawlmii klin sii hin vangda ungu mhin theda, “Nah tak ktlora kurthlong pti? Mleija hava miilaija Romia.”
Ava leiji rawlmii klin siingi arvangda ungu mhin theda, “Ki hin athe, nah Romia miilai khat ptimo?” Ungbi Poul li theda, “Oji.”
Rawlmii klin siingi arthawngda, “Neiva Romia mii kukurthut nra sum knempok kdo piik ma.” Poul li theda, “Pdainu neia Romia miingi kṭou ping.”
Ava leiji mma kparsin nrangki kurthlong rekka, kankai tir chlamda; ungu rawlmii klin sii rukka mma ngi Romia miilai khat mdobowl leiji ṭi chda.

Pdainu mupduk niingi, Jihudia rekva tak leiji mma mdo plaal in tdit mkindit deinuwmda, mma ava parthlet pthiida, ungta thiimpu kinreel rek leh karseel lop mkheng mkurku nra paureenda, mma ngi Poul la ṭhida mmaiṭhuwm inni tipripda.
Ungta Poul li karseel lop suw rim thida, theda, “Ku u knaorek, snii kpha thung ngi neiji Isowr maiṭhuwm mi kuplung bin mkheng thu kṭha ngi ka am kcha ping.”
Ungta thiimpu kparthaang Anania ngi mbengi krip rek hin mner tha mdo tpeen nraan paureenda.
Ava dilli Poul li mhin theda, “Kpowlli tulṭhut bang, Isowr ri nah akti peengra! Nowlam dil kṭoiji nei mkik ṭewlra ko ong thitinu, Nowlam liit kma pangi nei mkit peeng rangki pau apṭumma?”
Ungbi mbetha krip rekki theda, “Isowr ki thiimpu kparthaang nga nang ngi rai nmo?”
Ungta Poul li theda, “Ku u knaorek mma thiimpu kparthaang tdit neiji deimaang; mleija hanto kjitda, ‘Paamkpu tunni amii rekki kṭha kma mpau ronime.’ ”

Pdainu sadusi rek mii angṭhe ungta Pharisi rek mii angṭhe kurchou lamma tdit Poul li mdee thungta, karseel lop thung ngi mma ngi owngda, “Ku u knaorek, neia Pharisi rek chapa Pharisi miilai khat ping; kdiyou thungki kring karheel kdung reenni kdo arngai chaak leiji nea kja kcha ping.”
Ungta mma ngi hava mthe thungta, Pharisi rek leh sadusi rek arlakki mkalrai naan kurthuwkda; ungbi kunpun lop ava kanṭhen chda.
Mleija sadusi rekki theda, Mleija kring karheel mata Waantamsii mata pthla tdit ame; pdainu Pharisi rekva mkheng deida ungu ro lamda.

Ava dilli kheel siingi vawnglumda; ungta Pharisi rek lop thungki chukpu rek angṭhe ngi rip lamda pauvi karteen nlamda, “Hava miilai doparma do khat lee neenva pha maan ring. Mma hin pthla khat mata Waan tamsii khatti kthe ruk kro.

Ungta kdung reenki plung kthi ngi vawng mlum thungta, Poul ava mthum mthummi kjen pthi kro lam kdingi rawlmii klin siiva ṭida, rawlmii rekki juda mmaan arlakki namtrom mi lowngda rawlmii ki innpii thu mdo arhun ṭhi nraan paupṭumda.
Mupduk nii jaanni Mukpu ngi mbetha ripda ungu theda, “Plung apngar daat, mleija Jerusalem thung ngi Neiki sakhi ado piik lulungi, Romia thang rukva Neiki sakhi pii nadi.”
Khuw mvar thungta, Jihudia rekka kurthlong lamda mmaanni Poul me eayo dok du in khim khaiji chaanee nimaan ring kdingi mdaksaan kurbowl lamda paureel lamda.
Mii somplii kheelli paureel dok lamda.
Ungta mmaanni thiimpu kinreel rek leh kverrek hin chet lamda ungu the lamda, “Neenni Poul ke eayo dok duin khim khai then kdo chaak ma nraan kdaksaan kurbowl innu paukreel dok inna.

Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, naanni mma mlei thung ngi kṭha ngi karkhal nrang heppi ado arjun ṭhi nraan, karseel lop tu kilṭhi ngi rawlmii ki klin sii hin atheen. Ungta mma ngi murjun nai du liitti mma neenni eayou dok inni.”
Tunva mmaan dopthlim ava Poul chernu chapa murdupa ngi aryaa da; mma ngi rawlmii innpii thung ngi lutda Poul hin songda.
Ava leiji Poul li rawlmii berksu khat ownda ungu mhin theda, “Hava ksenao va rawlmii klin sii hin aṭhi psuk; mleija mma ngi mhin paukhat mson nuwmma.”
Ava leiji mma ngi rawlmii klin sii hin ṭhi paphaak da ungu theda, “Rownginn thu ado khum in Poul li hava ksenaova nah ado kpaphaak rangki mo ownda, mleija mma ngi nah hin paukhat mthe chaak nuwmma.”
Rawlmii klin sii ngi mkhut tha kjowngda ungu kensii tha ṭhi ptliing thida, khewlda, “Nei kihin tak the nada?”
Ungbi mma ngi theda, “Pduk niingi nang ngi Poul hin karman dokki pau kikhewl rang heppi karseel lop thung ngi ado ṭhi pthuw nra, Jihudia rekki nah hin mdo ṭhil nraanki pau kulrot ndok lamma.

Pdainu rot pik lamma; mleija mii somplii kheel dekki mma ava mipthlim inna, mma me eayo dok duin khim khaiji then kchaa knee tlo maanche kdingi mdaksaan kurbowl lamda pau mreel dok inna; ungta tunva mmaanni nah hinki pau mdo aryaak nraan leiji kurthlong dok lamma.”
Ava leiji rawlmii klin siingi ksenao va, “Nei kihin ado tithe pik ava ku mii khat lee hin songma,” dida mhin paukham da.

Ava dilli mma ngi rawlmii berksu rek miilai knii ownda ungu theda, “ṭhang kdum thung ngi Kaisaria kpha rangki rawlmii rek arjaa knii ungu skowl kthou mii som tikheu ungta kchei ksin mii arjaa knii tu kilṭhi ngi chet in.
Poul ava skowl aptuwng inra paamkpu Philiks hintha kuhui deekki adoṭhi paphaak nraan apurthlong in.”
Ungta hava mlei thung ngi mma ngi che khat kjit da:
“Kloudia Lysia ngi kinreel siiki paamkpu Philiks nah ahinni akurvui chaakka.
Hava miilaija Jihudia rekki kjowngda, ungu ke eayou rangki kurthlong lamda, mma ava Romia mii tdit neiji deinu, rawlmii rek tu kilṭhi ngi mmaan thungki kdo ktlan pik.
Ungta mmaan doplaal naki mlei deinuwm nu, mmaanki karseel lop thung ngi kdo juṭhi.
Mmaanki Nowlam mlei thung ngi mraal pii lamda, pdainu mdiyo nra mata rownginn thu ma am nrangki pau khat lee pre neiji pha chmaang.
Ungta hava miilai tunni mraal kpii ngi kurthlong lamma tdit karyaak thungta, neiji mma raal kpii rek rukka nah amaiṭhuwmmi mdo the nraan paupṭumnu, mma nah hinni kuknotti ksii chaakka.”
Ava leiji rawlmii rekki mmaan doparseel dil kṭoiji, Poul la lou lamda, jaanni Antipatria hin ṭhi lamda.
Ungta mupduk niingi skowl kthou miirekka mma tu kilṭhi ngi ma lam thida, mmaanni rawlmii innpii tha mdil in kinle lamda.
Mmaanni Kaisaria thlung lamda, ungu paamkpupa hin chethi parlaan lamthida, Poul rukka mhin pii lamda.
Chethi ava mma ngi pa thida, tva paamkowl ki tdit mma ngi khewlda. Mma ngi Silisia ki tdit mdee thungta,
mma ngi theda, “Araal kpii rek mthlunta neiji aju aryaa rolaini.” Ungta mma ava Herod lusang inn thung ngi mdo seel psuk nraan paureenda.
Nii parnga diltha thiimpu kparthaang Anania ngi kver rek mii angṭhe leh mner kjaang miilai khat Tertulia ṭhida arjungda. Poul ki mraal kpii rangki mmaanni paamkpu hin lusang tur oi lamda;
ungu mma mo own in thungta, Tertulia ngi hanto theda, mma mraal piida,
“Kinreel siiki Philiks, nang ngi kheel siiki kdaai mpaphaak chaan tinu ungta nah do purdonni hava chati rek kchang kdonni ado tpintiin pik lei inni,
mlam ktai thu, ungu mmun kteen thung ngi havaki plung kanpa mkheng tu kdo rot chaak in.
Pdainu mpha ado klo pik ma nra ktoi tekki ado taryaak pik nraan awonsat ra kaktham chaakka.
Mleija hava miilaija khusiir tparthit na khat, ungta dultipaam mkheng thu ka am Jihudia miirek hin pauvi vawng kuplum lik Nasareth lop berksu khatti amda.
Mma ngi luwbuk Inn ruk mdo kchou kre nra kurthlongda, pdainu neenni kjowng dok innu, neenki Nowlam dil kṭoiji kṭewl nikaan di.
Pdainu rawlmii berksu Lysia thlengda neen kukhut thungki nam trommi mlowng inda,
mma ki mraal kpiirek ava nah amaiṭhuwmmi mthlen nraan paureenda. Neenni mma ki mraal kdo piik naan khim khaija nah adak katti aparsin nabi, dei daat nadi.
Jihudia rek rukva hava khim khaija anto pi dilamda the tpom lamda.
Ungta paam kpupa ngi mpau nra mmik makcha psuk thungta, Poul li arthawngda:
“Hava chati rek tunni nang ngi akṭewlla tdit neiji kdo dee chaak leiji plung kngammi karthe loi chni.
Neiji Jerusalem tha luwkbuk ra kahan chaak ava nii sowm leiknii kheel mlai tdit nang ngi dei nadi;
Ungta mmaanni ku mii khat lee hin nei kdo karteen ṭhi mdit mata kurtuwl miirek vawng kdo plum ava luwbuk Inn thung daat don mata synagog rek thung daat don mata khuwpii thung daat don pha lamme.
Mdit mata mmaanni neiki kraal mdo tpiik naanki mlei kat ava pii pchaang lam nime.
Pdainu nah hinni hava kthe chaakka, mleija mmaanni karmak lop mdodit in ava Lam dil kṭoiji neiji nenki npahle ki Isowr luwbuk nu, Nowlam thu mata khulpu rek dokjit thu do khim khai rin chnu,
kindit rek ruk kindit kma rek ruk mikniing ngi kring karheelra dida hava mmaan mdaksaan kat rukva mdorot in Isowr ava hinni neiji kuplung kdo var chaak.
Ava leiji neiji Isowr hin ruk ungta miirek hin rukva plung kpanchel deekki ka am nra kja ngi plung kdo purdun chaak.
Tunva kum mruk diltha nei kchati rek hin chla ungu tlaaikdown chra kthleng cha ping.
Kurtuwl mii mata vawngklum ktaak liitti luwbuk Inn thu kartleu dokki hava kdotlot slii pha lamda. Pdainu Asia ki Jihudia miirek angṭhe am lamda.
Mmaanni nei kihin kraal mdo piik nraan ma ambi, mun hava thu nah amaiṭhuwmmi athe lamso.
Mdit mata hava miirek mdaksaan katti neiji karseel lop maiṭhuwm mi kri mpha thu kdo parma ma amta athe lamso.
Kdiyou thungki kring karheel mlei thu snii naan amaiṭhuwm inni ado tparsin naan hava krowl hanto daatti neiji mmaan arlakva krip ping.
Pdainu Philiks ava ngi Lam tdit mlei thu mkindit kat deida, “Rawlmii klin sii Lysia murjunta naanki mleija reelro laini,” dida the thida mnit sown pthiida.
Ava dilli mma kṭha deekki mdo seel psuk nraan, pdainu mplap rekki mdo kriin mdo purdon pik chaak nra, kintekki mdo thiik nraan, rawlmii berksu hin paupṭum da.
Ma am bong diltha, Philiks ava ngi mnumei Jihudia snu miilai khat kurthuwk Drusila ṭhida, Poul ku ownra mii siida, Khrista Jisu hin krin cha mlei thu mdo the pik karyaa ra arvada.
Ungta mma rinkidit ungu daksaa kjuwm ungta dilki kekṭewl mlei thu ngi mkarteen in thungta, Philiks va ṭida, ungu theda, “Hava mpha ki tumva sun; neiki mpha ma am thu a own laini.”
Poulva sum mikpii luwng rangmo kdi rukva binda. Ava leiji maknem thu mma ngi mii siida, ownda ungu karbiik ṭhida.
Pdainu kum knii mve dok thungta, Porsias Phestas ava ngi Philiks kchang donda; Philiks va Jihudia rek san nuwm da, Poul la rownginn thu ma daat da.
Tunva Phestas ava ngi mpaam thung ngi arvang lutda, nii kdum diltha Kaisaria ki Jerusalem tha hangda.
Ungta thiimpu kinreel rek leh Jihudia rek berksu miirekki Poul ki mraal the lamda, mhin ktham chlamda,
lamtha mmaanni pthlimda mdo eayo nraan, mma ava Jerusalem tha mdo hansii da mdosan nraan pau khewl chlamda.
Phestas ava ngi arthawngda, Poul la Kaisaria tha am daatda mma mdak katti ava tha kbeiji mjun nra theda.
Ava leiji mma ngi theda, “Naan arlakki rutan kthloi miirekki mjunṭoi lamso, ungu ava miilai do parma ma amta, mmaanni mraal kpii lamra.”
Mma ngi mmaan arlakki nii tret mata nii sowm kipkheel kma ambong thida, Kaisaria tha jungda; ungu mupduk niingi kekṭewl ko onna tunni ko ong thida, Poul mdo arvan ṭhi nraan paupṭumda.
Ungu mma marvan ṭhiin thungta, Jerusalem kikjung Jihudia rekki klop dok lamda, mlei kat ktaakki krik krik pau knempokki mraal pii lamda.
Poul karthe loi, “Neiji Jihudia rek Nowlam tun mata luwbuk Inn tun mata Kaisar tun mraal kpii ngi karmak nong tlo liit maang.”
Pdainu Phestas ava ngi Jihudia rek mdosan nuwm leiji, Poul hin theda, “Nang ngi Jerusalem tha hangda hava pau mlei thung ngi nei kmaiṭhuwmmi avatha aparsin nuwmma?”
Pdainu Poul li theda, “Neia paamkpu Kaisar maiṭhuwm mi krip daat ping, ava thung ngi ado tparsin kat raan; Jihudia rek hin neiji karmak nong tlo liit maang tdit nang ngi kminni ado dee dok.

Anto daat joso neiji karmak tloda ungu kdiyou kroki do khat ktlotbi; neiji kdiyou rangki karthlet ra thlaam maang; pdainu mmaanni kraal mdo tpiik lam thung ngi do khat lee ma am mabi, ku mii khat lee ngi neia mmaan hin mpii pchaang nime. Neiji Kaisar hin pau kdo naak dok.”
Ava dilli Phestas ava ngi karseel lop tu pau mkaryaak ndok diltha arthawngda, “Nang ngi Keisar hin pau ado naak dok leiji Keisar hin vangcha.”
Tunva niikhu mve bong diltha kruwng Agripa leh Barnis ava ngi Phestas dokowl rang ngi Kaisaria tha thlung lamda.
Ungta mmaanni niikhuw roiksotti makcheen dil thaan, Poul mlei thu Phestas ava ngi kruwng maiṭhuwmmi ṭhida, theda, “Philiks do maak daat rownginn thung ngi miilai khat am daat da;
ungta neiji Jerusalem thu ka am daat mpha thu, thiimpu kinreel rek leh Jihudia rek kver rekki, mma mlei thu kihin the lamda, mma mlei thu mraal kpii rangki mkhewl lamda.

Neiji arthawng lamnu, mleija mdo the psul in mii ava ngi kthe psul rek kurdut ṭhida mmaan dothe naki mraal mlei thu mkarthe loi du khim khai ku mii khat ti miilai ava mpiik dok bi ava Romia ki nopa pme.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, mmaanni hava thu mthuw kurku in mpha thu, neiva krem maang, pdainu mupduk niingi kekṭewl ku onna tunni ko ongnu ungu miilai ava mdo arvan ṭhi nraan pau pṭumnu.
Mraal kpii rekki rip lamda mma mlei thung ngi neiji kṭha kma ngi kdobin hep luluva khat lee the lam mda;

mmaan karteenna ava, mmaanki dhormo mlei thu, Jisu tdit miilai khat, kdiyou thungki ava Poul li kring karheel pi dida, mdothe ava mmaan poibin thung ngi mdo purthun susu in thung ngi karteen psuk lamda.
Hava le mlei thu neiji tak heppi khewl nikda dinu, mma ngi Jerusalem tha hangda ava mlei thung ngi mpirsin nuwm mo dinu khewl nu.
Pdainu Poul li paamkpu kinreel dobin dil kṭoiji, mdo seel psuk nraan mthe thungta, neiji mma ava Kaisar hin ksii du khim khai mdo seel psuk nraan paureennu.
Ungta Agripa ngi Phestas hin theda, “Nei kdaksaa katti mii ava karyaak nuwmma.” Mma ngi theda, “Pduknii ngi mhin aryaa nadi.”

Ava leiji mupduk niingi Agripa leh Barnis ava ngi marchaang klin ni rawlmii ki klin siirek leh khuwpii ki klinksaang rek tu kilṭhida mii kurtuwlna inn klin thu lut lamda. Ava dilli Phestas ti Poul mdo arvan luṭhi nraan pau pṭumda.

Ungta Phestas ti theda, “Kruwng Agripa ungu hava thu ka am nen nkheng, Jerusalem leh hava thu ka am Jihudia miirek mkheng ngi nei kihin mlei mdo kjit in miilai ava asuwn, mleija mma mrin bong rang pme kdingi owng lamda.
Pdainu mma ngi mdiyo nrangki do khat lee neiji pha manu, ungta mma mdaksaa rukva paamkpu kinreel hin pau mdo naak dok leiji, mma kdosi dok nra reel dok nu.

Pdainu neiki paam kpupa hin mma mlei thu kdo kjit kat ra do khat lee am mda. Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, naan amaiṭhuwm inni kṭhi pthuw chaakka ungu kinreel siingi kruwng Agripa, nenni mma npirsin ndok dil thaanni, neiji mlei mruk kdo kjit chaak rang nga kpha cha kro ping.
Mleija rownginn thungki miilai khat ava mma ki mraal kikjit pik kma nsii pthiibi, ava dosi nime mo kdingi bin chnu.
Agripa ngi Poul hin theda, “Nah adaksaa ki tummi kpaura akrot pikka. Ava dilli Poul li mkhut haida karthe loi chda:
“Kruwng Agripa, Jihudia rek mii mkheng ngi nei mdo tithe psul nlam, ava nah amaiṭhuwmmi snii ngi kdo theloi chaak rang leiji ksuwkṭha changi kirbin kchaam ping,
mleija nang ngi Jihudia rek leh pau kthuwk mkheng ado tdee pik ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, nei kpausaam karyaa thung ngi ado tdiil pik chaak nra kaktham kcha imping.
“Neiji keksenao ki kupṭhunni kdaksaa katki kchati rek arlakki Jerusalem thung ngi ka am kcha ping, Jihudia rek mkheng ngi ava mdodee dok.
Mmaanni sakhi mpiik nuwm inbi, mpha roiksot thung ngi mmaanni mdodee in, mleija neenki dhormo thu knet merri Pharisi miilai khatti ka am cha ping.
Ungta tunva neen kpahle hin Isowr paureel dok ava kdo arngai chaak leiji mdo kṭewl rangki hava thung ngi krip kchaam ping;
sumkhur sowm lei knii ngi suwn jaan knai kma plung klutti luwbukda mdo phaak chaak raanki mdo arngai in. Ungta O kruwng hava karngai ji Jihudia rekki kraal mpii lamda!
Isowr ri kdiyou thungki mdo prin pinlet ava naan ku mii khatva talu leiji do ksi kma thleer ri abin inna?
Nei kdaksaa kat daat rukva, Nasareth ki Jisu kro kma ngi nong knempok kdo tlot kat kat ra dinu kdobin.

Ungta ava neiji Jerusalem thung ngi tlonu; thiimpu kinreel rek rutan piikki, kintiing rek mii knempok ava rownginn thung daatti kukhum kma, pdainu mmaanni mi eayo in mpha thung rukva neiji mraal in kpii thu kdo tpom lam.

Ungta neiji maknem thung ngi synagog rek mkheng thu mraal pii lamnu, Isowr kjowm kcha ngi mdo tlot nraan kurthlongnu; ungu kdung plung kthingi mraal pii lamnu, paam ktlokki khuwpii rek kpha ruk pja chlamnu.
“Hanto neiji thiimpu kinreel rek rutan ki paupṭum tu kilṭhi ngi Damaskas tha chetnu.
Kunthun ṭimmi, O kruwng, lamtha neiji parwaanki mar awng khat deinu, kniw kheel dekki kleng mar awng ngi nei leh kmiiṭhi rekka mtukhul dok inda.
Ungta kikheng inni dul leen ktluk chaak in thungta, Hebru pauvi nei kihin mdo the slii neiji aryaanu, “Soul, Soul, talu leiji Neia atapjat chaakka? Nang ngi tarliing akaubi lim chnadi.’
Ungbi neiji thenu, ‘Mukpu, Nah ku ptida?’ Ungbi Mukpu ngi kihin theda, ‘Neia nah do pjat slii Jisu ava ping.’
Pdainu kardelra akhu ngi rip; mleija hava tummi neiji ahin ktardet ping, mleija nang ngi ado tdee ungta Neiji ado ktidet ra ava sok loda sakhi ado piik nra Neiji ado kukchol khiin nra,
Neiji miirek leh ktlok chati rek thungki aṭen pthuwk nikdon

mleija mmaanni kjiing thungki mar awngtha, seitaan rutan thungki Isowr ktongtha kinle da, pnu rek kuptlot pik mdo arlaan chaak nraan ungu Nei mikrin kchangi kartleu dok rek arlakki ado thiik lam nra, mmik in kapvan pik ra Neiji aksii kurthuwk ping.’
“Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, O kruwng Agripa, neiva parwaan ki mik kleng thu kleekka pchaang maang,

pdainu rukri reeppi Damaskas tha, ava dilli Jerusalem tha ungu Judia paamkowl mkheng thu, ungta ktlok chati rek hin rukva thethuw nu, mleija mmaanni plungren hurda ungu Isowr hin mkinlet nraan ungta mmaanni plungren hurda kurhui nong mdo tlot nrang lei.
Mleija hava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, luwbuk Inn thu Jihudia rekki mukjowng lamda, ungu mke eayoura kurthlong lamda.
Snii kpha thu neiji Isowr hinki kbom thloi chnu ungta hava thu ripnu kdil leh klin hinni sakhi kpiik chaakka,

mleija Khrista ngi kja kakham parteel kat da, ungu ava ngi, kdiyou thungki rukri reeppi ring kinle da, miirek leh ktlok chati rek mikniing hinni mar awng mkaryaam nra, kthuwk dok khulpu rek leh Mousi dothe ava kma donle neiji do khat lee the chmaang.”
Ungu mma ngi hanto mkarthe loi thungta, krowl kparyaa ngi Phestas ti theda, “Poul, mong kukto kchaamti, kdung reenni akurchu chaakki mong atupto pthia.”
Pdainu Poul li theda, “Kinreel sii Phestas, neia mong kto maang, pdainu mkindit kat kthe cha ping.
Mleija kruwng ngi hava le mlei deida, ungu mma hinni kintekki kpau kcha ping; mleija mma hinva paurek ava kurdowl ava pme mleija neiji deinu, ditta hava kensi khat thung ngi kthuwk nong ava pme.
Kruwng Agripa, khulpu rekka nangva arin chaak mo? Nang ngi rin chna tdit neiji kdea.”
Ungbi Agripa ngi Poul hin theda, “Mpha ktoi tek thung ngi khristen atpurthuw nuwm ma!”

Ungbi Poul li theda, “Toi tek daat joso mata saangpa daat joso Isowr hin kṭhil kma donle, nang daat kma pdainu snii ngi mkaryaa kcha mii mkheng rukva, hava thiir ri hephep daat kma nei klulu mkurthuw nrang leiki.”
Ava dilli kruwng leh paamkpupa Barnis leh kuk ong miirekka rip lamda;
ungu mmaanni mkunsun in thungta, khat leh khatti the lamda, “Hava miilaija mdiyo nra mata rownginn thung ngi tukhum nrangki mlei do khat lee ame.”
Ungta Agripa ngi Phestas hin theda, “Hava miilaija Kaisar hin mthe thut ma tlaangbi, kintekki tapthlat pthii rang nga.”

Ungta neenni Romia kira arkuwngpii ktuwngra kukurthlon in thungta, mmaanni Poul leh rownginn thungki mii murson rekka, Agastas rawlmii kinreel sii mdodit rawlmii rek berksu mmiing Julias mdodit ava hin parlaan lamda.
Ungta Asia paam ktai thung ngi kchet ra Adramitian arkuwngpii khat tun tuwng innu, neenni truwn leen howl innu, ungu Thessalonikia ki Masidonia mii khat Aristarkas ti neenna mṭhiinda.
Mupduk nii ngi Sodon thlung innu; ungta Julia va Poul la wonsat klongi tloda, mplap rekki tuk mdosut pik nra rot pikda.
Ungta ava thungki ngi truwn leen arkuwngpii tun ktuwn in thungta, tchangkhuw ngi mdo traan lei inni, Kupras prahpaam ktongtha howl innu.
Silisia leh Pamphilia dusukki truwn thung ngi howl innu, neenni Lisia thungki Maira tha thlung innu.
Ava thung ngi Italy kira Alekjandria ki arkuwngpii khat, rawlmii berksuva phada, ava thu neen rukka muptuwng chaanda.

Niikhuw roiksot dokki neenni ktap naam naammi howl innu ungu kparsa langlang ngi Knidias thlung innu, ungu kche kurnowl raanna tchangkhuw kraang ngi mkarsit ma thungta, Salmonia ki Kretia prahpaam ava kurdungi howl innu.
Kparsa langlang ngi neenni arkuwngpii thlunna mun kuhui deek mdo dit Lasia khuwpii ktinel tek thung ngi thlung innu.
Mpha roiksot reenni maangda, ungu kthen ngowl naan ro mso reen leiji arkuwngpii kuhowl ava parsa langlangda, Poul li mhin inni parseel lamda,
theda, “Ocha rek arkuwngpii ava do ngi nor donle knemmi kmaangra, arkuwngpii leh mthungki dona rek daat kma nrinkhu inrukka kmaangra.”
Pdainu rawlmii ki berksuva Poul dothe hinva, arkuwng ksa leh ava kpupa pau knaa tkiin betda.

Ungta arkuwngpii thlunna ava phalbii thung ngi mthlunna mṭhat ma leiji, mii maknemmi ava thungki truwn thung ngi mdo thiik nra parseelda Kretia ki arkuwngpii rina Phonikis mdodit karthakki kniw thuwna ktong ki leh kurdu ki kniw thuwna ktarngaiji thlung innu, ungu ava thangva phalbii kurthuwkda.
Ungta kurdu ktongki tarthli marhan raan hiir hiir thungta, mmaanni mdo ngei in kpha kcha heppi karbin lamda, mmaanni mnareeng ri khiing lamda, diibiing ktinel tek Kretia tha howl lamda.
Pdainu tunkat daatti tchangkhuw kraang ngi, karthakki kniw thuwna mdodit avaki ngi laan ktongtha kdung ngi raanda;
ungta arkuwngpii kjowngda tchangkhuw mdiil pchaan ma raan thungta, neenni mlam ma pthiinnu anto mhowl inda.
Ungta Kouda mdodit prahpaam kdilsuwn ava tingi chenda, kparsa langlang ngi neenni arkuwng ava kjowng innu;

ava mkhiin dil thaan rongi, mmaanni arkuwngpiia mdo howl nraan ktong thang ngi howl lamda, ava dilli Sytias tha kchen daat rang mo kdingi ṭi lamda, mmaanni arkuwng buwdaar ava pchowm lamda, ungu anto howl lamda.
Tchang khuw kraang ngi kdung reenni mdo traan lei inni, mupduk niiva mmaanni arkuwngpii leenki dona ava arkuwng leen kvar pṭhun lamda;
ungta mnii kdumna nitva arkuwng thungki dona ava mkhut kat inni var lamda.
Ungta nii kursonni bursi ruk kniw ruk mkandanma thungta, tchangkhuw kraang ngi kdung mjiil dok inda, kring chra kdobin chaak in mkheng ava am mda.
Then mdo chaak manaan roi mso reen thungta, Poul li mhin inni arvangda, ungu theda, “Miirek, naanni ataryaak pik daat tlaang in, ungta Kretia ki nhowl ma tlaang inbi, kar eakrep leh kmaang amnime.
Pdainu plung ado pnet nraan neiji akatham chaak inna; mleija naan arlakki ku khat lee rinkhu maang nime, pdainu arkuwngpii daat ra.
Mleija snii jaanni Mma ki Waan tamsii kurthuwk neiji luw kdobuk ava ngi kbe tha ripda,
ungu kihin theda, ‘ṭi liit ma, Poul; nang ngi Kaisar maiṭhuwmmi arima rome, ungta asuw, nangtu kilṭhi ngi kohowl miirek mkheng nga Isowr ri mrot pikka.’
Ava leiji miirek, plung apnet chaan, mleija Isowr rinchnu, nei kdothe hep hep daat ra.
Pdainu prahpaam murson tha nenni tchen maan rome.”
Jaan ava mnii sowm lei plitna veida, neenni Adria truwn thung ngi tchangkhuw doraanni kaklaan in thungta, thanṭim arveelli arkuwngpii kohowlva, laan nai pakda kdingi binda.
Ava leiji mmaanni lam somknii kukthuk archaang pha lamda, mhai kursown bet in thungta, lam sowm lei parnga archaang ngi pha nowl lamda.
Ungta neenni lung klin nor daat nikaan mo kdingi ṭi innu, mmaanni arkuwngpii mdil ktongki mnareeng plii ava pchowm lamda, khuw var nra ṭhil chaannu.
Ungta arkuwngpii kohowl rekki mchen chaak nraan mlam thlaam lamda, arkuwngpii thungki mnareeng kupchowm dotlot tlo leek lamda, arkuwng ava truwn thu pṭum lamda,
ungbi Poul li rawlmii ki berksu hin theda, “Hava miirekki arkuwngpii thu ma am maanbi, kartlan pchaang nimaanti.”
Ava leiji rawlmii rekki arkuwng ri kvetbuk lamda, ungu anto pthla pthii lamda.

Khuw mtlei rang thungta, mkheng inni then mruk ruk mdo chaak nraan Poul li ktham chlamda, theda, “Sniiva naanni then ado chaak liit mnaanki nii sowmlei plitna kurthuwkka, naanni nowl nowlda sown maan, akheng inni then mruk ruk achaan.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, arutan nraan then mruk ruk achaan, mleija naan ku mii khat lee luwleenki sam khdaat pre ṭuh nime.”
Ungta mma ngi hava the thida, mma ngi thenpen louda, mmaan mkhengki maiṭhuwm mi panpaak thida khuida kchaa pṭhunda.
Ava dilli mmaan mkheng inni plung pngar lamda, mdaksaan ki then mruk ruk chaa lamda.
(Arkuwngpii thungki neenna kikheng inni arjaa knii som tikheu lei truk in ping.)
Ungta kukhoppi mmaal dok inle, arkuwngpii mthowm nra, kehu rekka truwn thu var pthii lamda.
Tunva khuw mtlei thungta, mmaanni laan ava tin chlam mda, pdainu diibiing khat dei lamda, mrot khim khai thu arkuwngpii ava diibiing ava tha ṭhi nuwm lamda.

Ava leiji mmaanni mri khim khai kvet lamda truwn thu var pthii lamda, mpha ava kat thung ngi arkuwng nareeng ruk parthlet lamda; ava dilli mduki arkuwng ava tchangkhuw kraang ktongtha thii lamda, diibiing tha howl lamda.

Pdainu diibiingki sitphui norda, mdu ktongki ava diithu tla chdokda; arkuwngpia sitphui thu nowt dokda, kakna liit kma am chdaatda, ungta mdil ktongki ava tchangkhuw kraang ngi mlaak mlaakki kui chda.
Rownginn thu mdo khum ku mii khat lee ngi dii kbulda mchen chaak ma nraan rawlmii rekva ke eayou rangki kurthlong lamda;
pdainu rawlmii rek berksu ngi Poul mdo ktlan nuwm leiji, mdobin in ava mdotlot ma nraan theda. Dii kukbul dei rekki arkuwngpii leenki junkhuwngda, rukri ngi laan mthlun nraan pau pṭumda,
ungta ka am daat rekva dingphel mata arkuwngpii klekṭik tun aklaan so dida. Ungu ava leiji mii mkheng ngi laan tha kal chaannu.
Neenni ka karthle dok dil thaanni, neenni Maltia tdit parhpaam deiro innu.
Ungta khuwpaam ava thungki miirekki kheel siingi wonsat mlo chaanda; mleija khuwkra pṭhunda kheel reenni kjiil sikda, mmaanni mei pchok lamda kikheng inni mkowl chaanda.
Poulva ding tut khat thlaamda ungu mei thu dikda, msat thungta pruwl khat thuwkda mkhut tha purkol dokda.

Khuwpaam ava thungki miirekki, mkhut leenki pruwl mdee in thungta, khat leh khatti the lamda, “Hava miilaija miilai khat ke aeyou munra. Mma ngi truwn thungki karthlet chdaat joso, ringthleng mun nime,” kdingi the lamda.
Anto kurthuwk chdaat joso mma ngi pruwl ava mei thung ngi kṭhik lot pthiida kja nangme.

Mmaanva ktarthliing ra mata tluw daat don kdiyou rang mo kdingi arda lamda; pdainu mmaanni roiksotti arda lamda mhin do khat lee mthuw ma thungta, muplungbin in parthleng lamda, mma mukpu khat kdingi the lamda.
Tunva mun ava arveelli paam avaki prahpaam kpupa mmiing Pablias tdit miilai khat amda, mma ngi mkowl chaanda, nii kdum lik thu mwonsatti mupthlung chaanda.
Hanto thuwkda, ditta Pablias pah ava riphaak leh poisen ni koi chda, ungbi Poul li velda, mleen mkhut khiingda ṭhil pikda, ungbi dam chda.
Ungta hava mthuw thungta, prahpaam thu ka am omlai kthloi cha rekki thleng lamda ungu pdam pik chlamda.
Mmaanni chla knempok mpii chaanda; ungu neenni arkuwngpii leen kuhowl rangki ktuwn in thungta, kdo kriin chaak in mkheng msim pik inda.
Thla kdum diltha neenni prahpaam thu phalbi pvei dok in thiinnu, unao kanphiir kdujik Alekjandria ki arkuwngpii khat leen howl innu.
Syrikias thu tparngat innu, neenni nii kdum kcheeng innu.
Ungta ava thungki neenni lam punkoi innu, Rhegiam thlung innu; ungu nii khat diltha kurdu ktongki tirthli raangda, ungbi mnii knitna rongi Putiolia thlung innu.
Ava tha neenni ku u knaorek pha chaannu ungu mmaanni mo own chaanda, nii tikheu kcheen ṭhiinnu. Ungta neenni anto Romia thlung chaannu.

Ungta avaki ku u knao rek inni, neen mtaryaak in thungta, Apias bajaar mdodit ungu innlu kdum kpha dek lamkla ngi neenna mdu chaanda. Mmaan mdee thungta Poul li Isowr panpaak da, ungu plung tapngar chda.
Ungu neenni Romia kthlun in thungta, Poul la mthina ngi rawlmii doseelli ma am nra rot pikda.

Nii kdum diltha, mma ngi khuw ava thungki Judia miirek berksurek own purkuk da, mma ngi mhin inni theda, “Ku u knaorek, neiji miirek mata nenki npahle nopa do khat lee raal piimaang, anto daat joso neia Jerusalem ki rownginn thu mdo tkhum lammi Romia rek khut thu mparlaan lamda.
Mmaanni mpirsin dok lamda, kdiyo nrangki mlei khat lee ma amma thungta, mmaanni neia kintekki mapthla nuwm lamda.
Pdainu Jihudia rekki mrot ma thungta, neiji kchati miirek hin kdo psul nlamra dokhat lee am mdaat joso, neia Kaisar hin lusang kdo tur oima rome di chnu.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, neiji adei inda pau kdosaam chaak nra, ado ko own in, mleija Isreel rekki plung ngi kdung mdo arngai chaak, ava tummi neia hava thiirri ngi mdo tbowl.
Ungta mmaanni mhin the lamda, “Nah mlei thung ngi neenni Judiaki chethi khat lee arlaang chmaan ring, ungta hava nang mlei thu pau ksongra mata kṭha pau ksong ra ku u knaorek in khat lee thlengme.
Pdainu nah poibinna talu tdit neenni nah hinki karyaak chaak nuwm inna; mleija nah amna mun kteen thu miirekki araal piida tdit neenni dei innu.

Mmaanni mma tummi nii khat mpalreen in thungta, mma amna thung ngi mii knempokki thlengda. Ungta mma ngi Mousi Nowlam leh khulpu rek dokjit mikniing thungki Isowr Kruwngpaam sakhi piida, Jisu mlei thung ngi plungren mdohur nraanki jiingsun kingi kjiing kpha dekki the pik lamda.
Ungta mii angṭhea mma pausaammi plungren hurda, ungu murson rekva rin chlamme.
Ava leiji mmaan msingreel in thu kulrot nlam mda, Poul li hava paukhat mthe dilthang rongi sun lamda: “Pthla Kchiir ri naanki apah khulpu Isaijah hintha hanto tiptheda:
‘Hava miirek hin chet ra ungu athe,
naanni taryaakka aryaa naandi pdainu aryaa pandi nimaanti,
ungu naanni tsutta suw naandi pdainu suw pandi nimaanti,
mleija hava miirek plung nga kurmowl cha a,
ungta maknaa inna mdo aryaak naan thungki krik cha a,
ungu mmik inna mipjiin pthiinna,
anto mkurthut ma tlaangbi mmik inni suw pindi lamdon,
ungta maknaa inni aryaa lam don,
ungu muplung inni dei pindi lam don,
ungta mdam chaak nraan Nei kihin kinle lamra.”
Hava Isowr ki kirliinna ava ktlok chatii rek hintha msia tdit naanni adei chaan; mmaanni knaa ktikiinra.”
Mma ngi hava pauna rek mthe dok le, Jihudia rekka sun lamda, msingreel inni kdung karteen nlamda.
Ungta mma ngi kum knii lik thu mdaksaa ngi kpurdon chda ava tha amda, ungu mma hin kthleng mii mkheng nga kowl chda,
Isowr Kruwngpaam paryaamda ungu Mukpu Jisu Khrista mlei purchukda ku mii khat lee dopkhaan mangi, plung ktangar leh kintekki nong mdo tlot chaak.
Jisu Khrista sra owr khat, kenyee ra mdo own, Isowr kṭha paumin tumra msikki mdo pankai,
chodu ngi Mma khulpu rek hin pau mdo reel dok Kchiir Laaika rek ava,
daksaa dil kṭoiji Devid charuwl thungki, Mma Chapa mlei thu kṭha paumin
ungta kdiyou thungki kring karheel kchiir deekki Pthla rutan dil kṭoiji Mma ava Isowr Chapa tdit hurda, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista,
Mma thu nen chati rek mkheng arlakki Mma miing tummi krin cha rek thu kupṭoi tkurthut nraan plungnee leh kenyee tarlaan chaak in, 6ava thung ngi naan rukka Jisu Khrista dora ado to own chaak dok in;
kintiingra mdo own chaak dok, Romia thungki Isowr wonsat lo mii mkheng hintha:
nenki Npah Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai ava naan hin jiamso.
Rukri reeppi, naan akheng ngi mlei kurthuwkda, neiji neiki Isowr Jisu Khrista miing ngi kpanpaak chaakka, mleija dultipaam mkheng thu naan do rin chaak ava karyaamda.
Mleija kdown liit kma neiji kṭhil chaak mpha thu, naan abin paphaak innu, Mma Chapa ki kṭha paumin thu plung klutti sok kdolo psuk chaak Isowr ri neiki sakhi kurthuwk.
Isowr hin kdoṭhil chaak leiji tunva mṭutna reltha mrot pikda naan hin kthleng kchaam ping.
Mleija neiji naan aju kurdut ṭhi nuwm reennu, mleija naan ru akaptan pik ra, pthla ktongki chla ado tithem pik nraan,
mleija khat leh khat do rin chaak ava ngi naan leh nei mikniing thu plung kurchuwlli tkursop chaak nraan lei kurthuwk.

Ku u knaorek, mleija ktlok chati murson rek arlakki heppi naan arlak rukva kminni kdokhau chaak nra, mpha ktai thung ngi kthleng nuwm kcha ping (pdainu mapkhaan tlitda) naanni ava ado kdee raan neiji kngei chaakka.
Grik miirek leh nonaat ktaak miirek mikniing ungta ksing leh ka ak mikniing hinni neiji lei ktuwl chaakka:
ava leiji naan leh Romia thu ka am miirek hin neiji kṭha paumin kdo paryaam nuwm chaak.
Kṭha paumin mlei thu neia kning kjakme: krin kcha miipum ktai hin mkirliin chaak nrangki Isowr rutan ava rukringi Jihudia miirek ungu Grik miirek hin ruk.
Mleija krin changi mlei kurthuwkda Isowr ki rinkindit mdo tpandan; ava hanto kjitda, “Mdo rin chaakki rinkindit mii ava kringra.”
Mleija Isowr plung thitta kṭha kma mkheng kupsulli parwaanki arju kandang, ungta miirek ṭhat ma ava ngi kindit pkhaanda.
Mleija Isowr mlei thung ngi mmaan dodee ava oltek da, mleija Isowr ri mhin inni tdetda.
Dultipaam mapṭhan daatki Mdak tdee pchaanma, mleija Mmaki kṭuw knai kma rutan leh Isowr ktongki ava Mma doseem dok thung ngi kindit chelli dei lamda. Ava leiji mmaanna kuptlot pik amnime;
mleija mmaanni Isowr kdeidok kurthuwk daat lam joso Isowr kdingi mmaanni Mhin kjat pik lamme, pdainu mpoibin inna dosime, ungta muplung inna mong kukto ngi kjiing kcha a.
Msin nuwm reen lei inni ka aak chlamma,
ungu kmaang kro kmaki Isowr laarnee ava kmaang chrangki miilai mdit mata puwarek mdit mata saarek mdit mata khaoṭit khaojaar meel klou jikki khut dosak pthla ngi parthleng lamda.
Ava leiji, mmaan msingreel in thung ngi, mdaksaan mdo kjat ma nraan, muplung bin in dongei thu mkurchou chaak nraan Isowr ri mdo maak pthii lam,

mleija mmaanni Isowr mlei kindit ava mdo huwn chaak inni parthleng lamda, ungta kapṭhang Mii ava kchang rang nga mdo seem ava luwbuk lamda, sok ruk lo lamda, kapṭhang Mma ava kṭuw knai kma tpanpaak ra! Amen.
Mleija hava leiji mmaanna Isowr ri ningkja kurhui rak na ktongtha mdo maak pthii lam. Mmaanki snu rek rukva miinopa tlotna ava miinopa liit kma ktongtha parthleng lamda,

anto lulungi pselrek rukva snu rektu miinopa ngi tlot nlamme, ungu khat leh khat ning kakraalli karngai lamda, psel rekki psel rektu ningkjana nong tlo lamda, ungta mdoparma naanki mdo arlaan raan ava mmaan mdak kat inki mii kurthuwk.
Unggta Isowr kdei cha thu mmaanni kurhuiji mdodee maan leiji, kmaang chrangki poithuw leh karmak nong ktlo thu Isowr ri mdo maak pthii lam.
Mmaanna kṭha kma, hangmal, mii khusiir parthitna ktlo, kheithe ngi kdim, miii ke eayou, kthe purduk, kuhuwng kcha, miikrai, mmaanni khothe lamda,
titi ktada, Isowr dopder, ning er ri kpau, kpohok, napal ktlo, kṭhakma kupthuwk, mnuh mpah pauthe kleek,
ka aak, krin kma, plung ksel, wonsat ktaak, kṭha kma rek nong hava mkheng ngi kdim chlam kurthuwk.
Hava lu nong ktlo miirekka kdiyou kat ra kdingi Isowr ri mdo palreen ava mmaanni deida, avale daat mmaanni tlo lamda, pdainu ava ktlo rektu kulrot nlamda.

Ava leiji, O mii kekṭewl nang, kuku kurthuwk daat joti nah aptlot pik nime; mleija ktlok khat ado kṭewl psuk leiji, adaksaa athina ngi mraal kirpii kcha pti, mleija kekṭewl nangva antolu hepdaat ado tlot kcho.
Hantolu ktlo miirek leen Isowr do kṭewl ktla tdit neenni kdee in.
O miilai, nang ngi havalu ktlorek kṭewl thitinu, nah adaksaa katti tlo lam tinu, Isowr do kṭewl rang thungki karthlet rang ngi karbin kcha ptimo?
Mdit mata hantojaki Mma wonsat mdo khaan leh mdo diil ava doksi thleer kma atlot mo? Isowr wonsatta plungren hurna ktongtha kṭhi tdit dei mtimo?
Pdainu plung kapchai leh plung ado parthlen nuwm ma leiji, Isowr plung thitti rinkindit kṭewl mpurphuwn nit thungkira plungthit ava adaksaa ngi apurtuwlla.
Mleija Mma ngi miipum ktaija mma mma nong tlot dil kṭoiji kpinlet pik ra:
diilda kṭha ktlongi laarnee leh kunlor kphara ungta kmawng kro kma tummi kthlaam miirek hin kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu kpiira;
pdainu mdaksaa kparning da ungu kindit kuṭoi kma, pdainu kṭhakma nong kupṭoi miirekka plungthit leh kheel siiki plung thit kdura.
Kṭhakma ktlo miipum ktai leenni suwkthuwk leh kja kakham ka amra, rukri ngi Jiudia rek ungu Grik miirek ruk anto kurthuwkra,
pdainu kṭha ktlo miipum ktai tumva, rukringi Jihudia rek ungta Grik rek ruk laarnee leh kunlor ungu kdaai ka amra.
Mleija Isowr va ksanksui tdetme.
Nowlam ktaakki pnu ktla mii mkheng nga, Nowlam ktaakki kmawng chra, ungu Nowlam kurdu ngi pnu ktla mii mkheng nga Nowlam ava ngi kekṭewlra.
Mleija Isowr maiṭhuwmki rinkindit rek ava Nowlam mdo aryaak lei pme, pdainu Nowlam ktlo miirekka kpindit pikra.
Nowlam kthloi kma ktlok chati rekki nowlam ava nopa ngi mtlot in mpha thu, mmaanni nowlam thloi lam mjoso, mmaan mdaksaan na nowlam kurthuwk.
Mmaan plung thu mdo kjit dok ava ngi nowlam tdit mdo tdet, muplung bin in rukva sakhi piida, ungta mpoithuw in msik msik ava ngi kulrot nlamda, mdit mata ro lamda
nit ava thu Isowr ri neiki kṭha paumin dil kṭoiji, Jisu Khrista ar awng ngi, miirek dotlot tuprut nong ava kekṭewl ra.
Pdainu nah adaksaa ava Jihudia miilai ping kardida, Nowlam kthenda ungta Isowr tu akarnai naki napal atlot,
ungu Mma plungbin deida, ungu Nowlam dothe pik leiji kinreel sii kdingi abin,
ungta nah kinditti mik ktot rek kṭhi pik khat, kjiing thungki miirekki ar awng khat ping adit,
ka ak kpindit pik khat, kmorek avaki chukpu khat ping adit bi, lousing leh kindit kurkhum ndok Nowlam athloi ja,
ava ngi nang ngi mii murson purchuk thiti, nah adaksaa kpurchuk nimtimo? Kupru kupsulli aparyaam chunva, kupru ptimo?
Ku mii khat leengi losang kṭhi rome dithiti, nangva losang aṭhimo? khut dosak pthla ning tiprip thiti, luwbuk Inn thungki alrot mo?
Nowlam thung ngi kpohok kcha nang, Nowlam kupkuiji Isowr ado kjatma pme mo?
Mleija ava mdo kjit dok, “Naanni mlei kurthuwk intinu ktlok chati rek arlakva Isowr kjowm kcha ngi kpau lam.”
Naanni Nowlam apṭoi inbi, vunmor ado reen kat raan; pdainu naanni Nowlam apkui inbi, vunmor ado reen inna kreen kma lulura.
Ava leiji vunmor kreen kma miilai khatti, Nowlam dothe markhiik chaakbi, mma ngi vunmor mdo reenma ava kreen lulu kurthuwk memo?
Ava dilli tikjit dok kthloi ungta vunmor kreen pdainu Nowlam kupkui naan ava mdaksaa vunmor kreen kma pdainu Nowlam karkhii rek mmaanni mraal akpii raan.
Mleija mduwn daatti Jihudia mii kurthuwk ava Jihudia miilai kat pme, mdaksaa duwnki vunmor mdo reen daatti mdo pindit pik ava pme.

Thungki ngi Jihudia mii kurthuwk ava Jihudia miilai kat kurthuwk, ungta mkindit katki vunmor kreen ava plung kthena kurthuwk, plung kurthlut ungu tikjit ava pme. Mma kpanpaak rang nga miirek pme pdainu Isowr ra.
Ava mkurthuttu Jihudia miia tak msit ka amma? Mdit mata vunmor kreen ki arleek set tak ka amda?
Mlam khim khai thu knempok. Rukringi Jihudia rekka Isowr pau kparyaam rek dosilna.
Mii angṭhe ngi mrin chaak mabe? Mmaan dorin de ma heppi Isowr rukva anto ktlo rang mo?
Anto liit nime. Miipum ktaiji kparmak kurthuwk daat joso, Isowr ra kindit kurthuwk so, mleija hanto kjitda, “Nah apauna rekki nah kindit kat mdodit nra, ungu nah atikṭewl thu kapchaang kurthuwk na.”

Pdainu nenki nṭhat maan nong ngi Isowr ki mkindit soklou ktidet nkurthuttu nenni tak tithe raan? Nen ntunni Isowr ri kindit liit kmaki plungthit kupthlung rang mo? (dultimii lam ktong ngi neia kpau ping.)
Anto liit mso! Mleija anto nkurthut tu dultipaamma Isowr va tak heppi kekṭewl rang?
Pdainu nei kdo parma ngi Isowr ki kindit ava mpunlor deekku, talu leiji neia pnu karvei khatti kraal mdo tpiik lamda?
Ungta kṭha thuw nra talu leiji kṭha kma ta tlot marang? Anto lulungi mii angṭhe ngi titi pauvi mthe psuk lamda. Mmaanni kraal mdo tpiik ava kindit kurthuwk.

Ava mkurthut tu talu rang? Jihudia mii nenna kṭha bet in minmo? Eme, anto liit pme; mleija Jihudia miirek ruk Grik miirek ruk mikniing ngi pnu rutan kurdu ngi ka am dinu neiji mii mkheng hin chodu ngi kdo tdet dok.
Hanto mdo kjit dok lulu:
“Rinkindit ku khat lee ame,
khdaat pre ame;
kdei pandi ku khat lee ame,
Isowr kthlaam ku khat lee ame.
Mkheng inni siir tha kinle chlamma;
karchin lamda mmaanni karmak lamtha kchet chlamma;
kṭha ktlo ku khat lee ame, khdaat pre ame.”
“Mto or inna thlaan khur kparvang,
miplei inni mii huwn chaak nlamda.”
“Mner kowng in titha pruwl doi ka amma.”
“Mner inna pauhur leh pau kakha ngi kdim kcha a.”
“Mkhuwnna hii kpubuw rangki kjaang nga,
mlamṭoi naan thung ngi ke eakrep leh kja kakham
ka amma,
ungu kdaai lam ava mmaanni dei lamme.”
“Mmik sut naan thung ngi Isowr kṭi ame.”
Tunva nenni Nowlam dothe khim khaija, Nowlam tingi ka am miirek hin kpau tdit ndee in, ava leiji ner khim khai mdo pdown nra, ungu dultipaam mkheng nga Isowr dokṭewl nrang lei kurthuwk.
Mleija Nowlam nong rekki dultimii kukhat lee pre pindit pikme; mleija Nowlamva pnu tdee naki lousing mdo thuwṭhi.
Pdainu tunva Nowlam ktaakki, Isowr ki rinkindit ava ngi mii pandan pik inda, Nowlam leh khulpu rekki sakhi hur daat lam joso
Isowr ki rinkindit ava Jisu Khrista krin changi kring cha mii mkheng tum kurthuwk. Mleija mkarthlei nra do khat lee ame;
mleija mii mkheng nga pnu arveida ungta Isowr kullaar thungki ktoi tekki ktluw kcha lamma,
mmaanna Jisu Khrista do ktlan thu Mma plungnee ki chla ngi mdo panrit pik dok lam,
krin cha ngi mdo arlaan chaak nra, mdungi Isowr ri Mma hii ngi mdoren partleu pik dok lam. Hava Isowr ki rinkindit mdo tdetna, mleija Isowr ktongki Mma dodiil ava ngi chodu ki pnu rekka ptlot pikda;
tun tunki mpha thung ngi Mma mdaksaa kat ava rinkindit, ungta Jisu krin cha mii ava Mma ngi mpindit pikka tdit mdo tdetna.
Ava dilva nen napal tlot inna tak kthuwkka? Ava ame. Talu mlei da? Nong lei mo? Eme, pdainu krin cha mlei thu.
Mleija Nowlam nong ktaakki krin kcha mii ava mpindit pik kdingi nenni narpom daat in.
Mdit mata Isowr ra Jihudia rek daatki Isowr mo? Mma ktlok chati rekki Isowr ruk kuthuwk pmemo? ktlok chati rek ki ruk kurthuwk,
mleija Isowr ava khdaat; ungta vunmor kreen rekka mdo rin chaak inni kpinrit pik ra ungta vunmor kreen kma rekka krin cha thung ra.
Krin cha hava leiji nenni Nowlam tvar pthii raanmo? Anto liit pme. Nenni Nowlam mnebet na tutlot ra.
Ava mkurthut tu daksaa dil kṭoiji nenni npah in Abraham mlei thu talu the chenaan?
Mleija nong rekki Abraham ma mpinrit pikbi, ava mlei thung ngi mnapal tlot nra ka am, pdainu Isowr maiṭhuwm pme.
Mleija Laaika va tak mthe? “Abraham mi Isowr rin chda, ungta mma ava rinkindit ti mdolo pik.”
Tunva nong ktlo ku mii khat ava chla ngi tai pikme pdainu lei ktuwlli mdolo.
Ungta ku mii khatti nong ktlo kma pdainu kpinrit Isowr Mma rin chda, Mma mdo rin chaakki rinkindit kdingi lo pikda.
Mma leiji nong ktaak mii ava hin Isowr ri rinkindit dida phowl kṭha mdo piik lulungi Devid rukva hanto theda:
“Naan thungki karmak ptlot pikda,
ungta mupnu ton in thungki kdo pirliin pik miirek ava msuwkṭha;
Mukpu ngi pnu kdingi
mdolo pik mara mii ava msuwkṭha.”
Hava phowl kṭha mdo piikka vunmor kreen rek hin daat mo, mata vunmor kreen kma rek hin rukda? Krin cha thu Abraham hin rinkindit kdingi mdolo pik diin minnu ntheen.
Ava mkurthut tu tak heppi mdo piik da? Vunmor mreen dumo mata mreen dilda? Vunmor mreen dil pme, pdainu mma ngi mreen duki.

Mma ngi vunmor mreen dungi krin cha mdo thloi ava ngi rinkindit ki titinna mata kbiinamki vunmor kreen mdo arlaan chaak. Mmaan hin rinkindit kdingi mdolo pik vunmor kreen mlaiji krin cha mii mkhengki mpah mkurthut nrangki lei.
Ungta vunmor kreen daat kma, nenki npah in Abraham mi vunmor mreen dungi krin cha doṭoi nrang tha oida, hanto vunmor kreen rek pah kurthuwk.
Abraham leh mma charuwl rek hin dultipaam ava mma do kurthuwk ra dida pau mdoreel dok ava Nowlam leiki pme, pdainu krin chaki rinkindit mkurthut lei.
Nowlam kupṭoi mii hin daatti kpii mkurthut bi, krin cha ava dosime ungta paureel ava do khat lee kurthuwk nime.
Mleija Nowlamva plung thit mdo thuw ṭhi, pdainu Nowlam amna thungva, Nowlam kupkui ruk ame.

Ava leiji plungnee ki plungreel ava krin cha thu amda, ungta mma charuwl rek mkheng hin mdo piik, Nowlam kupṭoi rek hin daat pme pdainu Abraham dorin thung ngi krin cha rek ruk kurthuwk, mleija mma nen nkheng inki npah in.
Mleija hanto kjitda, “Neiji nang ava chati rek maknem ki mpah akpurthua.” Mma ngi Mhin mdo rin chaak, kdiyou rek hin rinkhu kpii ungta ka amkma ava ownda kpa am Isowr maiṭhuwm ki.
“Nah acharuwl rekka,” dida mhin mdothe pik lulungi, chati rek maknemki mpah mkurthut nra kilrin chpa kmangi kdung rinda bin chda.
Kdiyou tiing tiing cha, mleija mma kum arjaa khat arveel kurthuwkda, mma ngi ava mbin mpha thu mdit mata mnumei Sarah ava kdongnu kurthuwkda ava kpha thu mdo rin chaak ava down liit me.
Isowr paureel thung ngi plung kunchul tlome, kheel setsetti rin chda Isowr punlorda,
Isowr paureel dok ava ktlo pchaang kat ra kdingi kdung bin chda.
Ava leiji mma do rin chaakka, “Rinkindit kdingi mdolo pik.”
Pdainu “Mma mdolo pik,” kdi ki pauna rekva mma tum daatti mdo kjit pik pme,
pdainu nen ntum ruk kurthuwk. Kdiyou thungki kring kardel nenki Mukpu Jisu krin kcha nen ruk miido talo pik in,
nenki pnu ton leiji midiyo pik inda, ungta nen mikpindit pik raan ring kardel da.
Ava leiji, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista nenni trin chaak lei inni mipindit pik inda, Isowr tu kilṭhi ngi kdaai tphaak chaak in.
Mma ar awng ngi nenni tri naan thu kheel siiki wonsat hava pha chaan min ungta Isowr kullaar kthem thu plung ngi bin psuk in minnu tkanpat chaak in.
Ava kheel dekki nenni kja kakham thung ngi tkanpat raan, kja kakhammi kakhaang thuwṭhi da,
ka khaang kchangi plung kurkhum thuwṭhi da, ungta plung kurkhummi plungbin thuwṭhi da,
plungbin va tkinsiir in pme, mleija nen nhin mido tpiik chaak in Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Isowr wonsat ava nen nuplung ril thung ngi miptlon pik chaanda.
Nenni nsowl chaak slii thuwnni Khrista ngi mpha kcha deekki Isowr krin kma tummi diyouda.
Rinkindit miilai khat tummi khat mdiyora ava kparsa langlang, anto daat joso kṭha miilai khat tumva khatti kdiyou nuwm cha kro.
Pdainu nenni pnu ktong nkurthut slii arlaanni nen ntum raan Khrista diyouda Isowr ri Mma ki wonsat mihai tdee chaanda.
Tunva ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, nenna Mma hii ngi mido tpindit pik dok lei inni, Isowr plungthit thung ki Mma ngi kheel dekki mikaktlan pik chraan.
Mleija nenni Mma nhal chaak slii arlaan, Mchapa diyo ngi nnenna Isowr hin mipipinpik dok inda, tunva mido tpipin pik lei inni, kheel setti Mma rinkhu ngi miktlan chaanda.
Ava daat kma, pdainu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki ar awng ngi Isowr hin tkanpat chaak in, Mma ar awng ngi tunva nenni kpipin pik tarlaan chaak in.
Ava leiji, dultipaam thu miilai khatti pnu thuwṭhida ungta pnu thu diyouda, ungta mii mkheng ngi pnu mdo arve leiji kdiyou ava mii mkheng leen kurjouda.
Nowlam mpiik du liitti pnu ava dultipaam thu ka am dok, pdainu Nowlam am nma thungva pnu ame.
Anto daat joso Adam kingi Mousi kpha kdiyouvi paalda, Adam mi paureel mdo leek lulua kurthuwk mjoso miirek leenni pnu ktong tdit amda, Mma ava kurjung rangki khat ava lulu.
Pdainu pnu kirvei ava leemna chla lulu pme. Mleija miilai khat pnu arve ngi mii knempok mdiyobi, Isowr wonsat lo Miilai khat ditta Jisu Khrista wonsat leemna chla ava ngi mii knempok mdo pdim pik.
Ungta leemna chla ava miilai khat pnu ton hep lua kurthuwk me. Mleija khat pnu arve ava mraal piida kekṭewl li mdil mdoṭoi, pdainu leemna chlava pnu ktong mii knempok ava mdo pindit pik.
Miilai khat pnu ton leiji kdiyou ava ngi mpaalbi, wonsat leh leemna chla karlaang kcha rekka kheel siingi Miilai khat ditta Jisu Khrista thu rinkhu ngi kpaal chra.
Miilai khat pnuton ava ngi mii mkheng mraal mdo piik lulungi, Miilai khat rinkindit nong tlotti mii mkheng ngi rinkhu kpha chra.
Mleija miilai khat doleekki mii knempokki pnu mdo arve lulungi, Miilai khat pau pṭoiji mii knempok rinpindit pik chda.
Karmak nong mnem nra Nowlam arvang lutda, pdainu pnu mnem set set na thung ngi kheel siiki plungnee nemda,
ava leiji kdiyou ki pnu ava ngi mpaal lulu,plungnee rukva nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ngi Kṭuw knaima rinkhu rinkinditti kpaalra.
Ava mkurthuttu neenva talu the nikaan di? Mleija plungnee mnem nra, pnu thu nenni ktir tlit daat che naanmo?
Anto liit pme. Pnu thu kdiyou nenva tak heppi anto trin tlit daat raan da?
Jisu Khrista hinki baptis klou dok nenva, Mma diyo thung ngi baptis talo dok in tdit naanni dei maan timo?
Mpah laarnee ngi Khrista ngi kdiyou thung ki mrin kinlet lulungi, nen rukva rinkhu ren deekki tche chaak nraan, kdiyou ki baptis talo chaak in ava ngi nenna Mma tu kilṭhi ngi kulruwl in pmin.
Mleija Mma diyo lulungi nenni Mma tu kiilṭhi ngi khdaatti na am inbi, Mma rinkarheel lulungi nen rukka Mma tu kilṭhi ngi trin karheel chaak raan.
Nen ndaksaan thuwnki pnu mmaan dok chaak nra, ungta nenni pnu suwkki ta am bong ma nra, nenki ndaksaan pliw ava Mma tu kiilṭhi ngi khros leen kuk thoive tdit nenni ndee chaak dok in.
Mleija kdiyou dok mii ava pnu thungki kintek kcha a.
Pdainu nenni Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi ndiyo inbi, Mma tu kilṭhi ngi nen rukka trin chaak raan kdingi nenni krin cha tkurthut in.
Mleija kdiyou thungki kring kinle Khrista ava diyou kurnowl liit nime; kdiyouvi Mma leen paal kurnowl me tdit nenni ndee in.
Mma diyo ki kdiyou ava Mma ngi pnu ktong tha vei khat pangngi mii mkheng tummi kdiyou kurthuwk, pdainu kringki Mma rinkhu ava Isowr hin tha kring kcha kurthuwk.
Ava leiji naan rukva adak saanna pnu ktong tha kdiyouvi abin in, ungta Isowr hin tha Khrista Jisu thung ngi kring imping kdingi abin chaan.
Ava leiji, pnu dongei thung ngi ado pṭoi ma nraan, kdiyou chrangki adaksaan ava pnu ngi arjiil na mso.

Naan adaksaan thung ki khat ava kṭhakma ado tlot nraan pnu hin pii maan, pdainu naan adaksaan ava Isowr hintha kdiyou dok thungki rinkhu kpha kcha miirek lulungi am in. Ungta naan adaksaan thungki khat ava Isowr hintha rinkindit nong ado tlot nraan apii chaan.
Mleija naanni Nowlam kurdu kma pdainu plungnee kurdu ngi a am lei inni, pnu ngi naan leenni arjiil nime.
Ava mkurthuttu talu rang? Nenni Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am kma pdainu plungnee kurdu ngi ta am lei inni nenni pnu tla che naanmo? Anto liit pme!

Kdiyou hin kṭhi pnu daat don mata rinkindit hin kṭhi pau kupṭoi ava daat don, naanni adaksaanna havale thungki kupṭoi ki suwk rek akurthut inbi, naanni khat ado pṭoi in thungki suwk kurthuwk imping tdit naanni dei maan timo?
Pdainu mpha khat thu naanni pnu suwk kurthuwk daat jownti, mdo purchu thungki plung kurthlutti kupṭoi khat kurthuwk inti,
ungta, pnu thungki apintek chaanda, rinkindit suwk rek akurthut lei inni, Isowr kpanpaak cha kurthuwk so!

Naan adaksaanki apnu ton in nopa leiji, neiji dultimii pauvi kpau kcha ping, mleija naan adaksaan thungki khatti kbuwr ki nong klin klinni kṭha kma ado tlot in lulungi, tunva naan adaksaan thungki khat ava kpinchel deekki mchui nra, rinkindit hin apii chaan.
Naanni pnu suwk akurthut inki mpha thu naanna rinkindit ktong tha kintek in pti.
Pdainu tun tun naanni ning ado tipja naan thungki talu kinle aphaak chaak inna? Ava le ṭut naki nong nga kdiyou daat kurthuwk.
Pdainu tunva pnu thungki kintek inti ungta Isowr suwk in pti, mṭutna ki naan dophaak chaak ra ava kpinchel leh kṭuw knaima ki rinkhu kurthuwk.
Mleija pnu nong manna kdiyou, pdainu Isowr ki leemna chla piik ava nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki kṭuw knaima rinkhu.
Ku u knaorek, Nowlam kdei rek hin neiji kpau kcha ping, mleija mii ava ngi mrin lim thungva Nowlam mi mbowl tdit naanni dei maan timo?
Innknei dok snu ava mi innpu mrin khim khai thungva Nowlam ava ngi mdo bowl daat; pdainu mi innpu mdiyo dok bi, mi innpu mlei thu mma kintek kcha a.

Minnpu mrin slii daat arlaanni, mma ngi ktlok miilai khat hin inn mnei bi, mma ngi losang mṭhia. Pdainu mi innpu mdiyo dokbi, mma Nowlam ava thungki kintek mphaak chaakka, ungu mma ngi ktlok miilai khat hin inn mnei bi, mma ngi losang ṭhime.
Anto lulungi ku u knaorek, naan ava kdiyou dok thungki kring kinle ktlok khat Mma hin naanni Khrista daksaa ngi Nowlam thu kdiyou in pti, mleija Isowr tummi nenni thei tchui raan.
Nenni daksaa kurthuwkki nrin slii thuwn, Nowlam do pthuw ngi, nenki pnu poibinni, ndaksaan thungki khatti kdiyou tumra thei mchui nra nong ktlo kurthuwk.

Pdainu tunva kdiyou rangki paam suwkki ka am nen ava Nowlam thungki mipintek inda, mleija mdo kjit dok pliw ava kurdu ngi nenva soklo maanmin, pdainu pthlaki rinkhu ren thung ngi sok talo chaak in kurthuwk.

Ava mkurthuttu nenni tak the che naandi? Mleija Nowlam ava pnu mo? Anto liit mso. Anto kurthuwk daat joso Nowlam mlei mkurthuw mabi, neiji pnu kdodee ma tlaang rang nga. “Nang ngi kheithema,” dida Nowlammi mthe tlaang mabi, kheithe ava neiji kdei kurthuwk ni maang.
Pdainu paureen thu mpha kcha mdo phaak ava ngi, hangmal ki kheithe mkheng ngi mnam duwlda. Nowlam ktaak pnu ava kdiyou.
Mpha khat thu neia Nowlam ktaakki ka am cha ping, pdainu paureen mthlen thungta, pnu ring kinleda ungu neia kdiyou ping;
rinkhu paureel ki paureen ava katti neia kdiyou kurthuwk ping.
Mleija paureen thung ngi mpha kcha mdo phaak leiji, pnu ngi neia mhuwng chda, ungta ava ngi mii eayou da.
Ava leiji Nowlamma kchiir, ungta paureenna kchiir, ungu kindit ungta kṭha.

Ava mkurthuttu kṭha ava ngi neia mdo tipdiyo mo? Anto liit pme. Mleija pnu ava pnu kdingi mdo tdet nra, kṭha mdodit ava ngi nei kdiyo nra nei kthung ngi nong mtlotbi, ava pnu, ungta paureen ava ngi tpartena kheel dekki pnu marve chaakka.
Nowlam ma pthla ktongki tdit nenni ndee in, pdainu neia pnu kurdu ngi mdojur dok daksaa ktongki ping.
Nei kdaksaa kat dotlot ava neiji dei pandi chmaang. Mleija nei kdo ngei ava neiji tlo maang, pdainu neiji kdo pder chaak ava kat neiji tlo nu.
Tunva nei kdo ngeima ava neiji ktlotbi, Nowlam ma kṭha tdit neiji krotta.
Ava leiji ava ktloa nei nowl pme, pdainu nei kthung ngi ka am pnu.
Mleija nei kthung, ditta nei kdaksaa thung ngi kṭha do khat lee pre ame tdit neiji kdee chaak. Neiji kindit tlo nuwmnu, pdainu neiji tlo pchaang maang.
Mleija nei kdongei kṭha ava neiji tlo pchaang maang, pdainu nei kdongei liitma kṭhakma ava neiji tlonu.
Tunva neiji kdotlot nuwm liitma ava neiji ktlotbi, ava ktloa nei nowl pme, pdainu nei kthung ngi ka am pnu.
Ava leiji neiji kindit ktlot nuwm thu kṭhakma ngi mdo titnel tek ava Nowlam khatti pha chnu.
Mleija nei kdaksaa ril kthlung ngi Isowr Nowlam thung ngi kanpa chnu,
pdainu nei kdaksaa thungki Nowlam msik khat ava ngi nei kuplung bin ava tu rawl kurduk ṭhida, ungta nei kdaksaa thungki khat ava ngi pnu Nowlam thu suwkki mdo tithiik pthii ava neiji kdee chaak.
Neia suwkthi kcha ping! Daksaa thungki kdiyou hava kungi neia makṭen thuw chrang da?

Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista leiji Isowr panpaak chaan che! Ava leiji nei kdaksaa kat rukva kuplungbin tu kilṭhi ngi, Isowr Nowlam soklou cha kurthuwk ping, pdainu kdaksaa tu kilṭhi ngi pnu Nowlam ava sok kdolo chaak.
Ava leiji, tunva Jisu Khrista hintha ka am rek hin mraal piime.
Mleija Jisu Khrista hinki rinkhu pthla ki Nowlammi neia pnu leh kdiyou Nowlam thungki mpantek chda.
Mleija daksaa sowlna Nowlam ava Isowr ri tlo dokda: Mma Chapa khat ava pnu kurhui daksaa lulungi ungu pnu tummi sida, daksaa thu pnu ava mraal piida,
daksaa dil kṭoiji kchet kma pdainu pthla dilkṭoiji nen nthung inni Nowlam dongeen ava mkurkhum nra.
Mleija daksaa dil kṭoiji ka am miirek va daksaa dil kṭoiji poibin da, pdainu pthla dil kṭoiji ka am miirek va pthla poibinni bin lamda.
Daksaa poibin ava kdiyou kurthuwk, pdainu pthla poibin ava rinkhu leh kdaai kurthuwk.
Mleija daksaa poibin ava Isowr kusnuwm kma kurthuwk; avangi Isowr ki Nowlam dil ṭoime, ktlo pchaang ruk kurthuwk me;
ungta daksaa ktongtha ka am rekva Isowr ning tupthlung me.
Pdainu naan athung inni Isowr pthla ma ambi, naanna daksaa ktongki pmaanti, pthla ktongki in pti. Khrista pthla kthloi kma ku mii khat ava Mma hinni ame.
Pdainu naan athung ngi Khrista ma ambi, pnu leiji naan adaksaan ava diyou chdaat jownti, rinkindit leiji naanki pthla ava kring cha.

Kdiyou dok thungki Jisu ktipring pinle Mma pthla ava naan thung ngi ma ambi, Jisu Khrista kdiyou dok thungki ktipring pinle, Mma ava ngi naan thu ka am Mma pthla rukva kdiyou chrangki naan rinkhu akiprin pik chraan.
Ava leiji ku u knaorek, nenni daksaa dil kṭoiji kring tkurthut ma nraan, daksaa ki leenlei tutuwl in ava pme.
Mleija naanni daksaa dil kṭoiji kring akurthut inbi, diyou chnaandi, pdainu daksaa nongtlot ava naanni a eayo pthiinbi, ring naandi.
Mleija Isowr pthla doṭhi mii mkheng ava Isowr chapa rek lam.
Mleija kṭi ngi atluk chaak nraanki suwk owrki pthla ava naanni ado arlaan in ava pme, pdainu naanni mchapa kurthuwkki, pthla ava ado arlaan chaak in. Nenni “Aba, Apah!” diin minnu to own chaak in.
Nenna Isowr naole in pmin tditki Mma pthla ngi nen napthla hin sakhi mihur pik inda.

Ungta mnaole nkurthut inbi, alrou tphaak chaak raan, mleija Mma tu kilṭh ingi ngi nen ruk mpunlorbi, ungu Mma tu kilṭhi suwk nthuw ṭhiinbi, Isowr alrou kpha chrangki, ungta Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi alrou kpha sap tkurthut raan.
Mleija tuntunki suwkthuw ava nen nhin mdo tdet rangki laarnee ava tu tpinṭim rang nga hui chme.
Mleija mdo seem rekki Isowr Chapa kandang ra ava ning kakraalli arda chlamda.
Mleija mdoseem rekva doksi kma mma mma dongeiji am lamme, pdainu plung ngi mdobin psuk chaak in Mma kurdu ngi am lamda;
Mleija mdo seem rek kat rukka mdobowl lam thungki pintek don, Isowr naole kurthuwkki kintekki kunlor kpha chlamra.
Mleija snii kpha thu mdo seem rek mkheng ngi, nao kuplu thungki kdung kṭou heppi chel mdo chan ṭhiin ava nenni ndee in.

Ungta mdo seem rek daat kma, pdainu pthla avaki thei rukringi kthloi nen ndaksaan katti, nen ndaksaan mido tiktlan pik nraan, tuprutti chelchang in minnu, mchapa rek lulungi mido tujuw chaak nraan tardat chaak in.
Mleija nenni plung ngi tbin psuk chaak leiji mido taktlan in. Tuntunni kdei daatti plung ngi tbin in ava kbin psuk tkurthut in pme. Mleija mdodee ava ku ngi kbin psuk rangda?
