Pdainu nenni tdeema ava plung ngi tbin psuk leiji, kdung kdiil chatu kilṭhi ngi tardat chaak in.

Anto lulungi nenni nsowl chaak naan thu pthla ava ngi mido tbom in; mleija nenni tak heppi tiṭhil chaak raan tdit dei maan min, pdainu Pthla Mma katti mchelchan tu kilṭhi ngi, pauna rek kurthluk langlang tu mithe pik chaanda.
Ungta miirek plungbin kthlaam Mma ngi pthla ngi pthla poibin ruk mdodee, mleija Isowr dongei dilkṭoiji kintiing rek tumra pthla ngi the pik lamda.
Isowr ri Mma poibin dil kṭoiji, mdo own Mma wonsat lorek tu kilṭhingi mṭhat nra do khim khai nong mdo tlot tdit nenni ndeen.
Mleija Mma ngi chodu reeppi mdodee dok mmaan ava, mu u mnaorek arlakki rukri reeppi kṭou mkurthut nra, Mma chapa kdu jikki pankai pik chlamda.
Ungta Mma dopankai pik dokrek ava rukka Mma ngi tu own ruk own chlamda; ungu mdo own dokrek ava tpindit ruk pindit pik lamda; ungta mdo pindit pik dok rek ava tpunlor ruk punlor chlamda.
Ava mkurthut tu hava mlei thung ngi tak the chenaan? Isowr ava nen ntum mkurthut tu, ku ngi nraal mikpii raan?
Mchapa kparkhaal kma pdainu nen nkheng in tummi kpii dok Mma va, Mchapa tu kilṭhi ngi do mkheng nga nen ruk mipiin nime mo?
Isowr do kchol dokka ku ngi mraal kpii rangda? Kpindit pikka Isowr;
Mraal kpii rang nga ku da? Diyou dok da, kdiyou dok thungki kring kinle, Isowr khut chang ktongtha ka am, nen ntummi pauvi mikthe pik cha ava Jisu Khrista pmemo?
Khrista wonsat thungki ku ngi mikṭhen raanda? Suwkthuw rangmo, ku owr kcha rangmo, kja kakham mo, poitham rangmo, kheel siiki kja kakham mo, mdit mata kaang ksaang rangda?
Hanto mdo kjit lulu, “Nah tummi neenna niiluwnni me eayou inda; mdo eayo rangki jao lulu neenna mbin inda.”
Eme, havale mkheng thungki nnenna kheel siingi Mma wonsatti kapchaang riim tkurthuw in.
Mleija neiji kbin katta, mleija kdiyou daat don, rinkhu daat don, Waan tamsii daat don, kapchaang rek daat don, tuntunki daat don, karvang rangki daat don, rutan daat don,
kparthaang daat don, ktlum daat don, mdit mata mdo seem mkheng thungki talu talu kurthuwk daat don nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki Isowr wonsat thungki nnenna miṭhen pchaang liit in nime.
Neiji Khrista ki mkindit kthe kcha ping, ahuwng chmaan ring, pthla kchiir amleiji kuplungbin ni sakhi kuhur kurthuwk ping,
mleija neia kheel siiki kja kakhammi kuplung thung ngi mhai pja chda.
Mleija suruwl dil kṭoiji ku u knao rek leh krilam rek tummi nei kdaksaa katti pauhur kdo phaak chaak nra Khrista hinki kdet buk ava kngei kro ping.
Mmaanna Isreel miirek lam, ungta mmaan hinni mchapa kurthuwk, laarnee ki paurina, Nowlam kpii, luwkbuk, ungu paureel ava ka am,
mmaan thung ngi npuh le rilam ka am, ungta daksaa dil kṭoiji Khrista ava mmaan rilam thungki kthuwk. Mkheng tuwn ka am Isowr ava kṭuw knaima msuwkṭha. Amen.
Pdainu Isowr pauna ava do tipsit ma nrang pme. Mleija Isreel charuwl thungki mkheng ava daatti Isreel miirek ava pme.
Ungta mmaanni Abraham charuwl rek mkurthut lei inni mkheng inni Mma naole ava pme; pdainu “Nah charuwl la Isek thungki ra,” dida theda.
Hava ki mleija Isowr naole ava daksaa dil kṭoi ava pme, pdainu paureel naole ava charuwl rek kdingi mdo tai.
Mleija paureel dothe ava hava, “Mpha hava arveelli Neiji kinle nikdi ungta Sarah ngi chapa khat kthloira.”
Ungu anto daat ava pme, pdainu Rebika rukva nenki npah in Isek tdit miilai khat ava nao muhur mpha thu,
mmaan mṭou du liitti, kṭha mata kṭhakma ava mtlot du ngi, kukchol dilkṭoiji Isowr poibin mkurnowl tlit daat nra, nongrek, lei ava pme, pdainu mdo own dok leiji,
Rebika hin theda, “Upa ngi mnaopa sok klora,” dida.
Mdokjit dok ava lulungi, “Jakob pa wonsat mdolo pdainu Esau va kipder ra,” dida.
Ava mkurthuttu nenni tak the chenaan di? Isowr ktong thangva ksan ksui ka ammo? Anto liit pme!
Mleija Mma ngi Mousi hin theda, “Neiji wonsat kdolo hin wonsat lo nikdi, ungta Neiji plung kdo pneipsuk hin plung pnei nikdi.”
Ava leiji miilaiji mdobin ava lei pme, mdit mata mnongtlot lei pme, pdainu Isowr wonsat leen kurthuwk.
Mleija Laaika ngi Pharon hin theda, “Neiji ahin rutan kdo tdet nra, dultipaam mkheng thu Nei kmiing ava ngi mkaryaam nra, hava kat leiji Neiji nang nga ado kupthuw kurthuwk.”
Ava leiji Mma ngi mdobin psuk ava hin wonsat loda, ungta Mma ngi plung mdo tipchai nra mii ava hin plung mdo tipchai psuk.
Ava mkurthutbi naanni kihin the naandi, Talu lei Mma va karmak mdo phaak tlit da? Mleija kungi Mma poibin kmat rangda?”
Pdainu Isowr hin pau karthawng purlup miilai nang ava ku ptida? Mdosak ava ngi ksa hin, “Talu lei anto ado tseemda didonle karthawng rangmo?”
Tnek ksa ava ngi bul khdaat thungki louda khatti nong kṭha thungki ra ungta ktlok khatti pang sin tsinton rangki mdo sak nrangki bul leenni mdo pchaan amemo?
Mma ngi muplungthit mdo tdet nra ungta mrutan mdo tpandan nra, kokrop chrangki mdo seem plungthit ki uwm ava kheelli kdiilṭhi mkurthut tu,
wonsat ki uwm rek tummi Mma laarnee suwang sii, chodu reeppi laarnee tumra mdo purchuwl dok ava,
Mma do own dok nen nhin ruk Jihudia rek hin daat kma pdainu ktlok chati rek hin ruk Isowr ri ktidet nuwm mkurthuttu tak kthuwkka?
Hosea thu Mma ngi hanto mdothe dok lulu,
“Nei kmiirek kma mmaan ava,
‘Nei kmiirek’ dida Neiji own lam nikdi,
Ungta wonsat kdolo ma mii ava,
‘Nei kwonsat lo’ dida own nikdi.’ ”
“Ungta ‘Naanna Nei
kmiirek kmaanti,’
dida mhin inni kdothe na mun kat thung ngi,
‘Kring Isowr chaparek didonle mmaanna ko own lamra.’ ”
Ungta Isaijah ngi Isreel mlei thung ngi owngda theda, “Isreel chapa rek naanna truwn ava thungki sitphui jangi nem chdaat jownti; kthlowm tek kaktlan pik ra.
Mleija Mukpu ngi Mma paudon ava dultipaam tu kbeisekki kupṭuw pthiira.
Ungta Isaijah ngi hanto mdo the dok lulu,
“Waanmii luwngpa ki Mukpu ngi,
nen nhin naole mmaak mabi,
nenna Sodom hep lulu don,
Gomorah lulu tkurthut chaak raan.”
Anto mkur thuttu nenni tak the chenaandi? Mleija rinkindit kchen pṭoi kma ktlok chati rekki, ditta mmaanni mdo rin chaak lei inni rinkindit pha chlamda;
pdainu Nowlam dil kṭoiji rinkindit kchen pṭoi Isreel miirekva Nowlam kpurkhum ava pchaangme.
Tak lei da? Mleija mmaanni mdo rin chaak inni chen pṭoi lamme, pdainu nongrek tummi kchen pṭoi lulu kurthuwkda. Mmaanni khusiir mdo parthit nraanki lung ava leenni khusiir mparthit chaak inna.
Ava mdo kjit dok lulu,
“Asuwn, Siyon thung ngi miirek khusiir parthit nrangki lung khat,
ungta mtluk nraanki lung klin khat Neiji kthiik daatta;
ungta Mma krin cha miia ningkja du nime.”
Ku u knaorek, nei kuplung ngi bin chnu ungta Isowr hin kdo ṭhil pik nlamki mlei ava mdo ktlan pik nlam rangki kurthuwk.
Isowr tummi mmaanni plung muplut chaak in, pdainu dei kat chlamme tdit neiji sakhhi kuhur pik lamma.
Mleija Isowr hinki kurjung rinkindit ava deipandi chlamme, ungta mmaan dobin chaak ava thlaam lamda, Isowr rinkindit hin kirpii lamme.
Mleija Khrista ngi Nowlam ki mdonna mkurthut leiji, krin kcha miipum ktai ava kpindit pik chra.
Mousi ngi kjit da, mleija Nowlam dil kṭoiji rinkindit ktlo miia kring chra.
Pdainu krin cha thu rinkindit rekki theda, “Parwaan tha ku kakal rangda?” dida plung thu thema. (Ditta Khrista mdo arjun pṭum nrang lei kthe kurthuwk)
Mata “Kungi dulti ril tha jungklut rangda?” (Ditta Khrista ava kdiyou thungki mdo hunṭhi nrang lei).
Pdainu ava ngi tak mtheda? pauna ava naan ner leen leh plung thung ngi knai tekka, (Ditta krin chaki pauna karyaam);
mleija naan nerri Jisua Mukpu ungta Isowr ri kdiyou thungki mdo prin pinlet dida the thuwda plung thu arin chaak inbi, akaktlan pik chraan.
Mleija plung ngi mdobin chaak leiji mii ava mdo pindit pik, ungta nerri mdo the thut chaak leiji mdo ktlan pik.
Laaika ngi theda, “Mma krin kcha miipum ktaiva ningkja duni me.”
Mleija Jihudia rek leh Grik rek arlakki mkar thlei nra ame; Mukpu ava katta mkheng inki Mukpu, ungu Mma ku own kcha mii mkheng hin msuwanthuw kpii kcha kurthuwk.
Mleija, “Mukpu miing ku own kcha miipum ktaija kaktlan pik chra.”

Pdainu mmaanni Mhin krin cha kma pava tak heppi ku own lamrangda? Ungta mmaanni mdo aryaak liit maan Mma hin tak heppi krin cha lam rangda? Ungu kparyaam ktaak daattu mmaanva tak heppi karyaa lam rang da?
Mdosi kma donle miirek va tak heppi kparyaam rang da? mdo kjit dok lulu, “Kṭha paumin kparyaam rek khu ava tija thu mrungchen kṭha chdaat ta!”
Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni kṭha paumin pṭoi lamme; mleija Isaijah ngi theda, “Mukpu, neen mkaryaak pik in ku ngi mrin chaak da?”
Ava leiji krin cha ava karyaa thungki, ungu karyaa ava Khrista doparyaam thungki.
Pdainu neiji kikhewlla,
mmaanva aryaa memo? mdo aryaak kat in;
mleija mmaan krowl ava dultipaam mkheng thu,
ungta mmaan pauna rekka dultipaam mdonna dekki kchet dok.”
Neiji kikhewl nowlla, Isreel miiva dei pindi liit memo?
Rukringi Mousi ngi theda,
“Chati khat kurthuwk kma rek hin khei apthe nikdi;
ka aak chati leen plung apthit nik di.”
Ava dilli Isaijah ngi plung ktangarri theda,
“Nei makthlaam kma rekki Neia mpha chlamda;
Nei mkikhewl kma rek hin kdaksaa ktardet nu.”
Pdainu Isreel hin Mma ngi theda, “Kupṭoi kma leh paukleek rek hin niiluwnni kukhut khiing tlit daak nikdi.”
Ava mkurthut tu neiji aju khewl inni, Isowr va mmiirek mipthlei mo? Anto liit pme nei kdaksaa kat rukka Isreel miiping, Abraham charuwl thungki, Benjamin sumkhur khat ping.
Isowr va chodu reeppi mdodee dok mmii rek ava pthlei me. Elijah mlei thu Laaika dothe ava naanni dei maan timo? Isreel miirek raal kpii ngi mmava Isowr hin tak heppi mthe?
“Mukpu, mmaanni Nah akhulpu rekka eayou lamda, Nah asuwlbuwr rek eakrep lamda, ungta kthina daatti ka am imping, ungta mmaanva krinkhu mthlaam inna.”
Pdainu Isowr va mhin tak heppi marthaan? “Baal hin pkhuppi tardiilda kukuwn kma Nei kdaksaa kat tumra mii pun tikheu kdo arkhiik daat ka am.”
Ava leiji tun rukva plungnee ngi mdo kchol kekleem mruk ka am daatta.
Pdainu plungnee lei mkurthut bi, nong rek lei kurthuwk nowlme; anto mkurthut ma lebi, plungnee ava plungnee ngi am nowl nime.
Anto mkurthut tu talu rang? Isreel miirekva mdo thlaam inna pha chlamme, mdo kcholli mphaak chaakka, pdainu angṭhe rekka kapchai reen lamma,
hanto mdo kjit dok lulu,
“Isowr ri mhin inni kuk mok pthla pii lamda,
snii kpha thu mmik inni dei lamme,
maknaa inni aryaa lamme.”
Ungta Devid ti theda,
“Mmaan tebol ava ktaang leh makman naan khat kurthuwk so,
khur leh mraal ava mtum in kurthuwk so;
mdo dee ma nraan mmik inna jiing chso,
ungu kṭuw knai liit kma tkum chlam so.”
Ava leiji neiji kikhewlla, mmaanva mtluk nraanki khusiir mparthit inmo? Anto liit pme! Pdainu Isreelli khei mdothe nra, mmaan pnu ton leiji ktlok chati rek hin mkirliin naan kurthuwk.
Tunva mmaan pnu tonni dultipaam suwanthuwna, ungta mmaan doparma ngi ktlok chati rek suwanthuwna mkurthutbi, mkurhum tip innu, tija pang thu knem rangda!
Tunva ktlok chati rek naan hinni neia kpau ping. Ktlok chati rek hinkira kenyee khat kukurthut leiji, neiji knong tlot ava kdo kjat chaak
nei kmii Jihudia rek khei pthe nda, ungu mii angṭhe mdo ktlan nrangki kurthuwk.
Mleija mmaan do pthleiji dultipaam mdo pipinna mkurthut bi, mdolo pik nlamki mlei ava kdiyou dok thungki rinkhu kpha kcha ava kma donle talu rang?
Thenpen phel ava rukri reeppi kseeng theiji tlaai mdown chaakbi, mkheng kheng ngi kchiir ra; ungta murjuwng mseen bi, mbaak rukka kseengra.
Pdainu mbaak rek angṭhe beng chasora, ungu nang nga nowm kruwn khatti mben nathu ajomphun sora, kruwn dak ava thungki msuwanthuw aphaak chaak ve inbi,
mbaak rek tunni napal tlot nma. Nang ngi napal atlotbi, nang ngi murjuwng ado bom ava pme, pdainu murjuwng ngi ado tbom ava abin phaak cha.
Nang ngi the nadi, “Nei mdo tjomphun nra mbaak rekka kbeng kcha a.”
Ava mkindit kat kurthuwk. Mmaanna mdo rin chaak maan leiji kbeng kcha lam, pdainu nah ado rin chaakki krip kcha pti. Ava leiji pohok chma pdainu aṭi cha.
Mleija Isowr ri mbaak kat rap klu maktlan mabi, Mmava nang ruk aktlan pik nime.

Isowr wonsat leh plungthit atin cha: Ktluw kcha rek hin muplung mdo tipchai, pdainu nah hinva Isowr wonsat ka am, Mma wonsat kurnowlda ado tpurdon pik; antole mkurthut chaak mabi, nang rukka akaprah buk pthiira.
Ungta murson rek rukka mdo rin chaak maan thu ma am tlit daat maanbi, mmaan rukka kjom phunra, mleija Isowr va mdo jomphun nowl nlam rangki rutan mdo thloi.

Mleija nowm kruwn ding khat kat nang ava athlam bukda ungu daksaa kurdu kma, innkruwn dingleen atjomphun chaakbi, mdaksaa katki baak rek mmaan mdak kat kruwn ava dingleen va kheel siingi kjom phun pik chra.

Ku u knaorek, naan plungbin ni ksing lulu karbin chmaan, hava kukthuk pau ava naan dodee ra neiji kngei chaakka: Ktlok chati rekki kurhummi marvan du khim khai, Isreel miirek angṭhe hin plung kapchai set set daat ra,
Ungta ava leiji Isreel mii mkheng nga kaktlan pikra;
mdo kjit dok lulu,
“Kṭenthuw pik ava Siyon thungki kthleng nga,
Jakob charuwl thungki kṭhakma rekka klou pthiira;”
“Neiji mmaan pnu rek klo pthii mpha thu,
mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi hava Nei kpaurina.”
Kṭha paumin ktong thangva mmaanna naan akahal kchaan kurthuwk lam, pdainu mdo kchol dok rek ktong thangva mmaanna mpuhle tumva wonsat mdolo rek kurthuwk lam.
Mleija Isowr ki leemna chla rek leh mdo own rekka msuwkṭha.
Mpha khat thu naanni Isowr pau ado leek in lulu, pdainu tunva mmaan pauleek leiji wonsat arlaan chaak inna.
Ava leiji mmaan hin wonsat mdo tdet lulungi mmaan rukva wonsat mdo arlaan chaak nraan, tunva mmaan ava paukleek kurthuwk lamme.
Mleija Isowr va mii mkheng wonsat mdolo nra, mii mkheng ngi pau mdo leek nra ktlo kurthuwk.
O Isowr suwanthuw leh lousing ungta mdodee pindit ava tija thung ngi kukthuk chdaatta! Mma dokṭewlla tathlaam pchaan me ungu Mma lamṭoija tdee pchaan liit me!
“Mleija Mukpu poibinna kungi dei don,
mdit mata kungi kparseel rang da?”
“Mdit mata Mma dochoi pinlet ra kungi Mhin chla mpiikda?”
Mleija do mkheng nga Mma hinki Mma thungki Mma hintha ka am. Mma hin kṭuw knaima laarnee jiam so. Amen
Ava leiji, ku u knaorek, naan adaksaan ava kring leh kseeng ungu Isowr dolo kurhui tlaai downni ado piik chaak nraan Isowr wonsatti neiji naan hin kthe chaakka, pthla ktongtha naanni luwkbuk in pti.

Hava dultipaam nopa dilkṭoiji am maan, pdainu Isowr dongeija ava thide tdit tdee nangi kṭha ungta talo kurhui ungu mkinreel ava talu tdit adodee nraan, apoibin in ren kur owlli adaksaanna kur owl chaan.

Mleija naan miipum ktaiji muplungbin ava pkheel dekda kheel siingi mdo bin ma nra, pdainu miipum ktaiji Isowr dosilna krin cha avaki tpartena dil kṭoiji plung kdowng ngi adobin nraan, nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak plungnee avangi akatham chaak inna.
Mleija nen ndaksaan khdaat thung ngi msing knempok amda, ungta msing mkheng nga mnong kinṭim sii me,
ava leiji knempok nen ava Khrista thung ngi daksaa khdaat in pmin, ungu nen miipum ktaija daksaa thungki msing khat khat in pmin kdingi abin in.
Nen nhin mido tpiik chaak in plungnee dilkṭoiji msik msik chla tathloi in: pau kphuwngva, nen dorin chaak dil kṭoiji aphuwng chaso;
soklouva, nen soklo dil kṭoiji sok alou chaso; kpurchuk miiva, mma ngi apurchuk chaso;
kuksop miiva, mma ngi aksop so; kpii kchava, plung kneiji apii chaso; kbom cha miiva, plung klutti abom chaso; wonsat ktidet miiva, wonsatti kanpa kanpa ngi nong atlot pik so.
Wonsat ava dodak kat kat kurthuwkso; kṭhakma ava apder chaan, kṭha ava knetti arpom chaan;
unao wonsat kurlo lulungi khat leh khat wonsat kurlo in; khat leh khat karjat chaan.
Howngkva kma ngi nong alou in, pthla ngi kdung kdimmi Mukpu nong alou chaan.
Adobin psuk in thu kanpa chaan, suwkthuwk thung ngi adiil dei chaan, kdet liit kma aṭhil chaan.
Kintiing rek dokriin apurdon pik in, mal akowl dei chaan.
Naan akapja kchaan phowl kṭha apiin, phowl kṭha apiinra pauhur buk maan.
Kanpa rek akanpat ṭhiin, kṭap rek aṭa ṭhiin.
Khat leh khat plung kinṭimmi jiam in; kparlin reen maan, pdainu kdil nong thung ngi karchin inra am in; ksing siingi karbin maan.
Ku mii khat lee hin kṭhakma tummi kṭhakma ngi thul maan, pdainu mii mkheng dosut nathung ngi kṭha abin in.
Mkurthut derangbi, naan thung ngi ka am mii mkheng ava kdaaiji am so.
Kwonsat lorek, naan adaksaan ki phuw kurlou maan, pdainu Isowr plung thit hinni ama pthiin; mleija ava kjit dokda, “Phuw klouva Nei kdo, Neiji purthul nikdi, dida Mukpu ngi theda.”
Eme, “Akahal kcha poi mthamta, apamaal cha; mning makraal ta mdoneek ra dii apii cha; mleija anto ktlo avangi mma luwleen mei ai kṭuwng purtuwl naan.”
Kṭhakma kparchaan maan, pdainu kṭha ngi kṭhakma atapchaan in.
Miipum ktaija paamkpu diikpu kurdu ngi jiam so. Mleija Isowr hin kma donle rutan kthloi mii ame, ungu ka am daat rek ava Isowr dosil na jesang kurthuwk.
Ava leiji, rutan kthloi rek krokma mii ava Isowr do kchol kro kma kurthuwk, ungu krokma miia kekṭewlra.
Mleija paamkpu rekka kṭha nong ngi tipṭit rangki ava pme, pdainu kṭhakma rangki rutan kthloi mii ava naanni ṭini maan timo? Ava mkurthutta kṭha atlo in, ungu mma dorot pik arlaang chnaandi,

mleija mma naan ṭhat nra Isowr sra owr kurthuwk. Pdainu naanni karmak atlot inta, aṭi chaan; mleija do mdopsit marangki mkaangksaang hurme; mma Isowr sra owr, karmak ktlo hin muplung thit kupthlung ra.
Ava leiji, Isowr plungthit rang kat daat ser maan, pdainu poithuw daat rukva miilai khat va mma kurdu ngi ma am kat ra.
Mleija hava mlei thung ngi naanni khasna ado piik in, ditta hava nong kat tummi rutan kthloi rek ava Isowr nong ktlo rek kurthuwk lam.
Ado tuwl in mkheng nga apiin, khasna ado piik nraan thung ngi khasna apiin, ado piik nraan hin apiin, ado kjat raan hin akjat in, kheel siingi ado kjat nraan hin kheel siingi akjat in.
Khat leh khat wonsat kurlo kma donle, ku mii khat lee hinki leenlei khat lee pre tuwl maan; mleija mveen wonsat klo mii ava ngi Nowlam mdo purhum.
“Nang ngi losang ṭhima, Nang ngi mii eayou ma, pruma, nang ngi kheithe ma,” dida paureenda, ungta paureen murson rukka hava thung ngi mparchin tpom dok, “Nah adaksaa lulungi aveen wonsat alo cha.”
Wonsatti mveen hin karmak tlome; ava leiji wonsatta Nowlam kurkhum.

Hava daat kma hava talu ṭhang tdit naanni adodee in, tunva naanni ki iip thungki akardel nraanki mpha ava kvei dokka, mleija ru kri thokki nenni trin chaak in thungki hinva tunva kirliin na ava knai tekka;
Jaan ava lamkla ngi kvei kcha a, suwn knai tekka, nenni kjiingnu ki nongrek ava var pthiin che ungta mar awngki phow ava hiilnaa inche;
nen ndaksaan ava suwnni kchet lulungi chet inche, lamchet kapta ungu ju kipri, kṭhakma ktlo, plung krip kma, kar ai kalrai leh kheithe chang tlaak ktlo ava ma pthiin che.
Pdainu Mukpu Jisu Khrista ava hiilnaa da, ungu daksaa ningthlun nra daksaa nong tlo maan.
Krin cha thung ngi ksowl mii ava akowl chaan, pdainu mma poibin thung ngi kalrai ṭhi maan.
Ksowl chava an ke er daat mchaak arlaanni, ku mii khatva do khim khai tchaak krora kdingi binda.
Kchaa miiva kchaa kma mii ava do ksi kma binna mso, ungta kchaa kma miiva kchaa mii ava kṭewlna mso; mleija mma Isowr ri mdo kowl chaak dok.
Ktlok khat sra owr kekṭewl nang nga ku pti? Mma mdaksaa ki Kpupa maiṭhuwmmi tri ruk krip mata tutluk ruk ktlu kurthuwk kcha. Ungta mma ava ktipri pik chra, mleija mma Kpupava ktiprip kapchaang.
Miilai khat va nit khat ava nit khat hinnu kheel sii heppi mdo bin chaak, ktlok khatva nit mkheng nga kurdu jikki mdo bin. Miipum ktaiji mma mma poibinni rip mer chaso.
Nit kdan miiva, Mukpu mdo kjat nangi kdan cha kurthuwk so. Kchaa mii rukva Mukpu kakjatti achaa so, mma ngi Isowr mdo panpaak leiji, kchaa ku mii khat ruk va kheel siingi Mukpu kakjatti achaaso.
Nen ku mii khat leea mdaksaa tummi kring ava pme, ungta nen ku mii khat lee ngi mdaksaa tummi kdiyou ava pme.

Nenni kring nkurthut inbi, ava Mukpu hin kring cha tkurthut in, ungta nenni ndiyo inbi, ava Mukpu hin kdiyou tkurthut in; ava mkurthutbi, nenni ring jown min mata diyou jown min, nenna Mukpu do in pmin.
Mma ngi kdiyou leh kring mikniing ki Mukpu mkurthut nra, mṭutna hava ki tummi, Khrista ngi diyouda ungu kring kinle nowl.
Talu leiji naanva a u anao in akṭewl inna? Mata talu leiji naanva a u anao in ado rot in pme? Mleija nen nkheng inna Isowr ki kekṭewl ku onna maiṭhuwmmi tri sap raan;
Mleija kjit dok da,
“Mukpu ngi theda,
Nei krin leiji,
pkhup khim khaiji Kihin ktardiilra,
ungta plei khim khaiji Isowr kpanpaak ra.”
Ava leiji nnen nkheng ngi Isowr hin ndak ndakki mlei ava tpiik raan.
Ava leiji nenni khat leh khat leen kṭewl nmaan che, pdainu ava kchang nga a u anao inni lam thu khusiir mdo parthit ma nra mata mtluk ma nra poi abin in.
Mukpu Jisu ngi mlei kurthuwkda ktobor do khat lee ame tdit neiji kdee chaak; pdainu ktobor kdingi kbin ku mii khat tumva ktobor.
Naan do chaak ava ngi a u anao in khusiir parthit nra mkurthutbi, naanna wonsat dil kṭoiji chet maan ti. Khrista ngi mma tummi mdo diyo pik ava naan then chaakki ea krep maan.
Ava leiji naan ṭhatna ava kṭhakma ktongtha pauna mso.
Mleija Isowr Kruwngpaam ma tchaak tneek na pme, pdainu pthla kchiir thung ngi rinkindit leh kdaai ungu kanpa ngi;
Khrista sok klo thu Isowr dorot pik ungu miirek dorot ava kurthuwk.
Ava mkurthut leiji nenni khat leh khat hin kdaai leh plung kurchuwlli punchoi inche.
Then lei daatti nenni Isowr nong ae krep maan che. Do mkheng nga kartleu kat, pdainu mii khusiir parthit nrang ngi then kchaa ava rome;
saa kchaa mata ju knee ngi naanki a u anao in khusiir parthit nra khat lee tlo maan.
Naan dorin chaak ava adaksaan leh Isowr arlakki arkhi chaan; mdaksaa mthina dorotti mdo kṭewl ma mii ava kanpa kcha.
Pdainu plung chei kirche ngi kchaa mii ava mraal ka am, mleija mdobin chaakki mmava tlome; mleija krin cha thungki kma ava pnu.
Ksowl do pchaan ma kuhur ṭhi rangki nnenna nruwn ktang, ungta nen ndaksaan ning thlunna rang pme;
nen miipum ktaiji mma mma veen ṭhat nra, mukpunchoi nra tlot pik inche.
Mleija Khrista va mdaksaa mthina ki mning thlunna tlome; pdainu mdo kjit dok lulungi, “Nah akrai kcharek dorai ava Nei kleen ktla a.”
Mleija Laaika thungki chodu cho dilli mdo kjit dok ava nen mido tukso naan kurthuwk so, ditta plung krip mer leh kursoppi Laaika tbin psuk in.
Jisu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi khat leh khat plung khdaat plung knet ungta kuksop tu kilṭhi ngi a am nraan Isowr ri aju rot pik inso,
mleija krowl khdaatti kirchin da, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah Isowr ava naanni apanpaak chaan.
Ava leiji Isowr laarnee tummi Khrista ngi naan ado tkowl chaak in heppi, khat leh khat ekurkowl chaan.
Mleija npuhle hin mdo piik dok paureel ava mnet bet nra, Isowr ki kindit deek ava mdo tdet nra, Khrista ava vunmor kreen rek sra owrri kurjung dinu neiji naan hin kthe chaakka.
Ungta Mma wonsat leiji ktlok chati rekki Isowr mdo panpaak chaak nraanki. Mdo kjit dok hava lulu,
“Ava leiji Nang nga neiji ktlok chati rek thungki apanpaak nikdi, ungta Nah miing nga laa ngi thee nikdi.”
Ungu veikhat nowlli theda,
O ktlok chatirek,
Mma miirek tu kilṭhi ngi apanpaak chaan.”;
Ungta veikhat nowlli,
“Ktlok chatirek, akheng inni Isowr apanpaak chaan,
ungu mii mkheng ngi Mma apanpaak chaso”;
ungta kheel setti Isaijah
ngi theda,
“Ktlok chati rek leen kpaal rangki,
kthuwk Mma ava Jessi arjuwng thungki kthleng;
Mma hin ktlok chati rekki plung ngi kbin
psuk chra.”
Pthla Kchiir rutanki plung ngi kbin mnem set set nra, plung ngi bin inti ado rin chaak in Isowr ava ngi kanpa leh kdaai aju pdim pik chaan so.
Ku u knaorek, nei kdak kat rukka naan mlei thung ngi kning kthlung kcha a, mleija naan adaksaanna kṭha ava ngi kurkhumda, mkheng kdei ava ngi dim chda, ungta khat leh khat kpurchuk pchaang inti nu.
Pdainu naan dobin phaak ra mkinreel angṭhe akikjit pik inna, mleija Isowr ri nei kihin mdo tpiik plungnee ngi,
ktlok chati rek tlaaidown ava pthla kchiir ri mdo tpinchel dok talo kro kdingi thiimpu nong thung ngi kṭha paumin nong ktlo khatti soklou neiji plung ktangarri kthe chaakka.
Isowr ri mlei kurthuwkda knong tlot ava Jisu Khrista thu napal kdo tlot kat ra.
Mleija ktlok chati rekki kthe kupṭoi mkurthut nraan, nei kthung ngi Khrista doparman dok ava kma donle neiji do khat lee pre the chni maang. Pauna leh mnong tlotti,
titinna rek leh tngana rek rutan ava pthla kchiir rutanni, Jerusalem kingi lamkla ngi kowlda Ilirikiam kpha neiji Khrista ki kṭha paumin ava kurkhummi paryaam chnu,
Khrista miing mdodee nmaan liit thu, ktlok miilai khatti ber kcho mdo phun na thung neiji kṭha paumin kparyaam rangki ptuwn chnu,
pdainu mdo kjit dok hava lulu,
“Mma miing am nma thu mmaanni kdei kpha chlamra,
ungta Mma karyaa kma mmaanni karyaa pindi chlamra.”
Hava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, mpha maknem thu naan hin kthlen nra ava mapkhaan tlitda.
Pdainu tunva hava paamkowl thungva mmun kdo thloi chaak nowl ma leiji ungta kum roiksot thu naan hin kthlen nuwm leiji,
neiji Spenia tha kche mpha thu ado kukurdut ṭhi raan kbin chaakka, chodu reeppi naan tu kanpa sap thiin min don, naanni klamṭoi nrangtha ado tdak chaak raan.
Talu talu kurthuwk daat joso, tun tunva kintiing rek kbomra Jerusalem tha kahang rang imping.
Mleija Jerusalem tha ka am kintiing rek hinni Masidonia leh Akhaja ki rekki kpii kcha thu leemna chla purdon pik lamda plung kngamma.

Mmaan rukva plung kngammi tlo nuwm lamda, ungta mmaanva mmaan lei mtuwl chaak inna, mleija ktlok chati rekki pthla ktongki phowl kṭha kphaak ṭhi mkurthutbi, mmaan rukva daksaa ktongki dona ngi soklou rangtha kurthuwkka.
Ava leiji, neiji hava kupṭut dok mpha thu, ungu mmaanni mdo pthuw chaak in ava mhin inni mparlaan dok inta, neiji naan hinki Spenia tha vang ro nikdi.
Ungta neiji naan hin kthlen mpha thu Khrista hinki phowl kṭha ava kdimmi thleng nikdi tdit neiji kdee chaakka.
Ku u knaorek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista leh pthla wonsatti neiji kthe chaakka, nei ktumra neitu kilṭhi ngi Isowr hin tha ṭhil sap inche.
Mleija Jihudia thungki krin kma rek hinki ka karthle chaak nra, ungta Jerusalem tummi nei ksoklo ava kintiing rek dongei mkurthut nra,
ava leiji Isowr dongei kanpa leh arda krokki naan hin thleng chnik di.
Naan akheng nga kdaai ki Isowr ri aju ṭhi chaan so. Amen.
Kenkria ki rinlop thung ngi dikannu khat kurthuwk nen nchernuwn Phobe ava neiji kdorot pik dok,
mleija mma ava naanni Mukpu hintha kintiing kurhuiji ado tarlaan pik chaak nraan, naan hin mma do kat nra ava abom chaan, mleija mma ava mii maknem leh nei kdaksaa kat ruk mukbom kchaan.
Jisu Khrista nong thung ngi knong sukṭhi Prisila leh Akuila kurvui chaak lamma,
nei krinkhu tummi mmaanni mlowl mjur pik chlamda, nei kthina ngi panpaak chlam maang, pdainu ktlok chati rek rinlop mkheng rukva mpanpaak chaak lamma;
mmaan inn thungki rinlop rekka kurvui chaak lamma. Khrista hin Asia thungki rukri reeppi plungren kuhur, kwonsat lo Epinetias ava kurvui chaakka.
Naan arlakki kdung nong klou kcha Mery ava kurvui chaakka.
Nei krilam kthuwk rowng inn thu kdo amṭhi Andronikias leh Junias ava kurvui chaak lamma; mmaanna kenyee rek arlakki tdee ra khat ungta nei kdu ngi Khrista hin ka am dok miirek lam.
Mukpu hin nei kwonsat lo Amplitias ava kurvui chaakka.
Khrista hin nen nongsuk ṭhiin Urbanas leh kwonsat lo Stakhias ava kurvui chaak lamma.
Khrista hin mdorot dok Apillas ava kurvui chaakka. Aristobulas phungka thu ka am rekka kurvui chaak lamma.
Nei krilam kthuwk Herodion na kurvui chaakka. Narsisas phungka thungki Mukpu hin ka am rekka kurvui chaak lamma.
Mukpu nong ktlorek Triphana leh Triphosa ava kurvui chaak lamma. Mukpu hin kdung ngi nongksu nei kwonsat lo Presisa ava kurvui chaakka.
Mukpu nong ktlo thung ngi titin chaak ra khat kurthuwk Ruphas leh mma nuh ungu nei knuh ruk kurthuwk mmaan ava kurvui chaak lamma.
Asinkritas, Phlekon, Hermis, Patrobas, Harmas, ungta mmaan tu kilṭhi mu u mnaorek ava kurvui chaak lamma.
Philologas, Julia, Nerias, leh mchernu, ungta Olympas leh mma tu kilṭhi kintiing rek mkheng nga kurvui chaak lamma.
Kchiir khat doputti khat leh khat ekurvui chaan. Khrista rinlop mkheng ngi aturvui chaak inna.
Ku u knaorek, neiji akthe chaak inna, naan do kurchuk dok ava ksinchaak ungta tparsat luida msik msikki ktlo miirek ava aser inra atin in.
Mleija anto lu hep kdu miirek va nenki Mukpu Khrista sok lome, pdainu mthen pjor in ungta mpauṭhat inle mnerjaan inni do kdei cha kmarek plung huwn chaak nlamda.
Mleija naanni pau ado pṭoi in ava mkheng hinni mkandan slii daat thu mleija ava leiji naan leen neia kanpa kcha ping. Naanni kṭha thung ngi ksing lulu, kṭhakma thung ngi ado dee pandit ma nraan;
ava dil rongi kdaai ki Isowr ri seitaanna naan khuther ri kuknuwr pthiira. Nen ki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi aju kurthlo ṭhi chaanso.
Nei knongsuk ṭhi Timothi leh Lusia ungta Jason ungu nei krilam kthuwk Sosipater mmaanni aturvui chaak inna.
Hava chethi kikjit, Tartias neiji Mukpu hin akurvui chaak inna.
Rinlop mkheng leh nei mhai kupthlung kcha Kajas ava ngi aturvui chaak inna. Khuwpii sumbuwr karkhii Erastas leh nenki nu u nnao in Kurtas ava ngi naan aturvui chaak inna.
(Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista plungnee ngi akheng inna aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so. Amen.)

Tunva neiki kṭha paumin dil kṭoiji ru akaptan pik in kapchaang, ungta Jisu Khrista mdo paryaam dil kṭoiji, kum roiksotti, tuprutti mdo arkhiik pthii, kurthluk pau mdo tpandan pik dil kṭoiji Mma hin aksil chaak naanna,
pdainu tunva khulpu rek dokjit ava ngi chati rek mkheng hin mtidet dokka, krin cha kupṭoi mlei thung ngi, kṭuw knai kma Isowr paureen dil kṭoiji akthe pik dok inna.
Ksing Isowr khdaat chrel hinni Jisu Khrista thu kṭuw knai ma laarnee ka am kurthuwk so! Amen.
Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat, Isowr poibin thu mdo own dok Poul leh nenki na u nnao in Sosthenas ava ngi,
Korinthia ki Isowr rinlop hin tha, Jisu Khrista hin mdo tpinchel dok, Mukpu Jisu Khrista miing ku own kcha mmun ktaiki mii mkheng rek ava kintiing dida nen nkheng inki Mukpu ngi mdo own tpom dok:
Nenki npah in Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai naan thu am so.
Jisu Khrista hinki naan hinni mdo piik dok plungnee ava leiji mpha ktai thu neiji Isowr kpanpaak chaakka,
tditta mlam ktai thu naanna apausaam in mkheng leh mkheng thu kdei kcha ngi dim chaan tinu.
Khrista hin tha naan hin ki rinpaumin ava rukka net da.
Tditta ava leiji naanni nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista kandang ra ado ardat in heppi naan hinni pthla ktongki leemna chla ava kukhop kma lua ame;
nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista nit thung ngi kparmak tdit ktaakki mṭut na kpha dekki Mma ngi akipnet chraan.
Isowr ra trin chaak ra, Mchapa Jisu Khrista nenki Mukpu ava tu plap kurthuwk rangki naanna ado tu own chaak dok in.
Ku u knao rek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista miing ngi, neiji naan hin kthe chaakka, tditta naan arlakki kinṭhen ktaakki a am nraan, pdainu poibin khdaat ungu kekṭewl khdaatti kunlom in
Mleija ku u knao rek, naan arlakki kar ai kalrai ka amma kdingi khuloi miirekki neia mson pik chlam da.
Ava ki mleija naan miipum ktaiji, “Neia Poul mii ping,” Mdit mata “Apollo mii ping,” Mdit mata “Sephas mii ping,” kdingi theen tinu.
Khrista ava athem inmo? Naan tummi Poul la Khros leen kukthoi mo?
Kripas leh Kajas kma donle neiji ku mii khat lee pre baptis ado kuptlot maan leiji kanpa kchaam ping.
Nei kmiing ngi baptis ktlot dida ku khat lee ngi mdo the ma nrang lei.
Neiji Stiphanas le phungka mkheng baptis kdo ptlot chaak lam. Ava pkheelnu neiji baptis kdo ptlot ku khat lee dei chmaang.
Mleija baptis kuptlot rangki neia Khrista va mdo tsii ava pme, pdainu Khrista ki Khros ava leemna mkurthut ma nra, lousing ktaakki kṭha paumin kparyaam rang lei mdo tsii chaak.
Mleija Khros ki pauna ava ka aak rek tumva kmaang kcha, pdainu mdo ktlan dok nen ntumva Isowr rutan.
Mleija ava hanto kjit dok da,
“Ksing rek lousing nga Neiji eakrep nik di,
ungta kdei pandi rek dodee ava do tip sit nimaang.”
Ksing miilaija tu ungda? Nowlam chukpu rekka tu ungda? Tun kaalki mii karteen ṭhi dei rekka tu ungda? Dultipaam ki lousing nga Isowr ri mdo tpa aah pthi pme mo?
Mleija Isowr lousing ava dultipaam ki lousing va deime, ka aak do tlotti krin cha rek hin mdo ktlan pik nra, nen do paryaamma Isowr poibin ning kupthlung.
Mleija Jihudia rekki titinna rek ṭhilda ungta Grik rekki lousing thlaam lamda.
Pdainu nenva Khros leen mdo pthoi yo in Khrista paryaam in minnu, ava Jihudia rek khusiir parthit na khat ungta ktlok chati rek aah chaak na khat kurthuwk da,
pdainu mdo own dok rek Jihudia rek leh Grik rek mikniing hinva Khrista ava Isowr ki rutan leh Isowr ki lousing.
Mleija Isowr aah chaak na ava mii rek lousing ksingsii ava pkheel da, ungta Isowr sowl chaak na ava miirek ruktang sii pkheel da.
Mleija ku u knao rek, ado tu own in ava abin in; dultipaam dil kṭoiji ksing mii ava nemme, ru ktang mii nemme, klin ksaang thu kṭou mii nemme;
pdainu ksing ava ningkja mdo piik nra, Isowr ri dultipaam thu ka aak kchol da, ru ktang ningkja mdo piik nra Isowr ri dultipaam thu ru kdowng kchol da,
kunlor deekki miingi mdo bin ava do khat lee mdo psit ma nra, dultipaam thu Isowr ri kjuwm ava kchol da, ka am kma do ava rukka tpa am da,
tditta ava leiji dulti mii ku khat lee ngi Isowr maiṭhuwm mi napal mdo tlot ma nrang lei.
Jisu Khrista thungki rin khu thuwna, nenki lousing, nenki rinkindit leh kpinchel ungta mdo ṭenthuw pinlet naki Isowr do seem pik ava Mma;
ava leiji mdo kjit dok lulu ngi, “Napal ktlo miiva Mukpu leiji napal atlo chaso.”
Ku u knao rek, neiji naan hin kthlen mpha thu Isowr ki tuprut rinpaumin ava ahin inni kparthaang sii pauna rek mdit mata lousing ngi paryaam chmaang.
Mleija Jisu Khrista leh Mma ngi Khros leen mukthoi na ava kma donle neiji naan arlakki do khat lee dei chnuwm maang.
Ungta neia naan tu kilṭhi ngi kdung ksowl ungta kṭi ungu kunchunni ka am kcha ping;
ungta nei kpau saam leh kdo paryaam ava ril ktlaa ki pauna rek lousing ava pme, pdainu pthla leh rutan ki ngaal.
Tditta naan do rin chaak ka dulti mii ki lousing ava pme, pdainu Isowr rutan thungki mkurthut nrang lei.
Anto kurthuwk daat joso neenni plung kurchuwl rek arlak va lousing pauvi kpau kchaan ping, dultipaam ki lousing ava pme mdit mata do ktip sit kmara hava dultipaam ki paamkpu rek lousing lu pme.
Pdainu dultipaam mapṭhan du liitti Isowr ri nen tkunlor chaak nraan mdo purchuwl dok tuprut pau ava leh Isowr lousing neenni ksaam kcha kurthuwk in ping.
Hava dultipaam ki paamkpu rek ku khat lee ngi hava pauva deipandi me; mleija mmaanni mdee inbi, mmaan ni laarnee ki Mukpu ava Khros leen pthoi lam nime.
Pdainu hanto mdo kjit dok lulu ngi,
“Mik dodee ma knaa do aryaak ma,
dulti mii plung thu klut kma,
Mma wonsat klo cha rek tummi Isowr do purchuwl pik dok.”
Isowr pthla ava ngi nen nhin mipandan pik inda. Mleija pthla ngi do khim khai Isowr pau kukthuk daat ruk thlaam da.
Mleija miilai thu ka am pthla ava kma donle ku ngi miilai poibinna mdee da? Ava lulu ngi Isowr pthla ava kma donle ku mii khat lee ngi Isowr poibin dei me.
Tunva nenna dultipaam ki pthla karlaang kcharek ava in pmin me, pdainu nenni tdee pandit nra Isowr ri nen nhin leemna ngi mido tpiik in pthla ava Isowr hinki nenni tarlaan chaak in.
Ungta neenva dultimii lousing do purchu ngi pauna rek ava the maan ring, pdainu pthla kthloi rek hinni pthla ktongki kindit ava purlup innu pthla ngi akpurchuk kchaan ping.
Pthla ktongki mii kmava Isowr pthla ki leemna chla ava arlaang chme, mleija mmaanna Mma hin ka aak chlam, ungu Mma va deipandi lamme mleija mmaanna pthla ktongki kurthuwk lamme.
Pthla ktongki miiva do mkheng nga mdo kṭewl, pdainu ku mii khat do kṭewl ma ra ava Mma mdaksaa daat.
“Mleija ku ngi Mukpu poibin dei donle Mhin kpurchuk rang da?” Pdainu nenva Khrista poi bin tuthloi chaak in.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, neiva pthla ktongki miirek hin kpau lulu ngi kpau ava pchaang chmaang, pdainu daksaa ktongki miirek lulu kurthuwk ki Khrista ktongki nao kdowng rek lulu hin kpau kcha ping.
Arnuw dii ngi ado kpamaal chaak in, then kapchai apii maan ring; mleija naanna kirsim mlai in pti, ungu tun ruk va kirsim liit mlai inti.
Mleija naanna tun kpha thu dak ktongki mii kurthuwk in pti. Mleija naan arlak thu kheithe changtlaak ki akar ea akalrai in thungva daksaa ktongki miicham thlaang thlaang ngaal kurthuwk maan timo?
Mleija ku mii khatti theda, “Neia Poul mii ping,” Ungta ktlok khatti theda, “Neia Apollo mii ping,” Kdingi adothe in ava miicham thlaang thlaang ngaal kurthuwk maan timo?
Ava mkurthuttu Apollo ava ku da? Poul la ku da? Sra owr rek mmaan thu naanni rin chaan tinu, Mukpu ngi mmaan mii pum ktai hin mdo piik chaak lulu.
Neiji phunnu Apollo ngi dii let da, pdainu Isowr ri pmowng da.
Ava leiji kphun ruk dii klet ruk do ksi ava pme, pdainu kupmowng Isowr ava daat.
Kphun leh dii klet ava khdaat, ungta mikniing inni mnong tlot in dil kṭoiji marda man in karlaang chlam ra.
Mleija neenna Isowr nong klouve in ping, ungu naanna Isowr bil, Isowr inn sak ava in pti.
Nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak Isowr plungnee dil kṭoiji ksing inn sak lulu ngi neiji mmun pṭhang nu, ktlok khatti mleen mdo sak. Ava tun tak heppi sa nikdi kdingi mii pum ktaji tuk asut chaso.
Mleija inn mun mdo pṭhan dok ditta Jisu Khrista ava tunni ku khat lee ngi inn mun pṭhang me.
Tunva ku mii khatti innmun mdo pṭhan dok tun ni jeering, thiir, jeering kpowl, mman klu lang lang dinglung, arnaa kṭong, charuh,
ava mii pum ktai nong thu kpandang ra; mleija Nit ava ngi ktidet ra, mleija mii pum ktaiji tak hep kdu ki nong mtlot tdit ki meiji pirsin na thi donle, mei tu kilṭhi ngi kpandang ra.
Ku mii khat do pṭhan dok tunni mdo sak ava ma am daat bi, mma ngi mnah karlaang chra.
Ku mii khat nong tlot ava mkaak chaak bi, mma kja chra, pdainu mei thungki lulu ngi, mdaksaa kat ta kaktlan pik ra.
Naanna Isowr ki luwbuk Inn, ungta Isowr pthla naan thu ka am tdit dei maan timo?
Ku mii khatti Isowr luwbuk Inn me eakre bi, mma ava Isowr ri ke eakrep ra. Mleija Isowr luwbuk Inn na kchiir, ungta naanna luwbuk Inn ava in pti.
Ku mii khat lee ngi mdaksaa kurhuwn chaak mso. Naan arlakki ku mii khatti hava dultipaam thu ksing sii ngi mkarbin ta, mma ngi msin nra aak chaso.
Mleija hava dultipaam ki ksing nga Isowr hinva ka aak. Mleija hanto kjit dokda, “Mmaan sin na thu Mma ngi pmen lamda,”
Ungta veikhat nowlli Laaika ngi hanto theda, “Ksing poibin na do ksi pme tdit Mukpu ngi dei da.”
Ava leiji ku mii khat lee ngi mii rek do tlot pchaan rang leiji napal tlo mso. Mleija do mkheng nga naan ado,
Poul daat don, Apollo daat don, Sephas daat don, dultipaam daat don, kring daat don, kdiyou daat don, ka am daat don, dil ki rang daat don, mkheng nga naan ado;
ungta naanna Khrista do kurthuwk in pti; ungu Khrista ava Isowr do.
Hanto ngi neenna Khrista sra owr rek ungta kukthuk sii ngi Isowr vai klou rek lulu ngi ku mii khat va mik kbin pik chraan.
Hanto hep daat sra owr khat hinki mdo ngeen ava trin chaak kuhuiji vai klou cha ava.
Pdainu neia naan mdit mata dultimii ku mii khat kurdu ngi mdo tikṭewl rang nga mikdil sii kurthuwk. Nei kdak kat daat rukva kdaksaa kṭewl maang.
Nei kdaksaa mkap plaal ra ava neiji do khat lee tuk sut maang, pdainu neia parmak chmaang. Nei mkikṭewl la Mukpu.

Ava leiji, tun tunni kjiing thu kurdowl daat da ka am do ava mar awng tha kthuw ṭhira, ungta plung do bin kthe thuw rang ngi Mukpu murjun du, mpha mvee du ngi kṭewl maan. Audilli mii pum ktaiji Isowr do panpaak karlaang chra.

Ava leiji ku u knao rek, mdo kjit dok ava kheel li kchet kma neen ki hin akurchu chaak nraan, mleija naan ku mii khat lee naar mlin ma nra, khat san da ktlok khat mraal kpii tdit ma amma nra, akat nraan neiji hava mkheng nga kdaksaa leh Apollo purtol nu kdo saam chaak.
Mleija msik khatti ku ngi ati dee inda? Karlaang kma ngi ado thloi in tak ka am da? Naanni karlaang cha akurthut innu, leemna chla kma lulu ngi tak heppi napal atlot psuk inna?

Naanna kdim chdok in pti! Suwang kthuwk dok in pti! Neen ktaakki kruwng rek kurthuwk dok in pti! Neen rukka naan tu kilṭhi ngi paam kpu kukur thut nraan, naanni kruwng ngi apaal raan ava neiji kngei chaakka!

Mleija kdiyou rangki mii rek lulu ngi, Isowr ri kenyee rek neenna mṭut na rel tha mhai pdaar chaanda kdingi neiva kbin chaakka; mleija waan tamsii rek leh mii rek hinni dultipaam thu mii dosut thlaang thlaang ngaalra kurthuwk kchaan ping.

Neenna Khrista leiji ka aak rek in ping, pdainu naanna Khrista hin ksing rek in pti. Neenna ksowl kchaan ping, pdainu naanna ru ktang in pti. Neenva ningkja kdo dut in, pdainu naanna kanpa ado phaak chaak in.
Tun tunki mpha thungva neenna kpoi in ktham ungu kning in kakraal, dona pliw hiil naa innu, ungu mbun chaanda, ungta ka am nraan inn ruk am chme,
ungta neenni ku khut kat inni nong lou innu kdo tlot in, pauhur mtubuk in thuwnni phowl kṭha parlaan innu; kja kakham kdut in thu diil dei chaannu;
mtrai chaak in thu pau kparneem mi kdo the nraan tlownnu, tunva neenna dultipaam ki junthil lulu ngi do mkheng kukchou krep kurthuwk in ping.
Naan ningkja kdo piik nra neiva hava kjit chmaang, pdainu nei kwonsat lo knaole lulu akparseel kchaan ping.
Mleija naanni Khrista hin tha ber aksuk pik chraan mii knempok thloi daat jownti, naanni apah le knempokki thloi maan ti. Mleija Jisu Khrista ki kṭha paumin ava ngi neia naan pah kurthuwk cha ping.
Ava mkurthut bi nei knopa akurchu chaak nraan aka ktham chaak inna.

Ava leiji, Mukpu hin trin chaak kurhui nao, nei kwonsat lo Timothi ava naan hinni neiji ksii chaakka, mmun ktai thu rinlop ktai hin neiji kdo purchu chaak lam lulu ngi, neiji Khrista hin kche tlown ava mma ngi akpibin phaak chraan.
Naan hin nei kthlen ma ava naan mii angṭhe ngi mdo kanpat loi.
Pdainu Mukpu do ngei mkurthut bi, naan hin kbeiji thleng nik di, ungta kanpat loi rek pauthe ava kma pdainu mrutan in neiji thlaam nik di.
Mleija Isowr Kruwng paamma kpau ki ava pme, pdainu rutan ki.
Tak angei inna? Neiji naan hin kchung khat tu kilṭhi ngi thleng nik mo mdit mata pthla kparneem wonsat ava ngi thleng nik da?
Naan arlakki pang turkuiji kturkui cha mii ka amma tdit ki pau mson pik chlam da, ungta anto lua ktlok chati rek arlak daat ruk va ka am pme; mleija miilai khatti mpah numei iiṭhi da.
Ungta naanni ava kanpat loi in tinu! Ava kchang nga aplung in kja rang pme mo? Ava ktlo miilaija naan arlak in ki akneng pthiin.
Mleija dakki am mjo ring pthla va ado ka am ṭhiin, ungu neiji ava tha ka am daat kukurthut bi, kṭewl dok nik di.
Hanto lu nong ktlo mii ava Mukpu Jisu miing ngi neiji kekṭewlla. Naanni akurku in mpha thu, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki rutan tu kilṭhi ngi kapthla va ado ka am ṭhiin.
Mukpu Jisu nit thu pthla mdo ktlan pik nra, mdaksaa mmaan chaak nrangki tummi mii ava seitaan hin aparlaan pthiin.
Anapal tlot inna ṭha chme. Thowl kṭiik suwnni thowlpen knempok mdo archik ava dei maan timo?
Naan ava thowl ktaak lulu mpen ren akurthut nraan, thowl pliw ava aktleu dok in. Mleija nenki taplaanna rangki Jao nao Khrista ava eayou lamda.
Ava leiji, khusiir tparthit nra ktlo ungta kṭha kma thowl kmaal mdo tlot in thowl pliw ava chaa maan che, pdainu thowl ktaak thenpen kartleu ungu kindit ava nenni chaan che.
Nei kchethi thu pang turkuiji kturkui miirek tu akurchuwm ma nraan neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka;

hava dultipaam thu pang turkuiji kturkui cha, mdit mata hangmal leh namtrom nong ktlo, mata khut dosak pthla luw kbuk kdo the na liit pme, ava mkurthutbi, hava dultipaam thungki asun raan tha kthuwk ra.

Pdainu makchang ra naan hin kdo kjit ava ku mii khatti mu u mnao miing hurda pang turkuiji kturkui cha mdit mata hangmal, mata khut do sak pthla luw kbuk, kar ai kalrai, ju kipri, mdit mata namtrom nong ngi klowng hava lu ma amta kurhou ṭhi maan kdo dit na ava pme, hanto lu kdu mii ava then maal ṭhi maan.
Mleija talu rangsu dida neiji duwnki mii ava kṭewl nikdi? Naan do kṭewl rang nga rinlop thu ka am rek ava rang pme mo?
Duwn kia Isowr ri kekṭewl chra. “Naan arlakki kṭha kma nong ktlo miia akneng pthiin.”
Naan thungki miilai khat ava ngi mu u mnao mraal piida pau mupthuw mpha thu, kintiing rek hin kchet kma rinkindit kma rek hin kchet nuwm mo?
Dultipaam ma rinkindit rek do kṭewl ra tdit dei maan timo? Ungta dultipaam ma naan do kṭewl ra mkurthuttu, pau kdil suwn kekṭewl rang nga kurhui maan timo?
Nenni waan tamsii rek tekṭewl raan na dei maan timo? Hava rinkhu ki do ava tija thu kheel sii kurthuwk chdaat ta!
Anto mkurthuttu hantolu hep daat pau ma ammu, talu leiji rinlop thu do khat lee kurthuwk kma rek ado pṭewl inda?
Hava naan ningkja nra ado kthe pik in. Naan a u anao in arlakki pau kupṭuw ra ksing miilai ame.
Pdainu mu u mnao khatti mu u mnao khat tun mraal piida Nowlam tha kchet in pti, ungta ava krin kma rek kurthuwk pme mo?
Naan thung ngi khat leh khat arlakki pau mthuw bi, ava naan do pchaan ma. Ava kchang nga talu leiji kar makka diil pchaang maan ti? Ava kchang nga talu leiji alrowt inna?
Pdainu naan adaksaan katti parmak inti ado alrowt in, ungu naan a u anao in kat tunni ava kthuwkka.
Isowr Kruwngpaam ava rinkindit kma rek va pha chnime tdit naan ni aryaa maanti mo? Kurhuwng kcha, pang turkuiji kturkui, khut do sak pthla luw kbuk mdit mata losang kṭhi, cham turkuiji kturkui,
kup pru, hangmal, ju kipri, kar ai kalrai namtrommi klowng, mmaanni Isowr Kruwngpaam thlung pchaang nime.
Naan mii angṭhea anto lu hep daat kurthuwk. Pdainu naanna Mukpu Jisu Khrista leh nenki Isowr pthla miing ngi mdo alṭhut dok, mdo tpinchel dok, mdo pindit dok in pti.
“Nei ktumva do mkheng nga kro cha,” Pdainu do mkheng nga do ksi ava pme. “Nei ktumva do mkheng nga kro cha,” Pdainu neia do khat ava suwk owrri am nimaang.
“Then na poi ki tum ungta poija then ki tum” Ungu Isowr ri khat ruk khat ruk ke eakrep ra. Daksaa ava pang turkuiji tuturkui nrang pme, pdainu Mukpu tum, ungta Mukpua daksaa tum kurthuwk.
Ungu Isowr ri Mukpu tipring pinle da ungta Mma rutanni nen rukka mi kipring pinle chraan.
Naan adaksaan na Khrista ki khat tdit dei maan timo? Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, Khrista ki khat ava neiji louda snu ko ok kma kira tpurthut pthi nimo? Anto liit pme!
Ko ok kma snu tu mdaksaa kurjom mii ava mma tu daksaa khdaatti ka am tdit naanni dei maan timo? Mleija mdo kjit dok ava lulu, “Knii ava daksaa khdaat ra.”
Pdainu Mukpu tu kunlom mii ava Mma tu kilṭhi ngi pthla khdaat.
Pang turkuiji kturkui mii ava aser in. Pnu murson khim khai miilai ava daksaa duwnki kthuwk; pdainu pang turkuiji kturkui ava mdaksaa kat mraal karpii cha.
Naanni Isowr hinki ado thloi in, naan adaksaan mthung ava pthla kchiir luwbuk Inn tdit naanni dei maan timo? Naanna athi naanki in pti me;
mman ni ado tren dok in. Ava leiji naanki daksaa ava ngi Isowr apunlor chaan.
Tunva naan do kjit pau avaki mleija pselpa khat tumva snu khat ava mdo thown liit mangi kṭha.
Pdainu pang turkuiji kturkui ki kepthleem ma am leiji, pselpa khim khaiva mdaksaa ki tummi numei alou chso, ungta snu khim khaiva mdaksaa ki innpu athloi chso.
Mi innpu ngi mnumei hin kindit mdo piik ra ava apii chso, anto lu ngi mnumei rukva mi innpu hin atlo so.
Mleija mnumei ja mdaksaa tumra paalme, pdainu mi innpu ra; anto lulu ngi mi innpu ruk va mdaksaa ki kpu ngi paal me, pdainu mnumei.

Mlei pummi ado kulrot naan kma donle khat leh khat kpirthlei maan, ditta naanni adaksaan ado kjown pchaan maan leiji seitaanni ado tipthleem ma nraan, adaksaanna kṭhil cha thu plung klut sappi ka ammi kṭhara.
Paureen nu neiji hava kdo the chaak ava pme mrot na kthe kcha ping.

Tditta mii mkheng nga nei kdaksaa lulu ra ava neiji kngei kcha ping. Pdainu mii pum ktaija mma mma ki leemna chla mdo phaak, hava chla dil kṭoiji khat ungu ava chla dil kṭoiji khat Isowr hinki mdo phaak chaak.
Inn knei snu klou kma ungu meikhu rek hin neiji kthe chaakka, mmaan ava nei klulu ngi sangtlaakki ma am chaak in ava ngi kṭha ra.
Pdainu mmaanni mdaksaan mkurjown pchaan maanbi, inn knei snu klou atlo lamso. Mleija mei kakaa heppi mdo khaan raan kchang nga inn knei leh snu klou ava ngi kṭhara.
Inn knei leh snu klou dok rek hin neiji mnong raan kpiik chaakka, nei pme pdainu Mukpu, mleija mnumeiji mi innpu mdo kinṭhen ṭhi rang pme.
Pdainu mnumeiji ava ktlo mkurthut bi, msangtlaakki am chdaat so, mdit mata mi innpu tu karpipin chdok so. Ungta mi innpu va mnumei bowr ktlo pthi rome.
Ktlok rek hin neiji kthe chaakka, Mukpu pme, mleija unao khatti krin kma numei thloida, snu ava ngi mma tu ma amve rangbi, mma ngi mbowr mdo tlot pthi rang pme.
Snu ku mii khatti krin kma innpu mthloibi, ungu snu ava ngi mma tu ma amve rangbi, snu ava ngi mi innpu bowr ktlo pthi rome.

Mleija krin cha kma innpu ava mnumei ki ar awng ngi kartleu chdok, ungta krin cha kma numei ava mi innpu ki ar awng ngi kartleu chdok. Anto kma donle anao le in ava kartleu nime, pdainu mmaan ava anto lu ngi kchiir ra.
Pdainu krin cha kma saangram rekki mkinṭhen nuwm inbi, kinṭhen chdaat lamso; anto lu hep daat pau thungva kṭahpa ruk kchernu ruk bowl me. Mleija Isowr va kdaai rangki mido tu own chaak in.
Mnumei nangva a innpu ado ktlan ado ktlan mara ava tak heppi dei nada? Innpu nangva anumei ado ktlan ado ktlan mara ava tak heppi dei nada?
Mukpu ngi mii pum ktai hin mdo sil na dil kṭoiji, ungta Isowr do own dil kṭoiji mii ava ngi amso. Rinlop rek mkheng thu nei kdo sil na ava hava.
Mma ngi mo own mpha thu vunmor kreen dok mii ka ammo? Mma ngi vunmor mdo reenna kbii mdolo pthi nra mlam thlaam mso. Vunmor kreen mlai ku mii khat ka am mo? Vunmor mdo reen nra mma ngi thlaam mso.
Vunmor kreen ruk kreen kma ruk do khat lee tai pik me, pdainu Isowr paureen rek karkhii ava daat ra.
Mii pum ktaija mma mma mdo own na ava thu am chdaat so.
Suwk khatti a am mpha thu ato own mo? Do khat lee ngi bin ma, pdainu nang ngi kintek aphaak pchaan bi, ava adaksaa ngi kheelli asin ton cha.
Suwk khat lulu ngi Mukpu do own dok mii ava Mukpu hinni kintek kcha miilai. Anto lulu ngi mo own mpha thu kintek mii ava Khrista suwk khat.
Naanna mman pummi ado tren dok in; miirek suwk pmaanti.
Ava leiji, ku u knao rek, mii pum ktai ava ngi mma mma mdo own chaak na thu amso.
Tunva innknei snu klou mlai mlei thu Mukpu pau pṭum neiji thloi chmaang, pdainu Mukpu wonsatti talo kurhui miilai khat heppi nei kpoi bin akthe pik chaak inna.
Tun tunki kja kakham dil kṭoiji, mii ava ngi ma am daat ava lulu ngi ma am chaakki kṭhara kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.
Nang nga anumei khat hin kurbowl pti mo? Kintek ra thlaam ma. Nang nga anumei khat hinki kintek ptimo? Snu thlaam ma.

Pdainu nang ngi snu alo bi, apnu ame, ungta nalanao khat ti inn mnei bi, mupnu ame. Anto daat joso inn knei snu klou miilai ava dultipaam ki kja kakham kpha chra, ungu ava aju paphaak nuwm chmaan ring.
Ku u knao rek, nei kdo the chaak nuwmma hava, mpha ava ktoi tekka; tun ki kupṭhun ni mnumei kthloi miirekva khat lee kthloi kma lulu ngi am so.
Kurnung karbaang da ki am miirek va, mmaanni kurnung karbaang kma lulu ngi amso, ungta kanpa mii rek va kanpa kma lulu ngi am so, ungu kren mii rek va do khat lee kthloi kma lulu ngi am so.
Ungta dultipaam kparteel mii rek va mmaanni kparteel sii kma lulu ngi am lamso. Mleija tun tunki dultipaam ava kvei chra.
Naanni lamkrin cha thu kintekki a am raan ava neiji kngei chaakka. Snu klou kma miiva tak heppi Mukpu ning pthlung chnik da kdingi Mukpu nong thu pluung mdo plut.
Pdainu snu klou dok mii va tak heppi mnumei ning pthlung nikdi dida dultipaam nong thu plung plut da.

Ungta muplung bin ava kanṭheek da. Ungu inn knei mlai snu mdit mata nala va mdaksaa leh mapthla ava tak heppi kchiir rang kdingi Mukpu nong thu plung mdo plut, pdainu inn knei dok snu va tak heppi mi innpu ning pthlung chnik di kdingi dultipaam ki nong thu plung mdo plut.
Havaa naan akat nraan lei neiva kdo the chaak, naan tun ni mparsat set nra neiva kdo thiik ava pme, pdainu naan ṭhat bet nra ungta plung kinṭheek kma kurhui deekki Mukpu hin plung ado piik nraan lei.
Ku mii khatti inn mdo thlot dok nala ava hin kṭha ngi marngai dema, kdung reen kbinni mtardou bi, ungu anto kat ra mkurthut bi, mdo ngei ava mma ngi atlo chdaat so; mmaanni phal lamso, ava pnu pme.
Pdainu plung krip dok ku mii khat va karsiik dok kma lu kma, pdainu mpoi bin mkurjown pchaan mabi, inn mdo thlot dok nala ava mdo maak pthi nra plung mreel bi, mma ngi kṭha ngi atlo so.
Ava leiji mma inn thlot dok snu ava klou mii ruk va kṭha ngi klou chra; ungta snu klou kma mii ava ngi kṭha bet ra.
Mi innpu mrin daat khim khai thu mnumei ava mma do bowl thu ka am chdaat. Mi innpu mdiyo dok bi, mma ngi mdo ngei hin kintekki inn knei cha kro, avaa Mukpu hin daat ra.
Pdainu nei kdo kṭewl chaak va mma ngi anto ma am chaakki kanpa bet chra. Ungta neiva Mukpu pthla kthloija kdingi karbin kchaam ping.
Tunva khut dosak pthla hin then kdown mlei thu: “Nen nkheng inni tathloi dok in ava ndee in,” Nenni ndee in, “Kdei cha,” ava kparlin, pdainu wonsat va mdo punchoi.
Ku mii khat ti do mruk kdei cha ngi plung thu mbin bi, mdo dee kat ra ava mma ngi dei chme.
Pdainu miilai khatti Isowr wonsat mlobi, Mma ngi miilai khat ava mdo dee.
Hava thu khut do sak pthla hin then kukdown kchaa ki mlei, “Khut do sak pthla a kring ngi ka am ava pme,” Ungta “Isowr Khat ava kma donle murson khat lee ame, tdit nenni ndee in.”
Mleija parwaan leh dulti thu isowr rek ka am lam kro, isowr rek leh mukpu rek knempok ki ta am ruk ka am kat kat.

Anto daat joso nen ntumva Isowr Khat, Npah in, amda, do mkheng nga Mma hinki, ungu Mma tummi nnenna ta am in, ungta Mukpu Khat ditta Jisu Khrista ka am; do mkheng nga Mma thungki ungu nnenna Mma thu ta am in.

Anto daat joso, mii mkheng va hava kdei dokka kurthuwk me. Pdainu mii angṭhe va khut do sak pthla avaa nopa purthuw da, then ava khut dosak pthla hin mdo down kat kdingi chaa da, ungta ksowlli plung mdo bin lei inni buwr lamda.
Then ni nenna Isowr hin mido trot pik in ava pme. Nenni then nchaak mana nṭhat ma nraan ungu nchaak na nṭhat bet nraan kurthuwk ava pme.
Naan do tlot pchaan hava ava ngi ksowl mii rek khusiir parthit na kro kdingi cheek asin chaan.

Mleija khut do sak pthla luwbuk inn ava thu naan ku mii khatta miilai khatti tebol bengi kuk ong atidee dok in, ungu khut do sak pthla hin then mdo down kchaa rang thu muplung bin msowl bi, muplung tipngar nime mo?
Ungta Khrista ngi mtum ra mdo diyo pik naan ki a u anao in ksowl kcha ava naanni kdei dok akurthut lei inni me akrea.
Hanto a u anao in mraal kpii ngi plung thu ksowl li kbin cha rek ava sulpurnul in tinu, Khrista hin pnu ktla cha in pti.
Ava leiji, then ava ngi nei ku u knao khusiir parthit nra mkurthut ta, neiji saa chaa chliit ni maang.
Neia kintek cha pmaang mo? Neia kenyee khat pmaang mo? Nei va nenki Mukpu Jisu dei chmaang mo? Naanna Mukpu hin nei knong lo lei kmaan timo?
Ktlok mii rek hin kenyee khat kurthuwk mdaat joring, naan hinva kurthuwk kcha ping; mleija Mukpu hinki kenyee khat kukurthut naki kbii ava naan in pti.
Nei mhai kparsin rek hinni neiji karthe loi kchaam ping.
Kchaa knee ava nen plung bin daat pme mo?
Kenyee rek murson ungta Mukpu naopa le ungu Sephas le lulu ngi numei kṭhi ava nen nuplung bin daat pme mo?
Mdit mata krin nraan nong ktlo thu kma pthi kmara ava Barnabas leh nei daat mo?
Rawlmii khat lulu ngi mdaksaa ki partlai da sok klou ku ka am da? Rik rou phun thida mthei kchaa kmara ku ka am? Jao lop khat seel thida marnuw dii knee kma ku ka am da?
Dultimii rutanni neiva havaa the maang mo? Nowlam ruk va hanto jikki the memo?
Mleija Mousi Nowlam thu hanto kjit da theda, “Buh ado pther bing silpa ava mner ktuh ma.” Isowr do bin psuk chaak ava silpa mo?
Mkheng nga nen ntummi Mma va kthe kurthuwk memo? Nen ntumra avaa mdo kjit dok, mleija kukhoi ruk va ktum ka amra kdingi akhoi so, ungta mdo pther rukva ktum ka amra kdingi ather so.
Pthla ktongki kṭha ava neenni naan arlakki kvar cha kukurthut innu, daksaa ktongki dona neenni naan hinki kdo phaak inna knem reen mo?
Ktlok mii ngi naan hinki hava mdo arngai kat ra mkurthuttu, neenva karkheel sii ngi arngai ni maan ring mo?
Anto chdaat joso, do dak katti neenni sinton maan ring, pdainu Khrista ki kṭha paumin ktong tha kapkhaan liit kma neenni kdo tlot in khim khai thu kdo diil chaak in.
Mleija luwbuk Inn thu nong ktlo ra mdo thiik rek va luwbuk Inn thungki then chaa lamda, ungta suwlbuwr bengi sok klou rek va tlaai down thungki mtum in ka am tdit naanni dei maan timo?
Hanto lulu ngi, kṭha paumin kparyaam mii rek va kṭha paumin thu mrin nraan leiji then mdo phaak raan, dida Mukpu ngi pau mdo reen dok.

Pdainu hava le thu nei kdo tlot kat ra khdaat pre neiji the chmaang, mdit mata nei ktummi anto kat mkurthut nra neiji kjit chmaang. Mleija nei knapal tlot ava ku mii khatti do khat lee mipsit ma rang ta, neia kdiyo chaakki kṭha siira.
Mleija neiji kṭha paumin kparyaam bi, knapal tlot nra ame. Mleija nei kleen ni kdo tlot ma kro liit kma ngi amda. Mleija neiji kṭha paumin kparyaam mabi neia ksuw kthi kurthuwk ping!
Mleija nei kuplung binni havaa ktlo kukurthut bi, neiji mnah pha chnikdi; pdainu nei kuplung bin ki mkurthut mabi, mnong ra neia mdo tsil chaak na ping.
Ava mkurthuttu neiki mnah ava talu rang? Hava daat ra, ditta kṭha paumin kparyaam thu neiji kdo tlot kat ra ava ktlot mabi, kṭha paumin na leemna ngi kparyaam kurthuwk nik di.
Mleija mii mkheng thu kintek chdaat joring va, nei kdaksaa ngi karkheel betti mii kdo phaak chaak nra mkhengki suwk owr ri ka am cha ping.

Jihudia rek kdo thuw ṭhi nra, Jihudia rek thu neiji Jihudia khat lulu ngi am nu; Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am mii rek kdo thuw ṭhi nlamra, nei kdak kat ava neiji Nowlam kurdu ngi am cha mjo ring, Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am rek heppi, Nowlam kurdu ki khat lulu ngi ka am cha ping.
Nowlam duwn tha ka am rek neiji kdo thuw ṭhi nlamra, Isowr Nowlam kleek lulu ngi, pdainu Khrista Nowlam kurdu ngi, Nowlam duwn tha ka am rek hin, Nowlam duwn ki heppi ka am cha ping.
Ksowl cha mii kdo thuw ṭhi chaak nra, ksowl cha mii hin nei rukka ksowl cha ping. Hava mkheng ngi mii angṭhe mdo ktlan pik chaak nra, mii mkheng hin neia do mkheng kurthuwk kcha ping.
Neiji kṭha paumin thu ktum kdo phaak chaak nra, ava tummi neiji hava mkheng kdo tlot chaak.
Kchen parteek thu mkheng inni chen da, pdainu miilai khdaatti mnah mdo arlaan naanni dei maan timo? Ava leiji ado phaak chaak nraan chen in.
Klee kparteek khim khaiji do mkheng thu mdaksaa ava kurjowng. Mmaanva kmaang chrangki laarkhum mdo arlaan in, pdainu nenna kmaang rangki ava pme.
Kṭha a, neiji kuptuwn kma kchen kurthuwk maang, tarthli kraang kip prei khat lulu ngi neiji tlo maang;
pdainu ktlok rek hin kparyaam dok dil tha nei kdaksaa ava kurhui kma kro ping kdingi kdaksaa ava kchung kbii tpa amnu suwkki ka am ping.
Ku u knao rek, naanni hava ado dee raan ava neiji kngei chaakka, ditta nenki npah le mkheng nga armei tingi am lamda, mkheng inni truwn thu chet lamda,
ungta mkheng inni armei leh truwn thu Mousi hin baptis tlo lamda,
ungu pthla ktongki then mkheng inni chaa lamda,
ungta pthla ktongki dii ava mkheng inni nee lamda. Mleija pthla ktongki diia mdil in kṭoi daat lungpii ava thungki mmaanni nee lamda, ungta lungpii ava Khrista.
Anto daat joso mmaan mii maknem ma Isowr ningthlun na lam pme; mleija mmaan na kbowk laiji mdovar pthi lam.
Mmaanni kṭha kma mdo tlot in lulu ngi nenni tatlot ma nraan, tunva hava lea nen ntummi pau mdo kham.
Mii murson rek lulu ngi khut do sak pthla luwbuk maan; mdo kjit dok hava lulu, “Mii rekki kchaa knee ra ku ong lamda, ungta kardaam ra rip lamda.”
Mii angṭhe ngi pang turkuiji kturkui chlam da, ungu pun som knii lei kdum ava nii khdaat thu mdiyo in lulu ngi nenva pang turkuiji kturkui chmaan che.
Nenki Mukpu pirsin nmaan che, mii angṭhe ngi anto lu tlo da, pruwl rekki mdo ptuk yo lam lulu ngi;
mdit mata mmaan angṭhea thlou chuchu lamda ke ea krep ava ngi mdo eakre lam lulu ngi thlou maan che.
Tunva hava lea paukham lulu ngi mhin inni kthuwk, pdainu kum ṭut nrangki nen mido tpurchu naan tummi hava lea mdo kjit dok.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, krip ping dida kbin miiva ktluw kro ping adi sora cheek asin chso.

Mii do parteel pchaan ma kepthleem ava ngi ado tapchaan ma nraan lei ki. Isowr ra lam trin chaak kuhui, ungta naan rutan kheelli ado tipthleem raan na Mma ngi rome, pdainu kepthleem thungki akarthle chaak nraan mlam ruk akpurdon pik chraan, mleija naanni ado diil dei raan.
Ava leiji, nei kwonsat lorek, khut do sak pthla rek luw kbuk aser chaan.
Neiji ksing miirek hin kpau lulu ngi kpau kcha ping; nei kdo the pau ava asingreel inni akṭewl chaan.
Mukpu maal thu nenni phowl kṭha tparlaan in tong ava ngi Khrista hii them sap da knee tkurthut in pme mo? Nenni tupkui in thenpen ava ngi Khrista daksaa kthem sap tkurthut in pme mo?
Mleija thenpen khdaat ava ngi nnen mii knempok ka daksaa khdaatti mdo tpurthuw, mleija nen nkheng inni thenpen khdaat talo sap in.
Isreel mii rek ka abin in; tlaai down kchaa miirekka suwlbuwr plap pmemo?
Ava mkurthuttu neiva tak the nik da? Khut do sak pthla hin then mdo down ava do khat, mdit mata khut do sak pthla ava do khatti abin inmo?
Ava pme, ktlok chati rek tlaai down na Isowr hin pme tarnam rek hin mdo piik in dinu neiva kthe ping. Naanni tarnam rek tu plap akurthut raan neiva ngei chmaang.
Naanni Mukpu tong thungki leh tarnam rek tong thungki nee ve pchaang nimaan ti. Naanni Mukpu tebol thungki leh tarnam rek tebol thungki maal ve pchaang ni maan ti.
Mukpua khei mdo the nra nenni Mma plung pthit che naan mo? Nenna Mma kekheel li nru in ktang mo?
“Do mkheng nga pum ro kro,” Pdainu do mkheng nga do ksi ava pme. “Do mkheng nga pum ro kro,” Pdainu do mkheng nga kiplin kapsaang ra ava pme.
Ku mii khat lee ngi mdaksaa tum daatti parning mso, pdainu mveen tummi athlaam so.
Saa jurna thu mdo jur khim khaija plung ngi kpurdun susu da pau kikhewl liit kma achaa in.
Mleija “Dulti leh mthu ka am do khim khaija Mukpu do.”
Krin cha kma rek thungki khatti kmaal rang ngi atu own chaak in, ache maan kro kma mkurthutta, amaiṭhuwm inni mdo down khim khai plung msikki kbin kma, pau kekhewl liit kma achaa in.
Pdainu ku mii khatti, “Havaa khut do sak pthla hin tlaai mdo down ava,” kdingi atithe pik inta, akthe pik in mii ava tum lei, ungta aplung bin lei inni,
aplung bin in kma akthe pik in tummi chaa maan. Mleija nei kuplung bin ava talu lei ktlok khat plung bin kurthuwk rang da?
panpaak da neiji kchaak bi, neiji kdo panpaak loi ava talu leiji neia kṭha kma ngi mdo tithe psuk da?
Ava leiji naanni kchaa mdit mata knee mata nong ktlo khim khai thu Isowr laarnee ngi atlo in.
Jihudia rek hin mdit mata Grik rek hin mata Isowr rinlop hin khusiir mdo parthit nraan nong tlo maan.
Mmaan mdo ktlan pik nra, neiji kdaksaa kparning kma mii knem pok tumra thlaam nu, knong tlot khim khai thu mii mkheng ning thlun nra neiji ktlo cha kurthuwk ping.
Neiji Khrista nopa kdo pṭoi lulu ngi, nei knopa apṭoi chaan.
Mleija naan ni do khim khai thu nei mbin phaak chaan ti, naan hin ado kpiik in nopa ava kṭha deekki pṭoi inti, ava leiji ak panpaak chaak inna.
Pdainu pselpa luw khim khaija Khrista, snu luw ava pselpa, ungta Khrista luw ava Isowr tdit naanni adodee raan ava neiji kngei chaakka.
Pselpa ku mii khatti mluw khum sora mṭhil chaak bi, mdit mata pau mphuwnbi, mma ngi mluw ava kjat pik me,
pdainu snu ku mii khatti mluw kukhum kma mṭhil chaak, mdit mata pau mphuwn bi, mma ngi mluw ava kjat pikme mluw kngeu snu ava tu kinṭim ma.
Mleija snu miilai khatti mluw mkhum mabi, mma ngi mluw angeu so; pdainu luw kngeu mdit mata kthim ava snu khat tummi ning kja na mkurthut leiji, mma ngi mluw akhum so.
Mleija pselpa ava Isowr arling ungu laarnee mkurthut leiji, mma ngi mluw mdo khum rang pme; pdainu snua pselpa laarnee.
Mleija pselpa khat ava snu khat thungki mdo seem ava pme, pdainu snu khat ava pselpa khat thungki mdo seem.
Mdit mata snu tummi pselpa ava mdo seem ava pme, pdainu pselpa tummi snu ava mdo seem.
Ava leiji waan tamsii rekki mlei kurthuwk da, snu khatti mluw mdo khum ra.
Anto chdaat joso, Mukpu hin thangva psel ktaakki snu ame, mdit mata snu ktaakki psel ame;
mleija psel thungki snu mdo seem ava lulu ngi, tunva psella snu thungki kṭou. ungta do mkheng nga Isowr hinki kthuwk.
Adaksaan karṭewl chaan; snu miilai khatti mluw kukhum kma Isowr hin kṭhil cha kro mo?
Psel khatti msam ksaang ngi mhaal bi, mma hin ningkja na tdit ki nopa ka am,
pdainu snu miilai khat ta msam msaan bi, avaa naarlinna pme mo? Mleija mluw khum ra mhin msam mdo piik chaak.
Ku mii khatti ava mkarteen nabi, nen nhin daat ruk Isowr rinlop hin daat ruk anto lu ktlo ava ka am pme.
Pdainu naanni athuw kurku in mpha thu, mṭhat nrang mda pdainu kheel setti mthit nra kurthuwk da, ava leiji neiji ado kparseel in thungva apanpaak maan ring.
Mleija chodu ki mun thu, Rinlop khatti akunpun in mpha thu, naan arlakki kinṭhen ka amma tdit neiji aryaa chnu, ungbi ava neiji mruk rin nu,
mleija naan arlakki plung klut rek do tin chaak na mkurthut nra, naan arlak inni kinṭhen tdit ka am.
Naanni athuw kurdut in mpha thu, naanni ado chaak in Mukpu ki kmaal ava pme.
Mleija kmaal lu thu naan mii pum ktaiva mma mma ki then chaa da, khat ta mpoi mtham arlaanni ktlok khatta rikrou diingi prida.

Talu lei da? Ado chaak ado neek nraan inn thloi maan timo? Mdit mata Isowr Rinlop ningkja ado piik nraan ungta kthloi kma rek ado kinsiir nraan atlot inna? Naan hin neiva tak the nik di? Hava leiji apanpaak ni kaan mo? Eme, aju panpaak liit in ni maang.
Mleija neiji naan hin ado kparlaan inna neiji Mukpu hinki kdo arlaan ava kurthuwk, mleija Mukpu Jisu mparlaan pthi nit ava jaan ni Mma ngi thenpen louda,
Mma ngi mpanpaak dil tha khuida, ungu theda, “Havaa naan tum rangki Nei kdaksaa, Nei ado tbin phaak naanni hava atlo in.”
Anto heppi Mma ngi mmaal dok diltha tong rukka louda, ungu theda, “Hava tong nga ren paurina Nei kihii. Hava atlo in, mpha ktai thu Nei ado tbin phaak naanni anee in.”
Mleija naanni hava thenpen chaa da hava tong aneek in ktai thu Mma murjun du khim khaiji naanni Mukpu diyo kparyaam kurthuwk in pti.
Ava leiji, kurhui liit kma do tlotti Mukpu thenpen chaa da, mdit mata tong knee ku mii khat ava Mukpu daksaa leh mhii tunni kar mak nong mtlotta.
Mii ava ngi mdaksaa kparsin na thi sora, thenpen ava achaa so ungta tong ruk anee so.
Mleija ku mii khatti mdaksaa karbin liit kma pangi mchaak mneek bi, mdaksaa mthina tuwn mdo kṭewl nra kchaa knee kurthuwkka.
Ava leiji naan mii maknem ma sowlda koida, ungu kdiyou chlam.
Pdainu nenni ndaksaa ava kindit deekki nkṭewl chaak bi, nenna mi kṭewl in nime.
Pdainu dultipaam tu kilṭhi ngi nraal in mido tpiik ma nraan, Mukpu ngi mido tikṭewl in.
Ava leiji ku u knao rek, kmaal ra athuw kurku in mpha thu, khat leh khat karda in,
Mpoi ktham ku mii khat ma amta, kthuwk kurkukki araal in akpii raanki mkurthutta, mi inn tha maal chdaat so. Pau murson ki mleija neiji kthlen mpha thu athe pik ro lai inni.
Tunva ku u knao rek, pthla ktongki chla mlei thu neiji ado kthe pik maan rang nga ngei chmaang.
Naanni ktlok chati akurthut in mpha thu, khut do sak Pthla ka aak kcha hin lele tha ado tiṭhiin tdit neiji kdo dee.

Ava leiji, Isowr pthla do pthe ngi, “Jisua pauhurri abuk so!” dida ku khat lee ngi pau the me. Ungta Pthla Kchiir kma donle ku khat lee ngi, “Jisua Mukpu,” dida the me tdit naan dodee pandit ra ava neiji kngei chaakka.
Tunva chla ava msik msik pdainu Pthla khdaat.
Mnong nga msik msik, pdainu Mukpua khdaat;
ungta msik msik nong ktlo ka am, pdainu Isowr khdaat ava ngi mii pum ktai hin mkheng nga pii chda mdo mu pik.
Mii mkheng ṭhat nra mii pum ktai hin Pthla ava pandan pik chda.
Khat hin thangva Pthla ava ngi lousing pii chda, ungu ktlok khat hin thangva Pthla ava katti kdei kcha ki piida,
ktlok khat hin thangva Pthla ava katti krin ki pii chda, ktlok khat hin thangva Pthla khdaat ava ngi kapdam ki pii chda,

ktlok khat hin thangva tngana ki nong ktlo ki pii chda, ktlok khat hin thangva pau kphuwng ki pii chda, ktlok khat hin thangva Pthla rek ktin kcha ki pii chda, ktlok khat hin thangva msik msik pauvi kpau ki pii chda, ktlok khat hin thangva msik msik pau kpurlup ki kpii kcha.
Mma poibin dil kṭoiji havale mkheng nga mma mma ki tummi them pik da, khdaat chrel Pthla ava katti them pik lamda.
Mleija daksaa khdaat ava ngi msing knempokki ma am lulu ngi, daksaa msing mkheng nga knempokki am chdaat joso daksaa ava khdaat mkurthut leiji Khrista ruk anto.

Mleija Jihudia rek daat don Grik rek daat don suwk owr daat don kintek mii daat don, Pthla khdaat ava ngi mkheng nga daksaa khdaat thu baptis ptlot da, ungta mkheng nga daksaa khdaat thungki mdo pneek sap lam.
Mleija daksaa ava msing khdaatti mdo tpa am ava pme, pdainu msing knempok.
Khu ngi “Neia khut pmaang,” dida kthe mkurthut bi, “Neia daksaa thungki pmaang,” ava leiji daksaa thungki pme tdit ro nime.
Knaa ngi, “Neia mik kukurthut ma leiji, neia daksaa thungki pmaang,” dida mthe bi, ava leiji daksaa thungki pme dida tithe rome.
Daksaa mkheng nga mik mkurthuttu, taryaak nrang nga talu rang da? Daksaa mkheng nga knaa mkurthut tu, mikrim mdo pniim nrang nga talu thung rang da?
Pdainu anto katti Isowr va kchol da, khat khat ava msing ngi mi parnaak ṭip inda.
Mkheng nga msing khdaat mkurthut bi, daksaa talu rang da?
Anto lulu ngi msing ava knempokki ka am, joso daksaa ava khdaat.
Mik ki “Nang nga aju kriing maang,” dida khut hin kthe pchaang me mdit mata vei khat nowlli luw ava ngi, “Nang nga aju kriing maang,” dida khu hin kthe pchaang me.
Anto paa le rang ngi, daksaa thungki ksowl sii kcha msing ava ngi msit ka am sii,
ungta arleek setti tak kjat nra ame kdingi nenni tbin psuk in daksaa thungki msing rek ava hin tha kheel sii ngi tak kjat kat ra, ungta nenki do ksi kma msing ava kheel sii ngi kṭha ruk ka am,
msing thungki kṭha sii ava nenni do tipsit lu in pme. Pdainu nenni tkinsiir psuk in msing hin Isowr ri kheel sii ki tak kjat piida daksaa ava mdo punlom.
Ungta daksaa thu mkurnur ma nraan, pdainu msing rek ava ngi khat leh khat tuk mkursut nraan lei.
Msing khatti kja mparteel bi, mkheng kheng inni mdo jat ṭhi in; msing khatti kanpa mphaak bi, mkheng kheng inni mdo kanpat ṭhi in.
Tunva naanna Khrista ki daksaa in pti ungta naan mii pum ktaija msing in pti.

Ungta Rinlop thu Isowr va ru kri reeppi kenyee rek, mknit na thu khulpu rek, muk kdum na thu chukpu rek, ava dilli tngana rek nong ktlo rek, ava dilli kapdam rek, kbom rek, ber suda nong ktlo rek, msik msik pleiji kpau rangki kchol da pthuwk da. ka am.
Mkheng nga kenyee rek mo? Mkheng nga khulpu rek mo? Mkheng nga chukpu rek mo? Mkheng nga tngana rek ktlo lammo?
Mkheng inni kapdam ki chla mthloi inmo? Mkheng inni pleiji kpau lammo? Mkheng inni pau mpurlu inmo?
Pdainu kanthang sii ki leemna chla ava angeen chaan.
Ungta kinreel sii ki lam ava neiji aju tdet in nik di.
Neiji dulti mii leh waan tamsii rek pauvi kpau kurthuwk joring, neiji wonsat kthloi mabi, neia mukrowl pum kaanta mdit mata thlingdiing lulu nik di.

Ungta neiji khulpu khat kurthuwk ki rutan thloida, ungta kukthuk pau mkheng leh tdee na mkheng dei dok daat joring, ungu krin cha mkheng thloi da, lownpii rek punthot pchaang daat joring, wonsat kthloi mabi, neia dosi chmaang.
Neiji kdo thloi mkheng pii da, ungta mei thu mdo pkaak pthi ra kdaksaa parlaan pthi joring, wonsat kthloi mabi, neiji kdo phaak chaak ra do khat lee ame.
Wonsat ta kdiil dei, ungu plung knei; wonsat va kheithe nme, mdit mata napal tlo me;
wonsat ta plung ksel kut,lur ava pme. Wonsat va mdaksaa punmun me, sum pinsi me,
mdit mata kar mak bin thlit me,pdainu kindit thu kanpa cha.
Wonsat va do mkheng mdo parteel, do mkheng mdo rin chaak, do mkheng bin psuk da, do mkheng nga mdo diil pchaan.
Wonsat ta kṭuw kro ava pme; pdainu pau kphuwng rekka mongtek daat ra, msik msik pau kphuwng ruk va kdown pthi ra; kdei dok lang lang ava ruk mongtek daat ra.
Mleija nenki tdee na ava mkinreel ava pme, ungta nenki pauphuwn ruk mkinreel ava pme;
pdainu mkinreel mthlen mpha thu, kinreel kma ava kṭuw chra.
Neiji nao kukurthuw mpha thu, nao pauvi kpau ping, nao poi bin heppi kdo bin, nao dodee heppi kdo dee; neiji kvir dok thungta nao nopa ava kdo maak pthi.

Mleija tun tunva nenni meenseen thu kjiing chechu ngi ndee inna, pdainu dil thangva mai leh maiji tkardee ra. Tunva neiji maklek daat kdo dee; pdainu dil thangva kurkhum riim mi nei mdo tdee dok lulu ngi, neiji kurkhummi dei chnik di.
Ava leiji krin cha, kbin cha, wonsat, hava le kdumma ka am thlit; pdainu klin siia wonsat.
Wonsat aptuwn chaan, ungu kheel sii ngi Pthla ktongki chla plung klut, kheel siingi pau kphuwng ki arngai chaan.
Mleija ku mii khatti pleiji mpaubi mii rek hin kpau ava pme, pdainu Isowr hin kpau kurthuwk; mleija ku mii khat lee va mdo dee pandit pme, pdainu Pthla ngi mma ava kukthuk pau mdo pthe.
Khat ktong thang nowlva pau kphuwng nga mii rek kpunchoi pik, ungta kup ksop ungu plung ngamna pau mdo the pik.
Pleiji kpau miiva mdaksaa mthina ktong ki mdo the, pdainu pau kphuwng rek va Rinlop hin mdo the pik.
Tunva naan akheng inna msik msik pleiji apau raan ava neiji kngei chaakka. Pau kphuwng rekka pleiji kpau hinva kheel setti klin, mleija Rinlop hin kthe pik mkurthut nra ktlok khatti mdo purlu pik ra.
Tunva ku u knao rek, neiji pleiji pau da ahin thaanni kthleng kukurthuttu talu msit ka am rang da? Kpandan pik, mdit mata kdei dok, mata pau kphuwng mdit mata kpurchuk kma donle msit ame.
Rinkhu ktaak krowl tingsai daat don riseem daat don mkrowl ava kdu jikki kdum kma donle, ku ngi tak heppi kdei pandi rang?
Ungta pengkhul krowl ava mukrowl kthlei lik likki mdummu rawl karna ra ku kirsim rangda?
Ava leiji naan asingreel in thung ngi tdee pandit ma pauvi kpau ma ammu, mdo the ava tak heppi ku ngi kdei pandi rang? Mleija naanni tirthli thu kpau lulu kurthuwk chnaan di.
Dultipaam thu msik msik pauvi kpau ka am pok munra, ungta mlei ktaak tdit khat lee amnime;
pdainu pau ava ki mlei neiji kdei kukurthut mabi, neia kpau slii mii ava hin thangva paam ktlokki mii kurthuwk nik di ungta kpau slii mii ava nei kihin thangva paam ktlokki mii kurthuwk ra.
Ava leiji naan asingreel in thung ruk va, Pthla ktongki kandang ra kdung ngi angei inta, Rinlop linsaan nra kheelli atlo in.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, pleiji kpau miiva kpurlup rutan rang leiji aṭhil chso.
Mleija plei khatti neiji kṭhil chaakbi, kapthla va mṭhil chaakka, pdainu kpoi bin chaak ka mthei chui me.
Neiva tak tlo nik di? Kapthla tu kilṭhi ngi kdo ṭhil chaak ra ungta kpoi bin ruk va kdo ṭhil chaak ra; kapthla tu kilṭhi ngi neiji laa kdo the ra ungu kpoi bin tung ruk va laa kdo the ra.
Anto mkurthut mabi, Pthla ngi Isowr kpanpaak mkurthut bi, kdei pandi kma mii va ado the in kdei liit kma pa daattu tak heppi “Amen” di don kthe rang?
Mleija naanva kokhoppi panpaak naan di pdainu ktlok miia the pik maan ti.
Neiji naan hin msik msik pauvi karkheelli kpau leiji Isowr kpanpaak chaakka;
Rinlop thu neiji msik msik kpurchuk plei khdaat ava ngi pauna rek pun sowmmi pau kdo the rang hinva, kpoi bin tu kilṭhi ngi neiji pauna rek parnga daat kpau ra ava neiji kdo ngei chaak.
Ku u knao rek, plung bin thu kmo kurthuwk maan; kṭha kma thu nao kdowng ekurthuwk in, pdainu plung bin thungva plung apurchuwl in.
Nowlam thu hanto kjit da, “Plei msik msik ungta paam ktlokki nerri hava mii rek hin tha, mmaanni maryaak pik liit lam mdaat joso, Neiji pau nik di,” dida Mukpu ngi theda.
Pleiji msik msik pau kthe ava krin cha rek tum pme, pdainu krin kma rek tum kurthuwk, pau kphuwng nga krin kma rek tum mkurthut slii daat chunva krin cha rek tum ruk kurthuwk.
Ava leiji, Rinlop mkheng ngi thuwk kunpun da, mkheng inni msik msik pleiji mpau inbi, ungta duwnki rek leh krin kma rekki mthu mlu inbi, mong kukto kchaan pti di donle mmaanva the ni memo?
Pdainu mkheng kheng ngi pau aphuwng sora, ungta krin kma rek leh duwnki rek marvan lubi, mkheng leiji mma ngi plung ren hur don, mkheng leiji mma ngi plung kpurdun ra.
Mma ngi muplung ril thungki kthe thuw chra, ungta ava leiji, naan arlakki do dak kat katti Isowr ka amma, di donle kuwn daat donle Isowr luw kbuk chra.

Anto mkurthuttu talu da ku u knao rek? Naanni athuw kurku in mpha thu, laabuh khat, ungta akurchu nraan ki khat, kpandang ki khat, pleiji kpau ki khat, pau kpurlu pikki khat, ava naan mii pum ktaiji ado thloi in. Havale mkheng mkarmet nrang lei atlo in.
Ku mii khatti pleiji kpau mkurthutta, pauna knii mdit mata kdum tipkheel mso, karnaak deekki atheso; ungta miilai khatti apurlu pik cha so.
Pdainu pau kpurlu pik ra ku khat lee ma am mata mmaan mii pum ktaija Rinlop thu rim kdi am chlam so, ungta mdaksaa leh Isowr hin daatti pau chso.
Khulpu rek miilai knii mdit mata miilai kdum ava ngi pau lamso, ungu ktlok rekki mdo theenna talu tdit apinrit pik chlam so.
Kuk ong daat ktlok khat hin pau mpandan pik ta, ru kri kiva rim kdi am so.
Mleija mmaan mkheng nga kurchuk chra, ungta tuk kso na pau ava mmaan mkheng ngi khat khatti aphuwng lamso.
Ungta khulpu rek Pthla rek ava khulpu rek kurdu ngi ka am lam.
Mleija Isowr ra mii plung chei kparche ki Isowr ava pme, pdainu kdaai ki Isowr.
Kintiing rekka Rinlop rek mkheng thu anto lulu,
Snu rekka Rinlop thu rim kdi am chlam so. Mleija mmaan paura ava rot pik me, pdainu Nowlam ruk va mdo the ava lulu ngi, mii kbommi am lamso.
Mmaanni do mdee chaak nuwm inta, mi inn thaanni mi innpu in akhewl chlam so. Mleija Rinlop thu snu khat kpau ava ning kjana.
Talu da! Naan tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr pauna ava kthuwk mo? Mdit mata naan hin daatti kthlung mo?
Khulpu khat ping kirdi da ku mii khatti mkarbin bi, mdit mata Pthla ktongki ping dida mkarthe bi, neiji naan hin kdo kjit ava Mukpu paureen khat tdit mma ngi adei chso.
Ku mii khatti hava mtin chaak mabi, mma ava tin pik chni me.
Ava leiji neiki ku u knao rek, pau kphuwng thu plung aplut chaan, ungta msik msik pleiji kpau ra ava mat maan;
pdainu mkheng nga karmang deek ungu karnaak deekki atlo in.
Tunva ku u knao rek, naan hin neiji kdo paryaam kṭha paumin arlaang chaan ti, knetti ari chaak nraan neiji aju pbin phaak chaanni.
Naan do rin chaakka do ksi kma mkurthut ma, knet merri akjown chaak inbi, ava ngi naanna akaktlan chraan.
Mleija nei ruk va kdo arlaan chaak ru kri reep ki mkinreel ava naan hin ak parlaan chaak inna, mleija Laaika dil kṭoiji, Khrista ngi nen nupnu ton leiji mdiyo pik inda.
Tditta Mma ava alruwl lamda, Laaika rek dil kṭoiji mnii kdumna nitti ring kinle da,
ungta Mma ngi Sephas hin ktardet da, ava dilli sowm lei knii rek hin ktardet da.
Audilli Mma ngi arjaa parnga kheel dek mu u mnao rek hin vei khdaatti ktardet da, mmaan arlakki mii maknem ma tun kpha thu ka am daat lam, ungu mii angṭhea ki iip chdok lam.
Audilli Mma ngi Jeems hin maktardet dilli kenyee rek mkheng hin ktardet da.
Ava mkheng ṭut na rel tha, mpha liit kma thu kṭou cha khat nei kihin ruk va mhai tdet chda.
Mleija neia kenyee dida mdo to own ra ava kurhui chmaang, kenyee rek arlakki neia kdil sii cha ping, mleija neiji Isowr Rinlop suwk pthuwk nu.

Pdainu neia Isowr plungnee ngi hanto heppi ka am cha ping, ungu nei kuktong ki Mma plungnee ava do ksi kma lua kurthuwk me. Anto kurthuwk daat joso, nei kurthuwk mdaat joring, mmaan hinva neiji kheel betti nong kdo lo, pdainu Isowr plungnee ngi neia mkurthlo ṭhi chda.
Au mkurthut bi, nei kurthuwk mjo ring mdit mata mmaan kurthuwk joso, ava leiji neenni paryaam innu ungta ava leiji naanni ado rin chaak in.
Tunva Khrista ngi kdiyou dok thungki kring kinle karyaam mkurthuttu, tak heppi naan mii angṭhe va kdiyou dok thungki kring karheel ame kdingi ado the inda?
Pdainu kdiyou dok thungki kring karheel ma am mabi, Khrista rukka ring kinle che don;
Khrista ngi mrin kinlet mabi, nen do paryaam ava do sime, ungta naan do rin chaak rukka do sime.
Nen daat ruk va Isowr hin tha plei knei kurthuwk in min, mleija Isowr ri Khrista mdo prin pinlet kdingi sakhi hur pik in minnu, Mma ava ring kinle me tdit mkindit bi, kdiyou rek rukka ring kinle me.
Mleija kdiyou rekki mrin kinlet maan bi, Khrista rukka ring kinle me.
Khrista ngi mrin kinlet mabi, naan do rin chaak rukka do sime ungu naanna pnu thu kikter thlit daat in pti.
Anto mkurthut bi Khrista hin ki iip dok rek rukka kmawng kcha lamma.
Hava rinkhu ki tum daat rang ngi neni Khrista kbin cha nkurthut inbi, nenna mii mkheng thungki ktuwl sii kcha tkurthut inna.
Pdainu tluw da ki iip dok rek thungki ru kri reep ki mthei, Khrista ava kdiyou dok rek thungki kring kinle kat.
Mleija miilai khat ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da kdiyou ma am lulu ngi, Miilai khat ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da kdiyou dok thungki kring kinle tdit ka am.
Mleija Adam thung ngi mii mkheng mdiyo lulu ngi, Khrista thung ngi mii mkheng nga kring ra.
Pdainu mii pum ktaija mma mma ki ngi kparnaak ra; Khrista ava ru kri reep ki thei, au dilli Khrista ngi murjun mpha thu Mma mii rek ra.

Audilli Mma ngi Isowr tditta Mpah hin tha Kruwngpaam ava mparlaan mpha thu, paam kpu rek do paalna khim khai leh rutan khim khai ungta ru ktang khim khai, me eakre pthi dok diltha, mṭut na ava kurthuwk ra.
Mleija Mma rawlmii mkheng Mma khu pja tingi mthiik du khim khai Mma ngi kpaal ra.
Mṭut na relli rawlmii rek ava Mma do eakre ra ava kdiyou.
“Mleija Mma khu pja tingi do mkheng nga Isowr ri thii dok da.” Pdainu “Do mkheng nga Mma tingi mthiik dokka,” kdingi mthe mpha thu, Mma tingi do mkheng kthiik pik ava Isowr.
Do mkheng nga Mma tingi mthiik dok le, Mma tingi do mkheng kthiik pik ava tingi Mchapa mdak kat rukka ka amra, mleija Isowr ra mii pum ktai hin do khim khai kurthuwk.
