Anto mkurthut ma lebi, kdiyou chang kdonni baptis ktlo mdo dit ava tak mdo thena da? Kdiyou rekki mrin kinlet liit ma rang ngu, mmaan kchang ngi mii rek va talu leiji baptis mdo tlot inda?
ṭhang ktai thu talu leiji neia kja kcha ping da?
Ku u knao rek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista hin tha, naanki mlei thu nei knaar lin chaak na ava ngi neia mnii ktai ji kdiyou cha ping!

Dultimii pau nopa ngi neiji Ephisia thu nowmsaa rek tu kurbun kukurthuttu, ava neiva tak psit nik da? Kdiyou rekki mrin kinlet ma rang ngu, “Nenni chaa nee daat in che, mleija pduk niiva tdiyo chaak raan.”
Kurhuwng chmaan: “Kṭha kma kthloppi lamchet kṭha mdo eakre lu.”
Kindit poibin thu am in, ungu pnu tla kurnowl maan. Mleija mii angṭhe va Isowr dei chme. Hava naan ningkja nra neiji kdo the.
Pdainu ku mii khatti kthera, “Tak heppi kdiyou rekka kring kinle rangda? Tak hep kdu ki daksaa ngi kthuwk lam rang ki da?”
Ka aak miilai nang! Nah achiivar ava mdiyo mabi mowng nime.
Ungta achiivar ava kuk mowng rangki chipti dak var mti, kehu daat don, mdit mata chiimuh murson daat don mmuh thlaang thlaang dat avar ra.
Pdainu Isowr do kchol dil kṭoiji mdak piida, ungta mmuh mmuh dil kṭoiji mdak ka am.
Mleija daksaa mkheng nga kurdu sap ava pme, pdainu miilai tumva msik khat ungta saa tumva ktlok khat, puwa tumva msik khat ungu tuwlva tumva msik khat nowl.
Parwaan ki daksaa ungta dulti ki kthuwk daksaa ka am; pdainu parwaan ki laarnee ava khdaat, ungu dulti ki laarnee ava msik khat.
Kniw laarnee ngi msik khat, ungta thla laarnee ngi msik khat, ungu bursi rek laarnee ngi msik khat nowl; mleija laarnee thungva bursi khatta bursi khat hin msik khat.
Ava leiji kdiyou dok rek rin karheel nrang nga anto hep daat ra. Kring kinle ava kmawng kro rang pme.
Pang varri mdo var, pdainu laarnee ngi mowngda; ksowl lang lang ngi mdo alruwl, pdainu ru ktang lang lang ngi kring kinle.
Dultimii daksaa ngi mdo var ava Pthla ktongki daksaa ngi kring kinle, dultimii ktongki daksaa ma ambi, Pthla ktongki daksaa ruk ka am ra.
Hanto ngi kjit da, “Ru kri ki miilai Adam ma kring dulti miilai kurthuwk da”; Dil knao relki Adam ma rinkhu pthla kpii ava.
Pdainu Pthla ktong kia ru kri verki ava pme pdainu daksaa thlaang thlaang ngaal, au dilli Pthla ktongki.
Ru kri ki mii ava dulti thungki tnek miilai; miknit na mii ava parwaan ki.
Tnek mii mkurthut lulu ngi, dulti miirek ava tnek tum kurthuwk; parwaan ki mii ava anto lulu ngi parwaan mii rek lam.
Nenni dultimii arling heppi tkurthut in lulu ngi parwaan ki mii arling ava nnenni tdut jik raan.
Ku u knao rek, neiji hava kthe chaakka; daksaa leh hii ava ngi Isowr Kruwngpaam thlung chip pchaang nime, kmawng kro ava ngi kmawng kro kma ava pha chip pchaang nime.
Asuw in! Neiji naan hin kukthuk pau khat kthea. Nen nkheng nga ti ii in nime, pdainu

mṭut naki pengkhul mdum mpha thu, kuk notti mik tak kcha heppi, nen nkheng inna karthleng che naan di. Mleija pengkhul kdumra, ungta kdiyou rekki kmawng kma rang ngi kring kinle ra, ungu nnenna karthleng che naan di.
Mleija kmawng chra ava kmawng kmarang ngi karthlengra, ungu kdiyou chra daksaa ava diyou liit nime.
kmawng chra ava ngi kmawng kmara ava mmaak mpha thu, ungta kdiyou chra ava ngi kdiyou kmara ava mmaak mpha thu, mdo kjit dok hava ava kurkhum rora: “Kapngam ava ngi kdiyou ava mupjol dokka.”
“kdiyou, nah dopchaanna
tu ungda?
O kdiyou, nah akruw jella tu ungda?”
Kdiyou kruw jel ava pnu, ungu pnu rutanna Nowlam.
Pdainu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ava ar awng ngi, kapchaang cha ava nen nhin mi pii inda, Isowr kpanpaak cha kurthuwk so.
Ava leiji, nei kwonsat lo ku u knao rek, mpha ktai thu Mukpu nong alou chaan, Mukpu nong ktlo ava msit ktaak pme tdit naanni ado dee in.
Tunva kintiing rek tummi sum mdo ṭhai ki mlei: Neiji Galatia ki Rinlop rek hin kdo the pik lam lulu ngi, naan ruk va anto lulu ngi atlo in.
Nei kthlen mpha thu, taṭhai ma nraan, mma mma do pthuw chaak ava hapta ki mnii khat na thok nitti, naan mii pum ktaiji mkhut mkhut thu sum ava apurtuwl so.
Ungta neiji kthlun mpha thu, naan do kulrot na rek ava chethi tu kilṭhi ngi, Jerusalem tha naan chla piik ava mdo dak nraan neiji sii lam nik di.
Nei rukka kahan ra kro mkurthut bi, mmaan tu han kilṭhi rolai inni.
Neiji Masidonia kaklaan dok dil tha avel ro ni kaan di, mleija Masidonia sethleng ngi chet chnuwm nu.
Ungta neiji kipjiin kche nrang khim khai thu, naanni ado tdak chaak nraan, neiji aju am ṭhi bong inda mdit mata phalbi lik thu aju am ṭhi nikaan di.
Mleija hanto kvang slii ngi ado kukurdut ṭhi raan ava ngei chmaang; Mukpu do rot mkurthut bi, neiji ado ka am ṭhi bong raan ava kdo ngei chaak.
Pdainu Pentikos mphaak du khim khai Ephisia thu am daat nik di.
Mleija nei knong mkurchuwl nra thurngot khat kparjaa ngi mhai pvan pik chda, ungta nei mhai kro kma rek knempokki ka am lam.
Timothi mthlen ta, naan arlakki kṭi ktaakki ma am nra mhai sut pṭoi pik chaan; mleija nei knong tlot lulu ngi mma ruk va Mukpu nong mdo tlot slii.

Ava leiji ku mii khat lee ngi ning kpu uikma lu tlo mso. mma ngi nei kihin mdil mkinlet nra kdaaiji lamtha mhai dak pik chaan, mleija neiji mma ava ku u knao rek tu kilṭhi rangki karngai chaak daatta.

Nenki nu u nnao in Apollo mlei thungva, ku u knao rek tu kilṭhi ngi naan ado tvel chaak raan ava mhin kdung kdo the chaak, pdainu tun tunni naan hin mthlen ra ava mma poibin kurthuwk chme, mpha khat thu mma ngi thleng chlai so.
Mik khut ahar inra, krin cha thu rip mer chaan, plung ata pngar inra ruktang ngi am in.
Nong ado tlot naan mkheng thu wonsat kurlo ngi atlo in.
Tunva ku u knao rek, Akhaja thung ki chodu reeppi plung ren kuhur Stiphanas leh mphungka in ava naanni ado dee in; mmaanni kintiing rek nong ktlo thu mdaksaa inna kdung reenni plung plut lamda;
hanto kdu miirek khim khai ava tingi mhai am pik chaan dinu aka ktham chaak inna.
Stiphanas leh Phortunatas ungta Akhaikas lengi mdo taktlan pik lam leiji kanpa kchaam ping, mleija naan am nma thu mmaanni tuphut lamda;
mleija mmaanni nei kapthla ruk naan ruk arda mipro pik chaan da. Hanto hep kdu mii rek ava naanni mhai tin pik chaan.
Asia thungki rinlop rekki aturvui chaak inna. Akuila leh Prisila ungu mmaan inn thungki Rinlop tu kilṭhi ngi Mukpu hin kdung aturvui chaak inna.
Ku u knao rek mkheng inni aturvui chaak inna. Kchiir kurputti khat leh khat kurvui chaan.
Poul nei ku khut katti kjit nu akurvui chaak inna.
Mukpu wonsat klo kma ku mii khat ava pauhur adu chaso. Nenki Mukpu kurjung kurthuwk so!
Mukpu Jisu plungnee ngi aju kurthlo ṭhi chaanso.
Jisu Khrista thu, neiki wonsat ava akheng in hinni am so. Amen.
Isowr poibin dil kṭoiji Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat Poul leh nenki nu u nnao in Timothi ngi Akhaja mkheng thungki kintiing rek mii mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi Korinthia thu ka am Isowr Rinlop rek hin tha:
Nenki Npah in Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai naan hin am so.
Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah ungta Isowr kurthuwk, wonsat knei langlangki Mpah ungu plung ngam mkheng ki Isowr,

plung ngam ava tu kilṭhi ngi nen ndaksaa inna Isowr ri plung ngam mi pii chaanda, mleija ava leiji kja kparteel rek nen ava ngi plung ngam tpiik pchaan nraan, nen njat naan mkheng thu plung ngam mi hai pii chaan so.
Mleija Khrista jat kham ava kheel siingi nenni hur ṭhi in minnu, ava leiji Khrista thu plung ngam nenni kheel sii ngi tphaak chaak in.

Neenni kja kakham kparteel inbi, ava naanki plung ngam leh kirliing ado phaak nraan lei; ungta plung ngam mtipiik inbi, ava naan plung ngamna, neen kjat kakham in lulu ngi naanni kja kakham adiil dei chaan.
Neenni kdet liit kma plung aju pkai psuk innu; mleija naanni neenki kja kakham ado tphaak ṭhiin ava dei innu, naan ruk va neenki plung ngam ado tphaak ṭhi chaak in.

Mleija ku u knao rek, Neenni Asia thu kja kdo parteel chaak in ava naan dodee ma rang nga ngei chmaan ring; mleija neen ktuwn inki bowr krik ava kheel sii ki ava ngi mdo tnen lei inni, krinkhu inna kring rang ruk va bin chmaan ring.
Kdiyou rangki nenni talu leiji tarlaan inda kdingi bin chaannu; pdainu nenni nen ndaksaa tunni kbin psuk kma pdainu kdiyou rek kipring pinle Isowr hin tbin psuk chaak in.
Tiṭit kirvei kdiyou thungki Mma ngi mi ṭenthuw chaanda, ungta mi kṭen pthuwk chraan; Mma ngi vei khat mido tiṭen pthuw chaak nraan, Mma hin nenni kdung plung ngi bin psuk chaan che.
Kṭhil cha thu naan ruk va ado tbom chaak kat raan, ditta ava leiji mii knempok doṭhil pikki neen kihin suwṭhat mdo trot pik nraan ki tummi, mii maknemmi neen kchang kdon ni kanpa kpha chlam ra.
Mleija neen knapal tlot chaak inna, hava dultipaam thungki neenki kindit rinpaumin, kheel sii ngi naan ktong tha, dultipaam ki lousing pme, pdainu Isowr plungnee leh Isowr ktongki plung klut.
Mleija neenni naan hin do khat lee kjit chmaan ring pdainu naan do pat leh ado dee pandit in ava daat; naanni kurkhummi deipandi chnaan di kdingi kbin psuk chaak inna.
Naanni deithuw maanti, mleija Mukpu Jisu nit thung ngi neenni naan hin naar ado kiplin psuk chaak in lulu ngi, naanni neen kihin naar mhai plin psuk chnaan di.
Mleija hava anto kat kurthuwk, ditta naanni suwṭhat vei knii ngi ado phaak chaak nraan, ru kri ngi naan hin tithlen ra ava neiji kdo ngei chaak.
Masidonia tha kche thu lamtha ado kvel chaak nuwm in, ungta Masidonia ki naan hin kdil kinle da, ungu Judia kira lamtha neia naanni ado tdak chaak raan ava kdo ngei chaak.
Hava kdo tlot nuwm reen leiji plung krip kma lulu kurthuwk mo? Daksaa dil kaṭoiji ka am lulu ngi oji dinu kdo the dok ava neiji eme di teng nu kthe mo?
Isowr ava lam trin chaak kurhui kat mkurthut leiji, naan hin thangva ong leh maang ame.
Mleija Silvanus leh Timothi ungu neiji naan arlakki Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista kdo paryaam in ava ong leh maang ava pme; pdainu Mma hin thangva mpha ktai thu ong daat.
Mleija Isowr paureel dok mkheng nga Mma hin ong kurthuwk. Ava leiji nenni Isowr laarnee hin tha Mma thu Amen talo in.
Pdainu naan tu kilṭhi ngi Khrista thu mi kapṭhan pik ava Isowr, ungu rutan mi hai pii inda;
nen nleen inni Mma ngi kbii mi hai nam pik inda ungta pau palreen lulu ngi nen nuplung thu Pthla mi hai pii chaan da.
Pdainu plungril deida sakhi mukuhur pik Isowr ava neiji kaktham chaakka, mleija neiji naan ado ksan nraan ki Korinthia tha kthleng nuwm ava pmaang.
Neenni naan dorin chaak tun tha mkinreel li am inni di chmaan ring; naan kanpat nrang leiji nong ado ktlot ṭhi in, mleija naanni krip merri ado rin chaak in.
Mleija veikhat avel nowl inda aplung in kdo pjat ma nra kuplung kdo reel chaak dok.
Mleija neiji naan plung dun nra ktlo kukurthuttu, neiji plung kdo pjat mii ava kma donle neia ku ngi plung ngam mhai kpii chrangda?
Ungta plung kanpa mhai kpii chrang rek hinni neiji plung kja kdo phaak ma nra, mleija nei kakanpat bi, naan akheng inki kanpa tdit naan akheng inni ado dee kat kat in, neiji kdo tlot kikjit cha ping.
Mleija kdung plung kakham, plungkja, arthli knempok kbuw ngi kdo kjit chaak, naan plung kankar nra ava pme, pdainu nei kwonsat ava naan tun tha kheel sii ngi ka amma tdit naan dodee rang lei.
Pdainu plung kja ku mii khat ma ambi, mma ngi nei daat mdo tapjat ava pme; pdainu maklek suwn thu kparsa reenni kdo thena ava pme, naan akheng in hin ruk va kurthuwk.
Mleija mii knempokki miilai khat hin tha anto lu mraal kpii ava ko khoppa.
Ava leiji mma ngi kheel reenni plung mdo pjat ma nra, ava kchang nga naanni mhin kinle da ado ptlot pik in ungu plung ngam ado piik inni kṭha siira.
Ava leiji naanni mma ava wonsat adolo chaak nowl raan neiji kngei chaakka.
Mleija naanni do khim khai apṭoi inmo pṭoi maanti tdit neiji kdo dee chaak nra aju pirsin naannu hava kdo kjit chaak.
Naan do ptlot pik ku mii khat ava nei ruk ku kuptlot pikka. Talu talu daat joso neiji do khat kuptlot pik bi, ava naan tummi Khrista maiṭhuwmmi kdo ptlot pik.
Nen ntunni seitaanni khut mdo pnen ma nra; mleija mma poibinna nnenni ndee in.
Neiji Troas thung ngi Khrista ki kṭha paumin kparyaam ra kthlen thungta, Mukpu hin nei ktummi thurngot khat mhai pvan pik chda.
Pdainu ava tha ku u knao Titas kdo phaak ma leiji kuplung kja karnga liit chme. Ava leiji neiji mmaanna ma lam thinu, Masidonia tha kunsun cha ping.
Pdainu Khrista thu mpha ktai thung ngi kapchaang riimmi mihai ṭhi chaanda, ungta mmun ktai thu Mma kdei cha ki mikrim ava nnen leiji karyaam da, Isowr hin panpaak chaan che.
Mleija nnenna mdo ktlan pik rek leh kmawng kcha rek arlakki Isowr hin tha Khrista ki mikrim ava in pmin.
Khat hin thangva kdiyou thungki ngi kdiyou kira krim kurthuwk da, ktlok khat hin thangva, rinkhu thungki ngi rinkhu kira krim kurthuwk. Hava tummi kurhui ra ku ka amda?
Mleija mii knempok lulu ngi nnenna Isowr pauna kjur in pmin me; pdainu Isowr nong silna plung ktip miirek lulu ngi, Isowr do sut na thu Khrista ktong tha kpau in pmin.
Nenni ndaksaa kpanpaak ra nupṭhun inmo? Mdit mata naan hinki, mata naan hin tha, mii murson rek lulu ngi kro ki chethi nikriin inmo?
Mii mkheng ngi deida mdo pat ra, naan plung ril thung ngi kdo kjit chaak dok in, naan ki daksaa ava kro kdi ki neen kchethi.
Ungta naanna Khrista hinki chethi khat neenni ado kparlaan in tdit naanni tdet inti, ava mukdii do kjit pme pdainu kring Isowr Pthla do kjit, lungphel tun pme pdainu dultimii plung ril thu.
Hanto ngi Khrista thu Isowr hin knetti krin cha tkurthut in.
Neenni do khim khai pchaang da neen kthung ngi kthuwk lulu ngi neenva karbin chmaan ring; neenni kapchaang hep kukurthut naan na Isowr hinki.
Mma ngi ren paurina ki kapchaang kukurthut nraan ki mhai tapchaan inda, tikjit khat ava pme pdainu Pthla, mleija tikjit va mdo eayo pdainu Pthla va rinkhu kpii.

Nowlam ma lungphel tunni kjit da, mpiik mpha thu Isowr laarnee kandang da. Mousi mai ava chuwl chdaat joso, Isreel mii rek tumva mapleu reen leiji mmai ksuw ava pchaang chlamme. Nowlam rukka kapchai reen mkurthut che va kdiyou laarnee mdo thuwṭhi.
Pthla nong tlot ava tija klinni mlaar knei kurthuwk chdaat ta!
Mleija mraal kpii rang ngi mdo pankai ava kunlor langlang ungu rinkindit rang mdo pankai ava tija kheeli kunlor ri kipleu chdaat rang nga!
Hava ki mleija chodu ki kipleu sii ava tunva kunlor ame, mleija kheel siiki kunlor laarnee kipleu ava ka am.
Mleija kchuwl cha ava ngi mapleu bi, ka am thlit daat rang ava kheel siiki kunlor ri kipleu ra.
Neenni hava kdo bin psuk mer lei inni, kuplung inna kheel siingi ktangar.
Isreel mii rekki kchuwl kipleu ava ṭut mdo dee ma nraan, mmai kukhum Mousi lulua neenna kurthuwk maan ring.
Pdainu mpoibin inna pchai setset da; mleija snii kpha thu mmaanni, pliw paurina mpat inki mpha thu, maikhum ava mdo lii in pme, mleija Khrista mpha thung rongi mdo lo pthi.
Snii kpha thu mmaanni Mousi mpat in mpha thu maikhum ava muplung ril thuwnni ka am daat.
Pdainu mii ava ngi Mukpu hin mkinlet mpha thu maikhum ava kurlou cha.
Tunva Mukpu ava Pthla kurthuwk, Mukpu Pthla amna mun thungva kintek ka am.
Ungta nen nkheng inni nmai in kukhum kma Mukpu laarnee tsut in; ungta laarnee ava kat arling ngi tkarthlen chaak in, mleija hava Mukpu Pthla.
Ava leiji, Isowr nong ktlo ki wonsat kdo thloi chaak in, neenni plung parheel chmaan ring.

Tup prut nong leh ningkja nra nong mkheng nga neenni kdo maak pthi dok in; Isowr pauna plei knei psuk ungu karmak nong ktlo kdo pthlei in, pdainu plung kindit mii pum ktai hinva Isowr dosut na thung ngi kindit mlei ava neenni karphat chmaan ring.
Neenki kṭha paumin mkhum dokbi, ava kmawng chrang rek hin daatti kukhum.
Isowr arling kdu jik Khrista laarnee ki kṭha paumin ar awng thungki mdo ser nraan, krin kma rek poibinna mdo ptot pthi.
Mleija neenni kdaksaa in ava paryaam maan ring, pdainu neen kdaksaa inna sra owr lulu ngi Jisu tummi Jisu Khrista ava Mukpu di innu kdo paryaam chaak in.
Mleija, “Kjiingnu thungki mar awng klengra,” dida kthe Isowr ava ngi Khrista maiṭhuwmmi Isowr laarnee kdei chaki mido tpiik chaak nraan, nen nuplung ril in thuwnni kleng.
Pdainu kheel sii ki rutan ava Isowr do ungu nen ndo pme tdit mdo tdet nangi hava alrou neenni tnek beel thung ngi kdo thloi chaak in.
Neenni mlam ktai thu kja parteel chaannu, pdainu mhai parchi you inme; plung chei karche in ping, pdainu plung pngal pthi maan ring.
Suwk kthuwk in ping, pdainu msui chaan me; mdo te khe het in, pdainu me ea krep inme.
Jisu rinkhu ava neen kdaksaan thung ngi mkandan nra, mpha ktai thu Jisu diyo ava neen kdaksaan thu kdo arkeen chaak in.
Mleija kdiyou chrang ki neen kdaksaan thung ngi Jisu rinkhu mkandan nra, Jisu tummi kring neen ava mpha ktai thu me eayou nuwm inda.
Ava leiji kdiyou vi neen kthung ngi ka am pdainu kring ngi naan thu nong mdo tlot.
‘Neiji rin chnu, ungu ava leiji neiji kpau ping,’ dida Laaika ngi mdo kjit lulu ngi, krin cha ki Pthla ava kat neenni thloi chaannu, neen ruk va rin chaannu, ungta ava leiji neenni kpau chaan ping.
Mukpu Jisu kipring pinle Mma ngi nen rukka Jisu tu kilṭhi ngi mi ktipring pinle raan, ungu neenna naan tu kilṭhi ngi Mma awng ngi tri raan tdit kdo dee in.
Mleija miirek hin plungnee mnem setset leiji, Isowr laarnee thu kheel setsetti ado panpaak chaak nraan hava mkheng nga naan atum.
Ava leiji neenni plung pngal daak maan ring. Nenki ndaksaa mduwn ava kartlai chdaat joso, daksaa ril ava mnii ktaiji ren.
Mleija mpha mrukki tummi kja tparteel inni kheel sii ki kṭuw knai kma ki laarnee mido tpurchuwl pik in.
Mleija nenni tdee do ava ksuw kurthuwk maan min, pdainu tdee ma do ava tsut in; mleija tdee slii do ava roisot me, pdainu tdee ma do ava kṭuw knai kma ka am.
Mleija mthung ngi nen ta am naan dultipaam ki buw inn mtluk chaak bi, parwaan tha, Isowr hinni khut do sak ma kṭuw knai kma ka am tdit nenni ndee in.
Ungta nenni hava tha chel chang in minnu, parwaan ki inn kihiil knaa nuwm rekrekki ta am in;
mleija ava nhiil nnaak inbi ndakchai ji na am daat arlaan inni mi pha in nime.

Mleija hava buw inn thu na am slii daat arlaan inni, tarngai chaak reen lei inni chel tchan chaak in; mdolo pthi nrang lei pme, pdainu kheel setti mido tapnaak chaak nraan ki, mleija kdiyou kro ki rinkhua ava ngi kpinjer ra.
Nen mido tpinjer pik chaak nraan Isowr katti mi purchuwl pik chaanda, Mma do purtuwl mkheng kpha chrang leiji Pthla mi hai pii chaan da.
Ava leiji neenna mpha ktai thu karda in krok; neenni ki inn thaanni ka am in mpha thungva Mukpu hinki lam karlat kchaan ping tdit neenni kdo dee in.
Mleija neenni krin cha thu kchet in ping, kdo dee lei inni kchet pmaan ring.
Ungta ki inn in ma pthii thida Mukpu tu ka amve ava kdo ngei chaak lei inni kdung karda inna krok kcha a.
Ava leiji neenni inn tha am daat jown ring, Mma ningthlun na ktlo neenni kdo ngei chaak in.
Mleija nen nkheng inna Khrista ki kekṭewl ku onna ava maiṭhuwmmi tkandan sap raan, mleija nen mii pum ktaiji mma mma nong tlot dil kṭoiji kṭha daat don kṭha kma daat don tarlaan chaak raan.
Ava leiji, pauṭhat ti neenni miirek kdo archil chaak in; pdainu neenna Isowr hin mhai tdet chaanda, ungta naanki kindit plung ruk va dei naandi kdingi kbin chaak inna.
Neenni naan hin kdaksaan panpaak chmaan ring, pdainu plung ril kma, mduwn daatti miirek napal tlot naanni ado arthaan pchaan nraan, neenki mlei thu naan naarlin chaak nra akpii kchaan ping.
Mleija neen kdaksa inna siir ki mkurthut bi, ava Isowr tum; neen kpoibin inni kindit mkurthut bi, ava naan atum.
Mleija Khrista wonsatti mbowl inda, mleija mii mkheng tummi Miilai khatti diyou da; ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, mii mkheng ngi kdiyou ki ntum in tphaak sap in.
Ungta kring miirek ava mdaksaan ki tummi kring ava pme, mmaan tummi diyou da ungu kring kinle Mma tummi kring mkurthut nraan, Mma mii mkheng tummi kdiyou.
Ava leiji, tunii ki kupṭhunni, dultimii dak dil kṭoiji ku khat lee mai kjat maan ring, dak dil kṭoiji nenni mpha khat thu Khrista mai kjat jown min, nenni Mma mai takjat kurnowl in ava pme.
Ava leiji, ku mii khatti Khrista hin ma ambi, mma ava ren do seem kurthuwk kcha a, pliw ava kvei dokka, asuw in, ren ava kvei sliia.
Hava mkheng nga Isowr hinki, nenna kring thu Mma ngi Mma tu kilṭhi ngi mi pipin pik inda, ungta kpipin pik nong ktlo rang ngi mi pii chaan da.
Tditta dultimii mkheng nga Isowr ri Khrista thu mdaksaa ngi mi pipin pik chaanda, mmaan pnu ava Mma ngi bin kurnowl me, ungta kpipin pikki paumin ava nen nhin inni mi sil naan da.
Ava leiji nen nthu Isowr do thiik Khrista tummi pau kuhur thlit ava in pmin. Khrista kchang kdonni neenni aka ktham chaak inna, Isowr hin karpin dok in.
Mleija Mma thu nenni Isowr ki rinkindit tkurthut nraan, pnu kdei cha kma Mma ava nen tummi pnu tpurthuw da.
Mma tu kilṭhi ngi nong ktlo sap in pmin, naanni Isowr plungnee ava do ksi kma ado arlaan ma nraan neenni kthe kcha in ping.
Mleija Isowr ri theda,
“Mpha kcha kat thu Neiji aryaak pik ni kaan di,
ungta kirliinna nitti Neiji abom ni kaan di.”
Asuw in, tunva tarlaan chaak na ki mpha; asuw in, tunva kirliinna ki mpha kurthuwkka.
Neen knong tlot in thung ngi kar mak kdo phaak ma nraan, ku mii khat lee tummi neenni sut pṭoi maan ring.
Pdainu Isowr sra owr rek lulu ngi, neenni kdaksaan na mlam ktai thu kdo panpaak chaak in: kdung ngi kdiil dei cha thu, kja kparteel thu, nong kchil thu, kdung ngi knang cha thu,
kchung karlaang thu, rowng inn thu, kut,lur thu, kpalren da nong ktlo thu, mik khut kahar thu, poitham thu;
plung kseeng kdeiji kdiil dei cha, Pthla Kchiir thu, rinkindit wonsat thu,
rinkindit pauvi, ungta Isowr rutan ni; khut lechang ngi rinkindit ki rawl dona tu kilṭhi ngi;
mii do kjat leh mii do kjat nma thu, krai cha leh kpanpaak thu, plei knei lulu ngi mtlo inda, joso ava kindit;
malpa lulu joso maidee hep daat; kdiyou lulu joso, kring daat in ping, mraal mikpii in lulu, joso me eayou inme;
kja langlang lulu, joso mpha ktai thu kanpa kchaan ping; sra lulu joso kdung suwang in ping; do khat lee kthloi kma lulu, joso do khim khai kdo thloi chaak in.
Korinthia rek, naan hin neen knerra kparvang nga; neen kuplung nga kuprolla.
Naanna neenni vai apchil chmaan ring, pdainu naan adaksaan wonsat adolo lei inni kchil kcha in pti.
Akpinlet pik inni neiji kmo rek hin kpau kcha lulu ngi kpau kcha ping, aplung in ktuprol chaakka.
Krin kma rekka plap kurthut ṭhi maan. Mleija rinkindit leh rinkindit kma mii ava tak heppi plap kurthuwk rang da? Mdit mata kleng leh kjiingnu ava tak heppi ka amve rang da?
Tak heppi Khrista leh Dijabowlla kulrot nrang da? Mdit mata krin cha mii leh krin kma mii ava tak heppi khdaatti ka amve rang da?
Isowr luwbuk Inn na khut do sak pthla tu tak heppi kulrot nrang da? Mleija nnenna kring Isowr luwbuk Inn ava pmin; Isowr do the lulu,
“Neiji mmaan thu amda ungu mmaan arlakki tlowng nik di,
ungta Neia mmaan ki Isowr kurthuwk nikdi,
ungu mmaanna Nei kmii rek lam ra.
Ava leiji Mukpu ngi the da,
naan ni mmaan thungki thuwk dok inra,
ungta asik inni am in,
ungu ktobor do khat lee thowng maan,
ava dil rongi Neiji akowl nikaan di.
Ungta Neia naan ki Apah
in nik di,
ungu naanna Nei kchapa rek leh Nei kchanu rek naanndi,
dida kapchaang riim Mukpu ngi theda.”

Nei kwonsat lo rek, nenni hava paureel rek ta thloi lei inni, nenni ndaksaan leh pthla kbuwr khim khai partleu dok in chera, ungta ava kchang rang nga Isowr kṭi ngi kseeng deekki kinreel kurthuwk in che.
Neen kihin aplung in mhai pvan pik chaan; neenni ku mii khat lee plaal maan ring, neenni ku khat lee ea krep maan ring, neenni ku khat lee kat na chmaan ring.
Neiji naan raal akpii ngi hava the chmaang, mleija kdive kringve rangki naanna neen kuplung ril thuwnni ka am dok in pti dinu chodu ngi ahin thaan kdo the dok ksa.
Neiji kdung plung krippi ado kbin psuk chaak in; kdung ngi naar ado kiplin psuk chaak in; neia plung kngammi kdim kcha ping. Kja kakham kdo parteel in mkheng thu neia kakanpat ti kdim kcha ping.
Mleija neenni Masidonia tha kthlen in mpha thu, neen kdaksaa inna karnga chmaan ring pdainu muktong ktai thu kja parteel innu, mduwn tha rawl karnaak ṭhiinnu, mril thangva kṭi ngi ka am in ping.
Pdainu ktuwl kcha rek plung ngam kpii Isowr ri Titas marvan leiji plung ngam mpii chaan da.

Ungta mma arvan daat kma naan mlei thu mma plung ngam kpii plung ngam ava ngi nei klam ado sut in, kurnung karbaang inti a am in, ungu aplung in klut ava mma ngi song da, ava leiji kheel sii ngi neia kanpa kchaam ping.

Mleija chethi thu neiji naan plung kankar nra kikjit dok kurthuwk daat joring, neiji kansiir chmaang, neiji kansiir mjoring, chethi ngi mpha mruk suwn thung daat joso aplung in kankar munra kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.

Ava lulu ngi, kanpa kchaam ping, naan plung kankar lei pme; pdainu naanni plung ren ado hur nraan kingi plung kpur mkurthut leiji; naanni Isowr ktong tha plung ado pjat in, neen kihin, inni ajat akham in ava maang liit me.
Mleija Isowr ktongki plung kja ngi plung ren kuhur amda ungu plung ren kuhur thu kirliing kcha tdit ma am leiji kansiir cha lua ame; pdainu plung kjava kdiyou mdo thuwṭhi.

Mleija asuw in, Isowr ktong ki plung kja ngi tija thu naanna karme chdaat in pti, ning kakraalli daksaa kartleu nuwm, tija thu plung kthi, tija thu kpiir, tija thu mlam krin, tija thu plung klut, tija thu mraal kpii mthuwṭhi daatta! Mpau lam khim khai thu parmak maan ring tdit adaksaan ni ado rot dok in.
Ava leiji neiji kjit dok daat joring, karmak nong ktlo mii khat lei pme, pdainu neen ktummi naan plung klut ava Isowr dosut na thu naan hin mkandan nrang leiji neiji kdo kjit chaak.
Ava leiji, neenna plung ngam kphaak chaak inna.
Ungta neen kdaksaan ki plung ngam daat kma Titas mkanpat leiji neen ruk kheel sii ngi kanpa kchaan ping, mleija naan akheng inni mma poibin tparngat pik chaan tinu.

Mleija neiji mma hin naan mlei thu napal ktlot bi, ava ngi neia ningkja pha chmaang; pdainu neenni naan hin mkindit do khim khai kdo the thut dok in, ava leiji Titas maiṭhuwmmi neenni napal kdo tlot in na mkindit kat.
Ungta naan hintha mma va kheel sii ngi plung var da, akheng inni tithe kupṭoi akurthut in bin phaak chda, ungta kṭi leh kunchunni mma arlaang chaan tinu.
Kheel sii ngi plung ado kbin psuk lei inni kdung kanpa kchaam ping.
Ku u knao rek, Masidonia ki Rinlop rek hin mdo tdet Isowr plungnee mlei thu naan dodee ra ava neiji kngei chaakka;
Mleija kdung kpirsin ki kja kparteel thu kheel sii ngi kanpa lamda ungu sra chdaat lam joso kpii cha ngi dim chlam da.
Mleija neiji sakhi kpiik chaakka, ditta mdo thloi in dil kṭoiji mmaanni pii chlam da, ungta mdo thloi in kheel dek ruk va muplung bin chaak inni pii chlam da.
Kintiing rek kbom cha thu mmaan ruk mtum in ma am nra neen kihin inni ktham chlam da.
Ungta havaa neen kuplung bin chaak inna kurthuwk pme, pdainu Isowr poibin dil kṭoiji ru kri reeppi mdaksaan Mukpu hin pii chlamda, ungta neen kihin ruk kirpii chlamda.
Titas ti chodu ngi mdo pṭhun dok dil kṭoiji, kdung ngi hava plungnee ki nong nga naan arlakki mma ngi mdo pṭut dok nra, neenni mma hin kdo ktham chaak in.

Tunva naanni krin cha thu, apauna in thu, kdei cha thu, aplung lut naan mkheng thu, ungu neen wonsat ado talo naan thu, naanni do khim khai thu suwang athuw lei inni, hava plungnee ki nong thung ruk va suwang thuwk chaan.
Neiji havaa pauvi pṭum chmaang, pdainu ktlok rek hin plung klut ava anto thide tdit naan ki wonsat ruk do dak kat kat mkurthut nrang lei.
Mleija naanni nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista plungnee ado dee in, tditta Mma suwang thuw ngi naan rukka suwang athuw nraan, Mma ava suwang kurthuwk daat joso naan tumra Mma ava sra kurthuwk.
Ungta hava mlei thu neiji akthe pik chaak inna: ktlo leh kbin daat kma pdainu kum roi ksot thu ado pṭhun dok in ava tunva ado pṭut dok inni kṭha bet ra.
Ava leiji ktlo nuwm rekrekki bin inti ado thloi daat in ava apṭut dok chaak inbi karlot bet chra.
Mleija ktlo nuwm tdit ma am bi, mii ava ngi mdo thloi dil kṭoiji talo kuhui kurthuwk, ungu mma ngi mdo thloi ma dil kṭoija kurthuwk me.
Naan bowr tiprik bet da ktlok bowr jaan nrang lei neiva kdo the chaak pme.
Pdainu mkinṭim nra naan do thloi pok ava ngi, tun tun mmaan do ngei purdon pik da, mmaan do thloi ruk va naan do ngei aju kpurdon pik chraan, mleija ava ngi naan thu kinṭim kurthuwk ra.
Mdo kjit dok lulu ngi, “Knemmi kpurkuk mma va do khat lee kheelli thloi me, ungta mruk suwnni kpurkuk mma va mdo thloi ma ame.”
Pdainu Titas plung thu kinṭim chakki naan tuk aksut pik in Isowr kpanpaak kurthuwk so.
Mleija mma ngi neen kdo ktham chaak in ava daat prim psuk me, pdainu mdaksaa ngi plung mdo plut reen leiji muplung binni ahin thaan kthleng ra.
Kṭha paumin kparyaam rang lei mma tu kilṭhi ra, Rinlop rek mkheng thu kunton langlang ku u knao in neenni ksii chaak inna.

Ungta ava daat kma Mukpu laarnee tumra, ungu nenki kṭha nong ktidet rangki tummi, neenni mnong kdo tlot slii in, plungnee ki nong hava thu neen tu kilṭhi ngi kchet ktlowng ra Rinlop rekki mdo kchol dok lam.
Neenni plung kneiki leemna chla ava kdo kmei lei inni, ku mii khat lee ngi mdo tupsul ma nraan, cheek ksin chaak inna.
Mleija Mukpu mik sut na daat thung kma pdainu miirek do sut na thung ruk tak kjat kurhui ava neenni kdo ptuwn chaak in.

Ungta nong knempok thu plung klut, ungu marden kteen thu kdo pirsin ndok in, neen ki ku u knao in ava mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi ksii chaak inna, pdainu tunva chodu ki hinva kheel sii ngi plung klut ka amma, mleija kdung reenni naan plung ado tapkai psuk in.
Titas ki mleija, mma ava naan nong ktlo thu nei kmiiṭhi; ungta nenki nu u nnao in tumva, mmaanna Rinlop rekki tamsii rek Khrista ki laarnee rek lam.
Ava leiji Rinlop rek maiṭhuwmmi, naan wonsat leh naanki mlei thu neen knapal tlot in ava hava miirek hin mhai tdet pik chaan.
Tunva kintiing rek tummi kpii kcha mlei thu neiji naan hin kdo kjit nrang ki arleek set do ame.

Mleija neiji naan akirsim dok in deinu, mlei ava thu Masidonia ki miirek hin napal ktlot chaakka, ditta Akhaja va jaankum ki kupṭhun ni kurthlong dok da; ungta naan plung klutti mmaan mii ma knem ma ksop chda.
Pdainu naan ki mlei thu nei knapal tlot chaak ava do ksi kma mkurthut ma nra, ditta ava leiji neiji naan ado kthe pik dok in heppi, naanni akurthlon nraan kingi neiji ku u knao rek kdo sii chaak lam.
Neiji Masidonia rek tu kthlen mpha thu, naan kurchuwl kma laiji akphaak inbi, naan mlei thu plung ado ktipri psuk in ava kdo the psuk raan ma amma bi, ningkja tdut chaak raan.

Ava leiji ku u knao rekki, mdu betti naan hin chet da, ungu naan paureel dok hava leemna chla ava ado purchuwl dok nraan, kheithe changtlaak ktaak pdainu kpii nuwm rekrekki ado purchuwl dok nraan, kdo ktham chaak ava ngi kṭha rang mo dinu neiji kbin chaakka.
Mpau lamma hava: Ktlowmmi kvar miiva ktlowmmi kurkun chra, ungta knemmi kvar miiva knemmi kurkun chra.
Mii pum ktaiji kheithe changtlaak ktaakki mdit mata namtrommi ktlo kma, mma mma poibin dil kṭoiji atlo chso, mleija kanpa kanpa ngi kpii kcha ava Isowr ri wonsat mdo lo.
Ungta mpha ktai thu do khim khai kokhoppi ado thloi chaak nraan, ungu kṭha nong ktai tummi knemmi ma am nra, Isowr ri naan hin phowl kṭha khim khai kpii mdo pchaan.
Hava Laaika thu mdo the lulu, “Mma ngi pinṭheu tir da, Mma ngi sra hin pii chda, Mma ki rinkindit ava kṭuw knai liit pme.”
Chii kvar hin chiptii ungta tchaak rangki tummi thenpen kpurdon Mma ngi purdon donle mthuwna aktipnem pik chraan ungu naanki rinkindit then ava aju kipnem pik chraan.
Kheithe changtlaak ktaak liitti ado piik in leiji, naanna mlam ktai thu suwang akupthuwk chraan, neen thung ngi Isowr kpanpaak cha kurthuwk ra.
Mleija hava nong sok klou kcha ngi kintiing rek dongei daat kpurdon pik daat kma, pdainu knempokki Isowr kpanpaak ktipdim cha kurthuwk naan di.
Khrista ki kṭha paumin deida hava kurdu ngi naanni mii murson mkheng tummi plung kneiji ado piik chaak in ava ngi Isowr kpunlor kurthuwk naandi.
Anto liit chok kma Isowr plungnee ava naan athung inni ma am leiji mmaanni alam in suwda, ungu naan tummi mdo ṭhil chaak in.
Tithe pchaan liit ma Mma ki leemna chla leiji Isowr panpaak cha so.
Naan tu mai tkurdut in mpha thungva neia kjuwm langlang kcha ping, pdainu naan hinki lam kakarlat thungta Poul plung ktangar ra, nei kdaksaa katti plung ktap, plung kparneemmi aka ktham chaak inna!

Neenna dultipaam dil ṭoida ka am lam pi dida kraal in mpii inda plung kpur mii angṭhe hinni neiji plung krip merri kdo bin chaak ava neiji ka am daat mpha thu kdo tdet ma nra, ahin thaanni neiji kaktham kchaam ping.
Mleija neenni dultipaam thu am jown ringva, daksaa dil kṭoiji neenni rawl karnaak ṭhi maan ring.
Mleija neenki rawl dona ava dultipaam ki dil kṭoi pme pdainu rowng knet sii ava kdo pkui nraan ki, Isowr ktongki rutan kthloi in ping.
Neenni pau karteen psuk ava ea krep innu, Isowr kdei dokki kpohok khim khai ungu poibin khim khai ea krep thiinnu, Khrista kupṭoi kdo purthuw in.
Naanni kthe kupṭoi apurkhum dok inle, pau kleek khim khaija mraal kpii rangki ngi kurchuwl dokka.

Naan amaiṭhuwm inni ka am do ava asuw in. Ku mii khatti Khrista ki ping kardi da mdaksaa mthina ngi mbin bi, mdaksaa mthina ngi abin chdaat so, ditta mma ngi Khrista ki mkurthut lulu ngi neen rukka anto in ping.
Mleija neenki krutan in mlei thu neiji knem betti napal ktlo kurthuwk daat joring, naan linsaan nrangki Mukpu do piik chaak. Ungta naan ake eakrep rangki pme, neiva ningkja du chni maang.
Chethi rekki apṭit chmaan ringmo kdingi neiva kbin chaakka.
Mleija mmaanni theda, “Mma chethi rekka krik reenna ungu kapchai reenna, pdainu mdaksaa am ava ksowlla, ungta mpau saamma do si chme.”
Neen ka am ma in mpha thu chethi rekki kdo theen lulu ngi, neenni ka am daat in mpha thung ruk va anto daatta tdit anto lu kdu mii ngi adei so.

Mdaksaan kpanpaak kcha rek mii angṭhe tu kilṭhi ngi, neenni kdaksaan kpinṭim ra mdit mata tpurtol ra bin chmaan ring. Pdainu mmaan msingreel inni khat leh khat tu kpinṭim lamda, ungta msingreel inni khat leh khat kpurtol chlam da mmaanni dei pandi chlamme.
Pdainu mdo palreen kheelli neenni napal tlo chmaan ring, ungta neen ktum rang ngi Isowr do palreen ava naan kpha pang daat.
Mleija neenni naan hin kthlen chaak in mpha thu, ru kri ngi Khrista ki kṭha paumin kdo paryaam chaak in ungta mdo palreen ava neenni pkheel chliit maan ring.

Mdo palreen kheelli neenni ktlok mii khat nonglo na thu neenni napal tlot nmaan ring; pdainu neen kuplung bin chaak inna naan do rin chaak thu mkarkheel set set nra, naan arlakki neen kbil mlin nrang lei.
Ava leiji naan aju pkheel dek inda ktlok khuwpaam tha neenni kṭha paumin ava kparyaam cha kro in ping.
“Napal ktlo miiva Mukpu napal atlot chaak na so.”
Mleija mdaksaa mthina ngi kpanpaak kcha miia mdo rot pik pme, pdainu Mukpu ngi mdo panpaak mii ava mdo rot pik.
Neiji mruk ka aah chaak na thu ado tdiil pik chaak nraan kngeija. Mhai diil ṭhi chaan!
Neiji naanna Isowr ktong kingi khei akthe chaak naanna, mleija nalanao kartleu dang ngi khdaat chrel innpu Khrista ava hin inn mdo tathlot dok in.

Pdainu pruwlli mril kakhaa ngi Ev mdo huwn chaak lulu ngi, naan plung bin ruk Khrista hin plung klut ungu kartleu deekki luw ado buk in thungki lele dung ngi akṭhi raan mo kdingi neia kṭi kchaam ping.

Mleija ktlok khatti thleng sora neen kdo kparyaam in kma ktlok Jisu mparyaam inbi, mdit mata karlaang dok naanni ktlok khat ava hinki pthla msik khat arlaan inbi, mata ado arlaan dok in ava ktlok khat hinki kṭha paumin msik khat arlaan inbi, naanni mma ava kirsim dokki arot inna.
Naanni kunton dokki kenyee rek ado dit in mmaan hinva neia mjiing ktla bet ruk va karbin chmaang.
Kpau thu neiji pau chdei mdaat joring, kdei kma kia kurthuwk me, mlam ktai thu do mkheng nga neenni ado ktidet chaak dok in.
Isowr ki kṭha paumin neiji naan hin mman ktaakki kdo paryaam leiji, naan akinreel nraan nei kdaksaa ava ningkja kdu rakki pnu thu ktla kcha pingmo?
Neiji naan sok ado klo chaak nraan, ktlok Rinlop rek hinki mmaan do bom arlaang nu kulrowt chaak lam.

Ungta neiji naan aka am ṭhiin mpha thu, ungu kthloi chaak ma thu, neiva ku khat lee bowr tiprik chmaang, mleija Masidonia ki kthleng ku u knao rekki, nei kdo kriin chaak ava mhai purdon pik chlam da. Ava leiji chodu ki lulu ngi neiji dil thang ruk va abowr in tiprik chni maang.
Khrista ki mkindit ava nei kthu amda Akhaja paamkowl thu neiji napal kdo tlot chaak thungki neia rim kdi am ni maang.
Ungta talu lei da? Neiji naan wonsat ado klo maan lei mo? Nei kdo tlot ava Isowr ri mdo dee.
Ungta neen knong tlot in lulu ngi nong ktlot in dida napal ktlo rek mmaan neiji ktipde buk du khim khai, neiji kdo tlot slii ava tlo kurnowl thlit daat nik di.
Mleija hanto lu hep daat mii ava kindit kma kenyee rek lam, mmaan mdaksaa ava Khrista ki kenyee rek kdingi kpurdu jik lamda kuhuwng kcha nong ktlo rek lam.
Ungta tngana pme, mleija seitaan daat rap klua mdaksaa ava mar awng ki waan tamsii ping ngi kardi da kpurdu jik.
Ava leiji sra owr rekki mdaksaan rinkindit ki sra owr rek mupdut jik bi, ava arleek set pme. Mmaanki mṭut na ava mnong tlot inni karthawng ra.
Neiji kthe chaak nowlla, ku khat lee ngi ka aak ki mhai bin mso; pdainu naanni bin chdaat jown ti, nei ruk va mruk napal kdo tlot chaak nra, ka aak lulu ngi mhai lo pik chaan.
Nei kdo the chaak ava Mukpu rutan khim khai kthe ava pmaang pdainu ka aak khat ti napal thu plung krip mer cha ping.
Mii knempok ki dultipaam ktong tha napal mdo tlot leiji, nei ruk va napal kdo tlot chaak.
Mleija ksing naanni ka aak rek ava kanpa kanpa ngi ado diil ṭhiin!

Mleija ku mii khatti naanna suwk owr rekki ata tlot in, mdit mata ata chaak dok in, mata aju tkat na chaak in, mdit mata do ksi thleer kma ata tlot in, mdit mata amai thaanni ado titpeen in ava naanni adiil dei chaan.
Ava tumva neenna kdung ngi ksowl kchaan ping, dida nei kning kja nra neiji kdo the kat chaak ra.
Pdainu ku mii khatti napal mtlot nuwm rekrek bi, ka aak khatti neiji kpau cha ping, ava tummi nei rukka napal ktlot chaak nuwmma.
Mmaanna Hebru mii rek mo? Nei rukka ava ping. Mmaanna Isreel mii rek lammo? Nei rukka ava ping. Mmaanna Abraham charuwl rek lammo? Nei rukka ava ping.

Mmaanna Khrista sra owr rek lammo? Neia makṭha bet khat ava ping. Mong kokto miilai khat pau lulu ngi neiji kpau kcha ping. Kdung nong ktlo ngi pkheel nu, rowng inn thu ka ammi pkheel nu, tatai pchaan ma kchung hurnu, maknem thu kdiyou der der cha ping.
Neiji Jihudia rek kchung kbii vei som plii thungki khat ktla ava vei parnga chak thu kdo arlaan.
Kchung ngi vei kdum mbun chlam da; vei khat thu lung ngi mdeeng lamda. Vei kdum chak thu arkuwngpii kukui thu jaaunu; jaan khat leh kunthun nii khat truwn thu am chdaat nu;

neiji kche ktlown na maknem thung ngi dii klin thu, taku rek khut thu, kmii rek khut thu, ktlok chati rek khut thu, khuwpii thu, kbowklai, truwn thu, kindit kma ku u knao rek, hava mkheng thu khu siir parthit na thi ndaat lu.
Kdung ngi nong klou ungta mdo owr chaak thu, mik khut harnu jaan krah, poitham ning kraal, maknem thu then ktaakki puwrthlowk kpurlo nu, kjiil ksik thu dona ktaakki ka am kcha ping.
Ungta murson rek kthe kma, Rinlop mkheng tummi plung kjiing ava mnii ktaiji nei ktunni kparchip thlit da.
Ksowl cha mii hin neia sowl maang mo? ktluw kcha mii hin neiva plung pjiin maang mo?
Neiji napal ktlot kat rangbi, nei ksowl chaak na rek thu neiji napal ktlot chaakka.
Mukpu Jisu Pah Isowr, ava kṭuw knai liit kma tpanpaak chaak ra, Mma ngi nei kipleinei rang nga mdo dee dok.
Damaskas thu kruwng Aretas ava ngi ka am paam kpupa ngi nei mkukjowng rangki Damaskas khuwpii ava seel psuk da,
pdainu neia bowr thung ngi khuwsuwng thu mupṭum lamda, mma khut thungki karthlet kcha ping.
Neiji napal kdo tlot kat ra; ava ngi do khat leea phaa chni maang, pdainu neia Mukpu ki mik kleng rek leh mdo tpandan thu chet kurnowl thlit daat nik di.
Kum sowm lei plii kvei dokka, neiji Khrista ki Miilai khat deinu, ava mu kdumna parwaan tha arjuk ṭen dok da mdak pummo mdak ktaak tdit neiji dei chmaang, Isowr va mdee.
Ungta hava Miilai ava paradais tha arjuk ṭen dok da, mdak pummo mdak ktaak tdit neiji dei chmaang, Isowr va mdee.
Ungta mii dothe dema, tithe deliit ma, pau Mma ngi aryaa da.
Hava Miilai kchang ngi neiji napalla kdo tlot chaak, pdainu nei ktumva ksowl chaak na kma donle neiji napal tlo chni maang.

Neiji napal tlo chnuwm joring, ka aak khatta kurthuwk ni maang, mleija neiji mkindit the nik di. Pdainu ku mii khat lee ngi nei mdei da, mdit mata nei kihin ki aryaa da kheel sii ngi mdo tbin psuk ma nra, neiji ava tlo ni maang.
Ungta mdo tpandan pik knem reen ava ngi knaar mlin reen ma nra, kdak thu tirliing khat mpii da, knaar kdo plin ma nra, ungu nei mkuknuwr ra seitaan tamsii khat amda.
Hava mlei thu mdo tmaak pthi nra, Mukpu hin vei kdum chak neiji ktham chnu;

Pdainu Mma ngi kihin theda, “Nah atumva Nei kuplungnee ava kokhop kcha a, mleija ksowl thu Nei krutan ava kinreel.” Khrista rutan nei kleen ni makbaan thlit daat nra, kheel setset ti neiji ksowl chaak na thu kanpa kanpa ngi napal tlo chnik di.

Mleija Khrista tummi ksowl chaak na thu, ning er pau kdo aryaak na thu, mtu owr chaak thu, kja kakham thu, kheel siingi kja kparteel ava ngi nei kning kthlung rekrek cha; mleija neia kru mdown mpha thu kru ktang.
Neia ka aak kcha ping! Namtrommi naanni ado tpurthuw in, mleija neia naan do panpaak chaak katkat rang ping. Mleija neiji do si cha mdaat joring kunton dok kenyee rek hinva juwm liit maang.
Mkindit kenyee ki titinna rek ava naan arlakki kdiil dei kcha mkheng ngi titinna rek leh tngana rek ungu klin klin nong rek kdo tlot chaak dok.
Mleija nei kdaksaa ngi abowr in tiprik chmaang, Rinlop murson rek hinva naanni ado ptham in talu ka am da? Hava karmak ava mhai ptlot pik in.

Naan hinni kthlen nrangki ku kurthlonna hava ngi mvei kdumna. Ungta neia abowr in rina kurthuwk ni maang, mleija naan do ava neiji thlaam maang, pdainu naan akthlaam in ping; mleija mnaole ngi mnuh mpah tumra pning me, pdainu mnuh mpah ngi mnao le tumra mdo pnin pik.
Ungta naanki raothla tumra neiji kdo thloi chaak ava kdung kanpa kanpa ngi partlai chnik di. Neiji kdung reenni wonsat ado klo in leiji ktlowm suwnni wonsat mlo naan mo?
Pdainu nei kdaksaa ngi abowr in tiprik chmaang tdit naanni ro naan di, neiji lousing ktlotta didonle ku mii khatti ahuwng chaan donle aju kpiman chraan.
Neiji naan hinni kdo sii rek ku mii khat lee hin kakat na chaak mo?
Neiji Titas ksop nu, ungu mma tu kilṭhi ngi mnaopa pṭoi nu. Titas va naan ata kat naan mo? Pthla khdaat ti nenni tlo maan min mo? Kal khdaat ti tkhiin in pme mo?

Naan amaiṭhuwm inni neenni kdaksaan na karthe loi duwk duwkki abin thlit daat inmo? Isowr do sut na thu neenni Khrista ki ngi kpau kcha in ping, ungu nei kwonsat lo rek, mkheng nga naan alin asaan nraan ki.

Mleija neiji kthlen luwng thu nei kdo ngei ma ava naan hin kphaak khot, ungta naan do ngei liit ma nei kihin aphaak inbi,ava kṭitta; tditta kar ai kalrai kro, kheithe changtlaak, plung kthi, daksaa kparning, titih ktadah, kho kthe, kpohok, chei karche cheep chowppi ka am kro.

Neiji kthlen nowl mpha thu, Isowr ri naan amaiṭhuwm inni kjuwm rakki muktlo kro kdingi kṭitta. Ungta chodu ngi pnu ktla dok rek leh kbuwr thungki plung ren kuhur kma rek, pang turkuiji kturkui kcha, ungu kindit kma turkui ktlo mii maknem ava tummi neiji kurnung karbaang da kṭap kro ping.
Neiji naan hin kthlen ra ava hava ngi mvei kdum nra. Pau kthuwk lu ma amta miilai knii mkurthut mata miilai kdummi sakhira.

Chodu ngi pnu ktla rek leh ktlok mkheng hin neiji pau kdo kham dok, ungu neiji mvei knit na avel innu ka am daat thungki lulu ngi, nei ktaakki tun rukva pau kakham pik lamma, neiji vei khat kthlen nowlbi, purhui lam nimaang.
Khrista ngi nei kthung ngi kpau tdit naanni ado dee kat in. Naan akdiil ṭhi in mpha thu Mma ava sowl liit me, pdainu naan thu kdung ngi mru ktang.

Mleija ksowlli Mma ava Khros leen mdo pthoi in, pdainu Isowr rutanni kring. Mleija Mma thung ngi neenna ksowl kchaan ping, pdainu naan ado kdiil ṭhi inni Isowr rutan Mma ava tu kilṭhi ngi neenna ring chnik kaan di.

Naanni krin cha thu arpom thlit mo arpom thlit maanti tdit kdaksaan ni ado kpirsin naan. Adaksaa inna kpirsin in. Naan thung ngi Jisu Khrista ka am tdit dei maan timo? Kpirsin thung ngi naan ak kro kmaan kurthuwk kat.
Neenna mdo rot ma pme, tdit naanni pha naandi kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.

Pdainu naanni karmak nong ado tlot ma nraan, neenni Isowr hin kṭhil chaak inna. Neenni kpirsin kurdut ṭhi ra kakandan ma nraan, pdainu neenni kapchaang dok kma kurthuwk daat jown ring, naanni kindit ado tlot nraan leiki.
Mleija neenni kindit kro kma ngi do khat lee tlo pchaang chni maan ring, pdainu kindit tum daat ra.
Mleija neenni ksowl chaak in thu, ungta naan ru mtan mpha thu, neenna kanpa kcha in ping. Naanni mkinreel akurthut nraan neenni kṭhil chaak inna.

Kṭhit pthi rang kma pdainu ksa rang leiji, Mukpu ngi nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak rutan ava ngi, neiji naan hin kthlen mpha thu, kapchai reenni ado kthe ma nraan, naan hinki lam kakarlat slii thu, neiji hava kdo kjit chaak.

Mṭut na rel tha ku u knao rek, ak kthaan chaak inna. Mkinreel ekurthuwk in, nei kpau the chaak ava knaa mhai tkiin pik chaan, khat leh khat ekulrot naan, kdaaiji am in, ungta wonsat leh kdaaiki Isowr ri aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so.
Kchiir do putti khat leh khat kurvui chaan.
Kintiing rek mkheng ngi aturvui chaak inna.
Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ungta Isowr wonsat ungu Pthla Kchiir do thloppi akheng inna aju ṭhi chaan so.
Mii rek hinki kma, mii rek thungki kma, pdainu Jisu Khrista ungta kdiyou rek thungki kipring pinlet pik Mpah Isowr ki kenyee khat Poul li,
ungu nei tu kilṭhi ku u knao rek, mkheng ngi Galatia ki Rinlop rek hintha:
Nenki Npah in Isowr leh nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai naan thu amso.
Nenki Npah Isowr poibin dil kṭoiji hava kum kṭha kma thungki mido ṭenthuw nraan, Mdaksaa ava nen pnu rek tummi mipii chaanda.
Mma hin tha kṭuw knai liit kma ki laarnee ka am ekurthuwk so. Amen.
Khrista plungnee thu naan aku own kchaan, Mma ava kuk notti ma pthi in thiin tinu, kṭha paumin msik khat lik lik thu plung ado pinlet lei inni neia kdung ngi kngak kchaam ping.
Kṭha pauminna msik khat lik lik ava pme, pdainu mii angṭhe ngi naanna apunchul inda, ungu Khrista ki kṭha paumin msik khat mdo purthuw nuwm lei ngaal.
Pdainu neenni naan hin kdo paryaam in kṭha paumin ava naan hin msik khat liklik kṭha paumin khat neen mdit mata parwaan ki waan tamsii ngi mparyaam bi, mma ava pauhur ksudu chra.
Neenni chodu ngi kdo the dok in lulu ngi, tun ruk va neiji kthe chaak nowlla, ku mii khatti naanni ado arlaan dok in thungki msik khat liklik khat kṭha paumin mparyaam bi, mma pauhur kdu chra.
Tunva neiji mii rek dosan ra kthlaam mo Isowr dosan ra kthlaam da? Mdit mata neiji miirek ning ktupthlun nuwmmo? Neiji miirek ning ktupthlun bi, neia Khrista sra owr khat kurthuwk nimaang.
Mleija ku u knao rek, neiji naan hin kdo paryaam kṭha paumin ava miilai ki kṭha paumin ava pme tdit aktip dee chaak inna.
Mleija neiji miilai hinki kdo arlaan chaak pme, kdo purchu ruk ava pme, pdainu Jisu Khrista do pandan thungki kthleng.
Mleija chodu ki Jihu- dia rek dhormo thungki, nei krinkhu ava ado aryaak dok in, mleija Isowr ava neiji tija thu suwk pthuwk nu, kdo ea kre nra tlonu;
ungta nei kmii rek arlakki nei kaplap rek knempok pkheel nu neiji Jihudia rek dhormo kchet ping, nei kpah le nopa ava kheel sii ngi chang kdo ptlaak chaak.
Pdainu neiji kṭou du liitti Mma ngi mhai pankai dok chda, ungta Mma plungnee thu mo own dok chda.
Mleija neiji ktlok chati rek arlakki kdo paryaam chaak nra, nei kihin Mchapa mdo pandan rang nga mning thlungda, neiva daksaa leh hii tu pau saam chmaang.
Mdit mata nei kdu ki kenyee rek kpha ra Jerusalem tha hang maang, pdainu neiji Arabia tha kunsunnu; ungu Damaskas tha kinle nowl ping.
Audilli kum kdum diltha Sephas kvel ra Jerusalem tha hangnu, ungu nii sowm lei parnga kcheen ṭhinu.
Pdainu Mukpu naopa Jeems kma donle neiji kenyee rek ku khat lee kurdut ṭhi chmaang.
Neiji naan hin kdo kjit chaak ava Isowr maiṭhuwmmi plei knei pmaang!
Audilli neiji Syria leh Silisia paamkowl tha kchet cha ping.
Ungta Judia thungki Khrista Rinlop rekki neia mdei lamme.
“Mpha khat thu nen suwk mikupthuwk, mpha khat thu mma ngi mdo ea kre nuwm krin cha ava tunva mma ngi paryaam da,” dida karyaa mmaan daat ti theda.
Ungta neiji mlei kurthuwk nu mmaanni Isowr panpaak chlam da.
Au dilli kum sowm lei plii diltha Barnabas ṭhi nu Titas tu kilṭhi ngi Jerusalem tha kahang ping.

Mdo tpandan pik dil kṭoiji neiji hang nu; ungta ktlok chati rek arlakki neiji kṭha paumin kdo paryaam ava, ber ksu rek hin neiji kensi tha song chnu. Nei knong nga chodu daat don mdit mata tun daat don do ksi kma ranng nga ngei chmaang.
Pdainu nei kdo ṭhi Titas daat ruk, Grik mii khat kurthuwk daat joso namtrommi vunmor tipreen nu.
Pdainu nen mido tbowl nraan, Jisu Khrista thu nenni tathloi chaak in nenki kintek ava tup prut siirchang ngi kindit kma nenki nu u nnao rek inni pau kloura lut lamda.
Naan tummi kindit ki kṭha paumin kdo arkhiik nraan, mpha mruk rap klua neenva mmaan tingi lut maan ring.

Ungta ber ksu rek heppi tbin in, mmaan ava ngi do tlo daat lam joso, nei kihinva arleek setti mkarthlei nra ame; Isowr va ksan ksui tlo me, mmaan hin neiji kthe chaakka, ber ksu rek va nei kihin do khat lee tpom lamme.
Pdainu khat ktong thang nowl va, vunmor kreen kma rek hin mmaanni mdee in thungta, kṭha pauminna nei msil nlamda, ava vunmor kreen rek hin tha kṭha paumin tu kilṭhi ngi Pitor mdo sil naan hep daat.
Mleija vunmor kreen rek hin Pitor ri kenyee nong mdo tlot lulu ngi, ktlok chati rek hin ruk va nei ktum rukka mtlot pik chda.

Ungta plungnee nei kihinni mdo tpiik chaak avaa, ber ksu rek Jeems Sephas ungu Johon mmaan- ni mdee in thungta, plap mdo tkurthut ṭhi nraan, nei leh Bar- nabas kukhut in chang ktongki kjowng lamda. Mleija neenna ktlok chati rek arlak tha, ungta mmaanna vunmor kreen rek arlak tha kchet ra kulrot naan ping.
Neenni sra miirek kdo bin paphaak raan kdingi kthe ngaal lam kurthuwkda, ava katta ning kakraalli nei kdo tlot nuwm ava.
Pdainu Sephas ava ngi Antia tha mthlen mpha thu, kindit chelli mma ngi mdo parma leiji, mmaiṭhuwm katti neiji kdo rai chaak.

Mleija Jeems hinki mii rek mthlen dungi, mma ava ktlok chati rek tu maal dok lamda; pdainu mmaan mthlen in thung- ta, vunmor kreen rek lop kṭi kcha ngi, mdaksaa mthi nangi ktlok chati rek hinki kankai chda.
Ungta mma tu kilṭhi ngi Jihu- dia mii rek angṭhe ruk va plung kṭi det dutti tlo lamda, ditta ava leiji Barnabas ruk va plung kṭi det dut ktong tha ṭhi dok lamda.

Pdainu mmaanni kṭha paumin mkindit ktong tha setleng ring ngi mchema in ava neiji kdee thungta, mmaan mkheng mai- ṭhuwmmi neiji Sephas hin thenu, “Nang nga Jihudia miilai khat kurthuwkva, Jihudia mii khat am lulu ngi eam lo, ktlok chati miilai khat am lulu ngi a amma, tak heppi ktlok chati rek va Jihudia rek am lulungi ma am nraan apnam psuk lamma?”
Nen ndaksaan ava nṭou daat inki Jihudia miirek kurthuwkki taṭou chaak in, ungta pnu ktong kcha ktlok chati rek lulua tkurthut in pme.

Anto chdaat joso mii ava Nowlam ki nong mdo tlotti pindit pik me, pdainu Jisu Khrista mdo rin chaak thu. Khrista krin cha thu mido tpindit pik nraan, nenva Jisu Khrista trin chaak in, ungta Nowlam nong rek lei pme, mleija Nowlam nong rek va ku khat lee pindit pik me.
Pdainu nnenna Khrista thu mi kpindit pik chaan mkurthut, nen ndaksaan ruk va pnu kirvei tdit nphaak chaak inbi, Khrista va pnu sok mlo mo? Anto liit pme!
Pdainu neiji kdo pkui dok hava le ksak nowlbi, nei kdaksaa ngi karmak nong ktlo kat kurthuwk nik di.
Mleija neiji Isowr hin kring cha kukur- thut nra, Nowlam leiji neia Nowlam thu kdiyou kcha ping.

Neia Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi khros leen kuk thoi ping; kring bing daat ava nei nowl pme pdainu nei kthung ngi ka am Khrista ava kurthuwk. Ungta daksaa kring nga tunki nei krinkhu ava, nei wonsat muklo ungu nei ktummi mdaksaa kpii kcha Isowr Chapa krin changi neia kring ping.
Neiji Isowr plungnee pthlei chmaang; mleija Nowlam thu kpindit pik mkur- thut bi, Khrista diyo naki mlei amnime.
O ka aak Galatia rek! Khros leen Jisu Khrista kuk thoi ava naan amik kat inni ado dee chel in, naanna ku ngi atupsum chaak inda?
Hava hehe daat neiji aju khewl chaanni: Pthla ava Now- lam nong rek ado tlot inni ado arlaan inmo mata krin cha thu ado aryaak lei inda?
Hanto ja ngi naanna ka aak chdaat in pti mo? Pthla tu kilṭhi ngi pṭhun daat thiin tinu, daksaa ktong tha apṭut pthi daat inmo?
Hava do knem- pok ka naanni do ksi kma aparteel pthi daat inmo? Anto mkurthut katbi, do si chme.
Naan hinni Pthla akpurdon pik in Mma va naan arlakki tngana rek nong mdo tlot ava Nowlam nong rek lei mo, mata krin cha ngi karyaa lei da?
Abraham mi “Isowr rin chda, ungu mhin ni rinkindit khat kdingi mdo tai pik.”
Ava leiji krin cha mii rek ka Abraham chapa rek lam.

Ungta Isowr ri ktlok chati rek ka mdo rin chaak thuwnni kpindit pik chra, tdit Kchiir Laaika ngi mdu ngi the dok da, mdungi Abrahammi kṭha paumin paryaam dok da,theda, “Nah athung ngi chati mkheng ngi suwṭhat kpha chra.”
Hava mkurthut leiji krin cha mii rek ava krin cha kthloi Abraham tu kilṭhi ngi suwṭhat kpha chra.
Mleija Nowlam nong pṭoida ktlo mii mkheng nga pauhur tingi ka am, mleija hanto kjit dok da; “Nowlam Laaika thu mdo kjit mkheng pṭoida ktlo kma mii pum ktaija pauhur ksudu chra.”
Tunva Isowr maiṭhuwmmi Nowlam va ku khat lee pindit pik me, tdit ava anto katti kthuwk; mleija “Rinkindit mii ava mdo rin chaakki kring chra.
Pdainu Nowlam ma krin cha thu mkarnai nra ame, mleija ava ktlo cha rek mii rekka ava ngi kring ra.”

Khrista ngi nen kchang donda pauhur kurthuwk da, Nowlam pauhur thungki nenna mi ṭen- thuw pik chaanda, mleija Laaika thu hanto kjit dok da, “Ding khat tun mdo pthoi mii khim khai ava pauhur karlaang dok.”
Mleija Jisu Khrista thu Abrahammi phowl kṭha ava ktlok chati rek tun mthlen nra, ditta nenni krin cha thu Pthla paureen tarlaan chaak nrang ki lei.
Ku u knao rek, dultimii nopa kpurtolli: pau kulrot nda mupṭum dok diltha, ku khat lee ngi pkui me, mata tpom me.

Tunva pau- reel rek ava Abraham leh mma charuwl rek hin tha mdo seem. “Nah acharuwl rek,” dida Mma va mii knempok hin the me, pdainu khat mlei thu, “Nah acharuwl hin,” ditta charuwl Khrista ava hin kthe kurthuwk.
Neiji kdo the naki mleija hava: Kum arjaa plii som kdum dil thang ki Nowlam mi chodu ki Isowr pau- rina Mpaureel dok pmuwt pchaang nime.
Mleija mdo phaak ra ava Nowlam thung- ki ra mkurthut bi, Mpaureella kurthuwk nowl me; pdainu Isowr ri Abraham hin pau mdo reel pik dok.

Anto mkurthut tu Nowlam- ma talu da? Pau mdo reel pik dok na mii ava hin charuwl mthlen du khim khaiji kar mak ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da mdo tpom; ungta avaa waan tamsii ngi pau mdo naak lik na ava hin mdo parlaan dok.
Tunva pau knaa lik khat kikheel dek; pdainu Isowr ra Khdaat.
Nowlam va Isowr paureel rek mapten mo? Anto liit pme; mleija kipring pchaang rang ki Nowlam kpii mkurthut bi, Nowlam lei katti rinkindit kurthuwk ra.
Pdainu Jisu Khrista krin cha ngi paureel krin cha rek hin mdo piik nra, do mkheng nga pnu ngi ka am dida Kchiir Laaika ngi mdo the dok.
Tunva krin cha ava mthlen dungi, krin cha mkandan du khim khai arkam pthi da, nenna Nowlam tingi mi arkam kthen inda.
Ava leiji krin cha ngi nen mido tpindit pik nraan, Khrista mthlen du khim khai Nowlam mi ber ksu ra.
Pdainu tunva lamrin thleng dok da, nenna Now- lammi ber misuk pik nowl inme.
Mleija krin cha ngi naan akheng inna Jisu Khrista thu Isowr chapa rek in pti.
Mleija Khrista hin baptis ktlo mii maknemma, Khrista kihiil knaa.
Jihudia rek ruk Grik rek ruk pjiir me, suwk owr ruk kintek ruk pjiir me, psel ruk snu ruk pjiir me; mleija naan akheng inna Jisu Khrista thu khdaat in pti.
Ungta naanni Khrista ki akurthut inbi, naanna Abraham charuwl, pau- reel dil kṭoiji mcharuwl rek in pti.
Neiji mcharuwl dinu kdo the naki mleija, mii ngi do mkheng ki kpupa kurthuwk chdaat joso, mma ngi nao kdowng mkurthut slii thungva, suwk khat ava hin mma ngi mṭhat bet nra ame.
Pdainu Mpah ngi mnit mdo palreen mphaak du khim khai mma ava kseel rek leh plung mdo pnet bet rek tingi ka amlu.
Ava leiji nen rukka kmo nkurthut in mpha thungva, dultipaam ki pthla rek do paalna suwk rek ava tkurthut in.
Pdainu mdo pur- khumna ki mpha mthlen thungta, snu thung ngi kṭou kurthuwkki Nowlam tingi ṭou da, Isowr ri Mchapa ava hanto mi sii pik inda.
tditta ava leiji nenni mchapa rek kurthuwk lulu ngi tarlaan chaak nraan, Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am rek ava ṭen pthuwk da.
Ungta naanna mchapa rek akurthut lei inni, naan plung ril thu, Isowr ri Mchapa Pthla arju siida, “Abba, Apah!” dida ku owng kurthuwk.
Ava leiji suwk khatti naanna Isowr thu am nowl maan ti, pdainu chapa khat, ungta chapa khat akurthut inbi, charuwl in pti.
Chodu ngi naanni Isowr adee ma in mpha thungva, mukpu rek ktaak ki, rowng thu mdo bowl dokki ka am in pti.
Pdainu tunva naanni Isowr dei inti, mata Isowr ri adei inda, tak heppi naanni ksowl leh do ksi kma pthla dopaal na hin kinle inti, avaki suwk rek akurthut raanna angei inmo?
Naanni mnit mthla ungu mkum armik ado dan in!
Neiji naan tummi do ksi kma nong klo chaak mo dinu kṭit ta.
Ku u knao rek, mleija neiji naan alulu kukurthut heppi, naan ruk va nei klulu akurthut nraan, aka ktham chaak inna. Naanni nei kihin kar mak tlo maanti;
kdak kukoi chaak leiji, ru kri reeppi neiji kṭha paumin ava naan hin kdo paryaam chaak; tdit naanni adodee dok in.
Ungta kdaksaa anto kukurthut leiji naan apkham chjown ringva naanni mraida mipthlei maanti, pdainu Jisu Khrista lulu ngi, Isowr waan tamsii khatti ado tarlaan chaak in.
Hanto jaki akanpat inna tu ungda? Mleija neiji sakhi akuhur pik inna, ditta mkurthut de rangbi, naanni amik in khor pthii thida nei kihinni mhai kpii kchaan kro in pti.
Au mkurthuttu mkindit kdo the leiji naan rawlmii kurthuwk nik mo?
Mmaan va kdung ngi arda ado tup pro psuk in, pdainu kṭha lei pme; naanni mmaan arda ado pro psuk nraan; mmaanni mdo ṭhen nuwm in.
Mleija neiji naan aka am ṭhiin mpha thung daat kma, mpha ktai thu kṭha mlei thung ngi arda kpulro ava ngi kṭha.
Nei kwonsat lo knaole, naan thung ngi Khrista arling ma am du khim khai neia nao kuplu rang ngi kdung kṭou lulu ngi naan tum- mi kja chnowl imping.
Tunva neiji naan aju amṭhiinda ungta kukrowl kdo parthlen rang daat neiji kngei chaakka, mleija neia naan mlei thu kuplung kjiing reenna.
Nei kihin mhai the pik chaan, Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am nuwm naan va Nowlam aryaa maan timo?
Mleija Abraham mi suwk nuh khat leh kintek nuh khat thungki chapa rek knii thloida dida mdo kjit dok.
Pdainu suwknu chapa ava daksaa dil kṭoiji ṭouda, kinteknu chapa ava paureel dil kṭoiji ṭouda.
Tunva pau purtol khatta hava; Snu hava rekka paurina knii rek lam. Sinai lownki suwk owr khatta Hagar nao pluk.
Tunva Arabia thungki Sinai lown na Hagar, mma ngi tun tunki Jerusalem mdo arthaan pik, mleija mma ava mnaole tu kilṭhi ngi suwk owr lam.
Pdainu Jerusalem khuwluw ava kintek chanu, mleija mma nenki nnuh in.
Mleija Laaika thu hanto kjit dok da,
O nao kuhur kma khat, kdongnu;
kanpa cha;
nao kuplu ki kdung ksaan kparteel kma nang ngi owng ra kanpa cha;
mleija sangtlaakki ka am naole ava ngi,
mi innpu tu karnai thlit da ka am naole ava mdo pkheel.
Tunva ku u knao rek, Isek lulu ngi nenna paureel ki naole in pmin.
Pdainu mpha authu dak dil kṭoiji kṭou mma ngi Pthla dil kṭoiji kṭou mma ava suwk mdo pthuw lulu ngi, tun rukva anto lu kthuwk ra.
Pdainu Kchiir Laaika va talu mthe? “Suwknuh leh mchapa ava arei pthi; mleija suwknuh chapa ngi kinteknuh chapa tu alrou mdo phaak ve rang nga rome.”
Ava leiji ku u knao rek, nnenna suwknuh naole pmin me, pdainu kinteknuh naole in pmin.
Mleija kintek rangki Khrista ngi mi pintek inda; ava leiji rip mer chaan, ungta suwk owrki bowr krik thung ngi lut nowl maan.
Tunva Poul neiji ahin thaanni kthe chaakka, mleija vunmor kreen ava arlaan dok inbi, naan tumva Khrista do khat lee pme.
Vunmor kreen cha mii pum ktai hin neiji sakhi kpiik chaakka, ditta Nowlam mkheng karkhii rangki mma ava mbowl dokka.
Nowlam do pindit naanna Khrista hinki kdet kchaan pti; naanna plungnee thungki ktluw kcha in pti.
Mleija krin chaki Pthla thu nenni rinkindit ti bin psuk in minnu tardat chaak in.
Mleija Jisu Khrista thungva vunmor kreen ruk mdit mata vunmor kreen kma ruk do khat lee sime, pdainu wonsat thu krin cha nong ktlo ava daat.
Naanni kṭha deekki atlot inna! Kindit dil kṭoira ava ku ngi at mat inda? Tak heppi atap- khaan inda?
Hava ktlo ava naan aku own kchaan Mma hinki pme.
Thowlpen mruk suwnni thowlpen knempok mdo pduwt.
Mleija naanni nei mhai pkheel da ktlok mii hin poi reel psuk nimaan ti, kdingi neiji Mukpu hin knetti kbin chaakka; ungta ku ku kurthuwk daat joso, naan ning akpumul inna kekṭewl ra.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, neiji vunmor kreen ava kparyaam thlit daattu, talu leiji neia suwk ado tupthuw chaak inda? Ava mlei thung ngi khros ki khusiir tparthit na mlo pthiia.
Naan plung pur nra nong ktlo miirek ava mdaksaa mthina inni karchak chlamso.
Mleija ku u knao rek, naanna kintek rang lei ado tu own dok in; naanki kintek ava daksaa tum mdit mata kcha knee thung daatti sinton maan, pdainu won- sat thu khat leh khat sra owr kurthuwk in.
Mleija Nowlam mkheng nga pauna khdaat thu kurkhum dok, “Nah adaksaa lulu aveen wonsat alo cha.”
Pdainu naanni khat leh khat kparkei da akarchaak inbi, khat leh khat atluk ma nraan cheek asin chaan.
Pdainu neiji naan hin kthea, Pthla ngi echet chaan, ungta dak- saa poibin ning pthlung maan.
Mleija daksaa poi binna Pthla kipteng, ungu Pthla poi binna daksaa kipteng; mleija naan do tlot nuwm kapkhaan ra, hava lea khat leh khat kulrot nlam ava pme.
Pdainu naanna Pthla ngi ati ṭhiinbi, Nowlam tingi am maan ti.
Tunva daksaa ki nong rek mpandanna: Nala tartlaang kturkui, kbuwr, pang turkuiji kturkui,
khut do sak pthla luwkbuk, haimeeng kthloi, khat leh khat karhal, kthe purduk, kheithe, plungthit, kpunmun, ksinchaak, mii kipjiir kṭhen,

changtlaak, ju kip pri, lop loppi ju knee, ungta hava lu mkheng kurthuwk. Chodu ngi neiji ahin thaanni pau kdo kham lulu ngi, pau kakham chaakka, mleija hanto lu nong ktlo mii ava ngi Isowr Kruwngpaam thlung chip pchaang nime.
Pdainu Pthla ki thei ava wonsat, kanpa, kdaai, kdiil dei, plung knei, kṭha, lamtrin chaak kurhui,
plung kparneem, dak- saa kurjowng, hava le kro kma Nowlam ame.
Ungta Jisu Khrista ktongki miirek ava ngi mdaksaa do pjor ungu plungbin tu kilṭhi ngi khros leen kukthoi.
Nenni Pthla ktong tha kring nkurthut inta, Pthla ktong tha tche ruk chet in che.
Nenni daksaa kpohok, khat leh khat plung kparthit, khat leh khat khei karthe nmaan che.
Ku u knao rek, nong kpar mak ku mii khat akjown inta, Pthla ktongki kurthuwk naandi, plung kparneemmi apindit pik chaan. Naan ruk ado tipthleem ma nraan, cheek asin chaan.
Khat leh khat bowr krik kurhur pik in, ungta ava ngi Khrista Nowlam kpurkhum ra.
Mleija do ksi liit kma ku mii khatti mdaksaa ava do ksi dok heppi mkarbin bi, mdaksaa mthina ngi kurhuwng kcha a.
Pdainu mii pum ktaiji mma mma ki nong kpirsin na chso; ungta ava dilli napal mkurtlot naki mlei ava mdaksaa mthina ki hehe daat kurthuwk ra ungu mveen leiki nime.
Mleija mii pum ktaiji mma mma ki bowr kri kuhur kcha kurthuwk ra.
Pauna kpurchuk mii va mdo purchu mii ava tu kilṭhi ngi mdo thloi chaak ava athem ve lamso.
Kirsin chaak maan; Isowr kip pni chaak rome, mleija mii ava ngi chii mdo var dil kṭoiji, ava kat kurkun chra.
Mleija mma mdaksaa kat thu mdo var, mma mdaksaa kat thungki kṭop ava kurkun chra; pdainu Pthla hin kvar cha miiva Pthla thungki kṭuw knai kma rinkhu kpurkuk chra.
Ungta kṭha nong ktlo thu nenni arda pthit maan che, mleija nenni plung nparheel liit maanbi, mpha kat ava thu nenni turkun chaak raan.
Ava mkurthut bi, nenni mpha kcha nphaak in thu, mii mkheng hin nenni kṭha nong tlo inche, ungta karkheel sii ngi krin cha rek phungka rek hin kṭha nong nga tlo in che.
Asuw in, neiji naan hin ku khut katti chethi klinni kikjit chaakka.
Daksaa thu kṭha ngi ktidet ra kngei rek ki vunmor ado reen nraan ado tapnam psuk in. Khrista khros leiji suwk thuw mdo phaak ma nraanki lei ngaal.
Mleija vunmor kreen karlaang dok rek daat rap kluva, mmaan mdaksaan ni Nowlamma arkhii lamme, pdainu mmaanni naan adaksaan thu laarnee mdo phaak chaak nuwm lei inni, vunmor ado tipreen nuwm in.
Pdainu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki khros kma donle laarnee ava nei kihin ki lam karlat chdaat so, ava leiji dultipaam ma nei kihin tha, neiji dultipaam ktong tha khros leen kukthoi.
Mleija vunmor kreen ruk mdit mata vunmor kreen kma daat ruk do msit na ava pme, pdainu ren khatti mdo pṭhan.
Hava nopa ngi kchet mii mkheng tun, Isowr mii Isreel rek tun kdaai leh wonsat am so.
Mṭut na tha ku mii khat lee ngi kning pmul mso; mleija neia kdaksaa tun Jisu ki kbii nam kdo hur dok.
Ku u knao rek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi naanki Pthla aju thlop chaan so. Amen
Isowr plung binni Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat kurthuwk Poul li, kintiing rek leh Jisu Khrista hin trin chaak kurhui rek hintha:
Nenki Npah in Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaaiji aju ṭhi chaan so.
Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah Isowr ava kpanpaak chaakka, Jisu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi parwaan ki mun rek thu Pthla ktongki phowl kṭha khim khai suwṭhat ti mi pii chaanda.
Dultipaam mapṭhan du liitti, Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi Mma ngi mihai kchol chaan da, mleija Mma maiṭhuwmmi nenna kseeng ungu karmak ktaak liit tkurthut nraan leiki.
Jisu Khrista thu Mma chapa rek tkurthut nraan, wonsat thu Mma ngi mpoi bin dil kṭoiji mi pankai chaan da.
Mma wonsat lo thu laarnee ngi mido tpiik chaak in Mma kunlor ki plungnee tummi panpaak chaan che.
Mma thu Mhii ngi miṭen thuw chaan da, Mma plungnee suwang thuw dil kṭoiji, nen pnu tonrek ava mi ptlot pik chaan da,
ava nen ntun inni mi punthlut pik inda.
Mleija Khrista thu Mma poibin dok dil kṭoiji, lousing mkheng leh Mma poibin ki kurthluk pau ava nen nhin mi tdet inda.
Mpha mkurkhum thungki ra, Mma poibin ava parwaan ki do leh dulti tunki do mkheng Mma thu khdaatti ma am nrang lei.
Mma plung bin dok dil kṭoiji, do mkheng nga Mma poibin thu purchuwl dok da, ungu nenna Khrista tu khdaat ti ta am nrang leiji mupṭhun daat ki Mma poibin dil kṭoiji mi kchol chaan da.
Ava leiji nenni ru kri thu Khrista kbin kcha ngi Isowr laarnee panpaak chaan che.
Mma thungki Kṭha paumin ava ngi naanna kirliing chaan tinu, mkindit ki pauna ava aryaan tinu, ungta Mma rin chaan ti, Pthla Kchiir ki paureel tu kilṭhi ngi kbii nam ado tnam dok in.
Mma laarnee kpanpaak ra, mcharuwl nen nhin mdo palreen nenni nphaak chaak du in khim khai kira.
Mleija hava leiji, naanni Mukpu Jisu hin ado rin chaak in, ungta kintiing rek mkheng hinki naan wonsat ava neiji kdo aryaak chaak,
Neiji kdo ṭhil chaak thu naan aju bin phaak innu, naan tumra kdo panpaak chaak ava down chliit maang.
Mleija nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Isowr, laarnee ki Mpah ava hintha lousing ki Pthla khat ungta Mma tdee na pau kphuwng ado tpiik chaak nraan ṭhil chnu.

Mleija naan ado tu own chaak naan ki kbin cha ava, kintiing thu Mma hinki tphaak chaak raan laarnee ki suwang thuw, mdit mata naan do dee nra, naanni plung ki mik ava ngi mar awng ado thloi chaak nraan,
ungta nen nthungki krin cha rek mii ava hinki rutan ava kheel sii ngi klin langlang, Mma ngi klin nong mdo tlot dil kṭoi.
Khrista ngi kdiyou dok rek thungki mrin kinlet mpha thu kurkhum dok ungta parwaan ki mun rek thu Mma khut chang ktong tha ku ong da.

Tun knungki paam kpu rek mkheng leh rutan pum ungta ruktang ungu kapchaang rek leh mmiing ka am dok miing khim khai tunni, hava mpha thung daat kma, pdainu karvang rangki kum tum ruk va, Mma ngi kinreel sii.
Ungta do mkheng nga Mma khu pja tingi thiida, ungu Rinlop tummi do mkheng ki mluw purthuw pik da.
Mma ki daksaa ava kurkhum dokda, do mkheng nga Mma ngi pdim dokda, pum dimmi dim chda.
Ungta naanki pnu nong thungki leh pnu rek thu adiyo in mpha thu, Mma ngi apring chaanda.
Hava dultipaam ki kṭha kma dil ṭoi intinu mpha khat thu naanni kchet in pti, parwaan kurdu ki rutan ava dil ṭoi in tinu, pau kleek chapa rek thu tun tunni Pthla ngi nong mtlot sliia.
Hava mkheng arlakki mpha khat thu nenni daksaa do pjor dil kṭoiji ka am in pmin, daksaa leh poi bin thu ṭoi in minnu, ungta dultimii murson rek lulu ngi nen rukka nopa plung thit ava naole in pmin.
Pdainu Isowr wonsatti dim chda, mwonsat klin langlang thungki ngi nenna wonsat milo chaanda,
nenki pnu tonni ndiyo in mpha thu, Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi kring ve in min. (Plungnee ngi naanna ado taktlan chaak dok in kurthuwk.)
Ungta Mma tu kilṭhi ngi mipring pinle chaanda, ungu Jisu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi parwaan ki mun rek thu Mma tu kilṭhi mi pkong chaanda.
Mleija Jisu Khrista thu tpartee pchaan liit ma nen nhin ni muplungnee ki wonsat suwang ava karvang rangki kum thu mido tdet chaak nraan ki.
Mleija plungnee ngi krin cha thu aju ktlan chaanda; ungu hava naan adaksaan kat do tlot ava pme, pdainu Isowr chla,
ungta ku mii khat lee ngi napal mdo tlot ma nra, nong rek lei pme.
Mleija mdu ngi Isowr dopurchuwl dok kṭha nong rek thu nenni tche chaak nraan, Jisu Khrista thu mdo seem dok Mma nonglo rek in pmin.
Ava leiji, abin phaak chaan, mleija choduva naanna ktlok chati rek khat kurthuwkki daksaa thu khut do seem vunmor kreen mdo dit rekki vunmor kreen kma rek kdingi ado tu own in.

Mpha ava thu naanna Khrista hinki ado tiṭhen dok in, Isreel mii rek thungki paam ktlokki mii rek in pti, ungta paureel ki paurina rek thungki malli ka am in pti, plung ngi mdo bin psuk chaak ktaak, ungu dultipaam thu mukpu rek ktaakki a am in ava abin phaak in.
Pdainu tunva mpha khat thu Jisu Khrista hinki lamkla ngi ka am cha naan ava Khrista hii hinni ado tapnai chaak in.
Mleija Mma ngi Jihudia ungu ktlok chati tdit knii ki kdaai ava khdaat tpurthuw da, ungta karhal cha kṭhen ki bang ava pkui pthiida.
Mma mdaksaa thu paureen ki Nowlam leh nonaat rek ava eakrep pthiida, mleija Mma mdaksaa thu miilai knii ava ren khdaatti seem da, hanto kdaai mi purthuw pik chaan da.
Ungta khros thu knii ava Isowr ri daksaa khdaat mdo tpurthut nra, karhal chaki ava mdonna tpurthut pthiida.
Ungta Mma ngi thlengda lamkla ngi ka am naan leh lamknai ji ka am hin kdaai paryaam da.
Mleija Mma thu nen nikniing inni Pthla khdaatti Npah in kpha kcha tkurthut in.
Ava mkurthut bi, naanna mal rek leh paam ktlokki mii rekki am kurnowl maan ti, pdainu naanna kintiing rek tu kilṭhi ngi npaam inki miirek leh Isowr plung kat thungki mii tkurthut chaak in.
Jisu Khrista mdaksaa arkil ki lung kurthuwkki naanna kenyee rek leh khulpu rek do pṭhan dok tun ni mdo sak avaan pti.
Mma thung ngi mkheng nga jom purdut da ungu Mukpu hin kchiir luwbuk Inn khatti mdo sak dok.
Mma thu naan rukka Pthla ngi Isowr am nrangki munra ado ta sak dok in.
Hava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, ktlok chati rek naan kchang rang ngi, Jisu Khrista tummi rowng inn thu mdo khum Poul neiji,
naan tumra nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak Isowr plungnee ki kvailo ava naanni aryaa mun naan di.
Tak heppi kukthuk pau ava nei kihin mhai tpandan pik tdit ktoi tekki neiji kikjit chaakka.
Naanni hava apat inki mpha thu, Khrista ki kukthuk pau nei kdo dee pandit chaak ava naanni dei naan di.
Miirek chapa rek leh murson ki charuwl rek hin mdo tdet ma ava Pthla ngi kchiir kenyee rek leh khulpu rek hin tunva mpandan na.
Tditta ktlok chati rekki Jihudia rek tu mtum in phowl kṭha ava kinṭim sappi arlaang chlam da, ungta kṭha paumin ava ngi Jisu Khrista thu paureel karlaan ṭhi sap rek kurthuwk lamda.
Mma rutan ki nong ktlo ngi nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak Isowr plungnee ki chla dil kṭoiji neia hava kṭha paumin ki nong ktlo cha khat ping.

Kintiing rek mkheng thungki kdilsuwn kcha kurthuwk daat joring, hava plungnee ava mhai pii chda, tathlaam pchaan liit ma Khrista ki suwang thuw ava ktlok chati rek hin kparyaam ra, nei kihin ni mpii chda.
Ungta do mkheng kapṭhang dok kum roi ksotti Isowr thu kurdowl daat Mma ki kukthuk pau ava dultimii mkheng hin tpandang da.
Parwaan ki mun rek thu ka am rutan kpu rek leh ruktang rekki kheel sii ki Isowr lousing ava Rinlop thung ngi ktidet ra.
Hava nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista thu kṭuw knai liit kma Mma plungbin dil kṭoi.
Nenni Mma lamkrin cha thu plung ktangar leh kheel sii ki plung krip ta thloi chaak in.
Mleija naan tummi neiji kja kakham kdo parteel leiji, naanni plung ado parheel ma nraan, neiji aka ktham chaak inna, ava naanki laarnee.
Hava leiji Kpah maiṭhuwm mi neiji pkhuppi tardiil nu,
parwaan leh dulti ki phungka khim khaiji Mma do thowl pik kindit miing mdo arlaan chaak.
Mleija miilai ril thu Mma pthla ngi laarnee ki suwang thuw ngi ru ado taptan pik nraan ki,
ungta naan plung ril thu krin cha ma am nra; ditta naanni murjung thloida wonsat thu knetti a am nraan,
ava ki mkam leh mdung ungu kchuwng leh kukthuk ava talu tdit kintiing rek mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi kdei pandi ki rutan ado thloi chaak nraan ki.
Ungta karkheel li kdeipandi ngi Khrista ado dee nraan, mleija naanna Isowr ki nopa ngi pum dim kdim akurthut nraan ki lei.
Tunva nen nthung ngi Mma rutanni nong mdo tlot leiji, neen kdo ṭhil chaak in mdit mata kdo bin chaak in mkheng kheel dekki ktlo pchaang ra Mma hin tha,
mpha ktai thu Rinlop thung leh Jisu Khrista thu kṭuw knai liit kma Isowr kpanpaak cha kurthuwk so! Amen.
Ava leiji, Mukpu tummi rowng inn thu mdo khum dok neiji Mma do own dok thu rinkhu kurhui khatti ache nraan aka ktham chaak inna.
Plung kdowng leh plung kparneem mkheng tu kdiil dei tu kilṭhi ngi khat leh khat kar khaang dei in.
Kdaai dobowl Pthla ktongki plung kinṭim ava ngi ning kakraal li mhai tlot pik chaan.
Plung bin khdaat thu naan ado tu own in ava lulu ngi daksaa khat,
ungu Pthla khat, Mukpu khat, krin cha khat, baptis ktlo khat ka am,
Isowr khat ungta nen nkheng tun ungu mkheng thu ka am Npah in ava ka am.
Pdainu nen mii pum ktai hin Khrista ki chla ava mdo partee na dil kṭoiji plungnee mipii chaan da.
Ava leiji,
Laaika ngi theda,
“Mma ngi mhunkal mpha thu suwk rek knempok
ṭhi da,
ungta Mma ngi mii rek hin chla rek pii chda.”
“Mma ava hungkakal dok,” mdo dit ava tak mdo the nada? Pdainu Mma rukka ti knung rel dulti thu arjung ṭum memo?
Arjung kṭum Mma ngi do mkheng ktipdim rang ki parwaan mkheng tun thang ruk va hung kakal.
Ungta Mma chla rekka angṭhe ngi kenyee rek, angṭhe ngi khulpu rek, angṭhe ngi paumin ksira, ungu angṭhe hin pastor rek leh chukpu rek pii chlam da.
Mleija Khrista ki daksaa mdo punchoi nra, kintiing rekki mnong tlot naan thu, arda krok mkurthut nraan,
nen nkheng in hin krin cha thu plung kinṭim, ungu Isowr Chapa dei chda, plung kurchuwl miilaiji, kparthaang sii ngi Khrista ki arling tphaak chaak nraan ki.
Ava leiji plei knei miirek do jomphunni lele tha mi huwn chaak naanda, kindit kma pauvi paurin tirthli khim khai mdo juwn ṭhi kmorek lulu nenna tkurthut kurnowl in pme.
Ava kchang nga wonsat thu kindit pau theen minnu, mluw kurthuwk Khrista hin tha mlam khim khai thu tilin tsaan raan.

Mma hinki daksaa mkheng nga jomda, ungu mdo purdon tu kilṭhi ngi mkurdut na khim khai tri purdut da, msing khim khaiji nong kṭha ngi mtlot mpha thu, daksaa ngi linsaang don, ungta wonsat thu kpunchoi ra.
Tunva neiji Mukpu hin sakhi pii nu hava kthe chaakka, ditta ktlok chati rekki muplung bin in ava do ksi kmatha ma am in lulu ngi naanna am kurnowl maan.
Mmaanna mdodee pandit nraan thungki jiing chda, muplung ril mapchai reen leiji dei pandi lam mda Isowr rinkhu thungki ktliing chlamma.
Muplung ril in pchai reenda, mdaksaan na kṭha kma nong ktlo thu karpii lamda, ktobor nong ktlo khim khai thu hangmal lamma.
Naanni Khrista mlei thu akurchu inna hanto pme!
Naanni Mma mlei thu aryaa kat inti, ungta Jisu thung ngi mkindit ka am lulu ngi Mma ado purchu chaak in.
Chodu ngi naanki nopa thu ka am kuhuwng kcha ngi aṭhat nma in rinkhu pliw ava ama pthii dok in.
Ungu naan plungbin ki kṭha ava ngi ren apurthuw chaanra,
Isowr lulu ngi kindit ki rinkindit ungta nopa kchiir ren ava ahiil anaa chaan.
Ava leiji, plei knei ama pthiin, mii pum ktaiji mveen tu kindit pau athe so, mleija nen khat leh khat ava daksaa khdaat in pmin.
Plung kthira, pdainu pnu tla maan; plung apthit slii arlaan inni kniw ptla maan,
ungu dijabowl hinni mun pii maan.
kup pru miiva pru kurnowl mso, pdainu ava kchang nga mkhut ti kṭha nong atlo so, mleija mma ngi kikriing miirek hinni kpurdon pik kap pchaang ra.
Naan ner thungki kṭhakma pau thuwk mso, pdainu karyaa kcha miirek hin plung mdo pnee pik nra kpurdon pik mkurthut nra kṭha pau thuwk so.
Ungta Isowr Pthla Kchiir ava pja maan, ado tiṭen thuw naanki nit thu kbii nam ado tnam dok in.
Kakha ungta plungthit ungu plung kthi, ungta ku owng, titi ktadah mkheng ungu khusiir parthit na ava tlo maan.
Ungta khat leh khat wonsat kurlo in, plung kparneem mi Isowr ri Khrista thu naan ado tuptlot pik in heppi, khat leh khat kpurtlot pik in.
Ava leiji, mwonsat lo kmo rek heppi, Isowr no apṭoi in.
Ungta Khrista ngi wonsat milo chaanda, ungu mikrim kdi langlang tlaai kdown ni Isowr hin tha mdaksaa mido tpiik pik in lulu ngi, wonsat thu chet in.
Pdainu naan arlakki kintiing rek mkurhui in heppi, nala tartlaang kturkui leh kbuwr mdit mata hangmal mkheng mmiing daat rap klua the maan.
Ktobor nong ktlo do ksi kma pau, mdit mata songkho pau kthe ava tlo maan, pdainu ava kchang rang nga apanpaak in.

Hava adodee kat raan, ditta nala tartlaang kturkui, kbuwr miilai, mdit mata hangmal ku mii khat (Tditta ava khut do sak pthla luwkbuk mdo thena) ava ngi Khrista leh Isowr Kruwngpaam thlung chip pchaang nime.
Ku mii khat lee ngi naanna do ksi kma pauvi ahuwng chmaan so, mleija havale leiji pau kleek chapa rek tun Isowr plung thit kthlung ra.
Ava leiji, mmaan tu kurhou maan.
Mleija mpha khat thu naan na kjiing thu ka am in pti, pdainu tunva Mukpu hin mar awng kurthuwk in pti; mar awng ki kmo rek lulu ngi chet in.
Mleija mar awngki thei ava mkheng thu kṭha ungu mkindit ungta kindit deek.
Mukpu ningthlun na ava talu tdit akurchu chaak nraan atlo in.
Thei kchui kma kjiingnu nong tlot ṭhi maan, pdainu ava kchang nga kvaar tha athuw ṭhiin.
Mleija mmaanni tup prut nong mdo tlot in rap klua, tithe rang nga ning kjana a.
Pdainu mar awng ngi do khat mdo pandan ava kandang dok, mleija do kpandang ava mar awng.
Ava leiji Laaika thu theda,
“O ki iip dok, kardel,
ungta kdiyou dok thung ki kardel,
ungu Khrista ngi mar awng aju kiplen pik chra.”
Anto mkurthut bi ksing kma rek hep daat kma pdainu ksing lulu ngi naanni tak heppi kchet in ping kdingi kṭha ngi kursuw chaan.
Mnit rek mṭhat ma leiji mpha ava kṭha ngi asin ton chaan.
Ava leiji aak maan, pdainu Mukpu plung binna talu kdingi adei pandi chaan.
Ungta ju pri maan, mleija ava plung krip pme; pdainu Pthla ngi dim chaan.
Khat leh khat ava Isowr laa leh kpanpaak laa ungu Pthla ktongki laa kthe ngi plungril mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi Mukpu hin kanpa ngi athe in.
Mlei khim khai thu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista miing ngi Npah in Isowr hin tha mpha ktai thu apanpaak chaan.
Khrista kṭi ngi khat leh khat kurdu ngi am in.
Numei rek, Mukpu hinki heppi naanki a innpu in kurdu ngi am in.
Mleija Khrista ruk va mdaksaa katti, daksaa kṭenthuw pik Rinlop ki mluw mkurthut heppi, innpu ava numei ki luw.
Rinlop pi Khrista kurdu ngi ma am lulu ngi, numei rek va mmaan ki mi innpu in kurdu ngi do khim khai thu am so.
Innpu rek, Khirsta ngi Rinlop wonsat loda, ungu mtumra mdaksaa mdo piik chaak lulu ngi, anumei inna wonsat adolo raan.
Tditta mpanchel deek nra pauna tu kilṭhi ngi dii thu alṭhu da mdo partleu dok.
Mleija Mma daksaa thu Rinlop ava mrungchen kṭha, kbii ktaak, mdit mata ktivii ktaak, mata do khat lee ktaakki, mma ava Kchiir ungu karmak ktaak liitti mdo piik chaak nrang lei.
Anto lulu ngi innpu rek ruk va mmaan mdaksaan kat heppi mnumei inna wonsat aloso. Mnumei wonsat klo kcha ava mdaksaa wonsat klo.
Mleija ku mii khat lee ngi mdaksaa pder chme, pdainu pmaal da tuk mdo sut loi, Khrista ruk va Rinlop pa anto mdo tlot.
Mleija nenna Mma daksaa ki msing khat in pmin.
“Hava leiji pselpa ngi mpah leh mnuh ma thi donle, mnumei tu ka amve ra, ungta knii ava daksaa khdaatti ka amra.”
Hava pauril la kukthuk khat, ungu neiji Khrista leh Rinlop mlei thu kthe cha ping.
Anto kurthuwk daat joso, naan mii pum ktaiji adaksaan lulu ngi anumei in wonsat alo in, ungu mnumei ruk va mi innpu mdo kjat ra ava mdo deera.
Kmo rek, Mukpu dil kṭoiji anuh apah in pauthe apṭoi in, mleija hava kindit.
“Apah leh anuh akjat chaan,” paureel khat tu kilṭhi ngi ru kri reep ki paureen na hava:
mleija naan aṭhat nraan, ungta dultipaam thu roi ksot betti arin chaak nraan leiki.
Mpahle anaole plung mthit nra dai maan, pdainu Mukpu do archakki kthe kupṭoiji mhai juw pik chaan.
Suwk rek, Khrista hin ado tlot in heppi, kṭi leh kunchunni, plung krip pi, dultipaam ki naanki kpu rek pauthe apṭoi in.
Miirek ningthlun nra ktlo lulu ngi, mik sut daat kira nong tlo maan, pdainu Khrista ki sra owr rek lulu ngi, plungril mkheng tu Isowr poibin ava atlo in.
Mii rek hin kma pdainu Mukpu hin nong ktlo lulu ngi, kdung ado tlot nuwm intu kilṭhi ngi nong thu aplung in aplut chaan.
Mma ngi suwk owr kurthuwk chdaat joso mdit mata kintek kurthuwk daat joso, ku mii khat ti kṭha nong mdo tlot ava, Mukpu hinki ava kat karlaang chra tdit adei in.
