Kpu rek, mmaan hin rukva anto lu atlot pik in ungu kipṭit ama dok in, naan leh mmaan mikniing ki Kpupa ava parwaan tha ka am, ungta Mma hin thangva ksan ksui ame.
Mṭut na rel tha, Mukpu ngi Mma hinki ruktang ava ngi ru aju ptan pik chaan so.
Tditta dijabowl rip khaan da, rawl ado kurduk ṭhi pchaan nraan, Isowr ki rawlphow mkheng ngi kirsim in.

Mleija nenni daksaa leh hii ptengda rawl tkurduk ṭhiin pme, pdainu tun knungki paam kpurek ptengda, rutan rek ptengda, hava kjiingnu thungki dultipaam ki paam kpu rek ptengda, parwaan ki mun rek thungki Pthla ktongki kṭha kma luwngrek kipteng ava in pmin.
Ava leiji, naanni kṭhakma nit thu ari pchaan nraan, ungta mkheng kirsim dokki ari nraan, Isowr ki rawlphow mkheng alou in.
Ava leiji, kindit tu kilṭhi ngi arkowl in suwlpaar kparyeel inra, ungu rinkindit ki plung arkuw kpurlot da,
ungta kdaai ki kṭha paumin kurchuwl li akhu tun inni anaa in.
Hava mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi krin cha rawl dona alou inra, kṭhakma khat ki mei kṭuwng mkheng nga archu you pthiin.
Ungu kirliing ki rawl luwkhum, ungta Isowr pauna, Pthla ki kaang ksaang alou chaan.
Kṭhil cha leh karpii kcha mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi, Pthla ngi mpha ktai thu aṭhil chaan. Mṭut na kpha dekki kdown liit kma kintiing rek mkheng tummi kṭhil pik thu mik khut mhai har pik chaan.
Ungta nei ktum rukka kṭha paumin ki kuk thuk pau ava plung ktangarri owngda kdo paryaam chaak nra mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Mleija ava leiji neia thiir ri do bowl li pau kuhur cha mii ava ping, tditta neiji kdo the rang kat ava plung ktangar ri kdo the chaak nra, mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Tunva naan rukva neia tak heppi amnu, talu ktlotta tdit ado dee nraan, Mukpu hin trin chaak nong ktlo ungu nei kwonsat lo ku u knao Tikhikas ava ngi nei ki mlei khim khaija akson pik chraan.
Hava nong lei kat tummi neiji mma ava naan hin ksii chaakka, mleija neenna tak heppi ka am in ping tdit ado dee nraan, ungta naan plungril mma ngi akukso pik chraan.
Ku u knao rek, naan hin tha, Kpah Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki kdaai ungu ado rin chaak in tu kilṭhi ngi wonsat am so.
Kdiyou liit kma ki wonsat ava ngi nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista wonsat klo kcha mii mkheng nga plungnee ngi aju ṭhi chaan so.
Jisu Khrista ki sra owr rek Poul leh Timothi ngi, ber ksu rek leh dikan rek tu kilṭhi ngi, Philippia tha ka am Khrista ki kintiing rek mkheng hin tha:
nenki Npah in Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai naan thu am so.
Neiji naan akbin phaak in mpha thu, mkheng thung ngi neiji Isowr kpanpaak chaakka.
Neiji kṭhil chaak mpha ktai thu, kanpa tu kilṭhi ngi naan akheng in tummi kdo ṭhil chaak.
Ru kri reeppi snii kpha thu kṭha paumin tummi plap ado tkurthut ṭhiin leiji kanpa kchaam ping.
Ungta hava anto kat ra ditta naan thung ngi kṭha nong kupṭhun Mma ngi Jisu Khrista nit kpha thu ava kup ṭuw ra.

Naan akheng in mlei thu neiji kdo bin chaakki mlei ava naanna nei kuplung thu ado kurpom chaak mer in, mleija neia rowng inn thu mtukhum lam thu ungu kṭha paumin kthe loi leh ktipnet thu, naan akheng inna nei tu kilṭhi ngi plungnee kpha sap tkurthut in.
Mleija neiji Jisu Khrista ki wonsat tu kilṭhi ngi naan akheng in plung ado kapkham psuk chaak in ava Isowr ri sakhi kurthuwk.
Ungta nei kdo ṭhil chaakka hava, mleija kdei pandi leh kindit poibin mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi naan wonsat ado klo in ava kheel set setti mnem nra,
tditta ava leiji kinreel sii ava naanni ado rot nraan, ungu Khrista nit rek tummi kchiir deek ungta kupsul ktaak akurthut nraan leiki.
Jisu Khrista thu kurjung rinkindit ki thei rek ava ngi adim chaak nraan, Isowr laarnee hin kpanpaak kcha kurthuwk so.
Ku u knao rek, nei kleen kthuwk ava kṭha paumin kbom rangki, kindit ava sok klo cha tdit naanni adodee raan neiji kngei chaakka.
Tditta ava leiji neiji rowng inn thu ka amma Khrista tum tdit paamkpu lusang inn kseel mkheng leh mii mkheng ngi mdo dee nra.
Ungta neiji rowng inn thu ka am ava leiji Mukpu hin plung knet betti, ku u knao rek mii maknem hin kṭi ktaak liitti Isowr pauna ava kheel setti kpau cha kukurthut nrang lei.
Mii murson va kheithe leh kar ai kalrai paryaam da, pdainu murson rek va kṭha poibin ni Khrista paryaam lamda.
Mii angṭhe va hava thu nei mdo tukhum ava kṭha paumin ksanloi tum tdit deida, dil thang rongi wonsat ki nong tlo lamda.
Mii murson va plung klutti Khrista paryaam lamme, pdainu neiji rowng inn thu ka am slii daat thu kja kakham mdo tpiik nlamra poi bin lamda.
Ava mkurthuttu talu rang? Mlam ktai thu ktlo do tlot tlo daat joso mdit mata kindit ktlo kurthuwk daat joso, Khrista kparyaam kurthuwk; ungta ava thu neia kanpa kcha ping.
Ungu tkanpat ruk kanpa chnik di. Mleija neiji kdee ditta naan do ṭhil chaak thu ungta Jisu Khrista Pthla do bommi, nei mdo tiṭen thuw nrang tha kur owl ra.

Neiji kdung mlam suwnu kbin chaakka, ditta neiva do khat lee kjat maang, pdainu mpha ktai thu kdung plung ktangar ri ka am ava lulu ngi, tun ruk va ring joring diyou joring nei kdaksaa thu Khrista kpanpaak cha kurthuwk nik di.
Daksaa thu rinkhu mkurthut bi, nei knong tlot na thei kurkun kurthuwk. Anto daat joso nei kdo kchol chaak ra ava neiji thethuw pchaang chmaang.
Neiji daksaa rinkummi ka amthlit daat kukur thutbi, ava neiki thei, anto joso kdo kchol ra ava neiji the pchaang maang.
Neia knii arlakki kdung mhai parchip chda, sunda Khrista tu kilṭhi ava kdo bin chaak, mleija ava ngi kṭha sii.
Pdainu daksaa thu ka am chdaat ava naan tumva kheel sii ngi do ksi.
Hava Kindit katta hava, mleija krin cha thu naan tummi mkursom nra, ungu kanpa akurthut nraan, neiji am daat da naan akheng in tu kilṭhi ngi am nowl nik di tdit neiji kdee chaakka.
Tditta ava leiji neiji naan hin kthlen nowl ra ava naanni Jisu Khrista tu ka amve ki kanpa kheel sii ngi ado phaak nraan ka amra.

Naan rinkhu ki nopa ava Khrista ki kṭha paumin kurhuiji a am nraan hava hehe daat kurthuwkka, ditta ava leiji neiji naan hin thlengda adei jown ring mdit mata thleng mjoringva, kṭha paumin tummi krin cha thu lee leh chang ngi plung khdaat tu kilṭhi ngi Pthla khdaatti ari raan ava neiji karyaak chaak nuwmma.
Ungta naan ak kro kma rekki do khat lee kma thu aju pṭit maan so. Hava ava mmaan muk kro chaak nraan ki titinna khat kurthuwk, pdainu naan akirliin nraan ava Isowr hinki.
Mleija Khrista tummi Mhin ado rin chaak in daat kma pdainu Mma tummi kja kakham kparteel rang ruk ado trot pik dok in.
Chodu ngi rawl kdo karnaak ṭhi naan dodee dok, ava tun rukku neiji kdo karnaak ṭhi slii ava ado aryaak in thu mhai karnaak ṭhi chaan.
Ava leiji Khrista thu kursop, wonsat ki plung ngam kpii, Pthla thu kurku ṭhi, plung knei leh wonsat kthloi ma am luwngbi,
plung bin kinṭim sappi wonsat khdaat kthloiji plung khdaat, ungu poi bin khdaatti nei kakanpat ava mhai pdim pik chaan.
Mthina ki kparning mdit mata napal poithuw ngi do khat lee tlo maan, pdainu plung kparneem mi naan adaksaan hinva ktlok mii rek ava ngi kṭha bet kdingi mhai bin pik chaan.
Naan mii pum ktaiva mma mma arda ro ntha khuwsuw mso, pdainu ktlok rek arda ro nthang rukva asuw so.
Jisu poi bin ava naan arlak ruk va am so.
Mma ngi Isowr arling lou chdaat joso, Isowr tu kinṭimmi do khdaat pre arlaang me.
Pdainu sra owr khat ki arling louda, dultimii rek kdu jikki ṭouda mdaksaa ava ktlong ngi am chda.
Ungta dultimii arling kdu jikki Mma ngi mdaksaa ava plung kparneem mi khros leen kdiyou kpha thu Mma ngi pau pṭoida diyou da.
Ava leiji, Isowr va kparthaang siingi khiingda, ungta miing khim khai tunni Mmiing ava Mma hin pii da.
Mleija parwaan tha ungu dulti leen leh dulti ril tha ka am pkhup khim khaiji Jisu miing hin mtardiil nra,
ungu Mpah laarnee ra, plei khim khaiji Jisu Khrista ava Mukpu di donle kthe thuw ra.

Ava leiji, nei kwonsat lo rek, naanni mpha ktai thu kthe kupṭoi akurthut in lulu ngi, neiji aka am ṭhiin thung daak kma, pdainu nei ktaakki tun rukva kṭi leh kunchun tu kilṭhi ngi naan adaksaan akirliin chaak nraan nong atlo in.
Mleija naan thung ngi Mma ningthlun nra bin da, ungu ado tlot raan mikniing ava Isowr ri mtlot sliia.
Kho kthe mdit mata ktlou liit kma do mkheng ava atlo in.
Mleija naanni kunkoi leh plung ksel charuwl thungki mraal ktaak liitti, kparmak kma Isowr naole kurthuwk da, mmaan arlakki mar awng lulu ngi dultipaam thu alen nraan,
rinkhu ki pauna ava knet merri arpom chaan, mleija ava leiji Khrista nit thu neiji napal kdo tlot chaak nra, neiva do ksi kma ngi chen maang, mdit mata do ksi kma nong tlo maang.
Naan lamrin chaakki tlaai down tunni kpii cha lulu ngi nei kihii kpubu kurthuwk daat joso, neia kuplung kngam rekrek kcha a, ungu naan akheng in tummi kanpa kchaam ping.
Anto lulu ngi naan ruk va plung kngammi nei tu kilṭhi ngi akanpat raan.
Naanki pauren kdee dok le nei kuplung mngam nra, neiji naan hin Timothi kbeiji kdo sii chaak nra, kdung ngi Mukpu Jisu hin kbin psuk chaakka.
Naan ki mlei thu hanto ja ngi plung kakham mma hep daat ku khat lee neiji thloi chmaang.
Mmaan mkheng ngi Jisu Khrista ktongki kma mma mma arda rona ktongtha khuw suw lamda.
Pdainu naanva Timothi ngi mkurhui chaak ava ado dee in, tija thu mchapa ngi mpah sok mdolo lulu ngi, mma ngi nei tu kilṭhi ngi kṭha paumin ava sok mdolo chaak.
Ava leiji, nei kihin tak hep kdu ki nong kthuwk rang tdit adodee teng chaak nraan, neiji mma ava ksii nuwm chaakka.
Ungta nei kdaksaa rukka kbei sekki thleng nik di dinu neiji Mukpu hin lam krin chaak ka.

Ungta neiji neiki ku u knao, ungu knong suk ṭhi, ungta rawlmii kdo kurthut ṭhi, ungu naanki tamsii, ungta nei kdo kriin thu sok klou Epaphraditas rukka naan hin kdo sii ngi kṭha rangmo kdingi kbin chaakka.
Mleija mma ngi naan akheng in plung aju pkham psuk inda, ungta kheelli plung apjiin psuk inda, mleija mkoi naanni ado aryaak dok in.
Kdiyou daat rang ngi koi chkat kat da. Pdainu Isowr ri wonsat lo chda, ungu ava daat kma, neiji kja kakham tun kja kakham kdo dut ma nra, nei rukka wonsat mlo chda.
Tditta naanni mma ado dee lei inni akanpat chaak nraan, ungu nei kjat kakham mtlowm bet nrang lei kurthuwk da, neiji mma ava kheel sii ngi kdo sii chaak nuwm.
Ava leiji kanpa mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi, mma ava Mukpu hin mhai kowl pik chaan, ungu anto lu hep daat mii ava ado kjat raan.
Mleija nei ki hin tha naan sok lo mkurkhum nra, mma ngi mrinkhu vardeen da, Khrista nong leiji kdiyou sou cha.
Mṭut na rel tha neiki ku u knao rek, Mukpu hin kanpa chaan. Naan hin kurnowl kurnowl nu kdo kjit ava ngi karda pthit me, ungu ava ngi naan ahui naan ra.
Ui rekka cheek asin chaan, kṭhakma nong ktlo rekka cheek asin in, mdaksaan karngaat rekka cheek asin in.
Mleija nenna Pthla ngi Isowr luwkbuk, ungu Jisu Khrista thu laarknei, mkindit ki vunmor kreen, daksaa thu plung kpii kma mii rek in pmin.
Nei kdaksaa thung ruk va plung kdo pne psuk nrangki mlei ka am kro. Ku mii khatti mdaksaa thu plung mdo pne psuk nrangki mlei ka am kding ngi mbin bi, ava ruk neiji kheel sii kurthuwk ping.
Mnii tret na nitti vunmor kreen, Isreel mii Benjamin ki chati, Hebru khat thungki Hebru ngi kṭou; Nowlam dil kṭoiji Pharisi khat,
plung klut ktongtha Rinlop suwk kupthuwk, rinkindit ktong thang va Nowlam kurdu ngi mraal ktaak kurthuwk ping.
Pdainu neiji kdo tuwn khim khaija Khrista tumva kmaang kcha kdingi neiva kdo tai.

Anto kat kurthuwk, mleija neiki Mukpu Jisu Khrista kdeipandi ava mkurhui reen leiji do khim khaija kmaang pi kdo dit chaak. Mleija Mma tummi neiji do mkheng pmaang nu kja kcha ping, ungta mat maang kdo dit, tditta neiji Khrista kdo kat chaak nra
ungu Mma thu mdo tphaak chaak nra, Nowlam kthenda nei kdaksaa ki rinkindit khat kthloi ava kma, pdainu Khrista lamkrin cha ngi Isowr ki rinkindit ava lamkrin cha thu ka am.
Tditta neiji Mma rin karheel naki rutan dei chda, ungta Mma diyo na thu Mma lulu da, ungu Mma jat kham kuhur ṭhi kukurthut nrang lei.
Tditta mkurthut de rangbi, neiji kdiyou thungki kring karheel kdo phaak chaak nrang leiki.

Neiji hava kphaak chaak dokka, mdit mata kinreel chdok im ping kdo dit na ava pme; pdainu nei kdak kat tumva namduwl nu kdo chen rei chaak, mleija Jisu Khrista ngi Mma mdak kat ki tumra mdo tseem dok.
Ku u knao rek, neiva nei kdaksaa kat ki tumra seem maang kdingi karbin kchaam ping; pdainu neiki nong khat ava lamchi, dil ktongki ava parngiil pthii thinu kdusuk ki kdo chenrei pṭoi chaak.
Jisu Khrista thu tun knungki Isowr ri mdo own mnah ava kpha chrang ngi tilrii kcho ktong tha neiji kdo chenrei chaak.
Plung kurchuwl dok nenva hanto bin inche; ungta msik khatti naanni abin inbi, ava rukka naan hin Isowr ri ak pandan pik chraan.
Nenni hava tphaak chaak dok in, nenni kindit deekki ava arpom chaan che.
Ku u knao rek, nei kno kurchuk chaan, ungu nei ki hinni akurchu chaak in lulu ngi hanto lu ngi ka am rek ava bii atin chaan.
Mleija mii knempokki, chodu ngi neiji mpha ktai thu ado kthe pik kcho in ungu tun rukva arthli kbu tu kilṭhi ngi kthe chaakka, mmaanna Khrista ki khros kipteng ngi ka am lamma.
Mmaanki ṭut nra ava kuk krop kurthuwk ra, mmaan ki mukpu mpoi bin in kurthuwk da, ningkja nrang ktong tha mmaanni pohok lamda, dultipaam ktongki ava daat mmaanni bin lamda.
Pdainu nenna parwaan ki mii rek in pmin, ungu ava leiji nen mi kaktlan pik ra Mukpu Jisu tarngai chaak in.
Mma ngi do mkheng nga Mma mdaksaa kurdu ngi kthi kpha ki rutan ava Mma laarnee ki mdaksaa lulu ngi ktuwl sii kcha nenki ndaksaan ava ren kpur owl ra
Ava leiji, neiji wonsat lonu plung pkhamnu kdo bin psuk, neiki ku u knao rek, nei kakanpat leh laar luwkhum rang ngi Mukpu hin knetti mhai ri pik chaan.
Mukpu hin ado kulrot nraan neiji Eudia leh Syntikhas kaktham chaak lamma.

Ungta kindit nong kdo tlot ṭhi naan rukva, hava snu rek ado bom chaak nraan akatham chaak inna, mleija kṭha paumin tummi lee leh chang ngi nei knong tlot ṭhi Klement leh nei knong suk ṭhi mii murson rek tu kilṭhi ngi mmaan miing nga rinkhu ki Laaika thu ka am dok.
Mpha ktai thu Mukpu hin kanpa chaan; vei khat nowlli neiji kthe a, kanpa chaan.
Mii mkheng ngi naan do diil de ava adei so, Mukpua knai tekka.
Naanni do khat lee mlei thu plung pjiin maan, pdainu do khim khai thu kpanpaak tu kilṭhi ngi ado ṭhil ado ktham chaak inna Isowr hin ati det chaan.
Ungta Isowr ki kdaai mkheng nga ktip pdepandit Jisu Khrista ngi naan plung ril ungu apoibin in ava karkhii ra.

Mṭut na relli ku u knao rek, kindit khim khai, takjat kurhui khim khai, mkindit khim khai, kchiir khim khai, mrungchen kṭha khim khai, mman klu ungu kheel sii ngi kinreel ava ma amta, tpanpaak ra kuhui ma amta, havale mlei thu abin phaak in.
Nei kihin ni naan do kurchu naan ungta ado arlaan in, ungu ado aryaak in, ado dee in ava atlo in; ungta kdaai ki Isowr ri aju kurthlo ṭhi chraan.
Mukpu hin neia kdung ngi kanpa kchaam ping, ditta tunva naanni nei ktummi roi ksotti ado tbin pik in; naanni nei ado tbin pik kat kat in, pdainu mpha kcha ava naanni thloi chmaan ti.
Neiji kdo ngei leiji kthe kcha ava pmaang; mleija talu talu thung daat joso ka am na mun thu kning kthlung ngi kurchuk kcha ping.

Tak heppi tikkriin tdit neiji kdee, ungu tak heppi knemmi tathloi rang tdit ruk kdee chaak; mleija do khim khai ungta mlei mkheng thu kekleem lut lut daat don mdit mata poitham daat don, knempok daat don ktlowm suwn daat don, kurdowl li neia kurchuk chdok ping.
Nei kihin ru mkaptan pik Mma hin do mkheng nga neiji tlo pchaang chnik di.
Anto daat joso naanni nei kjat na thu awonsat inni mhur ṭhi chaan tinu.

Ungta Philippia naan adaksaan kat daat ruk va ado dee in ditta kṭha paumin mupṭhun daat le, neiji Masidonia ki kukunsun mpha thu, naan kma donle Rinlop ku khat lee ngi kpii ki ungu karlaang chaki mlei thu kmii ṭhira ka am pme.
Mleija Thessalonikia thung ruk va, naanni nei mukbom chrang ngi kurnowl kurnowl inti ado siin.
Neiva chla ra thlaam maang; pdainu naan tumra kheel bet ava kthlaam cha ping.

Neiji ava mkheng arlaang dok chnu, ungu mdo kheel dok, naanki chla ava reidii mikrim kdi langlang, Isowr dorot kro ungta mning thlunna tlaai down kurthuwk ki Epaphraditas hin ado puhur in neiji arlaang chnu, neia pum dimmi kdim kchaam ping.
Ungu neiki Isowr ri naan do kriin khim khai, Jisu Khrista thu Mma laarnee ki suwangthuw dil kṭoiji aju kpurdon pik chraan.
Nenki Isowr ungu Npah in hin kṭuw knai liit kma kpanpaak kurthuwk so. Amen.
Jisu Khrista hinni kintiing khim khai kurvui chaan. Nei tu kilṭhi ngi ku u knao rekki naanna leer khatti aturvui chaak inna.
Kintiing rek mkheng, kheel siingi Kaesar phungka rekki naanna aturvui chaak inna.
Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi naan ki Pthla aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so.
Isowr plungbin ni Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat Poul leh nenki nu u nnao in Timothi ngi,
Kolossia ki Khrista hinki kintiing rek leh trin chaak kurhui nu u nnao rek hin tha:
Nenki Npah Isowr hinki kdaai lei plungnee ka am kurthuwk so.
Neenni naan tumra kṭhil chaak in mpha thu, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah hin mpha ktai thu kdo panpaak chaak in.
Mleija Jisu Khrista hin naan do rin chaak, ungu kintiing rek mkheng hin wonsat adolo chaak in ava neenni karyaak chaak inna.
Mleija parwaan tha naanni ado bin psuk chaak in lei kurthuwk. Hava leiji naanni mkindit pauna ki kṭha paumin chodu ngi ado aryaak chaak dok in.

Naan hin kthleng ava dultipaam mkheng thu mthei kchui ungta klin ksaang kat kurthuwk ava leiji Isowr plungnee mkindit ado dee pandit intu aryaak nit kiin kupṭhunni adaksaan thung ruk va anto kurthuwk.
Ava nen nwonsat lo chaak in sra owr tkurthut ṭhiin Epaphraditas hinki kurchuk dok in pti. Mma ava neen kchang kdonni trin chaak kurhui Khrista sok klo cha kurthuwk.
Ungta Pthla thu naan wonsat ava neen kihin inni mhai tdet chaan da.
Ungta ava leiji neenni ava karyaak in nit thungki kupṭhun ni, naanni Pthla ktongki lousing ungu kdei pandi cha mkheng Mma poibin kdei cha tu kilṭhi ngi dim chaan.

Mukpu ki rinkhu kuhui thu a am nraan, kheel siingi Mma ning thlunna tlo da, kṭha nong khim khai thu thei achui nraan, ungta Isowr kdei cha thu akar kheel setset nraan, neenni naan tumra kdo ṭhil chaak in ava down chliit maan ring.
Kanpa tu kilṭhi ngi kdiil dei leh kparteel mkheng, Mma laarnee ki rutan dil kṭoiji, rutan mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi ru ajuptan pik chaan so.
Mar awng thu kintiing rek do phaak chaak rang thu ntum in tphaak ṭhiin ava ngi mido tpurhui lei inni Npah in ava panpaak chaan che.
Mma ngi kjiingnu dopaal na thungki miṭen thuw inda, ungu Mchapa wonsatti Kruwngpaam tha mi punthot chaan da.
Mma hin nenni pnu rek kuptlot pikki kṭenthuw ava tphaak chaak in.
Mma ava tdee pchaan ma Isowr ki arling ngi mdo seem, mkheng thungki ru kri verri kṭou.

Mleija Mma thu do mkheng nga seem da, parwaan leh dulti tun, tdee leh tdee pchaan ma, kruwngrek longkhom daat don, mdit mata kpaal na daat don, mata rutan kthloi rek daat don, do mkheng nga Mma thung ngi Mma tumra seem da.
Mma ava do mkheng mseem dungi am dok da, ungu Mma thu do mkheng nga kthuwk kurtuwl.
Mma ava Rinlop daksaa ki Mluw, Mma ava kdiyou thungki ru kri verri kṭou, mdo pṭhunna, ditta do khim khai thu ma am nrang lei.
Mleija Mma thu mkheng ava kdim dokki ma am nra,
ungta Mma thu do mkheng Mma mdaksaa hin mdo pipin dok nra, dulti tuwn daat don, mdit mata parwaan thang daat don, Mma khros ki hii ava ngi, mdo pdaai dok ra, ava Isowr ning thlunna.
Ungta mpha khat thu naanna kṭha kma tlo in tinu ungu kṭha kma plung ado bin in, Isowr hinki kdung lam karlatti ka am kcha in pti.
Tunva Mma maiṭhuwm mi mraal ktaak ungu kar mak ktaakki kchiir deekki ado piik chaak nraan, Mma mdaksaa diyo ngi Mma ngi mi pipin pik inda.

Krin cha thu naanni ado nowl thlit daat nraan, knet ungu kdet liit kma naanni kṭha paumin ado aryaak in thungki, kju kva plung ngi ksun daak ra kbin kma, parwaan tingi ka am mdo seem khim khai hin mdo paryaam dok, ungta ava thu Poul neia sok klou cha ping.
Tunva neia naan tummi kja kakham thu kanpa kcha ping, ungu Rinlop ava Mma mdaksaa tum mkurthut leiji nei kdaksaa ngi Khrista ki kja kakham kdo parteel kvaat ava neiji kupṭut chaakka.
Naan tummi nei kihin mdo tpiik chaak Isowr ktongki kurchuwl dok nong dil kṭoiji, Isowr pauna kurkhummi mkandan nra, neia naan sok klou cha ping.
Kum roi ksot ungta charuwl rek thu, kukthuk pau ava kurdowl kcha pdainu tunva Mma ki kintiing rek hinni mpandan dokka.
Mmaan hin tha Isowr ri ktlok chati rek arlakki kukthuk pau hava ki laarnee suwang ava kdung ngi tdet nuwm chda, laarnee kbin cha ngi naan thu Khrista ka am.
Neenni naan mii pum ktai ava Khrista hin plung kurchuwlli kdo piik chaak nlamra, lousing mkheng ngi mi pum ktai hin paukham innu, mii pum ktaija purchuk innu neenni Mma mlei kdo paryaam chaak in.
Mleija hava tummi nei kthung ngi ru kmuwt daatti kdo tlot, Mma nong ava dil kṭoiji nei kihinni mdo tpiik chaak rutan tu kilṭhi ngi kdo suk chaak.
Naan tum ungu Laodesia tha ka am rek leh nei kmai kdei cha kma rek tummi kdung kpalren nu nong kdo suk chaak naanni ado dee raan neiji kngei chaakka.
Mleija wonsat thung ngi muplung bin kinṭimmi arda krok ungu suwang thuw mkheng thloida ungta Isowr ki kukthuk pauvi Khrista dei dok da, mmaan plungril kuk sop mkurthut nrang lei.
Mma thungva lousing ki alrou mkheng kurdowl daat da ka am.
Ku mii khat leengi naanna pauna ngi ado tup sum ma nraan, neiji hava kthe cha ping.
Mleija neiji daksaa ngi am mjoringva Pthla va naan tu kilṭhi nu ka am daat ping, Khrista hin ado rin chaak in knet ava deida kṭha ngi a am in dei da kakanpat nrang ki lei.
Ava leiji, naanni Mukpu Jisu Khrista ado arlaan chaak in lulu ngi, Mma thu am in.
Mma thu arjung avar inra apunchoi in, ungta naan hin ado tpurchu in lulu ngi, naan lamrin chaak thu kdung knetti kheelli apanpaak chaan.

Khrista ktongki dil kṭoi kma, dultimii nopa dil kṭoi, dultipaam ki pthla rek ki mkinreel naanki nopa ava dil kṭoiji, ku mii khatti mma kurchu chaak leh do ksi kma pauvi ado tuk kjown ma nraan tuk kursut chaan.
Mleija mma thu Isowr ktongki daksaa mkheng kdimmi ma am nra,
ungu Mma thu rinkhu kdimmi naanni ado thloi chaak in. Mma ava paamkpu mkheng ki Isowr ungta rutan kthloi mkheng ki Mluw kurthuwk.
Khrista ki vunmor kreen thu daksaa ktongki dak ava ma pthiida, khut do seemma vunmor kreen khat tu kilṭhi ngi, Mma thu naanna vunmor ado reen dok in.
Ungta baptis ktlo thu Mma tu kilṭhi ngi ado tulruwl dok in, ungu kdiyou thungki Mma kipring pinle Isowr nongtlot tingi naan rukka Mma tu kilṭhi ngi kring kinle chdok in pti.
Ungta naanna apnu ton rek in leh adaksaan thu vunmor ado reen ma inni kdiyou chdok in pti, nen pnu ton mkheng mi ptlot pik inda, Mma tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr ri mido tip prin pinlet chaak in.
Nen nraal mipii da ka am Nowlam tikjit ava Mma ngi knuwl pthiida, khros tun jowtpi tha kthenda, Mma ngi siirri mdo thiik pthii.
Mma ngi Pthla ktongki rutan rek leh ru ktang rek rutan ava lou pthiida, ungu Mma ngi dultimii mdo tdet nangi mmaan ava mdaksaa ngi pchaang riim da.
Ava leiji, kchaa knee mdit mata kmaal kakam thu mdit mata thla ren mdit mata sabath mlei thu ku mii khat lee ngi naanna aju kṭewl maan so.
Hava lea kurjung rangki arlim khat ngaal; pdainu mpaulam katta Khrista hinki.

Naanna daksaa kpirlin kcha ungu waan tamsii rek luwkbuk ku mii khat lee ngi do ksi kma thleerri atlot nmaan so, mma ngi mik kleng tun tarsan louda mlei ktaak liitti kpunmun ni naar klinni Khrista kbin thungki kdown pthii kurthuwk.
Ungta daksaa ki mluw kurthuwk Khrista ava knetti kjowng me, mdaksaa mkheng ava mkurjom na thu Khrista ngi tri purdut da klin ksaang ngi mdojuw plin, ungu Isowr do ngeiji klin ksaang.
Dultipaam Pthla paal thu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi adiyo innu, talu leiji dultipaam ktong ki mii rek heppi ka am thlit daat in pti? Talu leiji Nowlam kurdu ngi ka am in pti?
“Kmei maan, partem maan, thowng maan,”
Mkheng ava kmawng chrangki do mmaanni mdo sin ton in ava mdo thena. Hava lea dulti mii ki nopa leh paurin dil kṭoi pmemo?
Havalea waan tamsii luwkbuk ungu ningkja na ungta daksaa suwkthuw nrangki ngi lousing tarsan klou, pdainu daksaa tukjown nrang kia mmaanna do ksi ava pme.
Naanna Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi kring kinle akurthut inta, Khrista ngi Isowr khut chang ktong tha mko onna tun knungki dona ava athlaam in.
Tun knung ki do ava leiji plung areel in, dulti do leiji plung reel maan.
Mleija naanni diyou dok inti, ungu naanki rinkhu ava Isowr thu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi kurdowl.
Nenki rinkhu kurthuwk Khrista ava mkandan mpha thu, naan rukka Mma tu kilṭhi ngi laarknei ji kandang naan di.
Ava leiji, naan athungki dultipaam ktongki: nala tartlaang kturkui cha, kbuwr, kjukva poithuw, kṭha kma poi bin, ungta hangmal, khut do sak pthla hava lea apdiyou pthiin.
Hava le tun ni Isowr plung thit kthlung ra.
Naanni hava le thu a am in mpha thungva, naan rukka mpha khat thu havale thu kchet in pti.
Pdainu tunva: Plung kthi, kdung ngi plung kthi, khusiir parthit na ktlo, titi ktadah, ungu aner thuwn ni sowngkho pau ado the in mkheng nga ama dok in.
Khatti khat huwn chaak nmaan, mleija naanni anong tlot in khim khai thu pliw ki nopa ado maak pthii dok in.
Ungta kseem Mma arling ava kdu jik dil kṭoiji kdei cha thu ren kur owl ki nopa ado tseem pik dok in ren ava ahiil anaa in.
Hava thu Grik leh Jihudia, vunmor kreen leh vunmor kreen kma, nonaat ktaak, Synthia mii, suwk owr, kintek mii, tdit ka am pme, pdainu mkheng thu mkheng kurthuwk ava Khrista.
Isowr do kchol khat lulu ngi, kchiir ungu wonsat thu, wonsat kthloi, plung knei, plung kdowng, plung kparneem, ungta kdiil dei cha ava ahiil anaa in.

Khat leh khat karkhaang dei inra, ungu ku mii khatti ku mii khat hin mdo psul chaak na ma amta; Mukpu ngi naan ado tuptlot pik in lulu ngi, khat leh khat kpurtlot pik in, ava leiji naan rukka ado tuptlot pik kat in.
Ungta hava mkheng tun nowlli, do khim khai plung khdaat ti kirchin wonsat ava ngi abowl in.
Ungta naan plung thu Khrista ki kdaai ava ngi paal so, ava leiji naanna daksaa khdaat rangki ado tu own chaak dok in. Ungu apanpaak dei in.
Khrista ki pauna ava naan thu knemmi amso, lousing mkheng ngi khat leh khat kurchuk inra kparseel in, ungta Pthla ktongki laa rekki naan plung ril thu Isowr hin kpanpaak laa atheen.
Ungu naanni pauna daat don nong ktlo daat don do khim khaija Mukpu Jisu miing ngi atlo in, Mma thu Mpah Isowr ava apanpaak chaan.
Numei rek, Mukpu hin akurhui in lulu ngi, naanki a innpu in kurdu ngi am in.
Innpu rek, anumei in wonsat alo in, ungu mmaan tun plung psel daak maan.
Kmo rek, do khim khai thu anuh apah in dothe apṭoi in, mleija hava ngi Mukpu ning kthlung.
Mpah le, anaole plung mkarheel ma nra, dai dai maan.
Suwk owr rek, mii ning kupthlung lulu ngi, mik sut ki sok klou ava kma, pdainu plung krippi, Mukpu kṭi ngi, dultimii ki akpu rek inna do khim khai thu apṭoi in.
Naan anong in khim khaija mii rek hin kma ungu Mukpu hin sok klou cha lulu ngi, plung klutti atlo in.
Naan do phaak chaak ra naanki mnah ava Mukpu hinki arlaang chnik di kdingi naanni Mukpu Khrista sok ado lo chaak in.
Mleija kar mak ktlo mii ava mma dotlot kar mak ava kpinlet pik ra, ungu ksan ksui tdit ame.
Kpu rek, parwaan tha naanni Kpupa Khat ado thloi in ava ado dee raan, naanki suwk rekka kindit deekki ungu kṭha ngi atlot pik in.
Kṭhil cha thu kpanpaak tu kilṭhi ngi mik khut ahar inra, kdet liit kma anowl thlit chaan.
Ungta pauna tummi Isowr ri thurngot mdo tapvan pik chaak nraan neen ktum rukka mhai ṭhil pik chaan, Khrista ki kukthuk pau kthe thuw rang ki nei rukka rowng inn thu ka am chdaat imping.
Mleija neiji kdo the rang kat ava kdo the chaak nra mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Mpha kcha khim khai alou inra, duwn tha ka am rek hin adaksaan na ksing ngi chet tlowng in.
Naan mii pum ktaiji tak heppi arthawng nikdi tdit ado dee nraan, ptih lulu ngi apa al inra, apau saam inna mpha ktai thu mman klu kurthuwk so.
Lam trin chaak kurhuiji sok klou, ungu Mukpu hin nei ksra owr ṭhi, nei kwonsat lo ku u knao Tykhikas ava ngi nei knong tlot mlei mkheng nga ak son pik chraan.
Tditta naanni nei ki mlei deida ungu mma ngi naan plungril ado tuk kso pik chaak nraan, hava mlei kat tummi mma ava naan hin neiji ksii chaakka.
Ungta lam trin chaak kuhui naan amii khat, ungu nei kwonsat lo ku u knao Onesimas ava mma tu kilṭhi ngi ksii chaakka. Hava tha kthuwk do khim khaija mmaanve ngi ak son pik chraan.

Neiji rowng inn thu kdo amṭhi Aristarkas ava ngi leer khatti aturvui chaak inna, ungu Barnabas riilam kthuwk Mak (mma mlei thu ado kparseel in ava ado arlaan dok in, mma ngi mthlen luwngta mhai kowl pik chaan.)
Ungta Jastas mdo dit Jesu ngi leer khatti aturvui chaak inna. Isowr Kruwngpaam kira nong kdo suk ṭhi rek arlakki vunmor kreen rekka hava mmaan daat kurthuwk, ungta mmaanna nei kuplung ngamna rek lam.

Naan amii khat in, Jisu Khrista ki sra owr khat Epaphras ava ngi aturvui chaak inna, naanni Isowr poibin mkheng thu plung kurchuwl, plung krippi ari nraan, mṭhil chaak mpha ktai thu mma ngi plung klutti ajubin phaak chaan da.
Mleija mma ngi naan tum leh Laodesia ungu Hirapolis rek tummi kdung nong mdo suk chaak ava neiji sakhi kuhur pik ka.
Nei kwonsat lo kdimpa Luk leh Demas ava ngi aturvui chaak inna.
Laodesia ki nei ku u knao rek leh Nimpha ungu mma inn thungki Rinlop hin leer khatti nei kdo arvui chaak ava mhai son pik chaan.
Ungta naan arlakki hava chethia apat dok inta, Laodesia ki Rinlop thung ruk va apa lamso; ungta naan rukva Laodesia ki chethi ado pat nraan asuw dei in.
“Ungta nang ngi Mukpu hinki ado arlaan chaak sok adolo ava mkurkhum nra ava ado dee ra,” kdingi Arkhipas hin mhai son pik chaan.
Poul nei kukhut katti kjit nu, leer khatti akurvui chaak inna. Mdo tbowl ava mhai parngiil pik chmaan. Plungnee ngi aju kurtho ṭhi chaan so.
Poul, Silvanas ungta Timothi ngi Mpah Isowr hin Mukpu Jisu Khrista hin ka am Thessalonikia Rinlop hintha:
Plungnee leh kdaai naan thu am so.
Mpha ktai thu naan akheng in tummi Isowr hin kdo panpaak chaak in, kdet liit kma neen kdo ṭhil chaak in thu ado ksaam psuk lu in.
Krin cha ngi anong tlot in ungu wonsat ki anonglo in ava neenni nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah Isowr kbin cha thu kdet liit kma ado kbin phaak in.
Mleija Isowr wonsat lo neen ki ku u knao rek, ava kdo dee in, mleija naanna Mma ngi ado tuk kchol dok in.

Mleija neenki kṭha paumin ava pauna daatti naan hin kthleng ava pme, pdainu rutan thu, Pthla Kchiir thu, ungu mkindit kdei cha kat tu kilṭhi ngi kthleng. Naan arlak kira naan tumra neenna tak hep kdu ki mii rek in ping tdit naan ruk va ado dee in.
Ungta naanna neen no leh Mukpu ki no ava kurchuk kcha dok in pti. Mleija naanni Pthla Kchiir ri kanpa tu kilṭhi ngi kja kakham kparteel knempokki pauna ava ado arlaan chaak in.
Ava leiji naanna Masidonia leh Akhaja thungki krin cha rek mkheng kurchu chaak nraan in pti.
Mleija Masidonia leh Akhaja thungki daat pauna ava kthuwk ava pme, pdainu naanni Isowr ado rin chaak in ava mun ktai thu kuryou da, ava leiji neenva do khat lee kdo the in pme.
Mleija neenki mlei thu tak heppi neenni naan arlakki lut innu, ungu kring leh mkindit ki Isowr sok kloura, ungta tak heppi khut dosak pthla luwkbuk thungki Isowr hin kinle in pti,
Isowr plung thit kthleng rang thungki mi kṭenthuw in, kdiyou dok thungki Mma do prin pinlet Mma Chapa Jisu ngi parwaan ki murjun ra ava karda chrangki kdingi mmaan mdaksaa kat inni song lamda.
Mleija ku u knao rek, ditta neenni ado kvel chaak inna do ksi kma lua kurthuwk me tdit naan adaksaan katti ado dee in.

Pdainu neenni Philippia thu kja kakham pha innu, ungta ningkja du chdaat jown ringva, naan dodee lulu ngi, neenni naan hin Isowr ki kṭha paumin kthethuw cha thu kdung mhai kipteng kchaan ava maiṭhuwm mi nenki Isowr hin tan kdolo chaak in.
Mleija neen kdo the inna kar mak mdit mata ktobor mata kindit kma ava pme.

Pdainu Isowr ki kṭha paumin tu kilṭhi ngi msil naanda mdo trot pik in ava lulu ngi, neenva kpau kchaan ping, dultimii ningthlun nra ava pme, pdainu nen plung ril kpirsin ndok Isowr ning thlun nrang lei.
Mleija naan dodee lulu ngi pauna rek kip pnii chaak mdit mata pau parnaal duwk duwkda kthe pmaan ring, ava Isowr ri sakhi kurthuwkka.
Neenni Khrista ki kenyee lulu ngi ṭhilda ngeen daat jown ringva, mii rek hin mdit mata murson rek hinki laarnee ava thlaam maan ring.
Pdainu mnuh ngi mnaole mdo sut pṭoi chaak lulu ngi, neenna naan arlakki plung kdowng ngi ka am in ping.
Ava leiji naan wonsat ajulo reen innu, neenni naan hin Isowr ki kṭha paumin ava daat kma, pdainu neen kdaksaan kat rukka kdo piik chaak nuwm in, mleija naanna neen kwonsat lo in pti.

Mleija ku u knao rek, naanni neen knonglo in, ungta knongtlot in na bin phaak naandi, neenni Isowr hinki kṭha paumin ahin inni kparyaam slii thuwn, ditta naan ku mii khat hin bowr krik ado kpiik ma nraan, suwn jaan knai kma nong kdo suk chaak in.
Krin cha rek naan hinni tak heppi neenni kchiir, ungta rinkindit ungu kupsul ktaak liitti ka am in ping tdit ava naan leh Isowr ri sakhi.
Mleija naanni ado dee in, naanna Isowr Mma mdak kat ki Kruwngpaam ungta laarnee thu ado tu own naan thu kurhuiji ache chaak nraan.
Neenni aju ksop innu, plung aju tipchai pik innu, pau kham innu mpah ngi mnaole hin mdo tlot lulu ngi, naan mii pum ktai hin ado ktlot pik dok in.

Ungta hava tummi neen ruk va kdet liit kma Isowr kdo panpaak chaak in, tditta naanni neen kihin ki Isowr pauna aryaan ti arlaan chaak in mpha thu, mii rek pauna lulu va arlaang maan ti, pdainu krin cha rek naan thu nong aju kup ptlot pik in Isowr ki pauna kdingi mlo pik inti nu, ava mkindit kat.

Mleija ku u knao rek naan, Judia thu ka am, Jisu Khrista hin ka am Isowr ki Rinlop rekki, ava nopa kupṭoi cha kurthuwk lam; mleija mmaanni Jihudia rek hinki kja kakham mdo parteel in lulu ngi, naan rukka anto jikki akhuwpaam inki miirek hinki aparteel chaak inna.
Mukpu Jisu leh khulpu rek mikniing ke eayou, ungta nen mi krei pthiin, ungu Isowr ning kupthlung kma, ungta mii mkheng kro kma ngi,

ktlok chati rek mdo ktlan pik nra, pau kthe thu nen mi pkhaan inda, ava leiji mmaanna mpha ktai thu tparteena kdimmi pnu marvee chaak inna. Pdainu mṭut na relva mleen thaanni Isowr plung thit kthlung nga.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, plungril kma daksaa ngi, mpha mruk tummi kinṭhen in minnu, kdung ngi aṭei chaannu, ungu naan mai kdeira kdung plung kdo purdun chaak in.
Mleija neenni, Poul neiji kurnowl kurnowl nu naan hin kthleng kcha nuwm ping, pdainu seitaanni mapkhaan thlit da.
Mleija nenki Mukpu Jisu murjun mpha thu, Mma maiṭhuwm mi nen tbin chaak thuwn, mdit mata kanpa mata napal ktlo ki luwkhum ava talu da? Ava naan pmemo?
Mleija naanna neenki laarnee leh kanpa ava in pti.
Ava leiji, neenni kdiil pchaan nowl maan thungta, Athenia rek hin tha ksangtlaak ki mdo tmaak raan ngei chnu.
Ungta naan do rin chaak thu ru aju kaptan pik chraan, ungu akuk ksop chraan, Khrista ki kṭha paumin thu Isowr sra owr ungta neenki ku u knao in Timothi kdo sii chaak in.
Tditta kja kakham kparteel thu naan ku khat lee akanvei ma nraan, naan adaksaan kat daat ruk va kbowr in krik naanni ado dee dok in.
Mleija neenni naan aka am ṭhiin mpha thu, neenni kja kakham kdo parteel raan ava mdu ngi ado kthe pik dok in, anto hep heppi thuwk da ava naanni ado dee in.

Mleija hava leiji neiji kdiil pchaan ma nowl thungta, naan do rin chaak ava kdo dee nra kdo sii chaak, mleija kepthleem mi aju kipthleem dok raan, ungu neen knong suk chaak inna do ksi kma kurthuwk kro kdingi kṭi im ping.

Pdainu tunva Timothi ngi naan hinki thlengda, ungu naan do rin chaak leh wonsat mson pik inda, ditta neenni plung kdong ngi ado kdee chaak nuwm in lulu ngi naan rukva mdei chnuwm in tinu, mpha ktai ado tbin phaak inki wonsat ki kṭha paumin mhur pik chaan da.
Mleija hava leiji ku u knao rek, neen ksuwk thuw in ungu kja kakham kdo parteel in mkeng thung ngi naanki mlei ungta naan do rin chaak ava ngi plung ngam kdo phaak chaak in.
Mleija naanni Mukpu hin knetti ari chaak inbi, tunva neenna kring kchaan ping.
Mleija naan tummi neenni Mukpu hin kpanpaak chaak inna. Mleija nenki Isowr maiṭhuwm mi ka kanpat in mkheng kvar deen chaak inna.
Suwn jaan knai kma plung klutti neenni ṭhil chaannu, tditta naan leh neen nmai in kurdu da ungu naan do rin chaak thu kvaat ava aju purdon pik chni maan ring mo?
Tunva nenki Npah in Isowr mdaksaa kat ungta nenki Mukpu Jisu ngi naan ktong tha klam in mtikhew pik chaanda.
Ungu neenni naan wonsat ado klo in lulu ngi, naan ni khat leh khat hin ungta mii mkheng hin wonsat knemmi ado lo nraan kheel set setti mhai tlot pik chaan.

Ava leiji nenki Mukpu Jisu ngi kintiing rek mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi, murjun mpha thu, nenki Npah in Isowr maiṭhuwm mi, naan plung ril thu kupsul ktaak ungu kchiir deekki ado tpunchoi pik nraan ki kurthuwk.

Mṭut na relli ku u knao rek, naanni tak heppi amda ungu Isowr ning pthlung nikaan di kdingi ado tlot in lulu ngi, naanni kheel setsetti ado tlot nraan, neen ki hinki akurchu chaak in heppi, Mukpu Jisu hin aju ksop innu aka ktham chaak inna.
Mleija neenni Mukpu Jisu hinki tak heppi akparseel in tdit ado dee in.
Mleija hava naan akpinchel deek nraanki Isowr do ngei. Pang turkuiji kturkui cha ava akdaan in.
Psel mii pum ktaiji mdaksaa ki numei ava kchiir ungu tak kjat kurhuiji tak heppi talo rang tdit ado dee in.
Isowr kdei kma ktlok chati rek lulu ngi, kar mak nong ktlo ki plung bin maan.
Tditta hava mlei thu ku mii khat lee ngi mu u mnao tun pnu tla mso, mleija neenni kapchaiji pau ado kakham pik dok in lulu ngi, hava mkheng phuw klou ra ava Mukpu.
Mleija Isowr va nenna ktobor rang leiji mido tu own in ava pme, pdainu kchiir rang lei.
Ava leiji, hava pau kleek ku mii khat va miilai pau leek me, pdainu naan hin Pthla Kchiir akpii kchaan Isowr pau kleek.

Pdainu ku u knao rek, wonsat akurlo nraan ki mlei thu, naan hin kdo kjit nrangki arleek set do ame, mleija naanni khat leh khat wonsat akurlo nraan, naan adaksaan katta Isowr ri ado tpurchu chaak dok in.
Ungta naanni Masidonia thungki ku u knao rek in mkheng hin wonsat adolo kat in. Pdainu ku u knao rek naanni kheel set setti ado tlot nraan, neenni akuk kso chaak inna.
Neenni pau ado kakham pik in lulu ngi, rim kdi amda, naan adaksaan ki nong daat binda, akhut intu kilṭhi ngi nong ado suk nraan;
tditta duwnki kthleng mii rekki ado takjat chaak nraan, ungu ku mii khat lee hin lam adosut ma nraanki lei.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, mdobin psuk chaak ra ktaak murson rek lulu ngi naan plung mjat ma nra, ki iip dok rek mlei thu, naan dodee ma rang nga ngei chmaan ring.
Mleija nenni Jisua diyou dok da kring karheel nowl kdingi trin chaak in, ava leiji, ki iip dok rek ava Jisu tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr ri arjun kṭhira.
Mleija Mukpu pauna hava neenni naan hin kdo the dok in, mleija Mukpu ngi murjun mpha thu kring nen ku mii khat ava ki iip dok rek dungi ru trit liit in nime.
Mleija Mukpu mdaksaa kat ava, waan tamsii mkinreel li, Isowr peengkhul krowl tu kilṭhi ngi owng donle, parwaan ki kurjungra. Ungta Khrista hin kdiyou kcha rek mmaanni ru kri reeppi kring kinle lamra.
Ava dilli ka am daat kring daat nen ava armei thu Mukpu kukurdut ṭhira mi kparchin purkuk raan; ungta ava leiji nenni mpha ktai thu Mukpu tu kilṭhi ngi ta am chaak raan.
Ava leiji, hava pauna rek tu kilṭhi ngi khat leh khat plung ngam karpii chaan.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, mpha leh mkum mi mlei kurthuwk da, naan hin kdo kjit nrang ki arleek set do ame.
Mleija Mukpu ngi kup pru khat thlen lulu ngi jaanni nii khat thu kurjung ra tdit naan adaksaan katti kmin ni ado dee dok.

“Kdaai ungta tiṭit traan nra arleek set do ame,” dida mii rekki mthe mpha kat thu, snu khatti nao kuplu rangki mukdung kṭou ava heppi, tun kat daatti muk kro chaak nraan mmaan leenni arjung kṭumra, ungu mmaan ava karthlet pchaang liit lam nime.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, naanna kjiingnu thungki pmaan ti, mleija ava nit va naanna kup pru hep va aju kṭhowng in nime.
Mleija naanna mar awng ungu suwnki naole in pti, nnenna jaan ki mdit mata kjiingnu ki in pminme.
Ava leiji anto daat joso, murson rek do tlot lulu ngi, nenni iip maan che, pdainu mik khut har in chera, plung knetti am in che.
Mleija ki iip rekka jaanni ki iip lam, ungu ju kipri rekva jaanni kipri lu lam.
Pdainu nenna suwn nao tkurthut lei inni, plung pnet inche, ungta krin cha leh wonsat ki plung arkuw hiilnaa inche ungu kirliing ki tbin chaak in rawl luwkhum khum in che.
Mleija Isowr ki plung thit ksudu rang ngi mido tpankai in ava pme, pdainu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista thu kirliing kpha chrangki.
Nenni har jown min mdit mata iip jown minva, Mma tu kilṭhi ngi kring tphaak chaak nraan, nen ntummi Mma ava kdiyou.
Ava leiji, naanni ado tlot in nong ngi khat leh khat kursop in ungta khat leh khat kpunchoi in.
Pdainu ku u knao rek, Mukpu hin naan arlakki nong ksu ungta tunni ka am, ungu aju kpurchuk kchaan mmaan ava kdung ngi ado kjat pik raan.
Ungu mmaan nong leiji kdung kparthaang ki wonsat ava ngi mhai tlot pik chaan diinnu neenni aka ktham chaak inna. Naan asingreel in arlakki kdaaiji am in.
Ungta ku u knao rek, neenni naan akuk kso chaak inna, howngkva rekka mhai arko pik chaan, plung kdil rekka plung atiplin pik chaan, ksowl rek abom in, mkheng nga adiil ṭhi sap in.
Kṭha kma ktlo tummi kṭha kma ngi naan ku mii khat lee ngi ado purthul ma nraan cheek asin dei chaan, pdainu khat leh khat hin ungu mkheng hin kṭha ado tlot nraanki mpha ktai thu athlaam dei chaan.
Mpha ktai thu kanpa chaan,
Kdet liit kma aṭhil dei chaan,
Mlei mkheng thu apanpaak in; mleija hava naan tummi Jisu Khrista thu Isowr plung bin ka am.
Pthla ser maan;
pau kphuwng miia do ksi kma ngi bin pik maan.
Pdainu do khim khai aparsin naan; kṭha ava knetti akjown chaan,
kṭha kma nong khim khai aser in.
Kdaai ki Isowr mdaksaa katti mkheng apinchel pik inda, ungta naanni Pthla ungu raothla ungta daksaa ava nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista murjun mpha thu, kurhui deek ungta tupsul nra ktaak liitti am in.
Naan ako own kchaan Mma ava lam trin chaak kurhui, ungu Mma ngi ava ktlora.
Ku u knao rek, neen ktummi mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Kchiir khat do put tu kilṭhi ngi ku u knao rek mkheng nga mhai arvui pik chaan.
Hava chethi ava ku u knao rek mkheng hin ado tpat pik chaak nraan, neiji Mukpu miing ngi aka ktham chaak inna.
Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi, naanna aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so.
Poul, Silvanas ungta Timothi ngi nenki Npah Isowr ungu Mukpu Jisu Khrista thu ka am Thessalonikia rek Rinlop hin tha:
Npah Isowr ungu Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai ava ngi aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so.

Ku u knao rek, naan tummi mpha ktai thu neenni Isowr kdo panpaak raan ava kurhui, mleija naan do rin chaak ava kheelli klin ksaang kurthuwkka, ungta naan mii pum ktaiji khat leh khat hin wonsat akurlo in ava karkheel set setta.

Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, naanni suwk kthuwk ado phaak in leh kja kakham ado phaak in mkheng thu ado diil dei in, ungu krin cha thu akurnowl thlit daat lei inni neen kdaksaan ni Isowr Rinlop rek thu kparlin kchaan ping.
Hava Isowr rinkindit do kṭewl mdo tdet na, tditta naanni Isowr Kruwngpaam kira kurhui akurthut nraan, ava leiji naanni kja kakham ado parteel in.
Isowr ri rinkindit kat mdo tlot tu kilṭhi ngi tun tun naan hin kja kakham akpii kchaan rek hin, kja kakham kpinlet pik lamra,
ungta Mukpu Jisu ngi mei kṭuwng thu Mma ki waan tamsii rek ruktang sii tu kilṭhi ngi, parwaanki murjun mpha thu, kja kakham kparteel naan ava neen tu kilṭhi ngi mido trot pik nraan,
Isowr kdei kma rek ungu nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki kṭha paumin kleek mii rek tun mraal kpiira.
Mmaan ava kṭuw knai kma kuk krop chrangki kja kakham ksudu lamra, ungta Mukpu maiṭhuwm leh Mma laarnee ki rutan ava thungki kikneng pthii lamra,
Mma ki kintiing rekki Mma murjun mpha nit thu mdo panpaak nlamra, ungta krin cha mii mkheng plung mdo psum nrang lei, mleija naanni neenki rinpaumin naanni ado rin chaak dok in.

Hava mṭut na kpha dekki neenni naan tumra mpha ktai thu kdo ṭhil chaak in, tditta nenki Isowr do own thu akurhui chaak nraan, ungta kṭha khim khai ungu Mma lamkrin chaki nong ado tlot in ava mrutan tu kilṭhi ngi kurkhumra.
Tditta ava leiji nenki Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee dil kṭoiji, naan thung ngi nenki Mukpu Jisu miing ungta Mma thung ngi naan ado tpanpaak nraan leiki kurthuwk.
Tunva ku u knao rek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista kurjung leh nenni Mma kurdut ṭhira nkunpun nraanki mlei thu, neenni aka ktham chaak inna,

kuk knot reenni aplungbin in mkunchun ma nra mdit mata lungdep akpurthlown ma nraan, Pthla daat don mdit mata pauna daat don, mata neen kihin inki chethi kdujik daat don, Mukpu nit kurjung ava plung chei karche ngi ado bin raan pme.
Talu talu thung daat joso naanna ku mii khat lee ngi ahuwng chmaan so; mleija ru kringi rutan kipteng thlengda ungu Nowlam kleek kmawng chapa mkandan du khim khai mnit ava thlung liit nime,

mma ava mukpu ping ngi kardi da mdit mata luw mdo buk, do khim khai tun ni kipteng, ungu mdaksaa kparlin kcha, tditta ava leiji mma ava Isowr ki luwbuk Inn thu ko ongda, mdaksaa ava Isowr ping ngi kdingi kparyaam da.
Neiji naan aka amṭhiin mpha thu ahin thaanni hava pau kdo saam dok ava bin phaak maan timo?
Ungta tunva Mma ki mpha thu mkandan nra mdo pkhaan pthii ava naanni ado dee in.
Mleija Nowlam kleek ki kukthuk pau ava mdo tlot dok; tun mdo pkhaan mma ava mlo dok du khim khai kapkhaan kcha ngaal.
Ungu audil rongi Nowlam kleek ava kandangra, ungta Mukpu Jisu ngi Mma ner thungki tdaal ava ngi ke eayou ra ungu Mma kandang donle Mma arjunni ke eakrep ra.
Nowlam kleek khat thlen ava seitaan nong tlot tu kilṭhi ngi rutan mkheng ungu titinna rek do tlot ktlo ungta tngana rek,
ungu kmawng chrangki tummi kṭha kma plei knei rek mkheng tu kilṭhira, mleija mmaan mdo ktlan pik nrangki kindit wonsat ava mmaanni pthlei lamda.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da mmaanni kar mak mdo rin chaak nraan mmaanni kar mak nong mdo tlot nraanki Isowr ri mhin thaanni rutan siida,
tditta ava leiji krin kma mkheng nga mraal mdo piik nlamra,rinkindit kma thu ṭhek kinṭheu tir chlamra.

Pdainu Mukpu wonsat lo ku u knao rek, neenni naan mlei thu Isowr hin kdo panpaak chaak kat raan, mleija mupṭhun daat ki Isowr ri ado taktlan chaak nraan Pthla ngi ado tpinchel in ungu kindit ava ado rin chaak nraanki ado tukchol dok in.
Hava leiji Mma ngi nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki laarnee ado phaak chaak nraan, kṭha paumin thu ado tu own chaak in.
Ava mkurthut bi, ku u knao rek, knetti rip in ungta neen kner thungki pauna daat don mdit mata chethi daat don naan hin ado kpurchu chaak in nopa ava knetti arpom chaan.
Tunva nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista mdaksaa ngi nenna wonsat milo chaan da, kṭuw knai kma ki plung ngam mikpii kchaan, nenki Npa Isowr ri plungnee thu kbin cha,
ava naan plung thu plung kngam akpii kcha in kurthuwk so, ungta kṭha nong khim khai leh pau khim khai thu aju kpunchoi pik chraan.
Mṭut na relli ku u knao rek, tditta naan arlakki lulu ngi Mukpu pauna ava kuk notti kurjou da ungta kinreel sii mkurthut nra mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Ungu kṭha kma leh kṭha kma mii rek thungki mido ṭenthuw chaak nraan; mleija mkheng nga krin cha mkurthut ma leiji mhai ṭhil pik chaan.
Pdainu Mukpua lamtrin chaak kurhui; Mma ngi kṭha kma thungki ru aju ptan pik in don ungu akseel chraan.
Ungta neenni pau ado kreen pik inna naanni tlo inti ta tlot ruk tlo naan di kdingi naan mlei thu Mukpu hin plung kapngam psuk chaak inna.
Mukpu ngi naan plung ava Isowr wonsat leh Khrista kdiil dei kcha thu aju ktikhew pik chraan.

Tun va ku u knao rek, naanna nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki miing ngi neenni pau akreen pik inna, tditta howngkva ungu naanni neen kihin ki ado arlaan chaak in nopa kupṭoi kma ku mii khat a u anao in ava aser chaan.
Mleija naan adaksaan ni neen kno ava tak heppi kurchuk nikaan di tdit ado dee dok in; neenni aka am ṭhiin mpha thungva neenna howngva maan ring.

Neenni ku mii khat lee hinki thenpen leemna ngi chaa maan ring, pdainu kdung kpalren innu nong kdo lo in, suwn jaan knai kma nong kdo suk in, tditta neenni naan hin bowr krik ado kpiik maan nrang lei.
Mleija neenki rutan ma amma lei pme, pdainu naanni neen kno akurchu chaak nraan, neen kdaksaan thu akurchu nraan leiki.
Mleija neenni naan aka amṭhiin mpha thu hava paureen na ado kpiik dok in: ku mii khatti nong msuk mata, chaa mso.
Mleija naan arlakki ku mii khatta howngkva ngi amda, nong khat lee sume tdit neenni aryaan nu.
Tunva hanto lu hep daat mii ava ngi rim kdi nong suda ungu mdaksaa rin nra ava atlo so kdingi neenni mmaan ava Mukpu Jisu Khrista miing ngi paureen innu kuk kso chaak inna.
Ku u knao rek, kṭha nong ktlo thu kja ngi karbin maan.
Ku mii khatti hava chethi thungki neen kdo the ava mupṭoi nuwm mabi, mii ava atin chaan, ungu mma ningkja nra, naanva mma ava nong suk ṭhi maan.
Mma ava akahal kchaan heppi suw maan, pdainu a u anao in khat lulu ngi arkowk in.
Tunva kdaai ki Mukpu Mma mdaksaa katti mpha mkheng thu mlei khim khai thu kdaai aju pii chaan so. Mukpu ngi naan akheng inna aju kurthlo ṭhi chaanso.
Poul nei kukhut katti hava kjit nu akurvui chaak inna. Nei kchethi khim khai thu hava ngi titinna kurthuwk, neiji hanto kdo kjit kcholu.
Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi naan akheng nga aju ṭhi chaanso.
Nen mika ktlan pik Isowr ungta nenni plung tbin psuk chaak in Jisu Khrista paureen dil kṭoiji, Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat Poul li,
Krin cha thu kindit nei kchapa Timothi hin:
Kpah Isowr hinki ungta Mukpu Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh wonsat ungu kdaai am so.
Neiji Masidonia tha kvan mpha thu ado kaktham chaak lulu ngi Ephisia thu am daat, tditta msik khat liklik paurin khat kpurchuk mii angṭhe ka am ava, apdown pthii dok lamra pau apṭum pik lam.
Mmaan mdaksaan na nopa paumin leh kṭuw knai kma charuwl paumin thu muplung inna kdim kcha a, tditta krin cha thu Isowr ktong ki kurchuk rang kchang nga plung kpurdun susu ktong tha ka am chlamma.
Nenni ptuwn in minnu pau tupṭum in plung kchiir ungu kṭha poibin ungta krin cha thu plung klut ava wonsat thungki kthuwk jesang.
Mii angṭhea havale thungki mdil in kinle chlamda do ksi kma pau karteen psuk thu kparvai kcha lamma.
Mmaanni tak kthea mdit mata talu leiji pau dak kma kthea tdit kdeipandi kma, Nowlam ki chukpu rek kurthuwk nuwm lamma.
Tunva ku mii khatti Nowlam ava anto katti msintonbi, Nowlam ava kṭha tdit nenni ndee in.

Hava ndee in, tditta rinkindit mii tumra Nowlam ava mdo seem pme pdainu Nowlam kleek leh pau kleek tum, Isowr kdei kma rek leh pnu kirvei rek tum, kchiir kma leh Pthla ktongtha ka am kma rek tum, mpah ke eayou ungu mnuh ke eayou ungu mii ke eayou rek tum,
pang turkuiji kturkui charek, cham turkuiji kturkui, mii kupru rek, plei knei rek, pauhur klou, ungu ktlok murson ava paurin tu kinṭim kma jesang.
Phowl kṭha kpii dei kunlor langlang ki Isowr kṭha paumin nei kihin kthe rang lei mdo tsil ndok dil kṭoiji kurthuwk so.
Nei kihin rutan mikpii kcha, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista Mma ava kpanpaak chaakka, mleija sok kloura neia mhai kchol chda, lam trin chaak kurhui khatti Mma ngi makṭewl da,
chodu va neiji Mma kjowm kcha ngi paunu ungu suwk pthuwk nu ungta ning er lo psuk nu; pdainu neiji Mma wonsat kdo arlaan chaak leiji kdei chdok kma ngi lamkrin kma heppi neiva ktlo dok ping.
Ungta nenki Mukpu plungnee ngi Jisu Khrista thu ka am lamrin leh wonsat tu kilṭhi ngi nei ktumra mhai pluwn pik chda.

Jisu Khrista ngi pnu ktong rek mdo ktlan pik nra dultipaam thu kurjung dida mdo the pau ava mkindit kat kurthuwk ungu kdung ngi tarlaan chaak ra kurhui. Ungta neia pnu ktong rek arlakki kheel dek cha ping;

pdainu kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava Mma krin cha rek hin mkurchu chaak nraan kheel sii ngi nei ki hintha Jisu Khrista Mma ngi mkinreel ki kdiil dei kcha ngi mdiil pik chda, hava leiji neiji wonsat kdo arlaan chaak.
Kṭuw knai kma ki Kruwng, kmaang liit kmara, tdee pchaan ma, khdaat chrel Isowr hin tha, tak kjat chaak ra ungu kṭuw knai liit kma kpanpaak kurthuwk so! Amen.
Kchapa, Timothi nangki mlei thu khulpu rek pauphuwn dok dil kṭoiji, hava pauva nah hinni ksil chaak na a, tditta kṭha ngi ado karnaak ṭhi nra hava pauna rekka asin ton cha,
ungu alamrin chaak leh kṭha pauna ava arpom cha. Mii angṭhe rek va kṭha poibin pthlei lamda mlamrin chaak in thungki arkuwngpii kukui heppi kukui chlamma.
Mmaan arlakki Hymenas leh Alekjandar ri, Isowr kjowm kcha ngi mpau ma nraan mmaanni mkurchu chaak nraan, neiji seitaan hin kparlaan pthii lamma.
Ava leiji ru kri reeppi neiji aka ktham chaakka tditta kṭhil cha, kaktham cha ungu kpanpaak ava mii mkheng tummi ado tlot ra;
kruwng rek ungta kparthaang ngi ka am mii mkheng rek, tditta nenni mlam ktai thu rinkhu kdaaiji, Isowr ktong tha, ungu mii do kjatti ta amra.
Hava ava kṭha, ungta nenna mikaktlan pik Isowr mik sut na thu talo kro.
Mii mkheng ktlan pik da, ungu kindit ava kṭha deek ki kdei cha Mma ngi mdo ngei.
Mleija Isowr khat ka am, ungu Isowr leh mii rek arlakki pau kpurlon khat ka am, dultimii kurthuwkki Jisu Khrista ngi,
mdaksaa ava mii mkheng tummi kṭenthuw rang leiji pii chda, Mma rinkhu paumin ava mpha kcha deekki sakhi hur pikda.
Hava leiji neia pau kparyaam khat ungta kenyee ngi mdo tukchol dok (Neiji mkindit pau kthe kcha ping, plei nei maang), krin cha leh kindit ava ngi ktlok chati rek chukpu khat ping.
Ava leiji mmun ktai thu psel rekki kchiir khut khiingda plung kthi ktaak mdit mata kar ai kalrai ktaakki mdo ṭhil chaak raan ava neiji kngei chaakka.
Anto lulu ngi snu rek ruk va mkul ka am ungu talo kro dona kṭha deekki hiil naada, msam keher mdit mata jeering mdit mata anto lu kdu dona mman klu langlang ngi kurthlong kma,
pdainu kṭha nongtu dhormo kcheel snu rek mkurthut raan.
Snu khatti kdung plung kparneem mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi rim kdi kurchuk chso.
Snu ku khat lee ngi psel rek tun ni kpurchuk mdit mata rutan mdo thloi ra ava neiji ro maang; mma ava rim kdi ma amra.
Mleija ru kri reeppi Adam mdo seem, audilli Ev;
ungta mdo huwn chaakka Adam pme, pdainu snu ungu pnu ktla.
Anto daat joso snu ava ngi mkul ka am deek tu kilṭhi ngi krin cha thu ungu wonsat leh kchiir deek thu mkurnowl thlit bi, nao mupluk thu kaktlan pik chra.
Tithe ava mkindit kat: Ku mii khatti Rinlop thu ber msuk nuwmbi, kṭha sii nong ava mngei chaakka.
Tunva Rinlop ber ksu ava mdang kthi kma, numei khat innpu, plung kparneem, daksaa kurjowng pchaang, mal kokowl dei, kpurchuk dei,
ju knee kma, plung kthi dei kma, pdainu plung kdowng, mii tu kalrai kma, ungu sum kngei kma ra.
Mma ngi mnaole ava mlam khim khai thu kthe kupṭoi ungta mii kakjatti mdo thiik ra, mdaksaa ki phungka ava kṭha ngi mdo loloira.
Mleija miilai khatti mdaksaa ki phungka daat mak klu kṭha ngi mloloi demabi, tak heppi Isowr Rinlop ava mmava tuk ksut pchaang rang da?
Mma ava plungren kuhur ro thok ava rang pme, mleija mnaar klin reenra, ungu dijabowl hin mraal mdo piik ava lulu thu ktla kcha kro.
Kheel sii ngi mma ava duwnki mii rekki kunton dokki mdo kjat rek rek kurthuwk ra, ava che donle mma ngi plung parheel da, dijabowl ktaang thu kman nime.
Anto lulu ngi dekan rek rukka kdung plung klut, plei kanthlaang kma, ju knee nuwm kma, ungu sumlot tun mkraam rang pme;
mmaanni kindit chelki poithuw tu kilṭhi ngi krin chaki kukthuk ava mdo kjown mer chaak raan.
Ungta mmaan rukka ru kri reeppi kpirsin na chlamso; audilli mmaan mdaksaa ava tupsul na ma am mata dekan rek heppi sok alou chlam so.
Anto lulu ngi snu rek ruk va kdung kṭha ngi plung klut, titi ktadah kma, pdainu plung kdowng do mkheng thung ngi lamtrin chaak kurhui mkurthut raan.
Dekan rek rukka numei khat ki innpu ra, ungu mnaole ungta mphungka ava kṭha ngi mdo loloi ra.
Mleija nong kṭha deekki ksu dekan mii rek ava mdaksaa tummi kṭha mdo phaak chaak in ungu Jisu Khrista hin ka am krin cha ava thu kdung plung ngam kpha kcha ruk kurthuwk lam.
Neiji nah hintha kbeiji kthlen ra ava kdo bin chaak,

pdainu nei kukto dok daat luwngta, Isowr ki phungka thu tak heppi tche tatlown rang tdit ado dee nra, neiji hava paurek ava ahin kikjit kcha kurthuwk ping, inn ava kring Isowr ki Rinlop, mkindit kcho.
Nenni dhormo ki kukthuk pau ava klin langlang ngi kurdowl tdit trot dok in:
Mma ava daksaa arling ngi kandang da,
Pthla ngi anto kat mi purthut pik inda,
Waan tamsii rekki dei dok da,
chati rek arlakki karyaam dok da,
dultipaam miingi lamrin chda,
laarnee ngi arjuk lou dok da.
Tunva kindit chelli Pthla ngi theda tditta mii angṭhe ngi diltha pthla rek hin ungu tarnam rek paurin hin, plung var psuk donle mlamrin chaak in thungki kankai chlamra.
Hava ava plei knei rek kṭha do tlot ktlo rek hinki kthuwk.

Hanto lu hep daat mii murson rekki inn knei snu klou rome ungta then murson ava ruk kchaa rome di lamda. Pdainu then ava kindit kdei lamkrin cha mii rekki panpaak da mṭhil chaak diltha tchaak ra mleija Isowr do seem.
Mleija Isowr do seem khim khaija kṭha, ungta panpaak da nenni narlaan bi, tipthlei ra do khat lee ame.
Mleija Isowr ki pauna leh kaktham kcha ngi mdolo kurhui dok.
Nang ngi hava pauna rek ava ku u knao rek plung thu atithiik pik chaakbi, nang nga krin cha ki pauna rek tun ni mdojuw, ungta nah doṭoi kṭha paurin, Jisu Khrista ki kṭha sok klou khat nadi.
Isowr ktaak leh alraangki do ksi kma paumin pṭoi ma. Isowr lamṭoi na thu nah adaksaa ava kurchuk cha.

Mleija daksaa ktongki kurchuk ava mpha mruk daat ki tum, Isowr ktongki ava mlam khim khai thu msit pum, mleija ava ngi tun tunki rinkhu leh karvang rangki rinkhu tum ruk va msit ka am langlang paureel pum.
Kdo the ava anto kat ungu kdung ngi talo chaak ra kurhui.
Mleija mṭut na kpha dekki nenni tapchaan nrangki hava nong nga tsuk, mleija mii mkheng, kheel sii ngi krin cha rek mdo ktlan pik nra, kring Isowr hin nenni plung ngi tbin chaak in.
Pau areen ra ungu hava lea apurchuk.

Nah akselai ava ku mii khat lee ngi do ksi kma ngi bin mso, pdainu nang nga krin cha rek tummi pau ksaam thu ungu ache atlown na thu, wonsat thu, krin cha thu, kchiir deek thu mkurchu chaak naan ni am.
Nei kthlen du khim khai, Laaika kpa, pau kparyaam, kpurchuk thu plung aplut cha.
Karseel loppi aleenni mkhut in mkhiin in mpha thu, khulpu rek pauphuwn nah hin ado tpiik chaak chla ado thloi ava lee sut daak ma.
Mii mkheng ngi nah nong tlot kṭha setset ava mdo dee nraan, hava nong rek atlo ra adaksaa ava karpii cha.
Nah adaksaa leh ado purchu thu plung aplut cha, ava arpom mer cha, mleija hava ktlo ngi nah adaksaa leh akaryaak pik rek kaktlan pik ra.
Upa arkowk ma pdainu apah khat lulu ngi mhin ak ksop cha; ahinni kmo bet ava a u anao lulu ngi atlo,
snu kver ava anuhle lulu, nala kdowng rek ava acher rek lulu ngi plung kseeng mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi abin.
Mkindit katti meikhu kurthuwk rek ava meikhu rek heppi ak kjat.

Meikhu khatti mnaole mdit mata murdu marte mthloi ta, mmaanni mmaan mdak kat inki phungka thu dhormo ki nong ktlo ngi, mnuh mpah hin mruk mdo pinlet pik nra kurchuk chso; mleija hava Isowr do sut na thung ngi talo kro.
Mkindit kat ki meikhunu ungu msangtlaak ki ka am mma ava kdung ngi Isowr kbin cha ungu suwnjaan knai kma ktham sora aṭhil chso.
Pdainu mdaksaa ningthlun nra ktlo ava mma ngi mrin slii daat thu kdiyou cha.
Mmaan thung ngi kar mak ma amma nra, hava pauva areen pik lam.
Ku mii khatti mma riilam kthuwk rek, ungta kheel siingi mma mdaksaa kat phungka thung ngi mpurdon pik mata, ungta mma ngi krin cha thu mmat bi, krin kma rek kepkheel dek kurthuwkka.
Kum som truk kthlung kma lai meikhunuh ava miing kuplut ro me, vei khat pang daatti innknei kurthuwk kro;

ungta kṭha nong ktlo thu plung klut, kṭha ngi nao kjuwk dei, mal kokowl dei, kja kakham kpha rek kpurdon pik dei, kintiing rek khu kulṭhut pik dei, ungu mlam khim khai thu mdaksaa ava kṭha nong ktlo thu plung mvar chaak bi, mmiing kuplut krora.
Pdainu meikhu rek kmo ava mmiing kuplut rome; mleija mmaanni innknei snu klou rangki mbin inbi, Khrista hinki mdil kinle chlamra.
Ungta ava leiji mmaan ava ru kri thokki mpaureel dok in kupkui lamra.

Ava daat kma, mmaanni innbung ktai khuwlai tlowng lamda howngkva kurchuk nlamda, ungu howngkva daat kma pdainu mmaanni mdo the liit ma raan pau the lamda, kho kthe leh daksaa kirsim thu nong pchil lamda.
Ava leiji meikhunuh kmo rekki inn nei da, naolu kthloi, innpaal na ktlo, ungta nen nraal kpii ngi kipteng mii hin mlam kapvan pik kmara ava neiji kngei chaakka.
Mleija mii angṭheva lele dung ngi seitaan dil mṭoi chaakka.
Ku mii khatti krin cha meikhunu snu miilai khat mthloi ta, mma ngi asut pṭoi pik lamso; Rinlop bowr tiprik lam mso, tditta ava leiji mkindit kat ki meikhu rek ksut pṭoi pik chra.
Kṭha deekki ber ksu kver rek kheel siingi pau kparyaam leh kpurchuk nong ktlo rek ava sik kheel dekki takjat chaak lamra.
Mleija Kchiir Laaika ngi theda, “Chavui ado pther slii silpa ner ava ado ktut rang pme,” Ungta “Nong ksu mii ngi marda man mdo arlaan chaak kat ra.”
Anto kat kdingi sakhi kpii ra knii mdit mata kdum kma donle kver khat kupsulli mraal khat lee kpii rome.
Mii murson rekki kṭi ngi ma am nraan, pnu thu kurnowl daat mii ava mii mkheng maiṭhuwm mi mhai arko pik cha.
Ksan ksui khat lee tlo ma, ungta ksan ksui ktaakki hava nopa rek ava ado arkhiik nra, Isowr leh Jisu Khrista ungta mdo kchol Waan tamsii rek maiṭhuwmmi neiji ahin hava pau kakham chaakka.
Ku mii khat lee tun ni kuknot reenni khut khiing ma, mdit mata ktlok miilai khat pnu arve phaak ṭhi ma; adaksaa ava kchiir deekki arkhii cha.
Dii hehe daat nee nowl ma, pdainu apoidun leh akoi de reen leiji rik rou dii mruk ruk anee.
Mii murson rek pnu ava makṭewl du liitti kuntown chdok, pdainu mii murson rek pnu ava dil thang ro ngi kandang lu.
Ava leiji kṭha nong ktlo rek rukka kunton dok; ungta mmaanni pandang liit mjoso, kurdowl pchaang lam pme.
Isowr miing leh mdo purchu pau ava tun ni ku mii khat lee ngi kṭha kma mdo the ma nra, suwk owr rek va bowr krik kuhur mkheng kakjat mkheng kuhui mkurthut lulu ngi, mmaan ki kpu rek ava akjat lamso.

Krin cha slii kpu kthloi cha rekki mmaan ki mu u mnao in mkurthut leiji, mmaan ava do ksi kma thleerri ktlo rome, mmaan sok klou kpha kcha rek ki krin cha leh wonsat kthloi mkurthut lei inni mmaan va kheel set setti sok alou chlam so.
Havale apurchuk ra aparyaam pik lam.
Ku mii khatti pau msik khat liklik purchuk da ungta nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki pauna rek krowl ava mrot ma, ungu Isowr ktongki kpurchuk thu kinṭim mkurthut mabi,

mma ava pleiknei mnaar linna ngaal, mma ngi do khat lee dei me; pauna rek mlei thu mma ngi do ksi kma poibin leh kar ai kalrai ungu karteen, pthuwkda, ava dothuw ṭhia changtlaak, ksinchaak, titi ktadah, kju kva poibin,
kindit kthloi kma arthluwk ktaak lulu ngi mii rek arlakki pau karteen psuk nlamda, tditta Isowr ktong ki ava tphaak chaak kro pak da kdingi bin lamda hava mkheng nga kthuwk.
Dhormo kṭha ngi kchet miilai ava, mdo thloi chaak thu ning kthlung mkurthut bi ava suwang.
Mleija nenni dultipaam thu do khat lee tsin in pme, ungta nenni dultipaam thungki do khat lee talo pchaan in pme;
pdainu nenni then leh dona nathloi chaak inbi ava tu kilṭhi ngi nenna ning kthlung tkurthut raan.
Pdainu suwang kthuwk nuwm rek ava kepthleem thu, ktaang thu, mong kukto poibin leh klim poibin knempok mii rek ava kar eakrep lamda ungu mkro chaak naan kurthuwk.
Mleija sum kngeija kṭha kma mkheng thuwna; hava kngei mii angṭhea mlamrin chaak thuwn ki tlowng parvai lamda ungu kja kakham knem pokki muplung inna kchei do thun heppi mdo ṭhen.
Pdainu Isowr mii, nah atumva, hava mkheng nga akdaan cha; ungta rinkindit, Isowr ktongki rinkhu, krin cha, wonsat, kdiil dei, plung kparneem, ava aptuwn cha.
Krin chaki kṭha rawl kurduk ṭhi ava akurduk ṭhi cha; kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu arpom cha, sakhi rek knempok maiṭhuwm mi nong ngi kṭha deekki athe thut mpha thu ado tu own chaak dok.
Do mkheng ava rinkhu kpii kcha Isowr ungta Pontias Pilot hin kṭha deekki ado the thut naki sakhi akpiik pik Jisu Khrista maiṭhuwm mi, Mma ki rinpaumin ava,
nah hinni neiji ksil chaak na a. Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista mkandan du khim khai Mma paureen ava kurhui deekki ktobor ktaak liitti ado arkhiik chaak nra neiji pau kakham chaakka.
Ungta hava phowl kṭha kpii dei khdaat chrel Mkinreel riim, kruwng rekki Kruwng, mukpu rekki Mukpu,

ku mii khat lee do dee ma mdit mata do dee pchaan ma, kdiyou liit kmara Mma hin daat ungta titnel pchaanma mar awng thu ka am, Mma mpha kcha deekki kandang ra. Tak kjat kurhui ungu kṭuw knai kma Kpaal ava Mma. Amen.

Hava dultipaam thu suwang kthuwk tumva, mmaanni napal mdo tlot ma nraan, mdit mata kmawng chra suwangthuw tuwn ni plung mdo var ma nraan, pdainu nen tkanpat chaak nraan do khim khai mi kuptlon pik nenki Isowr hin tha, mmaanni plung mdo piik nraan, mhin inni pau akham pik lam.
Kṭha nong ktlo ngi suwang mkurthuw nraan, mmaanni kṭha atlo lamso, changtlaak ktaak ungta plung kneiji apii chlamso.
Tditta mmaanni rinkhu katki rinkhu ava mdo arpom chaak nraan, dilki tummi kṭha innmun kapṭhang kurthuwkki, mmaan mdaksaan tumra apurtuwl chlam so.
O, Timothi, nah hinni ado tsil chaak na ava kṭha deekki arkhii cha. “Kdei dok” Ava thungki kthuwk do ksi kma pau leh Isowr lamkrin kma luki pau pang the ngi kthe ava aser cha.
Mleija “Kdei dok” ava mii angṭhe ngi mdo phaak chaak nuwm leiji krin cha ki kbii nam mapmaan pthiinna. Plungnee ngi aju kurthlo ṭhi chso.
Jisu Khrista thungki rinkhu ava paureel dil kṭoiji Isowr poibin Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat, Poul,
neiji wonsat kdolo knaopa Timothi hintha: nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista leh Mpah Isowr ki plungnee, wonsat ungta kdaai am so.
Nei kpahle do tlot lulu ngi, neiji kdet liit kma kṭhil chaak mpha thu, nah aju bin phaak chnu, kuplung ril kindit tu kilṭhi ngi, neiji sok kdolo chaak Isowr ava kpanpaak chaakka.
Tditta kanpa ava ngi kuplung mdim chaak nra, nah arthli kbu bin phaak chnu, suwn jaan knai kma, aju kurdut ṭhi nuwm chnu.

Nang ngi plung ril kurthlutti ado rin chaak ava neiji bin phaak nu, tditta ru kri reeppi nah apii Lois leh anuh Eunas lengi mdo thloi in krin cha ava tunva nah athung ngi ka am munra kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.
Tditta neiji nah leenni kukhut kdo khiin ava ngi nah thung ngi ka am Isowr chla ava mei heppi aṭuwn nra neiji aju kbin phaak chaakka.
Mleija Isowr va kṭi ki Pthla mipii me, pdainu rutan ungta wonsat ungu daksaa kurjowng ki Pthla mido tpiik chaak in.
Ava mkurthutbi, nenki Mukpu, mdit mata Mma tummi rowng inn thu ka am nei klei thu, sakhi kpii thung ngi aning tapjak ma, pdainu Isowr ki rutan thu kṭha paumin tummi, kja kakham mhai phaak ṭhi cha.
Mma ngi nenna mi ktlan pik inda ungta Kchiir do own khatti mi own chda, nong tlot lei pme pdainu Mma poibin mleithu ungu mpha roi ksot thu nen nhin mido tpiik chaak in Jisu Khrista ki plungnee thu,
ungta tunva nen mi kaktlan pik Jisu Khrista do pandan thu mi tdet chda, Mma ngi kdiyou ea krep da ungu kṭha paumin thu mar awng ki kdiyou kro liit kma rinkhu mithuw ṭhi pik da.
Mleija hava kṭha paumin ava tummi neia kparyaam, ungu kenyee ungta chukpu khatti mhai kchol chda,

ungu ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, neiji kja kakham ava anto heppi kdo phaak chaak. Pdainu neia kning kjak me, mleija klam rin chaakka neiji kdee, ungta nei ki hin mdo tsil chaak na Nit ava mphaak du khim khai, Mma ngi mhai kseel pchaang ra kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.
Jisu Khrista thu ka am krin cha leh wonsat thu, nei kihin ki nang ngi ado aryaak chaak dok pauna rek krowl dil ṭoiji apṭoi cha.
Nah hinni ado tsil ndok kindit ava nen nthung ngi ka am Pthla Kchiir ava ngi aseel chaak na.
Mmaan arlakki Phygilas leh Harmoginis tu kilṭhi ngi Asia thu ka am mii mkheng nei ki hinki mdil kinle chtir lam ava nang ngi ado dee dok.
Mukpu ngi Onesiphoras phungka ava wonsat alo chso, mleija mpha ktai thu mma ngi kuplung mhai tapngam pik chda, thiirri ngi nei mdo tbowl leiji mma va mning pjak me,
pdainu mma ngi Romia mthlun mpha thu, kdung ngi nei mthlaam chda, mhai pha da.
Nit ava thu Mukpu hinki wonsat mma ngi mdo phaak chaak nra, Mukpu ngi mma ava arot pik chso. Ungta mma ngi Ephisia thu kdung ngi nei sok mdo talo chaak ava kṭha jikki nang ngi ado dee dok.
Ava mkurthutbi, nei kchapa, nang nga Jisu Khrista thu plungnee ngi arutang so.
Ungta sakhi rek knempok maiṭhuwm mi nei ki hinki ado aryaak dok ava mii murson rek hin ruk va kpurchuk pchaang ra lamtrin kro mii rek hin asilna.
Jisu Khrista ki kṭha rawlmii khat heppi kja kakham mhai phaak ṭhi cha.
Mnong ktlo slii rawlmii khatti mma nong kuptlot pik mii ava ning mdo pthlun nrang leiji miicham nong khat lee tu kurchou nme.
Klee kchen kparteek ava mma ngi nopa dil kṭoiji mchen partee mabi mma ngi laarkhum pha chme.
Kpalren da nong klou loumii ava ngi mthei ava ru kri verri mdo phaak chaak ra.
Nei kdo the ava abin rim, mleija Mukpu ngi do khim khai ki kdeipandi kcha ava nah hinni akpii chra.
Neiji kṭha paumin thu, Devid charuwl thungki, kdiyou dok thungki kring kinle Jisu Khrista kdo paryaam ava abin phaak cha.
Hava kṭha paumin tummi, kpar mak khat lulu ngi kja kakham kpha thu ungta mdo tbowl. Pdainu Isowr ki pauna ava bowl me.
Ava leiji, mdo kchol dok rek tummi neiva do khim khaija kdo diil chaak, tditta mmaan ruk va kṭuw knai kma ki laarnee tu kilṭhi ngi Jisu Khrista thu kirliinna kpha kcha kro lam.
Hanto katti the da,
“Mma tu kilṭhi ngi nenni ndiyo bi,
Mma tu kilṭhi ngi ring che naan;
nenni ndiil pchaan inbi,
Mma tu kilṭhi ngi nen rukka tpaalra;
nenni Mma nipthleibi,
Mma rukva nenna mi kipthleira.
Nenna lamtrin kurhui mjown min,
Mma ava lamtrin chaak kurhuiji ka am daat,
mleija Mma ngi mdaksaa mat pchaang me.”
Hava abin phaak cha, kṭha thuwna kma, mkaryaa mii kar ea krena, pauna rek mlei karteenna thu, mdo kdaan nraan, Mukpu maiṭhuwmmi mmaanna pau mhai reen pik lam.
Kindit pauna ava kindit deekki purchuk da, ningkja ktaak liitti nong klou khat heppi Isowr do rot khat lulu ngi nah adaksaa ava kṭha deekki Mma hin apii cha.
Isowr kbin kma mii ngi pang pauvi mpau in thungki aser daak lam, mleija hanto lamkla set setti miirek ava Isowr ktaakki kuhowl pthii lamra.
Ungta mpau inna arnai doso heppi kso you lamra. Hymenas leh Philetas ava mmaan arlakki rek lam.
Kring karheel ava kvei dokka, kdingi kindit ava krin cha rek mii angṭhe plung tpinle pthii tir lamda.
Pdainu knetti Isowr do pṭhan dokka hava kbii nam pummi krip daat: “Mukpu va Mma miirek ka mdee,” Ungta “Mukpu miing kthe mii pum ktaiji kar mak nong mdo tlot thungki adown pthiiso.”
Inn klin khat thungva jeering leh thiir kpowl uwm daat ka am ava pme pdainu dingbeel leh tnek beel ruk ka am, ungta angṭhea kunton dokki mdo sinton ra, angṭhea pang sinni mdo sinra.

Ku mii khatti mdaksaa ava do ksi kma thungki mkartleu chaakbi, ava dil rongi mma ava kunton dok beel khat kurthuwk ra, mdo partleu dok ungu innkpu tummi do ksi langlang, kṭha nong khim khai thu kurchuwl dok cha.
Ava leiji ksenao do ngei thungki achen daak, ungta plung kseeng ngi Mukpu miing ku own kcha rek tu kilṭhi ngi, rinkindit, krin cha, wonsat ungu kdaai ava aptuwn cha.
Ka aak, mong kukto, mii chei kparche, do khat lee ktlo rome; mṭut na ava kar ae kalrai na tdit nang ngi ado dee dok.
Ungta Mukpu sra owr ava kar ea kalrai nrang ava pme pdainu mii pum ktai hin wonsat kthloi, kpurchuk dei, kakhaang dei,
kipteng rek ava plung kparneem mi kpindit pik kurthuwk ra. Isowr ngi rot pik donle mmaanni plung pinle da ungu kindit kdei kcha kro ra.
Ungta mma poibin ktlora dijabowlli mkjown dok lam diltha, dijabowl ktaang thungki mmaanni mkarthle chaak nraan leiki.
Pdainu hava adei pandi cha, tditta mṭut na nit rek thungva mpha ava kparsa langlang ngi kthuwk ra.
Mleija miirekka mdaksaa wonsat klo, sum kngei, napal ktlo, kpohok, mii krai cha, mnuh mpah pau kleek, plung ksel, kbuwr,
dultimii wonsat ktaak, tparmet kro kmarek, titi ktadah, ktlou dei, plung thit kdet,
plei knei, mpau kdet, kṭha kipder, napalli kdim, Isowr wonsat klo rang kchang nga kanthle ktardou kngei,
dhormo kdujik karpom pdainu ava ki rutan kipthlei, miirek ava aser cha.
Mleija mmaan mii angṭhe ngi innbung ktai tlowng lamda, pnu ngi mbowr in rik da, ungu mpoibin in thu chet lamda, kapchaang chliit kma snu rek kjowng lamda,
mmaanna mpha ktai thu kurchuk chnuwm lam pdainu mkindit kdei pchaang chliit kma rek kjowng lamda.
Jennes leh Jambras ava ngi Mousi mdo pten in lulu ngi, plung bin ktobor ungu krin cha kipthlei mii rek va kindit ava pteng lamda.
Pdainu lam klangi pha chlam nime, hava miilai knii rek lulu ngi, ma aah chaak inna mii mkheng ngi kdeira.
Tunva nang nga nei ado kpurchu, nei knopa, nei krinkhu doptuwn, nei kdo rin chaak, nei kdo diil, knet merri ka am nei kwonsat,

nei ksuwk thuw, nei kjat kakham, Antia thu, Ikoniam thu, Lystra thu nei kleen kthuwk, tak hep kdulu ki suwkthuw neiva kdiil tdit nang ngi ado dee dok; joso ava mkheng thungki Mukpu ngi mdo tiṭenthuw chaak.
Jisu Khrista thung ngi Isowr ktongki rinkhu ngi ka am nuwm mii mkheng ngi suwkthuw mdo phaak kat kat ra.
Kṭha kma mii rek leh kpurtut dei rekki mii huwng chlam da ungta huwn chaak donle karkheel set setti ktipthit lamra.
Pdainu nah atumva, nang ngi tak kurchuk cha pti tdit knetti ado rin chaak thung ngi anowl thlit cha, ku hinki kurchuk cha pti tdit ado dee ra,
ungu Jisu Khrista krin cha thu akirliin chaak nra nah akthe pik pchaang kurdowl jiik ava rek tu kilṭhi ngi, amot daat ki kurchuk dok cha pti tdit ado deera.
Kchiir Laaika mkheng nga Isowr tdaal ungta kpurchuk tum, karkowk ki tum, kipjiir pikki tum, ungu rinkindit tummi kurchuk cha kro,
tditta Isowr mii ava kṭha nong khim khai thu kurkhummi kurchuk dok cha.
Isowr maiṭhuwm leh kdiyou mii rek leh kring mii rek kekṭewl rangki Jisu Khrista maiṭhuwm, ungta Mma kandan leh Mma Kruwngpaam ktham nu neiji aksil chaak na a:
pauna ava aparyaam, mkaal thung ruk mkaal kma thung ruk kuknotti atlo, atuprot, arkowk, ungu aksop, kdiil cha mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi apurchuk.
Mleija mii rekki paurin ava mdo dee pchaan ma nraan ki mpha karvangra, pdainu maknaa in kapdak, mmaan mdak kat in do ngeiji kpurchuk chukpu rek ava mmaan mdaksaa inni kthlaam purkuk lamra.
Ungta kindit ti knaa ktikiin thungki kinlet daak lam donle paumin tseem ktong thang ngi plung kpii lamra.
Nah atumva mpha ktai thu kurthlong, kja kakham akhaang dei cha, paumin kparyaam ki nong atlo, anong tlot ava apurkhum cha.
Mleija neia tlaai kdown kpha thu kirsim dok kcha ping; nei ksun chaak nrang ki mpha ava kveija.
Kṭha rawl kdu ava neiji kukurduk ṭhi dokka, kchen kparteek kupṭut dokka, krin cha ava neiji kdan chaakka.

Ungta tunva rinkindit ki luwkhum ava nei ktumra mti thiik pikka, rinkindit kekṭewl Mukpu Nit ava thu nei ki hinni mhai kpii chra, ungu ava nei ki hin daat rang pme pdainu Mma kandan ra wonsat klo cha mii mkheng tum ruk kurthuwk.
Nei ki hinni kbeiji athlen nra ru alou cha.
Mleija Demas ava ngi tun tunki dultipaam wonsat loda mhai ma pthiida Thessalonikia tha kunsun kcha a, Kresen ni Galatia tha, Titas ava ngi Dalmatia tha kunsun lamma.
Luk mthina daatti neia mta am ṭhia. Nang ngi Mak athlaamra arvan ṭhi; mleija nei sok muklo cha thu mma ava do ksi langlang kurthuwk.
Tikhikas ava neiji Ephisia tha ksii dokka.
Troas thu Karpas hintha neiji kdo maak kiphrik leh klairik rek, ungta kheel siingi saavun jiik phel mkheng ava nang ngi arvan mpha thu mhai hur pik cha.
Thiir ksa Alekjander ri nei sul mdo tpurnul nra kdung tlo da; mma nong tlot dil kṭoiji Mukpu ngi kthul pik ra.
Mma hin nah adaksaa ava cheek karsin cha, mleija nen npau paryaam inna mma va kapchai reenni rome.
Ru kri reeppi neiji kakarthe loi chaak nathu nei kuktong tha ku khat lee ame; mkheng inni mat tmaak pthii lamma. Mmaan mraal kpiia kurthuwk mso!

Pdainu ktlok chati rek mkheng ngi mdo aryaak chaak nra, Mukpu ngi kbe tekki ripda ungu kurhummi paumin kdo paryaam chaak nrangki rutan mpii chda. Ava leiji neia humpii smang ner thungki mṭenthuw chda.
Mukpu ngi kṭha kmakhim khai thungki mṭenthuwda ungu Mma parwaan Kruwngpaam kira mhai ktlan chda. Mma ava kṭuw knai liit kma mlaar knei kurthuwk so. Amen.
Prisila leh Akuila ungta Onesiphoras phungka rekka leer khatti kurvui chaak lamma.
Erastas ava Korinthia tha neiji kmaak daat; Trophimas ava kukoi daatti Miletas tha kdo maak daat.
Phalbi mvee dungi athlen nra ru mhailo pik cha. Eubulas, Pudens ungu Linas leh Kloudia ungta ku u knao rek mkheng ngi aturvui chaak lamma.
Mukpu ngi nah pthla ava kurthlo ṭhi so. Plungnee ngi aju ṭhi chso.
Isowr sra owr khat ungta Jisu Khrista ki kenyee Poul li, Isowr do kchol dok krin cha rek ungta mmaanni Isowr ktongki mkindit ava kheel sii kdei dok kcha tu kilṭhi ngi,
kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu kbin cha ava plei knei liit kma, kum roi ksot thu Isowr ri paureel dok da,
ungta mpha kcha deek pau kparyaam thu Mma pauna ava mi pandan pik chaanda, ava thu neia nen mi kaktlan pik in Isowr ki pauṭummi mhai sil chaak nda.
Krin cha khat thu kinṭim chak, kinditti neiki knaopa Titas hintha: Kpah Isowr ungu nen mi kaktlan pik in Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh kdaai am so. Kretia thu Titas Nongtlot
Ava leiji neiji Kretia thu ado kmaak daat, tditta nang ngi kuhup ado tuphut nra, ungu neiji ado kparseel dok lulu ngi khuwpii khim khai thu kver rek ak kchol:
mii ava ngi kar mak nong mtlot ma, numei khat innpu mkurthut ra, ungu mnaole ngi krin cha mkurthuwra, ungta tlouda mii krai kma mdit mata kbom dei mii ava ak chol.
Mleija ber ksu khat va Isowr vaiklou lulu ngi, kar mak nong ktlo kma; kpohok kma, mdit mata plung kthi dei kma, mdit mata ju knee kma, mii ka ai krai kma, kak kraam kma,
pdainu plung knei, kṭha wonsat klo, mdaksaa kpu kurthuwk, kinditti krip, kseeng, ungu mdaksaa kurjowng pchaang, mii ava mkurthut ra.
Kindit paumin ki pauna thu mma ava knetti ma amra, tditta mma ngi mii murson hin kṭha paurin mdo purchu pchaan nra ungta pau kleek rek do parma thungki ktidet pik mkurthut ra.
Mleija pau kleek mii rek, pang pauvi kpau, mii kuhuwng kcha kheel siingi vunmor kreen rek lop mii ava knempokki ka am lam.
Mmaanna rim kdi ma am raan, mleija mmaanni sum mdo lot chaak nraanni, mdo purchu liit ma raan ava purchuk lamda, phungka mkheng nga pkui pthii tir lamda.
Msingreel in thungki khat, mmaan ki khulpu katti theda, “Kretia rekka mpha ktai thu plei knei lam, kṭha kma saa rek, howngkva poibuwr kparjaa rek lam.”
Hava rinpaumin ava mkindit kat kurthuwk. Ava leiji, mmaanni Jihudia rek do seem paumin thu mdit mata kindit kipthlei mii rek pau pṭum thu plung mdo var ma nraan,
krin cha thu kindit mkurthut nraan, kapchaiji mhai arko pik chlam.
Kchiir deek mii ava hin thang va do mkheng nga kchiir, pdainu ktobor leh krin kma mii ava hin thangva, kchiir khat lee ame; mmaan poibin leh muplung thuw inna ktobor.
Mmaanni Isowr kdei ping kdingi karthe loi lamda, pdainu mnong tlot inni Mma ava mat lamda; mmaanna tipder kirvei pau kleek, kṭha ktlo thu msit ktaak rek lam.
Pdainu nah atumva paurin do rot ava kat daat apurchuk.
Pselpa kver rekki plung kdowng, plung klut, plung kuk kjowng, kdung krin cha, wonsat kthloi, ungu kdiil dei mkurthut nraan mhai the pik cha.
Snu kver rek ki anto lulu ngi mlam chet Kṭha, kho kthe kma, ungu ju knee ki suwk mkurthut ma nraan mhai the pik lam; kṭha ava mmaanni apurchuk lamso,
ungu snu kmo rekki mmaan ki innpu rek leh mnao le wonsat mdolo nra,
plung kurjowng pchaang, plung kchiir, inn nong kipning, plung knei, mi innpu kurdu ngi ma am nraan apurchuk, tditta ava ngi Isowr pauna kṭha kma ngi the psuk lam nime.
Anto lulu ngi pselnao rekki mdaksaan mkurjown pchaan nraan mhai the pik chlam.
Mleija mkheng thung ngi nah adaksaa ava kṭha nong ngi atidet cha, ungu ado purchu thu plung klut plung ktippi atlo.
Mii ngi ado tithe chaak ma nra kṭha pauvi asaam, tditta nen nlei thu kṭha kma mdo the ma nraan, nen mi kro kma rekka ningkja apii lam.
Suwk owr rekki mmaan ki kpu rek tingi kṭi ngi ma am nraan, ungu mlei khim khai thu mning thlun naan mdo tlot nraan; pau mdo arthaan purlu jowk jowk ma nraan,
mdo alrowt lam ma nraan, pdainu mkheng thu kindit tloda mdo tdet nlamra mhai the pik cha, tditta mmaanni do khim khai thu nen mi kaktlan pik Isowr paurin ktapṭhat bet kurthuwk ra.
Mleija mii mkheng kirliin chaak nra Isowr plungnee kandang nga,
Plungnee ava Isowr ktaakki ka am ungta dultipaam ktongki kngei thungki tmaak pthii nra, ungu plung kparneem, kindit deekki krip, Isowr ktongki rinkhu ngi hava dultipaam thu ta am nra, mii the pik da,
nenni plung ngi tbin chaak in klin langlang nenki Isowr leh nen mi kaktlan pik in Jisu Khrista ki laarnee kandang ra ava nenni tardat chaak in.
Nen pnu ton mkheng thungki mi kṭenthuw ra, ungta kṭha nong ktlo tummi plung klut Mma mii rek ava Mma tummi mdo partleu pik nlamra, Mma ngi nen ntumra mdaksaa kpii cha kurthuwk.
Hava lea athethuw dok; aksop lam, ungu rutan pum mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi mhai rai pik chlam. Ku mii khat lee ngi do ksi kma aju bin mso.
Mmaanni paam kpu rek leh rutan kthloi rek tingi ma am nraan, kthe kupṭoi, plung ktip nong khim khai thu mkirsim nraan,
ku mii khat lee tun ni kṭha kma pau mdo the ma nraan, kalrai mdo ser nraan, mii mkheng hinni plung kparneem ungu plung kdowng mdo tdet nraan atipbin phaak chlam.

Mleija nen ndaksaa ava mpha khat thungva ka aak in pmin, pau kleek, lele tha kchet, do knempok kngei, ungu kanthle ktardou ki sowk rek, nenki nit ava khusiir parthit na leh khei kthe ngi tpartlai pthii in, mii do pder chaak ungta khat leh khat kipder cha ngi ta am in.
Pdainu nen mi kaktlan pik Isowr ki kṭha ungu wonsat mkandan thungta,

Mma ngi mi hai ktlan chaan da, ava nenki rinkindit nong tatlot lei inki pme, pdainu Mma mdaksaa kat ki wonsat dil kṭoiji, Mma ngi nenna veikhat kpurlu kcha ki kulṭhutti Pthla Kchiir ri ren mi pur owl inda mi ktlan pik chaan da.
