Nen mi kaktlan pik in Jisu Khrista thung ngi mido taptlon pik in.
Tditta Mma plungnee ngi mido tpindit pik chaak nraan, ungu kṭuw knai kma kbin cha ki alrou mi paphaak chaan da.
Mdo thea kindit kat.
Hava pau ava Isowr krin cha rekki kṭha nong ktlo cha thu mdaksaan ni plung mdo plut nraan nang ngi ado namduwl lamra ava neiji kngei chaakka; hava lea mii rek tummi mkinreel li kṭha.
Pdainu ka aak mii pauvi parjuk kparhai, suruwl ktai, kar ai kalrai, ungu Nowlam tummi kalrai mhai ser pik cha, mleija mmaanna mkat na ktaak ungta do ksi pme.
Kṭhen ktupthuwk miilai ava veikhat mdit mata veiknii ngi mhin pau akham pik dok diltha, mhin pau khat lee the ma.
Hanto lu kdu mii ava mthina ngi mraal karpii kcha, ktobor ungu pnu kirvei tdit ado deera.
Neiji Artimas mdit mata Tikikhas ava nah hinni ksii lam mpha thu, Nikopolis tha nei ki hin tha arvan nra ru mhailo pik cha, mleija phalbi lik thungva ava tha am daat nik di.
Kekṭewl rek Yenas leh Apollo ava mlam thaan ado dak pik lam nra mhai tlot pik cha; kvaat khat ma amma nra mhai sut pik chlam.
Ungta nen nmii rekki thei kchui kma mkurthut ma nraan, kuknot kat lu thu mdo purdon pik nraan, kṭha nong ktlo thu mmaan mdaksaa ava kurchuk chlam so.
Nei kdo amṭhi rek mii mkheng ngi leer khatti aturvui chaakka. Krin cha thu nen wonsat mi klo rekka kurvui chaak lamma. Plungnee ngi naan akheng nga aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so.
Jisu Khrista tummi rowng inn thu ka am Poul nei leh nenki nu u nnao in Timothi ngi, neen kwonsat lo in knong suk ṭhiin Philemon
ungu neen kchernu in Apphia ungta rawlmii kdo kurthut ṭhiin Arkhipas leh nah inn thungki Rinlop hin tha:
Nenki Npah Isowr leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki kdaai leh plungnee am so.
Neiji kṭhil chaak mpha thu nah aju bin phaak nu, Isowr kdo panpaak chaak thlit lu,
mleija Mukpu Jisu leh kintiing rek mkheng hin tha nah awonsat leh krin cha thu ado thloi ava aryaa nu,
ungbi nei kdo ṭhil chaak ava Khrista tu rinkhu khdaatti ka am lamrin ava ngi nang tu plap khat kurthuwkki, phowl kṭha khim khai kheel set setti tdee pandit chaak nraan leiki.
Mleija nah wonsatti neia kdung ngi kanpa kcha ungu plung ngam kpha kcha kurthuwk ping, mleija ku u knao, nah Isowr mii rek mkheng plung ngam khat pti.
Ava dil kṭoiji, ado tlot nra ava nang ngi ado tlot chaak nra, nah hinni pau kupṭum ki plung ktangar ava kokhoppi kdo thloi,
anto daat joso wonsat leiji Jisu Khrista tummi tun ruk va rowng inn thu ka am Poul nei kurthuwk chdat joringva kchang kdonni aka ktham chaakka.
Rowng inn thu ka am mpha thu Pthla ktong ki mpah kurthuwk neiji kchapa Onesimas tummi kak ktham chaakka.
Mpha khat thu mma ava nah hin do ksi cha pme, pdainu tunva mma ava nah tum ruk ungu nei ktum ruk va do ksi langlang cha.
Nei kuplung kat kurthuwk mma ava neiji nah hinni ksii pinlet chaakka.
Tditta mma ngi nah kchang donda kṭha paumin tummi neiji rowng inn thu ka am daat thu, sok mhai klo chra plung kngam rek rekki neiji mma ava kdo thiik chaak nuwm.
Pdainu nah plung ṭhat ava namtrom mkurthut ma nra, pdainu nah plungbin daat mkurthut nra, nah poibin ktaakki neiji do khat lee tlo nuwm maang.
Mdit mata mma ava nang ngi ado thloi pinlet thlit daat nra, hava leiji mpha mruk tummi lam karlat dok kro in pti.

Mma ava suwk owr khat lulu kma, pdainu suwk owr khat kipkheel dekki, nei ki hin thangva wonsat kdolo rek rek ku u knao khat kurthuwk pdainu nah ahin thangva daksaa ktong thang ruk Mukpu ktong thang ruk tija pang thu wonsat adolo kurthuwk chdaat rang.
Ava leiji nah plap pi neia atbin ta, nei ado tkowl chaak rang heppi, mma ava mhai kowl pik cha.
Mma ngi nah ahinni kar mak mdo tlot mkheng mdit mata mleituwl ma amta, ava nei kleenlei thu mhai tpom pik cha.
Poul nei kukhut katti hava kdo kjit chaak, neiji choi chdaat nikdinah adaksaa kat ruk nei kihin lei ktuwl dinu kdo thena ava pme.
Oji, ku u knao, Mukpu miing ngi nah hinki kbom cha neiji kngei chaakka. Khrista miing ngi nei kuplung mhai pngam pik cha.
Nang ngi pau ado pṭoi ava kuplung thu knet merri neiji bin chnu, ava lei ahinni neiji kdo kjit chaak kurthuwk, tditta nei kdo the kipkheel dekki nangva tlo munna kdingi kbin chaakka.
Ava daat kma, neiji malpa ngi kthlun chaak nra ktumra innka khat mhai purchuwl pik cha, mleija nah doṭhil chaak ava ak krot pik ra kdingi neiji kbin chaakka.
Jisu Khrista thu neiji rowng inn thu kdo amṭhi Epaphratas,
ungu Mak, Aristarkhas, Demas leh nei knong suk ṭhi Luk mmaanni leer khatti aturvui chaak lamma.
Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ngi apthla akurthlo ṭhi chso.
Alraangva Isowr ri npahle hin thangva mlam msik msik knempokki khulpu rek hin pau theda,
pdainu hava mṭut na nit rek thungva Mma ngi Mchapa thung ngi mi pau pik inda, Mma ava do mkhengki alrou kpha chrang ngi kchol da, Mma thu dultipaam ava pṭhang da.

Mma ava Isowr laarnee ngi ownda, ungta Mma nopa kat ava louda, dultipaam ava Mma rutan ki pauna ngi tpa am da. Pnu leiji Mma ngi kpartleu mtlot diltha, kparthaang sii kinreel ava khut chang ktong tha Mma ngi ku ongda.
Mma ngi miing mdo phaak ava mmaan hinva kheel sii ngi kinreel mkurthut lulu ngi, Waan tamsii rek hinva Mma ngi kinreel sii.
Mleija Isowr ri Waan tamsii khat hin theda,
“Nah Nei Kchapa pti,
snii ngi akupluk chaakka.”
Mdit mata veikhat nowlli,
“Neia Mma Pah kurthuwk nik di,
ungu Mma Nei ki hin thangva Kchapa kat ra.”
Ungta vei khat nowlli ru kri verri kṭou ava Mma ngi dultipaam thu murjun ṭhi mpha thu, Mma ngi the da,
“Isowr Tamsii rek mkheng ngi Mma ava luw abuk lamso.”
Tamsii rek mlei thu Mma ngi theda,
“Mma ngi Waan tamsii rekka tarthli
ungta Msra owr rekka mei kṭuwng tpur owlda.”
Pdainu Mchapa mlei thu Mma ngi the da,
Nah ako onna ava, O Isowr ṭuwnai liit nime,
Nah Akruwngpaam ki rinkindit rek paal ava mkindit kat.
Nang ngi rinkindit wonsat lo tinu,
ungta Nowlam kupṭoi kma ava pder chtinu;
ava leiji Isowr, Nangki Isowr ri akchol da,
Nah plap rek tipkheel dek da kanpa ki thao apubul chda.’
Ungta, “Mukpu Nang ngi,
mupṭhun daat ki dultipaam pṭhang tinu,
ungu Parwaan na Nah akhut nong tlot;
mmaanna kmawng chra,
pdainu Nah ka am thlit daat pti;
dona heppi mmaan mkheng nga kchuwl chlamra,
buw lulu mmaanna thlep pthii lam nadi,
ungta mmaan na karthleng chra,
pdainu Nah anto ka am thlit chdaat pti,
ungu Nah akumma ṭuwnai me.”
Pdainu Mma ngi Waan tamsii khat hin theda,
“Nah aksnuwm kma rek akhu tingi
kthiik du khim khai Nei ku khut chang
ktong tha ku ong cha.”
Kirliing kpha chrang rek tummi sok klou pik ra ado sii,
mkheng ava Pthla rek sok klou slii ava pmemo?
Ava leiji, nenna mi kjuwn ṭhi dok kro in pmin kdingi taryaak dok in ava thu knai betti plung plut inche.
Mleija Waan tamsii rek dothe thut dok paumin ava kindit mkurthut bi, ungu pnu ktla mdit mata pau kleek ki mdo tlot in lulu ngi mraal kpha chra.
Nenna klin langlang ki kirliing kcha nkurthut maannu tak heppi tkarthle raan da? Mukpu ngi ru kri reeppi ava the thuw dokda, ungta Mma pau karyaa kcha rek nen nhin kakbaang thlit daat.
Isowr ruk va titinna rek leh tngana rek, ungu msik msik tngana rek, ava Mma poibin dil kṭoiji mdo them pik Pthla Kchiir ki chla rek tu kilṭhi ngi sakhi mdo piik.
Mleija nenni tithe slii in dultipaam thu kurjung rangki Mma ava Isowr va Waan tamsii rek kurdu ngi thiime.
Mmun khat thu ava sakhi pii da the da,
“Nah do bin psuk mii ava talu da?
Mdit mata Nah do sut pṭoi Mii Chapa ava tak hep kdu da?”
‘Mma ava Nang ngi Waan tamsii rek kurdu ngi,
mpha mruk tummi pchowm ti,
Nang ngi Mma ava laarnee leh kakjat tu kilṭhi ngi,
laar luwkhum pkhum pik ti,
Mma khu therri do khim khaija
ti pnung pthii tinu.’
Tunva do khim khaija Mma kurdu ngi thii tinu, duwn tha Mma ngi khut mdo pnen ma do khat lee ame. Anto lulu ngi nenni do khim khaija Mma kurdu ngi ka ammi tdee liit in pme.

Pdainu Isowr ki plungnee ngi mii pum ktai tummi Jisu ngi kdiyou pirsin ndokda, mpha mruk tummi Waan tamsii rek kurdu ngi kchowm betti amda, suwk kthuwkki mdiyo leiji laarnee leh kakjat ki laar luwkhum mdo khum ava nenni ndee in.
Tditta Mma lei ungu Mma thung ngi do mkheng ma am leiji, chapa rek knempokka laarnee tha mdo arvan ṭhi naki kja kakham ava ngi mmaan kirliin chaak naki mkinreel kurthuwk.
Mleija ktipinchel dok Mma ungu mdo tipinchel dok rek mkheng thuwna ava khdaat.
Mma ngi theda,
“Neiji Nah amiing nga Nei ku u knao rek hin paryaam nik di,
mmaanni mthuw kurku in mpha thu Neiji apanpaak nik di.”
Ungta vei khat nowlli,
“Neiji Mma rin chnik di.”
Ungu vei khat nowlli,
“Neia Isowr do piik chaak kmo rek tu,
hava thu ka am daat ping.”
Ava leiji kmo rekki daksaa leh hii thu mtum in mdo phaak ṭhiin leiji, Mma ngi kdiyou thu kdiyou ki rutan kthloi dijabowl mdo ea kre nra,
ungta kdiyou ra kṭi cha ava ngi rinkhu roi ksotti mdo bowl pthii kurdu ngi ka am kcha mdo ṭenthuw nra, Mma mdaksaa ruk va mmaan tu nopa kinṭim chakki ava kat louda.
Mleija kindit katti Mma ngi Waan tamsii rek mdo bin pik lei ava pme, pdainu Abraham charuwl rek mdo bin pik.

Ava leiji Mma ngi mii rek pnu ton mdo ptlot pik nra, Isowr sok klou cha thu, plung knei ungu lam trin chaak kurhui thiimpu kparthaang mkurthut nra, Mma ava mu u mnao rek tu mlam khim khai thu kinṭim ra.
Mleija Mma mdaksaa ngi kja kakham pha da ungu mdo pthleem leiji, mdo pthleem mii rek ava Mma ngi mdo bom pchaan lu.
Ava leiji, Parwaan do own thu mtum ka am, kseeng ku u knao rek, nenni tkarthe thut chaak nraan, kenyee ungu thiimpu kparthaang, Jisu abin phaak in.
Mousi rukva Isowr inn thu trin chaak mkurhui lulu ngi, Mma ava Mma kukchol cha ava hinni trin chaak kurhui.
Anto joso inn ava hinva inn khat ksa mii ava hin kheel sii ngi takjat pik lulu ngi, Jisua Mousi hinva kheel sii ngi mlaar kneiji kurhui.
Mleija inn khim khaija miilai khatti mdo sak, pdainu mkheng ksa ava Isowr.
Tunva Mousi va Isowr inn mkheng thu sra owr khat lulu ngi, dilki mii dothe ra avaki tummi trin chaak kurhui.

Pdainu Khrista ava Isowr Inn leenni Chapa khatti trin chaak kurhui kurthuwk. Ungta nenna nenki plungbin thu knetti bin chda, ungta kbin cha thu napal tatlot chaak in ava narpom mer chaak inbi, nenna Mma Inn ava pmin.
Ava leiji, Pthla Kchiir khatti theda,
“Snii ngi Mma krowl aryaak chaak thuwnni,
rutan klin kmat rekki kbowk laiji
mdo parsin naan thungki lulu ngi,
aplung in tapchai reen maan.
Ava thu apahle ngi Nei mparsin nlamda,
ungu Nei knong tlot rekka kum som plii thu dei lamda.
Ava leiji, ava charuwl rekka Neiji eawng knat psuk lam nu,
ungbi Neiji kthe;
‘mpha ktai thu mmaan plung binni lele tha chet chlamda;
Nei klam ava mmaanni dei liit lamme.’
Neiji kuplung thitti pau kdo reel lulu ngi,
‘Mmaanni Neiki karnga thu lut pchaang chlam nime.’ ”
Ku u knao rek, naan thungki kṭha kma ku mii khat, plung thu krin cha kma ava ngi, kring Isowr hinki lele tha naan akṭhi pthiin kro kding cheek karsin chaan.
Pdainu naan thungki ku khat leea pnu dohowlli muplung mapchai ma nra, “Snii,” tdit ma am slii daat thu mnii ktaiji khat leh khat kursop in.
Mleija ru kri thokki nenni plung tapngam psuk in ava mṭut na kpha dekki knetti narpom chaak inbi, nenni Khrista tum kphaak ṭhi tkurthut in.
Hanto theda,
“Snii ngi naanni Mma krowl aryaak in mpha thu,
rutan klin kmat rek lulu ngi,
aplung ril in tapchai maan.”
Maryaak chunni rutan klin kmat rekka kule da? Mmaanna Mousi ber suk kurdu ngi Egypt kma pthii rek mkheng ava pmemo?
Ungta Mma ngi kule hin kum som plii eawng mak knat psuk lamda? Kbowk laiji daksaa kluwng ktla mmaan hin pmemo?
Ungta pau kleek rek ava kma donle, Mma karngat na thu lut chip pchaang lam nime dida kule hin Mma ngi pau maktham da?
Tditta mmaanni mdo rin chaak maan leiji paam ava thu mlu pchaan maan nenni ndee in.
Ava leiji, Mma karngat na thu klut kcha avaki paureel ma am slii thu naan ku mii khatti kthlung pchaang kma ngi akekṭewl in kro kdingi nenni ṭi chaan che.
Mleija mmaan hinni mthlen lulu ngi kṭha paumin ava nen nhin kthleng, pdainu mdo aryaak in paumin ava do khat lee tipsit lamme, mleija karyaa rek va mlamrin chaak in tu kilṭhi ngi arlaang lamme.

Mleija krin cha nenva karnga ava thu talu chaak in, Mma ngi hanto theda, “Nei kuplung thitti pau kdo kham lulu ngi, ‘Mmaanni Neiki karnga ava thu luwt chip pchaang lam nime.’ ” Dultipaam mapṭhan daat ki Mma nong ṭuw dok daat joso kthe chaakka.
Mleija mun khat thung ngi tikheu ava mlam hanto ngi theda, “Ungta Isowr ri mnong tlot na mkheng thungki mnii tikheu na nitti karnga da.”
Ungu mun ava thu Mma ngi the nowlda, “Mmaanni Nei kakar ngat na thu lut pchaang lam nime.”
Ava leiji, klut ra mii angṭhe ma am leiji, ungu ru kri verri kṭha paumin karlaang kcha rekki, mpauleek lei inni mlu pchaan maan leiji,
mpha roi ksot diltha Mma ngi Devid hin theda, “Snii,” mdo dit nit khat palreen pik lamda, mpauna rekka hanto tker lamda, “Snii ngi naanni Mma krowl aryaak in mpha thu, aplung ril in tapchai maan.”
Mleija Joshua hin mkarngat chaak naan mpiik bi, Isowr va dil kira nit khat ava the nime.
Ava mkurthut bi, Isowr mii rek tummi mkarngat nraan sabath nit khat ka am daatta.
Mleija Isowr karngat na thu klut kcha ku mii khat ava, Isowr ri Mma nong thungki mkarngat ava lulu ngi, mma ruk va mnong tlot thungki karnga kcha.
Ava leiji, ku mii khat lee ngi paukleek ava thu mtluk ma nra, nenni karnga kcha thu talu chaak nraan ru lou chaan che.

Mleija Isowr pauna ava kring, ungu mdo tlot slii, kaang ksaang haa knii kraang jap kheel dekki kraang, raothla leh pthla kpurdu, ungu mhang leh daksaa kurjom kṭhen kpha thu kthun pchaang, ungta arthluwk dobin leh plungthuw mdo dee teng pchaan.
Ungta mdo seem khat lee ngi Mma maiṭhuwm ki kurdowl daat ame, pdainu do mkheng nga Mma mik sut na thu kandang, Mma hin nen nkheng ngi mlei tpiik raan.
Ava mkurthut bi, nenni Isowr Chapa, Jisu, Parwaan tha ktlowng Thiimpu Kparthaang sii nenni tathloi in kdingi nenni tithe thut dok in ava knetti arpom inche.
Mleija nen nsowl chaak naan thu wonsat klo pchaang kma ava pme, pdainu nen lulu ngi mlam khim khai thu mdo pthleem, anto daat joso pnu ktla kma Thiimpu Kparthaang nenni tathloi chaak in.
Tditta mpha kcha deekki tikriin in mido tbom chaak nraan, wonsat leh plungnee tarlaan chaak nraan, nenni plungnee ko onna ktinel tekki plung prip chaan che.
Mleija thiimpu kparthaang khim khaija Isowr leh mii rek arlakki nong ktlora, pnu rek tummi chla rek leh tlaai mi kdown pik, mii rek kchang kdonra mido tukchol pik in.
Mma mdaksaa kat daat rukka ksowl ava ngi mdo tukhul dok leiji kdei pandi kma rek leh kpar mak kcha rek hin plung kparneemmi kdiil pchaang kurthuwk.
Mleija ksowl hava leiji miirek tum daat kma Mma mdaksaa kat tum ruk pnu leiji tlaai mi down pik inda.
Ungta ku mii khat lee ngi ava kakjat pikki mdaksaa mthina ngi loume, pdainu Aron mdo own lulu ngi Isowr va own chda.
Ava leiji Khrista rukva Thiimpu kparthaang khat mkurthut nra mdaksaa mthina ngi karkhiing me, pdainu Mma ngi kchol da Mhin theda,
“Nah Nei Kchapa pti snii ngi akupluk chaakka.”
Mun ktlok khat thung ruk va Mmangi theda,
“Nah Melkhiyedek do parnaak dil kṭoiji,
kṭuwnai kma ki Thiimpu Khat pti.”

Jisu ngi dultimii daksaa ngi ma am mpha thu, kdiyou thungki kaktlan pik pchaang Mma hintha, krowl kparyaa ngi kṭap ungu arthli kbu tu kilṭhi ngi, kṭhil kaktham kcha tloda, ungta Mma ngi Isowr mdo ṭit leiji aryaak pik chda.
Mma ngi Mchapa kurthuwk chdaat joso, kja kakham kparteel thu pau pṭoi da.
Ungta Mma ava mkinreel kurthuwk da, Mma pau kupṭoi mii mkheng hin kṭuw knai kma ki kirliinna thuwna kurthuwk,
Melkhiyedek dopar naak dil kṭoiji Isowr Mma ava Thiimpu Kparthaang Khat kdingi the thuwda.
Hava mlei thu neenni kdo the raan ka am pok, pdainu naanni ado aryaak de maan leiji ado kthe pindit pik raanna kparsa reenna.

Mleija hava mpha thu naanni Chukpu rek akurthut kat nraan, ku mii khatti naanna Isowr pauna ki mdo pṭhunna thokki paumin ava naan hin ado tpurchu pik nowl nraan ki kat kurthuwk. Naanna then kapchai kma arnuw dii akriin inna;
mleija arnuw dii kjown mii pum ktaiva rinkindit ki pauna ava pintiing dei me, mleija ava mma nao.
Pdainu then kapchai ava plung kurchuwl mii rek tum, mleija ava ktlo pchaang ki kurchuk dok mii rek va kṭha leh kṭha kma ktin pchaang kurthuwk.
Ava leiji, chodu ki Khrista ki paurin ava nenni ma pthiin che, ungu plung kurchuwl ktongtha, kdiyou nong rek thungki plung ren kuhur kapṭhang Isowr ktongtha krin cha thu vang inche;
baptis ktlo, khut kikhiing mlei thu mdo parseel, kdiyou rin karheel naki, ungu kṭuw knai kma ki kekṭewl thu pṭhang nowl maan che.
Ungta Isowr ri mrot rangta nenni hava tlo inche.
Mleija veikhat kleng dok rek, Parwaan ki chla kparsin na dok rek, ungu Pthla Kchiir ki mtum kpha dok rek,
ungta Isowr ki kṭha pauna leh karvang rangki kum ava ki rutan kparsin na dok rekki,
vei khat nowlli plung ren kuhur tdit ava kparsa langlang nga, mleija mmaanni Isowr Chapa ava mkhusi inni mmaan mdaksaa kat in tummi khros leen pthoi lamda ungu kandang ngi ningkja mdo piik in.
Mleija mleen khuwkra thlit daat ava knee, ungta bil knum rek tummi chiibaal kupthuw pik ungu paam ava ngi Isowr hinki phowl kṭha ava mdo arlaan chaak.
Pdainu tirliing nowm daat muk mownbi, ava do sime, mdonna thangva mei thu kukbung chra.
Anto daat joso nei kwonsat lo rek, neenni hanto pau daat jown ring naan tummi mṭhat bet nra tditta kirliing kchara ava nenni tbin psuk chaak in.
Mleija naanni ado tlot slii in ava Isowr ri anong tlot in ungu wonsat ava kjuwm mi suwda mdo pindit pik ava pme, naanni kintiing rek sok adolo chaak in tummi wonsat mdo tidet.
Ungta neen kdo bin chaak inna naan mii pum ktaiji kdung ado bin chaak in ava mṭut na kpha dekki ning kakraalli kinṭim sappi ktidet inna kdingi abin chaan.
Tditta ava leiji naanni howng avat ma nraan, pdainu krin cha, ungu kdiil deiji paureel ava kpha kcha rek nopa klou cha kurthuwk in.
Mleija Isowr ri Abraham hin pau mreel mpha thu, mpaureel nra klin ku khat lee ma amma leiji, mma mthina ngi pauktham da,
theda, “Kinditti Neiji phowl kṭha apii nik di ungu aju purjou pok chnik di.”
Ungta Abraham mi hanto diil dei chda, paureel ava pha chda.
Mii rek va mmaan hinnu klin bet ava miing pau ktham nlamda, ungu mdo pne bet nraan, ungta mkarteen naan mkheng thu mpau ktham inni mṭut na purthuw lamda.
Ava leiji Mma paureel karlaang kcha rek hin Mma poibin ava kartlei liit pme tdit mkindit nangi Isowr ri mdo tdet nuwm leiji paukham tpomda.

Tditta ava leiji nenni talu chaak nraan nen ndusukki ka am plung dobin knetti karpom kirtlei liit kma rangki do knii thung ngi plei knei rang nga kurthuwk liit pme, ruktang ngi nen mido tuk kso nraan leiki.
Nenni tphaak chaak in plung dobin chaak ava raothla ktongki hava nareeng lulu kat, tditta kukdown Inn thungki buwkhaar dil pangtha ril ktlummi talu chaak na.
Ava thu Jisu ngi Melkhiyedek dopar naak dil kṭoiji kṭuw knai kma ki Thiimpu Kparthaang Khatti, nen kchang donda ru kri verri milu pik inda.
Mleija Melkhiyedek ava Salem ki kruwng, Isowr ki Thiimpu Kparthaang sii Mmangi kruwng rek eayou thida mdil kinle da Abraham kurdut ṭhida ungu mhin phowl kṭha pii chda,

ungta Mma hin Abraham mi do khim khai thungki tholowm sruk sowm thungki khat piida. Mmiing ava ru kri reepki rinkindit Kruwng kdingi purlup da, ungu ava dilli Mma ava Salem ki Kruwng ruk kurthuwk da, tditta ava kdaaiki Kruwng kurthuwk.

Mma ava Mpah mdit mata Mnuh mdit mata mthuwna charuwl ka am pme ungu mdo pṭhunna nit mdit mata mrinkhu ṭut na ka am pme, pdainu Isowr chapa rek Mma ngi purkuk thlit da kṭuw knai kma ki Thiimpu khatti ka am.
Asuw daat in, Mma tija thu klin chdaatta. Nenki npah in Abrahammi chasowm ki tholowm ava Mma hin piida.

Ungta thiimpu khat ki nong karlaang kcha Levi charuwl rek kat daat rukva Nowlam paureen dil kṭoiji mii rek hinki, tditta Abraham charuwl thungki kurthuwk daat joso mu u mnao rek hinki tholowm ava louda.
Pdainu mmaan charuwl thungki kma hava miilaiji Abraham hinki tholowm arlaang da ungu paureel karlaang dok mma ava phowl kṭha pii chda.
Klin betti kdil bet hin phowl kṭha mdo piik ava arleek setti pau tkarteen psuk nra ame.
Hava thangva kdiyou chra miirek ava ngi tholowm mdo arlaan; ava thangva kring sakhi kthloi Mma ngi mdo arlaan.
Ku mii khatti hanto kthe ruk kro tditta tholowm karlaang Levi mdaksaa daat ruk va, Abraham hin tholowm mdo piik,
mleija Melkhiyedek ki Abraham mkurdut ṭhi mpha thungva Levi ava kṭou mlai liit.

Tunva Levi phungka thungki ngi thiimpu ki mkinreel mkurthut bi, (mleija ava kurdu ngi mii rek va Nowlam mdo arlaan chaak,) Aron do parnaak dil kṭoiji Miing khat kchang nga melkhiyedek dopar naak dil kṭoiji ktlok thiimpu khat mthuw nrangki arleek setti talu msit ka amda?
Mleija thiimpu thung ngi mkartleu nra ma ambi, Nowlam rukka mkartleu kat ra.
Mleija ktlok chati kurthuwk miilai khat mlei thu hava lea mdo the, chati ava thungki ku khat lee ngi suwlbuwr sok lome.
Mleija Judah charuwl thungki nenki Mukpu ava kthuwk kat, ungu chati ava ki thiimpu mlei thu Mousi va do khat lee theme.
Melkhiyedek hep daat ktlok Thiimpu khat mthuw mpha thu hava kheel dekki kindit chel ra.
Thiimpu khat kurthuwk Mma hava daksaa ktongki charuwl mlei thu mdo ngeen dil kṭoi kat ava pme pdainu kṭuw knai kma rinkhu ki rutan dil mdo ṭoi.
Mleija Mma hinni hanto sakhi piida,
“Melkhiyedek dopar naak dil kṭoiji,
Nah kṭuw knai kma ki Thiimpu Khat pti.”
Khat ktong thangva, chodu ki paureen ava sowlda do msit ma leiji kneng pthiida.
Mleija Nowlam va mkinreel do khat lee pthuwk me; ktlok khat ktong thang nowlva plung dobin chaak kṭha bet ava mithe pik inda, ava thu nenni Isowr hin tnai chaak in.
Ungta ava paukreel ka am kma ava pme.

Chodu ki thiimpu kurthuwk rek va, pau kakham ktaakki mnong inna mdo tlot in, pdainu hava khatta pau mdo reel tu kilṭhi ngi theda, “Mukpu ngi paukham da, ungu mpoibin parthlei nime, ‘Nah kṭuw nai kma ki Thiimpu Khat ava pti.’ ”
Hava ngi Jisua kindit kat ki kṭha bet paurina pur owlda.
Mnong tlot inna kdiyouvi mdo pkhaan thlit lei inni, chodu ki thiimpu rekka msing knempok lam.
Pdainu Mma ngi Thiimpu nong ava ktlok khat hin ksilna tlome, mleija Mma kṭuwnai liit kma ka am.
Mma thu Isowr hin knai kcha rekka mpha ktai thu kheel setti Mma ngi kaktlan pik lam mdo pchaan, mleija mmaan tummi pau kthe pik ra kdet liit kma kring.
Mleija hantolu hep daat Kchiir ungu tupsul na ktaak, pnu ktla kma, pnu kirvei rek thungki msikki ka am, Parwaan kheel dekki mdo khiin Thiimpu Kparthaang Khat nenni tathloi in.

Thiimpu kparthaang rek va ru kri verri mmaan mdaksaan kat ki pnu tum tloda, audilli mii rek pnu tummi mnii ktaiji tlaai mdo down in lulungi, Mma va mdo tlot nra ame. Mleija Mma mdaksaa mkarpiik chaakki vei khdaatti mii mkheng tumma mdo tlot dok.
Mleija ksowl cha miilai ava Nowlam mi thiimpu kparthaang rang ngi mdo tpur owl, pdainu Nowlam dil thang ngi kthuwk paureel ki pauna ava ngi kṭuw knai kma ki mkinreel Mchapa ava mido tukchol pik in.
Tunva neen kdo the mpau katta hava: nenni hantolu hep daat Thiimpu Kparthaang tathloi in, Parwaan tha mkullaar pummi Kruwng ko onna tunni mchang ktong tha kuk ong Khat,
mun Kchiir thu, miilai kma pdainu Mukpu dopri mkindit ki buw Inn thu mdolo.
Mleija thiimpu kparthaang khim khaija chla ungta tlaai kdown rangki mdo kchol dok; ava leiji hava Thiimpu rukva do khat mdo down ra.
Tunva Mma ngi dultipaam thu ka am katkat mkurthut bi, Mma ava thiimpu khat kurthuwk liit nime, mleija Nowlam dil kṭoiji chla kdown ra ava thiimpu rek ka am lam.

Mmaan ava Parwaan ki mun Kchiir thungki mno leh marlim sok klou kcha ngaal lam; mleija Mousi ngi buw inn kṭhunra mkirsim mpha thu Isowr ri mhin parseel da, theda, “Lown tun nah ahinni mdo tdet dil kṭoiji do khim khai ado sak nra asuw cha.”
Pdainu anto katti, Khrista ngi pliw hinva kheel siingi kinreel kṭha bet ki paurina Mma ngi pau kpurdon ki sok klou ava pha chda, mleija kṭha paureel tuwn ni ava ktlo kurthuwk.
Mleija ru kri thokki paurina ava ngi mparma mabi, miknit naki mmun rang nga amnime.
Mleija mmaan doparma Mma ngi mphaak thungta Mma ngi theda,
“Mukpu ngi theda, Mnit rek kurjungra,
ava thu Neiji Isreel phungka leh Judah phungka tu kilṭhi ngi,
ren paurina khat pṭhang nik di.
Neiji mkhut in kjowng nu Egypt paam thungki,
kṭhi pthuw lam nitti,
mmaan pahle hin paurina kdo seem pik lam lulu pme;
mleija kpaurina thu mmaanni nowl lamme,
ungta ava leiji Neiji plung pdun psuk lam maang.
Ava nit rek diltha,
Neiji Isreel phungka tu kilṭhi ngi,
do seemra paurina ava hava,
dida Mukpu ngi theda;
Nei Knowlam ava mmaan poibin thu Neiji thii nik di,
ungta mmaan plung thu kjit pik lam nikdi,
ungu Neia mmaanki Isowr kurthuwk nik di,
ungta mmaanna Nei kmii rek kurthuwk lamra.
Ungu ‘Mukpu adei cha,’
kdingi the lam thida mmaan mii pum ktaiji,mplap hin ‘Mukpu adei in,’
dida mii pum ktaiji mu u mnao hin purchuk nime,
mleija mkheng kheng inni kmo suwn kingi,
kver kpha dekki Neia mhai kdei chlam ra.
Mleija Neiji mmaan dopar ma thu wonsat lo lam nikdi,
ungu Neiji mmaan pnu rek bin phaak nowl ni maang.”
Mma ngi ren paurina ru kri ver ki ava pliw pur owl pthii da. Ungta pliw kurthuwk cha ungu kchuwl cha ava kmawng chra mthea.
Tunva ru kri thokki paurina ava daat rap klua luwkbuk ki nonaat ungta dultipaam ki mun kchiir ka am.
Mleija buw Inn khat purchuwl dok da, mduwnki ka khat ava meila rina ungu tebol ungta thenpen mdo down nrangki; Mun ava Kchiir mdo dit.
Mik knit na buwkhaar dilpang tha Kchiir ki Kchiir Sii mdo dit buw Inn khat ka am.

Ava thu meikhut mikrim kdi mdo pkaak na jeering suwlbuwr ungta jeering ngi pum klummi mdo klum dok paurina ki Pluh ka am, mthung ngi manna amna jeering uwm khat, ungu arnaa ksunna Aron kchung, ungta paureen ki tebol rek ka am.
Hava tun tha laarnee ki Cherubim tditta mpthla pum saa pthla ava ngi wonsat longkhomma pkhumda. Hava mkheng ki mlei thu tunva neenni do khat lee the pchaang chmaan ring.
Hava le khim khai hanto mpurchuwl dok le, thiimpu rekki Isowr sok kloura mduwn ki buw Innka thu klut thlit lam;
pdainu mik knit na ka thungva kum khat thu vei khat pang daat thiimpu kparthaang klut lu, mma mdaksaa tum leh mii rek nong parma tummi tlaai kdown ra klut pdainu hii ktaak va klut kchok pme.
Pthla Kchiir ri hanto tdet pik da, tditta duwnki buw Inn ava ma am slii daat arlaanni, Mun Kchiir thu talu nrangki lam kparvang pme.
Hava tun tunki mpha kthena kurthuwk. Hava mdo purchuwl dil kṭoiji, chla rek ungta tlaai kdownni luwkbuk cha plungreel thu mkinreel ava tpur owl pchaangme.
Pdainu hava lea kchaa knee hehe daat leh msik msikki kartleu kcha, rewn ni mparnaak du khim khai mdo kdanra daksaa ktongki nopa ava.
Pdainu Khrista ngi klin sii thu, ungu kheel siiki mkinreel buw Inn, khut do sak ma tditta mdo pṭhan thungki kma, kṭha thuwna ki Thiimpu Kparthaang kandang dok.

Khrista ngi buw Inn thu mlu mpha thungva, keelrek hii mdit mata silsuwn hii ksin kma Mma mdaksaa hii ngi kṭuw knai kma ki kṭenthuw pik cha ava arlaang da, mii mkheng ki tummi vei khdaat chrelli Mun Kchiir thu klut.
Mleija keel rek hii ungu silpa rek hii ngi kparda kmalai silnu mdo pkaak ava purvut tu kilṭhi ngi kbuwr mii rek pin chel nra mdo jai.

Isowr hin tha Pthla ava ngi karmak ktaak liitti Khrista ngi mdaksaa hii mdo piik ava ngi kṭuw knai kma Isowr sok klo mkurthut nra, kdiyou nong rek thungki ngi naan plungreel mdo partleu ava tija thu kheel sii kurthuwk daatta.

Ava leiji, ren paurina kurdu ngi ka am kar mak nong ktlo thungki kṭenthuw rangki khat mkandan leiji, mdo own dok rekki kṭuw knai kma mdo phaak chaak raan paureel mdo arlaan chaak nraan, Mma ava ren paurina ki pau kpurlon lik.
Mleija ktlo nuwm ma am khim khai thu ktlo mii ava mdiyo kat ra.
Mleija kdiyou thung daatti ktlo nuwm ka am, mleija kseem Mii ava ngi kring mkurthut khim khai thu namtrom pme.
Ava leiji ru kri thokki paurina ava hii ktaak va kro pme.

Mleija Mousi ngi mii mkheng hintha Nowlam ki paureen khim khai mthe thut mpha thu, mma ngi sil rek leh keel rek hii, dii ungta kning ngi ksen saamul ungu hysop kchung tu kilṭhi ngi louda Laaika leh mii mkheng leen jaida.
Mma ngi theda, “Hava naan hin Isowr paureen paurina ki hii.”
Ungta anto hep daatti buw Inn ruk ungu luwkbuk thu mdo sinton beel uwm mkheng ruk hii jaida.
Nowlam kurdu ngi do khim khaija mdo partleu thut kurthuwk, ungu hii kbuh kma donle pnu rekka ptlot pik me.
Hanto Parwaan ktongki do ava kupṭoiji kartleu kat kurthuwk, pdainu Parwaan ki do avale katta hava le hinva kṭha sii ngi tlaai mdo down.
Mleija kindit do khat ava dil kṭoiji, khut dosak mun Kchiir thu Khrista lut me, pdainu tunva Parwaan kat thang ngi nen ntummi Isowr maiṭhuwm mi arju kandang.
Mdit mata thiimpu kparthaang ngi mun Kchiir thu mkum ktaiji mdaksaa ki hii kma hii ava tu kilṭhi ngi mlu lulu ngi Mma mdaksaa ava tlaai kdown rang leiji lut kurnowl thlit me.

Ava mkurthutbi, Mma ngi dultipaam mapṭhan daat ki kdet liit kma kja kakham kparteel ra kurthuwk. Pdainu anto katti kum ṭut tha Mma mdaksaa ava tlaai kurdownda, pnu mdo knen pthii nrang ngi vei khat pang thu kandang da.
Ungta dultimii rekka vei khat kdiyou kat ra kurthuwk, ungu ava dil tha kekṭewl ra.
Ava lulu ngi Khrista rukva mii knempok ki pnu kuhur pik ra tlaaiji kurdownda, pnu kparteel kmara pdainu ning kakraalli Mma karda kcha rek kaktlan pik rang ngi mvei knit na kandangra.

Mleija Nowlam rangki kindit do kṭha ava kma marlim ngaal mkurthut leiji, kdet liit kma mkum ktaiji kurnowl thlit da tlaai kdown ava ngi lamknai kcha rekka tden thung preva mkinreel pur owl pchaang me.
Anto mkurthut mabi, mmaan tlaai downna kma pthii rang mo? vei khdaatti luwkbuk rekki mkartleu inbi, mmaanni pnu dei kurnowl lam nime.
Pdainu hava tlaaidown ava mkum ktaiji pnu kbin phaak kurthuwk.
Mleija silpa rek leh keel rek hii ngi tden thung preva pnu rek klou pthiia pchaang me.
Hava leiji, Khrista ngi dultipaam thu murjun mpha thu, Mma ngi theda,
“Tlaaidown rek ungu downda kpii cha Nang ngi ngei mti,
pdainu Nang ngi ktumra daksaa khat ado tpur owl pik.
Kakaa ngi downda kpii kcha ungu,
pnu tummi downda kpii cha thu aning thlung me.
Ava dilli Neiji the nu,
‘Laaika jiik kjul thu Nei klei mdo kjit lulu ngi,
O Isowr, Nah apoibin ktlora Neia kurjung imping.’

‘Tlaai kdown, ungta downda kpii cha, ungu kakaa ngi downda kpii kcha ungta pnu tummi downda kpii kcha ava Nang ngi ngei mti ungu aning thlung me dida tun knung ki Mma ngi theda.’ Hava lea Nowlam dil kṭoiji downda mdo piik chaak.
Ava dilli Mma ngi tpomda, ‘Asuw, Nah plungbin ktlora Neia kurjung imping.’ Mvei knit naki mdo pṭhan nra ru kri reep ki ava knuwl pthiida.
Ungta Mma plungbin ni Jisu Khrista ngi mdaksaa downda mdo piik ava ngi nen nkheng nga vei khdaatti mi tpinchel pik chaanda.
Ungta thiimpu khim khaiji mnii ktaiji sok kloura, kardu jikki tlaai kdown ava kurnowl thlit da kpii chrang ngi ripda, ava ngi pnu rek klou pthii pchaang nga kurthuwk me.
Pdainu Khrista ngi pnu rek tummi kṭuw knai liit kmara vei khat pang ngi tlaai downda pii chda ava ngi Isowr khut chang ktongtha kuk ong.
Ava dilli Mma kusnuwm kma rekka mkhu pja tingi mthiik du khim khai arngai da ka am.
Mleija vei khdaat chrelli Mma ngi downda mdo piik chaakki, mdo tpinchel dok rek ava mpha ktai thu mkinreel pur owlda.
Ungta Pthla Kchiir ri nen nhin sakhi mi hur pik inda; mleija ru kri ngi theda,
“Ava nit rek diltha mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi,
Nei kdo seemra paurina ava hava dida Mukpu ngi theda:
Neiji Neiki Nowlam rek ava mmaan plung thu daal pik lam nikdi,
ungu mmaan plungbin thu kjit nik di.”
Ava dilli Mma ngi tpomda, “Mmaan pnu ton rek ungu kar mak nong mdo tlot in ava Neiji bin phaak nowl ni maang.”
Havale kuptlot pik amna thungva pnu tummi downda kpii kcha amnime.
Ava leiji, ku u knao rek, Jisu hii ngi nenni mun Kchiir thu klut chrangki knetti tbin chaak lei inni,
ren lam leh kring lam ava buwkhaar thu Mma mdaksaa ngi mi pvan pik chaanda.
Ungta nenni Isowr Inn tunni klin langlang Thiimpu khat tathloi chaak in.
Kindit plungril krin cha ki kindit ava ngi kdim, kṭha kma plungbin thungki nuplung bin in mdojai partleu ungu nen ndaksaa ava dii kchiir deekki mdo alṭhut tu kilṭhi ngi vanai inche.
Kakna liit kma nuplungbin in dothe thut chaak ava knetti arpom in che, mleija paukreel Mma ava trin chaak kurhui.
Ungta khat leh khat wonsat leh kṭha nong rek ktongtha kurbom inche.
Mii murson rek dotlot lulu ngi kthuwk kurkuk ra leek maan che, pdainu khat leh khat kursop da, ungu mnit kvei slii naanni ado dee in heppi kheel set set ti tlo in che.
Mleija nenni kindit kdei cha narlaan chaak dok dil thaanni kdei kdeiji pnu ntlaak inbi, pnu rek tummi tlaai kdown vei khat ame.
Pdainu mdo kṭewl ra ka am daat ava ṭi inche, ungu kro kma rek ava mei kṭuwng thu kukbung chlamra.
Mousi Nowlam kleek mii rek ka mrinpaumin thuwnni sakhi rek knii kdum ktaak wonsat ktaakki kdiyou kcha lam.

Isowr Chapa mkhu ngi kther, ungu Mma kartleu chaak na paurina ki hii ava kbuwr heppi kbin, ungta plungnee ki Pthla ava kjuwm rakki ktlo mii ava tija kheelli mraal kpha chrang tdit naanni bin maan timo?
Mleija, “Phuw kloura ava Nei kdo, Neiji purthul nik di.” Ungta vei khat nowlli, “Mukpu ngi Mma mii rekka kekṭewl ra,” dida kthe Mma ava nenni ndee in.
Kring Isowr khut thu ktla kcha mii ava tiṭit kirvei daatta.
Pdainu naanna kleng aphaak dok dil thaan, kja kakham tu kilṭhi ngi kparsa langlang ngi kdiil kcha aparteel in mpha thu, chodu ki nit rek abin phaak chaan.
Mpha khat thu kandang ngi mii maiji ning earri arai chaanda, ungu kja kakham ado parteel in, ungta mpha khat thu anto heppi mdo tlot in ava plap in pti.

Mleija naanni rowng inn thu mdo khum rek wonsat lo inti, ungu naan adaksaan tummi kṭha sii kmaang kro liit kma rangki alrou ka am tdit dei inti, naanki alrou mulrowt in mpha thu, kanpa rek rekki ado rot pik in.
Ava leiji, klin langlangki mnah kthloi, naan dobin chaak in ava var pthii maan.
Mleija naanni Isowr poibin tloda, ungu mpaureel ado arlaan chaak nraan, ado diil dei kat raan.
Mleija Laaika ngi theda,
“Mleija mpha mruk dil thang bong ngi,
kurjung rangki khat ava kurjungra ungu kto liit nime.
Pdainu Neiki rinkindit ava klamrin chaakki kringra,
ungta Mma ngi mdil mkursown kinletbi,
Nei kraothla ava Mma thu kning thlung nime.”
Pdainu nenna kmawng chrang ngi mdil tha kursown kinle mii ava pmin me, pdainu rin chda raothla karkhii kcha rek in pmin.
Tunva krin cha ava plung krippi tbin psuk chaak in ava, tdeema do ava plung tuplut chaak in.
Mleija ava lei miipliw rekki Isowr ktongki krot pik mdo arlaan chaak in.
Krin cha ava nenni ndee pandit chaak in, tditta dultipaam ava Isowr pauna ngi mdo pṭhan dok, ava leiji tdee do ava tdeema do ava thungki mdo seem.

Krin cha thu Abel li Kein hinva talo kro tlaaidown Isowr hin down pik da, ava thu mma ngi rinkindit krot pik arlaang chda, Isowr ri mma chla piik sakhi hur pikda; mma ava diyou chdaat joso krin cha thu mma tithe thlit in.
Krin cha thu Enok ki kdiyou mdo dee ma nra mma ava arju lou dok da; ungta Isowr ri mdo arjuk lo dok leiji, mma ava phang lamme. Tunva mma ava murjuk lo dok dungi mma ngi Isowr ning tupthlun pik chda.
Ungu krin cha ktaakki Mma ning ktupthlun pik ava kurthuwk pme, mleija Isowr hin knai kcha mii khim khai ava hin Mma ka am ungu kthlaam kcha rekka mnah kpiira tdit mdo rin chaak kat ra.

Krin cha thu Noha ngi mdo dee chaak ma kthuwk rangki mlei thu Isowr ri paureel pik da, mma ngi pṭoida, mphungka mdo ktlan nra arkuwngpii khat mma ngi sada; hava leiji mma ngi dultipaam mraal piida, ungu krin cha dil kṭoiji rinkindit ki charuwl khat.
Krin cha thu Abraham mi, alrouvi mdo arlaan chaak ra mun khat ava tha kunsun rang ngi mu own mpha thu pṭoida; ungta mthlun nra mun kdei liit kma ngi kunsun da.
Mii paam ktlok tha ka am lulu ngi krin cha thu mma ngi paureel ki paam ava thu paalda, Isek leh Jakob tu kilṭhi ngi buw inn thu paal lamda, paureel ava kat ki charuwl kurthut ṭhi lamda.
Mleija Isowr ri punchoi dokda sada mdo seem khuwpii ava ktongtha mma ngi tarngaida.
Krin cha thu Sarah ngi kdung der chdaat joso, paukreel pik Mma ava trin chaak kurhuiji mdo bin leiji, nao mdo hur nrangki rutan ava mdaksaa thu arlaang chda.
Ava leiji, mma ngi diyou tiing tiing daat joso, parwaan ki bursi rek heppi knempok, ungu truwn biingki tatai pchaanma sitphui hep jangi ngi knem mcharuwl rek ava miilai khat thungki plu chda.
Hava le mkheng nga parreel karlaang ava pme, pdainu lamkla ngi deida ungu arvui chda, ungta mmaan ava dultipaam ki mal rek leh paamsuwk rek kdingi deida, krin cha thu kdiyou kcha lam kurthuwk.
Mleija hanto kthe mii rekki mpaam raanni mthlaam inna kdingi the pindit pik lamda.
Mmaanni mdo sun daak in paam ava mbin rim inbi, mmaanni khuw dil kinle chlam ruk kro.
Pdainu kṭha bet khat Parwaan paam ava mmaanni ngeen lamda. Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, mmaanki Isowr tdit thung ngi Isowr ra mning kjak me, mleija Mma ngi mmaan tumra khuwpii khat purchuwl pik chlamda.
Abraham ma krin cha thu mpirsin mpha thu, Isek ava tlaaiji downda pii chda, ungta paureel rek karlaang kcha miiva mchapa khdaat chrel ruk downda kpii kcha thu kirsim.
Mma mlei thu theda, “Isek thungki nah acharuwl rekka kthuwk ra.”
Isowr va kdiyou dok rek mii rap klua ktipring pinle mapchaan kdingi mma ngi bin chda, ava leiji pau purtol kthe ngi mma ava arlaang pinle chda.
Krin cha thu Isek ki Jakob leh Esau ava dil kira tummi phowl kṭha pii chlamda.
Krin cha thu Jakob pi mdiyo du tiing ngi Joseph chapa rek mii pum ktai hin phowl kṭha pii chda, mukchung tun kbaang da Isowr luwbuk chda.
Krin cha thu Joseph pi mrinkhu mṭut tiing tiing ngi Isreel naorekki kal mdo khiin nraan the pik chlamda ungu mma mdo alruwl nlam rangki mlei thu parseel lamda.
Krin cha thu Mousi ngi mṭou mpha thu, mnuh leh mpah ngi thla kdum dowl lamda, mleija mmaanni nao rungchen kṭha ava dei lamda; ungta kruwng pauṭum ava mmaanni ṭi lam me.
Krin cha thu Mousi ngi mver mpha thu, Pharoh chanu ava chapa mdo dit rang nga rome.
Pnu ki nungai ava mdo phaak kchang rang nga Isowr mii rek tu suwkthuw kphaak ṭhi ava mma ngi kchol chda.
Egypt ki alrou hinva Khrista tummi ningkja phada kja kakham kparteel ava ngi klin siiki alrouvi bin chda, mleija mma ngi mnah ava ra suw chda.
Krin cha thu mma ngi Egypt ma da, kruwng plung thit ra mma ngi ṭime; mleija tdee pchaan ma Mma ava kdei kcha heppi parteelda.
Ru kri verri kṭou psel ava mdo eakre ma nra, krin cha thu mma ngi taplaanna leh hii kjai ava danda.
Krin cha thu mii rekki truwn ksen ava laan ki heppi klaan lamda; pdainu Egypt mii rekki anto lulu ngi maklaan in thungta, truwn dii ngi junjuh tir chlamda.
Krin cha thu Jerikho suwng ava nii tikheu mloi dok dil thaanni tluw chda.
Krin cha thu ko ok kma Rahab pi tuprut pau klou rek ava plappi mdo kowl lam leiji, kthe kleek rek tu kilṭhi ngi mawn ṭhi lamme.
Ungta kheel setti neiva tak the nik da? Mleija Gedion, Barak, Semson, Jepthah, Devid, ungu Samuel leh khulpu rek mlei thu kdo the rang nga mpha ngi mrot pik chme.
Krin cha thu mmaanni kruwng paam rek pchaang lamda, kindit nong tlo lamda, paureel rek arlaang lamda, humpii smang rek ner pmeeng lamda,
mei rutan archu you lamda, kaang ksaang haa thungki karthlet lamda, ru kdowng thungki mru in tang da, rawl kdu thu mru in tangda, paam ktlokki rawlmii rek rei pthii lamda.
Snu rekki kdiyou dok rek ava kring karheel li arlaang chlamda. Mii murson rekki rinkhu kṭha bet tha mrin kinlet chaak nraan, kintek ra mdo mat lei inni suwkthuw pha chlamda.
Mii murson rekki kchung kuhur, mii do pnii chaak, ungu thiir ri do bowl, ungta rowng inn thu mdo khum lei inni kja kakham parteel lamda.
Mmaan ava lung ngi deeng lamda, knii kthuwkki ngaat lamda, kaang ksaang ngi eayou lamda, Jao leh keel vun naa lamda parvai lamda, sra kurthuwk lamda, suwkthuw pha lamda, mii do owr chaakki am lamda.
Mmaan tummi dultipaam ava mkurhui ma lei inni kbowk lai, ungu lown tun tha, lung khur leh dulti khur thu parvai chlamda.
Ungta kdung ngi mdo rin chaak in am daat joso, havale mkheng ngi paureel arlaang chlamme,
mleija nen ktaakki mkinreel mdo pur owl ma nra, Isowr ri nen ntumra kṭha bet do khat mi purchuwl pik inda.

Ava leiji, nea mi ktukhul dok in klin langlang armei khat ka ammi sakhi rek mkurthut leiji, nen ruk va bowr krik leh knai tekki kakbaang pnu khim khaija nsiir inni thii pthii in chera, ungu nen ndusuk inni ka am kchen kparteek kdei tu kilṭhi ngi chen rei inche.
Krin cha kpu ungu mkinreel kpurthuw Jisu suw inche, Mma ngi mmaiṭhuwm mi ka am kanpa ava tummi, ningkja ra matda khros parteelda, ungu Isowr ko onna mkhut chang ktong tha kuk ong.
Ava leiji naanni plung pjada mdit mata ktet dok akurthut ma nraan, Mma mraal kpii ngi pnu rek dohal chaak thungki mdo diil chaak ava abin phaak in.
Pnu mraal kpii ngi ado kursul ṭhi in ava hii kbu kpha ra naanni karnaak ṭhi maanti.
Ungta mchapa rek lulungi Mma ngi ado tuk kso chaak inna naanni aparngiil pthii dok inmo?
“Kchapa rek Mukpu do archak ava ko ol tekki lou maan,
mdit mata Mma ngi araal in atpiik inta plung parheel daak maan.
Mleija Mukpu wonsat lorekka mdo pindit pik,
ungta Mma do arlaan chaak chapa rek khim khaija mdo archak.”
Naan do diilra ava karchak tum. Mchapa rek lulu ngi Isowr ri ado ta tlot pik in; mleija mpah do archak ma chapa ku ka am da?
Mii mkheng do phaak ṭhi sap karchak ava ngi a am maanbi, naanna mchapa rek kma pah taak nao in pti.
Hava daat kma, nen mi karchak chraan dultimii ki npahle tathloi in; ungu nenni takjat chaak lam. Pthla ngi Npah in ava kurdu ngi kheel siingi ta am raan pmemo?
Mleija mpha mruk tummi mmaanki dothloi thu mi archak inda, pdainu nenni Mma ki Kchiir ava tphaak ṭhi nraan, nen ṭhat nra mido tarchak in.
Mleija mpha mruk tummi karchak mkheng ava kanpa rang kchang nga plung jatna kurthuwk; dil thang rongi ava ngi kurchuk chdok rekka rinkindit ki kdaai theiji kchui lam.
Ava leiji, abaan in kakham ava akhiing inra, khu kunchun ava ru aptang in,
ungu akhu ther raan arji in, mleija khu kseek rekki mkhu in mdo ar el ma nraan, pdainu ava kchang nga kdam lamra.
Mii mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi Kchiir leh kdaaiji a am nraan atlo in, mleija ava ktaakki ku khat lee ngi Mukpu dei chnime.
Ku mii khat lee ngi Isowr plungnee kpha kcha kma mkurthut ma nra asuw dei in; tditta murjung kakha mowngda ungu suwkthuwna ava ngi mii knempok mbuwr ma nrang lei.
Tditta ku mii khat lee ngi pang turkuiji kturkui, mdit mata dhormo ktaak Esau lulu upa ngi mṭou chaak ava then vei khdaat pang kingi mdo jur chaak heppi mso.

Mleija naanni ado dee in, tditta dil thang rongi phowl kṭha marlaan chaak nuwm thu, mma ava rot pik me, mleija arthli kbu ngi thlaam chdaat joso mma ngi plung mdo parheel chaak nrangki mpha ava phang chme.
Mleija naanni tuthown kro, kṭuwng slii mei, ungu kjiingnu, kjiing mek muk, tirthli kraang,
peengkhul krowl, ungta pauna rek krowl karyaa rekki, mhin thaanni mdo paryaam pursom pik chaak nlamra ktham chlamda.
Mleija mhin inni mdo piik dok, “Nowmsaa daat rukva lown ava mthownbi, ava lung ngi kdeengra,” dida pau mdo pṭum ava mmaanni diil pchaang lamme.
Tdee chaak ava tija thu tiṭit kirver daatta dida Mousi ngi theda, “Kdo ṭit chaak tu kilṭhi ngi kunchun ping.”
Pdainu naanna Siyon lown tha, ungu Parwaan ki Jerusalem, kring Isowr khuwpii tha, ungta tatai pchaan ma Waan tamsii rek kurku na tha kthleng in pti.
Ungta Parwaan tha mmiing mdo plu dok, ru kri reepki kṭou rek kunpun na tha, ungu mii mkheng kekṭewl Isowr hin tha, ungu kinreel li kindit mii rek pthla ava hin tha,
ungu ren paurina ki pau kpurlon Jisu hin tha, ungta Abel hii hinva kheel siingi kṭha ngi tpaal chaak naan hii kjai ava hintha kthleng kchaan pti.

Kpau slii Mma kipthlei akurthut ma nraan asut pṭoi dei chaan. Mleija dulti tun pau kakham pik lam Mma ava mmaanni pthlei lamda, mkarthle pchaan maanbi, Parwaanki pau kakham Mma ava nenni nipthlei inbi, tkarthle pchaan in nime.
Mma krowlli dultia tpunchunda; pdainu tunva, “Neiji dulti daat kpunchun kma pdainu parwaan ruk vei khat nowlli tpunchun nikdi,” dida Mma ngi paureel da.
“Vei khat nowlli,” Hava mdo seem dok do ava tnok donle klou pthiira, mdo tno pchaan ma do ava daat ka amra.
Ava leiji, kakna pchaang kma Kruwngpaam tarlaan chaak lei inni, nenni kdung kakjat leh kṭi tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr dolo kro luwkbuk kdown cha ki plungnee arlaang inche.
Mleija nenki Isowr ava kukbung mei kurthuwk.
Unaoki wonsatti kur nowl thlit so.
Malrek kowlda plung nei ktidet parngiil maan che, mleija mii mursonni kdei chdok kma ngi Waan tamsii rek pthlung chlamda.
Rowng inn thu mdo khum rek ava rowng inn thu ado am ṭhi in lulu, ungu naan rukka daksaa ngi a am lei inni, suwk kthuwk rekka mhai bin phaak pik chaan.
Kphal ava mii mkheng thu takjat chaak kurthuwk so, ungta kowm kbuwr rome; mleija Isowr ri pang turkuiji kturkui leh losang kṭhi ava kekṭewl ra.
Naan arinkhu in thu sum kngei ava aser chaan, ungta ado thloi in ava ngi ekhop in; mleija Mma ngi theda, “Neiji asui inda ama pthii liit in nimaang.”
Hava thu nenni plung krippi tithe chaak in, “Mukpua nei mukbom, neiji ṭi nimaang, mii ngi nei kihinva tak ktlo pchaang rang da?”
Naan hinni Isowr pauna akthe pik kchaan ber ksu rekka abin paphaak in; mmaan rinkhu thei abin inra, ungta mmaan dorin chaak nopa ava apṭoi in.
Jisu Khrista ava janii ruk snii ruk kṭuw knai liit kma kartlei kma ka am.
Msik lik lik ungta ren lik lik do purchu ngi aṭhi pthii maan so; mleija plungril la plungnee ngi ru mdo ptan pik, then pme, ava kupṭoi rekka do psit lamme.
Nenni suwlbuwr khat tathloi chaak in, ava thu buw Inn sok klouvi ava mthung ngi then kchaa rome.
Mleija pnu tummi tlaai kdown ra thiimpu kparthaang rek ava ngi mun Kchiir thungki mdo arvan sin in hii avaki saadak rek ava songkowm tha mdo pkaak pthii lu in.
Ava leiji Jisu rukva Mma hii ava katti mii rek mdo tpinchel nra, paltong duwn tha kja kaham mdo parteel.
Ava leiji, nenni songkowm duwn tha chet in chera, ungu Mma ningkja na ava hurṭhi chaan chera diil inche.
Mleija hava tha nenni knet mer rang ki khuwpii tathloi in ava pme, pdainu kurjung rangki khuwpii ava nenni kthlaam tkurthut in.
Mma hin Isowr kpanpaak ki tlaaidown ava down in chera nowl thlit inche, tditta ner ki thei ava ngi Mma miing mdo dee chaak.
Kṭha ktlo ava naanni ado thloi in, kthemve thu mhai parngiil pik chmaan, mleija hanto lu tlaai downni Isowr ning kthlung.

Ber ksu rek pauthe apṭoi in, ungu mmaan kurdu ngi am in; mleija mlei kpiira mii rek heppi, mmaanni naanki raothla arkhii da ksut pṭoi kurthuwk lam. Mmaan plung kapja kma kanpa rek rekki atlo in, mleija naan akak nraan amnime.
Neen ktummi mhai ṭhil pik chaan, mleija do mkheng thu kdo tlot nuwm lei inni, plung thuw kindit kdo thloi chaak in kdingi neenva kdo bin chaak in.
Naan hin kbeiji neiji kikinlet nra, naanni hava ado tutlot pik raan, plung klutti akaktham chaak inna.
Tunva kṭuw knai kma ki paurina hii ngi klin langlangki Jao krung nenki Mukpu Jisu kdiyou dok thungki kipring pinle; kdaai ki Isowr ri,

Jisu Khrista do sut na thu mning kthlung, do kṭha khim khai thu naan akursom nraan, naanni Mma poibin ado tlot nraan, naan thung ngi nong ktlo kurthuwk; Mma hin kṭuw knai liit kma kpanpaak kurthuwk so. Amen.
Ku u knao rek, neiji naan hinni kthe chaakka, kuksop ki nei kpauna rek ava mhai parteel pik chaan, mleija neiji naan hin ktoi tekki kdo kjit chaak.
Nenki nu u nnao in Timothi ava mdo parthle dok, tdit naanni ado dee pandit raan, kbeiji mma mthlen ta mma tu kilṭhi ngi avel chlai inni.
Naan ki ber ksu rek mkheng leh kintiing rek mkheng ava leer khatti kurvui chaak lamma. Italy ki kthleng rekki aturvui chaak inna.
Akheng inna plungnee ngi aju kurthlo ṭhi chaan so. Amen.
Isowr ungta Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki sra owr khat Jeems ava ngi kinṭheu tir cha chati sowm lei knii rek hin tha: kurvui chaak lamma.
Neiki ku u knao rek, naanni kja kakham knempok aparteel in thu, mkheng ava kanpa ngi mhailo pik chaan,
mleija naanni adee in, tditta naan alamrin chaak kpirsin ni ado diil chaak nraanki mdo thuwṭhi.
Ungta naanni do khat lee ado kriin ma nraan, mkinreel ungu kurkhum dok akurthut nraan, naan dodiil chaak ava ngi mdo purkhum dok.
Ku mii khat lousing kvaat ma amta, mii mkheng hin pau ktaak liitti plung kneiji kpii Isowr hin aṭhil chaso, ungu Mma ngi mhin kpii chra.
Pdainu plung kinṭheek liit kma mma ngi aṭhil chso, mleija plung kinṭheek mii do ṭhil ava tarthli do juwn truwn hep daat.
Mleija plung kinṭheek ungu mlam mkheng thu plung krip kma miilai ava ngi Mukpu hinki do khat lee karlaang chrangki bin cha mso.
Plung kjuwm ku u knaova mdo khiin pik leiji napal atlo chso,
ungu suwang miiva plung kdowng ngi napal atlo chso, mleija nowmsuwl paar lulu ngi mma ava kṭuh chra.
Mleija kniw kthuwkki kdung pchaida msat cheva nowmsuwl ava kpurvui kchalu; mreipaar ṭuh chda, ungta mrungchen kmawng kcha. Anto lulu ngi suwang miilai rukka mdu suk thung ngi kchuwl kcha kurthuwk.
Kja kakham kparteel mii ava msuwkṭha, mleija mma ngi kpirsin mri mpha thu, Isowr wonsat klo kcha rek hin pau mdo reel pik dok rinkhu ki laar luwkhum mma ngi karlaang chra.
Mii ava mapthleem mpha thu ku mii khat lee ngi, “Neia Isowr ri mdo tipthleem,” kdingi kthe rome; mleija kṭha kma ngi Isowr va pthleem me, ungu Mma mdaksaa rukva ku khat lee pthleem me.
Pdainu mii pum ktai ava Mma do ngei thu, ungu Mma mdak kat do ngei thu kchet rangki mdo pthleem.
Audilli plungbin kurmowl ava ngi pnu pṭouda; ungta pnu mkurchuwl dok leh kdiyou mdo pṭou.
Nei kwonsat lo chaak ku u knao rek, kurhuwng chmaan.
Kṭha baanjam khim khai ungu kinreel chla khim khaija tun knungki kthleng, Mma ava karthleng liit me mdit mata kjiingnu kur owl kma mar awngki Npah ava hinki kurjung.
Mma do seem rek do ava thungki ru kri ngi thei mkurthuw nra, Mma mdaksaa kat plung binni nenna kindit pauna ava thu mido tiṭhi chaak in.
Nei kwonsat lo ku u knao rek, hava adei in. Mii pum ktaija karyaa thu knaa ksing, kpau thu naam naammi kpau, naam naammi plung kthi kurthuwk so.
Mleija miilai plung thitti Isowr ki rinkindit nong tlo pchaang me.
Ava leiji, ktobor ungu kṭha kma nong ktlo mkheng ma pthiida, naanki raothla rek kaktlan kap pchaang mdo pṭau dok pauna kparneem ava tu kilṭhi ngi mhai arlaan pik chaan.
Pdainu pauna ava ktlo rek kurthuwk in, naan adaksaan kurhuwn chaak nangi karyaa daat kurthuwk maan.
Mleija ku mii khatti pauna ava aryaa thida ktlo mkurthut mabi, mma ava meenseen thu mdaksaa ki nopa mai ksuw kcha ava hep daat.
Mleija mma ngi mthina ki nopa mai suw chthida, mche nrang tha mche dok che, tak hep lu kdu ping tdit mma ngi mdo parngiil pthii.
Pdainu kinteu kcha ki Nowlam mkinreel ksuw kcha ava, kdet liit kma ka am, mdo parngiil pthii ra knaa daat ktikiin kma pdainu mnong ktlo mii ava ngi mnong tlot thu msuwkṭha ra.
Ku mii khatti miplei mukjowng pchaan ma, ungu muplung ril thu kurhuwng chda, dhormo kneiji mkarbin bi, ava lu miilai dhormo ava do ksi ava pme.
Npah in Isowr maiṭhuwm ki kbuwr liit kma kchiir dhormo ava hava: Sranao rek ungu meikhu rek jat kham thu kvel, ungta dultipaam ki ktobor thu mdaksaa karneeng da ka am ava.
Neiki ku u knao rek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista,ungu laarnee ki Mukpu krin cha thu ksan ksui tlo maan.
Mleija naan akunpun in mpha thu jeering khutpaar knaa, dona mman klu ngi kurthlong mii thleng sora, ungu sra miilai khat rukva dona pliw ngi kurthlong sora marvan lu mpha thu,

ungta naanni mik klor maiklor ava kukthok betti suwda, “Awonsatti hava thu mhai ko on pik chaan,” dida the thida Sra miilai ava hin “Nang nga autha erip daat,” mdit mata “Nei kukhu ther tha eko ong,” dida kthe akurthut innu,
naan asingreel inni pjiir inti nu ungu kṭha kma poithuw ngi kekṭewl maan timo?

Nei kwonsat lo ku u knao rek, mhai aryaak pik chaan. Krin cha thu suwang kthuwk rangki Mma wonsat lo rek hin pau mdo reel pik dok rek Kruwngpaam ki charuwl rek rang ngi dultipaam thungki sra owr rek ruk Isowr va kchol memo?
Pdainu naanva sra mii ava kjat pik maan ti. Naan suwk akupthuwk in, kekṭewl lusang thu akuhowl in mmaan ava suwang rek pmemo?
Naan atun ki tak kjat kurhui amiing in ava mmaan ni mdo jowm chaak in pmemo?
Kchiir Laaika dil kṭoiji, “Nah adaksaa lulu ngi aveen wonsat alo,” dida mdo the kinreel siiki Nowlam ava kindit deekki apurkhum chaak inbi, kṭha deekki ktlo in pti.
Pdainu naanni ksan ksui atlot inbi, naanna pnu ktla kchaan pti, ungu kar mak nong ktlo rek lulu ngi Nowlam mi atikṭewl inna.
Pdainu ku mii khatti Nowlam mkheng karkhiik chaakka, dida karthe pdainu khat pang thu mapchaan mabi, mma ava mkheng tun mpar ma a.
Mleija, “Losang ṭhima,” dida kthe mma ngi “Mii eayou ma,” kdi rukva theda. Naanni losang kṭhi kma pdainu mii a eayo inbi, Nowlam ki kpar mak ava in pti.
Ava leiji kintek Nowlam kurdu ngi mdo kṭewl rang heppi tpau ruk pau in ungu ta tlot ruk atlo in.
Mleija wonsat knei kma ku mii khat hin thangva wonsat ktaakki mdo kṭewl pik; anto daat joso wonsat ava ngi kekṭewl ava mdo pchaan.
Nei ku u knao rek, ku mii khatti krin chaakka dida karthe thida, pdainu mnong mtlot mabi, ava tak msit ka am da? Mdo rin chaakki mma ava kaktlan pik rangmo?
A u anao in psel mdit mata acher in khatti mdo hiil naak ra thloi msora ungu mnii ktai ki then mikriin nu,
Naan ku mii khatti mhin inni, “Kdaaiji vang chbak, klum deekki am, apoi pa chso,” dida the thida, daksaa do kriin do khat lee mpurdon pik mabi, ava tak msit ka amda?
Ava leiji krin kcha rukka mnong ma am mabi, mthina ngi kdiyou cha.
Pdainu ku mii khatti kthera, “Nangva rin chti neiva mnong ngi kdo tlot,” anong rek kma ado rin chaak ava mhai tdet, ungu nei rukva klamrin chaaka mnong ngi aju tdet ni.
Isowr ra khdaat tdit ado rin chaak in; kṭha deekki ava ado tlot in. Tarnam rek daat rukva mdo rin chaak, ungu mṭit inni kunchun lam.
Do ksi kma mii rek naan, mnong ktaakki krin cha ava mthei ktaak tdit naanni adee nuwm inna?
Nenki npah in Abraham mi suwlbuwr tunni mchapa downda mpiik mpha thu ava mnong rekki mdo pandang pmemo?
Krin cha ava mnong rek tu kilṭhi ngi kchet ve, ungu krin cha ava mnong rekki mdo purkhum tdit naanni ado dee in.
Ungta Kchiir Laaika ava kindit, “Abraham mi Isowr rin chda, ungu ava rinkindit khatti mdolo pik,” dida mdo the ava kurkhum dok; ungu mma ava Isowr plap mdo dit.
Mii ava mnong rekki mdo pindit pik, ungu mdo rin chaak daat pme tdit naanni ado dee in.
Ungta anto lulu ngi ko ok kma Rahab ruk va, tamsii rek ava arlaang chthida, lam msik khat tha mdo sii ava mnong ngi mdo pindit pik pmemo?
Mleija Pthla ktaak daksaa ava kdiyou kcha lulu, mnong ktaakki krincha rukka kdiyou.
Neiki ku u knao rek, naan mii knempokki chukpu rek kurthuwk maan, mleija kurchuk nen ava hin klin ungu kparsa langlang ngi kekṭewl ra tdit ado dee in.
Mleija nen nkheng inni do knempok tparma lu in, ungu ku mii khatti mpau na thu mparma liit mabi, mma ava kinreel miilai khat kurthuwkka, mdaksaa mkheng rukka kukjowng pchaang ra.
Nen mido tupṭoi nraan nenni skowl ner rii happi nner inna nipṭen inbi, nenni ndaksaa mkheng ruk tu howl ra.
Arkuwng pii rek ruk mhai sut pik chaan; kling langlang ungu kheel siiki tchang kraang ngi juwn daat joso nareeng kdil suwnni kuhowl mii ava ngi mdo howl nuwmna tha mdo howl.
Anto lulu ngi plei ava daksaa thungki msing kdilsuwn, ungu klin klin do napal mdo tlot. Paam klinpa ava meiṭai suwnni mdo thlaar kre.
Ungta plei ava mei lulu. Nen nthungki msing khat plei ava ngi rinkindit kma dultipaam thu kṭha kma ṭoujouda, rinkhu mkheng nga meiji ṭuwngda sim meiji kṭuwng cha.
Mleija nowmsaa, plung ngi kundowt, truwn thungki mdo seem msik msikki do puwa ava tipmeeng pchaang da, ungu ava dultimii ngi mdo tipmeen.
Pdainu dultimii ku mii khat lee ngi plei ava tipmeeng pchaangme. Karnga liit kma kṭha kma khat, kdiyou kruw ngi kdim kcha.
Ava ngi nenni Mukpu ungu Npah panpaak in minnu, ungu ava ngi nenni Isowr arling klou mii ava pauhur tbuk naan.
Ner khdaat thungki phowl kṭha leh pauhur kthuwkve. Neiki ku u knao rek, hava anto liit rang pme.
Diitlaang kphul khdaat thu dii kthlum leh kakha kphulve kromo?
Nei ku u knao rek, kduwt ding leen kruwn kchui mdit mata rik rou leen kduwt kchui rang mo? Ptih dii thu dii kṭha kthuwk pchaang pme.
Naan arlakki ksing ungu kdei pandi ku ka am in ptida? Lousing ki plung kparneem mi mma nong ava kṭha rinkhu ava ngi atidet chso.
Pdainu naan plungril thu kakha kheithe ungu mdaksaa kparning ma ambi, napal tlot na maan ungu kindit tunni pleinei maan.
Havalu lousing nga tun knungki arjung kṭum ava pme pdainu dultipaam pthla ktongki, dijabowl hinki.
Mleija kheithe leh daksaa kparning amna thungva kar mak vevu ungu kṭha kma nong ktlo khim khai ka amlu.
Pdainu tun knungki lousing ava ru kri ngi Kchiir, au dilli kdaai, plung kparneem, mlei ko ol, wonsat knei leh kṭha theiji kdim, plung chel karche mdit mata plung ktobor ame.
Ungta rinkindit thei ava kapdaai rek dovar kdaai ava.
Ava ngi naan arlakki kar ai kalrai rawl kurdu mdo thuwṭhi pme mo? Naan thungki msing rek ava ngi rawl karnaak ṭhira ngei maanti mo?

Naanni kdung ngi ado ngei in ungu thloi maanti; ava leiji naanni mii ado eayo in. Ungta naanni khei ado the naan pdainu phang chmaan ti, ava leiji naanni kar ea ṭhiin ti rawl ado karnaak ṭhiin. Naanni thloi maanti, mleija ṭhil chmaan ti.
Naanni aṭhil chaak in ungu arlaang chmaan ti, mleija naanni ado kinthlet loi raan kar makki ado ṭhil chaak in.

Trin chaak kurhui kma mdo seem miirek! Dultipaam plap kurthuw ṭhi ava Isowr kipteng tdit dei maan timo? Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da ku mii khatti dultipaam plap mkurthut ṭhi nuwmbi, mdaksaa ava Isowr kipteng mpurthuw a.
Mdit mata “Nen nthung ngi ka am Mma ngi mdo seem Pthla ava kdung kheithe nda,” dida Kchiir Laaika ngi mdo the ava do ksi kma naanva abin inmo?
Pdainu Mma ngi kheel setti mipii inda; ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda Laaika ngi theda, “Isowr ri kpohok rek ava mat da, pdainu plung kdowng rekka plungnee pii chlamda.
Ava leiji Isowr kurdu ngi naan adaksaan na karpii chaan. Dijabowlli amat indon ungu naan hinki kchen chra.
Isowr hintha nai chaan ungu Mma ngi naan hin aknai pik chraan. Pnu kirvei rek naan, akhut in apartleu chaan, ungu plung kunṭhuwn ni am maan, aplungril in apchiir chaan.
Kdung kja ngi ungu kurnung karbaang inra ṭap in. Naan apnii inna kurnung karbaang tha ungu akanpat inna aplung in jiinna ktong thang ra.
Naan adaksaan ava Mukpu maiṭhuwm mi plung kdowng ngi am in ungta Mma ngi akikhiing chraan.

Ku u knao rek, khat ti khat mraal kpii ngi kṭha kma pau karthe nmaan. Mu u mnao mraal kpii ngi kṭha kma pau kthe, mdit mata mu u mnao kekṭewl, Nowlam mraal kpii ngi kṭha kma pau kthe ngi Nowlam kṭewl maan. Pdainu naanni Nowlam akṭewl inbi, naanna Nowlam kupṭoi kurthuwk maanti, pdainu kekṭewl miilai khat in pti.
Kaktlan ungta ke eakrep kapchaang Mma ava Nowlam kpii ungu kekṭewl khdaat kurthuwk. Pdainu mveen kekṭewl nah ku pti da?
“Snii mdit mata pduk nii ngi nenni khuwpii hava thu chet in chera ava tha kum khat am in che, tphaak chaak raan sumdowl lou inche,” dida kthe naanna tun tunni arvaan.
Pduk niiva tak kthuwk rang tdit naanni dei chmaan ti. Naan arinkhu inna talu da? Mleija naanna mpha mruk tummi kandang thida kmawng kcha mnil ava in pti.
Ava kchang nga, “Mukpu poibin mkurthutta, nenni ring in min don hava mdit mata ava tatlot ra,” dida naanni ado the raan.
Pdainu tunva naanni kpohok ungu kparlin nong atlot inna. Hantolu hep daat kparlin ktlo mkheng ava kṭha pme.
Ku mii khatti mkindit dei chda, ungu ktlo kma mma ava pnu.
Tun tunni arvaan, suwang rek naan, atun thaanni kthleng slii kja kakham tummi ṭap chaan ungu owng in.
Naan suwanthuw ava kṭop kcha a, ungu ado ana inna ngeetti mupṭum thutta.
Naanki jeering ungta jeering kpowl ava tampei kakaak kcha a, ungu tampei ava ngi naanki sakhi kurthuwk ra ungu mei lulu ngi naan adaksaan kchaara. Mṭut na nit rek tummi naanni alrou apurtuwl inna.
Asuw in, naan bil thu bil knum rek arda man, naanni ado kardowl daak rekki owng lamda; ungu kakhau rek own ava mpunpa ngi Mukpu knaa kthlung nga.
Naanni dultipaam thu arthlu arle ungu kngei ning kthlung ngi ka am in pti; mdo suryo nra nit khat kira aplung inna apmer inna.
Naanni rinkindit mii ava mraal pii inti, te eayo ruk ado eayo in; mmaanva amat inme.

Ava leiji, ku u knao rek, Mukpu murjun du khim khaiji adiil dei chaan. Asuw in, mman klu langlang dultimii leen kpanma ungu kukto ngi khuw mrat du khim khai bil knum mii ngi khaang da mdo ardat chaak.
Naan rukva adiil dei chaan. Aplungril in apṭhang chaan, mleija Mukpu arjun nrang nga knai tekka.
Ku u knao rek, naanna ado tekṭewl ma nraan khat leh khat kurnur maan; asuw in, kekṭewl ava thurngot bulli krip daatta.
Ku u knao rek, Mukpu miing ngi khulpu rekki kja kakham mdo diil in ava lulu kurthuwk in.
Asuw in, knetti kakhaang rek ava neenva kanpa kdo dit lu in. Naanni Job do khaang ava ado aryaak dok in, ungta Mukpu wonsat lo ungu wonsat knei Mukpu ki mṭut na nit ava naanni ado dee in.

Pdainu ku u knao rek, hava mkheng tun, parwaan mdit mata dulti mata ktlok miing kthamda paureel maan, pdainu ado tekṭewl ma nraan, naanni ong ngi ado dit raan ava ong ngi adi in, eme ado dit raan ava eme adi in.
Naan arlakki kja kakham ku mii khat ka ammo? Mma ngi aṭhil chso. Kanpa ku mii khat ka ammo? Mma ngi kanpa laa atheso.
Naan arlakki kukoi ku mii khat ka ammo? Mma ngi Rinlop ki kver rek a ownso ungu mmaanni mma tumra Mukpu miing ngi thao apbul lam sora, aṭhil pik lamso.
Ungta krin cha rek do ṭhil pikki kukoi miilai ava kaktlan chra, ungu Mukpu ngi kpardel prip pik chra; ungta mma ngi pnu marve bi, Mma ngi kuptlot pik chra.
Ava leiji, naanni adam chaak nraan, khatti khat hin apnu ton in athe thuw in, ungu khat leh khat tummi karṭhil pik in. Rinkindit miilai khat do ṭhil ava kheel li ruktang ngi nong mdo tlot.
Elijah ava nen ndaksaan kat heppi dulti miilai khat, ungta khuw mrat ma nra plung klutti mma ngi ṭhil chda, ungu kum kdum thla truk lik thu dultipaam thu khuw rame.
Audilli mma ngi ṭhil nowlda ungbi parwaan ki khuw prat pik chda, ungta dultipaam ava ngi chasowm arkun chda.
Neiki ku u knao rek, naan arlakki ku mii khatti kindit thu mparvai chaak ungu ku mii khatti atiṭhi pinlet inta,

mlam ṭoi rang thungki parvai da kar makki ka am kcha, pnu kirvei khat arvan kṭhi pinle mma ava kdiyou dok thungki mraothla kaktlan pik chra ungta mupnu ton knempok ava kupkhum pik chra tdit mma ngi adeiso.
Jisu Khrista ki kenyee khat Pitor ri, Pontas thu, Galatia thu, Kapadosia thu, Asia thu, ungu Bethania thung ngi ṭhek kinṭheu tir da paam suwkki ka am rek,
Chodu reeppi Kpah Isowr ri kcholda ungu Jisu Khrista pauthe mdo pṭoi nraan Pthla do tpinchel dok ungta Mma hii kthuwk ava ngi mdo alṭhut dok rek hintha: Plungnee leh kdaai naan athung ngi dim chso.
Nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki Mpah Isowr ava panpaak chaan che! Mma wonsat klin langlang ngi kdiyou dok thungki Jisu Khrista kring karheel thu kring kbin changi nnenna renni kṭou cha,
Ungta kmawng kmara, kbuwr liit kma, kchuwl kma naan atumra Parwaan tha mdo arkhiik, alrou ava tphaak chaak nraan lei.
Mṭut na nit ki mpha thu Isowr rutanni kandang ra mdo purchuwl dok nen tkirliin chaak nra kring thu ado tseel psuk pik in.
Mpha mruk tummi tun tun naanni kja kakham knempok parteel daat jown tiva, hava thu naanna kanpa kcha in pti.

Ava leiji naan do rin chaak plung klut ava meiji pirsin na joso kmawng chra mman klu jeering kheel dekki Jisu Khrista kpurphuwng thu kpanpaak ungu mlaarknei ungta kakjat pik mkurthut nra ado tpirsin naan.
Mma ava naanni kdei liit kma wonsat lo chaan tinu, tun tunni naanni dei cha mjownti, Mma ava rin chaan tinu kanpa kcha in pti, ungu kheel siingi kanpa chnaan di.
Naan do rin chaakki araothla in kirliing ado phaak chaak in.
Kirliing hava mlei thu naan ado rangki kurthuwk plungnee ava pau kphuwng khulpu rekki mdo thlaam in.

Khrista ngi kja mdo parteel ava kthe thuw ungu dil thang ki laarnee mdo phaak ra ava mmaan thu ka am Khrista ki Pthla ngi mdo the pik dok lam ava tak hep kdu mii mdit mata talu mpha thung rang kdingi thlaam lamda.

Tditta mmaanni mdaksaan sok lou lamme, pdainu naan tumra mmaan hin pandang da, Parwaan ki mdo arjuk sii Pthla Kchiir rekki naan hin kṭha paumin kparyaam mmaan ava tun tun naan hinni atithe pik inna, hava do ava Waan tamsii rek rukva kdung mdo dee nuwm chaak in.
Ava leiji, aplungril in apnet chaan; kle apjaang in, Jisu Khrista mkurphuwn thu naan hin kthleng plungnee tun kdung kbin cha ngi plung athii chaan.
Kthe kupṭoi kmo rek lulu, chodu ngi adee pandit chaak maan thu a am in lulu ngi am maan.
Pdainu naan aku own kchaan Mma Mchiir lulu ngi, naan adaksaan rukka ache atlown nraan, mkheng thu chiir in.
Mleija Laaika thu kjit da, “Kchiir ri am in, mleija Neia Kchiir ping.”
Ungta ksan ksui ktaakki mii pum ktaiji mnong tlot dil kṭoiji kekṭewl Mma ava naanni Apah adit inbi, naan adaksaan ava paam suwkki a am in mpha thu kṭi ngi am in.
Jeering kpowl mdit mata kmawng chra do kma, naan apah le thungki ado phaak chaak in do ksi kma rinkhu ava thungki in pti.
Pdainu tupsul na ktaak mdit mata kbii ktaak Jaonao khat lulu ngi, Khrista ki hii mman klu langlang ngi ado tren dok in.
Mma ava dultipaam mpunchoi du liitti mdo kchol dok ksa, pdainu naan tumra mpha mṭut na thang ngi mdo pandan.
Naan do rin chaak leh ado bin chaak in ava Isowr hin mkurthut nra, kdiyou dok thungki pring pinle da, Mhin ni laarnee pii chda, Mma thu naanni Isowr hin plung knet cha in pti.
Naan ki a u anao rek in ava kdung wonsat klo cha ngi araothla in ava kindit kthe kupṭoiji apartleu chaan.
Kmawng chrangki muh kma pdainu kmawng liit kma rangki muh ngi kring ungta kakbaang thlit daat Isowr ki pauna ngi naanna ren ṭouvi kṭou kcha in pti.
Mleija,
“Daksaa mkheng nga nowm lulu,
ungta mlaarnee mkheng nga nowm paar lulu.
Nowm ava kpurvui cha,
ungu mreipaar ava kṭuh cha,
pdainu Mukpu pauna ava ṭuwnai me.”
Naan hinki kṭha paumin karyaam ava hava.
Ava leiji mii ngi khu siir mdo parthit nrangki mkheng ungta naan ki aṭhat nmaan mkheng ungu plung klut kma, kheithe, titi pau ksaam mkheng ama pthii dok in.
Ren thokki kṭou ro nao kdowng heppi naanni kirliing ado phaak chaak nraan, Pthla ktongki arnuw dii anee in.
Mleija Mukpuki wonsat ava naanni ado partem dok in.
Mii rekva mdo pthlei pdainu Isowr mik sut na thu mman klu langlang ngi mdo kchol lung ava hin arvaan.
Ungta Jisu Khrista thu Isowr dolo kro, Pthla ktongki tlaai down ni ado tdown nraan, naan adaksaan rukka hava kring lung heppi, Pthla ktong ki inn ksa kurthuwk in.
Mleija Laaika thu theda, “Asuw in,
Siyon thu mdo kchol dok mman klu langlang,
markil ki lung khat Neiji kphun na,
ungu Mma krin cha mii ava ningkja du nime.”
Ava leiji, mman klu langlang Mma ava naanni arin chaan, pdainu krin cha kma rek tumva,
“Inn ksa pangi mdo pthlei lung ava katti,
markil ki kcho ril kurthuwkka.”
Ungta
“Lung khat ava mii rek khu siir parthit na,
Lungpii ava mtluk chaak naan ra;”
mleija mmaanni pauna ava ning mdo pu ui maan leiji khusiir kparthi ava mmaan tum kat ra dida mdo purtum.

Pdainu naanna kjiingnu thungki kheel siiki mar awng tha ado to own dok in, tditta Mma ngi tngana nong rek mdo tlot ava kthethuw ra, mdo kchol dok chati, kruwng khatki thiimpu ra, kchiir chati rek leh Isowr miirek rangki in pti.
Mpha khat thungva naanna mii pmaan ti pdainu tunva Isowr miirek in pti; mpha khat thungva naanni wonsat arlaang chmaan ti pdainu tunva naanni wonsat ado arlaan chaak in.
Kwonsat lo rek, naanki raothla rawl ado karnaak ṭhiin daksaa do ngei thungki ado ser nraan, mal rek leh paamsuwk rek lulu ngi neiji akaktham chaak inna.
Kar mak nong ktlo rek dida kaplaal li mmaanni mpau ma nraan ktlok chati rek arlakki naanki kṭha nong mmaanni deida kvel nit thu Isowr kpanpaak mkurthut nraan kṭha ngi echet tlowng in.
Mukpu tummi dultimii nopa khim khai ava kurdu ngi am in, kinreel siiki paam kpu hin,
mdit mata kar mak ktlo rek mraal kpii ra paam kpu rek hin ruk va atlo in, ungu kindit nong ktlo mii apanpaak in.
Mleija kṭha deekki ado tlot in ava ngi ka aak mii rek do dee pandit ma ava rim kdi kthii pthii ava Isowr poibin.
Kintek mii rek lulu ngi am in, anto daat joso naan akinte chaak in ava kṭha kma ado khum nraan heppi sinton maan; pdainu Isowr sra owr rek heppi am in.
Mii mkheng akjat chaan. A u anao in kthuwk ava wonsat alo in. Isowr aṭi chaan. Paam kpu ak kjat in.
Sra owr rek, naanki plung ṭhat leh plung down ava daat kma pdainu kdung ado diil in rukva, kak kjat mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi naanki kpu rek kurdu ngi am in.
Mleija Isowr dobin mkurthut leiji, kindit kma ki kja kakham parteel da, kdiil cha mii ava mdo rot pik.

Mleija naanni kar mak nong ado tlot lei inni ado tbun in ava akhaan chaak innu, ava tak ksi rang da? Pdainu naanni kindit tloda ungu ava leiji kja kakham parteel da, kdung adiil chaak inbi, naanna Isowr do rot pik ava in pti.
Mleija hava kpha thu aju own chaan da, tditta naanni Mma khunee ado ṭoi chaak nraan, naan akurchu chaak nraan ado tmaak pik in, mleija naan tummi Khrista rukva kja kakham mdo parteel.
Mma ava pnu tla me; mner thu kar mak pau khat lee thuwk me.
Mma ava mrai chaak in mpha thu, Mma va rai purthul me; Mma ngi kja kakham mphaak thu, pṭit lamme; pdainu kindit deekki kekṭewl Mma hin lam mdo rin chaak.
Nenni pnu ktongtha diyou da rinkindit ktong tha kring tkurthut chaak nraan, ding leen Mma mdaksaa katti, nenki pnu mihur pik inda. Mma kchung kbii ngi naanna kdam ado phaak chaak in.
Mleija naanna Jao lulu ngi kparvai kcha in pti, pdainu tunva Jao krung ungu naanki raothla rek kseel Mma hin kinle kcha in pti.
Anto lulu ngi numei rek, naanki innpu kurdu ngi am in, tditta ku mii khat mursonni pauna kupṭoi kma kurthuwk daat lam joso, mmaanki numei lamchet ṭhatti, pauna ktaak liitti,
mmaanni naan no ṭhat ungu lamchet kṭha mdee in mpha thu kpha kcha kurthuwk lamra.
Naanna mduwn ni kirsim sam keher, jeering ngi kirsim, ungu dona mman klu hiil naa maan.
Pdainu plung ngi kurdowl miilai plung kparneem ungta Pthla ngi kdaai kmawng liit kmara ava ngi kirsim chaan, ava Isowr do sut na thu mman klu.
Chodu ngi plung klut snu rekki anto kirsim lamda mmaanki innpu rek kurdu ngi ka am lam.
Anto lulu ngi Sarah ngi Abraham do the pṭoida, mhin Mukpu kdingi mdo own chaak. Ungta naanni kindit tlo da do khat lee ngi atipṭit maanbi, tunva naanna mma naole in pti.

Anto lulu ngi innpu rek, naanki numei ava kapchaang chlang lang pme kdingi kak kjat pik cha tu kilṭhi ngi am in, mleija naanna rinkhu plungnee ki charuwl rek mdo punlom dok in pti. Tditta naan do ṭhil ava mdo pkhaan ma nra, naanki numei rek kbin pikki am in.
Mṭut na rel tha naan akheng inni Pthla ki plung khdaat, plung kinṭim, mu u mnao wonsat klo, plung kparneem, ungta plung kdowng ngi am in.

Kṭha kma tummi kṭha kma pinle maan, mdit mata krai tummi rai pinle maan; pdainu ava kchang nga phowl kṭha apii chaan, mleija naanni phowl kṭha ado phaak chaak nraan hava tummi naanna ado tu own dok in.
Mleija,
“Rinkhu wonsat klo ungu,
kṭha nit rek kdei cha nuwm mii ava,
kṭha kma thu plei knei ungta,
kṭha kma pau mdo the nrang thungki mner arkhii chso.
Mma ngi kṭha kma thungki kinle sora ungu kindit atlo chso;
mma ngi kdaai athlaam sora mdu suk asomchso.
Mleija Mukpu mikka rinkindit rek leen ka am,
ungu maknaa ava mmaan do ṭhil chaak thu kparvang.
Pdainu Mukpu ngi kṭha kma ktlo rekka mraal mdo piik.”
Naanni kindit chang kaptlaak akurthut innu, tunva naan sul akpurnul raanna ku rang da?
Pdainu rinkindit leiji naanni kja kakham aparteel inbi, suwkṭha kurthuwk naan. Mmaan ava ṭi chmaan mdit mata plung pja maan.

Pdainu naan plung ril thu Khrista ava Mukpu kdingi ak kjat chaan. Naan thu ka am kbin kcha leiji akikhewl in mii pum ktai ado arthaan pik nraan mpha ktai thu apurchuwl chaan, anto daat joso plung kdowng plung kparneemmi atlo in.
Khrista thu naan alam chet in kṭha ava do ksi kma thleer ri ajowm chaan da akrai kchaan ma am mpha thu ningkja mdo phaak chaak nraan, naan plung bin ava kindit deekki arkhii chaan.
Mleija Isowr poibin mkurthut bi, naanni kar mak nong ktlo thu kja kakham ado parteel in kchang nga kindit nong ktlo thu kja kakham ado phaak inni kṭha siira.

Mleija Isowr hin mido tiṭhi chaak nraan, rinkindit kma rek tummi, rinkidit deek Khrista ava rukka mii mkhengki pnu tummi vei khat pang thu mi diyo pik inda, daksaa ngi Mma ava diyou da, pdainu Pthla dil kṭoiji ring karheel da.
Mma Pthla ava ngi chet da rowng inn thu ka am pthla rek hin pau paryaam da.
Noha nit rek thu arkuwngpii msak slii thu Isowr ri kdung diil da mardat mpha thu, pthla rek ava ngi pṭoi lamme; ava thu ktlowm suwn tditta miilai tret rek daat dii thungki ktlan pik lamda.
Baptis ktlo hava ngi arthawng purlup da, tunva naanna ado taktlan pik dok in, daksaa tun ki ktobor tuknuwl pthii lulu pme, pdainu Jisu Khrista rin karheel thu, Isowr plung kindit chel ava ngi theda,
Mma ava Parwaan tha hungkal da Isowr khut chang ktong tha ka am, Waan tamsii rek, Pthla ktong ki rutan kthloi rekka Mma tingi ka am.
Ava leiji, Khrista ngi daksaa thu kja kakham mdo phaak leiji naan adaksaan ruk va ava poibin heppi ru alou chaan, mleija daksaa thu kja kakham kpha kcha rek mii ava pnu thungki mdo down dok.
Ava leiji arinkhu in ka am daat ava thu daksaa ktongtha dulti mii do ngei thu a am nowl ma nraan pdainu Isowr plungbin thu a am nraan lei.

Kṭha kma ktlo, daksaa do ngei, kdiil dei kma, ju kipri, lamchet kapta, lop loppi ju knee, nowlam ktaak khut do sak pthla luw kbuk, hava ktlo ngi ktlok chati do ngei thu mpha ado pve dok inna kukhoppa.
Naanni anto lulu ngi karleu nong thu pop adolo maan leiji mmaanna kngak kcha lamma, ungu khei atithe naanna.
Pdainu mmaanni kdiyou leh kring kekṭewl Mma hinni mlei kpii lamra.
Mleija hava leiji daksaa thu mii rek heppi kṭewl daat joso, Isowr hep daat Pthla thu mmaanni mdo rin chaak nraan, kṭha paumin ava kdiyou miirek hin rukva mdo paryaam pik.
Do mkheng ṭut nra ava knai tekka; ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da kilring chaan, ungu kṭhil cha thu plung knetti am in.
Mkheng tuwn ni ka am khat leh khat wonsat kurlo thu leek daak maan, mleija wonsatti pnu knempok mdo pkhum.
Knur liit kma khat leh khat kurkowl dei chaan.
Mii pum ktaiji chla khat karlaang kcha lulu ngi, Isowr ki msik msikki plungnee kṭha vai klou heppi khat leh khat hin mnong karpii chaan.

Ku mii khatti pau mthe ta, Isowr pau ksaam lulu ngi asaam so; sok klou ku mii khat va, Isowr do purdon rutan ni sok klou lulu ngi alou chso; tditta do khim khai thu Isowr ava Jisu Khrista thu mdo panpaak nrang lei kurthuwk. Mma hin kṭuw knai kma ki laarnee ungta rutan ava ka am. Amen.
Kwonsat lo rek, naan tuwn ni kpirsin ni kthleng meikṭuwng ava kngak reenni msik khat lik lik do khat kthuwk heppi karbin maan.
Pdainu Mma ngi laarnee mkandan mpha thu naan ruk kdung ngi kanpa ungu akanpat chaak nraan, Khrista jat kham kphaak ṭhi ngi kdung kanpa chaan.
Khrista miing leiji akrai kcha in ma ambi, naanna asuwnkṭha, mleija laarnee ki Pthla leh Isowr ava naan tunni ka am.
Pdainu naan ku mii khat lee ngi mi ke eayou, mdit mata kup pru, mata kar mak ktlo, mdit mata miipau na thu mlei ktaak liitti kpau thu kja pha chmaan.
Anto daat joso ku mii khatti Khristen khat heppi kja kakham mphaak chaak bi, mma ngi mning pjak mso, pdainu miing ava tingi Isowr apanpaak chso.
Mleija Isowr phungka thu kekṭewl mdo pṭhun nrangki mpha ava kveija; ungta ava nen nthung ngi mupṭhunbi, Isowr ki kṭha paumin kleek rek ṭut chaak nrang nga talu rang da?
Laaika ngi theda,
“Rinkindit miilai ava,
kparsa langlang ngi kaktlan pik mkurthuttu,
rinkindit kma rek leh pnu kirvei rekka tva tha kandang rang da?”
Ava leiji, Isowr plungbin dil kṭoiji kja kakham kdiil rekki trin chaak kurhui mido tapṭhan pik in ava ktongtha kindit nong ktlo ngi raothla rek ksil na lamra.
Ava leiji kver mdo kurthut ṭhi ungta Khrista jat kham sakhi kuhur kandang rangki laarnee ruk mtum ka am kphaak ṭhi naan arlakki ka am kver rek ava neiji kuk kso chaak lamma.
Ktlo nuwm kma lu kma pdainu ktlo nuwm rek rekki, ningkja na ngi mman lei kma, pdainu ning kakraalli plung klutti, naan arlakki Isowr Jao lop ava mhai seel pi chaan.
Naan ado tsil na tun kpaal na kma pdainu Jao rek lop tummi mkurchu chaak naan kurthuwk in.
Ungta Jao krung mkinreel ava mkandan mpha thu, naanni laarnee ki kchuwl kro kma laar luwkhum pha chnaan di.

Anto lulu ngi kmo bet va kvir bet tingi ma amra. Naan akheng nga khat leh khat plung kparneem tu kilṭhi ngi adaksaan na kparnaak in, mleija Isowr va kpohokka mdo mat pdainu plung kdowng hin plung kparneem mdo piik.
Ava leiji, mpha kcha deekki Isowr ri ado tikhiin chaak nraan, ruktang langlang Isowr khut ava tingi adaksaan na plung kdowng ngi am in.
Naanki ajat naan mkheng nga Mma hin avar deen chaan, mleija Mma ngi naanna tuk ado tu sut pik in.
Plung apnet chaan, mik khut ahar in. Naan akipteng in dijabowlli, humpii smang kruwn lulu ku mii khat mdo chaak nra thlaamda pang tlowng ngi ktlowng nga.
Krin cha thu knet merri mma ava amat in, tditta anto hep daat kja kakham kparteel ava dultipaam thu ka am a u anao in hin rukva kthuwk dok tdit ado dee in.

Ungta kṭuw knai kma laarnee ki tummi, Khrista thu mdo own dok naan ava, plungnee mkheng ki Isowr Mma daksaa katti, kja kakham mruk aphaak dil thaanni tipnet don akapṭhan pik craan, ungu ru aju kaptan pik raan.
Kṭuw knai liit kma Mma ngi kpaal kurthuwk so. Amen.

Trin chaak kurhuiji kdo bin chaak, neiki ku u knao Silvanas leiji neiji ktoi tekki kikjit chaakka, aksop chaan, ungu hava Isowr plungnee kindit pi dinu neiji kthe thut chaakka, ava thu knetti am chaan.
Bebylon tha ka am, anto heppi mdo kchol, mma rukva aturvui chaak inna; ungu anto lulu ngi kchapa Mak ruk va aturvui chaak inna.
Wonsat tu kilṭhi ngi khat leh khat kurput inra kurvui chaan.
Khrista thu ka am naan akheng hin kdaai amso.
Jisu Khrista ki sra owr khat ungu kenyee khat kurthuwk Simon Pitor ri nenki Isowr ungta kaktlan pik Jisu Khrista ki rinkindit rek nen tu kinṭim sappi krin cha kpha rek hintha:
Isowr leh nenki Mukpu kdei chaki lousing thu plungnee leh kdaai ava naan thung ngi knemmi kurjou kurthuwk so.
Nen mi ku own kchaan Mma kdei chaki lousing thu Mma mdak kat ki laarnee leh kinreel ki rinkhu ungu Isowr ktongki do mkheng nga Isowr rutanni mi rot pik inda.

Ava thu Mma ngi mman klu langlang ki leh klin langlang paureel nen nhin inni mihai pii chaanda, tditta kngei leiji dultipaam thungki ktobor knaam thungki ado tiṭen thuw chaak nraan, ungta Isowr ktongki rungchen kpha sap akurthut nraanki.
Mleija hava lei katti naanva ado rin chaak in kṭha ava tu kilṭhi da, ungu kṭha kdei chaki lousing tu kilṭhi da,
ungta kdei cha lousing nga daksaa kurjowng tu kilṭhi da, daksaa kurjowng ava kdiil dei tu kilṭhi da, kdiil dei ava Isowr ktongki tu kilṭhi da,
ungu Isowr ktongki ava unao ki karman tu kilṭhida, ungta unao ki karman ava wonsat tu kilṭhida, hanto ktopom kurthuwk.
Mleija havalea naan ado ungu mnembi, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista kdei cha ki lousing thu kurchuwl kma mdit mata mthei ktaak kurthuwk ni maan ti.
Mleija havale kthloi kma ku mii khat ava, mma ki pnu pliw ava mdo partleu pik dok kparngiil mii ava mik ktot ungta mbe ki tek daat mdo dee.
Ava leiji, ku u knao rek, ado tu own chaak in naan leh ado tuk kchol chaak naan ava knetti ado thiik nraan changtlaak athloi in, mleija naanni hava atlot inbi, tluw liit nimaan ti.
Ava leiji nenki Mukpu ungu kaktlan pik Jisu Khrista ki kṭuw knai kma Kruwngpaam alu chaak nraanki kekleemmi akpurdon pik chraan.
Ava leiji hava ado bin phaak nraan, naanni dei dokda, ungu naan dothloi kindit thu kapṭhang dok kurthuwk daat jownti, mpha ktai thu neiji ak pbin phaak chaak inna.
Hava daksaa ngi ka am khim khai thu, naan dobin phaak nangi, ado kukso in ava mkindit kurthuwk mo kdingi neiva kbin chaakka.
Mleija nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista do tdet dil kṭoiji, neiji kdaksaa kdo maak pthii nrangki mpha ava knai tekka tdit neiji kdee chaakka.
Ungta neiji ksun chaak dok diltha mpha ktai thu naanni hava ado bin phaak chaak nraan neiji suw chdaat nik di.

Mleija neenni nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki rutan leh kurjung rangki ava aktidet in mpha thu nopa ki paumin ava ksing rek rekki pṭoi chmaan ring, pdainu Mma kullaar ava neen kmik kat inni sakhi in ping.
Mleija Mma ngi Mpah Isowr hinki kak kjat leh laarnee marlaan chaak mpha thu, laarnee ki kullaar ri Mhin krowl khatti theda, “Hava Nei kwonsat lo Kchapa, Mma hin kdung ngi kning kthlung nga.”
Parwaan ki krowl kurju ava neenni aryaa chaannu, mleija Mma tu kilṭhi ngi Kchiir lown tuwn ka am sap in ping.

Ungta nenni tu thloi in khulpu rek pauna ava ngi kheel setti mihai pindit pik inda. Khuw mtlei du khim khai ungta plung thu vaarpa bursi marhan thuw du khim khai mmun kjiing thung ngi meila mlen lulu ngi, plung aplu chaak inbi, kṭha deekki tlo naandi.
Ru kri verri hava ado dee pandit raan, tditta Kchiir Laaika ki pau kphuwng ku mii khat lee ngi mthina daat ki pau kpurluppa ava pme.
Mleija pau kphuwng nga tden thung preva miilai do binni kthleng ava pme, pdainu Pthla Kchiir do thown mii rekki Isowr hinki pau mdo the.

Naan arlakki kindit kma chukpu rek kthuwk heppi, mii rek arlakki kindit kma khulpu rek kthuwk lamra, ke eakrep rang leiji kindit kma tup prut pau ksin lamra, mma kṭenthuw Isowr kat daat rap klua mat lamda, mmaan mdaksaan tuwnni kbei sekki mmawn chaak nraan pthuwk lamda.
Ungta mii maknemmi kṭha kma ktlo ava dil kṭoi chlamra, ungu mmaan leiji kindit lam ava krai chlamra.
Ungta makraam reen lei inni kindit kma pauvi pang the akthe psuk raan; mmaan nikar mak nong mdo tlot inna alraangki howngva liit lamme, ungu mmawn chaak nraan ava iip liitme.
