Mleija Waan tamsii rekki pnu mtlaak in mpha thungva Isowr ri ṭheek liit lamme, pdainu sim thu mvar pthiin, ungu mdo kṭewl nlam rangki nit mphaak du khim khai kjiingnu khur thu ktuh da mdo thiik pthii lam.
Mma ngi alraangki dultipaam ava kṭheek kma pdainu Isowr kbin kma rek dultipaam ava tun diipa mdo pinlet, rinkindit ki pau ksaam Noha ava mii murson tikheu rek tu kilṭhi ngi mdo ṭheek.
Sodom leh Gomorah hava khuwpii knii ava purvut kjuwng daatti mraal piida, ungta Isowr kbin kma rek ki mkurchu chaak naan.
Ungta kṭha kma ava ngi kṭha kma nong tuptlot lamda kdung ngi mkinthlet naan kurthuwk, rinkindit Lot ava Mma ngi mdo ṭenthuw pik.
Mleija rinkindit miilai ava ngi mmaan arlakki ma am thu mdo dee ungu mdo aryaak, mmaan ki nowlam ktaakki nong mdo tlot in ava mnii ktaiji rinkindit ki raothla mdo owr chaak.
Audilli mdo kṭewl nrangki nit ava mphaak du khim khai Isowr kbin cha rek mii ava ṭenthuw da, ungu rinkindit kma rek ava mraal kpii tingi arkhii da mdo thiik ava Mukpu ngi mdo dee.
Ungta kheelli kanthle ktardou ki nong kbinni kbuwr ungu rutan pum ning kpu ui kma mii ava Mma ngi mdo dee.
Mmaan ava plung ktaak, ungu kpohok, mmaanni mlaar knei langlang khat ava kṭi kma mdo rai chaak in.
Waan tamsii rap klua kheel sii ngi ktang ungu mru tang daat joso Mukpu maiṭhuwm mi kṭewlda ungu krai kcha tlo me.
Pdainu hava lea mdoi pummi mdo seem saa rek heppi, mdo pman ra ungu mdo eayo rang ngi kṭou, mlei kdei pandi kma krai mmaan ava mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi kinṭim chakki mmawn chaak nraan, ke eakrep lamra.
Kar mak nong mdo tlot lei inni kar makki kja chlamra. Kanthle ktardou rekki suwn kanpat loi lamda, mmaanna achaak aneek ṭhiin mpha thu mnopa inni kanthle tardou lamda kbii pum ungu kar mak kcha lam.
Mmik inna losang kṭhi ngi kdim kcha a, pnu tummi pneel liit lamme. Mmaanni knet kma raothla ava pman lamda. Muplung ril inna kakraam kurchu ndok lamda. Mmaanna pauhur ki naole lam.
Mmaanni kar mak nong ktlo thu mdo kat nraan ngei lamda, Boer chapa Balam lamṭoi ṭoi lamda, kindit pthlei lamda leledung ngi kchet chlamma.
Pdainu dultimii pauvi arkowk da; ki ewng kcha skowlraam mi dultimii krowl khatti khulpu ava pkhaan da.
Hava lea dii ktaak diitlaang ungu tirthli khuw dorei pthii armei rek lam; mleija mmaan tumra kjiingnu khur ava mdo ṭheek daat.
Mleija mmaanni ka aak napal pau the lamda, kindit kma thungki raanṭhul li karthlet kcha mii rek ava daksaa ktongki kar mak ktlo thu archil lamda.
Mmaanni kintekki ma am nraan pau preel lamda, pdainu mmaan mdaksaan na ktobor naam ki sowk rek lam; mleija miilai khat do pchaan ku mii khatta ava ki suwk.

Mleija mmaanni nenki Mukpu ungu mi kaktlan pik in Jisu Khrista kdei cha thu dultipaam ki kbuwr nong thungki mkarthle chaak dok in dil tha, mmaanna kbuwr nong thu kman nowl lamda, ungu kpar chaan chaak lamda, mṭut na thangva ru kri ki hinva kheel sii.
Mleija mmaan hinni mdo parlaan Kchiir paureen kdei kdeiji mdil thaanni mdo kinlet daak in hinva, rinkindit lam ava mdo dee liit maanni kṭha sii.
Kindit pauril dil kṭoiji mmaan hin thuwk kat da, uiji mkunso chaa nowlda ungta tulṭhut dok vaksuwn ni bul thu kukbul nowl.
Kwonsat lorek, neiji naan hin kdo kjit chaak ava tunva hava ngi mvei knit naki chethi, ungu naan do bin phaak naan thu, naanki plung kchiir kuk ksop kcha ping.
Tditta Kchiir khulpu rek pauphuwn dok, ungta naan akenyee thuwn ni akaktlan pik in Mukpu paureen abin phaak in.
Ru kri verri hava ado dee pandit raan, tditta kipnii chaak rekka mṭut na nit thu mdo pnii chaak tu kilṭhi ngi mdo ngei in kanthle ktardou ava dil kṭoi chlamra
ungu kthe lamra, “Tu ungda Mma arjun nrangki paureel la? Mleija mpah le mi ii dokki kupṭhunni, do mkheng nga mapṭhan daat ki kupṭhun lulu ngi mmaanna kurnowl thlit daat lam.”
Kdei kdeiji mmaanni ning mdo pu ui in pme, tditta alraang ngi Isowr pauna ngi parwaan leh dii ngi mlei kurthuwk da, dii thungki dultia ka am,
ava thu ka am dultipaam ava dii ngi jiil dokda kmawng kcha dok.
Pdainu kekṭewl nit ungu Isowr kbin kma rek kro chaak nrang ki nit mphaak du khim khai, tun tunni ka am daat pauna ava katti parwaan leh dultia mei tumra purtuwl da mdo arkhiik daat.
Pdainu kwonsat lo rek, hava khat pang nga ning kpu ui kmalu tlo maan, tditta Mukpu hin thangva nii khatta kum punkhat lulu, ungta kum pun khatta nii khdaat lulu.

Mukpu pauna ava mii angṭheva naam naammi mdo bin lulu ngi naam naamma kurthuwk pme, pdainu ku khat lee mdo pmawn nuwm ma leiji kdung ngi mdo diil chaak, ungta mkheng kheng ngi plung ren kuhur ra ava mdo ngei.

Pdainu Mukpu nit ava kup pru thlen lulu ngi kthlengra, ungta au dilli parwaan ava krowl kparjaa ngi kmawng chra, ungu kinreel do ava mei thu kbung donle kjot chraungta dulti leh mtuwn ki nong rek ava kakaa chra.
Do mkheng nga hanto mjot chaak rang leiji, Isowr nit kbeiji kurjungra ava karda slii ngi, kchiir deek ungu Isowr kbinni tak hep kdulu mii kurthuwk nikaan di kdingi am in!
Ava nitti mlei kurthuwk don parwaan ava meiji ṭuwng donle kukbung chra, ungu kinreel do ava meiji sat donle kjot chra.
Pdainu Mma paureel dil kṭoiji nenna rinkindit rek amna ren parwaan leh ren dulti tardat chaak in.
Ava leiji, kwonsat lorek, naanni havale ado ardat lei inni, kbii ktaak mdit mata mii do psul nma liitti, kdaaiji Mma ngi ado tphaak chaak nraan ru alou in.

Ungta nenki Isowr do diil ava kirliin chaak nangi alou in. Ava leiji nenki nwonsat lo in, nu u nnao in Poul rukva, mma hin mdo piik chaak lousing ava dil kṭoiji naan hin hava theda mchethi rek mkheng thu mdo kjit chaak.
Havale thu tdee pandit liit ma pau angṭhe ka am, kdei pandi kma rek leh plung krip kma miirek mmawn chaak nraan, ktlok laaika mdo tlot lulu ngi, mmaan poibin ni purjuk parhai lamda, mdo tlot in.
Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, kwonsat lo rek, naanni hava ru kri ngi dei dok da, nowlam ktaak miirekki kar mak tu kilṭhi ngi aṭhii in da ungta naanki plung knet ava mmaan chaak ma nra cheek karsin chaan.
Pdainu plungnee leh nenki Mukpu ungu mi kaktlan pik in Jisu Khrista kdei cha thu klin ksaang kurthuwk in. Mma hin tha tun ruk ungta karvang ra kṭuw knai kma nit thu mlaarnei. Amen.
Mupṭhun daat ki ka am, nenni taryaak dok in, nmik inni tdee dok in, nenni suw in minnu nkhut inni tikmei dok in rinkhu ki pauna mlei thu.

Rinkhu ava seem da kandang, ungu nenni ndee in, ava sakhi kdo hur in, ungta Mpah tu kilṭhi ngi kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava naan hin kparyaam ava rinpaumin hur chaannu ungta neen ki hinni mhai pandan pik inda.
Tditta neenni kdo dee in, ungu kdo aryaak chaak in ava naan hin ruk va kparyaam chaak inna; ungu neenni plap kdo kurthuw ṭhiin ava Mpah leh Mchapa Jisu Khrista.
Ungta neen kakanpat
in mkurkhum nra neenni hava kikjit chaak inna.
Neenni Mma hinki aryaan nu, naan hinni kdo paryaam chaak in paumin ava hava, tditta mar awng nga Isowr ungu Mma hin thangva kjiingnu ame.
Nenni kjiing thu nche slii daat chun inni Mma ava plap kukurthuw ṭhi dida nthe inbi, nenni plei knei tkurthut in, ungu kindit dil kṭoiji am maan min.
Pdainu Mma ngi kleng thu ma am lulu ngi, nenni mar awng thu nche inbi, nenna khat leh khat plap tkurthuw in, ungta Mma Chapa Jisu hii ngi nen pnu ton mkheng mpartleu dokka.
Nenni pnu arvei maang ngi dida nthe inbi, nenni ndaksaa nthina ngi tkurhuwn chaak in, ungu kindit ava nen nthu ame.
Nenni nenki pnu rek nthe thut chaak inbi, Mma ava trin chaak kurhui ungta kindit kurthuwk, ungu rinkindit kma mkheng thungki nen pnu rek ava mi kuptlot pik chra ungta mi kpartleu chraan.
Nenni pnu tla maang dida nthe inbi, nenni Mma ava plei tnei psuk inna, ungu Mma pauna ava nen nthung ngi ame.

Nei knaole sisi rek, naanni pnu atlaak ma nraan, neiji naan hinni hava kikjit chaakka; pdainu ku mii khatti pnu mtlaak bi, nenki Npah ava tu kilṭhi ngi nenna mi ksan chraan, rinkindit ki Jisu Khrista ka am.
Ungta nenki pnu rek tummi Mma ngi nakchang in midon pik inda, nen ntum daat kma pdainu dultipaam ki pnu rek mkheng tum kurthuwk.
Nenni Mma paureen rek nar khiik chaak inbi, hava ngi nenna anto kat tdit ndee chaak raan.
“Mma ava neiji kdee,” dida kthe pdainu mpaureen rek kleek miilai ava plei knei, ungta kindit ava mma thu ame.
Pdainu Mma pauna kar khii cha mii ava hin tha mkindit kat ki Isowr wonsat kinreel ka am. Hava ngi nenni Mma thu ka am ping tdit tdee kat chaak raan.
Mma hintha kakbaang thlit daat ping dida kthe mii ava va Mma che heppi mma rukva mche ra.
Kwonsat lorek, neiji naan hin ren paureen khat kikjit ava pmaang, pdainu mupṭhun daat ki naan dothloi pliw paureen ava; naan do aryaak dok pauna pliw ki paureen.
Anto daat joso neiji naan hinni ren paureen khat kikjit chaakka, ava Mma leh naan thung ngi kindit kurthuwk, mleija kjiingnu ava kvei dokka ungta kindit mar awng ava kleng nga.
Mii ava ngi mar awng thungki ping dida karthe thida mu u mnao mipder chaakbi, mma ava kjiingnu thu ka am thlit daatta.
Mu u mnao wonsat klo mii ava mar awng thu kakbaang thlit daat, ungta ava thu khusiir mdo parthit nra ame.
Pdainu mu u mnao kipder cha mii ava kjiing thungki ungu kjiingnu thu kchet, ungu mma ngi tva tha kchet imping tdit kardei me, mleija kjiingnu ngi mmik mupto pthiia.
Kmo sisi rek, neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka, mleija Mma tummi naanki pnu rek ava atuptlot pik dok inna.

Kpahle naan hinni neiji kikjit chaakka, mleija mupṭhun daat ki Mma ava naanni ado dee dok in. Ksenao rek, neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka, mleija naanni kṭha kma khat ava ado pchaan dok in. Kmo rek, neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka, mleija naanni Apah in ava ado dee dok in.

Kpahle, neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka, mleija mupṭhun daat ki Mma ava ado dee chaak dok in. Ksenao rek, neiji naan hin kikjit chaakka, mleija naanna aru in ktang ungu Isowr pauna naan thu kbaang thlit da ka am, ungta kṭha kma khat naanni ado pchaan dok in.
Naanni dultipaam mdit mata dultipaam thungki do ava wonsat lo maan. Ku mii khatti dultipaam wonsat mlobi, Mpah wonsat klo ava mma thu ame.
Mleija dultipaam thu ka am do mkheng, daksaa do ngei, ungu rinkhu napal, ava Mpah hinki pme pdainu dultipaam thungki.
Ungta dultipaam ma kvei kcha lu, ungu mthungki tngei do ava ruk kvei kcha lu; pdainu Isowr plungbin ktlo mii ava kṭuw knai liit kma kakbaang thlit daat.
Kmo rek, mṭut na ṭhang kurthuwkka! Ungta khrista kma kthleng naanni ado aryaak in lulu ngi, tun rukva khrista kma knempok kthleng nga; ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, mṭut na ṭhang tdit nenni ndee in.

Mmaan ava nen nthungki ksun kcha lam, pdainu mmaanna nen nthungki lam pme, mleija mmaanni nen nthungki mkurthut inbi, nen tu kilṭhi ngi ta am slii daat raan, pdainu mmaan mkheng nga nen nthungki pme tdit mkandan nra ksun kcha lamma.
Pdainu naanna Kchiir khat ava ngi thao ado tupbul dok in ava naan akheng inni ado dee dok in.
Naanni kindit ado dee maan leiji neiva kikjit cha ava pmaang, pdainu naan do dee dok, ungu plei kneija kindit mlei pme tdit ado dee dok in.
Jisua Khrista tdit kmat miilai ava kma donle plei knei ku ka am da? Mpah leh Mchapa kma khrista kma ava hava.
Mchapa kmat ku mii khat lee ngi Mpah thloi me, Mchapa kthethuw mii ava ngi Mpah ruk mdo the thut chaak.
Naan thung ngi mupṭhun daat ki ado aryaak in ava kbaang thlit daat so. Mupṭhun daat ki ado aryaak in ava ngi makbaan thlit daat bi, audilli naanni Mchapa leh Mpah thu kakbaang thlit naan di.
Mma paureel pik dok kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu ava hava.
Naan aku huwng kchraan mii rek mlei thu neiji akikjit pik inna,

pdainu naanni Mma hinki ado arlaan chaak in thao kpubul ava naan thung ngi kakbaang thlit daat, ungta naanna ktlok mii khatti ado tpurchu nraanki arleek set do ame; Mma thao pbul li do khim khai thu aju purchuk inda, ungu ava kindit, ungta naan hin ado tpurchu in ava heppi, plei knei kma, Mma thung ngi kbaang thlit chaan.
Ungta tunva, kmo sisi rek, Mma mkandan mpha thu plung krippi nenni hurda, Mma murjun mpha thu ning kakjak ki ndil thaanni tkursown ma nraan, Mma thu kbaang thlit chaan che.
Mma ava rinkindit tdit naanni ado dee in, kindit ktlo mii pum ktai ava Mma ngi mdo pṭou pik tdit ado dee kat chaak in.

Asuw in, Isowr naole kdingi mido tu own nraan, Npah inva tak hep kdu pang thu wonsat mi tpiik chaak daat inna; ungta naanna anto kat in pti. Dulti- paam mi nen mido tdee ma naanki mlei ava dultipaam ava ngi Mma dei chme.

Kwonsat lorek, tunva nenna Isowr naole in pmin; nenna talu tdut raan tdit kandang mlai, pdainu Mma ngi mkandan mpha thu nenna Mma rungcheng tdut jik raan tdit nenni ndee in, mleija nenni Mma ava mhep mheppi tdee chaak raan.
Ungta Mma kbin kcha mii pum ktaiji Mma Chiir heppi Tchiir chaak raan.
Pnu ktla mii pum ktaiji Nowlam mdo leek daak; pnu va Nowlam mdo leek.
Pnu rek klou pthii ra Mma ava kandang tdit naanni ado dee in, ungu Mma thungva pnu ame.
Mma thung ngi kakbaang thlit daat ku mii khat lee ngi pnu arvei me, pnu kirvei ku khat lee ngi Mma ava dei chme mdit mata kdei tdee ruk dei chme.
Kmo sisi rek, ku mii khat lee ngi ahuwn chaak maan so. Kindit ktlo mii ava Mma ngi rinkindit mkurthut lulu ngi rinkindit kurthuwk ra.
Pnu ktla mii ava dijabowl hinki; mleija mupṭhun daat ki dijabowl ava pnu thu ktla. Dijabowl nong rek ke eakrep rang leiji Isowr Chapa kandang.
Isowr hinki kṭou ku khat lee ngi pnu arveime; mleija Isowr nopa ava mma thung ngi kakbaang thlit daat. Ungta Isowr hinki kṭou mkurthut leiji mma ngi pnu tla pchaang me.
Isowr naole, ungu dijabowl naole ava hava ngi tdee ra: kindit ktlo kma mii, mdit mata mu u mnao wonsat klo kma mii ava Isowr hinki pme.
Mleija mupṭhun daat ki naan do aryaak pauminna hava, tditta nenni khat leh khat wonsat tkurlo raan.
Ungta mnaopa ke eayou kṭha kma khat Kein hep daat rang pme. Ungu talu leiji mma va mnaopa mdo eayo da? Mleija mma mdak kat nong tlot ava kṭha pme ungta mnaopa ava rinkindit miilai.
Ku u knao rek, dultipaam miingi ado tipder chaak lei inni ngak maan.
Nenni kdiyou thungki ra rinkhu kpha thu taklaan chaak dok in, mleija nenni nu u nnao in wonsat talo in. Wonsat ktaak mii ava kdiyou thung ngi kakbaang thlit daat.
Mu u mnao kipder kcha ku mii khat ava mi ke eayou, ungu mike eayou ku mii khat lee hinni kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu kbaang liit me, tdit naanni ado dee in.
Nenni hava wonsat ava tdee chaak in, tditta Mma ngi nen ntummi mrinkhu mi pii chaan da; ungu nenni nu u nnao rek tummi nrinkhu in tpiik chaak kat raan.
Pdainu dultipaam ki alrou kthloi ungu mu u mnao do kriin dei daat joso muplung ril thung ngi mraal kpii ngi do khat lee purdon pik da mtlot mabi, tak heppi Isowr wonsat ava mma thu kakbaang rang da?
Kmo sisi rek, nenni pauna mdit mata pau daatti wonsat klo kurthuwk maan che, pdainu mnong ungta kindit thu wonsat kurlo in che.
Hava ngi nenni kindit tdit tdee raan, ungta plung ril ava ngi nen nraal mi tpiik inna.
Ungu nen nuplung ril ava Mma maiṭhuwmmi knetti ta am raan; mleija Isowr ra nen nuplung ril hinva klin kurthuwk, ungta Mma ngi do khim khai mdo dee dok.
Kwonsat lo rek, nen nuplung ril in ava ngi nraal in mi kpii mkurthut bi, Isowr maiṭhuwm mi plung krip kthloi kurthuwk maan min.
Ungta Mma hinki nenni tiṭhil chaak in khim khai ja tarlaan chaak in, mleija nenni Mma paureen arkhi in min ungu Mma ning thlunna ktlo pmin.
Ungta hava ava Mma paureen rek, tditta nenni Mma Chapa Jisu Khrista ava lamrin chda, Mma paureen pik ava heppi nenni khat leh khat wonsat tkurlo raan.

Mma paureen karkhi mii mkheng nga Mma hin kakbaang thlit daat, ungu Mma ava mmaan thung ngi ka am, ungta Mma do piik chaak Pthla ava ngi, Mma ava nen nthung ngi kakbaang thlit daat tdit nenni ndee in.
Kwonsat lorek, Pthla khim khaija lamrin chmaan, pdainu Isowr hinki mo kdingi apirsin naan; mleija dultipaam thu kindit kma khulpu rek knempok ktlowng lamma.
Hava ngi naanni Isowr Pthla ava ado dee in: daksaa thu Jisu Khrista ava kurjung dida kthe thuw kcha Pthla khim khai ava Isowr hinki.
Ungta Jisu kthe thuw kma pthla khim khaija Isowr hinki pme. khrista kma pthla ava hava kurthuwk, mma ava kthleng nga tdit naanni ado aryaak dok in, ungu tunva dultipaam thu ka am dokka.
Kmo sisi rek, naanna Isowr hinki in pti, ungu naanni mmaan ava ado pchaan dok in; mleija naan thung ngi ka am Mma ava dultipaam thu ka am ava hinva klin sii.
Mmaanna dultipaam ki rek lam, ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, mmaan do the ava dultipaam ki ungu dultimii ngi mdo aryaak pik lam.

Nenna Isowr hinki in pmin. Isowr kdei kcha mii khim khaiji mido taryaak pik in, ungu Isowr hinki kma mii ava ngi nenna mido taryaak pik in pme. Hava ngi nenni kindit Pthla leh kindit kma pthla ava kdei cha tkurthut in.
Kwonsat lorek, nenni khat leh khat wonsat kurlo in che; mleija wonsatta Isowr hinki, ungta won kapsat ava Isowr hinki kṭou ungta Isowr mdo dee.
Wonsat ktaak miiva Isowr deime; mleija Isowr ra wonsat knei.
Hava thu Isowr wonsat ava nen narlak ki mdo pandan, tditta Mma thung ngi nenni ta am chaak nraan, Isowr ri Mchapa Khdaat chrel ava dultipaam thu misii pik inda.
Wonsatta hava, tditta nenni Isowr wonsat talo in ava pme, pdainu Mma ngi nenna wonsat milo inda ungu nenki pnu chang kdonni Mchapa misii pik inda.
Kwonsat lorek, Isowr va hanto ja thu wonsat mi klo kchaan mkurthutbi, nen rukva khat leh khat wonsat tkurlo chaak kat raan.
Ku mii khat lee ngi Isowr kdei ame; nenni khat leh khat wonsat tkurlo inbi, Isowr ri nen nthung ngi kakbaang thlit daat ra ungta Mma wonsat ava nen nthung ngi kinreel ka am ra.
Hava ngi nenni Mma thu ungu Mma ngi nen nthung ngi kakbaang thlit daat tdit nenni ndee in, mleija Mma ngi Mma mdak kat ki Pthla mi pii chaan da.
Ungta Mpah ngi Mchapa ava dultipaam kaktlan pik ra misii pik inda tdit nenni dei in minnu ava rinpaumin kuhur pik tkurthut in.
Jisua Isowr Chapa dida ku mii khatti mthe thut chaakbi, mma thung ngi Isowr kakbaang thlit daat kurthuwk, ungu mma ava Isowr thung ngi kakbaang thlit daat.

Ava leiji nen ntummi Isowr wonsat milo inda nenni dei in min ungta trin chaak in. Isowr ra wonsat knei, ungu wonsat thu kakbaang thlit daat mii ava Isowr hin kakbaang thlit daak, ungta mma thung ngi Isowr kakbaang thlit daat.
Hava thu wonsat ava nen tu kilṭhi ngi kinreel kurthuwk, tditta kekṭewl nit tummi nenni plung krippi ta am nraan, mleija Mma ngi anto mkurthut lulu ngi nen rukka hava dultipaam thung ngi tkurthut in.
Wonsat thungva kṭi ame, pdainu kinreel wonsat ava ngi kṭi ava krei pthii kurthuwk. Mleija kṭia mraal tu kilṭhi, ungta kṭi miia wonsat thu kinreel pme.
Nenni won tapsat in, mleija ru kri ver thu Mma ngi nen wonsat milo chaan da.

Ku mii khatti, “Neiji Isowr wonsat klo,” dida the thisora, mu u mnao mapder chaak bi, mma ava plei knei; mleija mma ngi mdo dee daat mu u mnao wonsat klo mkurthut mabi, mma ngi mdo dee ma Isowr ava wonsat lo pchaang nime.
Ungta Isowr wonsat klo miiva mu u mnao ruk wonsat mdo lora dida mdo the hava paureen ava Mma hinki tphaak chaak in.
Jisua Khrista dida krin kcha miipum ktai ava Isowr nao khat, ungta mnuh mpah wonsat klo mii pum ktaiji mnao ruk wonsat mdolo.
Hava ngi nenni Isowr wonsat lo da ungu mpau- reen rek nupṭoi in mpha thu nenni Isowr wonsat talo in tdit ndee in.
Mleija nenni Mma paureen rek arkhii chaan minnu, hava Isowr wonsat. Ungu Mma paureen rekka krik ava pme.
Mleija Isowr hinki kṭou cha khim khaiji, dultipaam ava mdo pchaan chaak; ungu hava kap- chang tdit nen lamrin chaak ava ngi dultipaam ma mapchaanna.
Jisua Isowr Chapa dida krin kcha ava kma donle, dultipaam kapchaang ku ka am da?
Dii leh hii ngi kthleng Mma ava hava, Jisu Khrista ava dii daat kma pdainu dii leh hii tu kilṭhi.
Ungta sakhi kuhur ava Pthla kurthuwk, mleija Pthla ava kindit.
Sakhi kuhur rek kdum ka am lam, Pthla, dii ungu hii ungta havale kdum ava kulrot nlam.
Nenni dulti miirek rinpaumin narlaan inbi, Isowr rinpauminna klin langlang kurthuwk, mleija hava Isowr rinpaumin tditta Mma ngi Mchapa sakhi mdo hur pik.
Isowr Chapa krin kcha miia mdaksaa thung ngi rinpaumin mthloija. Isowr krin cha kma mii ava ngi Mma ava plei mnei psukka, mleija Isowr ri Mchapa mdo pluk ava rinpaumin mma ngi lamrin chme.
Ungta rinpaumin ava hava, tditta Isowr ri kṭuw knai kma rinkhu mi pii chaanda, ungu hava rinkhua Mma Chapa thu ka am.
Mchapa kthloi mii ava ngi rinkhu kthloi cha kurthuwk; Isowr Chapa kthloi kma miiva rinkhu thloi chme.
Isowr Chapa krin cha naan hin kṭuw knai kma ki rinkhu athloi inna tdit naan do dee nra, neiji naan hin hava kikjit kcha ping.
Ungta Mma thung ngi kdung plung tip pri psuk chaak inna hava, mleija nenni do khim khai Mma plungbin dil kṭoiji nṭhil chaak inbi mi karyaak pik chraan.
Ungta nenni tiṭhil chaak in khim khai mi taryaak pik inna tdit nenni ndee inbi, nenni Mma hin taktham chaak inna tphaak inna tdit ndee in.

Ku mii khatti kdiyou rang ki kma mu u mnao pnu ktla mdee ta, mma ngi aṭhil pik so, ungu kdiyou rangki kma pnu ktla tummi Isowr ri rinkhu kpii chra. Kdiyou rangki pnu ka am; ava tummi miilai khat va mdo ṭhil chaak ra dinu neiva the maang.
Kar mak nong ktlo mkheng nga pnu, pdainu kdiyou rang kma pnu ka am.
Isowr hinki kṭou kcha ku mii khat lee ngi pnu arvei me tdit nenni ndee in, pdainu Isowr hinki kṭou Mma va mdo arkhiik, ungu kṭha kma khat ava ngi thowng pchaang me.
Nenna Isowr ki in pmin, ungu dultipaam mkheng nga kṭha kma khat ava thu ta am in tdit ndee in.

Ungta Isowr Chapa ava kthleng nga, ungu nen nhin kdeipandi cha mi pii inda, kindit ava ku tdit tdee nra; ungta Mma Chapa Jisu Khrista, kindit Mma thung ngi nenna ta am in tdit nenni ndee in. Kindit Isowr ungu kṭuw knai kma rinkhu ava hava.
Kmo sisi rek, naan adaksaan na khut do sak pthla luwkbuk thungki karneeng chaan.
Kver khatti mdo kchol dok snu, ungu kindit thung ngi nei kwonsat lo mnaole, ungta nei daat kma pdainu kindit kdei mii mkheng hin thang ruk,
nen nthung ngi kakbaang thlit daat ungu kṭuw knai liit kma nen mi kṭhi chraan kindit mlei thu:
Npah in Isowr ungta Mpah Chapa Jisu Khrista thungki kindit leh wonsat thu plungnee, wonsat ungu kdaai ava ngi mihai ṭhi chaan so. Kindit ungta Wonsat
Nenni Npah in hinki paureen tathloi chaak in lulu ngi, kindit dil kṭoi slii nah anaole kdo phaak chaak leiji kdung kanpa kchaam ping.

Ungta snu nah ahinni neiji kaktham kchaam ping, nah hinni neiji ren paureen khat kikjit lulua kurthuwk pme, pdainu nenni khat leh khat wonsat tkurlo ra dida mdo the mupṭhun daat ki nenni tathloi in khat ava kikjit kcha ping.
Ungta nenni Mma paureen rek wonsat ava dil taṭoi chaak in; naanni mupṭhun daat ki ado aryaak in lulu ngi, tditta naanni wonsat dil ado ṭoi naanki paureen ava hava.
Mleija Jisu Khrista ava dultimii daksaa thu kthleng tdit kro kma kuhuwng kcha rek mii knempok ki dultipaam thu kthuwk lamma; hanto lu kdu mii ava kuhuwng kcha ungu khrista pme.
Naanni anong tlot in ava kapmaang kma pdainu kurhummi mnah ado phaak chaak nraan asingreel inni kursut pṭoi dei chaan.
Ungta Khrista paurin thung ngi ka am kma msik khat ti kchet kcha ku mii khat va Isowr thloi me; paurin thu kakbaang miiva Mpah ungu Mchapa mikniing ngi mdo thloi chaak.
Hava paurin ktaakki ku mii khatti naan hin mthlen ta, inn thu pthlung maan, mdit mata kowl maan.
Mleija mma kukowl miiva mma nong tlot kṭha kma ava mdo phaak ṭhi. Mṭut na Pauna rek

Naan hin kdo kjit ra do knempok neiji thloi chddaat joringva, chee leh mukdii sinton nuwm maang, pdainu nenki kanpa mkurkhum nra, nei kdak thleng da adei lai inni ungu mai leh maiji kurdu da pau tsaam raan ava kngei chaakka.
Naan do kchol achernu in naole ngi leer khatti aturvui chaak inna.
Kver khat ava kindit thu neiji wonsat kdolo chaak Gaus hin tha kikjit chaakka.
Kwonsat lo, nang ngi araothla mkheng tu kilṭhi ngi ado tlot neiji kdo dee lulu ngi, do mkheng nga kṭha ngi ado tlot nra tditta adak mdam nra neiji kṭhil chaakka.
Mleija nah rinkhu ki kindit pau ava ku u knao rek angṭhe kthlung ngi arinpaumin mson pik lamda kdung ngi neia kanpa kchaam ping, ungu nang ngi kindit kṭoi kat cha pti.
Tditta nei knaole ngi kindit mdo ṭoi karyaa cha ava ki kheelli nei kakanpat nra ame.
Kwonsat lo, nang ngi ku u knao rek, kheel siingi mal rek hin plung kneiji sok adolo ava tak kjat kurhui langlang ki nong ktlo pti.
Rinlop maiṭhuwm mi nah wonsat ki rinpaumin mdo piik dok in. Nang ngi mmaan ava lam tha ata dak pik lambi Isowr sok klou kurhuiji kṭha deekki tlo ndi.
Mleija mmaanna Mma tummi mdo sii dok ungu krin kma rek hinki do khat lee arlaang lamme.
Ava leiji nenni hantolu kdumii rek ava tupthow pik katkat ra, tditta nenna kindit thu nong ksuve tkurthut nraan leiki.
Neiji Rinlop hin tha do mruk kdo kjit chaak; pdainu mdaksaa ru kri nuwm, Deutrephas va nei krutan pṭoi me.

Ava leiji neiji kthlen mpha thu, nei kraal mikpii ngi kṭha kma pauna rek mdo the mma nong tlot slii ava neiji thlaam pthuwk nik di. Ungta ava daat rukva pneel me, tditta mma ngi ku u knao rek ava kowl chlamme, ungu kukowl chnuwm rek rukka pdown pthii lamda ungta Rinlop duwn tha maknen pthii inna.
Kwonsat lo, kṭha kma no kurchuk chma. Kṭha ktlo mii ava Isowr hinki; kṭha kma ktlo miiva Isowr dei chme.
Mii pum ktai ungu kindit deekki Demetrias ki rinpaumin hur lamda, nei rukva rinpaumin akuhur pikka, ungu neiki rinpaumin kindit ava nang rukku ado dee dok.
Neiji nah hinni kdo kjit rang nga ka am pok, pdainu neiji peen leh mukdii ngi kjit nimaang.
Kbeiji ado kdee nra, ungu mai leh maiji kurdu da pau tsaam ra ava neiji kbin chaakka.
Nah hin kdaai ava ngi aju ṭhi chso. Aplap rekki leer khatti aturvui chaakka. Kaplap rek mii pum ktai hin aturvui chaak inna kdingi mhai son pik cha.
Jisu Khrista ki sra owr khat ungu Jeems naopa Juda ava ngi, mdo own dok rek, Kpah Isowr thung ngi Jisu Khrista tummi mdo arkhiik kwonsat lo rek hin tha:
Wonsat knei, kdaai, ungu wonsat ava naan thung ngi am so.

Kwonsat lo rek, naan hinni nen nkheng ki kirliin na mlei thu kjit chnuwm rek rek nu, kintiing rek hinni vei khdaatti mdo parlaan dok krin cha ava tummi plung ktangar ri ado karnaak ṭhi nraan, tik kjit chaak ava ngi do ksi kat heppi bin chnu.

Mleija mii angṭhe tup prut siirchang ngi kankai dok lamma, mleija hava ki mraal mdo piik nra alraang ngi mdo kjit dok. Nenki Isowr plungnee ava lele tha pang turkuiji kturkui kcha ktong thang ngi kṭhi, Isowr kdei kma mii angṭhe rekki nenki Chukpu khdaat chrel leh Mukpu Jisu Khrista ava mat lamda.

Tunva naan akheng inni kurhum mi vei khdaatti dei daat jown ti,naan do bin phaak ra ava neiji kngei chaakka, tditta Egypt paam thung ki mii rek kaktlan pik Mma ava ngi krin kma rek ava mdilthang bong ngi eakrep da.

Ungta tilrii mdo kowl ava karkhii kma pdainu ma amna kma pthii Waan tamsii rekka Mma do kṭewl nrang ki klin langlang Nit ava mphaak du khim khai ktuh da kjiingnu thu kṭuw knai liit kma mdo arkhiik pthii.

Hanto lulu ngi Sodom leh Gomorah ungta marveel ki khuwpii rek pang turkuiji kturkui kcha ungu msik msik dongei thu tlo lamda, kṭuw knai kma ki meiṭhuwm thu mraal mdo phaak in ava nen tkurtol chaak naki sok klou lam.
Anto daat joso mdo tlot in lulu ngi mii rekki mner inni daksaa pbuwr lamda rutan pthlei lamda, ungta mlaarknei langlang khat ava kalrai ṭhi lamda.

Pdainu kinreel sii Waan tamsii Maikhal ava ngi dijabowl mkalrai ṭhi mpha thu, Mousi daksaa mlei thu mkarteen ṭhi thung ngi kdung krai kcha ngi mma tun ni kekṭewl ki pau khat lee the me, pdainu Mma ngi theda, Mukpu ngi nang nga aju krai chra,” dida theda.
Pdainu hava mii rek va mdo dee pandit ma in khim khaija rai chlamda ungta plung ktaak saa rek lulu ngi mdo dee in dil kṭoiji mmaanna kmawng kcha lamma.
Mmaanna msuwnkthi! Mleija mmaanni Kein lamṭoi ṭoi lamda, mdo kat chaak nraan Balam nong parma thung ngi bowr krik mhur chaak inna, ungu Korah pauleek thu kmawng tir chlamma.

Hava lea naanki wonsat kmaal thu kbii pum lam, mmaanni plung ktangarri lop mkurku mpha thu, mdaksaan daat kursut pṭoi lamda; mmaan ava dii ktaak tirthli dojuwn armei lulu lam, vei knii ngi kdiyou, murjung tik tker pthii mkaal thu kukto mthei ktaak ding rek lam.
Mmaan mdak kat inki ningkja ava powm plokki ksou truwn dii kurnuk ava lulu ngi kparvai kcha bursi rek lam, mleija mmaan tummi pum jiing ngi kjiingnu ava kṭuw knai liit kma mdo arsan pik lam.
Adam charuwl thungki mtikheu na hava Enok ruk va pau phuwng da theda, “Asuw in, Mukpu ngi Kchiir mii rek ava mpun mpun ni ṭhida kurjung nga.

Mii mkheng kekṭewl rangki, ungta Isowr kdei kma mii mkheng rek ki Isowr ktaakki nong mdo tlot in mkheng ava Isowr kdei kma lam ktong thang ki mkurthut leiji ungu Isowr kdei kma pnu kirvei rek raal kpii ngi, kṭha kma pau mkheng mdo theen ava raal kpiira kurjung nga.”
Havalea mpha ktai thu knur dei rek, kupsul rek, mdaksaan do ngei dil kṭoi rek, mdo kat nraan ni mii hin pau kpardai rek, mner thuwnni kdung napal pau kthe rek lam.
Pdainu kwonsat lorek, nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista ki kenyee rekki chodu ngi mdo phuwn dok in pau ava ado bin phaak kat raan.
Mmaanni naan hinni the lamda, “Mṭut naki mpha thu mmaan mdak kat inki Isowr kdei kma ki dongei dil kṭoiji kchet rek kipnii chaak ka am lamra.”
Mii kṭhen pthii, dultipaam ktong ki mii pthla ktaak rek ava havale lam.
Pdainu kwonsat lorek, naanki daksaa ava kheel siiki Kchiir ki krin cha thu kpunchoi in; Pthla Kchiir tu aṭhil chaan.
Isowr wonsat thu naan adaksaan na arkhii chaan; kṭuw knai kma ki nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista wonsat lo thung ngi arda chaan.
Ungta plung chel karche mii angṭhe tun wonsat mhailo pik chaan.
Mii angṭhea mei thungki mhai ṭenthuw pik chaanra, mhai ktlan pik chaan; daksaa do tpa am kbii pum dona kpha thu tipder chaak kro mii angṭhe leen kṭi tu kilṭhi ngi wonsat mhailo pik chaan.
Tunva atluk nraan thungki akarkhii chraan kapchaang, ungta kbii khat lee ktaak, kanpa tu kilṭhi ngi Mma laarnee ki maiṭhuwm mi ari pchaan nraan,
nen mi kaktlan pik in khdaat chrel Isowr hin nenki Mukpu Jisu Khrista thu Mma laarnee kukthuk sii ngi kpaal ungu rutan kthloi ava mpha ktai thu chodu ungta tunruk ungu kṭuw knai liit kma am so. Amen.
Kbeiji kthuwk kat ra, Jisu Khrista ki pauphuwn, msra owr rek hinni mdo tdet rangki Isowr ri mhin mdo piik; ungta Mma sra owr Johon hinni Mma ki Waan tamsii arju siida tipdee chda,
mma ngi Isowr pauna ungu Jisu Khrista rinpaumin, mma do dee chaak mkheng ava sakhi pii chda.
Mdo pandan pauna rek ava owngda kpa kcha mii rek ka msuwkṭha! Ungta ava karyaa kcha rek, ungu ava thu mdo kjit karkhii kcha rek mii ava msuwkṭha; mleija mpha ava knai tekka.
Johon ni Asia thungki Rinlop rek tikheu hin tha: Ka am slii, ka am dok, ungta karvang rang Mma hinki, ungu Mma ku onna Pthla rek tikheu hinki,
ungta trin chaak kurhui ki sakhi kdiyou dok thungki ru kri reeppi kṭou, ungu dultipaam ki kruwng rek, paam kpu ngi kpaal Jisu Khrista ki plungnee leh kdaai naan thung ngi am so.
Nen wonsat mi klo kchaan ungu Mma hii ngi nen pnu rek thungki mi kpantek chaan
ungta nenna Mma ki Kruwngpaam, Mpah Isowr thiimpu rek ra mdo purthuw, Mma hintha laarknei langlang ungu kṭuw knai liit kma paam kpu ngi paal so. Amen.

Asuw in, Mma ava armei tu kilṭhi ngi kurjung nga, Mma kcheiji kthun mik khim khaiji kdei ra; ungta dultipaam ki chati rek mkheng ngi Mma mlei thu kurnung karbaang donle ka am lamra. Anto kat ra. Amen.
Ka am bing, ungu ka am dok, ungta kurjungra ruktang riim Mukpu Isowr ri theda, “Neia Alpha ungu Omega ping.”

Naan ki a u anao in, Jisu Khrista suwkthuw kphaak ṭhi ungta Kruwngpaam kdung ngi akdiil ṭhiin Johon neia Isowr ki pauna ungu Jisu Khrista ki rinpaumin mlei thu Patmos mdo dit prahpaam tun ni ka am ping.
Mukpu nit thu neia Pthla ngi am chnu, ungta kdil pang ktong tha peengkhul krowl khat hep daat krowl khat kparyaa langlang neiji aryaa chnu.
Ava ngi theda, “Nang ngi ado dee ava Laaika thu akjit, ungu Rinlop rek tikheu hin, Ephisia ungta Smyrnia ungu Pargamum ungta Thyatira, Sardis ungu Philadelphia ungta Laodesia tha apthla.”
Ava dilli nei kihin kpau bing ava ksuw ra kdil kinle nu, ungu kdil kikinlet thungta jeering meila tikheu krip daat neiji deinu.
Ungta meila rek arlakki Mii Chapa hep daat phrik kturrown knaa ungu muplung jeering riingi kparyeel neiji deinu.
Mluw leh msam ava plaa kpowl lulu ngi, tbuwr heppi powlda, mmik ava meiṭai kṭuwng heppi ṭuwngda;
mkhu ava mei thu tukno dang thiir ksen uwm hep daat, ungta mukrowl ava dii knempok kluwng ava archaang hep daat da.
Mkhut chang ktongtha bursi tikheu sinda, mner thu kaang ksaang kraang mhaa knii ngi pdonda, ungu mmai ava kniw kapchaiji ksa heppi lengda.
Neiji Mma ava kdee thungta kdiyou lulu ngi mkhu therri tluw chnu. Pdainu Mma ngi mchang ktong ki mkhut kleen ni thiida, theda, “ṭi ma, Neia mdo pṭhunna ungu mṭut na ava ping.
Ungta kring daat auping; Neiji diyou nu, ungu asuw, Neia kṭuw knai liit kma kring ping, ungta kdiyou leh sim ki chungkam ava Neiji ksin daatta.
Tunva nang ado dee ungu dil thang ngi kthuwk rangki ava akjit.

Nei kukhut chang ktong tha nang ngi bursi tikheu ado dee ungta jeering meila tikheu krip ado dee ki kukthuk pau ava bursi rek tikheu va Rinlop rek tikheu ki tamsii rek lam ungu meila krip rek tikheu ava Rinlop rek tikheu rek lam.”
Ephisia thungki Rinlop tamsii hin akjit: Mkhut chang ktong tha bursi tikheu ksin jeering meila tikheu krip ava arlakki kchet Mma do the pauna rek ava hava.

“ ‘Anong tlot anong palren ungu kdung ngi ado diil chaak, pdainu kṭha kma miirek ka diil pchaang mti, ungu kenyee rek in ping dida karthe rek ava ado pirsin ndok lam, pdainu ava kma ava kindit kma rek tdit nang ngi ado dee.
Nang ngi kdung diil chti ungta Nei kmiing ngi ado tuhur pik ava arda pthit liit mti tdit Neiji kdeea.
Pdainu hava ngi nang nga araal akpiik ka, tditta nang ngi ru kri ki thokki wonsat ava amaak pthiia.

Tak thu ktlu cha pti tdit abin phaak cha, plung ren ahur cha, ungu ru kri ki anong tlot ava atlo cha. Nang ngi plung ren ahur mabi, Neiji nah hin arjung nik di, ungta nah ameila rina ava mmun thungki lou pthii nik di.
Anto daat joso nah ado thloi ava Nei ruk va kdo pder chaak, Nikolaitia rek nong tlot ava apder cha.
Rinlop rek hintha Pthla do the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso. Ava kapchaang miia Isowr paradais tha ka am, rinkhu ki dingchui kchaa Neiji rot pik nik di.
“Ungta Smyrnia thungki Rinlop hin ak kjit pik: ‘Diyou thida kring kinle, ru kri reep ki ungu mṭut na pauna ava hava.’
“Nah asuwkthuw leh asrat thuw ava Neiji kdeea Pdainu nang nga suwang pti ungta Judia rek in ping ngi dida kirthe mmaan ni titi pau athe psuk da pdainu mmaanna seitaan ki synagog rek lam.

Nang ngi ajat kham ra ava ṭi chma. Asuw, naan mii angṭhea dijabowl li ado tpirsin naanni rowng inn thu akvar pthii raan kirsimma ungta nii sowm thu naanni suwkthuw pha naandi. Kdiyou kpha thu nang ngi trin chaak kurhui cha ungu Neiji rinkhu ki laar luwkhum apii chnik di.
Rinlop rek hin Pthla ngi mdo the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso. Kapchaang dok mii ava mvei knit naki kdiyou ava ngi lim nime.
“Ungta Pergamum thungki Rinlop tamsii hin ak kjit pik: ‘Kaang ksaang mhaa knii kraang jam Mma pauna rek ava hava.’

“Nah a amna mun ava Neiji kdeea, ava thung ngi seitaan ko onna ka am, nang ngi Nei kmiing arpom mer chti ungta seitaan rek amna, naan arlakki mdo eayo dok, Neiki trin chaak kurhui khat, Antipas nit rek thu sakhi atpiik pik mpha thu nang ngi ado trin chaak thu mat liit mti.

Pdainu Neiji araal ado kpiik ra mruk ka amma: ava tha Balam do purchu kurpom mii angṭhe athloi daatta, tditta khut do sak pthla hin tlaai mdo down ava kchaara, ungu pang turkuiji mturkui chaak nraan, Isreel chapa rek maiṭhuwm mi khusiir mdo parthit nraan mma ngi Balak purchuk da.
Ava leiji nang rukva Nikolaitia rek do purchu kurpom mii angṭhe athloi daatta.
Ava leiji plung ren ahur cha. Anto mkurthut mabi, Neiji nah hin kbeiji thleng nik di ungta Nei kner ki kaang ksaang tu kilṭhi ngi rawl karnaak ṭhi lam nik di.

Pthla ngi Rinlop rek hin mdo the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso. Kapchaang mii ava hin tha kurdowl manna ava pii chnik di, ungta lung kpowl khat, ungu lung ava tun ni miing ren khat tik kjit Neiji mhin pii chnik di. Karlaang chra mii ava kma donle ku khat lee ngi ava dei me.
“Ungta Thyatiria thungki Rinlop tamsii hin ak kjit pik: mei kṭuwng hep daat mmik kthloi, ungu mkhu ava thiir ksen uwm tukno dang hep daat Isowr Chapa ki pauna rek ava hava.
‘Nah anong tlot rek, nah awonsat ungu ado rin chaak, ungta asok lo, ungu kdung ngi ado diil chaak, ungta nah anong tlot rek dil ki avangi ru kri ki ado pkheel Neiji kdeea.’

Pdainu Neiji araal ado kpiik nra hava ka amma, tditta mdaksaa mthina ngi khulpii ping kirdi kcha snu Jeyebeel ava nang ngi rot pik tinu, ungta mmava pang turkuiji kturkui kcha ungu khut dosak pthla hinki tlaaidown ava kchaara Nei ksra owr rekka purchuk lamda ungta lele tha mṭhi pthii lamma.
Mma ngi plung ren mdo hur nra mpha kdo piik, pdainu pang turkuiji kturkui kcha thungki plung ren kuhur ra ava mma ngi pthlei da.

Asuw, mmaanni mma nong tlot thungki plung ren mhur maan bi, mma ava kowm tun ni kukoi daatti var pthii nik di, ungu mma tu kilṭhi ngi losang kṭhi rekka klin langlang ki suwk kthuwk thung ngi var pthii lam nik di.
Ungta mma naole ava preiyou tir lam nik di. Ungu poibin leh plungril kthlaam ava Nei tdit Rinlop rek mkheng inni kdei lamra, ungta naan nong tlot dil kṭoiji naan mii pum ktai hin Neiji pii nik di.

Pdainu Thyatiria ki mii angṭhe hava mdo purchu kurpom kma, seitaan ki kukthuk pau pi dida mii angṭhe ngi mdo the, ava kurchuk kma, naan ava hin Neiji kthea, naan tun tha bowr krik murson Neiji thii nimaang.
Nei kurjun du khim khai ado thloi daat in ava knetti arpom chaan.
Mṭut na kpha dekki kapchaang ungta Nei knong rek karkhii mii ava hin chati rek tun tha mrutan in Neiji pii chnik di.
Ungu tnek beel mlek mlekki kukui kcha lulu ngi, Nei kdaksaa kat daat ruk va Kpah hinki rutan kdo arlaan chaak heppi, mma ngi mmaan ava thiir kchung ngi kpaal nlamra.
Ungta Neiji mma hin vaarpa bursi pii chnik di.
Rinlop rek hin Pthla do the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso.
“Nah nong tlot ava Neiji kdeea, kring miing nang ngi athloija, ungta nang nga kdiyou kchaam ti.
Ekardel, ungu kdiyou rang ngi ka am daat mkekleem rek ru aptan pik lam, mleija Neiki Isowr maiṭhuwm mi nah nong tlot mkinreel Neiji pha chmaang.

Nang ngi ado arlaan chaak ungu ado aryaak dok ava abin phaak; ava arkhii cha, ungta plung ren ahur cha. Nang ngi akardel chaak mabi, kup pru lulu Neia arjung nik di, ungu talu ṭhang thu Neiji nah tun ni arjung nik di tdit dei nimti.
Anto daat joso mdo mna kbuwr kma mii ktlowm suwn Sardis nang ngi athloija; ungta kpowl dang dang ngi mmaanni neia muktlown ṭhi lamra, mleija mmaanna kurhui lam.

Kapchaang rek ava hanto lulu ngi dona kpowl pnaak lam nik di, ungta mma miing ava Neiji rinkhu ki Laaika thungki knuwl pthii ni maang; mma miing nga Neiki Kpah ungu Waan tamsii rek maiṭhuwm mi the thut pik nik di.
Rinlop rek hin Pthla ngi mdo the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso.

“Ungta Philadelphia thungki Rinlop tamsii hin mdo the ava ak kjit pik: Kchiir khat, kindit khat, Devid chungkam kthloi, mdo pvan ava ku khat lee ngi mdo arkam pchaan ma, mdo arkam ava ku khat lee do pvan pchaanma, Mma pauna rek ava hava.

“Neiji nah nong tlot rek ava kdeea. Asuw, ku khat lee do pvan pchaan ma thurngot khat kparvang Neiji nah amaiṭhuwmmi akthiik pikka; pdainu rutan ktlowm suwnni ado thloi ava Neiji kdeea, anto chdaat joso nang ngi Nei kpauna rek arkhii ti ungu Neia mmat mti.

Asuw, Jihudia rek in ping ngi kirdi lam thida anto kma rek pdainu pleiknei rek ava Neiji seitaan ki synagog tpurthuw lam nik di. Asuw, Neiji mmaan ava nah hinni tipthleng lam nik don, ungu nah akhu therri luw apbuk lam nik di, ungta neiji nang wonsat ado klo ava mmaanni kdei lamra.
Nang ngi Nei kpauna rek ava kdung ado diil chaak leiji, dulti tun ka am kpirsin rek, dultipaam mkheng thu kurjungra suwk kthuwk avaki ṭhang thu Neiji aju knen pik nik di.
Neia kbeiji arjung nik di; ku khat lee ngi nang ki laar luwkhum ado tulown chaak ma nra, ado thloi daat ava knetti arpom cha.

Kapchaang mii ava neiki Isowr luwbuk Inn thungki kcho khat tpurthuw nik di; mma ngi ava thungki duwn thuwk liit nime, ungta mma leen Neiji Neiki Kpah miing, Kpah ki khuwpii, Parwaan ki Nei Kpah hinki kurjung kṭum ren Jerusalem ungu Nei kdak kat ki ren miing ava kjit pik nik di.
Rinlop rek hin Pthla do the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso.
“Ungta Laodesia thungki rinlop tamsii hin mdo the ava ak kjit pik: trin chaak kurhui ungu rinkindit sakhi rek, Isowr do seem daat ki mdo pṭhunna, Amen ki pauna rek ava hava.
“Nah nong tlot rekka Neiji kdeea, nang nga tsat ruk sa mti tdai ruk dai mti, kdai mdit mata ksa kurthuwk!
Ava leiji, nang ngi tdai ruk kdai kma tsat ruk ksa kma klum tuwm tuwm akurthut leiji, kner thungki Neiji aju pthot pthii nik di.

Neia suwang ping, alrou kdo thloi pok, ungu do khat lee kriing maang; diti nang ngi ado the leiji, nang nga do ksi kma wonsat kurhui rak,sra, mik ktot, ungta adak chai daatti a am rang nga dei cha mti.

Ava ngi mlei kurthuwk da, nang ngi Nei ki hinki mei do pchiir dok jeering, tditta nang ngi suwang akurthuw nra, ungu dona kpowl ado naak chaak nra, ungta ningkja naki adakchai ado dowl nra, ungu ado dee nrangki amik ava thao ado tpubul nrangki, Nei kihin ki ado ren chaak nra akthe pikka.
Neiji won kdo psat rek rek mii ava trai ruk kdo rai tarchak ruk kdo archak; ava leiji khei athe nra plung ren ahur cha.
Asuw, Neiji thurngot bulli rip nu kipreija; ku mii khatti Nei kukrowl aryaa da thurngot mpvan bi, Neiji Mma thung ngi arjung nik di, ungu then chaak ṭhi nik di, ungta Mma Neitu amve nikaan di.
Kapchaang mii ava, Nei kdaksaa katti pchaang nu ungta Kpah ku onna tun Mma tu kilṭhi ngi kuk on in lulu ngi, Nei tu kilṭhi ngi Nei kuk onna tun kuk onve nraan Neiji rot pik nik di.
Rinlop rek hin Pthla do the ava knaa ka am mii ava ngi aryaa chso.”

Hava diltha neiji suw nu, ungbi asuw in, Parwaan tha thurngot kparvang da! Ungta peengkhul khat krowl heppi nei kihin kpau bing, ru kri reep ki krowl ava ngi theda, “Hava tha arhang kal bet, ungu audilli kthuwk ra nong khim khaija neiji aju tdet ni.”
Mpha ava kat thu neia Pthla ngi am chnu, ungta asuw in, Parwaan tha tu ko onna khat rip daat da, khatta tkonna tunni ku ong daat da.

Ungta ava tun ni kuk ong Mma ava Jasper tdit lung kṭil leh karnelia tdit lung ksen hep daatti kandang da, ungu emeral tdit lung ke er mman klu lang lang tdee ava heppi mku onna ava kowllisa ngi tukhul dokda.
Muku onna ava tkonna rek som knii lei plii ngi tukhul dok da, ungta tkonna rek tun thangva kver rek som knii lei plii ku ong lamda, kpowl sippi kirsim lamda mluw in tun jeering luwkhum khum lamda.
Mukonna thungki kowl kiplek, ungu pṭeek kpuwk krowl thuwk da, ungta Isowr Pthla rek ava mku onna maiṭhuwmmi meila choi tikheu vi ṭuwngda.
Ungta mku onna maiṭhuwm mi kchiir dang truwn thungki likli hep daat khat amda.
Ungta mku onna tupkhul jikda, mdil mdu msiir ri, mmikki pum dimmi kdim kcha kring saa rek plii am daat lamda.
Ru kri ver ki kring saa ava humpii smang hep daat, miknit na kring saa ava silpa hep daat, mukdum na kring saa ava mmaija miilai mai hep daat, ungta miplit na kring saa ava kjuwng pliim hep daat.
Ungu kring saa plii ava pthla truk ruk mdo thloi in ava mmik rekki tupkhul jikda ungu mthung thang rukka mmikki pum dimmi dim chda, ungu suwnjaan knai liit kma pring lamda.
“Kchiir, Kchiir, Kchiir, ka am dok,
ka am bing,
ungu kurjung ra,
Mukpu Isowr ava kapchaang riim kurthuwk!”
Ungta kṭuw knai liit kma ka am, mku onna leen kuk ong daat Mma ava kring saa rekki mlaar pnei lamda, kjat punlor lamda ungu mpanpaak in khim khai thu,

kver rek som knii lei plii rekki mku onna leen kuk ong Mma maiṭhuwm mi kuwn lamda ungta kṭuw knai liit kma Mma ava panpaak lamda; mmaanni mlaar luwkhum in ava mku onna maiṭhuwmmi var lamda, laa the lamda.
“Neen ki Mukpu ungu Isowr,
Nang nga laarnee ungta kunlor ungu,
rutan karlaang ra kurhui sii pti,
mleija nang ngi do mkheng ado seem.
ungu Nah plungbin ni do mkheng nga
amda ungta ado seem dok kurthuwk.”
Ungta tu ku onna leenni kuk ong Mma khut chang ktongtha mdu mdilli mdo kjit dok, kbiinam rek tikheu vi mdo nam dok jiik kjul khat neiji deinu.
Ungu ruktang lang lang Waan tamsii ngi krowl kparyaa langlang ngi “Jik kjul pvangda ungu kbiinam rek kupkuira kurhui ku ka am da?” Dida kthe khuw kaksam neiji aryaa nu.
Ungbi Parwaan thang daat don dulti leen daat don mata dulti rilki ku mii khat lee ngi jiik kjul ava kapvang ra mdit mata mthungki ava ksuwra kapchaang ku khat lee ame.
Ungbi jiik kjul pvangda ungu mthungki ksuwra kurhui ku khat lee mphaak ma thungta neia kdung ngi ṭap chnu.

Au dilli kver rek thungki khat ava ngi ki hin theda, “ṭap ma, asuw, Judah chati thungki, humpii smang, Devid arjung ava ngi jiik kjul ungta mthungki kbiinam rek tikheu ava mdo pvan nrangki mapchaan dokka.”

Ungta mku onna leh kring saa rek plii arlakki kver rek mlaiṭim mi marki tikheu ungu mmik tikheu pum, te eayo dok hep daat Jaonao krip daat neiji deinu, ava dultipaam mkheng thu mdo sii Isowr Pthla rekka tikheu lam.
Ungta Mma ngi vangda ungu tku onna tun ni kuk ong Mma khut chang ktongki jiik kjul ava louda.

Ungu Mma ngi jiik kjul ava mlo thungta kring saa rek plii ungta kver rek som knii lei plii ngi Jaonao ava maiṭhuwm mi kuwn lamda, mii pum ktaiji tingsai khat khat sin lamda, kintiing rek do ṭhil chaak ava mkrim kdi langlang mdo pkaakki kdim jeering tleengbeel ava amda.
Ungta mmaanni laa ren
kthe ngi the lamda,
“Jiik kjul ungu kbii namrek louda kapvang ava Nang daat pti,
mleija Nang nga a eayou lamda ungta chati leh pau ungu,
mii rek ungta chati mkheng thungki Nah ahii ngi mren chaan ti,
ungu mmaan ava neenki Isowr hintha,
Kruwngpaam ki thiimpu rek ra seem tinu,
ungta mmaanni dulti tunni kpaal na lamra.”
Au dilli tku onna ava kloi kring saa rek leh kver rek punpii ki punpii ungu pun ki pun Waan tamsii rek krowl neiji deinu ungu taryaak ruk aryaanu.
Krowl kparyaa ngi the lamda,
“Rutan, ungta alrou,
lousing ungu ruktang sii ungta kunlor ungu,
laarnee ungta suwṭhat karlaang,
ungu mdo eayo dok Jaonao Mma ngi kurhui sii a!”
Ungta Parwaan ki ungu dulti leenki ungta dulti ril ki ungu truwn thungki mthungki mkheng leh mdo seem khim khaiji hanto mdo the neiji aryaa nu,
“Tkonna tun ni kuk ong Mma hin tha ungta Jaojao ava hinni kpanpaak ungu kakjat ungta laarnee ungu ruktang sii ava kṭuw knai liit kma amso!”
Ungta kring saa rek plii ngi theda, “Amen!” Ungu kver rekki kuwn lamda luwbuk chlamda.
Tunva Jaonao ava ngi kbiinam tikheu thungki khat mdo pvan ava neiji deinu, ungta kring saa plii thungki khatti, khuw kippri krowl khat heppi “Arvang” dida mdo the neiji aryaa nu.
Ungu neiji dei nu, ungta asuw in, skowl kpowl khat, ungu kthou ava ngi jai khat sinda; ungta laar luwkhum khat Mma hin piida, ungu kapchaang slii ngi kapchaang rang ki chet da.
Mma ngi miknit na kbiinam mpvan thungta, miknit na kringsaa ava ngi theda, “Arvang!” dida mdo the neiji aryaa nu.
Ungta ksen reirui, ktlok skowl khat thuwk da; kthou ava dulti tuwn ki kdaai mdolo pthii nrangki rot pik da, miirekki khat leh khat mkursur yo nraan ki; Mma ava kaang ksaang klin khat pii da.

Mma ngi mukdum na kbiinam mpvan thungta, mukdum na kring saa ngi “Arvang!” dida mdo the neiji aryaa nu. Ungu, ungta asuw in, skowl kvom khat neiji deinu, ungta kthou ava khut thung ngi mdo owl nra sinda.

Ungta kring saa rek plii arlakki krowl khat heppi, “Kehu sear khatti dinari arjaa khat, ungu tujun sear kdummi dinari arjaa khat; pdainu thao leh rik rou dii ava thowng ma!” dida mdo the neiji aryaa nu.
Mma ngi miplit na kbiinam mpvan thungta, kring saa miplit na ngi “Arvang!” dida mdo the neiji aryaa nu.

Ungta ungu asuw in, skowl kbal phet phut khat neiji deinu, ungu ava kthou miing ava kdiyou, ungu sim mi mdil ṭoida, ungta mmaan ava dultipaam sruk plii thungki khat ava hin rutan piida, kaang ksaang ngi mdo eayo nraan, ungu poitham ungta omlai ungu dulti tunki nowm saa ngi mdo eayo nraan ki rutan pii lamda.
Mma ngi mparngat naki kbiinam mpvan thungta, Isowr pauna lei ungu mmaanni sakhi mdo hur lei inni mdo eayo dok in mmaan ki raothla rek ava suwlbuwr tingi neiji deinu.

Krowl kparyaa langlang ngi mmaanni owng lam da the lamda, “O kinreel siingi Kchiir, ungta mkindit ki Mukpu, dultipaam thu ka am rek tun kṭewl ti don, neen ki hii mphuw ado talo pik nraanna tak pang ksot rangda?”

Ava dilli mmaanna phrik kturrown khat khat pii chlamda ungta sra owr mdo kurthut ṭhi in ungu mu u mnao rek mmaan ava lulu ngi ke eayou rangki mdo tlot slii in msing ava mkurkhum du khim khai, mpha mruk tummi mkarngat bong chaak nraan Mma ngi theda.
Mma ngi mtruk na kbiinam mpvan thungta, neiji deinu, ungu asuw in, klin langlang ringnaang thuwk da; ungta kniw ava saavun lulu vom chda, thla kukkloi peeng ava hii hep daatti sen chda.
Ungta tirthli kraang ngi kduwt ding ke er mdo pṭut tir pthii lulu ngi, parwaan ki bursi ava dulti tun tla tir chda.
Parwaan ava jiik kjul heppi kjul dok da, ungta lown leh prahpaam khim khaija ma amna mun thungki punthot pthii da.

Au dilli dultipaam ki kruwng rek, paam kpu rek, rawlmii ki ber ksu rek, ungu suwang rek, ruktang rek, suwk leh kintek mii pum ktai ava khur thung ngi kurdowl lamda, ungu lown ki lownpii rek arlakki kurdowl lamda.
Lown rek leh lownpii rek hin own lamda, “Neen kleen inni mhai tlaak pik inra tku onna tun ni kuk ong Mma maiṭhuwm ki, ungta Jaonao plung thit rang thungki mhai dowl chaan.
Mleija Mmaan plung thit ki Nit klin langlang kthleng nga, ungu ava maiṭhuwm mi ku krip pchaang rang da?”

Hava dil tha Waan tamsii rek plii ngi, dultipaam markil plii thu rip daat lamda, dultipaam leen, truwn leen, mdit mata dinglung haikhei leenni tirthli mraan liit ma nra, dultipaam ki tirthli khur plii mdo kjown mer in ava neiji deinu.

Au dilli kring Isowr ki kbiinam ksin ktlok Waan tamsii khat kniw thuwna ktongki arhang kthuwk neiji deinu, ungta dultipaam leh truwn sulkpurnul rang ki rutan mdo piik Waan tamsii rek plii hinni Mma ngi krowl kparyaa ngi owngda own lamda.
Mma ngi theda, “Nenki Isowr sra owr rek pchel tunni kbii mnam du khim khai dulti mdit mata truwn mata dinglung haikhe sul purnul maan.”
Ungta kbii mdo nam rek archaang neiji aryaa nu, Isreel chapa rek chati thungki khim khai punpii pun som plii lei plii ava kbii nam pik lamda.
Judah chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Ruben chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Gad chati thungki pun sowm lei knii,
Asher chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Naptali chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Manaseh chati thungki pun sowm lei knii,
Simion chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Levi chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Isakhar chati thungki pun sowm lei knii,
Yebulun chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Joseph chati thungki pun sowm lei knii, Benjamin chati thungki pun sowm lei knii kbii nam pik lam da.

Au dil tha neiji suwnu, ungu asuw in, ku mii khat lee dotai pchaan ma klin lang lang khat kurtuwl, chati khim khai thungki, sumkhur mkheng thungki miirek leh paurek, ava tkonna maiṭhuwm ungu Jaonao maiṭhuwm mi rip lamda, phrik kturrown kpowl ava naa sip lamda, mkhut thuwnni sipra arnaa ksin neiji deinu.
Ungta krowl kparyaa langlang ngi mmaanni owng lamda, “Tku onna na tun ni kuk ong tkirliinna ava nenki Isowr leh Jaonao do!” kdingi the lamda.
Ungta Waan tamsii rek mkheng ngi tku onna tukhul dok lamda ungu kver rek leh kring saa rek tukhul dok lamda, ungta tku onna maiṭhuwmmi kuwn lamda ungu Isowr luwbuk lamda.
The lamda, “Amen. Suwkṭha ungu laarknei, ungta lousing ungu tpanpaak, ungta takjat, ungu ruktang leh rutan kthloi ava kṭuw knai liit kma nenki Isowr! Amen!”
Au dilli kver rek thungki khatti nei kihin mkhewl da, theda, “Phrik kpowl kturrown knaa rek ava kule da, ungu tva ki kthleng lamda?”

Neiji Mma hin thenu, “Ocha, Nang ngi adee.” Ungbi Mma ngi nei kihin theda, “Hava mmaan ava suwk kthuwk klin langlang thungki kthleng lam, Jaonao hii ngi mphrik inna kpowl dang dang ngi mdo arsuk pik lam.
Ava leiji mmaan ava Isowr ku onna maiṭhuwmmi ka am lam. Ungta Mma luwbuk Inn thu suwnjaan knai kma sok mdolo chaak in; ungu tku onna tunni kukong Mma ngi ma am nraan kpii chra.
Mmaan ava mpoi in tham nime mning in kraal nime, kniw ngi sat lam nime mdit mata do khat lee ngi sat donle kapkaa amnime.
Mleija tku onna mlaiṭim mi ka am Jaonao ava ngi krung chlamra, ungta kring diitlaang kphul ava kpha ngi kṭhi chlamra, ungu mmaan mik tun ki arthli khim khaija Isowr ri kuk knuwl pik chlamra.”
Jaonao vi mtikheu na kbiinam mpvan thungta, Parwaan ava ṭhang mṭim arveel thu rim kdi am chda.
Au dilli Isowr maiṭhuwm mi krip Waan tamsii rek tikheu, ungu mmaan hinni peengkhul tikheu mdo piik lam neiji deinu.

Ungta krim kdi langlang tapkaak na jeering tleengbeel kdilsuwn ksin ktlok Waan tamsii khat suwlbuwr betha rip daat da; ungta Mma ngi tku onna maiṭhuwm mi ka am jeering suwlbuwr tunni kintiing rek mkheng doṭhil chaak ava tu mdo purchuwmra, Mma hin mkrim kdi langlang ava pii lamda.
Ungta Waan tamsii khut tunki meikhut ava ngi kintiing rek do ṭhil chaak tu kilṭhi ngi Isowr maiṭhuwmmi hanthlut da.

Au dilli Waan tamsii ava ngi tleengbeel kdilsuwn ava louda suwlbuwr thungki mei louda pdim dok thida dultipaam thu var da, ungbi kdung ngi pṭeek kpuwk krowl amda, kowl plek da, ungu ringnaang thuwkda.
Tunva peengkhul tikheu ksin Waan tamsii rek tikheu vi, mpeengkhul in kdum rangki kirsim lamda.

Ru kri verki Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, ungbi ṭil leh mei ava hii tu kurchuwmmi dulti tun tla da; ungta dulti sruk kdum thungki khat ava kbung chda, ungu ding rek ruk sruk kdum thungki khat kbung chda, ungta nowm arnaa ke er mkheng nga kbung chda.
Miknit na Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul ava dumda, ungbi meiji kṭuwng slii lown kparthaang langlang hep daat ava truwn thu var pthiida.
Ungbi truwn ava sruk kdum thungki khat hii kur owl chda, truwn thungki kring tuwlva khim khaija diyou chda, ungta arkuwngpii sruk kdum thungki khat ava eakrep da.

Mukdum na Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, ungbi Parwaan ki bursi klin langlang khat meila choi heppi kṭuwng ava arjun tla da, ungbi kreng sruk kdum thungki khat ungta diitlaang kphul rek khim khai tunni arjung tla da.
Bursi miing ava ding arkit mdo dit ungta dii sruk kdum thungki khat ava arkit kur owl chda, ungu ava mkhat reen leiji dii knee mii knempok diyou chda.

Miplit na Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, ungbi kniw sruk kdum thungki khat, ungu thla sruk kdum thungki khat, ungta bursi sruk kdum thungki khat ava prei da, ava leiji mar awng sruk kdum thungki khat ava jiing chda, ungu suwnki kleng sruk kdum thungki khat leng mda, anto lulu ngi jaanki sruk kdum thungki khat ava ame.

Au dilli pliim ava ngi Parwaan ṭimmi kjuwng neiji deinu, ungu krowl kparyaa khatti owngda, “Waan tamsii rek kdummi peengkhul kdum rangki mkirsim lei inni, dulti tunni ka am mii rek ava tija thu msuwkthi chdaatta! msuwkthi chdaatta! msuwkthi chdaatta!”
Ungta mparngat na Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, ungbi parwaan ki bursi khat dulti tunni arjung ktla neiji dei nu, ungu Mma ava ti knung rel khur ner ava chungkam mhin pii da.
Mma ngi ti knung rel khur ner ava pvang da, ungta mangmei khat hep daat khur ner thungki meikhut arhan thuwk da, ungbi kniw leh parwaan ava khur ner thungki meikhutti pum jiing ngi jiing chda.
Au dilli mei khut thungki khaopruwn rek dulti tunni thuwk da, ungu mmaan ava dulti tunki ruwlparthi rek rutan hep daat rutan ava pii lamda.
Dultimii ava mapchel tunni Isowr ri kbii mdo namma rek kma donle, dulti tunki arnaa kmowng ke er do khim khai mdit mata dinglung haikhe lu chaat sul mdo purnul ma nraan mhin inni theda.
Mmaanni ke eayou kma thla parnga lik thu suwk mdo pthuw nlamra rot pik lamda, ungta mmaan suwk pthuw ava ruwl parthi ngi miilai mdo pkee hep daatti suwk pthuwk lamda.
Hava nit rek thung ngi mii rekki mdiyo nraan kthlaam lamra ungu pha chlam nime; mmaanni kdiyou nuwm lamra, ungta kdiyou ava mmaan hinki kchen chra.
Tsut ndaat va khaopruwn rek ava rawl karnaak ṭhira kirsim skowl rek hep daat lam; mluw leen thaanva jeering luwkhum lulu; mmai in ava dultimii mai hep daat lam.
Msam inna snu rek sam hep daat, ungu mhaa inna humpii smang haa hep daat lam.
Thiir plung arkuw hep daat klip thloi lamda, ungta mapthla in archaang nga skowl rek knempokki rawl karnaa kalrei ava archaang hep daat lam.
Marmei inna ruwl parthi lulu, ungu mkruw ka am, ungta thla parnga lik thu miirek suwk mdo pthuw nraanki rutan ava marmei leen inni ka am.
Mmaan tunni kruwng lulu tiknung rel khur thungki tamsii khat thloi lamda; mma miing nga Hebru pauvi Abaddon mdo dit Grik pauva Apollyon mdo dit.
Ru kri reepki suwthit na ava kvei dokka; asuw in, suwthit na knii thleng mlai.
Au dilli mtruk na Waan tamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, ungbi Isowr maiṭhuwm thungki jeering suwlbuwr thungki arkii rek plii thungki krowl khat neiji aryaa nu.
Peengkhul kthloi mtrukna Waan tamsii hin theda, “Euphrats kreng klin langlang thung ngi mdo bowl daat Waan tamsii rek plii ava apthla dok lam.”
Ava leiji ṭhang, nit, thla, kum tummi mdo purthlon dok Waan tamsii rek plii ava dulti sruk kdum thungki khat ke eayou ra pthla da.
Skowl ktuwng rawlmii rek msing ava vei knii thung ngi pun sowm sowmmi pun sowm kdingi neiji aryaa nu.

Ungta nei kmik kleng thu skowl rek ava hanto deinu: Ktuwng rek plung arkuw ava saphire lung mman klu haikok reirui, ungu kantup pditti mei pdit hep daat lam, ungta skowl rek luw ava humpii smang rek luw hep daat, ungu mei, meikhut leh kantup ava mmaan ner thungki thuwkda.
Hava tngana rek kdum mi dultimii sruk kdum thungki khat ava mner in thungki kthuwk mei ungta meikhut ungu kantup ava ngi eayou da.
Mleija skowl rek rutanna mner in leh marmei thuwnki kthuwk; mmaan armeija pruwl rek lulu, mluw pum, ava ngi miirek sul purnul lamda.

Hava tngana rek do eayo ma dultimii rek mkekleem va khut dosak tarnam ungu khut do sak pthla rek leh jeering ungta jeering kpowl ungu thiir ksen ungta ding lung, kdei pchaang kma, karyaa pchaang kma mdit mata kchet pchaang kma luw kbuk thungki mmaanni down liit lamme ungu ava thungki plung ren hur lamme.
Mdit mata mmaanni mii ke eayou thungki, mit trang nong thungki, mata pang turkuiji kturkui cha thungki, ungu kup pru thungki plung ren hur liit lamme.
Au dilli Parwaan ki kurjung ṭum ruktang langlang Waantamsii khat neiji deinu, armeiji jiil dok da, mluw leen kowllisa amda, mmaija kniw hep daat, mkhu rek ava mei kcho hep daat da.
Mma ngi mkhut thu mdo sin daat jiikkjul kdilsuwn ava pvangda. Mchangki mkhu ava truwn leen khiingda, ungu mlee ki mkhu ava laan tha khiingda,
ungta humpii smang khat kruwn heppi krowl kparyaa ngi owngda, Mma ngi mu own thungta, pṭeek kpuwk tikheu heppi marchaang ava amda.
Ungu pṭeek kpuwk tikheu vi miprit dok thungta, neia kikjit ra kirsim nu, pdainu Parwaan ki krowl khat dothe aryaa nu, “pṭeek kpuwk tikheu dothe ava kbii anam dok, ungu kjit lamma.”
Ungta truwn leen krip daat Waantamsii nei kdo dee ava ngi Parwaan ktong tha mkhut changki khiingda
ungu kṭuw knai liit kma ava thu ka am ava ktham da, Parwaan ungu mthungki ka am ruk kapṭhang, dultile mthungki ka am, truwn leh mthungki ka am kapṭhang Mma ava kto liit nime dida pau ktham da.
Pdainu mtikheu na Waantamsii ngi mdo dum ra peengkhul nit rek thu Mma ngi mdum du tiing ngi Mma ngi msra owr rek khulpu rek hin theda, Isowr ki kukthuk pau ava kurkhum ra.
Au dilli Parwaan ki krowl khat nei kdo aryaakki ki hin the nowlda, “Va,truwn leen thang leh laan tun krip daat Waantamsii khut thung ngi mdo sin daat jiikkjul kparvang daat ava alou,” dida theda.

Ava leiji neiji Waan tamsii hinvanu jiikkjul kdilsuwn ava mdo tpiik nra thenu; ungbi Mma ngi ki hin theda, “Alou ungu achaa dok; nah apoi thungva kakha ra, pdainu aner thungva pkhui ning heppi kthlumra.”
Ungbi neiji jiik kjul kdilsuwn ava Waantamsii khut thungki lounu ungu chaa dok nu, kner thungva pkhui ning heppi thlumda, pdainu kchaak dok le kpoi thungva khada.
Ungta nei kihin theda, “Nang ngi mii knempok ungu chati rek ungta pauna rek ungu kruwng rek mlei thu pau ado phuwn nowlra.”
Au dilli kchung hep daat mdo owl na kchung khat mpii da, ungu ki hin theda, “Erip ungta Isowr luwbuk Inn, suwlbuwr ungu mthungki luwkbuk rek ava a owl.
Pdainu luwbuk Inn duwnki dulbuk ava owlma; ava ama pthii, mleija ava chati rek hin mdo piik dok, ungta mmaanni Kchiir khuwpii ava thla som plii lei knii thung ngi kther lamra.
Ungta Neiki sakhi rek knii ava ngi khuiru dona naa lamdon le kum pun khat arjaa knii ungu nii som truk lik thung ngi pau mdo phuwn nraan ki rutan rot pik lam nik di.”
Hava lea dultipaam ki kruwng maiṭhuwmmi krip ding knii leh meila rina knii rek lam.
Ungta ku mii khatti sul mpurnul lambi, mner in thungki mei ptlong donle mmaan kipteng rek ava mdo chaaklu; ku mii khatti sul mpurnul lambi, anto lulu ngi mma va ke eayou ra.

Mmaanni pau mphuwn in nit lik thung ngi khuw mrat ma nra, parwaan mdo arkam nraan ki chungkam mdo thloi in, ungta dii ava hii mdo pur owl nraanki rutan mdo thloi in, ungu mmaanni mbin in khim khai thu tngana rek ava dulti leen mdo prei nraan krutan mdo thloi in.
Ungta mmaanni rinpaumin mupṭut dok inle, ti knung rel khur thungki saa arhan thuwk donle mmaan tun rawl karnaak ṭhi don, ungu pchaang lam don ke eayou lamra.
Ungta mmaan ki kdiyou kluwng ava pau purtol va Sodom leh Egypt mdo ditna, mmaanni ava khros leenni Mukpu mdo pthoi naan, klin langlang khuwpii arlakki ka am.

Mleija mii rek hinki, chati rek, ungu pleiji kpau rek, ungta chati rek ava ngi nii kdum mṭim lik thung ngi mii rekki mmaan ki kdiyou kluwng thlaam lamda ungu thlaan thu mdo alruwl raanna rot pik lamme.
Ungta dulti tun ka am rekki kanpa lamra, ungu mkanpat inni chla kparthleng lamra, mleija hava khulpu rek knii ava mmaanni dultipaam thu suwk pthuwk lamda.
Pdainu nii kdum mṭim ava dil tha Isowr hinki rinkhu tdaal mmaan thung ngi lutda, ungbi mkhu inni rip lamda, ungta mmaan kdei mii rek leen kheel siiki kṭi ava amda.
Au dilli Parwaan ki krowl kparyaa langlang khat mmaan hinni mdo the ava aryaa lamda, “Hava tha arhang kal in!” Ungbi mmaan kipteng rek ava do sut na thung ngi armei arlakki Parwaan tha hangkal lamda.

Ungta ṭhang ava kat thu klin langlang ringnaang khat thuwk da, ungbi khuwpii thungki buw Inn ava tluw chda; ringnaang kthuwkki miilai pun tikheu eayou da, ungu mdo ṭheek rek ava ngi kheel siiki kṭi ngi Parwaan ki Isowr ava panpaak chlam da.
Mknit na suwthit na ava kvei dokka; asuw in, mukdumna suwthit na ava kthleng tiingtiing nga.

Au dilli mtikheu na Waantamsii ngi peengkhul dumda, Parwaan tha krowl kparyaa khat amda, ava ngi theda, “Dultipaam ki kruwngpaam ava nenki Mukpu leh Mma Khrista ki Kruwngpaam mi kur owl kcha a, ungta Mma ngi kṭuw knai liit kma kpaal ra.”
Ungta Isowr maiṭhuwmmi tku onna tunni kuk ong kver rek som knii lei plii ngi, kuwn lamda Isowr luwbuk chlamda,
the lamda, “Kapchang riim Mukpu,
Isowr kurthuwk slii ungu kurthuwk dok,
Nang ava neenni akpanpaak chaak inna,
tditta Nang ngi arutan klin langlang lou tinu,
kpaal rangki apṭhunna.
Chati rekka mplung kthi,
pdainu Nah plung thit kthlung nga,
ungta kdiyou rek mdo kṭewl nrangki,
msra owr khulpu rek ungta,
kintiing rek mnah mdo piik nra,
ungu Nah amiing kṭi rek kdil leh klin mikniing,
ungta dulti ke eakrep rek ava,
ke eakrep rangki mpha kveija.”
Au dilli Parwaan ki Isowr luwbuk Inn ava kparvang da, ungta Mma paurina ki pluh ava kandang da; ungu kowl plek da, krowl rek, pṭeek kpuwk archaang, ringnaang, kdung ngi ṭil ktla ava thuwk da.
Ungta klin ungu kukthuk langlang khat Parwaan ki arjuk kandang da, snu khatti kniw kpurlot da, thla ava mkhu therri thiida, ungta mluw tunni bursi rek sowm lei knii ava luwkhummi khum da.
Mma ava nao hurda ungbi nao kukplu chrangki mukdung mṭou thungta ṭapda.
Ungta kukthuk langlang ktlok khat Parwaan ki arjuk kandang da; asuw in, klin langlang ruwlrew ksen khat ava mluw tikheu ungu markii sowm, ungu mluw rek tunni laar luwkhum khum lamda.

Mma armeiji parwaan ki bursi rek ava sruk kdum thungki khat ruwt pthiida ungu dulti tunni var pthiida. Ungu ruwlrew ava ngi snu nao pluk daat ava mdo chaak nra, nao kuplu rang ngi kunchul slii snu ava maiṭhuwmmi ripda.
Snu ava ngi chati rek mkheng tunni thiir kchung tu kilṭhi ngi kpaal rangki pselnao khat plu da, pdainu mnao ava Isowr hin Mma ko onna tha arjuk chom dok da.
Ungu snu ava kbowklaiji chen chda, mun ava thu nit pun khat arjaa knii ungu som truk lik thu mdo juw chaak nra, Isowr ri purchuwl pik da.
Tunva Parwaan tha rawl amda, Maikhal leh Mtamsii rekki ruwlrew rawl karnaak ṭhida; ungu ruwlrew leh mtamsii rek rukva karnaak ṭhi lamda.
Pdainu mmaan ava pchaang dok lamda ungu Parwaan thang ngi mmaan am nrangki mun am kurnowl me.
Ungta ruwlrew klin langlang ava var pthiida, tditta alraangki pruwl, Dijabowl ungu seitaan mdo dit, dultipaam mkheng kuhuwn chaak na, mma ava mtamsii rek tu kilṭhi ngi dulti tunni var pthiida.

Ungta Parwaan ki krowl khat kparyaa langlang ngi mdo the neiji aryaa nu, “Tunva kirliinna ungu rutan ungta nenki Isowr ki Kruwngpaam ungu Khrista rutan ava kthleng nga, mleija nenki Isowr maiṭhuwmmi nu u nnao in ava suwnjaan knai kma plei knei psuk mma ava mvar pthii dokka.
Mmaanni mma ava Jaonao ki hii ungu mmaan rinpaumin ki pauna ava ngi mapchaan dok inna, mleija kdiyou kpha thu mmaanni mrinkhu inna chang ptlaak lamme.

O Parwaan ungu mthung ngi ka am rek naan kanpa chaan! Pdainu O dulti leh truwn naanna asuwn kthi, mleija dijabowl ava muplung kthi langlang ngi naan hin kurjung ṭumma, mleija mma ki mpha ktoi tek ava mma ngi mdea!”
Ungta mma dulti leenni mdo var pthii mdakki mdee thungta, pselnao kuplu snu ava owr chda.
Pdainu snu ava ngi kbowklai ki pruwl ava hinki mjuwn chaak nra, klin langlang pliim pthla knii mhin pii chda, ungu mun ava thu mma ngi kum kdum mṭim thu nao juwk chda.
Pruwl ava ngi snu dil pṭoi da mner thungki dii ava kreng dii kluwng hep daatti dii kluwng ngi mdo junjuh chaak nra ptlong da.
Pdainu dulti ngi snu ava bom chda ungu dulti ngi mner pvang da ruwlrew vi mner thungki mdo ptlon kreng dii ava pjol da.

Au dilli ruwlrew vi snu ava plung pthit da, ungbi mcharuwl angṭhe ka am daat rek Isowr paureen karkhii rek leh Jisu rinpaumin kuhur rek rawl karnaak ṭhi rangki chet da. Ungu mma ngi truwn sitphui leen ripda.
Ungta truwn thungki arhang kthuwk saa khat markii sowm ungu mluw tikheu ungta markii sowm leenni laar luwkhum sowm khumda ungu mluw ktaiji Isowr kjowm kcha ki miing mdo hur neiji deinu.

Ungta neiji kdo dee saa ava ruwnnu hep daat, mkhu rekka towm khu hep daat, ungu mner ava humpii smang ner hep daat da. Ungu ava hinni ruwlrew vi mrutan ungta mko onna ungu klin langlang rutan ava mhin pii da.
Ungta mluw khat ava kdiyou rang ngi lim chda, pdainu kdiyou rang ngi mlim ava dam chda, ungbi dultipaam mkheng ngi kngak kcha saa ava dil ṭoi lamda.

Mii rekki ruwlrew luwbuk lamda, pdainu saa ava hinni mma ngi rutan mdo piik leiji, mmaanni saa ava luwbuk lamda, the lamda, “Hava saa hep daat ku ka am rang, ungu mma rawl karnaak ṭhi pchaang ra ku ka am rangda?”
Ungta saa ava hintha Isowr kjowm kcha ki pauna rek ungu do ksi thleer kma mpau nrangki ner rek pii da, ungu ava rutan mdo thloi nra thla som plii lei knii rot pik da.
Ava leiji mner pvang da, Isowr kjowm kcha ki kipteng pau theda, Mma miing ungu mthung ngi ka am rek, tditta Parwaan tha ka am rek kjowm kcha ngi pau theda.
Kintiing rek rawl karnaak ṭhida mdo pchaan nlam rang ki rutan rukka rot pik da. Ungu chati ungta miirek ungu pau ungta chati khim khai tuwnni rutan mdo thloi nrangki piida.
Ungta dulti tuwnni ka am mii mkheng, ungu dultipaam mapṭhan du liitti mdo eayo dok Jaonao ava rinkhu Laaika thung ngi mmiing mdo kjit ma mii mkheng ngi ava luwkbuk ra.
Knaa ka am ku mii khat mma ava ngi aryaa chso.

Paam suwkki mdolo ra ku mii khat ma amta, paam suwkki chet chso; kaang ksaang ngi ku mii khat ksuryou ava kaang ksaang katti ksuryou ra. Hava thung ngi kdung kdiil dei leh kintiing rek lamrin chaak ava ka am.
Au dilli ktlok saa khat dulti thungki arhang kthuwk neiji deinu; Jaonao heppi markii knii ka am ungta ruwlrew khat heppi pauda.
Ava ngi ru kri thokki saa ava maiṭhuwmmi rutan mkheng sinton da, ungu dulti leh mthung ngi ka am khim khaiji kdiyou rang ngi klim kdam ru kri thokki saa ava hin luw tpubuk lamda.
Mii rek do sut na thung ngi parwaan ki mei arjung kupṭum kpha thu klin klin tngana nong rek tloda.

Ungta saa maiṭhuwmmi nong mdo tlot nrangki tngana rek nong mdo rot pik ava ngi, dulti tuwn ka am rekka plei nei psuk lamda, kaang ksaang ngi klim anto daat joso kring daat saa pthla ava aseem lamso kdingi theda.
Ungta saa ava pthla ngi mpau nra, ungu saa pthla ava luwkbuk kma rekka mdo eayo nra saa pthla ava thung ngi tdaal mdo piik nrang ki rot pik da.
Kdil leh klin mikniing, suwang leh sra mikniing, kintek leh suwk mikniing mkheng ngi mchang ktong ki khut mdit mata mapchel leen inni kbiinam mdo thloi nraanki ruk tlo da.
Ava leiji kbiinam tditta saa miing mdit mata msing miing kthloi miilai ava kma donle ku khat lee ngi kren mdit mata kjur pchaang me.
Hava ava lousing mdo dit, kdeipandi mii ava ngi saa sing nga atai chso, mleija ava dultimii rek sing kurthuwk. Msing nga arjaa truk som truk lei truk.
Au dilli neiji deinu, ungta asuw in, Siyon lown leenni Jaonao rip daat da, ungu Mma tu kilṭhi ngi mapchel tun inni Mma leh Mpah miing kthloi punpii khat ungu pun som plii lei plii rek am lamda.
Ungta Parwaan ki krowl khat dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daat, ungu kdung ngi pṭeek kpuwk archaang hep daat neiji aryaa nu; krowl kdo aryaak ava tingsai kdum krowl hep daat ta.

Ungta mmaanni laaren ava tkonna maiṭhuwm ungu kring saa rek leh kver rek maiṭhuwmmi the lamda. Laa ava dulti thungki mdo ṭenthuw rek punpii khat pun som plii lei plii kma donle ku khat lee ngi the pchaang me.

Mmaan ava snu tu mdaksaan kbuwr liit kma rek lam, mleija mmaanna Kchiir rek lam, mmaanna Jaonao chena ktai thu mdil kṭoi rek lam, hava lea ru kri thokki thei lulu ngi Isowr leh Jaonao tummi dultimii thungki mdo ren dok lam.
Ungta mmaan ner thu plei knei am liit me, mleija mmaanna kenyee rek lam.

Au dilli dulti tunni ka am chati rek khim khai ungu sumkhur khim khai ungta pau khim khai ungu mii rek khim khai hin ni pau kparyaam rangki Parwaan ṭimmi kjuwng slii Waantamsii ktlok khat neiji deinu.

Ungta krowl kparyaa ngi Mma ngi theda, “Isowr aṭi chaan ungu Mma hinni apanpaak chaan, mleija Mma ngi mdo kṭewl nrangki ṭhang ava kurjung nga; ungta parwaan leh dulti ungu truwn leh diitlaang kphul kseem Mma luw abuk chaan.”
Mdil kṭoi ktlok Waantamsii khatti theda, “Bebylon klin langlang ava ktluw kcha a, ktluw kcha a, mma ngi chati rek mkheng nga kbuwr ki kanthle ktardou ki ju mdo pneek.”
Ungta mmaan dil kṭoi ktlok Waantamsii mukdum nangi, krowl kparyaa khatti theda, “Saa luwkbuk ku mii khatti pthla, mdit mata mapchel leen mata mkhut leenni kbiinam marlaan bi,
mma rukva Isowr plungthit ki rik rou dii, muplung thitti tong thu mdo purchuwm ava kneera. Ungu mma ava Kchiir Waantamsii rek leh Jaonao maiṭhuwmmi meila kantuppi suwk kupthuwk ra.
Ungta mmaan suwkthuw naki meikhut ava ṭuwnai nime; ungu saa ava leh mapthla luwkbuk ungta ava miing ki kbiinam karlaang kma mii khim khaija suwnjaan knai liit kma karnga chlamra.”
Hava thung ngi Isowr paureen karkhii rek leh Jisu krin cha kintiing rek do diil dei ava ka am.

Ungta Parwaan ki krowl khat nei kdo aryaak ava ngi theda, “Hava ava akjit: snii ki kupṭhunni Mukpu hin kdiyou dok rek ava msuw kṭha. Msuw in kṭha kat kat. Tditta mmaan nong tlot dil kṭoiji mnong tlot naan thungki karnga chlamra!”
Au dilli asuw in, Armei kpowl dang khat, mluw leenni jeering laar luwkhum kukhum, mkhut thung ngi tangkep kraang jap ksin, Mii Chapa khat hep daatti armei tunni kukong ava neiji deinu.

Ungta luwbuk Inn thungki kthuwk ktlok Waantamsii khat, armei leenni kukong Mma ava ngi krowl kparyaa khatti own da, “Atangkep pa mthung ngi jukhiing, ungu kminna, ungta mmin nrangki ṭhang nga kvei dokka, mleija dultipaam ki takhau ra ava kmin dokka.
Ava leiji armei leenni ku kong Mma ngi mtangkep ava dulti leen juk khiing da, ungu dultipaam ava khauda.
Ungta Parwaan ki luwbuk Inn thungki kthuwk ktlok Waan tamsii rukva tangkep khat kraang jap sin da.

Au dilli ktlok Waan tamsii khat, mei tun rutan kthloi Waan tamsii ava suwlbuwr thungki thuwk da, ungu Mma ngi tangkep kraang jap khat ksin Mma ava krowl kparyaa langlang ngi ownda, “Atangkep pa jukhiing, ungu dultipaam ki rik rou ava mbel mbelli akhau purkuk, mleija thei ava kmin dokka.”
Ava leiji Waan tamsii ava ngi dultipaam thu mtangkep arju khiing da ungu dultipaam ki rik rou ava khau da, ungta Isowr plung thit ki rik rou dii mdo sowm na thung ngi var pthiida.

Ungta rik rou dii tsowm na ava khuwpii duwn thang ngi var pthii da, ungu rik rou dii tsowm na thungki hii kluwng ava skowl ner rii kpha dekki kparthaang ngi luwng da, mleija ava meel arjaa kdummi ksaang ungu lamkhat kheelli kukthuk.
Au dilli Parwaan tha klin langlang tngana tikheu ksin Waantamsii tikheu, tngana khat ava neiji deinu, ava lea mṭut na, mleija avale thu Isowr plung thit ta mṭut na.
Ungta mei tu kurchuwm truwn lik kli hep daat, ungu saa ava leh mapthla, ungta mmiing msing kapchaang dok rekki mkhut thuwnni Isowr tingsai ksin truwn lik kli betha krip daat neiji deinu.
Ungta mmaanni Isowr sra owr Mousi leh,
Jaonao ki laa the lamda,
“O kapchaang riim Mukpu Isowr,
Nah nong tlot ta klin langlang ungu tngana a!
O Mukpu Nah miing nga ku ngi kṭi kma am donle,
akpanpaak kma rang da?
Mleija Kchiir ra Nang daat pti.
Chati rek mkheng thleng donle,
Nang daat luw kbuk chlamra,
mleija Nah do kṭewl la kandang nga.”
Hava dil tha neiji deinu, ungu Parwaan thang ngi sakhi ki buw Inn luwbuk Inn ava kparvang da.
Ungu luwbuk Inn ava thungki tngana rek tikheu ksin, Waan tamsii rek tikheu thuwk lamda, plaabuw ktarnaal dang ngi kipleu ava kparyeel lamda, ungta muplung inna jeering riingi kparyeel lamda.
Ungta kring saa plii thungki khatti, Waan tamsii rek tikheu ava kṭuw knai liit kma ka am Isowr plung thitti kdim; jeering tleeng beel tikheu pii lamda.

Ungta luwbuk Inn ava Isowr laarnee leh mrutan ki meikhutti pum dimmi dim chda, ungu tngana rek tikheu ksin Waan tamsii rek tikheu vi mdown dok du in khim khai, luwbuk Inn thu ku khat lee lut chip pchaang me.
Au dilli Waan tamsii rek tikheu hinni pau kthe krowl khat kparyaa ava luwbuk Inn thungki neiji aryaa nu, “Naanni jung inra Isowr plung thit ki tleengbeel tikheu va dultipaam tun aptlong in.”
Ava leiji ru kri verki Waan tamsii ngi jungda, mtleengbeel ava dulti leen ptlongda, ungbi saa pthla ava luwkbuk kbii kthloi mii rek tun ni tiṭit karvei kpaan ava thuwkda.
Miknit na Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava truwn leen ptlong da, ungbi kdiyou miilai khat hii heppi kur owl chda, ungu truwn ava thungki kring do khim khaija diyou chda.
Mukdumna Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava kreng rek leh diitlaang kphul tun ptlong da, ungbi hii ngi kur owl chda.
Ungta dii ava Waan tamsii ngi mdo the hava neiji aryaanu, “ka am slii ungu ka am dok, O Kchiir Khat, Nah do kṭewl la kindit langlang nga!
Mleija mii rekki kintiing rek leh khulpu rek hii pbu lamda, ungu mmaan do neek ra hii ado piik lam, ava anto kat kat ra!”
Ungta suwlbuwr own neiji aryaa nu, “Oji, kapchaang riim Mukpu Isowr, Nah do kṭewl rekka kindit ungu mkindit kat!”
Miplit na Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava kniw leen ptlong da, ungbi mei tu kilṭhi ngi mii rek mdo sat nra rot pik da.
Mii rekka mei ksa reenni pkaa lamda, ungbi tngana rutan kthloi hava Isowr miing nga mmaanni pauhur buk chda, ungta mmaanni plung ren hurda Mma kpanpaak tlo lamme.
Mparngat na Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava saa ku onna leen ptlong da, ungbi mkruwng paam ma jiing chda; mii rekki mjat reen lei inni miplei in purtuk lamda.
Ungta kdung ksaan kpaan leiji Parwaan ki Isowr ava pauhur buk lamda, ungu mnong tlot in thungki mmaanni plung ren hur lamme.
Mtruk na Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava Euphrats kreng leen ptlong da, ungbi mthungki dii ava kniw thuwna ktongki kruwng rek lam kpurchuwl pikki kang chda.
Ungta ruwlrew ner thungki leh saa ava ner thungki ungu kindit kma khulpu rek ner thungki uiṭok hep daat ktobor pthla rek kdum kthuwk neiji dei nu.
Mleija mmaanna tarnam pthla rek kurthuwk, titinna rek ktlo, dultipaam mkheng thungki kruwng rek hin, kapchaang riim ki Isowr nit klin langlang tunni rawl karnaak ṭhira kunpun rang leiji chet lamda.
“Aryaa in, kup pru heppi Neiji arjung nik di. Mdakchai daatti kandang lerlorri mche ma nra mik khut harda mdona karkhii kcha mii ava msuw kṭha!”
Ungta mmaanni Hebru pauvi Armageddon mdo dit mun ava thu kunpun lamda.
Mtikheuna Waan tamsii ngi mtleengbeel ava tarthli leen ptlongda, ungbi luwbuk Inn thungki tku onna thungki krowl kparyaa langlang kthleng ngi theda, “Ava mtlot dokka!”
Ungta kowl kiplek, pṭeek kpuwk archaang rek, mkrowl rek, dultipaam thu mii rek ma am daat ki kthuwk liit kma ringnaang klin langlang khat thuwk da, ringnaang ava kdung ngi klin.
Khuwpii klin ava kdum kthuwkki jen da, ungu chati rekki khuwpii rek ava tluw chda, ungu Bebylon klin langlang nga Mma plung thit ki ju tong mdo pneek rangki Isowr ri bin phaak da.
Ungu prahpaam khim khai chen chda, ungta lown khdaat pre ame.

Kegi som parnga lulu ngi krik, klin langlang ṭil parwaan ki ngi mii rek leenni tlada, tngana ṭil ava leiji miirek ki Isowr ava pauhur buk da mrai chaak du in khim khaiji, tngana ava kdung tiṭit kirvei daatta.
Au dilli tleengbeel rek tikheu ksin Waan tamsii rek tikheu thungki khatti, ki hinni arvang da theda, “Arvang, dii knempok leen kuk ong daat snu ko okkma klin langlang mdo kṭewlra neiji aju tdet ni.
Dultipaam ki kruwng rekki mma tu kilṭhi ngi kturkui chlam da, ungu kturkui kcha ki ju ava dultipaam thu ka am mii rekki nee lamda.
Ungta Pthla thu neia Mma ngi kbowk laiji mṭhi dok da, ungu mluw tikheu ungu markii sowm ka am, Isowr kjowm kcha ki miing ngi pum dim kdim kcha, saa ksen ava leen ni kuk ong snu khat neiji deinu.

Snu ava kning ngi ksen leh kning ngi ksen reirui dona ngi kirsim da, ungu jeering mman klu langlang ungta pṭhi arlo ngi kirsimda, mkhut thungtha tipder kurhui ungu mturkui chaak naki kbuwr ava ngi kdim jeering tong khat sinda.
Ungta mapchel leen tha kukthuk miing khat kjit da; ‘Klin langlang Bebylon, ko okkma rek leh dultipaam ki ktobor nuh,’ dida kjit da.
Ungu snu ava ngi kintiing rek leh Jisu tummi mdo eayo rek hii mdo neek neiji deinu.
Neiji mma kdee thungta kdung ngi ngak chnu, pdainu Waan tamsii ngi ki hin theda, “Talu leiji kngak ptida? Snu kṭhi, mluw tikheu ka am markii sowm ka am ava ki kukthuk pau neiji aju the pik ni.

Nang ngi ado dee saa ava kthuwk dok, ungu kthuwk pme, ungta mma ava ti knung rel khur thungki arhang kthuwk rangki, ungu mma ava kmawng lamtha kchet; ungta dultipaam mapṭhan daat ki rinkhu ki Laaika thu mmiing mdo kjit ma dulti leen ka am saa rek ava tak heppi kthuwk, ungu kthuwk slii, ungta kthuwk rangki da kdingi kngakki ksuw lamra.
Hava lousing ki poithuw rangki: mluw tikheu ava snu ko onna lown tikheu rek,
kruwngrek tikheu ruk ka am, parnga ava ktla chdok, khatta ka am bing daat, ktlok khatta kthuwk rangki, ungu mma ngi mthlen thungva mpha ktoi tekki kpiira.
Kurthuwk dok leh kurthuwk kma saa ava tret pdainu ava rukka tikheu thungki, ungta kmawng lamtha chet da.
Nang ngi markii sowm ado dee ava kruwng rutan karlaang mlai kruwng rek sowm, pdainu saa ava tu kilṭhi ngi ṭhang khat pangki tummi kruwng hep daatti rutan karlaang rangki.
Havale ngi plung bin khdaatti mdo bin in ungu saa ava hintha mmaan ki rutan ungta mrutan inna mdo piik in.

Mmaanni Jaonao tun rawl karnaak ṭhi lamra, ungu Jaonao vi ava ngi kapchaang chlamra, mleija Mma ava Mukpu rekki Mukpu kruwng rekki Kruwng, ungta Mma tu kilṭhi rek ava mdo kchol dok ungu trin chaak kurhui rek mdo dit.”
Ungta Mma ngi ki hin theda, “Ko okkma snu ko onna ado dee ava mii rek leh kurtuwl miiluwng ungu chati rek leh pau rek kurthuwk.

Ungta nah dodee markii sowm mmaan leh saa ava ngi ko okkma snu ava kipder chlamra, mmaanni msangtlaak ungu mdakchai daatti kpurthuw pthii lamra, ungta mdaksaa ava kchaa lamra, ungu mei thu kapkaa pthii lamra.
Mleija Isowr pauna rek mkurkhum du khim khai, Mma poibin ktlo rangki, plungbin mkinṭim nraan, ungta saa ava hin kruwngki rutan mdo piik nraan, mmaan poibin thu Isowr ri mdo thiik pik lam.
Ungta nah do dee snu ava dultipaam ki kruwng rek tun kpaal klin langlang khuwpii ava.”
Hava dil tha Parwaan ki kurjung kṭum ktlok Waan tamsii khat, klinni rutan kthloi; neiji deinu, ungta dultipaam ava Mma pleuvi taanda.

Ungta kheel siiki krowl li Mma ngi owng da, “Klin langlang Bebylon ava ktluw kcha a, ktluw kcha a! Tarnam rek amna mun, pthla ktobor khim khai kurku na, ktobor leh tipder kurhui, puwa rek kurbu na kurthuwkka.

Mleija chati rek mkheng ngi mma ki kbuwr kanthle ktardou ki ju pri nlamda ungu dultipaam ki kruwng rekki mma tu kturkui chlamda, ungta dultipaam ki sumdowl klou rekki mma dongei thu suwang thuw nlam da.”
Au dilli neiji Parwaan ki krowl khat kdo aryaak ava ngi kihin theda,
“Nei kmii rek,
naanni mma pnu ton ado arvee ṭhi ma nraan,
mma leenki tngana rek ado phaak ṭhi ma nraan,
mma thungki thuwk dok in.
Mleija mma pnuton ava parwaan kpha dekki,
kchuwng ngi mpurtuwlla,
ungu Isowr ri mma pnu arvee mbin phaakka.
Mma ngi ado tpiik chaak in lulu ngi mma hin apiin,
ungu mma nong tlot rek ava,
sruk khat apkheel inra apiin;
mma ngi mdo purchuwmna tong ava thu,
sruk khat kheelli apurchuwm pik in.
