Mma ngi mdaksaa kpunlor da mdo ngei thu mlet lulu ngi,
kja kakham leh kurnung karbaang apartee inra mhin apiin.
Muplung ril thu mma ngi,
kruwngnu khatti kuk ong ping dida theda,
‘Neia meikhunu pmaang,
kurnung karbaang dei liit nimaang.’
Mma ki tngana rek ava nit khdaat thu, omlai,
kurnung karbaang, poitham kthleng ra,
ungta mma ava meiji kukbung chra;
mleija mma kekṭewl Mukpu Isowr ava kapchaang riim.”
Mma tu kturkui kcha, ungu mma dongei kngei ṭhi, dultipaam ki kruwng rekki mma ava meiji kṭuwng mdo dee lei inni, ṭap lam donle kurnung karbaang lamra.

Mma suwkthuw kṭi kcha ngi leer khatti mmaanni rip lam donle ungu kthe lamra, “Suwkthi palo! Suwkthi palo! Klin langlang khuwpii nang, kapchaang riim khuwpii Bebylon! ṭhang khdaat thu nang nga atikṭewl la.”
Ungta dultipaam ki sumdowl klou rekki, mma tummi ṭap lamda kurnung karbaang lamma, mleija ku khat lee ngi mmaan dojur dona ren pik lamme.
Jeering, thiir kpowl, lung mman klu, sumbuwr, plaabuw, ktarnaal dangdang mikrim kdi ding mkheng, hol dona mkheng, thiir kvom, thiir, likli,
satee howk, mroi, tapkaak thu mkrim ka am, myrrh tdit reidii, thao mkrim kdi, ju, thao, jaam mman klu, kehu, sil, Jao, skowl, ungu skowl kari, suwk rek, tditta dultimii raothla rekka havale.
“Nah araothla do ngei thei rek ava nah athungki ksun kcha a, ungta nah alrou rek leh kipleu dang ngi akunlor chaak ava kmawng kcha a, tphaak chaak nowl liit rang me!”
Snu hava thungki alrou kpha kcha rek, hava dona rek sumdowl klou cha rekki, mma jat kham kṭit pikki leer khatti rip lamda ṭap lamda, ungu kdung ngi kurnung karbaang chlam da.
“Suwkthi palo! Suwkthi palo! kning ngi ksen leh ksen rei rui dona mman klu ktarnaal dangdang ngi kirsim, jeering, lung mman klu, sumbuwr ri kirsim klin langlang khuwpii daat lo!

ṭhang khdaat thung ngi hava alrou mkheng nga do ksi kma kuplowm kcha a.” Ungta truwn biing ngi mdowllo in mkheng ka am chdaat, arkuwngpii kpupa rek leh kipjiin rek, ungu arkuwng kthou miirek mkheng ngi leer khatti rip lamda,
mma kukbung meikhut mdee in thungta owng lamda ṭap lamda, “Khuwpii kling langlang ava hep daat tak ka am rangda?”

Ungta mmaanni mluw tun inni vaiphul kurbuk lamda, ṭap lamda ungu kurnung karbaang lamda owng lamda, “Suwkthi palo! Suwkthi palo! Klin langlang khuwpii truwn thu ka am arkuwngpii kthloi mkheng nga mma alrouvi suwang kthuwk cha! ṭhang khdaat thu do ksi kma kuplowm kcha a.
O parwaan, mma tun kanpa cha, O kintiing rek, ungta kenyee rek leh khulpu rek, mleija Isowr ri mma raal piida makṭewlla!”

Au dilli kapchaang riim Waan tamsii ngi klin langlang chakkri lung hep daat, lung khat chomda truwn thu var pthiida, theda, “Ava leiji klin langlang khuwpii Bebylon ava muplung thit tu kilṭhi ngi kvar pthiira, ungu vei khat am kurnowl chnime.

Ungta nah athungki tingsai kdum rek, laa kthe dei rek, riiseem kdum dei rek, ungta peengkhul kdum dei rek, ava nah athung ki vei khat aryaa kurnowl chnime; ungu do khim khai dim knei miilai ava nah athung ngi veikhat am nowl nime; ungu chak kri lung archaang ava nah athung ngi vei khat am nowl nime.

Ungta meila kleng ava nah athung ngi vei khat am nowl nime; ungu kphalnuh leh pah ava nah athung ngi vei khat taryaak nowl nime; mleija nah sumdowl klou rekka dultipaam thungki klin mii rek lam, ungu chati mkheng nga nah amit trang ngi ado huwn chaak na.
Ungta khulpu rek leh kintiing rek hii ava mma thung ngi phangda, ungu dultipaam thu mdo eayo mkheng ruk mphaakka.”
Hava diltha Parwaan ki mii knempok krowl kparyaa nei kdo aryaak ava ngi theda, “Hallelujah! Nenki Isowr hin kirliinna leh laarnee ungta rutan ka amma!
Mleija Mma do kṭewl la mkindit ungu kindit deek kurthuwk; kturkui kcha ngi dultipaam kpubuwr klin langlang mma ava Isowr ri makṭewlla, ungu msra owr rek hii ava Mma ngi mma tunni mphuw mlo a.”
Veikhat nowlli Mmaanni owng lamda, “Hallelujah! mma thungki meikhutta kṭuw knai liit kma ksun kcha a.”
Tku onna leenni kuk ong Isowr ava kver rek som knii lei plii leh kring saa rek plii ngi kuwn lamda luwbuk lamda theda, “Amen. Hallelujah!”
Ungta tku onna leenki krowl khat thleng da, owngda, “Mma sra owr rek naan akheng, Mma kṭi klin kdil mkheng rek, nenki Isowr apanpaak chaan.”

Au dilli klin langlangki kurtuwl krowl hep daat neiji aryaa nu, dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daat, ungta kdung ngi pṭeek kpuwk archaang hep daatti, owngda, “Hallelujah! Mleija kapchaang riim nenki Mukpu Isowr ri kpaalra.
Nenni kanpa in chera kdung panpaak da ungu punlor in che, mleija Jaonao ki kphal ava kurjung nga, ungu kphalnu ngi mdaksaa kirsimma.
Mma ava plabuw ktarnaal dang ngi kipleu, ungta Kchiir ri mkirsim ra mrot pikka.” Mleija plabuw ktarnaal dang ava kintiing rek rinkindit nongtlot.
Ungta Waan tamsii ngi nei ki hin theda, “Hava akjit cha: Jaonao kphal kmaal thu kowl mdo lat rek ava msuwkṭha.” Ungta Mma ngi ki hin theda, “Hava lea kindit kat ki Isowr pauna rek lam.”

Au dilli neiji mkhu therri luw kbuk ra kuwn chnu, pdainu Mma ngi kihin theda, “Nang ngi ava ado tlot rang pme. Nei rukka Jisu rinpaumin kurpom nangki a u anao rek leh nang tung ngi sra owr tkurthut sap in,” Mleija Jisu rinpaumin ava Pthla do phuwn.
Au dilli Parwaan kparvang neiji deinu, ungu asuw in, skowl kpowl khat. Ava leenni kuk ong Mma ava trin chaak kurhui ungu kindit, ungta rinkinditti Mma ngi kṭewlda rawl karnaak ṭhi kurthuwk.
Mma mik ka mei kṭuwng lulu, ungu mluw tun laar luwkhum knempok amda; ungta Mma mdaksaa daat kma donle ku mii khat lee dodee pchaan ma tikjit miing khat amda.
Mma ava hii thu tpuhuwm dona ngi kirsim da, Mma mdo ownna miing nga Isowr pauna.
Ungta Parwaan ki rawlmii rekki skowl kpowl leen tuwng lamda, plabuw ktarnaal dang, kpowl ungu Kchiir naa lamda mdil ṭoi lamda.

Chati rek mdo suryo nrangki mner thungki kaang ksaang kraang jap khat thuwk da, ungu Mma ngi thiir kchung tu kilṭhi ngi kpaalra; kapchaang riim ki Isowr plung thitti rik rou dii mdo sowmna ava Mma ngi kther pthiira.
Mphrik kturrown tun leh mphei tun tik kjit kruwng rekki Kruwng, Mukpu rekki Mukpu tdit miing khat amda.
Au dilli kniw thu krip daat Waan tamsii khat neiji deinu, ungta kjuwng puwa rek mkheng nga Mma ngi krowl kparyaa ngi own da, “Arhang in, Isowr kmaal klin langlang tummi kurkuk in!
Kruwng rek daksaa, rawlmii ki ber ksu rek daksaa, kapchaang miirek daksaa, skowl rek leh ktuwng rek daksaa, kintek leh suwk mikniing, klin leh kdil mikniing, mkheng ki daksaa kchaara thuwk in.”
Ungta skowl tun ktuwng Mma leh Mma rawlmii rek rawl karnaak ṭhira, saa ava ngi dultipaam ki kruwng rek tu kilṭhi ngi rawlmii rek tu kurkuk neiji deinu.

Ungu saa ava leh saa ava kbiinam karlaang rek ungu ava pthla luwkbuk rek, titinna nong mdo tlotti mdo huwn chaak, kindit kma khulpu rek ava kjowng lamda, havale knii ava kantup mei kṭuwng thu mikring daat inni var pthii lamda.
Ungta angṭhe ava skowl tun kuk ong ner thungki kthuwk kaang ksaang ngi suryou tir lamda; ungu puwa rek mkheng nga mmaan dak kluwng ngi mpoi in paa chda.
Au dilli Parwaan ki ktlok Waan tamsii khat kurjung kṭum neiji deinu, mkhut thu ti knung rel khur ava chungkam leh thiir rii klin khat sinda.
Ungta Mma ngi ruwlrew tditta alraangki pruwl mdo dit dijabowl leh seitaan kjowngda, kum punkhat tummi bowl lamda.

Ungu khur thu var pthii lamda, ungta kum pun khat mphaak du khim khai, chati rek ava mdo huwn chaak nowl lamma nra, khur ava arkam thida mleen kbii namda. Au diltha mpha mruk tummi mma ava kparthle pik chra.

Au dilli neiji tku onna rek deinu, ungta mleen kuk ong rek hin kekṭewl rutan pii landa. Ungu Jisu rinpaumin tum leh Isowr pauna tummi mluw mdo reen rek, ungta saa, mdit mata pthla luwkbuk kma rek ungu mapchel leen mdit mata mkhut leenni kbiinam karlaang kma rek mmaan raothla rek rukka neiji deinu. Mmaanni rinkhu pha chlamda, ungu kum pun khat thu Khrista tu kilṭhi ngi paal lamda.
Kum pun khat mṭut du khim khai kdiyou mii angṭhe rukva rinkhu pha lamme. Hava ru kri thokki kring karheel kurthuwk.

Ru kri thokki kring karheel cha thu mtum kpha rek mii ava msuwkṭha ungu Kchiir. Hanto lulu ngi mvei knit naki kdiyou rutan ame, pdainu mmaanna Khrista leh Isowr ki thiimpu rek kurthuwk lamra, ungu Mma tu kilṭhi ngi kum pun khat kpaal lamra.
Ungta kum pun khat mṭut dok mpha thu, seitaan ava rowng inn thungki kparthlet ra.
Ungta dultipaam markil plii thungki chati rek kuhuwn chaak arhang kthuwk ra, tdit ava, Gog leh Magog, rawl karnaa rang ngi karchin lamra; mmaan msing ava truwn thungki sitphui jangi knem.
Ungta mmaanni dultipaam mkheng thungki thuwk lam donle kintiing rek amna sang leh nwonsat lo in khuwpii tukhul lamda, pdainu parwaan ki mei arjung ṭumda, ungu pka pthii lamda.
Ungta mmaan kuhuwn chaak dijabowl la saa ava leh kindit kma khulpu rek am ndaat kantup mei kṭuwng duwm thu kvar pthiira, ungu mmaan na kṭuw knai liit kma suwnjaan knai kma suwkthuw kpha chlamra.
Au dilli neiji tku onna kpowl dang tunni kuk ong daat klin khat Mma ava neiji deinu; dulti leh parwaan ava Mma maiṭhuwmki chen chda, ungu Mma tumra mun khat lee ame.

Ungta kdiyou rek, klin leh kdil ava tku onna maiṭhuwmmi rip daat lamda, ungu Laaika ava pvangda. Rinkhu Laaika leh ktlok khat rukka pvangda. Ungu kdiyou rek ka mmaan nongtlot dil kṭoiji, Laaika thu mdo kjit dil kṭoiji kṭewl da.
Ungta truwnni mthungki kdiyou ava pii pthiida, kdiyou leh sim mi mthung inki kdiyou ava pii pthiida, ungu mkheng ava mma mma nongtlot dil kṭoiji kṭewl da.
Au dilli kdiyou leh sim ava meiki duwm thu var pthiida. Mei ki duwm hava mvei knit naki kdiyou.
Ungta rinkhu ki Laaika thu ku mii khat mmiing ktaak ava meiki duwm thung ngi var pthiida.
Au dilli neiji Parwaan ren khat leh dulti ren khat deinu; mleija ru kri ki parwaan leh dulti ava vei dok da, ungu truwn rukka vei khat am nowl me.
Ungu Isowr hinki Parwaan ki arjung kṭum, Kchiir khuwpii, ren Jerusalem ava mi innpu tummi kmou kirsim lulu ngi, neiji deinu.

Ungta tko onna thungki krowl khat nei kdo aryaak klin langlang ava ngi theda, “Asuw, Isowr amna ava miirek tu kilṭhi a. Mmaan tu kilṭhi ngi Mma ava ka amra, ungu mmaanna Mma miirek kurthuwk ra, ungta Isowr mdaksaa katti kurthlo ṭhi lamra.
Mmaan mik tunki arthli khim khai Mma ngi kuknuwl pik ra, ungta kdiyou veikhat amnime, mdit mata kurnung karbaang, kṭap, mdit mata kdungksaan veikhat amnime, mleija chodu ki do ava kvei dokka.”
Ungta tkonna tunni kuk ong Mma ngi theda, “Asuw, Neiji do mkheng nga ren kpur owlla.” Mma ngi the nowlda, “Hava akjit, mleija hava pauna rek ka trin chaak kurhui ungu kindit kat.”
Ungta Mma ngi ki hin theda, “Mtlot dokka. Neia Alpha ungu Omega, mdo pṭhunna leh mṭut na ava ping. Mning kakraal hin tha rinkhu ki diitlaang kphul thungki mman ktaak dii Neiji pii chnik di.
Kapchaang rek mii ava ngi hava kpha chra, ungu Neia mma ki Isowr kurthuwk nik di ungta mma Nei kchapa ra.

Pdainu kṭi dei, krin kma, ktobor, nla tartlaang ngi kturkui kcha rek, mitrang ktlo rek, khut do sak pthla luwkbuk rek, plei knei mkheng rek tum ma mei leh kantup kṭuwng duwm kurthuwk ra, ava miknit naki kdiyou.
Au dilli mṭut naki tngana rek tikheu kdim jil tleengbeel mtikheuna ksin Waan tamsii tikheu thungki khat karvang ngi neia mhai karbiik ṭhida, theda, “Arhang, Jaonao ki numei kmou Neiji aju tdet ni.”
Ungta neia Pthla ngi kdung kparthaang lown ava tun tha mhanṭhi dokda, ungu Parwaan ki Isowr hinki arjung kṭum Kchiir khuwpii Jerusalem mhai tdet da
Isowr laarnee thloida. Khuwpii ava kheel siiki mman klu langlang lungrek, Jasper tdit lung kṭil, krystal heppi kchiir dang lung.
Ava klin langlang, mbang kchuwng, paltong sowm lei knii pum, ungta paltong ktaiji parWaan tamsii rek sowm lei knii amda, ungta paltong leenni Isreel chapa rek chati sowm lei knii miing kjit da.
Kniw thuwna ktong tha paltong rek kdum, karthak ktong tha paltong rek kdum, kurdu ktong tha paltong rek kdum, kniw tlaak na ktong tha paltong rek kdum amda.
Ungta khuwpii bang nga ber kcho sowm lei knii amda, ungu ava tunni Jaonao ki kenyee rek sowm lei knii miing sowm lei knii kjit da.
Ungta nei mhai karbiik ṭhi Mmava mdo owlna jeering kchung ava ngi khuwpii ungu paltong rek, ungta mbang rek mdo owl nra sinda.
Khuwpii ava markil plii amda, mdung leh mkam ma kinṭim chak; ungu Mma ngi khuwpii ava mukchung sinni owlda, meel pun knii arjaa plii, mdung, mkam, mchuwn ava kinṭim chak.
Mbang rukka Mma ngi owlda, ava Waan tamsii do owl dil kṭoiva khut liing arjaa khat som plii lei plii.
Khuwpii ava lung kchiir dang, jeering kchiir dang, kurthuwk da, mbang nga jasper tdit lung kṭil.

Khuwpii bang ber kcho rek ka lung mman klu langlang; ru kri reep ki ava Jasper tdit lung kṭil, miknit na ava saphire tdit lung haikowk reirui, mukdumna ava agate tdit lung kpindit sirser, miplit na ava emeral tdit lung ke er,

mparngat na ava onyks tdit lung knempok tpurchuwm, mtrukna ava Kornelia tdit lung ksen, mtikheuna ava Krisolit tdit lung monaang chengchung, mtret na ava beryl tdit lung ke er, mtukut na ava topas tdit lung monaang, msowmna ava khrisopras tdit lung haituk chui lulu ke er, msowm lei khat na ava Jasin tdit lung ksen ringreng, msowm lei knit na ava omethyst tdit lung kvom chengchung.
Ungta paltong rek sowm lei knii ava, sumbuwr sowm lei knii, paltong ktaiji sumbuwr khat khat. Ungu khuwpii arlakki lam ava likli heppi sekthleng ringreng jeering kchiir dang.
Ungu khuwpii ava thu luwbuk Inn khdaat pre neiji dei chmaang; mleija luwbuk Inn ava kapchaang riim Mukpu Isowr leh Jaonao.
Ungta khuwpii ava mleen ni kniw mdit mata thla len nra ame, mleija mar awng ava Isowr laarnee ungu meila ava Jaonao ava.
Ava ar awng ngi chati rekka kchet ra; ungu dultipaam ki kruwng rekki mlaarnee in ksin lamra.
Ungta suwnni paltong rekka arkam liit nime, ungu ava thang va jaan tdit amnime.
Ava thu mmaanni chati rek do panpaak leh do kjat na ksin lamra.
Pdainu ktobor, mdit mata tipder nong ktlo, mdit mata kar mak nong ktlo khat lee pre mthung ngi klut ronime, pdainu rinkhu ki Jaonao Laaika thu mdo kjit rek daat ra.
Au dilli Isowr leh Jaonao ko onna thu, lik kli kchiir ringreng rinkhu dii kreng,

khuwpii arlak thungki mlam ṭimmi mhai tdet da; kreng raalpha khat ktong thang rukva, mthla ktaiji thei kchui, rinkhu ding msik msik thei sowm lei knii ngi kchui khat amda; ungta ava ding arnaa rekka chati rek dam chaak na.
Pauhur tdit do khat lee ame, vei khat amnime, pdainu Isowr leh Jaonao ko onna ava thung ngi ka amra, ungu Mma sra owr rekki Mhin luwkbuk chlamra.
Mmaanni Mma maiṭhuwm kdei chlamra, ungu Mma miing nga mapchel tun inni ka amra.
Ungu jaan veikhat amnime; meila mdit mata kniw ki mar awng kriing lam nime, ungta mmaan na kṭuw knai liit kma kpaal chlam ra.

Ungu Mma ngi ki hinni theda, “Hava pauna rekka trin chaak kurhui ungu kindit kat kurthuwk. Ungta khulpu rek hin pthla kpii Mukpu Isowr ri kbeiji kthuwk rang kat ava msra owr rek hinni ktidet rangki Waan tamsii khat arju siida.
Ungta asuw, Neia kbeiji arjung nik di.” Hava Laaika rek dophuwn pauna rek karkhii kcha mii ava msuwkṭha.
Johon neiji havale ava aryaa nu ungu kdo dee chaak kurthuwk. Ungta neiji aryaa nu kdee chaak mpha thungva havale mhai ktidet kcha Waan tamsii ava neiji luwkbuk ra mkhu therri kuwn chnu.
Pdainu Mma ngi ki hinni theda, “Nang ngi ava ado tlot rang pme! Nei rukka nang leh nangki a u anao khulpu rek ungu hava Laaika ki pauna rek karkhii chrek sra owr sap in pmin. Isowr luw abuk cha.”
Ungta Mma ngi ki hinni theda, “Mpha mtoi tek leiji, hava Laaika thungki pauphuwn ki pauna rekka kbii namma.
Kṭha kma nong ktlo miiva atlo thlit chdaat so, ungu ktobor mii va tbor thlit chdaat so, ungta rinkindit miiva kindit nong atlo thlit chdaat so, kchiir miiva chiir thlit chdaat so.”
“Asuw, Neia kbeiji arjung nik di, ungu Neiki mnah ava mii pum ktaiji mma mma nong tlot dil kṭoiji Neiji arjun sin pik nik di.
Neia Alpha ungu Omega ping, ru kri ver ungta dil knau mdo pṭhunna ungu mṭut na ava ping.”
Mphrik ktur rown kursu kcha mii ava msuwkṭha, tditta rinkhu ding ava hintha kindit mdo phaak chaak nraan, ungu khuwpii ava paltong rek thu klut chlamra.
Duwn ki rekka uirek, mitrang ktlo rek, nla tartlaang kturkui rek, mii ke eayou rek, ungu khut do sak pthla luwkbuk rek, ungta kar mak ava wonsat loda ktlo mii pum ktai rek lam.
“Jisu Neiji nah hinni Rinlop rek tumra hava rinpaumin tu kilṭhi ngi Neiki Waan tamsii kju siia. Neia Devid arjung ungu mcharuwl, jiingsun ki bursi vaarpa kleng dang ava ping.”
Pthla leh kmou ava ngi theda, “Arhawng,” Ungta karyaa mii ava ngi “Arhawng,” kdingi atheso. Ungu ning kakraal mii ava ngi arhawng so, mman ktaak rinkhu dii ava kbin kcha rekki alou chlam so.
Hava Laaika thungki pauphuwn ki pauna rek karyaa mii pum ktai ava hin neiji pau kaktham chaakka: ku mii khatti mto pombi, hava Laaika thung ngi mdo the tngana rek ava Isowr ri kto pom pik ra.
Hava Laaika thungki pauphuwn rek pauna ava ku mii khatti mlo pthii bi, hava Laaika thu mdo the rinkhu ki ding leh kchiir khuwpii thungki mtum ava Isowr ri klou pthii pik ra.
Havale sakhi kpii Mma ngi theda, “Kinditti Neia arjung kat nik di.” Amen. Arjung, Mukpu Jisu.
Mukpu Jisu ki plungnee ngi kintiing rek mkheng nga aṭhi cha so. Amen.
